1b1(rnying rgyud):
1b2(rnying rgyud): phyag skad du/  drug
1b3(rnying rgyud): nas
2a1(rnying rgyud): shes don gyi snying po khro bo rdo rje'i rigs kun 'du sa rig pa'i mdo rnal
2a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor grub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bcom ldan
2a3(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag
2b1(rnying rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
2b2(rnying rgyud): bzang po rdo rjesang he ru ka gsang ba mchog bdag po byin gyis brlabs kyi dbang phyug/ mi zad mdzod kyi bkod pa/ 
2b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i don langam pa'i spyod pa/ sa bskyed pa de/ rmadu byung ba'i don 'di nyid/ bshad pa'i gnas gsang
2b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i yang gsang ba kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings kyi pho dang thig le bdal ba'i klong / ye 'byam rma du grags pa'i gzhal
2b5(rnying rgyud): yas rgya phyogs su yongs su ma chad pa/ chos nyid kyi na mkha' las cho 'phrul gyi sprin kun tu 'thibs/ byang chub
3a1(rnying rgyud): kyi char mngon par 'bab pa/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba bangs par gyur
3a2(rnying rgyud): pa/ ye shes kyi myu gu mngon par bsred pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa/ rtse mo kun tu rgya mnyam pa/ rin po/ 
3a3(rnying rgyud): che'i rgyal pos rnam par brgya na pa/ mu tig gi lhung lo dang / chun 'chang dang / lda ldis mdzes
3a4(rnying rgyud): pa nyi ma chen pos gsal bta ba pa/ zla ba chen pos phra bkod paskar ma dang shin tu skar ma dag
3a5(rnying rgyud): gis gzer spras pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i 'od snang bas kun tu mdangs phyung ba'i mkha' la/ rlung nag gi phung po rgyu yang / 
3a6(rnying rgyud): su ma chad par mnyam pa/ khrag gi phung po dpa' klong du 'khrug pa/ rgya phyogs su yongs su mched pa/ ma tang gi gnas
3b1(rnying rgyud): dang / bris ma 'bur 'bang bar chags pa/ rus pa phung po rgya kun tu mnyam pa'i bzhi la 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang 'od zer kun tu 'phro gag bu
3b2(rnying rgyud): cung brtsegs pa'i rtsig pa la gnam lcags kyi gzer ta le bar btab pa/ rtsibs kun du nyi ma dang zla ba rangs par 'phyo ba nya chen po'i ka gdung la/ 
3b3(rnying rgyud): nya phran dra ba gtams pa/ zla ba'i ka rten dang / nyi ma'i ka lo dang / sbrul chun gyi ka rgyan la sogs pa/ hUM gi thog dang / me'i char mngon par 'ang
3b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ chos nyid kyi bla res rnam par brgyan pa// ye shes kyi lda ldis mngon par bres pa/ rdo rje'i// rgyan dang 'phan gyis klubs pa sbrul nag/ 
3b5(rnying rgyud): gi zar tshags dang / sprin nag gi grib so lde bus gzhol ba'i bar bar thams cad na rin po che dang / mu tig dang / me tog gis mdzes pa/ 'kho
3b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i maN+Dal yo bkram la/ bam ril che chung dang / khog skam stong smad dang / yan lag ring thung dang dbang po'i phreng ba dang / rdo rjes kun tu spras
3b7(rnying rgyud): ba/ sgo dgus kun tu gsal bar gyur pa'i gnas na rdo rje rgyal 'tsha ba zhes bya ba'i zhe sdang rdo rje dang / rdo rje go phur zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal rin chen dang / 
4a1(rnying rgyud): / rdo rje ging zhes bya ba'i 'dod chags pad+mo dang / rdo rje karma zhes bya ba'i phra dog sna tshogs dang / rdo rje bya rog ces bya ba'i drod kyi rtag
4a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang / rdo rje dus mtshams zhes bya ba'i 'thun 'jug gi bka' sdod dang / rdo rje spun thams cad dang / rdo rje mong thams cad dang / rdo rje rig 'dzin thams cad nga
4a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje lus thams cad dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor thams cad dang / rdo rje ngag thams cad dang / rdo rje las thams cad dang / rdo rje yid thams cad dang / rdo rje ma thams
4a4(rnying rgyud): cad dang / rdo rje ging thams cad dang / rdo rje ma/ kha' 'gro thams cad dang / rdo rje shugs kyis 'gro ba tham/ sa cad dang / rdo rje phra men ma thams cad dang rdo
4a5(rnying rgyud): rjekun tu 'bar ma thams cad dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin thams cad dang / rdo rje srin mo thams cad dang / rdo rje slas dang / bye mo dang / bran mo la sogs pa bud med thams
4a6(rnying rgyud): cad dang / rdo rje mngag pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje khro bo thams cad 'du bar gyur pa// rdo rje rigs kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'gying bag gi tshul gyis bsnyengs pa mi
4a7(rnying rgyud): mnga' bar rdo rje'i gdan la 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/ cho 'phrul chen po namakha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / tshe
4b1(rnying rgyud): 'phrul chen po rnam grol sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / cho 'phrul chen po rnam grol sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / cho 'phrul chen po thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i
4b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas dang / na mkha'i bu mo dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / na mkha'i bu mo dga'i sdud ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / namakha'i bu mo rnam par gdung ma zhes bya ba'i
4b3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / na mkha'i bu mo sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo la sogs te/ shin tu gsang ba chen po'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang dam tshig chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ 
4b4(rnying rgyud): dam tshig chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / dam tshig chen po nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgya das dang / dam tshig chen po pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs
4b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas dang / dam tshig chen po bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'i sangs rgyas dang / dam tshig chen mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen po dang / dam tshig chen
4b6(rnying rgyud): mo nor bu'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / dam tshig chen mo pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / dam tshig chen mo rgyan gyi dbang phyug ma zhe/ 
4b7(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo la sogs te/ shin tu mi 'da' ba chen po'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang tshad med pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ gsang ba chen po byams pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas
4b8(rnying rgyud): dang / gsang ba chen po snying rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / gsang ba chen po dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang / gsang ba chen po tang skyes kyi snying ngo zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas pa/ 
5a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba chen po bde ba'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / gsang ba chen mo 'joms byed dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo/ 
5a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba chen mo dga' ba'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / gsang ba chen mo khyab pa'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / shin tu tshad med pa'i 'khor dang / 
5a3(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rol pa chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas yak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas rak+Sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen po'i sangs
5a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas b+hig sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen mo 'i rnal 'byor ma yak+Sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen mo'i
5a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rak+Sha she ri ka zhes bya ba dang / rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma b+hig sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma bi shwa she ri ka zhes bya ba dang / 
5a6(rnying rgyud): shin tu rol pa chen po'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ 'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas te sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen po
5a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas ke sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas pa sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs
5a8(rnying rgyud): byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma te shaM she ri ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma kau sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma be shwe she ri ka zhes bya
5b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / 'jigs byed chen me'i rnal 'byor ma bi shwa sho ri ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang 'joms byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste
5b2(rnying rgyud): 'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas trag sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas hr-i sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas ka sha he ru ka zhes bya ba
5b3(rnying rgyud): dang / 'joms byed chen pa'i sangs rgyas bag sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma trag sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen po'i rnal 'byer ma hr-i sha sho ra
5b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma ka sha da ri ka zhes bya ba dang / 'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma bag sha sho ri ka la sogs te/ shin tu 'joms byed chen po'i
5b5(rnying rgyud): dang / gzhan yang za byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ za byed cha na po'i sangs rgyas ru ti he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas rag ti he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen
5b6(rnying rgyud): po'i sangs rgyas kha hi he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas sa ha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma ru ti sho ra ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma tagau ti shor
5b7(rnying rgyud): ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma kha hi sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang / za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma sa ha sho ri ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor rab tu mang zhing bsam gyi
5b8(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa'i he ru ka mtha' yas pa sha stag rnams dang / gzhan yang gsang ba'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ gsang ba'i bu mo dkar mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo kun mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang
6a1(rnying rgyud): bu mo rmongs mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo ro langs ma zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo lbos mo zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo gtum mo zhes bya ba dang / 
6a2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bu mo sme sha can zhes bya ba dang / gsang ba'i bu mo mtshogs ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i bu me'i 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhan yang dga' ba'i bu mo'i
6a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor 'di lta ste/ dga' ba'i bu mo seng gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo bya rgod gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo stag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo wa gdong ma zhes
6a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba da'i bu mo dur bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / dga' ba'i bu mo mun gdong ma zhes
6a5(rnying rgyud): bya ba la sogs shin tu dga' ba'i bu mo'i 'khor bsam gyis/ mi khyab pa dang / gzhan yang shin tu gus pa'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ shin tu gus pa'i bu mo rta gdong man
6a6(rnying rgyud): bya ba dang / shin tu gus pa'i bu mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gus pa'i bu mo spre'u gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu gus pa'i bu mo thal byed ma la sogs pa shin tu gus pa'i bu
6a7(rnying rgyud): me'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang shin tu bsod pa chen po'i sras kyi 'khor la 'di lta ste/ shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal stag gi mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal g.yag gi
6a8(rnying rgyud): mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpa la sha ba'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal gzig gi mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal rta'i mgrin
6b1(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal spung ki'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal seng+ge'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal dom gyi mgrin zhes bya/ 
6b2(rnying rgyud): ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal bag gi mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal dred mo'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje bsod ma zhes bya ba dang / shin
6b3(rnying rgyud): tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje dur khrod ces bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen mo rdo rje gtun khung zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod pa chen me rdo rje gtum mo zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod ma chen me rdo rje
6b4(rnying rgyud): mda' snyems ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod ma chen mo de rje sgra 'byin ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod mche/ na mo rdo rje za byed ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje
6b5(rnying rgyud): 'dren ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje spror ma zhes bya ba dang / shin tu bsod ma chen mo'i 'kho ra rab tu mang po rnams dang / de dag la sogs te rdul phra rab snyed
6b6(rnying rgyud): dang thabs gcig go/ yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mo sa dza sho ri kas kyang nyid kyi sku la rnam par 'khrol te/ mdun gyis bltas nas thabs gcig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
6b7(rnying rgyud): gi bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mkhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes
6b8(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i ngang la rnam par zhugs so// thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa'am/ rnam par ldog pa mi dmigs so// de nas bcom
7a1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des dbyings kyi ngang la mi g.yo bar mnal bzhin du yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mos stong pa nyid kyi glu 'di blangs te/ rnam
7a2(rnying rgyud): par bskul to// yod med stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus// nam pa' bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klung // mi gnas mi dmigs rnam
7a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas gzhengs zhes bskul nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste/ 
7a4(rnying rgyud): dper na na mkha' dngas pa las zla ba dri ma med par shar ba lta bu 'o// de nas yums ba sho ri ka la gzigs te/ 'dzum pa rnam par mdzad do// dper na nyi ma stong las 'od kyi zer
7a5(rnying rgyud): bkye ba lta bu'o// de nas 'od kyi zer de dag las byang chub kyi mngon par 'khrigs te/ rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang / rol pa sna tshogs
7a6(rnying rgyud): kyi glog dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga dang / dung dang / ker kor dang / gling bu dang / rol pa sna
7a7(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi rgyan dang / rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang / steg pa dang / 'khyud pa dang / steng pa dang / sbyor ba dang / bstim pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyis gsol ba dang / myang / 
7a8(rnying rgyud): dang / 'cha' ba dang / bde ba dang / spro ba dang / 'jo ba dang / 'jug pa dang / rol pa sna tshogs kyis dga' ba chen po la 'jug pa rnam par mdzad do// de nas yum kun tu bzang mo des spyan
7b1(rnying rgyud): zithim pag kyis rnam par 'dud pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po la rnam par bltas te/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas rol pa chen po'i glu 'dis ga
7b2(rnying rgyud): ba btab po// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha// longs spyod rdzogs mdzad rol pa chen po'i sku// rdo rje sems bskal bzangs dpal khyod bdag/ thabs kyis rol pa bde
7b3(rnying rgyud): chen dbyings nas bzhengs// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des glu de bskul bar thugs su chud nas/ bde ba chen po'i ngang de las cho 'phrul chen por rnam par bzhengs/ 
7b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par bgying ba dang / rnam pa brjid pa dang / gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang / rnam par bshad pa sna tshogs zhabs kyi brgya bskum dang / sku'i 'gyur bag dang / smin ris kyi 'bri ku ta bsgyur
7b5(rnying rgyud): ba dang / sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad do// de nas thams cad/ dang / thams cad la mtshan ma dang / rnam pa dang / yod pa
7b6(rnying rgyud): dang / med pa thams cad la gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun la khyab par mdzad de/ de dag gi rang bzhin du rnam par gnas so// de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang mo de ngo mtshar du gyur
7b7(rnying rgyud): te/ yang rnal 'byor pa'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs te/ cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i glu 'dis gsol ba btab bo// ye shes sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab che la
7b8(rnying rgyud): mnga' brnyes pa'i// 'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs mdzad bzhengs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po/ 
8a1(rnying rgyud): des rdo rje rol pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas yum rdo rje kun tu ba
8a2(rnying rgyud): mo dang / dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu rdo rje rol pa'i de kho na'i glu 'dis
8a3(rnying rgyud): bskul te gsol ba btab bo// e ma ho// yid bzhin sku mchog na mkha' lta bu las/ khyab pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje gar mdzad cing // gzi brjid sprin dpung rol pas po sgyings
8a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku// thogs med rdo rje rol pa'i cho 'phrul ston// e ma ho/ yid bzhin gsung mchog sgra brnyan lta bu las/ snyan pa'i byin brlabs rdo rje brjod mdzad cing // yan lag
8a5(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho mi zad bkod pa'i gsung // seng+ge sgra yis gas sngags rgya mtsho sten// e ma ho// ye shes snying po nyi ma lta bu las// ye shes byin rlabs rdo rje bde mdzad cing kyi
8a6(rnying rgyud): le spros bral rnam par mi rtog thugs// rnam grol de nyid nges pa'i cho 'phrul ston// mi shes blun rmongs 'dam bying 'gro ba rnams// sdug bsngal rgya mtshos bcings pa thabs kyis khrol/ 
8a7(rnying rgyud): marig mun pas ldongs pa'i don gyi phyir// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rol pa'i gru yis sgrol// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs chen po// ye shes don gyi snying po mchog dang ldan// rnam
8a8(rnying rgyud): 'byor reg chen rdo rje kun 'dus rgyud// 'dus pa'i tshigs la rgya cher bshad du gsol// a la la ho// zhes nges par btud de gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das gas
8b1(rnying rgyud): mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje rol pa de kho na nyid kyi glu des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'dzum pa mdzad pas thugs na/ 
8b2(rnying rgyud): bar dag pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyis mo lang ba'i 'od zer dang bcas pa 'byam klas pa khyab par shar bar mdzad do// 'od zer de dag re re las rdo rje he ru ka rab tu mang po'itsha
8b3(rnying rgyud): shar bar mdzad do// de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag 'khor so so'i zha 'bring bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad do// de dag las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab pas mun
8b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i klong thams cad gsal bar mdzad do// rig pa'i chos kyi 'drug sgra dang / rig pa'i chos kyi char dang / reg pa'i chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang / gar sna tshogs dang / rig pa
8b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'byam klas pa'i nam kha' la sgra sna tshogs phan tshun dang / yan man dang / snrel bzhi la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par ling long chad
8b6(rnying rgyud): par byung ngo // mchod pa'i char yang mngon par phab rmad du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang ling long chad rmad du byung ba'i thugs kyang lhang nge'o// rmad du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyi
8b7(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa yang a la la ho// zhes sgra sgrogs/ sangs rgyas 'bum phrag kyang gsung dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig du/ e ma ho// rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don byung ngo // 
8b8(rnying rgyud): zhes sgrogs/ 'khor 'bum phrag dang gdul bya sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar skyed/ rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs don gyi phye ba phyung // ngom zhing ngo mtshar bar gyur te thams cad nye bar gnas so// 
9a1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'khor rnam par sbyong ba'i rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms
9a2(rnying rgyud): bapar zhugs nas rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs so// hUM hUM hUM rdo rje 'du bar bsdus pa yi// dam tshig chen po'i rigs 'dzin rnams// bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral 'khod// 
9a3(rnying rgyud): rigs ma yin pa rigs min 'gyur// bskal pa bzang po'i dam tshig 'di// skal ba ngan la 'bab mi 'gyur// de las 'das na de rlag byed// hUM kro d+ha dz+wa la sa ma ya/ rak+Sha dz+wa la sa ma ya/ 
9a4(rnying rgyud): yak+Sha dzA la sa ma ya/ tsid ta dz+wa la sa ma ya/ zhes gas dngas pa tsam gyis zhal ljags kyis dbang po 'od me dpung chen po las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang / srin
9a5(rnying rgyud): po'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang / gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'khrug ba dang / za byed 'od kyi 'phreng ba 'bar ba rgyud mar byung bas ru tra can dang / bdud dang / srin mo dang
9a6(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'jug sred dang / sred med dang / dbang phyug dang / stobs ldan dang / spre'u dang / ra dang / lu 'di dang / sbrang ma dang / bya rog dang / me
9a7(rnying rgyud): khyer dang / 'khor ba dang / chu dang / sa dang / na mkha' dang / me dang / sgra dang / bsam ngan la sogs pa brlag ste/ mi gnas par gyur cing / rmad du byung ba nyid du mdzad
9a8(rnying rgyud): de/ de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil ba dang / 'khor mang po dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa// skye maho/ e ma bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis
9b1(rnying rgyud): brlab du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des zhal gyi mdangs phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag ye shes kyi 'od zhi zhing 'khyil pa dang / mdzes
9b2(rnying rgyud): shing bde ba dang / ldan pas thams cad rangs par byas pas snod du rung bar rnam par sbyangs nas/ 'od de dag 'od kyi gnas su thim par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
9b3(rnying rgyud): gi bdag po des mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng+ge rnam par rgyal ba'i sgra lta bus don gyi bkod pa/ gsang ba'i nges pa rgyud kyi 'grel pa/ rtags kyi rol
9b4(rnying rgyud): pa/ rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po sgra 'dis bshadad do// a o o/ sa ma ya/ a d+hi/ gu h+ya pu ti a ho ku la ma tong byid ta badra a mo g+ha i shwa ra sa ya na gu ti
9b5(rnying rgyud): la la ho zhes cang mi gsung ngo // kun tu mi gsung / rab tu mi gsung / gsungs pa mi 'gog/ 'gog pa ma/ yin/ ma gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor
9b6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// rnam par bzhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la zhal gzigs te/ 'dzum pas bskul ba rnam par mdzad do// de nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa'
9b7(rnying rgyud): des bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi bstan las langs nas/ rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas nas/ lce pad+mo'i steng du bzhag nas lus sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor gyi
9b8(rnying rgyud): lugs su byas nas/ seng ge'i lta stangs kyis byas nas steng pa'i zhal du bltas te/ rdo rje rgyal po tshogs bdag dgongs su gsol// chos kyi rgyal po mi g.yo rgyal tshul mdzad// rgyal
10a1(rnying rgyud): mchog rgyal po chos kyi rgyal po'i mthus// 'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher bshad du gsol// a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las
10a2(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des rdo rje las kyi bka' ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces
10a3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// badz+ra karma tsakra sa twa raM zhes gsungs te/ rdo rje rgyu gram gyi 'khor lo gcig sems dpa' rdo rje'i lag du babs par gyur nas/ las kyi rdo rje'i dbang thob par
10a4(rnying rgyud): gyur te rnam par rol pa chen po shin tu bla bkyal da ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to// byin gyis dbarlabs nas kun tu mi gzob rab tu bag dang ldan pa chen por
10a5(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan ma de lag du blangs te/ stabs sna tshogs dang / gar dang klu sna tshogs rdo rje tshig tu len
10a6(rnying rgyud): cing rdo rje rgya gram las kyi 'khor lo de lan rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas grangs gnyis dang lnga bsgyur ba zhing khams mtha' dag rnam par g.yos te/ g.yos rab tu g.yos
10a7(rnying rgyud): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs 'ur
10a8(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur/ chem rab tu chem/ kun tu rab tu tshim par gyur te/ zhing khams thams cad ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor shes dag du gyur/ bcud yul thams
10b1(rnying rgyud): cad ni phyag rgya chen por gyur/ rnam par rngam pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun logasu seng ge rdo rjes mtshan ma'i gdan la 'gying bag gi tshul gyis rnam par gnas so// de nas 'dus
10b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs pal me che rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar byin brlab
10b3(rnying rgyud): che ba/ 'di ltar rgya che ba/ 'di ltar mkhas pa/ 'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las skyes pa lags so// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
10b4(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshigs sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub kyi sems thams cad kyi phyi mo// snying rje thams cad kyi bdag po// sangs rgyas
10b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi rje ba can/ byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yab/ rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi mes chen po// mya ngan las
10b6(rnying rgyud): 'das pa thams cad kyi ded dpon/ bdud thams cad kyi yang bdud chen po// chos thams cad kyi mdzod/ ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin// 
10b7(rnying rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa mnyam pa'i dus/ pho mtha' las kyang ba mtha'/ dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa/ 'byam klas pa'i dus nas bya ba byas shing
10b8(rnying rgyud): byed pa byas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor zhing gnas pas na/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thams cad
11a1(rnying rgyud): kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te/ de 'dra'o zhes bka' stsal ba las 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
11a2(rnying rgyud): 'dis ni 'di ltar ngo mtshar lags bde bar gshegs pa 'di ngo mtshar lags so// sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la logs su btud de lus sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor
11a3(rnying rgyud): lugs su byas te/ rmad du byung ba'i me tog dang // tshegs kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byas te// 'di ltar smad byung ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas thugs las rgyal skyes pa// ci
11a4(rnying rgyud): ltar zhing 'dir snang zhig gu/ rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal dpa'i sras// ngo mtshar khyod kyis spyod pas na/ bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// bsgrub pa'i lam
11a5(rnying rgyud): mchog dam pa dag/ tshig gis mtshon te gsal ba ra mdzod// a la la ho zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas dam pa rdo rjes rdo rje bskor te bsgyur nas brjid
11a6(rnying rgyud): bag du mtshon de smras pa/ oM AM hUM/ a la la ho// rgyal ba'i sras pos cang mi gsung // mi gsung bas ni rgya cher bshad// bshad du med pa'i chos 'di ni// rgyal ba
11a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis ma bshad de// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang // rnam par brjod par mi bzhed de// rgya cher bshad par dgengs pa'o// skye ba med pa'i chos rnams ni// ma
11a8(rnying rgyud): skyes par yang snying por bzhed// snying nge'i don du gang gyur pa// tshig du smra ba legs pa yin// spros pa nyid na grol ba zhes// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bshad// des
11b1(rnying rgyud): rdorje rgyal po nyid// bka' ma stsal par dgongs pa'o// dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa// ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ltar// dgongs don rig la snang gyur pa// ma skyes/ 
11b2(rnying rgyud): snying nge'i don gyis na// tshig du spro bar ma yin na'ang // mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor pa// tshig la zhib cing don la rtsing // tshig phyir blo 'brang rtsal zhan rnams// kri phyir bsam par
11b3(rnying rgyud): bya ba// mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa yi// cho 'phrul tshig gis mtshon pa ni// bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// gsang ba de nyid snying po'i don// mnyam nyid byang chub theg chen po// 
11b4(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bkod de nges brjod kyis// rgya chen 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste// stong par sbas pa'i don 'di
11b5(rnying rgyud): la/ dpes mtshon tshig gi lde mig gis// mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye byas// sbas pa'i don 'byin gsal/ byed pa// sa lu phub khrod snang me bzhin// gsal ba/ 
11b6(rnying rgyud): snang rnyed sa ler 'dug/ zab mer spyod pa la mos pas// gang zhig don la 'dris pa yi// gsang sngags spyod pa'i rang bzhin no// mthun pa'i dmigs bcu dper bzhag ste// rnal 'byor
11b7(rnying rgyud): can gyis shes par bya// sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang // gzugs brnyan dri za grong khyer dang // blag cha chu zla mig yor dang // chu bur 'khrul dang mgul mer snang // sgrub dang gas
11b8(rnying rgyud): sngags spyod pa dang // grub pa dang ni gnas dag dang // bzlas pa'i sgra dang phyag rgyar rtog/ ting 'dzin lta ba che 'phrul brtag/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ni// skyes bu dag gi rtsol ba dang / 
12a1(rnying rgyud): sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba las// dbang po yid 'phrog cir snang yang // de la 'gro 'ong ga la yod// de ltar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // yig 'bru
12a2(rnying rgyud): rdzas kyi sbyor ba las// grub par snang yang rang bzhin med// ji ltar smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni// zhing ba'i dus kyi zla ba la// dred dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba las// byis pa gdungs pa'i rang
12a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyis// chu yi 'du shes ci bskyed kyang // tshim pa'i rgyud ni ga la 'gyur// gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang // rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa la// mtshan ma'i tha snyad ming du btags
12a4(rnying rgyud): de nyid stong pas mong mi dmigs// dper na rmi lam rang / bzhin ni// skyes bu gnyid kyi dbang gyur na// thangacig skad cig yud tsam dang // lo la sogs pa de
12a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin du// bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin myong // sangs nas ci yang mi dmigs ltar// de bzhin sngag sa kyi spyod pa dag/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la// spyod/ 
12a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rnam pa cir snang yang // brtags na dmigs pa kun dang bral// gzugs brnyan snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// dper na gdong dang me long las// brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs/ 
12a7(rnying rgyud): byung yang // red par gyur pa ga la yod// de bzhin sngags kyi dngos grub kyang // sgrub dang ting 'dzin yo byad las// brten nas dngos grub tshul zung yang // gsol thob dmig/ 
12a8(rnying rgyud): pa ga la yod// dri za gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni// mkha' 'am yid kyi mkha' dngos lo// dri za'i gzugs ni gar byung yang // grong khyer de yang de nas byung // byung nas de yang mi rtag
12b1(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags grub pa'i gnas dag kyang // chos sam yid kyi mkha' ngos la// rnal 'byor gsang bdag gar bskyed pa// de nyid gnas pa'i gnal med khang // byang yang de la gnas ma
12b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// brag cha grag pa'i mtshan ma ni// dper na ngos la sgras rkyen pas// ci bzhin sgra ltar brag cha 'byung // byung yang sgrar thos dmigs pa med// de bzhin sngags tshig bzlas pa'i/ 
12b3(rnying rgyud): sgra// dper na med las yod btags pa'i// mtshan ma la rjen stong pa'i sgra// brjod pa tsam du bstan par zad// ji ltar chu yi zla ba ni// sgrib med mkha' las bla shar ba// gzug
12b4(rnying rgyud): brnyan dang ba'i chu nang snang // snang yang gzung ba'i rtog/ med pa// de bzhin gzugs snang phyag rgya yang // sems kyi mkha' las skur gsal ba// phyag rgya rigs
12b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ngo la snang // de ltar snang yang 'dzin rtog bral// ji ltar char gyi rgyun bzhin du// chu las chu bur rnam par 'byung // de yang cig gis rnam pa las// mang po'i rnam grangs du ma
12b6(rnying rgyud): sdud cing phyir yang dum bur 'chad// de bzhin rnal 'byor sgrub pa yi// ting 'dzin rnam pa mang por 'dod// 'khrul pa snang ba'i rang bzhin ni// spros bral dngos po stong pa las// srog dang shed can
12b7(rnying rgyud): byed pa po// sems can pa la sogs par snang // mig nad ngo la rdzas ltar snang // 'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad// de bzhin sngags kyi lta ba yang // cho 'phrul mang po cir 'phrul pa// snang ba med
13a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin la// 'khrul pa sna tshog snang bar zad// rnal 'byor can gyis de ltar lta// ji ltar mgal me'i rang bzhin// gang dag lag na mgal me thogs// bskor na 'khor
13a2(rnying rgyud): lo'i rgyun ltar snang // de la 'khor lo'i rang bzhin med// de bzhin sngags kyi cho 'phrul yang // mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las// ji ltar dmigs pa'i don 'byung ste// cho 'phrul sna tshogs rgyun mi 'a6
13a3(rnying rgyud): de phyir mtshan ma'i chos thang// mtshan med ngang du gcig pas na// rtogs pa'i bag chags ci byung yang // chos kun dbyingasu gcig pa'i phyir// rtog 'jug spros pa'i mtshan ma kun// mi byung ma skyes dbyi
13a4(rnying rgyud): nyid la// g.yos pa med cing cho 'phrul 'byung // yon+tan sna tshogs cher 'byung ba'i// gter gyi dbyig 'di gang mthong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon+tan yang // skad cigacig la de la 'dus// de bas yid bzhi/ 
13a5(rnying rgyud): rin chen 'di// ldog pa med pas dang du zang // den dam yang dgag/ ter gyi mchog/ rnal 'byor kun gyi nor mchog ste// gang hU~M/ gas de thob gcig pu nyid// 'brel med gzhan gyis thob pa
13a6(rnying rgyud): dga'// bdag med gnyis bral bde chen gleng // sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che// ye nas lhun grub 'dus ma byas// thig la chos nyid la 'byam pas// kun khyab brdal bas snying por 'dus// mi dmigs sgo/ 
13a7(rnying rgyud): / bral byang chub sems// zab mor snang ba'i nges don 'di// mnga' la mdud pa gting dpag dka'// rnal 'byor dmigs ldan blo chung zhing // gang zhig rtsal zhan de rtog pa// g.yor mo'i tshul du bdag rtag pa// 
13a8(rnying rgyud): rtags kyang rtog par mi 'gyuraro// dper na nyi ma'i snying po la// mig gi dbang pos rab rtags na// de rtags don de mi rtogs kyi// 'od kyi zer gyis mig rdzil 'gyur// de 'drar byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis// zam mo
13b1(rnying rgyud): don la cir brtags kyang // yang dag don de mi mthong gi/ blo zhan byis bag chad brgyal// brtag tu med pa'i chos rnams ni// rtog pa can gyis mi rtogs te// gang zhig de don mi rtogs phyir// g.yang sar / 
13b2(rnying rgyud): pa ci cha yod// gdod nas ma thos shin tu dge/ bsam dang bral bas de bzhin gzhag/ mi rtag bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang // byis pa rnams la ngas ma bstan// bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te// bstan du med cing go bar
13b3(rnying rgyud): dka'/ tshig gis brjod pa kun dang bral// 'di zhes bstan du ga la yod// med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi byed// mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing // yod kyi me long gsal byas na// nam mkha' dag la
13b4(rnying rgyud): brtags na// snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin ni// nam mkha' lta bur de nyid 'gyur// chos nyid na mkha' lta bu ste// namakha' la yang mtsha na nyid med// nam mkha' gang min brjod byed pa// brjod pa de nyid dngos
13b5(rnying rgyud): po ste// dngos po de yi ming brjod kyang // nam mkha' de la 'gag mi 'gyur// de bzhin mi rtog rjod byed pa// rjod pa de nyid rnam to// ga ste// rnam rtog de yi ming brjod kyang // mi rtog de la 'gag mi/ 
13b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de 'drar sems kyang de ltar blta// sems nyid gzhan du ma grub ste// de bzhin chos kyang grub ma yin// sems dang chos nyid gnyis med// sems nyid gang yin chos nyid de// chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin// chos
13b7(rnying rgyud): sems gnyis med ldan gyur pa// bla med byang chub chen por bshad// sems ni na mkha' lta bu ste// rnam par rtog bral gang mi rtogs// de bzhin sa gzhi chen po ltar// bla med byang chub myu gu skyed// me yi rang bzhinaH
13b8(rnying rgyud): snang bas// rmongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed// rlung gi rang bzhin yin pas na/ mi shes pa yi rdul kun sel// chu yi rang bzhin yin pas na// nyon mongs gdung ba kun mi byed// sman gyi ring bzhin min phran/ 'khor bas
14a1(rnying rgyud): gcong rnying rnam par 'byin// de ltar ci'i rang bzhin pas// 'tshe ba rnams kyi gsos su 'bab// de bzhin rno dpal rang bzhin pas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam
14a2(rnying rgyud): par gcod// nyi ma lta bur snang ba yis// mun khang snang ston sel bar byed// ri rab lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// brtan po mi 'gyur g.yo ba med// rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin pas// mi g.yo ba la
14a3(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs che// sems ni 'di ltar cho 'phrul pas// de phyir 'khor dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis su snang ba ma yin te// sems kyi rang bzhin bzang ngan las// gnyis kyi 'du shes phye ste bstan
14a4(rnying rgyud): sems las yang dag ye shes 'byung // de bzhin bde dang / sdug bsngal 'byung // chos dang sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung // dge 'dun yang ni de bzhi no// 'di las pha rol phyin
14a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang // byang chub dang ni pad+mo 'byung // 'di las rdo rje sem saM dpa' dang // dri med rini chen dpa' sbyin 'byung // de bzhin rdo/ rje dpag med dang // sna tshogs rgyal ba 'di las 'byung du 'di
14a6(rnying rgyud): las phyag rgya sna tshogs dang // rigs pa'i snying po thams cad 'byung // 'di las 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // sdug bsngal nga rgyal phrag dog 'byung // gti mug dag kyang de bzhin te// 'di las khams gsu
14a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang // skyes pa bud med ma ning 'byung // 'di las 'dod dang 'dod gzir dang // nyon mongs gdung 'dod chag pa 'byud ri dang skye bo de bzhin du// na mkha' dang ni rlung dag dang // sreg pa'i me ni rab tu
14a8(rnying rgyud): 'byung na 'di las sa dang chu dang ni// rdo nga sa bon myu gu 'byung // de bzhin glog dang skar ma dang // nyi ma zla ba sprin rnams 'byung // de bzhin spyod dang mi spyod kun// thams ci dang 'byung bar 'gyur// dper na na
14b1(rnying rgyud): mkha'i rang bzhin las// sprin dang na bun khug bla sa dang // zla ba nyi ma skar tshogs dag / snang yang namakha' bzhin du gnas// de bzhin sems kyi namakha' las// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ci byung yang // chos nyid
14b2(rnying rgyud): namakha' bzhin gnas par// rnal 'byor can gyis lta bar bya// de lta bu yi sems nyid ni// rtogs dang ma rtogs rang bzhin la// lta ba'i khyad par so sor blta// rtog pa can gyi ngog la// rtog pa 'khrul pa'i/ 
14b3(rnying rgyud): bor snang // kun tu nyer 'jog lam tshor la// kun tu rdul gyi phung por snang // tshogs spyod snying rje nyer 'jog la// thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar// de nyid mnyam par shes gnas na// na mkha'i rang
14b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin mthong bar gnas// ye shes rang snang ni mkha' la// nam kha' nyid du snang bar zad// brjod bral mthong med dmigs dang bral// mthong ba med pa'i don 'di ni// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams
14b5(rnying rgyud): kyis bshad// bde gshegs snying po byang chub la// dgongs pa/ 'di las gang mi mnga'// lta ba de dang ldan bzhin du// dam tshig na mkha' lta bu la// bsrung dang mi bsrung phyogs dang
14b6(rnying rgyud): bral tu 'di'o zhes ni bsrung du med// bsrung ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed cag/ dus gsum rgyal bas gsungs mod kyang // bsrung ba'i mngon gcig tu 'dus// nam mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas// nam mkha'
14b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dam tshig bsrung // de yang bsrung du med na bde// gzhan pa theg pa chung ba rnams// bsrung ba'i mtshams dag bsrungs nas ni// skyon yon chos la blang dor byed// bsrung dang bral ba'i chos rnams ni// 
14b8(rnying rgyud): bsrung du med pas de bzhin gzhag/ de bzhin pa yi dam tshig la// ji bzhin pa yi blo gzhag ste// rjed pa med pa'i sems nyid kyis// bsrung ba med pa'i ngang du bsdam// bsrung med na mkha'i dam tshig 'di/ 
15a1(rnying rgyud): ji ltar grags pa'i rang bzhin la// sdom dang tshul khrims so sor snang // byis pa rnams ni tha tshig sdom// bden gnyis rgyu la ston par grags// bla med mchog la dam tshig/ 
15a2(rnying rgyud): spyod du gcig gi don las ma g.yos kyang // 'dul dbang ngo la so sor grags// kho na nyid ldan dam tshig mchog/ de dang gang ldan dam pa ste// de las 'das na tshig par 'gyur// de phyir dam tshig chen
15a3(rnying rgyud): bo ni/ nam mkha' 'dra bar dpa' bos bshad// rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad la// dam tshig 'di las yong mi mnga'// spyod pa dag gi khyad par yang // chos nyid bya ba rtsol kun bral la// bsgrub dang
15a4(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i dmigs pa med// 'khrul pa gcod pa'i skye bong/ dag/ dmigs med byang chub bde chen la// sdug bsngal rtsol sems bcug pas nor// bya ba med pa'i chos nyid la/ 
15a5(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs bya me de spyad pas 'khrul// rang byung lhun grub gan sa bzhin du// byis pa'i spyod pas ci btsa la dgos// gang zhig 'dod de ci zhig sgrub// ci sprad ci bsgrubs ci brtsal yang / 
15a6(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal nyid de byang chub med// dmyal bsangs rgyas chen po la// sdug bsngal byang chub lam nyid// nyan thos rang rgyal sa gnyis dang // theg pa'i khyad par ci bstan pa// byed ba rtsol bcas pa tha~Md 'phrul bla med byang
15a7(rnying rgyud): chu ba gagasu che// gang zhig brtsal med bde chen don// sems kyi klong 'dis na mthong na// sgrabang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang // byis pa don med kyi na 'khyam// brtsal du med pa'i rang bzhin la// rtsol ba'i spyod pa
15a8(rnying rgyud): ci zhig bya// 'dzin pa med pa'i chos nyid la// tshig 'dzin nor ba'i rtsol byar med// bgrod du med pa'i chos nyid la// bgrod pa'i dkyil 'khor ming dang bral// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la// rtog sems
15b1(rnying rgyud): bsam pa'i dmigs dang bral// brtsal med pa yi chos nyid la// brtsal med ye nas lhun gyis grub// mtha' dbus med pas brdal ba che// phyi nang med pas ye gsal khyab// skyon yon med par lhun gyis// 
15b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs / bsgrub du med pas brtsal sems bral// gzung du med pas dmigs dang bral// thams cad mkhyen pas byin brlabs che// gdod nas byang chub snying por gnas// spyod pa'i khyad par 'di lta bu des
15b3(rnying rgyud): na gcig las med bzhin du// spyod 'thun rtsol ba'i rang bzhin la// rnam rtog spyod pa so sor snang // 'khrul pa thams cad 'khor bar spyod// rgyu 'bras mi slu bden don spyod// mi dmigs pa la na mkhar spyod na de
15b4(rnying rgyud): ltar spyod pa kun spyod kyang // dam pa'i don de spyod mchog nyid// dam par gyur pa thams cad la// dam pa'i spyod pa de las med// skyes bu ma cho ga gis de skad bshad// the tshom med par shes par gyis/ ma bsgo/ 
15b5(rnying rgyud): byang chub de bzhin nyid// bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid la// bsgom pa dmigasu med pa ste// ting 'dzin zhes ni gangag su med// bsgoms kyang rnyed pa ma yin la// de bzhin ma sgoms stor ba med// 
15b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom chos sna tshogs cir snang yang // bsgom nas de yi ngang mi gnas// de bas byis pa'i spyod yul yin// dper na byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis// sa la sogs pa gzugs sna tshogs// mdzes par byas nas skad
15b7(rnying rgyud): cig mthong // mthong ba nyid nam grub ste// skad cig kho nas zhig gyur nas// sa la sogs pa'i rdul du snang // de bzhin rnal 'byor byis pa yis// gzugs la sogs pa sna tshogs bsgom// sems kyi bye brag
15b8(rnying rgyud): skad cig la// yid kyi rgyu ba sna tshogs 'byung // byung ba bzhin du de ma grub// sems kyi skad cig dran pa la// yid kyis dmigs pa rgyun chad nas// byung tshor chad pa'i mtha' spangs te// chos rnams na mkha'
16a1(rnying rgyud): bur ni/ brjod med rgyun mi 'chad par dmigs// de don phyin cim log par// rjed med ting 'dzin sgom pa'i mchog ci phyir chos kyi dbyings nyid ni// namakha' lta bur 'dus ma byas// bsam/ 
16a2(rnying rgyud): / du med pas na mkha' 'dra// brjod du med pas gzugs dang bral// kun gzhi kun tu na mkha' la// yid ni mkha' la nyi shar 'dra// rnam shes nyon mongs sprin gyis khebs// 'du byed rlung gis kun bskyod de
16a3(rnying rgyud): gsal dang byung 'jug sangs dang 'gag/ rnam shes mtshan ma'i rtog pa yis// kun gzhi na mkha' mthong mi ster// kun gzhi mthong nyid chos sku ste// 'di don na mkha' ma brjod pa// ting 'dzin chen po rgyu/ 
16a4(rnying rgyud): mi 'chad/ gang zhig 'di don yid 'chang ba// gzugs kyi dngos po cir snang yang // sems ni ye nas mya ngan 'das// bden dan sangs rgyas thams cad la// dgongs pa 'di las yong mim
16a5(rnying rgyud): snang ba med pa'i nam mkha' 'di// ting 'dzin chen por gnas bzhin du// 'di las glags te ci zhig tshol// rgyal bas brtsam kyang yong mi brnyed// 'di las gzhan du gang tshol ba// btsal ba
16a6(rnying rgyud): nyid na chi chad 'gyur// gzhan nam dman pa'i sgo rnams ni// ting 'dzin med pa'i chos nyid la// 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin bcugs pas nor// de dag la ni gang spyod rnams// then tsher mig ni nam mkha' la// phra rab
16a7(rnying rgyud): then thag 'dzud pa ltar// byis pa las gang byed pa de// shed can dag gis byar mi rung // shed can spyod pa'i nam mkha' de// then tsher na mkhar shong mi 'gyur// de bas gzhan la bstan pa min// bstan na
16a8(rnying rgyud): byis bag chad 'gyur// chos nyid na mkha' lta bu'i dngos// gsal bar 'od stong nyi mas 'grub// byin rlabs 'od kyi zer phreng tsam// sgyu ma ltar snang mtshan mar thob// mi g.yo mtshan med rang bzhin dngos
16b1(rnying rgyud): skye med sems kyis ma mthong ba/ byis pa 'drid pa'i rtsed mor snang // dngos grub chen po'i sems nyid de// yid bzhin 'byung ba rin po che// ji ltar dmigs shing bsgyur bar 'gyur// grub pa'i don chen ba
16b2(rnying rgyud): cad rdzogs// sems kyis sems kyi tshul mthong na// dngos grub ces de dag las 'ong // gang gis stsol te su yis blang // sbrul dang stsol bar byed mi dmigs// dper na chu dang me long deng // mkha' dang ral
16b3(rnying rgyud): bri shel la sogs// gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin la// rnyog med la sogs bltas gsal ba// chu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin// de la ngo mtshar che mi 'byung // sems kyi chu gsal na mkha' la// nyon mongs
16b4(rnying rgyud): sprin gyis rnyog med na// dngos grub nyi zla skar tshogs bkram// sgrib med byin brlabs ngang gis 'char// kun bzhin mkha'i snying po de// nyon mongs sprin gyis gting spungs pa// shes rab rlung gis
16b5(rnying rgyud): ma gtor bar// ga zha mkhan gyi spro 'dri yis// sgrib bsal ches nyid gsal 'dod pa// ji ltar chus gsher byis pa dag/ nyi ma sprin ldan grib ma yis// shin tu sgrib par gyur pa na/ sprin che
16b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i phung po la// kha yi dbugs kyis bus byas na// sprin gsal nyi 'od gsal 'dod 'brar// de phyir rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// sems nyid don la rnam brtags te// kun bzhi rtsa ba shes pa
16b7(rnying rgyud): bya/ sems nyid de la bltas gsal ba// rtsa ba dang ni gang ldan pa// dus dang tshig dang lor gyur yang // yal ga lo 'dab 'bras bur bskrun// rtsa ba'i sa bon med mi 'gyur// ci ltar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor
16b8(rnying rgyud): rnams// nan gyis mtshan pa'i dngos grub dag/ byis pa'i sems kyis blang 'dod na// de yang mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur// dper na me yi rang bzhin dag/ sa dang nags tshal sreg byed pa// rgyu rnams chogs
17a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bden pa las// med las yod pa'i bden par snang // de ltar mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor yang // mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul thob 'dod pa// mtshan ma'i rgyu rnams tshogs pa las// mtshan/ 
17a2(rnying rgyud): ma rangs pa'i mtshan mar snang // shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la// byang chub spyod pa cher spyod pa'i// dam pa'i don la cher dmigs pas// gsang mchog rig pa'i dngos grub myur// mtshan mar mi rtog
17a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyis// zab mo'i don chen go ba ni// nges pa'i don gyis thag bcad// mnyam pa'i don la yid ches bya// ji ltar mkha' la tshig tsam du// ngang du brjod pas brjod byed kyi// brjod pa'i tha snyad dang bral
17a4(rnying rgyud): bas// ji ltar 'khrigs kyi smig rgyu dag/ snang ba nyid na med pa lta dar// cho so cog gi rang bzhin gsal// gsal ba nyid na de dmi dmigs// thabs chen gting zab shes rab la ma// spros bral
17a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i 'phreng las 'das// gtos ches yangs pas la/ gnyis bral// dbus mtha' mi dmigs mnyam pa'i lam// / gcig tu mnyam par chud nas ni// yul med tshol ba'o sas
17a6(rnying rgyud): bral de blang dor gnyis kyi mtha' spangs nas// gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// chos nyid dbyingasu ro gcig phyir// shes dang shes bya gnyis med// ye nas shes nyid chos shes na// chos nyid
17a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan nas btsal ci dgos// dper na sgyu ma'i bde sdug kyang // bsal nas gnyi ga ma dmigs ltar// 'khor ba 'gyur ba'i bde sdug kyang // mnyam par rang bzhin don gyis mnyam// ji ltar dus rnams
17a8(rnying rgyud): thams cad dag mnyam pa nyid rtog nas ni// sgros tshig rje sum 'drang na// mnyam 'gyur dus rnams ga la dmigs// mkha' la ring gis gzugs med phyir// dmigasu zin par mi 'gyur bzhin/ 
17b1(rnying rgyud): sems kyis ma skyes don mi dngogs// skyon dang yon tan gnyis 'byed pa// rtogs nas gnyis kyi don spangs te// rang bzhin mnyam par don gzhag na// bsgom zhes ming du brjod par zad// gnyi su lta/ 
17b2(rnying rgyud): ba ma skyes phyir// gnyis kyi 'du shes ci byung yang // rang byung zhi ba ma bkag chos// ye nas ma bcos don gyis gsal// ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// mi gnas ye shes thugs dang mnyam
17b3(rnying rgyud): rig dang ma rig khyad par las// 'khor 'das rten dang 'brel bar snang // rnam rtog med phyir zhi ba med// 'dzin par ma yin spros bral min// drang po'i don bstan ma gtogs par// don la tshig gis brjod
17b4(rnying rgyud): du med// snang yang med pa'i rang bzhin la// shes blo yod pa 'i sems mi 'byung // mnyam nyid stong pa'i don 'di la// / don ldan stong pa'i sgo mi 'dogs// ma bcos rang bzhin ni// 
17b5(rnying rgyud): ba yi/  mtshan ma'i rtog bral shes ldan pas// medo tsam du'ang mi dmigs na// byung tshor 'dzin par ga la 'gyur// thams cad mi gnas byang chub pas// brtsal nas grub pa
17b6(rnying rgyud): ma yin yang // sgyu ma sangs nas 'khrul bral bzhin// spros bral ye shes snying por gnas// 'khor bar rtog pa dug yin te// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi shes na// dug 'thungs bde ba ga las 'od
17b7(rnying rgyud): sbyar legs dug nyid sman du 'gyur// 'khor ba'i las rnams de ltar snang // 'khrul snang dug gzer gzod dka' ltar// ma rig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal snang // rmi lam sgyu 'phrul mi zad pas// shin
17b8(rnying rgyud): tu nyam thag gdungs pa'i tshe// 'chi bdag bdud kyis zin 'dra la// mgon btsun gzhan gyis mi phan te// bdud sel rtsi dang 'dra bar ni// yang dag la ma mchog rtogs par bya// dug nang smo sangs 'byang
18a1(rnying rgyud): ba la// skad cig ma la mi bzod cing // sman dang sman pa'i rtsol bsgrub pa// sangs nas de dag mi dmigs ltar// 'khor ba mi dmigs 'khrul pa la// rmi lam nad sel ba rtsol sgrub
18a2(rnying rgyud): ltar na sgrub dang ting 'dzin rtsol byed kyang // 'khor ba stong rtogs nyid byang chub// sgyu ma rgyu 'bras mi slu bzhin// blun rmongs ngo la de ltar snang // mnyam nyid rig pa'i rtsal can dag/ 'khor ba 'khrul pa'i
18a3(rnying rgyud): tshig tsam du// ma nor lam rig blo la gsal// de la rtsol thob rlom sems med// sems nyid don dang ma mnyam na// tshig gis mnyam pas don mi dpogs// 'khrul 'khor mnyam las ma g.yos
18a4(rnying rgyud): kyang Ta log rtogs sgyu ma'i tshul tsam snang // sems nyid ye sangs rgyas rig nas// rig pa'i don la brtson sbyor zhing // rang byung yon tan rtsal bsdud pa// 'khrul par 'brel pa ga la yin/ 
18a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems ldan pasam rdzogs na// ye shes mchog ldan mnyam nyid sku// ting 'dzin mchog ldan bla ma'i dbang // dge bsags mchog ldani lus spyod pa'i// bsod nams mchog ldan
18a6(rnying rgyud): gzugs kyi sku// rnam smin tshul gyis 'grub mi lta// brtsal nas thob par mi byed// rgyu yi dus nyid 'bras bu'i mchog dpyod pa'i sems nyid ting 'dzin ni// sems can dus na don la sbyor// lhun grubs
18a7(rnying rgyud): bgrod mi byed// 'khor ba'i sa shes bde ldan gnas// mi gnas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yang // byang chub 'khor ba'i lam dang 'brel// sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma bkag tshul// rang byung rtogs bral gcig tu man+ta
18a8(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi don brtsan par// chos nyid la yang chos nyid gsal// mnyam pas mnyam zhes tshig brjod kyang // mnyam pa'i don dang 'thun mi 'gyur// byang chub de yang mi dmigs te// mi gnas zhes ni gang
18b1(rnying rgyud): brjod cing // gnas dang dmigs pa'i gnas 'dzin pa// gzung 'dzin zhes ni de la bya// rgyu 'drar byang chub sems med na// dngos bral yul med stong pa dag/ mkha' la rang bzhin mi gnas zhes// bstan pa de na
18b2(rnying rgyud): yod ma yin// bsam gtan lus ni gtser byed dang // gnas de lus kyi phyag rgya kun// mtshan mor mngon par zhen las byung // mtshan med sems la bya bcol med// smig rgyu bzhin du lus red na/ gnas dang
18b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyar dmigs pa med// byed spyod che du ston byed cing // bya med bya ba'i dmigs pa'ang med// de nyid ma skyes gzhi med pas// gnas bder lus bcos kha na med// zhen par 'chos lam spyod byed pa// de nyid
18b4(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin rnam rtog ste// bsam gtan lus dben dben ma yi na// mkha' la sems dben dben pa'i mchog/ sems nyid du dben pa'i gnas yin te// 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod mchog gnas/ 
18b5(rnying rgyud): bla gab ri phug gzhal med min// sems nyid dpag yas/ gzhal med mchog/ 'di ni rmad byung nor bu'i gzhal/ phyi dang nang med kun tu nang // 'du bar 'dus pa tshogs ma yin// 
18b6(rnying rgyud): sems la ye shes tshogs 'dus mchog/ chos kun 'dus pas lus pa med// dpag med rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs// kun rdzob 'byor pa yo byad min// sems nyid 'byor pa rdzas dang ldan/ 
18b7(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i rdzas mchog 'di shes na// bsgrub 'grub 'di la the tshom med// sgom par byed pa sgom pa min// bsam bya dmigasu med pa ste// 'di ltar sems kyi gsang sgom pa// don la sems sgom ting / 
18b8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin mchog/ bsrung zhes bsrung bar bya mi dmigs// stong par sbas pa'i sems nyid// mtshan mar 'das nas tshig shes na// bsrung ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o// tshig tu mnyam brjod mnyam mi dmigs/ 
19a1(rnying rgyud): sems nyid rang dag mnyam pa las// mnyam pa'i don nyid lhag par med// 'di don mnyam shes mnyam pa'i don// rtul zhugs spyod pa spyod min te// sems la sems gzhol rol
19a2(rnying rgyud): spyod pa na thabs che yangs pa spyod pa'i mchog/ byang chub don gyi phyi mo ru// sems kyi phyi mor ye gnas pas// gsol thob mtshan ma'i ming mi dmigs// dngos grub chen po rgyun mi 'chad// de ltar seMs
19a3(rnying rgyud): kyis sems mthong na// ye shes kyis ni chos nyid mthong // dus kun tu ni skye 'gag med// sngon ma mthong ba'i don mthong 'gyur// de yang dngos po cang mi mthong // thams cad rang bzhin med pa zhig/ blo la 'gyus
19a4(rnying rgyud): pa kho nar zad// de lta bu'i don mthong na// mtshan mar mthong ba ci yang med// sgyu ma tsam du tshul shes nas// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i don snang 'gyur// kha cig dag ni de don la// mthong ba ci yang med
19a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur na// snang ba zhes ni ci phyir gdags// med pa'i don dang 'a/ gal 'gyur zhes// the tshom za 'gyur de dag la// mthong / ba med pa'i don de nyid// yid kyi ngo la snang 'gyur na// snang zhes de
19a6(rnying rgyud): phyir brjod par bya// de bas 'khrul pa ma zad par// nam mkha' mthong ba med pa de// de nyid yid la snang 'gyur yang // gzugs la snang bar 'gyur ba min// sems nyid bden par ma mthong na// yid la
19a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan med don gsal dang // mtshan ma 'khrul par rgyu ba gnyis// 'dren mar rgyu byed 'dral 'gyur min// de nyid bden par mthong 'gyur na// de nas de ma thag du yang // yid kyi rgyu ba rgyun chad nas/ sngar 'drul
19a8(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i chos bral te// des ni bden pa mthong ba yin// de bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshigs// sems ni yang dag lam nyid// mkha' la bya lam rjes med bzhin// gol med lam zhes 'dren pas bshad// de ltar
19b1(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'i lam de yang // kun gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// tshig tu mtshon te bshad mod kyang // dmigs med tshig gi yul bral ba// de yi rang bzhin de yin na// rang bzhin gzhi las mtshan mar bgro// 
19b2(rnying rgyud): de la ming med ming btags rgyus// yin dang ma yin the tshom skyes// de las rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur te// de bsal don phyir mtshan ma yi// tshig gi tshogs kyi rnam grangs las// sgo mo dpag tu med par bshad/ 
19b3(rnying rgyud): de yis nges don rjes bcad pa// thugs kyi klong nas bton pa yi// tshig gi sgron mas don btsal ba// laM nyid ji ltar yin zhe na// dran byung rje su 'brengs na ni// 'khor ba'i gnasu 'khor bar 'gyur
19b4(rnying rgyud): dran 'byung g.yo ba ci bkag pa// de dag 'gog pa nyid 'gyur// dran byung med par blun pa ni// mu stegs can lam mun par 'gyur// 'di zhes semasu gcig gzung na// mtshan ma rtog
19b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i ri bo yin// snga phyi med ces byang bcad na// med de chad pa'i mu can yin// gzhi yi don la yud tsam zhig/ cir ga skye 'gag byung ba de// rnam grangs lam de 'phel 'gyur gyi/ la
19b6(rnying rgyud): gyi chos nyid ga la 'gyur// dper na 'gro gang byis pa dag/ grib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshol// rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis// brtsal na grib med dag mi rnyed// don nyid ye nas gnas bzhin du/ 
19b7(rnying rgyud): sems nyid sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis// sha thang bar ni don tshol ba// don med bdud kyi las yino// don la tshig tu brjod pa ni// nam mkha' dag la bcod pa 'dra// tshig tu sman dang spang bshad kyang // 
19b8(rnying rgyud): nad pa'i tshogs la mi phan// sems nyid don du ma shes na// tshig tu don brjod don mi rtogs// 'khor ba spangs nas 'das tshol ba// gzugs btang nas ni grib tshol 'dra// lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe/ 
20a1(rnying rgyud): ma rig ye shes tha dad min// ma rtogs rtogs pa lam tu gcig/ sems 'di sna tshogs par snang bas// sna tshogs semasu gcig pa yin// dper na gser du gcig pa las/ dbying
20a2(rnying rgyud): dang gzugs ni tha dad par// byis pas so so'i ming du grags// grags kyang gser gyi ngo bor gcig/ de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin la// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul khyad par gyis// ji ltar bltas dgu der
20a3(rnying rgyud): snang yang // snang yang sems las gzhan mi dmigs// sgron mar 'bar ba'i rin chen ni// gal te ngan khung sbas gyur kyang // de nyid yon tan rang snang bas// 'od ni mkha' la gsal bar 'gyur// 
20a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin sems nyid rin chen sgron// lus ngag 'khor bar bying gyur kyang // rang byung rang zhi rang snang bas// shes rab chos nyi da mkha' la gsal// sems nyid na mkhar 'drar mtshungs te// 
20a5(rnying rgyud): kun khyab stong gsal sna tshogs 'byung // byung tshor g.yo 'gogathams cad kyang // rang bzhin gyis 'byung ngang gis zhi// mdor na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin// 'gyur bas thangad ngo // 
20a6(rnying rgyud): bor snang // ma bcos g.yo ba med nyid la// sna tshogs rgyu 'byung mi skyon zhing // cho 'phrul mi 'gag nyam nga med// ji bzhin na mkha'i rang bzhin la// blo bzhag ma g.yengs kho nar zad// de ni skyes mchog
20a7(rnying rgyud): don po che// de sems dus gsum thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ngo bo yin// de lta'i don la ring zhig nas// shes shing 'dris par gyur pa na// nges don mthong ba'i nyam drod ni// don dang mjal
20a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i rtags chen yang // man ngag lung gis brgyan 'char te// nges par don gsum myong bar 'gyur// de dag thog tu phebs pa yi// drod chen rtag su bstan pa yin// de yi zhar las byung ba'i
20b1(rnying rgyud): drod// 'khor ba'i chos la snying rje yi// byang chub sems kyang skye bar 'gyur// mtshan ma rtog pa'i chos rnams la// yid mi ches pa'i 'du shes skye// chos rnams 'di ltar yin pa las// 'di ltar
20b2(rnying rgyud): 'khrul pa ngo mtshar che// ya mtshan dpyod pa'i 'du shes 'byung // 'di don ma shes 'gro ba rnams// rtsol grub dka' ba'i thabs chen gyis// yang dag don tshol lam re ring // bsags pa'i bras bu
20b3(rnying rgyud): yod 'gyur yang // don de mthong bar yong mi nus// de 'dra'i 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar shes pa'i nyams drod ni// skal dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang // rgyud 'gros tshig gis ma bkrol bar/ 
20b4(rnying rgyud): sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas// smra ba'i sgo mor thams cad gsal// don la nges pa'i gtan tshigs dag/ tshig tu mtshon te 'byin par nus// de ni chos sku mnyam nyid dang // dbyer
20b5(rnying rgyud): med gnyi su med pa yin// rten pa'i gsung thugs sku brnyan da nga // de ni mtshungs pa yong mi no// zhi lus mthar 'gog/ skyon gnyis dang // de ni mtshungs pa yong ma yin// sa la blob
20b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems dpa' dang // de yang mi mtshungs rgyal bas gsungs// rigs dang drang srong don dpyod dang // lus 'dra sems ni yong mi mtshungs// de phyir rnam dag lam chen ni// sems kyi gsang 'di yin
20b7(rnying rgyud): pas na// ska ldan 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// lam 'di shes par bya ba las// brtsal bar bya ba'i sems med// lam 'di shes pa de nyid kyis// dka' ba'i brtsol sgrub ma byas par// thams cad thams ca
20b8(rnying rgyud): grub par 'gyur// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs/ de bas na sems 'di ni lam zhes bya'o// 'khor ba zhes bya'o// sems can zhes bya'o// gru zhes bya'o// bgrod pa zhes bya'o// byang chub ces bya'o// sems
21a1(rnying rgyud): shes bya'o// shes rab ces bya'o// ting 'dzin ces bya'o// gnas shes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// zab pa zhes bya'o// gsang
21a2(rnying rgyud): ba zhes bya'o// gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya'o// chos shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas shes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jug pa'i phyir ni la mo// 'khrul pa'i phyir ni 'khor ba'o// 
21a3(rnying rgyud): ma shes pa'i phyir ni sems cano// sgrol ba'i phyir ni gru'o// bskyod pa'i phyir ni dgrod pa'o// bde ba'i phyir ni byang chubo// dran pa nges pa'i phyir ni semaso// mkhas pa'i phyir ni shes rabo// gsal ba'i phyir
21a4(rnying rgyud): ni ting 'dzino// phyin pa'i phyir ni gnaso// zla med pa'i phyir ni rabo/ dro mtshar ba'i phyir ni mchog// 'phags pa'i phyir ni phu lo// dbang byed pa med pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa'o// gting ring ba'i phyir ni/ 
21a5(rnying rgyud): zab pa'o// gab pa'i phyir ni gsang ba'o// phra ba'i phyir ni gting da/ bag dka' ba'o// kun 'byung ba'i phyir ni cho so// sa non pa/ 'i phyir ni byang chub sems dpa'o// mthar phyin pa'i phyir ni sangs
21a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas te// sems dpa' chen po de'i phyir na rnal 'byor gyi lam 'di shes par bya ste// la 'di ni chos thams cad kyi gzhi'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yu mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad 'di la
21a7(rnying rgyud): byung ba'i phyir na gzhi'o// mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam 'di nas gshegs par gyur to// da ltar ston pa nyid kyang lam 'di nas gshegs pa ste/ de'i phyir lam 'di shes par bya'o// de ltar na de'i phyir
21a8(rnying rgyud): lam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab ces kyang bya'o// de bzhin du yum zhes kyang bya ba dang sras zhes bya ba dang / bdag po zhes bya ba dang / gdung zhes bya ba dang / srog ces bya ba dang / nor zhes bya
21b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang bran zhes bya ba dang / sku zhes bya ba dang / gsung zhes bya ba dang / thugs zhes bya ba dang / yon+tan zhes bya ba dang 'phrin la chen po zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theb chen po dang shre rab chen po dang / byang chub chen po dang / dbang chen/ 
21b2(rnying rgyud): bo dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 'da' bar dka' ba dang / chos nyid la zad mi shes pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / rnam par brjid pa dang / sna tshogasu ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / cir yang 'byung ba dang / mdzad pa/ 
21b3(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i phyir de dag ni de ltar yin par shes par bya'o// de'i phyir yang lam 'di yongs su shes par bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o// 'chi ba chen po zhes bya ba dang / long spyod chen po
21b4(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / yo byad chen po zhes bya ba dang / rgyu zhes bya ba dang // rkyen zhes bya ba dang / 'bras bu zhes bya ba dang / spyod pa zhes bya ba dang / cho 'phrul zhes bya ba dang / phyag rgya zhes bya ba
21b5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang / bsgrub pa zhes bya ba dang / sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang / tshogs cha na po zhes bya ba dang / kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
21b6(rnying rgyud): yul la 'dod pa sna tshogs pa dang / dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang / 'jol tog tu spyod pa dang / dgos pa bsgrub pa dang / 'bras bur byed pa dang / kun tu log pa dang / don grub pa dang / smin par bsags pa dang / 
21b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / bya ba byed pa dang / sna tshog su 'byung ba dang / mtshan mar bstan pa dang / rnam par 'dud pa dang / shin tu mi mjed pa dang / 'dod pa byed pa dang / lhag par 'dod pa dang / kun tu 'byor pa dang / 
21b8(rnying rgyud): / lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir yongasu shes par bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di la ni thams cad yod/ chos thams cad ni rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum du 'dus par shes par bya'o// gsum gang zhe na/ 
22a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu'i rnal 'byor dang / rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yang 'di nyid yin zhing 'di las 'byung bar shes par bya ste/ de yang ji ltar zhe na/ rgyu ni 'phrul pa
22a2(rnying rgyud): shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o// de bzhin du mtshan ma gnyis dang / rtog pa gsum dang / log pa bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / dbang po lnga dang / rgyu drugs/ 
22a3(rnying rgyud): rkyen bcu gnyis dang / skye ba bcu gnyis dang / rang bzhin bco brgyad dang / spyod pa bcu gcig dang / smon pa bzhi dang / lam lnga dang / gnas drug dang / mu gsum shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid
22a4(rnying rgyud): shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir te/ lam de nyid ma rig pa'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes bya'o// yul dang gnyisu gyur pa'i phyir na mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ 
22a5(rnying rgyud): dus gsum dngos por rtog pa'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya'o// nges pa lnga log pa'i phyir don las gol ba dang / mnyam pa las gol ba dang / phyogs las gol ba dang / gzhi las gol ba'i phyir
22a6(rnying rgyud): log pa zhes bya'o// rgyu 'bras kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir mun pas 'thibs pa dang / sred pas gdungs pa dang / sdong pos non pa dang / mi phyed pas 'thas pa dang / kun nas 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhes/ 
22a7(rnying rgyud): bya'o// kun nas 'dus pa'i phyir rgyu 'dus pa dang / rkyen du tshor ba dang / mtshan mar shes pa dang / thams cad nas byed pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i phyir phung po zhes bya'o// sgor gsal zhing yul la dbang byed pa'i/ 
22a8(rnying rgyud): phyir mthong bar dbang ba dang / thos par dbang ba dang / tshor bar dbang ba dang / myong bar dbang ba dang / reg par dbang ba'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o// 'bras bur byed pa'i phyir 'dzin par dbang ba dang / mnyen par byed
22b1(rnying rgyud): bdang / chags par byed pa dang / g.yo bar 'bung ba dang / skyed par gsal ba dang / dus su red pa'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o// rkyen du 'brel pa'i phyir sa bon dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gu dang / ldum bu dang / yal ga dang / 
22b2(rnying rgyud): sdong po dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / snying po dang / skams pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya'o// mtshan ma skye ba'i phyir mthong ba skye ba dang / snang ba dang / thos pa dang / sgra bsnyen dang / tshor ba dang dri dang / 
22b3(rnying rgyud): myong ba dang ro dang / reg pa dang / shes pa dang / chos skye ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya'o// mtshan ma'i chos nyid can gyi phyir mthong ba'i chos nyid dang / snang ba'i chos dang / lhang nge ba'i chos dang / thos pa'i chos
22b4(rnying rgyud): dang / grags pa'i chos dang / gsal ba'i chos dang / tshor ba'i chos dang / dri'i chos dang / tshim pa'i chos dang myong ba'i chos dang / ro'i chos dang / bro ba'i chos dang / reg pa'i chos dang / reg bya'i
22b5(rnying rgyud): chos dang / nges pa'i chos dang / shes pa'i chos dang / chos kyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos nyi da ces bya'o// mtshan mar spyod pa'i phyir 'du shes sgyur ba'i
22b6(rnying rgyud): spyod pa dang / dbang du spyod pa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang / sgro su 'dogs pa'i spyod pa dang / zla las gal ba'i spyod pa dang / kun du 'tshig pa'i spyod pa dang / bla bkyil 'tshal
22b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i spyod pa dang / chags pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa dang / kun tu bdud kyi spyod pa dang / phyin ci log pa'i spyod pa dang / gnyis las rten pa'i spyod pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o// 'bras bur smin pa'i phyir rdzogs
22b8(rnying rgyud): bar smin pa dang / rim par smin pa dang glo buro dang smin pa dang / bsgyur te smon pa'i phyir smin pa zhes bya'o// bgrod par byed pa'i phyir gdung ba'i lam dang / 'gog pa'i lam dang / mun pa'i lam dang / 'dam
23a1(rnying rgyud): gyi lam dang / yang ba'i phyir lam zhes bya'o// brten par byed pa'i phyir bzod ldan gyi gnas dang / yid ldan gyi gnas dang / mnyam ldan gyi gnas dang / 'dod ldan gyi gnas
23a2(rnying rgyud): dang / rtsod ldan gyi gnas dang / dga' ldan la gnas pa'i phyir gnas shes bya'o// bde ba'i mu bzung ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi mu dang / byed pa dang / dbang phyug gi mu bzung ba'i phyir mu zhes bya'o// 'dus
23a3(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i tshogs rkyen gyi rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ shes pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o// de bzhin du don gnyis dang / tshul gsum dang / thabs bzhi dang / chos
23a4(rnying rgyud): lnga dang / rigs drug dang / mdzad pa tshon po bcu gnyis dang / cho/ 'phral chen po bcu gnyis dang / ye shes bco brgyad dang / sa'i khyad par bcu gcig dang / sku bzhi dang / lam lnga dang 'bra
23a5(rnying rgyud): bu chen po drug dang / byang chub chen po gcig shes te chub par/ 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rang rkyen tsam du spyod cing 'bras bu'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'i
23a6(rnying rgyud): phyir te/ lam de nyid ma nor bar shes pa'i phyir de shes pa gcig shes pa'o// bden pa gnyis snang ba'i phyir don gnyis pa zhes bya'o// mtshan nyid gsum gyis sbyor ba'i phyir kun brtags 'thun pa la
23a7(rnying rgyud): yod pa'i tshul dang / gzhan dbang mi 'thun pa la med pa'i tshul dang / rjesu dpag pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i phyir tshul zhes bya'o// mkhas pas zin pa'i phyir khad kyis 'jug pa'i thabs dang / rkyen la
23a8(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i thabs dang / mngon par 'jug pa'i thabs dang / thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs shes bya'o// rang bzhin la gnas pa'i phyir rgyu'i chos dang / lam gyi chos dang / rtogs pa'i chos dang / 'bru
23b1(rnying rgyud): bu'i chos la gnas pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o// phyis 'byung bar shes pa'i phyir rgyu'i dran pa dang / 'bras bu'i dran pa dang / sgra'i dran pa dang / sbyor ba'i dran pa dang / gnas kyi dran pa dang / mngon sum pa'i/ 
23b2(rnying rgyud): dran pa dang / rig pa'i phyir rig pa drug ces bya'o// gzhan gyi don du mdzad cing 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo ba'i tshul dang / bltams pa'i tshul dang / rol pa'i tshul dang / mnga' dbang chen po'i
23b3(rnying rgyud): tshul dang thar bar gyur pa'i tshul dang / dka' thub chen po'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud btul ba'i tshul dang / cho 'phrul ston pa'i tshul dang / myangan
23b4(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i tshul gyi phyir mdzad pa chen po zhes bya'o// sna tshogs su 'phrul pa'i phyir ting 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang // snang ba'i cho 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun brjod
23b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / bsam/ gtan gyi cho 'phrul dang / byin brlabs kyi cho 'phrul da pa/ skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang / stobs kyi cho 'phrul dang / yon+dan gyi
23b6(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul dang / 'bras bu'i cho 'phrul dang / de'i phyir cho 'phrul zhes bya'o// phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i phyir nang gi chos thams cad shes pa dang / phyi'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes
23b7(rnying rgyud): dang / phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / stong pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / don dam pa'i chos nyid shes pa'i ye shes dang / 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad shes pa
23b8(rnying rgyud): ye shes dang / mtha' mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / dus gsum gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / bla dor mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye
24a1(rnying rgyud): shes dang / rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad shi ba'i ye shes dang / chos can gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye/ 
24a2(rnying rgyud): shes dang / dmigs pa med pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / mtshan mar mi rtog pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / 
24a3(rnying rgyud): dngos po mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang / brten te gnas pa'i phyir mi gos pa'i rig pa dang / mi nyams par rig pa dang / mi bsgrib par rig pa dang / rdzogs par rig pa dang / 
24a4(rnying rgyud): ma g.yos par rig pa dang / mnyam pa nyid rig pa dang / gnyisu me dra par rig pa dang / yongasu dag par rig pa dang / kun tu legs par rig pa dang / de ma thag par rig pa dang / rdzogs par chub pa'i rig
24a5(rnying rgyud): ba la brten pa'i phyir sa zhes bya'o// kun tu brjod cing ngo bo nyi/ du gnas pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang / chos nyid dang / rdzogs long spyod pa dang / 'dren par sprul pa'i phyir sku zhes bya'o// 
24a6(rnying rgyud): bgrod cing 'jug pa'i phyir tshogs dang / sbyor ba dang / mthong ba dang / sgom pa dang / mtha' zad du phyin pa'i phyir lam zhes bya'o// rgyu la don yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rdzogs pa dang / thams cad ma
24a7(rnying rgyud): ba dang / yongasu khyab pa dang / tshog su 'byung ba dang / kun tu dbang ba dang / dgos pa tshang ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya'o// mngon par rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub chen po zhes bya'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs
24a8(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ ma nor ba gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o// de bzhin du nges pa gnyis dang / yon+dan gsum dang / dgongs pa bzhi dang / chen po lnga dang / 
24b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa drug dang / 'byung tshul bcu gnyis dang / ting 'dzin bcu gnyis dang / ye shes chen po bco brgyad dang / rnal 'byor chen po bcu gcig dang / bsgrub pa chen po bzhi dang / sbyor ba lnga dang / dngos
24b2(rnying rgyud): grub chen po drug dang / rdzogs pa chen po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu nyid 'bras bur grub pa'i phyir gtan la phebs pas na ma nor ba zhes
24b3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// the tshom mi za ba'i phyir thabs kyis nges pa dang / shes rab kyis nges pa zhes bya ba'o// 'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir yang yongasu khyab pa dang / rlab su che ba'i yon tan dang / rtsis las 'das pa'i
24b4(rnying rgyud): phyir yon+tan zhes bya'o// thabs kyis ldem por dgongs pa'i phyir mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi phyir dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang / gnyen po'i phyir grangs gzhan la
24b5(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa dang / bsgyur ba'i phyir don gzhan la dgongs pas na dgongs pa zhes bya'o// lhag par 'phags pa'i phyir mdze/ na pa dang / bdag nyid chen po dang / de yin pa dang / thams ca
24b6(rnying rgyud): du che ba dang / kun tu rdzogs pa'i phyir chen po zhes bya'o// kun nas tshang ba'i phyir mnyam pa chen po dang / 'byor pa chen po dang / 'dus pa chen po dang / rig pa chen po dang / dbang chen po dang / 'dres
24b7(rnying rgyud): ba chen po'i phyir tshogs shes bya'o// gzhan gyi don du 'byung zhing 'gro ba'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i phyir gnasu bskyod pa dang / mnyam par gyur pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / spro bar spyod pa
24b8(rnying rgyud): dang / gsang bar sbyor ba dang / mtshan ma bcom pa dang / mdzad pa med pa dang / seng ge'i gsung sgra dang / nges par rdzogs pa dang / tsham ngam chen po sprul pa mdzad pa dang / yong su dag pa'i phyir 'byung
25a1(rnying rgyud): tshul chen po zhes bya'o// gsal zhing mi gtong ba'i phyir sems kyi spyod pa ste/ rnam dag dbyings kyi ting 'dzin dang / snang gsal yel 'phye'i ting 'dzin dang / mi zad mdzod kyi ting
25a2(rnying rgyud): dang / mngon par rtog pa'i ting 'dzin dang / thams cad rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'byung chen sprul pa'i ting 'dzin dang / dbang sgyur thabs kyi ting 'dzin dang / rtse gcig 'bros pa'i ting 'dzin dang / tshogs
25a3(rnying rgyud): chen rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dang / rin chen myu gu'i ting 'dzin dang / dug 'joms sman gyi ting 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting 'dzin gyi phyir ting 'dzin ces bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rgyu'i ye shes
25a4(rnying rgyud): dang / thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes dang / yi ge'i ye shes drang / phyag rgya'i ye shes dang / sprul pa'i ye shes dang / cir yang mdzad pa'i ye shes dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / na mkha'
25a5(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i ye shes dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes dang / rin po che lta bu'i ye shes dang / nyi ma lta bu'i ye shes dang / snang ste/ nga gsal ba'i ye shes dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang so sa
25a6(rnying rgyud): rtog pa'i ye shes dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shesu gsal ba'i phyir ye shes chen po zhes bya'o// 'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang / bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor// 
25a7(rnying rgyud): dri chen byed pa nal myo pa rnal 'byod dag gsang gro rung la myor dang / spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang / mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor dang / lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'gro
25a8(rnying rgyud): dang / rtsal chen sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang / lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i phyir rnal 'byor zhes bya'o// mnyam pa nyid grub pa dang / bde ba chen por
25b1(rnying rgyud): grub pa dang / yong su rdzogs par grub pa dang / thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir grub pa chen po zhes bya'o// rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyor ba dang / thabs dang shes rab tu sbyor ba dang / dbyings dang ye shes sbyor/ 
25b2(rnying rgyud): dang sems dang cho su sbyor ba dang / las dang thugs rjer sbyor bas sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o// srid pa rgya mtsho dbyingasu tshim par grub pa dang / 'khor ba rgya mtsho bdag gis grub par gyur pa dang / bdag nyid
25b3(rnying rgyud): chen po lhun gyis grub par gyur pa dang / dmigs pa gang yin pa de bzhin grub par gyur pa dang / cho 'phrul rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub pa dang / don dam bcud kyis rnam shes rgyas par grub pa'i phyi
25b4(rnying rgyud): dngos grub chen po zhes bya'o// rnam grangs thams cad byang churab kyi sems bde ba chen por rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir rdzogs par chen po gcig ces bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshigs sa
25b5(rnying rgyud): khyad par chen po bcu gcig non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste gang zhe na/ 'gyur dbang ma nges pa/ 'i sa dang / brten pa bzhi'i sa dang / gal chen sbyor ba'i sa dang mi
25b6(rnying rgyud): ldog gnas pa'i sa dang / bslab pa rgyun gyi sa dang / cho 'phrul sprul pa'i sa dang / brten pos khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa dang / dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba'i sa dang / gnas pas mi 'gyur ba'i sa dang / 
25b7(rnying rgyud): bdal ba chos nyid kyi sa dang / rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa ste/ sa 'di dag non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor bslab pa'i ma
25b8(rnying rgyud): bcu chib par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ gang zhe na gzhi dam tshig 'dis bzung bar bslab pa dang / rgyud thos pas bgrol bar bslab pa dang / phul du mkhas pas dbyung bar bslab pa dang
26a1(rnying rgyud): sgo kun nas bsdud par bslab pa dang / rim pa dbang gis bgrod par bslab pa dang / la spyod pas dor bar bslab pa dang / thag lta bas gcad par bsgruslab pa dang / nyam su ting
26a2(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis blang bar bslab pa dang / don man ngag gis bsgrub par bslab pa dang / mdo gcig tu bsdu bar bslab pa'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ yon+dan gyis che ba sbom par
26a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ gang zhe na/ che ba nyi shu dang / rol pa nyi shu dang / cho 'phrul nyi shu dang / rngom pa nyi shu dang / brjid pa chen po nyi shu dang / tog chen po'i nor bu'o// gzhan yang 'dus
26a4(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/ rma du byung ba'i mthu chen po nyi shu thob par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ 'jig rten chen po drug 'phang bar 'dod pa dang / chu'i phung po chen
26a5(rnying rgyud): po rngubs te bskam par 'dod pa dang / rlung gi bskal pa bcing bar 'dod pa dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum dgye bar 'dod/ pa dang / bsreg pa'i bskal pa chen po gsum gzhil bar 'dod pa
26a6(rnying rgyud): dang / nam mkha' thams cad pa spu gcig gis dgang bar 'dod pa dang / ba spu gcig las sangs rgyas bye ba dgye bar 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas bye ba ba spu gcig gi nang du shong bar 'dod pa dang / 'khor ba zad/ 
26a7(rnying rgyud): ba spu gcig du rngub par 'dod pa dang / ba spu gcig gis 'khor ba thams cad la khyab par 'dod pa dang / bskal pa'i 'khor lo chen po ring du bsrab par 'dod pa dang / thung ngu bskul bar 'dod pa dang / dus
26a8(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo chen po mnyam par bskor bar 'dod pa dang / 'khrul par bskor bar 'dod pa dang / las kyi 'khor lo chen po rgyun du bskor bar 'dod pa dang / rgyun gcad par 'dod pa dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo
26b1(rnying rgyud): bzlog par 'dod pa dang / lug su bskor bar 'dod pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo chen po rgyun gcad par 'dod pa dang / dmyal ba'i 'khor lo chen po dong sprugs par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab
26b2(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor rtog pa'i ri bo brgyad bcu rtsa gcig gzhil bar 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ dngos bzhi'i rtog pa dgu dang / 
26b3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma'i rtog pa dgu dang / brtags kyi rtog pa dgu dang / rkyen gyi rtog pa dgu dang / las kyi rtog pa dgu dang / spyod pa'i rtog pa dgu dang / bskyod pa'i rtog pa dgu dang / zhen pa'i rtog pa dgu dang / mngon par
26b4(rnying rgyud): rtog pa dgu'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ ltung ba'i sgo dgu shes pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ bdud chen po'i risu ltung ba'i sgo dang / mu stegs
26b5(rnying rgyud): gyi khams ltung ba'i sgo dang / srin po'i khamasu ltung ba'i sgo dang / gnod sbyin gyi ri su ltung ba'i sgo dang / ru tra chen por ltung ba'i sgo dang / bgegs chen por ltung ba'i sgo dang / lha chen po'i
26b6(rnying rgyud): su ltung ba'i sgo dang / sho gam gcan chen gyi ris ltung ba'i sgo dang / dmyal ba chen por ltung ba'i sgo'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ lam 'di shes par 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi
26b7(rnying rgyud): chos shes par bya'o// ci lta ci ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rtag par yang blta'o// chad par yang blta'o// skye bar snang ngo // dmigs par yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di ni 'dod chags dang
26b8(rnying rgyud): pa'o// zhe sdang dang bcas pa'o// gti mug dang bcas pa'o// nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o// phrag dog dang bcas pa'o// mtshams med pa lnga dang bcas pa'o// de dang nye ba lnga dang bcas pa'o// lci ba bzhin/
