27a1(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'o// log pa brgyad dang bcas pa'o// log pa brgyad dang yang bcas pa'o// gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshigs 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang bcas pa'o// ma byin pa
27a2(rnying rgyud): len pa dang bcas pa'o// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang bcas pa'o// brdzun dang bcas pa'o// phra ma dang bcas pa'o// ngag rtsub mo dang bcas pa'o// tshig khyal pa dang bcas pa'o// brnab ses
27a3(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa'o// gnod sems dang bcas pa'o// log par lta ba dang bcas pa'o// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs de bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos de rnams la spyod par 'dod pas lam 'di la bslab par
27a4(rnying rgyud): bya'o// shes par bya'o// goms par bya'o// klong du gyur dpar gyis shig ces sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas gsung so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdol
27a5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rang bzhin gyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che'i tshogs kyis rmad byung gi phyag rnal 'byor lugasu byas nas/ seMs
27a6(rnying rgyud): dpa' rdo rje dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po smra ba'i seng ge khyod la bdag cag shin tu zhu ba spobs na snang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / smra ba'i se
27a7(rnying rgyud): ge des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs ji ltar zhu ba'i don snang gis kun tu spobs pa skyed la zhu ba'i don gsol cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshim
27a8(rnying rgyud): kyis a la la ho/ zhes gsol to// smra ba'i seng ge chen po khyod kyis rgya cher bshad pa'i rnal 'byor rang bzhin chen po'i don gyi rje su bdag cag 'jug par 'tshal na/ 'di la 'jug pa'i sgo du mchis// 
27b1(rnying rgyud): thabs ji ltar lags/ lam gang ltar bde/ sems dpa' chen po 'di'i don rgya cher ba sha du gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag leg so// shin tu
27b2(rnying rgyud): leg so// nges par leg so// khyod kyis zhus pa'i don 'di rnams ngo mtshar che ste/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo gsal zhing rgya cher byed/ rna logs la gus par nyon cig gsal bar bshad
27b3(rnying rgyud): par bya'o// de nas 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i gsung sgra yis chos rnams kyi sgo 'byed pa 'di gsal bar bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas chos kyi sgo mo 'di// grangs mang bsam gyis mi khyab kyang / mdo
27b4(rnying rgyud): ru bsdus na gsum du gsal// rtsol bas 'jug pa'i sgo mo dang // grub pa thabs kyi sgo mo dang // mthar phyin 'bras bu'i sgo mo'o// dang po la yang gsum yod de// mtshan nyid thabs kyi sgom
27b5(rnying rgyud): dang // thub pa rigs kyi 'jug sgo dang // grub pa lung gi gas nga sgo'o// de dag sgo mo re re la'ang // gsum gsum yod par 'dren pas bshad// gnyis pa'i sgo la'ang gsum yod// shes
27b6(rnying rgyud): rab rtogs pa'i sgo mo dang // ting 'dzin goms pa'i sgo mo dang // smon lam grub pa'i sgo mor gsal// tha ma mthar phyin sgo mo la// rnal thar gsum gyi sgo zhes bshad// 'jug pa'i lam la'ang 'di lta ste/ 
27b7(rnying rgyud): dam pa gsum du gsal bar bshad// 'dren pa chen po'i bde snod dang // thub pa chen po'i 'jug sgo dang // dam pa chen po'i mdzod gsumo// 'jug pa'i thabs kyang 'di lta ste// thabs las thabs byung / 
27b8(rnying rgyud): thabs gsum ste// don dang yi ge ting 'dzin gyis// rje su gang gis rtags byas na// 'jug pa'i thabs kyis dam pa'o// don gyi rje su 'jug pa yang // don ni chos nyid snying po la// rjesu 'jug pa'i sas
28a1(rnying rgyud): yin te// sems nyid chos la sbyor ba'i skabs// rnam pa bcu zhes 'dren pas bshad// bcu nyid gang dang gang zhe na// 'dun pa skye ba'i gnas skabs dang // rtsol ba sbyor ba'i gnas skang/ 
28a2(rnying rgyud): dang // bslab pa 'jug pa'i gnas skabs dang // 'du shes 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs dang // sbyor chen la 'jug gnas skabs dang / ro nyid tshor ba'i gnas skabs dang // yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs pa
28a3(rnying rgyud): rtog chen nyid la phebs skabs dang // de nyid gdeng du gyur pa'i skabs// las su rung ba'i skabs dang bcu// bcu po de dag re re yi// skabasu sems dang chos phrad pas// rig pa byang chub sems re 'byung // 
28a4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems ni gang zhe na// 'di yi grangs kyang rnam pa bcu// / g.yo ba byang chub sems nyid dang // de bzhin smon pa byang chub sems// ldang ba byang chub chen po'i sems// de bzhin sbyo
28a5(rnying rgyud): ba byang chub sems// 'jug pa'i sems dang dge ba'i sems// mi 'gyur ba dang rig pa dang // gnas pa dang ni rdzogs nga'o// byang chub sems shes grags pas na// sems bcu
28a6(rnying rgyud): ngag du rgyal bas bshad// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de// skabs bcu dag tu sbyor bas na// gzugs brnyan chos nyid ngo la snang // gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ci ltar snang // phra mo tsam gyi skar ma/ 
28a7(rnying rgyud): dang // de bzhin skar ma tha mal pa// skar ma chen po dag dang ni// zla ba tshes gcig rnam pa dang // gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// brgyad dang bcu drug rnam pa yi// gzugs brnyan dag tu snang ba ste dang/ 
28a8(rnying rgyud): por snang ba cang ma yin// chu zla lta bur gzung du med// sems kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba dang // chos nyid gsal ba'i nyi ma gnyis// yul dang dbang po'i tshul lta bur// dbyings dang ye shes rang bzhin
28b1(rnying rgyud): gsal// 'di ni rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i lam// bgrod par byed pa'i thabs chen yin/ lam 'di goms par bslab bya na// rnal 'byor bslab par bya ba'i mtha'// gnas bcu dag kyang 'di lta ste / ji lta/ 
28b2(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi gshin pa la// brten nas sa bon btab pa las// 'bras bur smin par gyur pa yis// 'tsho bar byed pa'i srog 'dzin ltar// chos nyid kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// dam tshig 'di la brten
28b3(rnying rgyud): nas ni// dngos grub lo tog smin pa yis// dge ba'i srog 'dzin dam pa'o// bslab pa 'di yi dam tshig ste// bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin du// goms par bya ba rab tu gces// ji ltar cang shes
28b4(rnying rgyud): gyi ling dag/ sdom byed sgrog gis bcing 'gyur ba// bkrol byas bde blag byang 'gyur na// ci la'ang thogs med 'gro ba ltar// sems kyi cang shes dbang po 'di// mi shes bcing
28b5(rnying rgyud): pas bcings 'gyur ba// rnam grol thos pa'i sgo mo yis// shre/ rgyud kun grol thogs med 'gro/ 'di ni mi shes rgyud 'grol ba'i// bcing bar bya ba 'gro ba ste// rgyud nas dgrol
28b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i bslab pa ru// gom par bya ba rab tu gces// ji ltar ri mthon rtso mo la// sgyid mi lug par brtson 'dzegs na// mtho sar phyin cing rtse non pas// yul khams rtogs shing lam la mkhas
28b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin shes rab mthon ri la// sgyid mi lug par mnyan bsams na// kun gyi phul du shes rab phyin// mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med// don la mkhas par bya ba de// phul du dbyung ba'i
28b8(rnying rgyud): bslab pa ste/ shes rab chen po 'ad dag la// gos par bya b.rab tu gces// dper na bung gakhung tshol ba// kun tu 'jug cing byung nas ni// rang gi 'jul khung gang lon par// nges par 'jug
29a1(rnying rgyud): cing gnas pa ltar// rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshol ba// spyod sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu// lta sgor 'jug cing brtags bsdur na// ma nor nges pa'i dbu ma la// chos nyid don gyi rjes sa
29a2(rnying rgyud): phyir// sgo mo kun nas bskur ba yi// bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yin te// goms par bya ba rab tu bces// ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba// mang po'i dbang por dpon bstabs te// 'khor lo la
29a3(rnying rgyud): sogs rin chen gyis// kun la dbang sgyur thob pa ltar// de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba// chos kyi dbang por dpon bstabs te// phyag rgya la sogs rtags chen gyis// rim par kun gyi thog
29a4(rnying rgyud): mar 'gro/ 'di ni dbang gi khyad par te// sa la rim par 'byung ba yi// rtsal gyis bgrod cing bslab pa'i mtha'ang // goms par bya ba rab tu bcas// ji ltar glang po tshur/ 
29a5(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa// tshamatshom chags thogs yod med par// dga' ba'i long sprod brod tshul gyis// mi ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar// rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa'i blo// brtul zhugs rgya
29a6(rnying rgyud): mtsho'i chur 'jug pa// rtsal chen sbyong ba'i brod tshul gyis// chags thogs med par la dor ba'o// bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yino// spyod pa'i bslab pa dam pa ni// goms par bya ba rab tu gces
29a7(rnying rgyud): ji ltar khyung chen mkha' lding ba// gshog pa'i rtsal gyis nam 'phangs gcod// ngam grog chu klung mtha' yas kyang // gshog rlabs 'og tu kun chung ltar// rnal 'byor mnyam nyid mkhar ldid
29a8(rnying rgyud): pa// theg pa'i spyod sgo mtha' yas kyang // mnyam pa chen po'i don gyis ni// lta 'phang rlabs kyis thag gcad pa'i// 'di ni re dang dogs pa yi// the tshom gcod pa'i lta ba ste// don la sems kyi
29b1(rnying rgyud): lta ba ste// bslab pa 'di dag goms pagaces// dper na rgya mtshor nor len mi// sbrul dang chu srin sbrang ma las// sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun// dka' ba nyam su blangs nas 'grub ni/ 
29b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor bde tshel ba// rnam rtog bying rmugs byar yang dgra/ gzhom par dka' ba'i las 'di dag/ nyamasu blangs na bde thob rnyed// 'di ni ting 'dzin dam pa yis// nyam su blangs pa'i bslab
29b3(rnying rgyud): pa ste// sems kyi goms par bya ba'i las// 'dres par bya ba rab tu gces// ji ltar mun pa dug dang rdzas// sman snang gser du bsgyur bas na// 'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis// dka' ba'i las
29b4(rnying rgyud): chen sna tshogs pas// sdug bsngal spyad kyang mi grub ste// su ni gra man ngag ldan pa'i mas// tshegs med gyi na'i tshul gyis ni// bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar// rnal 'byor
29b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i don sgrub pa// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur man ngag dang // gang dag mi ldan pas kyang ni// dka' ba spyad kyang 'gru/ ba pa min// sems kyi gsang 'di sus mthong ba// de dag
29b6(rnying rgyud): man ngag ldan pa ste// 'dod pa'i don mchog gang yin pa// de dag tshogs med kyi nas 'grub// don rnams sgrub par gang byed pa// man ngag can gyis 'grub pa'i phyir// don rnams 'grub par
29b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba yi// bslab pa 'di dag rab tu gces// dper na kun du rgyu ba'i mi// 'dod pa'i yul du 'gro byed na// yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang // bgrod pa'i la mo gnas gcig las med// de
29b8(rnying rgyud): bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// brgyad khri bani stong chos bstan kyang // bkri zhing drang ba'i tshig yin to// bsam pa'i yul ni gcig pa'o// don rnams gcig tu sdud pa yi// bslab par bya ba
30a1(rnying rgyud): pa ste/ nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir// 'di dag goms par bya ba yin// bslab pa 'di la goms gyur na// lobs pa'i yonan mtha' yas te// lobs pas lam
30a2(rnying rgyud): la mkhas par 'gyur// sngags kyi yon tan chen po yang // rma du byung ba thob par 'gyur// gsang sngags chen po'i khyad par ni// thams cad thams cad bya'o cog/ byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod pa'o/ 
30a3(rnying rgyud): dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste// dper na na mkhar rgya 'tsho 'am// ji ltar me dpung rgyal po 'dra// de yang de yul che chung gis// khyad par nyid kyis bslabs pa yi// rgyal po de yang khyad par gyis
30a4(rnying rgyud): dbang sgyur bya ba'i khams rnams la// che chung rim pa yod rab yin// rnal 'byor sngags tshul de ltar snang // thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang // bab chod thadu 'jug pa ste/ dper
30a5(rnying rgyud): na glang chen chur 'jug pa// rab dang glang chen bab mi bab// de yang rtsal sgyid drag gzhan gyis// la la tha du gcod pa la// la la bsegasu 'gro ba yin// la la chung zhig bshan
30a6(rnying rgyud): thabs 'gro// de ltar rnal 'byor rgyu nyid na// 'bras bu'i don la bab tshod kyang // rtsal 'phang mtho dman khyad par gyis// ji ltar nus tshad der snang phyir// sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang // sgrib dang grol
30a7(rnying rgyud): sa rtog pa dang // spyod dang dam tshig ting 'dzin dang // dus dang dngos grub mthar phyir dang // lta ba'i khyad par gnas gyur rnams// thams cad gcig las med na yang // grangs dang dbye ba'i bye brag rnas
30a8(rnying rgyud): snod kyi rdul dang sbyar nas ni// chos rnams kun gzhir gcig pa la// kun gzhi gnas 'gyur rnam pa lngas// bye brag lam gyi chos snang // gzhi nyid rgyu yi kun gzhi dang // sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun ga// 
30b1(rnying rgyud): / dang // snang ba don gyi kun gzhi dang // 'gyur ba med pa'i kun gzhi dang // brtsal med gnas pa'i kun gzhi lnga// skabs lnga dag du gnas 'gyur bas// sa yi khyad par bgrod pa yin// de yang
30b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi chos 'di dag/ kun kyang yongs kyis rnal 'byor dang // 'gro don gsum gyis 'gro ba ste// dge don dang ni sgrub pa po// rig 'dzin zhes ni rdzogs pa yin// de na rtsal gyis khyad par gyis/ 
30b3(rnying rgyud): dang po las kyi rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chung ngu rnams// rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul/ spyod pa/ 
30b4(rnying rgyud): byed dang don 'dod pa// sbal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang / brtsal ba'i yul ni chad pa yin// nor bu las kyi 'phang dums pa// rang skal 'tsho ba'i ched bor nas// rgyal po thabs
30b5(rnying rgyud): kyis 'phang mtho ba'i// longs spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang / de dag mi 'thob 'tsho bral bzhin// bskal ldan can gyi don/ 'di dag/ skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o// sna tshogs
30b6(rnying rgyud): gter gyi khang pa dag/ rgyal po'i mdzod du gyur pas na// spyod sgo 'jug pa thams cad kyang // dka' thub phyi nang khyad par gyis// rin tshan sna dgu'i rim pa dag/ so so'i las thabs mtho dman gyis yul
30b7(rnying rgyud): de gcig las med na yang // yig tshang sgo dgu so sor spyod// rgyal por gyur na de kun la// dbang sgyur byed pa'i bdag po yin// mi gnas chos kyi dbyings nyid dag/ blta ba'i yul du gyur pa na// rig
30b8(rnying rgyud): pa rtsal gyi khyad par gyis// blta yul gcig las med na yang // so sor 'jug sgo kun nas spong // dbyings kyi rang bzhin gcig pa la// rtsal 'bang 'thon dman khyad par gyis// skas kyi gdang / 
31a1(rnying rgyud): / bu rtsi ba ltar// sa dang theg pa'i khyad par du// 'thon dman rim par snang ba yin// mnyam par gyur pa'i gni gcig la// 'thun dang mi 'thun don gyis ni// dper na khang pa
31a2(rnying rgyud): sgo mangs bzhin// sa dang thag pa so so'i sgo// mi 'thun so sor snang ba yin// so so'i theg pa'i sgo rnams la// 'jug pa la sogs ma sbyangs kyang // kun gyi rtsa ba 'dir gcad pas// gcig
31a3(rnying rgyud): te tha dad yongs kyis med// de ni ri dang lhun po 'am// kun tu rgyu dang gzhon ltar// mthong thos ston pa'i khyad par ni// don gyis de ltar yod pa yin// des na chos rnams thad kyi// rtsa ba'i sems
31a4(rnying rgyud): 'di yin pas na// nam mkha' lta bu'i dpes mtshon te// kun dgyi rtsa ba shes par bya// 'di ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byorar ba// lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa ste// lam stor lam/ 
31a5(rnying rgyud): btsal lam rnyed pas// nye lam bde rnyed grub pa'o// rnyed pa lam nyid gang zhe na// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa yin te/ sa bcu rims kyis bgrod pa'i phyir// sa yi khyad par bshad
31a6(rnying rgyud): par bya// 'di yi gnas 'dzin spyod pa'i sa// rnam pa bcu phrag gcig gis rdzogs// 'gyur dbang mo nges sa 'di la// bcos ma 'phra men spyod pa dang // tshul rtags 'dzin dang mos pa dang / dge
31a7(rnying rgyud): la 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor lnga// 'jug ldog ltung dang bcas pa yis// kun du 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o// 'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// gnas shing spod pa'i sa zhes bya// bsten pa gzhi'i
31a8(rnying rgyud): sa 'di la// dang po las can rnal 'byor dang // bslab pa sbyong dang nges pa la// ngag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o// dka' sdod las kyi dang po pa// gnas shing spyod po'i sa zhes bshad// gal chen spyod
31b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sa 'di la// gnas shing spyod pa'i sa yin te// rigs chen 'byed pa'i rnal 'byor nyid// dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kun// gcod sbyong sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis// legs nyes stobs chen byed// 
31b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bslab pa rgyun gyis 'di la// g.yo dang thob dang brtan badrod// de bzhin rtags tshen g.yo ba dang // thob pa nyid dang brtan pa yi// rnal 'byor rnam pa drug po dag/ bslab pa'i gnas bcu mthar
31b3(rnying rgyud): 'byin cing // ji ltar zla ba yang gsal bzhin// bslab pa'i ye shes 'phel 'gyur te// don la mi skrag ngo mtshar skye// dpyod sems 'jug pa'i shes pa des// ngan song mi log dgon par 'jug
31b4(rnying rgyud): bar chad dag kyang de la byung // gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang // spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang // mtshan ma rtags da kyi rnal 'byor gsum// gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad
31b5(rnying rgyud): bsod nams gter gyi sa 'di la// spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'a/ byor nyid// mos pa dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas// brtsal/ can blo yau bsti gnas sa// bslab pa'i mtha' bcu sprir tshig
31b6(rnying rgyud): pa'o// bsten pas khyad par 'gro 'di lo// dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang // rigs chen 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs che// nges par spyod dang rtsal chen sbyong // yul la 'jug dang rig par sbyor
31b7(rnying rgyud): bdun nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste// bslab pa'i rgyu 'bras 'di bcu la// goms par byed pa'i tshul du sbyor// ngal bso ba la thams cad mthong // mi ldog sa la goms char med// 'di dag sbyor// 
31b8(rnying rgyud): ba gzhi gcig kyang // so so thun mong ma yin pa'o// sgrib las zhes rtsi byed cing // ye shes re re 'char ba'o// de na bslab pa'i mtha' gcig la// mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams// mnyam
32a1(rnying rgyud): pa la bzhag re re la// ye shes re re 'char ba ste// tha ma rang byung nyid kyis rdzogs// mthar byin pa dang thob po dang // mi ldog rnams la rim pa bzhin// rmi lam dag dang sgra brnyan dang / 
32a2(rnying rgyud): mngon sum nges pa ci rigs par// rnal 'byor rdo rje gral sko ba// rdo rje rdo rje che ge mo// zhes ni nyid dang sa khams dang // zhing khams kun tu bsgrags byas nas// rnal 'byor lung rab ston pa'o// 
32a3(rnying rgyud): dmigs pas 'bras bu skye 'di la// grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor gsum// rgyal ba'i thugs las rgyal skyes shing // rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tshe ba pa
32a4(rnying rgyud): khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing // ting 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o// // gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la// tshigs chen 'dus pa rtsal chen rdzogs// gsum du rdzogs par shes bya ste/ phyag
32a5(rnying rgyud): rgya chen po rgyu ma yin// 'khor lor sgyur ba'i rgyal chen po// mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drug pa// rdzogs pa'i ga/ nas na longs pa'o// bdal ba chos nyid sa 'di la// rol pa
32a6(rnying rgyud): brgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang // bde ba tshe dang thig ler rdzogs// gsum nyid ni rdzogs pa la// yul don ye shes de sbyar ba// shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs// sgyu ma'ang sgyu ma yin spyod
32a7(rnying rgyud): la// rdzogs pa sbyor chibs 'di ni// bcu yi tha ma dang po las// mthar rdzogs kun gyi thog yin te// klong yangs na mkha'i snying po la// sprin med nyi ma 'bum gyi bdal// cir snang ci yang ma
32a8(rnying rgyud): yin pa// mi skye mi 'gag ngo bo la// ji ltar bltas dgu der snang ba// theg mchog spyi rgya'i rlabs kyis bcad// de yang lta ba'i khyad par gyis bdag nyid chen po'i rnal 'byor dang // lhun gyis
32b1(rnying rgyud): grub dang klong yangs chub// gsum rdzogs rang byung bdal ba'o// 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam// rnal 'byor can gyis bgrod par bya// gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// don gyi
32b2(rnying rgyud): rjes ni tshol 'dod na// tshig 'ga' thos pa tsam gyis ni// chog pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cig/ khyed kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi// yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor// spyod pa 'gyur bar byed mod
32b3(rnying rgyud): kyi/ yang dag don du yong ma gyur// chags sdang las la zhen mod kyi// dam pa'i don la yod ma zhe na// long spyod rgya cher byed mod kyi// chos nyid don gyi ro ma tshor// bdag med phyogs bral zer
32b4(rnying rgyud): mod kyi/ nyon mongs lnga dang yong ma bral// brtul zhugs rtog dang choms mod kyang // gzung 'dzin rtog pa yong mchom// / de bas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// thos pa tshig gi sgron
32b5(rnying rgyud): ma yis// yang dag don gyi gser btsal na// rtogs 'dod spre'u 'di bzung nas kyang // rkun mo byil btags byas te// gse khung skar khung kun dgag cing // khang stong pang phung
32b6(rnying rgyud): bshig nas ni// rgyal po'i skor mdzod kha phye na// de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas yin// yang dag don gyi lam tshol na// rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya// rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang // mtshan ma rgyu ba tsher rab
32b7(rnying rgyud): dang // byung tsher skyon lnga gsal bar bya// rtog pa la yang gnyis yod// rags dang phra bar snang ba yin// de bzhin mtshan ma che chung gnyis// rgyu ba ring mo thung gnyis// de bzhin tshor ba gsal migs la/ 
32b8(rnying rgyud): byung tsher gnyi su snang ba yang // myur ba dang ni bul ba'o// 'di ni don la sgrib pa yi// rtog pa chen po'i gags chen yin// ci phyir don de mi mthong phyir// mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang // kun tu/ 
33a1(rnying rgyud): 'thibs dang sprin phung dang // na bun lta bur bsgribs pa yis// yang dag mi gsal mthong mi 'gyur// 'di yang bye brag gnyis gnyis te// mun pa mun nag chen po dang / kunas/ 
33a2(rnying rgyud): 'thabs pa lta bu dang // kun tu 'khrigs dang bsgribs pa dang // 'thibs pa chen po chung ngu gnyis// sprin chen 'thibs dnga'al rol dang // na bun gtams dang ban bun gyis// gnas ngan
33a3(rnying rgyud): dang mi'i gnas dang // 'dod khams bzhi yi lha gnas dang // gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med khams// nyan thos rang rgyal gan su ltung // ltung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon chen ni// mtshan ma'i
33a4(rnying rgyud): g.yeng ba rnam drug yin// rang bzhin yul la g.yeng ba dang // de bzhin phyi rol g.yeng ba dang // nang mtshan ma'i g.ye rab dang // yid la byed dang gnas ngan len// 'di dag rab tu
33a5(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bya// bsal nas don la mnyam bzhag tshe// n+ta pa'i don la sgrib pa'i skyon// rnam pa lnga 'byung 'di lta ste/ byA tshor dbang gis g.yeng ba dang // bying rmugs dbang gis
33a6(rnying rgyud): pa dang // 'dzin chags dbang gis 'gog pa dang // ther zug dbang gis rtog pa dang // phyal ba'i dbang gis med pa ste// 'di ni mnyam pa'i skyon yin// skyon chen de dag glan pa'i chos// sems kyi/ 
33a7(rnying rgyud): lon 'di rgyal bas bshad// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rnam par mi rtog don tshol na// gcig pu dben pa'i sa bzung ste// tshad ma gsum dang ldan pa'i blos// rnam par rtog pa'i rjes
33a8(rnying rgyud): gcad pa/ yod med sngon thog ga las byung // brtags zhes rtog brtas las byung // rtog pa rgyu mar rab shes na// rtog pa'i ri bzhi par 'gyur// des ni gnas ngan gsum mi ltung // rtog pas/ 
33b1(rnying rgyud): las byung zhe na// mtshan ma'i chos las byung ba yin// mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na// mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur// des ni 'dod khams tha mar min// mtshan ma gang las byung zhe na dran
33b2(rnying rgyud): pa rgyu ba dag las byung // dran pa sgron du shes gyur na// rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed// mthu des 'dod khams gnyis par min// rgyu ba gang las byung zhe na// tshor ba dag las byung ba yin// dag ci
33b3(rnying rgyud): skye bar bya ba med// tshor ba sgyu mar shes gyur na// skyon gyi tshor ba sel bar byed// 'dod khams gsum par ltung mi 'gyur// tshor ba gang las byung zhe na// byung tshor phyi nang dag las byung // dag cing skye bar
33b4(rnying rgyud): bya ba med// de nyid skyon du shes 'gyur na// de ltar shes pa'i ma thu yis ni// 'dod khams bzhi par mi ltungango // byung tshor gang las byung zhe na// sems kyi chos las byung ba ste// sems nyid rgyu
33b5(rnying rgyud): mar rab shes na// sems kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur// phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la// sems nyid smig rgyu lta/ bu yin// yod med gnyis kyi mtha' las grol// de ltar / 
33b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rnal 'byor pa// 'dod khams lnga par ltung mi 'gyur// sems nyid yod pa'i dngos po 'am// med ces bya bar mi lta bar// mu stegs can du ltung mi 'gyur// bying rmugs can du ma gyur pa/ 
33b7(rnying rgyud): 'du shes med par ltung mi 'gyur// 'du shes rje su ma 'brangs par// sems can gnasu de mi 'khor// kun gzhi'i don la goms pas ni// nyan thos gnasu de mi ltung // stong zhing zhi bar mi bye/ 
33b8(rnying rgyud): pas// rang rgyal lta bar de mi ltung // rnam dag stong par mi byed pas// byang chub spyod par ltung ma yin// mnyam nyid stong pa'i don dag la// so so tha dad mi 'byed pas// sa yi rim par mi ltung ni/ 
34a1(rnying rgyud): rims kyis sbyang zhing 'bar ba med// yang dag don gyi rang bzhin ni// ci la mi gnas mi len cing // ci yang mi mthong thos pa med// cir yang mi byed byed dang bral// ci yang thos
34a2(rnying rgyud): pa rdul tsam med// cir yang snang ba med pa de// de ni snang ba dam pa yin// bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni// bsam du med pas de bzhin gzhag/ rang bzhin med pa'i chos nyid la// sems kyi
34a3(rnying rgyud): gyi ni 'da' skad cig mas// mi g.yo rgyun tu dran par bya// de ltar don la mnyam bzhag na// rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung // drod dang rtag dang cho 'phrul dang // mngon shes dang ni ye shes 'byung / 
34a4(rnying rgyud): drod ni g.yo dang thob pa dang // rtags ni byung dang brtan pa dang // cho 'phrul byung dang rdzogs pa dang // rig pa phra mo thams cad gsal// des ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin// dper na mun/ 
34a5(rnying rgyud): pa sangs pa dang // snang ba byung dang na mkha' dang // kun tu ma thong dang thams cad gsal// de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis/ ni// bag chags mun pa kun bsal te// ji ltar rlung gi sprin
34a6(rnying rgyud): phyogs ltar// skad cig tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis// sgrib pa'i phung po 'phyag par 'gyur// ji ltar mar mes mun bsal na// mun nyid snang bar 'gyur ba bzhin// skad cig ma yi don rig pas/ 
34a7(rnying rgyud): sngon nas bsags pa'i mun pa sel// des ltar rig pa'i skyes bu ni// don la rig pa'i sgo bye zhing // chos kyi mig dang de ldan pas// mthong thos le'u tshig bzhir bsdebs// sa pa yin pas
34a8(rnying rgyud): ngan la spyod// chos kyi mig dngam ldan na// mu mtha' yas pa'i tshig rnams kyis// don gyi tha skad ce brjod kyang // nor mnor gyi don mi dpogs// tshig phyir blo 'brangs de mu nod // bslab pa'i
34b1(rnying rgyud): dang lam pa yin// tshig don 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang // gzhan la ston par ma byed cig/ bstan na rdo rje bka' rkun de// dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// gang dag tshul 'phyos mkhan dag gi/ don la zla
34b2(rnying rgyud): shed ma bye bar// tshig dang yi ges khrid nas ni// mi shes bzhin du chos bstan na// sems can thams cad srog phrogs pas// mi shos chos ston de bas lho// de bos mnyam pa'i don 'di la// 
34b3(rnying rgyud): bstan te cig car 'jug shes na// bsgom pa'i yun ni ring thung dang // las 'phro yod dang med pa dang // nam grub snyam pa'i khar ma lus// mnyam pa'i don la mnyam bzhag na// de ma thag du rig
34b4(rnying rgyud): pa 'char na mnyam pa'i don las ma g.yos na// gzugs khams gnasu de mi ltung // mnyam pa nyid la ma chags na// // gzugs med khamasu ltung mi 'gyur// mnyam nyid mngon// 
34b5(rnying rgyud): du gyur pas na// nyan thos gnasu de mi bltung // ci yang med/ pa'i don mthong na// sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya// des na/ ting 'dzin khyad par 'di// rnal 'byor can gyis 'dris par
34b6(rnying rgyud): sgom// thams cad mi rtog skye med cing // rtog pa'i mtha' spangs na mkha'i dbyings// ji bzhin mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid// mtshan ma'i rtog pa yul las 'das// yul med na mkha'i rang bzhin
34b7(rnying rgyud): las// snying rje chen po'i byang chub sems// nyi ma stong gi dkyil 'khor shar// mtshan ma'i chos rnams kun la khyab// nyi ma 'bar ba snying po las// 'od zer yig 'bru'i mchog tu gsal// 
34b8(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'byung ba'i yi ge a// cir yang 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin lnga// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'byung // de yang rtsal gyis khyad par las// dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang // 
35a1(rnying rgyud): thos dang mthong ba la sogs te// sems kyi yul dang na mkha'i dbyings// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas par// rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge/ yan lag yi ge so so mi/ 
35a2(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas// 'phro 'du tshad kyang phyag rgya yi// tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhi no// 'di ni dang po'i 'jug rings te// mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o// yi ge'i ye shes
35a3(rnying rgyud): las skrun te// don byed pa dang phyag rgyar bskyed// rgya mtsho gnon dang na mkha'i skas// rlung bcing ba dang rgyun bzlog dang // bsreg pa'i bskal pa bzhil ba dang // nyin zla zhon dang 'jig rten
35a4(rnying rgyud): 'phang // sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'degs// stong gsum yung sa 'brur 'jug tshul dang // gzhig dang spar ba la sogs te // bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa// goms pa la su rung
35a5(rnying rgyud): ba yi// rnal 'byor rtsal chen sbyong bar zad// bzlas pa'i/ mthar phyin grub pa dang // bcing ba yongasu rdzogs pa dang // bsam pa la su rung ba dang // don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa
35a6(rnying rgyud): bya ba yongasu dag pa dang // don cig yul la so sor snang // des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang // dbyings nyid gcig la sgo mo kyi// rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad par gyis// bsam pa'i yul ni/ 
35a7(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs te// dang po'i sa la gnas pa yi// brtsam pa las kyi rnal 'byor pa// 'dun pa sems pa'i rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam drug/ shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang dmas pra/ 
35a8(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste// don la mthong bar mi 'gyur te// rang gi mos pa'i lha sgom na// lha yi sa bon gang yin pa// kha dog tshon gyis phye nas ni// sna yi dbugs la rgyu byas te// dbugs/ 
35b1(rnying rgyud): kyi yul du gyur tshad// zung bsgril par 'phro gsal ba las// 'phro 'dra'i gan su bskyed par bya// rang gi chag tshad dang sbyar ba'i// sku yi khyon yang de tsa mo// gnyis pa'i sa la gnas pa yi/ 
35b2(rnying rgyud): bka' sdong las kyi rnal 'byor las// sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi pa'o// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni// sa bon rang bzhin yi ge la// 'od zer 'bar bar bcas pa de// dri chung yul
35b3(rnying rgyud): ni tshun chedadu// 'phro 'du gsal bar bskyed pa las// rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i// sku yi khyon yang de tsa mo// gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor lung gi bka' bsgo las// 
35b4(rnying rgyud): sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnams gsum po// dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod// lha yi sa bon gang yin pa/ rang bzhin yi ger bsgyur byas te// 'od zer 'bar dang bcas
35b5(rnying rgyud): pa yis// thos pa'i yul ni tshun chadadu// 'phro 'du gsal ba/ byas pa las// rang gi chag tshad bzhi bsgyur tsam// sku yi/ khyon yang de tsa mo// de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhin// lha
35b6(rnying rgyud): yi khyad par gang yin pa// yi ge'i rim pa bzhin byas nas// 'phro 'du'i chad kyang de bzhin te// rim pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang // 'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang // sems kyi lcogs tshad
35b7(rnying rgyud): tshun chadadu// sku yi khyon gyi khyad par yang // chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pas// sku yi khyon gyis gang bar bsgom// gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// yi ge'i rjesu don dpags
35b8(rnying rgyud): na// yi ges don rnams ston par 'gyur// ci phyir don nyid yi ger snang // dbyings las a byung a las ni// yi ge'i tshogs byung sna tshogs 'bros/ a ni rang bzhin yi ge ste// rten dang bral
36a1(rnying rgyud): pas rgyu rkyen med// kun la khyab pas na mkha' 'dra// a ni chos nyid cho 'phrul te// chos nyid zab mo'i ngang las ni// cho 'phrul yi ge a byung bas// as ni chos nyid mtshon/ 
36a2(rnying rgyud): bar byed// a las yi ge 'bru'i tshogs 'phros te// tshig tshogs bstan pa rgya mtshor grags// yi ge'i sgra skad kun bzung ste// sna tshogs yi go'i skadu bsgyur// yig 'bru'i yan lag mang ponam
36a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin a yi ngang du 'dus// thugs kyi klong nas a byung bas// a yi 'od zer 'phro 'du las// mgur gyi gsang bar shar ba las// gsung sgra yi ge lngar 'bros pa// a ka kha ga khyA pa de nas
36a4(rnying rgyud): a yi 'od zer de// ljags kyi zla gam pad mor 'bros// ljags kyi 'thil du 'khyil ba las// 'od zer yig 'bru lngar/  shar ba// tsa tsha dza dz+nyAnya// de nas a yi 'od zer de// ljags
36a5(rnying rgyud): kyi rtse la 'bros pa las// 'od zer yig 'bru bcur shar ba/ Ta dza Da d+hA Na ta tha da d+ha na// de nas a yi 'od zer de/ zhal gyi sgo nas 'phros pa las// cho 'phrul yi ge lngar shar
36a6(rnying rgyud): pa pa ba b+ha ma// de nas a yi 'od zer de// phyi rol yul du 'phros pa las// cho 'phrul yi ge sna tshogs 'phros// ya wa ra la sha Sha sa hak+Sha/ oM I/ u U e I/ o o/ oM aH/ a las rma
36a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul 'od 'phros pas// yi ge'i phreng ba tshogs byung ste// yi ge'i yan lag ye shes la// sangs rgyas sku yi sa bon byung // dpag med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// sku dang gsung dang thugs sprul / 
36a8(rnying rgyud): chags khrag rgyam tshogs mdzes par snang // des ni miga'i rang bzhinan// rgyal ba'i sku nyid yin par bshad// yan thugs kyis boran te// gal sogs pa dang l+la// mgur kyigs ri
36b1(rnying rgyud): bzhin yin // gnyis pa tsa la sogs pa lnga// zla gam ljags kyi rang bzhin yin// gsum pa Ta la sogs pa bcu// ljags kyi rtse mo'i rang bzhin yin// bzhi pa pa la sogs pa lnga// zhal gyi sgros
36b2(rnying rgyud): las byung bar bshad// lnga pa ya la sogs pa yi// bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag/ sku las 'phros par rab tu bshad// zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las// sgrib pa sreg pa'i yig 'bru ha// gsang ba
36b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' ya'ang zar las// sgrub pa sreg pa'i yag 'bru ha// gsang ba'i mkha' yi 'od zer las// cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yig 'bru k+Sha// sku yi khrun tshad lte ba las// 'dod pa 'byung ba'i yig 'bru hwa/ 
36b4(rnying rgyud): thugs khar 'khyil pa'i dpal be'u las// mtshan ma dag pa 'i yig 'bru sha/ phyag gi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las// cho 'phrul ston pa'i yig 'bru shu/ skyes bu chen po'i dpung pa las/ 
36b5(rnying rgyud): rtog pa 'joms pa'i yig 'bru la// skyes bu chen po'i lta/ zur las// 'dod chags sreg pa'i yi ger// skyes// bu chen po'i dku skabs las// gti mug sel ba'i yi ge
36b6(rnying rgyud): wa// skyes bu chen po'i byin pa las// 'khor ba gnan pa'i yi ge 'bru yi// skyes bu chen po'i spyan gnyis las// rang bzhin yig/ i gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i snyan gnyis las// rang
36b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin yi ge u gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i shangs gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge oM gnyis shar// skyes bu chen po'i tshems gnyis las// rang bzhin yi ge o gnyis shar// skyes bu che/ 
36b8(rnying rgyud): be'i spyi gtsug nas// rgyal ba'i sa bon a du shar// des na yig 'bru'i yan lag kun// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gsung thugs// oM ni sku yi rang bzhin te// AHni thugs kyi mtshan nyid// yi ge'i phra
37a1(rnying rgyud): ba mang po kun// gsung brjod gsung gi rang bzhino// A ni chos sku'i rang bzhin te// oM ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams// sprul pa dren/ 
37a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i sku zhes bshad// a ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// oM ni rig pa'i ye shes yin// yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams// chos dang chos nyid rang bzhin yin// a ni brjod pa'i rgyu yin te// 
37a3(rnying rgyud): oM ni tshig tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// tshig gi tshogs nyid yi ge yin// yi ge ring ba'i tshig gi mdzod// yi ge 'od zer 'bar 'bros pas// chos dang chos ma yin pa rnams// ngag gi dbang po kha
37a4(rnying rgyud): don dang tshig du rgyas par 'gyur// sgra skad kun gyis sdus dpa'i tshogs// yig 'bru phreng ba'i ngang du rdzogs// tshig dang yig 'bru thams cad kun// oM gyi rang bzhin ngang du rdzogs/ 
37a5(rnying rgyud): gyi cho 'phrul thams cad kun// a yi rang bzhin dbyingasu ni// / a ni yig 'bru kun gyi gter// a ni chos kyi dpying su thim// des na rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams// sku dang gsu
37a6(rnying rgyud): thugs rdo rje de// 'dul ba'i dbang gi khyad par gyis// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang snang // sa dang na mkha' me dang rlung // chu la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis// 'dul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams la/ 
37a7(rnying rgyud): sa dang na mkha' la sogs pa'i// chu dang rlung gi ngo bor snang // gang dag sku yis 'dul ba'i tshe// sku dang gzugs brnyan ring bsrel dang // rten la sogs pa tha dad par// 'jig rten kun tu
37a8(rnying rgyud): ston par 'gyur// gsung gis 'dul ba'i dus byung na// dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu las// sogs pa'i sgra skad sna tshogs dang // yi ge'i gzugasu bstan nas ni// 'khor ba'i khams
37b1(rnying rgyud): snang bar byed// ci'i phyir zhe na yi ge ni// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te// thugs rje'i rang bzhin yin pas na// thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs kyis// thams
37b2(rnying rgyud): cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// de bzhin yi ge'i tshogs 'di yang // yan lag sbyor sdud sna tshogs kyis// thams cad tshig du go bar byed// yi ge rang bzhin ye shes ni// so so'i don rnams bshad par
37b3(rnying rgyud): bya/ a ni ma skyes ye shes yin// rang bzhin thams cad stong par ston// ke ni bya ba'i ye shes de// lam gyis thams cad grol bar ston// kha ni khyab par byed pa'i sgo// mi dmigs thams cad
37b4(rnying rgyud): grol bar ston// ga ni don du gyur pa'i sgo// yul med thams cad grol bar ston// g+ha ni gnas pa'i sgo yin te// gaN+DI dag du ma nges grol bar ston// nga ni 'dzin pa med pa'i sgo 'dzin
37b5(rnying rgyud): bral thams cad grol bar ston// tsa ni 'gag pa med pa'i sgo/ cir yang snang bas thams cad 'grol// tsha ni 'da' ba med pa'i sgo/ 'bral ba med pas thams cad 'grol/ dzan
37b6(rnying rgyud): ma byung ba'i sgo/ mi gnas pas ni thams cad grol// dz+ha ni rnyog ma bral ba'i sgo/ dri mi dag pas thams cad grol// nya ni spyod dang bral ba'i sgo/ bya ba med pas thams cad grol// Ta ni nga rgyal med
37b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgo ri bo med pas thams cad grol// dza ni sgyu rtsal med pa'i sgro/ byed pa med pas thams cad grol// Da ni 'dres pa med pa'i sgo/ rtsod pa med pas thams cad grol// zla ni slu ba med pa'i sgo/ 
37b8(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma thams cad grol bar byed// Na ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo/ 'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol// ta ni tha snyad med pa'i sgo/ brjod pa med pas thams cad grol// tha ni rten dang bral ba'i sgo/ 
38a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa med pas thams cad grol// da ni gtong dang bral ba'i sgo// len pa med pas thams cad grol// dzan rang bzhin med pa'i sgo// mtshan nyid med pas pas/ 
38a2(rnying rgyud): cad grol zhan ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo// 'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol// ba ni nges par byung ba'i sgo// 'gag pa med pas thams cad grol// ba ni dngos po med pa'i sgo/ ci yang med/ 
38a3(rnying rgyud): pas thams cad grol// ba ni brjod pa med pa'i sgo// brjod pa med pas thams cad grol// b+ha ni rdul dang bral ba'i sgo/ rtog pa med pas thams cad grol// ma ni chags pa med pa'i sgo/ 
38a4(rnying rgyud): rtag pa med pas thams cad grol// ya ni chags pa medapa 'i sgo/ gos pa med pas thams cad grol// wa ni rgyu rgya na med pa'i sgo// 'bras bu med pas thams cad grol/ 2na
38a5(rnying rgyud): rkyen dang bral ba'i sgo/ dor ba med pas thams cad grol// la ni blang ba med pa'i sgo/ yon tan med pas thams cang grol// sha ni spros pa med pa'i sgo zhi bas thams cad
38a6(rnying rgyud): grol bar byed/ Sha ni khur dang bral ba'i sgo/ lci ba med pas thams cad grol// sa ni yang dag gsang ba'i sgo/ nges pas thams cad grol bar byed// ha ni rgyu dang bral ba'i sgo/ rkyen dang bral bas
38a7(rnying rgyud): grol bar byed// a ni khams dang bral ba'i sgo// mtshan nyid med pas grol bar byed// i ni mthong ba med pa'i sgo/ gzugs dang bral bas thams cad grol// u ni thos pa med pa'i sgo// sgra dang bral
38a8(rnying rgyud): bas thams cad grol// e ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo/ dri dang bral bas grol bar byed// o ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo/ reg dang bral bas thams cad grol// oM na tshe 'phrul 'byung ba'i sgo/ cir yang snang / 
38b1(rnying rgyud): pas thams cad grol// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos// yong mthong snang grags chos thams cad// yi ge'i chogs mngon sangs rgyas// yi ger ma gyur gang yang med// chos nyid snying na
38b2(rnying rgyud): nyi ma la// 'od zer yig 'bru'i tshogasu 'bar// chos nyid na mkha' lta bu la// yig 'bru sna tshogs pra bkod pa// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// nyi ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer las/ 
38b3(rnying rgyud): 'od kyis 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'bar// yi gaM hUM gis 'od 'bros pas// rdo rje snying po'i sa bon zhes// rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du grags// nyi ma'i 'od zer rin chen las// yi 'bru 'od kyis 'phros pas/ rin
38b4(rnying rgyud): chen snying po'i sa bon zhes// rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags // nyi ma pad+mo 'bar 'phros pas// cho 'phrul yi ge'i a du 'bar// pad+ma rigs kyi zhing du grags// sna tshogs nyi ma'i
38b5(rnying rgyud): 'od 'bros pas// cho 'phrul yi ge ha ra gsal bas// sna tsheg/ snying po'i sa bon te// las kyi rigs kyi zhing du grag// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// thugs ni rdo rje yi
38b6(rnying rgyud): yin// ye shes dam pas sprul pa yi// rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la// rdo rje rigs shes bya bar bshad// yon+ta na ye shes rin tshan yin// rin chen de las sprul pa yi// rgyal ba dpag tu med
38b7(rnying rgyud): ba la// rin chen rigs shes bya bar bshad// gsung gi ye shes pad+mo ste// pad+mo ye shes las sprul pa'i// rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la// pad+mo rigs kyi zhing du grags// phrin las bya ba sna tshog
38b8(rnying rgyud): te// sna tshogs ye shes sprul pa yi// rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la// las kyi rigs shes bya bar bshad// sku ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la// sprul pa rgyal ba dpag/ 
38b9(rnying rgyud): med la// de bzhin rigs shes bya bar bshad// de bas rigs kyi gtan tshigs ni// ma bcos sku ni de bzhin nyid// mi 'gyur rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs// yon+tan kun 'byung rin chen rigs/ 
39a1(rnying rgyud): chags med gsung gi pad+mo'i rigs// bya ba byed pa las kyi rigs// sku yi sprul pa thams cad ni// de bzhin rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin// thugs las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni
39a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin// yon tan yul gyi sangs rgyas rnams// rin chen rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin// gsung las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// pad+ma rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin// 
39a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// phrin las rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin// ci phyir rigs shes bya zhe na// dang po de las byung ba dang // bar tu de yi bya ba byed// tha mar de yi rgyu 'dzin phyir// de phyir
39a4(rnying rgyud): rigs shes grags pa yin// dper na me dang chu dag dang / nam mkha' dang ni sa dag la// gnas pa'i sems can mtha' dag kun// gnas rgyun nyid kyi ming 'dzin te// me la
39a5(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can la// me yi yi dgas ma zhes zer/ chu la gnas pa'i sems can la// chu srin tA ra na zhes za 8// ci phyir lnga zhes bya zhe na// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad
39a6(rnying rgyud): la// sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang // mdzad pa 'phrin las nyid dang lnga// rig pa lnga dang lnga nyid du// thams cad kun tu gsal bar snang // des na lnga zhes nges par bshad// ci phyir zhes na
39a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun// lnga po de las ma gtogs pa// gzhan las byung zhing gzhan na med// sangs rgyas mtshan gyi khyad par yang // mtshan med pa las mtshan rtags pa// thams cad lnga po nyid las
39a8(rnying rgyud): btags// mtshan gyi bye brag thams cad kun// tha snyad tsam du gdags par zad// rigs med pa las rigs smos pa// 'dul ba'i dbang du lngar snang yang // dran pa'i don de dngos gzhi med// 
39b1(rnying rgyud): ci yang med las ci snang ba// mkha' la 'ja' tshon byung ba 'dra// chos kun na mkha' 'dra ba zhes// gsang ba mchog gi bdag por bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa yin// sangs
39b2(rnying rgyud): rgyas med cing sems can med// 'khor ba med cing chos nyid med// dmigs pa med de mi dmigs med// de ltar shes pa mkhas pa yin// rig dang ma rig tshul
39b3(rnying rgyud): gcig ste// de ltar shes pa rgyal ba yin// sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sems can de// sems can sangs rgyas gcig pa yin// de ltar shes pa'i rgyal ba
39b4(rnying rgyud): sras// byang chub phyir ni gang ma brnyes// ma brnyes gang yang de/ ma brnyes// brnyes pa med pa'i don mthong na// de ni brnye// sa pa'i mchog yino// gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor nas
39b5(rnying rgyud): lam gyi ngo bo tshol 'dod na// lam gyi rtags nyid dpes mtsho na te// lam gyi don la goms par bya// mi gnas mig ldan sgron ma yis// lam gyi rgyu la mkhas par bya// bag
39b6(rnying rgyud): chags rtogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams// sna tshogs dngos por snang mod kyang // nam mkha' dag la smig rgyu 'dra// de yang gtan tshigs nges pa yi// dpe yis mtshon te rtogs bya na// mkha' la sprin
39b7(rnying rgyud): pung 'ja' tshon dang // char la sogs pa'i rgyun snang yang // nam mkha'i cho 'phrul gcig du zad// rtag tu de ltar snang ba min// dper na sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yang // slu zhing 'drid pa cir snang yang // sgyu ma'i
39b8(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa snang bar zad// rtag tu de ltar snang ba min// dper na rdo yi dngos po yang // sra zhing mkhregs pa'i dngos po yang // brtags sam phye mar byas nas kyang // rlung gi mthu yis gtor byas na// 
40a1(rnying rgyud): da la rang bzhin ga la song// dper nam sa rang bzhin dag chang tshing skar sdur kun stug cang // 'bar 'gro snang gsal mched byed na// rgyu mthu yis brlag 'gyur // del
40a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin ga la yod// dper na rdzas kyi dngos po yang // me yi mthu yis sreg 'gyur na// de la rang bzhin ga la yod// shes pas zin pa'i sems can rnams// gzugs dang dran pa sna tshogs kyi
40a3(rnying rgyud): dbang po la sogs mdzes gyur kyang // phung po mi rtag shi 'bros na// dngos po brtan par mi 'gyur te// gzugs rnams so sor zhig nas ni// rus pa dag kyang mi snang ste// zhig dang rul la sogs
40a4(rnying rgyud): ba yis// tha mar ci yang mi snang 'gyur// ri bo chen po la so/ rags pa// dngos po brtan g.yo'i 'jig rten rnams// / bsreg pa'i bskal pa la sogs pa// bskal ba gsum
40a5(rnying rgyud): brlag byas na// de la rang bzhin ga la yod// des na dngos de'i chos rnams kun// dngos por brtags pa ma mi/ pas// chos rnams rang bzhin med par shes// 'di ni rnal
40a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor lam gyi mchog/ 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams goms par gyis// zhes sems dpa' rdo rje smra ba'i seng ges rnal 'byor mchog gi lam gsungs pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun
40a7(rnying rgyud): 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor rjes 'jug pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas smra ba'i seng ge sems pa'i rdo rje nge cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs ston pa zhes bya ba'i cho
40a8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// ting 'dzin de'i byin gyi rlabs las ning khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te// don yongs rdzogs pa'i snga ltas byung bar gyur to// 'khor der 'dus par bya
40b1(rnying rgyud): pa rnams la la ni nyi zla'i steng na gnas shing chos nyid ldan mkha' la lding bar gyur to// la lan ri rab rgyung mar 'phel// la la ni stong gsum chen po'i khams 'phen par gyur to// la la ni chos / 
40b2(rnying rgyud): bden pa'i don mthong bar gyur to// la la ni seng ge'i khri la 'dug par gyur to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de tshe 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis shin tu
40b3(rnying rgyud): mtshar che bar gyur nas/ sems dpa'i rdo rje de la rnal 'byor gyi phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po che 'phrul rgya cher gda' ba 'di don ji
40b4(rnying rgyud): bu lags/ rtags ci lta bu lags/ bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ smra ba'i seng ge chen pos bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnam
40b5(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ni don yongasu rdzogs pa'i ltas chen po yin te/ sgra lta sa kyi mtshan ma 'di dang sbyar na 'dus pa chen po'i rnams sa nas sar shin tu 'phar zhing yang dag nges pa'i don mthong
40b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i snga ltas yino zhes gsungs pa las/ rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po sa non pa'i snga ltas ni ji lta bu lags/ don mthong ba'i snga ltas ni ji lta bu lags
40b7(rnying rgyud): bdag cag rnams la bsha du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs leg so// khyod kyis zhus pa'i don rgya chen bshad par bya'o// 
40b8(rnying rgyud): rna ba lhogs la gus par nyon cig/ sgrub pa don gyi rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor don la sbyor ba'i tshe// spyad pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis// khams dang sa ni gar 'gro ba// mdo don tshul lngas lung
41a1(rnying rgyud): bstan// nges pa'i snga ltas byung ba'i// 'bras bu don gyi khyad par yang // tshe 'phrul sna tshogs ston par nus// de nas yang dag bden pa 'thob// nges pa'i snga ltas rnam pa lngan/ 
41a2(rnying rgyud): rgyurgya yi dus na 'byung ba ni// tshig gi brjod pa 'di lta ste// blo rtsal las kyi khyad par yang // snang ba lus kyi snga ltas dang // ngo mtshar rdzas rnyed tshul rtags dang // mtshan ma pra yi rmi ltas dang / 
41a3(rnying rgyud): 'dun pa mang po'i snga ltas kyis// 'bras bu gang dang gang 'grub pa// mtshan ma gsal bar rgyud las 'byung // dper na me yi snga ltas ni// du ba'i mtshan ma rgyas par 'byung // du ba gar bya
41a4(rnying rgyud): gnas de na// me nyid yod par nges pa yin// de bzhin chu li// snga ltas kyang // rlangs dang sngabs dang srog chags 'byung // de na chu nyid yod par nges// rlung gi ltas kyang 'di// 
41a5(rnying rgyud): lta ste// sprin rnams rgyug cing dum bur 'chang// des na rlung che na 'byung bar de/ ci 'tshal lo ma gang byung ba// de na gser khung yod pa ltar// snga ltas mtshan ma 'di dag gis// 'bras
41a6(rnying rgyud): bu 'thon dman gar 'gyur ba// rgyu la mkhas par byas nas ni// mtshan ma ci byung de la sbyar// bar chad med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// srog la bab kyang mi lta bar// rnal 'byor yul la 'jug pa dang
41a7(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rig pa'i rtsal sprugs pa// gnyen po kun bsten sa sbyangs nas// rnal 'byor sa la brtson par bya// 'dis ni gdon mi za ba dang // la la the tsho mi skye zhing // ma nges la zhugs the tshom
41a8(rnying rgyud): med// dper na 'jig rten byis pa dag/ yun rings ma la skyo ba ltar// snga ltas byung ba'i sgra thos na// shin tu brod pas mdun bsu ltar// ltas chen byung ba'i breng tshul gyi// shin tu brtson pas/ 
41b1(rnying rgyud): bde thob 'gyur// de bas snga ltas mtshan ma rnams// shes nas brtson par 'bad pa'i rigs// blo rtsal las kyi khyad par gyis// ting 'dzin drod kyi snga ltas 'byung // yang dag bden pa'i don bstan
41b2(rnying rgyud): na/ mi skrag ma dang dga' ba skye// yang dag don la nges bstas na// 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba skye// yang dag don la 'dris pa dang // rnam grangs chos la dad mi 'gyur// yang dag don nyid mthong ba na// tshig
41b3(rnying rgyud): la dga' ba mi skye zhing // don nyid nye bar 'dzin par byed// don mthong ba dang ye shes skye// ye shes skyes par gyur pa dang // dngos por snang ba thams cad kun// sgyu ma bzhin du shes par 'gyur// sgyu ma
41b4(rnying rgyud): du shes pa la// brten nas chos nyid don bltas na// snang ba ma dad pa' ngan nyid na// snang ba med pa'i don nyid ni// snang ba me/ dang bar mthong bar 'gyur// snang med srid pa mthong ba'i tshe cha
41b5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung // de nyid bden pa'i snga lta so// nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// rdul phran 'dra ba'i mtshan ma 'byung // de ni g.yo ba'i snga lta so// de nas smig rgyu lta bur 'byur/ 
41b6(rnying rgyud): dang po'i drod ces bya bar bshad// de nas mtsho yi rlabs ltar 'byung // ber gyi drod ces bya bar bshad// de nas rlung chen lta bur yang // thogs pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur// tha ma'i drod ces bya bar bshad/ 
41b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yig 'bru'i drod spros pas// char chen 'bab pa lta bur 'byung // de ni thob pa'i drod ces bya// de nas mkha' la sprin ldings bzhin// ting 'dzin rtsa 'phangs mtho bar 'gyur// de na shin du brtan pa'i
41b8(rnying rgyud): drod// de nas ta la gcig tsam du// bdag gi lus ni dbang med par// mkha' la 'bar zhing 'phags par rtsol// 'di ni shin tu gsal ba'i drod// de nas sa chen g.yo ba ltar// shin tu yam yom mar
42a1(rnying rgyud): mer 'byung // 'di ni dang po'i rtags shes bya// de nas ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs na// ci ltar dmigs pa der 'grub ste// me yi skye mched der bsgoms na// me yi rang bzhin nyid 'gyur/ 
42a2(rnying rgyud): chu yi skye mched der bsgoms na// chu yi skye mched nyid du 'gyur// rlung gi skye mched der bsgoms na// rlung gi skye mched nyid 'gyur// yig 'bru'i skye mched der bsgoms na// yig 'bru'i gang ltar gsal bar
42a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de ltar rdzas kyi skye mched du// gang ltar bsgoms pa de ltar 'gyur// de ni rtags chen thob pa yin// blo yi ting 'dzin rtsal rdzogs na// ngag gi bden pa'i rtsal 'byung ste// sreg pa'i me chen ma
42a4(rnying rgyud): ba na// zhi bar gyur cig byas pa yis// de nyid ni zhi bar 'gyur// // chu klung gnod pa'i rgyun byung na// chad par gyur cig brgya dad pa yis// de nyid ni chad par 'gyur// rlung chen gnod pa'i rgyun
42a5(rnying rgyud): byung na// zhi bar gyur cig brjod pa yis// de nyid du ni chad par 'a/ gyur// nad pa'i tshigs ni mthong ba na// gang na na ba'i dmi gas der ni// selaM gol gtogs pa'i tsam gyis kyang // nad na/ 
42a6(rnying rgyud): zhi bar gyur ces brjod// nad kyi tshogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur// de bzhin ngag gis brjod byas pa// thams cad ma lus grub par 'gyur// ngag gi bden pa'i rtsal rdzogs na// lus kyi drod la rtsal 'byung ste/ 
42a7(rnying rgyud): gnyid kyi rtog pa choms pa dang // lus kyi bzod pa thob pa ni// 'di ni dang po'i drod yi no// khams kyi zas dang bral ba dang // mdangs dang dbang po gsal 'gyur ba// 'di ni gnyis pa'i drod ces bya// shing ba
42a8(rnying rgyud): lta bus yang ba dang // khams bde mi bde mi 'byung zhing // nad kyi tshogs dang bral 'gyur ba// 'di ni drong chen bstan pa yin// khams kyi zas la ma bsten yang // dbang po gzi mdangs shin du gsal// 
42b1(rnying rgyud): 'di ni ting 'dzin ro tshor rtags// gzhan yang lus kyi snga ltas ni// mnyam pa'i dkyil krung bcas nas ni// khru gang tsam du 'bar ba dang // ta la gang tsam bar du 'gro// 'di yang ltas chen rtags min
42b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang snang ba'i na mkha' la// goms pas bgrod 'gro ba dang // chu la mi 'dzings la 'dzul// me yis mi 'tshig rlung bcing ba// 'di yang snga ltas chen po yin// lus kyi bden pa'i rtsal rdzog na// 
42b3(rnying rgyud): mthu yi rtsal yang 'byung ba ste// mthu yi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// gal te dgos sam 'dod pa na// sa 'am rdo 'am bye ma dgra/ gser dang dngul la sogs par bsgyur// skams dag la chu byin
42b4(rnying rgyud): cing // sel ba dag la ljon shing 'byung // de la sogs pa'i dgoge/ sa pa rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar 'grub// spyod pa'i/ mthu dang rtsal rdzogs na// 'byor pa'i yon+dan rdzogs 'gyur te/ 
42b5(rnying rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i nor 'byung zhing // 'dod pas bsam pa thams cad 'grub// rdzas kyi mchog du gyur pa yi// ngo mtshar can yang rnyed par 'gyur// de dag rung ba'i snga lta so// 'gro gang 'du ba'i snga lta
42b6(rnying rgyud): kun gyi bkur zhing dga' ba dang // kun gyi yid 'ong bar 'gyur// thams cad 'dul zhing thams cad la// dbang sgyur byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// de dag snga ltas chen po yin// mtshan ma pra yi rmi ltas
42b7(rnying rgyud): kyang // shin tu rgya cher 'byung ba ste// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis// bag chags byang ba'i snga ltas kyang // rtog par cer bur 'byung ba dang / khrus chen rtag tu byed pa dang // dri ma'i tshogs rnams dag
42b8(rnying rgyud): pab dang // chu bo dag la rgal ba dang // mtshe chu dag la rkyal ba dang // char gyi rgyun gyi 'khru ba dang // gzhan gyis bum pa gang ba'i chus// bdag gis lus la ldugs pa dang // me dpung chen pos sreg pa dang / 
43a1(rnying rgyud): / shin tu mthon pa'i rtsa dag las// rlung gis shin tu g.yeng zhing 'thor// 'di dag bag chags byang ba'i ltas// 'jigs dang bral ba'i snga ltas ni// g.yul 'gyed pa las slar log / 
43a2(rnying rgyud): nad las thar te sos pa dang // kha tse na ra dag la thar pa dang // gshed ma'i lag nas shor ba dang // gcan zan nang nas bros pa dang // dug nad dag las sos pa dang // bcings pa dag las grol bar
43a3(rnying rgyud): thag pa bcad par gyur pa rnams// mtshan ma bzang po'i snga ltas yin// sa rnams thob pa'i snga ltas ni/ khri rkang dag las 'dzeg pa dang // phal ba'i skas la 'dzeg pa dang // ljon shing dag la 'dzeg pa dang // 
43a4(rnying rgyud): gyen du shin tu 'gro ba dang // ri bo'i rtse la 'dzeg pa dang // rin chen skas la 'dzeg pa dang // mchod rten dag la 'dzeg dpa dang // na mkha'i skas la 'dzeg pa rnams// 'di dag don gyi
43a5(rnying rgyud): snga ltas yin// sa rnams non pa'i snga ltas kyang // khri mthon steng na 'dug pa dang // glang po che la zhon pa dang // seng ge dag la zhon pa dang // khyung chen lding la zhon pa dang // mchod rten
43a6(rnying rgyud): la phyin pa dang // ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang // nam mkha'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang // lus las sprin phung 'byung ba dang // zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dang // nyi ma'i steng na 'dug pa rnams// rnal 'byor sa la
43a7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i rtags// sangs rgyas sras kyi snga ltas ni// rgyal po'i bka' la brtags pa dang // bka' yi dbang por bskos pa dang // gzhan la dbang sgyur byed pa dang // 'jig rten skos la 'bebs
43a8(rnying rgyud): pa dang // gzhan gyi sde pa dbang sdud dang g.yul chen dag las rgyal ba dang // bdag nyid rgyal por gyur pa dang // mgo la me tog skye ba rnams// rgyal po'i srasu gyur pa'i ltas// chos la dbang thob sngan
43b1(rnying rgyud): ni// glegs bam bab mo rnyed pa dang // de bzhin 'dri ba mang po dang // de dag la ni dpyod pa dang // gzhan la 'chad cing ston pa dang // don nyid gtan la 'bebs pa dang // me long dag la lta ba dang / shel
43b2(rnying rgyud): gyi bum pa gang ba la// lta zhing brtags te 'thung ba dang // rin chen nor bu thu ba dang // 'khor lo lag du babs pa dang // nyi zla lag pas zin pa dang // ri rab klad la bskor ba rnams// chos la dbang thob snga
43b3(rnying rgyud): lta so// bden pa mthong ba'i snga ltas kyang // sngon ma mthong gi yul mthong dang // stong gsum rgya cher mthong ba dang // gling rnams gzhan du phyin pa dang // ri rab kha la phyin pa dang // nam mkha' rgya cher maH/ 
43b4(rnying rgyud): pab dang // rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin pa dang // lag na sgron me thog/ pa dang // nyi ma'i snying po lta ba dang // snang srid dpyod pa byed dpa rnams// chos la dbang thob ltas chen yin// lung bstan
43b5(rnying rgyud): thob pa'i snga ltas ni// rol mo'i sgra rnams thos pa dang // 'bru ga gi sgra ni grag pa dang // seng ge'i nga ro grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra yi gtam thos dang // gzugs brnyan zhal ni 'dzun
43b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang // sangs rgyas gsung thos sku mi mthong // lha mo glu dbyings spags pa dang // gzhal yas ngag la sgra 'byung dang // grogs po grags po zhes brjod cing // chos kyi 'gro ba byed pa rnams// lung bstan
43b7(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i snga lngas// de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams// ltas chen kun tu snang ba dang // gang zag las kyi dang po rnams// rigs 'dzin so so'i sa pa ni// 'gyur ba'i snga ltas bshad pa yin// rnam
43b8(rnying rgyud): 'byor las kyi dang po la// ltas chen 'di dag gang byung yang // 'khor ba'i 'du 'dzi kun bsal nas// don la rtogs shing rnams sbyong // des ni don la reg par 'gyur// don la reg pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ rig
44a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rdo rje balhun gyis grug/ rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa dang // sa la rgyal chen skyong ba'i cha// rgyal gyi tshe phrul sna tshogs 'byung // nyaM mAnon nas 'gro ba dang // ra ba rked nas gtsa/ 
44a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'bang ba dang // sreg pa'i skal ba gzhil ba las// sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kun// khyad par rtsal gyis ston par nus// de la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams
44a3(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul gyi ni cho 'phrul yin// rje su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul ni// 'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la// so so skad dang chos 'thun par// 'dul ba'i sgo ni sna tshogasu// so so'i skad ston par nus// de dag
44a4(rnying rgyud): rjesu bstan pa yin// chos kyi sgo rnams snang ba yi// nges dpa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad pagyis// 'jig rten khams rnams g.yos nis kyang // thams
44a5(rnying rgyud): cad ngo mtshar skye 'gyur te// sems kyi bsam pa rangs byas nas// so so dga' ba'i ro myong 'gyur// chos rnam snang ba'i cho 'phrul yin// kun nas kun tu brjod pa ni// gsang ba'i
44a6(rnying rgyud): yi ge'i phreng ba las// rdzu 'phrul chos kyi sgra sgrogs pas// mthong yod snang grangs chos rnams kun// kun kyang sngags kyi sgrar grag pas// sngags su ma gyur gang yang med// des na rtsal gyi khyad
44a7(rnying rgyud): par las// sogs pa'i ston thams cad 'byung // zhes smra ba'i seng+ge chen po sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsung so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las cho 'phrul bstan pa'i
44a8(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig gsang ba mchog gi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par
44b1(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang // 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// smra ba'i sed+d+he sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid ni// dam tshig chen po'i bdag nyid bdag cag rnams kyis mthong / 
44b2(rnying rgyud): de skad ces gsel ba dang / sems dpa' chen po des bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams chos thams cad kyi srog ni dam tshig yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas 'dus pa
44b3(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshogs kyis sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems dpa' chen po dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba rnams bdag cag rnams thos par 'tshal// thos nas kyang rtogs
44b4(rnying rgyud): pa 'tshal/ rtogs nas kyang de la gnas par 'tshal na// sems dpa' chen pos rgya cher bsha du gsol// de skad ces gso ral pa dang // sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa
44b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshogs dam tshig rnams 'di lta ste/ shin tu gsal ba'i dam tshig ni// snod ma yin par gyur pa las// phyi nang gsang ba gsum dag du// sba ba'i thabasu spyad nas
44b6(rnying rgyud): kyang / gsang ba'i chos rnams gsang bar bya// bstan pa'i gnas min snod ngan dag/ rnam pa bzhis bsdus bye brag rnams// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor bcud can gyis// shes nas spang bar bya/ 
44b7(rnying rgyud): phyir bshad// 'jig rten pa dang theg dman dang // mu stegs log lta'i lha li dga'// dad med blo zhan g.yeng rmugs shing // bslab nyan mi brtson byol song mtshungs// dang log dam nyam sa// 
44b8(rnying rgyud): don las gol// byang chub zag pa gting nas chang// sems kyi mu gu'i rtsa tshig pa// ngan 'gro'i 'dam du kha srub yin// snod med kha sdug de dag la// gsang ba smra bar bya ba min// spras na de cing
45a1(rnying rgyud): sgrub 'gyur// gsang ba'i tshig rnams khar sgra yang // gab pa gsang ba'i don mi shes// skyon can sA los sgrogs rnams la// gsang ba'i don rnams lhag par smra/ ba
45a2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub gsang ba'i tshig rnams la// sgra la nyan kyang don mi gnyer// snying po'i don gsang mi thub pa// bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin// gsang don mi thub snod ngan la// gsang ba smra bar ga
45a3(rnying rgyud): byed pa// de dang snod med snod ngan gnyis// 'khor ba'i khamasu zag par mnyam// lta dang dam tshig sgrub pa yi// dam pa'i mdzod gsum smra shes kyang // goms pa'i mthu med gnas ma gyur// ngan
45a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu phrag dog ser snas gdungs// bya med chos la blo gtod cing // spyod rtsing dam ral rdeng med par// rnal 'byor/ spyod la lta dman zhes// zer ba pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'pho// 
45a5(rnying rgyud): snod ngan 'khor bar 'pho pa la// gsang ba'i don rnams smra bya da pa// gsang ba nyams pa'i dbang gis na// nyams pa de dang de 'drar 'gyur// zla ngan nyams sod can lan 'dren/ 
45a6(rnying rgyud): gsag lce gnyis sgyur byed cing // sems la nyon mongs lnga bcangs te// rku dang sgyu spyod brdzun la dga'// tshe cig grags pa ched phyi ru// gang zag phyir 'breng tshig 'ga' la// mnyan te brjod
45a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod tshul 'chos pa// log smra dug can tha rams ltungs// dug can ltung ba'i snod de la// gsang ba'i dmigs rnams smra ba ni// rnal 'byor nyams pa chen po ste// 'khor ba'i tha mar de ltung 'gyur/ 
45a8(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar ba ma 'gyur snong ngan la// gsang ba gsang chen la sogs pa'i// don dang rang bzhin gang yin pa// bstan kyang bi ma ltung gagasu 'gyur// de bas bstan par bya ba min// gal te bstan pa/ 
45b1(rnying rgyud): g+hu na na// sngon sgra can byed de dag rnams// mthong yun dung byed gnyis skrag 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkhas gsal don ldan la// rnal 'byor ma shes gang dag gis// dregs pa'i dbang gi phrag dog gi sam/ 
45b2(rnying rgyud): so nam grangasas byed pa// de skyed bskal ba'i grangs mnyam por// 'bras brim pad myong bar 'gyur// gal te las kyi 'bre lanan// de snod bskal bar bzed 'jug dgos// mkhas gas la don ldan rgya
45b3(rnying rgyud): kyang ni// gong ma bzhin du ngan bsams na// de yang gnas ngan len pa ste// mkhas pa de la skye mi nus// rnal 'byor don ldan tshul 'thun la// ngan pa'i tshig gis sems dkrugs shing // sgo srur tre / 
45b4(rnying rgyud): brdung btab na// dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// zhar las dbyung ba'i rnam smin yang // ji ltar rgyu 'thun de 'drar 'gyur// bskal ba dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rtsa nyams sbyi can ra/ 
45b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin ni// ngan sems khro gtum ldan pa dang // mi zad phra min las spyod byed// gang dag mi shes ngang tshul can// / byis pa'i rang bzhin blo zhan pas// shin tu dman po'i lta
45b6(rnying rgyud): kyis/ tshul bcos mkhan la bkur bar byed// gang dag dam tshig ston ldan// byams la gnas shing rtag tu bzong // tshul shis don gyis gzhung rnams srong // de dag la ni 'dun pa med// dam
45b7(rnying rgyud): tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du// byang chub snying po thob pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung // 'byung bar yang dag ngas ma mthong // rgyal ba'i sras gyur rnal 'byor pa// lam ston skyon sel
45b8(rnying rgyud): mkhas pa la// kha cig dregs dang phrag dag gis// khro spong thabs kyis smod par byed// de na 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste// nams kyang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung // mi shes pa yi rnal 'byor po// yang
46a1(rnying rgyud): don dang ldan pa'i mi// rjesu 'gro bar mi byed cing // long spyod 'du 'dzi gang ldan pa'i rjesu 'gro zhing de la 'dud// de ni log pa'i lam pa yin// rnal 'byor ltang dang byang chub khe/ 
46a2(rnying rgyud): 'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung // zang zing nor dang g.yo sprul khe// chung yang ci 'grub srog dang sngo// rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can// bum snod nang gi gsal ba ltar// shes rab mdzod kyi
46a3(rnying rgyud): gter ldan yang // srog chags rkum me'i sder mo ltar// khong nas gab sba ba de ni sngon la// blun po rnams kyis cir mi mthong // dper na 'di 'drar tshul gcig ste// lus la gter 'chang mi/ 
46a4(rnying rgyud): dang ni/ blun por gyur pa'i mi dag gnas// 'grogs kyang gnyi dmatshungs khyad med 'dra// ting 'dzin bsngags pa brjodadabyed cing // ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba med// yang dag bsngags
46a5(rnying rgyud): brjod byed cing // yang dag don du gnyer ba med// dam tshig bsngag brjod byed cing // dam tshig don du gnyer ba med// ji ltar/ 'gro gang la la dag/ nor bu rin chen 'di 'dra ste// 'dod pa'i/ 
46a6(rnying rgyud): yon tan kun 'byung zhes// rin chen dag gi ston brjod// de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis// de ltar 'dod pa 'byung gyur na// de ltar cung zad yod dam zhes// dris kyang med pas slar smras pa// gang
46a7(rnying rgyud): zhig dgos pa stong ba yi// yon cung zad smos par zad// de nyid bdag la med ces smra// de bzhin rnal 'byor mi rtson pas// bslab par bya ba'i chos bral la// chos nyid bsngag brjod byed kyang // de / 
46a8(rnying rgyud): la ni chos nyid med// de las spyod pa'i yig spyod rnams// dam tshig can gyis spang ba dang // rnal 'byor chos 'dzin gang dag gis// rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred can// gsang ba 'jig na
46b1(rnying rgyud): dgrar mthong nas// de dag sdig pa mthong ba ltar// smod cing chad pas gcod byed pa// skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras// dper na blon po gang dag gis// nyes byas khrims dang 'gal 'gyur na/ 'gas
46b2(rnying rgyud): bar mi gtong khrims dang sbyor// bka' yi yo slong blon po de// rgyal po'i thugs 'dzin dam pa zhes// kun du rgya cher grags par 'gyur// ldum ra dug gi sdong skyes na// bdag pos dug du
46b3(rnying rgyud): shes ma thag/ rtsad nas phyung ste med par byed// ci phyir ldum zas de dag las// dug 'phel gyur na 'chi phyir de bzhin nyams 'gyur dug can de// brtul zhugs can gyi rnal 'byor des// gnas
46b4(rnying rgyud): sam lo yi spyugs te spang // gang dag mi spong mgon byed pa// de dag gsang ba'i dam sri yin// don la rnal 'byor gang zhig gis// tha tshigs zab mor bcas rnams las// bsrub
46b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i bsam pa mo g.yo bzhin// rtsa ba yan lag bcas rnams/ la// gal te mtsher zhig gyur kyang // rnam smin yod kyang / rtsa mi nyams// ji ltar glang po e na ya// shi nas ro ru gyur
46b6(rnying rgyud): mod kyang // 'ga'u wang rtsis ni don byed ltar// rnal 'byor nyams de ror gyur yang // gzhan gyis bkur ba'i gnas yin zhing // de yi don byed nus pa yin// de ltar mod kyang 'di kun rnams// rmi lam
46b7(rnying rgyud): du yang mthong mi bya// ci phyir 'o ma nyung ngu zhig/ rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin// rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor can kun ma rung 'gyur// 'khor ba'i g.yul rgyal byed pa yi/ 
46b8(rnying rgyud): log pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad kun// don la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thams cad bsgrims te spang bar bya// gal te ma spang log spyad nas// 'khor ba'i g.yul ni rgyal 'gyur te/ 
47a1(rnying rgyud): bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu chung 'gyur// kun kyang dge spyang don chung zhes// yang dag don las yid byung zhing // log pa'i chos la spro bar byed// kun kyang log pa'i las spyad// 
47a2(rnying rgyud): bas// yid du ma 'ong sna tshogs 'byung // des ni sgro skur gnyisu 'gyur// bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa// ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis// nams kyang gnod pa yod mi mdzad// de yi 'kho
47a3(rnying rgyud): na gnas pa yi// gang dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams// rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi// skyon mthong tsam na chad pas gcod// thams cad ngan 'gror spri'u tshugs ltung // sgrub pa'i snod
47a4(rnying rgyud): mchog gcig yod// 'di dang mi 'thun kun rdzogs pa'i// rgyud mnyen don ldan ngang tshul bzang // ci la chags med gtong ldan sems// shes rab rnam grol lde mig gi/ 
47a5(rnying rgyud): gti mug thar ma blo phye nas// chos kyi snying po'i mig ldan/ bas// rtag chad phrang mthong dbu ma'i yul// ma nor la du 'jug shes pas// sdong po chen rab dul ba'o// tha tshig
47a6(rnying rgyud): lung las byung ba bzhin// gzhung srong thub par byed pa de// rgyal ba'i sras po yin pas na// de la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar// de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu ste// 
47a7(rnying rgyud): yid 'ong 'dod dang bde ba 'byung // rigs 'dzin rgyal ba kun yu mo// de bzhin dam tshig thub pa ltar// gnas par byed pa'i rten yang yin// dam tshig kun gyi srog yin te// dam tshig kun
47a8(rnying rgyud): gyinor mcheg/ dam tshig 'od ni 'jigs pa'i skyabs// dam tshig bgrod pa lam gyi mchog/ dam tshig chu bo sgrol ba'i glu/ dam tshig dngos grub dam pa yin// dam tshig grogs kyi mchog/ 
47b1(rnying rgyud): yin te// dam tshig long ba'i mig bu yin// ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar// gzhan gyi sde pa 'joms pa yin// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed// des na dam tshig rgyun bzhin bsrung // 
47b2(rnying rgyud): mdor na bdag gi sgo gsum po// dag pa gsum gyi mtha' gzung na/ lha dang grogs dang slob dpon dang // bdag nyid dag pa ma khrel ba'i// tshul gsum mi gnod dam bcas gsum// yongs
47b3(rnying rgyud): mnyams mdo bzhi po// mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas// mdo don dran pa la bgrang bsngo// brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig ni// dam tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro/ wa dang cang shes
47b4(rnying rgyud): gyi ling dang // blang dor ming bral khri chen bdag/ shing du rmA chen smos 'dra'i sems// dpa' rtul sngags mchog dajam zhing gtum// mkha' lding khyung chen lhag mi lta/ gtum
47b5(rnying rgyud): thung dom chen sdong gcig pa// yid thub mi ldog rgya mtshor gser// gti mug lkug pa'i blo tshil ldan// ri rngo ma 'gyur brtan pa che// mkha' ltar yangs dogs kun dang
47b6(rnying rgyud): bral// gnam lcags lce'i drag shul can// phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bdag/ zon bag khu 'phrig kha rogs sems// nges pa'i nga rgyal glang tshul ldan// zla bral seng ge ri dgas rgyal
47b7(rnying rgyud): re 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs blo// g.yo ldan lcag chen sgyu ma'i rgya// gtsang sme med par kun spyod cing // thogs med gsod spyod lce spyang kha// che ba'i nga rgyal stag mchog blo// kun 'dzi/ 
47b8(rnying rgyud): blo ldan na mkha' lding // sa thub pag len rgyal 'khor skyong // rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni// bcu gnyis dang ni gsum blor ldan// goms nas nyam su len byed pa// rnal
48a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i bka' ba yin// dal ba'i rgyud ldan tha tshig can// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// bsrung dang brjod dang gsang ba dang // yan lag spyad pa'i dam tshig dang yi
48a2(rnying rgyud): 'ong dang du blang ba dang // brtul zhugs zab mor spyod pa dang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thams cad kyi// mi 'dor mi spang sbyar ba yi// rig ldan shes par bya ba dang // thob cing grub par bya/ 
48a3(rnying rgyud): ba yin// re re la yang lnga lnga ste// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag las// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad ldan pa// sprad par bya ba'i nor mchog yin// rnal 'byor byang chub sems rgyud la// nges par/ 
48a4(rnying rgyud): brtags te spyod pa'i bu// zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi// blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan// 'di ni sngar 'a dgro tha tshig ste// zab mo sgrub pa'i sngon legasu// rdo rje tha tshig/ 
48a5(rnying rgyud): drag po'o// gocan 'brang lam rnams bsrung ba'i phyir// / spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams// nges pa'i don gyis bsrung byas nas// de ni dbyig gi snod chen yin/ de/ 
48a6(rnying rgyud): ltar spyi yi sdom pa la gnas nas dus kyi skabs 'di ru// bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni// mi shigs pa ni seng+ge ste// gcan zan rgyal po yin paso// za ma tog ni 'dod pa'i gter/ 
48a7(rnying rgyud): dug spyo ba ni der mi rigs// rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag/ de ni breg pa'i rigs ma yin// gangs kyi zhun chu khol ma dag/ mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min// pad+ma ze'u 'bru/ 
48a8(rnying rgyud): ma byed/ zla zer ma yin kha mi dbye// ma brtags bug rdol can gyi snod// kha mi dbye zhing bcud mi brug/ don dang mi ldan bcos ma'i brtags// bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min// shel dkar
48b1(rnying rgyud): rin chen sgo nga dag/ 'dam rdzab khung du bsub mi bya// seng+ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/ dug can snod blugs pa min// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// bsreg par bya ba yong ma yin// khyung chen gshog pa
48b2(rnying rgyud): mkhar brkyang ba// de dag gcag par bya ba min// gnam lcags me yi dur mo dag/ brdab par bya ba ma yino// stag gzig 'drol bas las byas pa'i// las kyi lhag ma bsdu ma bya// rdo rje brag che/ 
48b3(rnying rgyud): gtams pa'i gzhi// de dag gzhig par bya ba min// rdo rje ra ba'i go chags ni// bsdam bya bral bar bya ba min// bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma dag/ g.yengs pa'i klung gis bskyod mi bya/ rdo rje
48b4(rnying rgyud): tshig gi chu rgyun dag/ 'ol dkar gcad par bya ba min// rgyal po bka' btegaso phyag rgya dgo// nam zhar dbyib rnga mi bya'o// rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar// rmang nas ts+tsha
48b5(rnying rgyud): par mi bya'o// gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba dag/ rgyal mtshan rtse las dpog mi bya// rnal 'byor las kyi khyad par/ can// skal can rnam pa dam tshig ste// skal bar ldan pa'i
48b6(rnying rgyud): nor mchog yin// rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mchog ni// rdo rje las kyi thun tshags dag/ rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis// srog la bar chad byed pa'i dgra/ nyon mongs 'thibs pa de zhom bya// snyoms wa/ 
48b7(rnying rgyud): le lo'i dpung bskyed pa// thugs thub ra chod nga rgyal bzhi// dregs byed dbang po myos pa'i bcud// dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya// rdo rje gsang tshig ma gtogs pa// 'dres pa gang zag
48b8(rnying rgyud): byis pa'i tshig/ zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing // thams cad rdo rje gsang bas bya'o// ji ltar gsod pa'i mi rnams dag/ gshed ma'i mis ni gsod pa'i tshe// thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa
49a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin le lo dgra bcom brtson par 'bad // rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gags bsal ba// dka' thub sdom pa'i mdud pa can// 'dod dang 'od spyod mi mthun dang // spyi mthun nang du/ 
49a2(rnying rgyud): mi gcig pa// phyi nang can dang gnod byed dang // 'dod mos bying rdugs brkam pa dang // dang med rtsa nyams 'byar g.yeng can// ma bsepas bsgrims te spangs par bya'o// de ni rnal 'byor gags
49a3(rnying rgyud): yin te/ dngos grub chu ba'i gcod par byed// rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa la// bar du gnod pa'i bdud lnga 'byung // rnam rtog 'breg pa'i bdud nyid dang // de bzhin btang snyoms la lo'i bdapa 'o/ 
49a4(rnying rgyud): spyod 'du 'jig yang ba'i bdud// tshig rtsub mtshon cha rnon po'i bdud// khro gtum dang thung 'khrug pa'i bdud// rnal 'byorasbyor ba'i bdud lnga po// yang dag don la sgrib pa ste// gnyen / 
49a5(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems mchog gis// zhi ba chen po'i ngang du bzlog/ rna la 'byor spyod pa'i dgra bzhi po// thabs la mkhas pa/ sa gdul bar bya// rdo rje brnag pa gsang 'phel bas// ngag gi
49a6(rnying rgyud): dbang po nyams 'gyur te// kha na ma thos phog par 'gyur// de dge btsas kar 'gyur ba'i dgra/ lta dman spyod rtsing 'chol ba yis// bka' yi gzhung por log par spyad// nor bas bar chad 'byung ba'i/ 
49a7(rnying rgyud): dgra/ dam gtsor spyod pa'i las rnams yin// 'da' dka' rdo rje mchog gsum po// btang snyoms phyal bar shor ba ni// rtsa ba rul pa'i ljon shing bzhin// bka' chad chen po 'bab pa'i gnas// brtsam
49a8(rnying rgyud): pa las la sbyor ba'i tshe// 'bad pa'i rtsal shugs chungs pa yis// don rnams grub par ma yin te// 'bras bur mi 'gyur 'phrog pa'i dgra/ rnal 'byor chen por spyod pa la// 'dod pa'i nor mcho
49b1(rnying rgyud): 'phrog pa'i dgra/ thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis// skyon gyi dgra bzhi spang bar bya// srid gsum sprul ba'i zhing 'di dag/ sangs rgyas zhing du rtogs pa ni// sa rnams gcig car sbyangs pa ste/ 
49b2(rnying rgyud): zhing rnams dag pa'i mchog yin no// khams gsum mchod pa'i rgyu 'di dag/ yo byad chen po'i mchog yin te// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i rgyu// rma du byung ba'i mchod pa'o// 'khor ba dur khrod
49b3(rnying rgyud): gnas 'di dag/ bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te// ma nor ma bcos chas kyi dbyings// brtsal med lhun gyis grub pa la// dug lnga rgyu ba'i rtsa ba dag/ ye shes lnga yi rtsa ba te// kun shes kun rig gas/ 
49b4(rnying rgyud): ba'o// rang rig ye shes rang las byung // rnal 'byor chos mig da ldan pa yis// nges pa'i don du 'di ltar blta'o// 'din rgyun gyi dam tshig te// brjod med pa bsrung ba'o// bsrung ba thub
49b5(rnying rgyud): par bya ba la// dam tshig rtsal gyi khyad par ni// gang dag rig pa 'dzin pa yi// blo la nges pa'i lung du bstan// 'dod bas chags dang 'joms pa dang // gti mug nga rgyal phra dag rna
49b6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste// don dang ldan pa'i skyes bus spyad// sbyor dang grol bar byed pa dang // ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed// rnal 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog sprad par bya ba'i las
49b7(rnying rgyud): yino// rgyal ba sems can thams cad dang // dngos por brtags pa thams cad kyang // don gyi ngang du gcig pa ste// de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad no// mnyam pa
49b8(rnying rgyud): chen po'i ngang du gsal// theg pa 'o ma ma'i khyad par rnams// kun kyang rang rig blo la gsal// ston ci 'byung mi brjod cing // 'og ma rnams la mi smod cing // thams cad mnyam pa'i dam tshig ste/ 'di
50a1(rnying rgyud): ltar shes na tshogs mchog rdzogs// gzugs rnams rnam par snang ba mdzad// tshig rnams brjod pa snang mtha' yas// rnam rtogs kun tu sems rdo rje// rig dang tshor ba ran
50a2(rnying rgyud): chen 'byung // yid g.yo byed pa don kun rdzogs// stan 'gan rang bzhin spyod pa'i gnas// zhing bcu dag dang ldan pa na// bde ba chen po'i long spyod thogs med 'phrin las rnam bzhir rdzogs/ phyi'i
50a3(rnying rgyud): yul dang nang gi sems// thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas// de la sgrib dang mi sgrib ces// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs// thams cad mnyam nyid dbyings gyur pas// phung po lnga don ye
50a4(rnying rgyud): shes lnga/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug ni// phyag rgya chen po 'i rig 'dzin yin// yul dang ye shes rang bzhin las// gzhan gyi rang bzhin med pas na// mtshan ma'i rnam pa tsir
50a5(rnying rgyud): yang // de la tshed pa'i gnas medo// dam tshig dam pa gang zhe na/ gabade ba dam tshig ste// rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa/ de ni dam tshig chen po'o// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas/ 
50a6(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las// dngosu spyad pa thams cad bya// de ni dam tshig chen po yin// snod du gyur pa yum gyi dbyings// chung rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'// 'byung 'jug rig pas yongs spyad/ 
50a7(rnying rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje tha tshig yin// srid pa'i sems can thams cad dang // thar pa chos kyi rnam grangs kun// so sor thams cad snang ba ste// kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal// spyod pa'i las dang rtog
50a8(rnying rgyud): pa dang // mtshan mar gyur pa thams cad kyang // sems kyi phyi nang spyod yul de// rtags na long spyod tsheg su 'gyur// ma skyes stong bsku'i rgya// rang bzhin smon med gsung gi don// mtshan med yid
50b1(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i thugs// rnam gsum bde chen sangs rgya so// mnyam pa'i lta bas dbang bsgyur na// 'khor ba thams cad dbyings la snang // las kun rdzogs pa'i mchog yin te// gzhan du 'phrin la
50b2(rnying rgyud): lus pa med// sdug bsngal byang chub chen po ste// 'khor ba ye nas mya ngan 'das// sgrib pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// nyon mongs kun kyang byang chub don// snang ba med pa'i don mthong dang // sa dang sa
50b3(rnying rgyud): yi rim par ni// 'di dang 'di zhes gzung du med// 'di ni snang med thob pa'i gnas// sku dang gsung thugs mi g.yo ba'i// ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang la gnas// ji ltar bsgyur yang chos nyid pas// chad
50b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas zhes brjod dang bral// med dang phyal ba gcig po dang // lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dam tshig che// 'di zhes ri su chad med pa// 'di ni srung ba'i dam tshigo/ sprad par spyod par bya med pa// 
50b5(rnying rgyud): srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten pa'i// spyod par snang ba tham// sa cad kun// lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod// ma spang sa lhun grub dbyer med pas// dbyings las gzhan na lta ru/ 
50b6(rnying rgyud): med// 'di ni lta ba'i dam tshigo/ sa chu me rlung snod bcud bcas// kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid do// chos nyid don la gzhan med pa// rang byung ye shes gsal ba'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin po/ 
50b7(rnying rgyud): tshe// ma btsal rang la yod pa yin// 'dod pa 'byung ba'i long spyod de// bde chen longs spyod tshogs yino// ngan song mtho ris thams cad dang // 'phags lam 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// rang
50b8(rnying rgyud): bzhin so sor mi dmigs te// sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin yin// spyod dang gzugs rigs thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin te// sku gsung thugs tshig rgya cher ston// don rig/
