51a1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rang bzhin no// ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba// mi gnas pa la chags pa med// don gyi khyad par rtogs chud na// kun du bzang po'i mchog gisa'o// mtshan dang dpe byad kun
51a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs te// thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi don// bdag nyid tshon por thams cad rdzogs// lhun rdzogs bde ba chen po yi// khyab pa chen por kun bdal bas// sgrib pa kun byang tshogs kun rdzo/ 
51a3(rnying rgyud): rnam grol bcings pa kun dang bral// lhun grub bde ba'i gnas chen yin// zhes smra ba'i seng+ge chen pos gsung so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dam tshig
51a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad brdas mtshan pa nye su bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas ting 'dzin
51a5(rnying rgyud): de las bzhengs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis/ gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad ni/ bdag cag rnams kyi brda' rig pa tsam gyi ngo bor mthong // 
51a6(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i tshags chos thams cad ni brda' dang / tha snyad dang / btags pa tsam du shes par gyis shig/ btags pa'i chos thams cad
51a7(rnying rgyud): ni phyi nang gang du yang mi gnas te/ chos thams cad la ming gi gzhi med cing btags pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba yino// brda zhes bya ba ni sbas pa btags pa'i tha snyad yino// sbas pa'i chos rnams
51a8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i phyir// thams cad sba zhing brgyud par bya// 'di ltar brda' yis sbyor ba la// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bgyis// de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsol bapa/ sems
51b1(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen pos brda'i chos rnams rgya cher ba shadadu gsol// bdag cag gis kyang chos thams cad// brda yi don gyi brgyud par bgyi// brda zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// sbas pa'i chos ni gang dang ga
51b2(rnying rgyud): mi bstan gsang ba gang gang lags// de skad ces gsol ba dang // smra ba'i seng ges bka' stsal pa// nyon gcig 'dus pa chen po tshogs// brda zhes bya ba sbas pa'i tshig/ sbas ste gsang ba'i
51b3(rnying rgyud): chos rnams ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa yin// mi bstan gzhan la gsang ba ni// mu stegs la sogs sde pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pa 'phra ba las// shin tu blan zhing sba ba'i phyir/ 
51b4(rnying rgyud): sbas pa'i brda' yis bstan par bya// brda yi ston chen po ni // grangs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab na// mdor sdus rnam pa bzhi yod de// gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin dang // 
51b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rigs pa'i spyod yul dang // sbas pas grub thag ste ba dang // gsang ba'i dam tshig mi nyams shing // ba la dga' ba'i ma sring rnams// nye zhing gdung ba'i thabs
51b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// de bas sbas pa'i brda' rnams ni// tshig gis mtshon te brjod par bya// a la la ho// // a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ ma hA go ru sad kram/ gu ya de bi sa ma ya/ ma hA tsan tra ma
51b7(rnying rgyud): hA pu ra sha gu ya b+ha ga/ ma hA badz+ra/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho ya ha ma/ ra ga ya me/ sa ma ya dzaHlhan/ oM A hUM/ sa ma ya/ sa ma ya/ e h+ye hi/ e h+ye hi/ ha he ha/ ha he ha/ ma taM kha/ ma taM kha/ ka ru k+Sha / ka ru k+Sha k+ShaM ba ri/ 
51b8(rnying rgyud): k+Sha ba ri ra ho he/ sa ma ya hi/ a la staM/ a la s+ho// kha kha le/ kha kha le/ shad pa/ shad pa/ kha ra ma khA hi/ khe ra ma khA hi/ kha le b+h+yo/ khe le b+h+yo/ kha ka kha kha ka kha/ kha d+hi ha he/ rak+Sha khA ha~M/ rak+Sha khA hi/ ha ha he re/ guH
52a1(rnying rgyud): gu g+ha/ sa ma/ sa ma/ ma le mu le/ ta le du le ma tsa me tse/ kuh+ya sid ti/ pa ra ma/ ba ra ma/ shi ri ho/ shi ri ho/ ma ma kha ka traM/ e e e e/ hri tri pa/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ kha kha le le/ karma ma ti b+h+yo rak+Sha
52a2(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo rak+Sha gram b+h+yo// kar+m+ma le kar+m+ma le k+Sha ti sha ne/ rak+Sha karma/ rak+Sha karma/ kro d+ha k+ShaM khA hi b+hu khA hi b+h+yo tsa le yaM tsa le yaM/ pra ba la pra tsa le/ gu ra ba yaM/ gur ba yaM/ bi gur ti/ bi gur te/ ma ma haM/ ma ma haM/ ngag brda dam tshig
52a3(rnying rgyud): gi phyag rgya'o// bya gri tsa ra ma/ bya gri tsar ma/ ba yang k+Shi ga ri/ ba ya k+ShaM ga ri/ ba byA dz+nye ba ba ti/ na ra ha sa/ na ra ha sa/ ban d+ha kA pA la/ ban d+ha kA pA la/ tsa ra man ga trag/ tsa ra ma na ga trang / ra ga ra ga ta tsa ra ga
52a4(rnying rgyud): rag ta tsa/ ru ti ra ma ta/ ru ti ra ma ta/ ka ru ga tsaka ru ga tsa ba bya dab ti/ bi bya ba ti/ gang 'gro na/ gang 'gro na/ thar pa ta/ thar pa te/ dpa' byed la/ dpa' byed kha/ zla ba rgyas dang rdzogs pa dang / 
52a5(rnying rgyud): zla ba dkar dang zla grom mchog/ tshe 'dzin kun gyi gtso mo dang / 'jam po thar pa chen po dang // gal zhes bya ba'i ro ma chog dang // gzi brjid chen po'i dri zhim dang // bran mo dang na
52a6(rnying rgyud): g.yog 'chang mo// 'jam dpal rnon po'i ka tar dang // ma tha ya/ ma tha ya/ pa ra pa ti/ par ba ti/ rA tha ma/ rA tha ma/ kha ta ma nya/ kha ta ma nya/ ra ti hU ra ti hUM/ shi nya ma tha/ shi nyam tha/ ka ra ma tha/ ka ram tha/ 
52a7(rnying rgyud): shag ti kha/ shag ti khayog carban/ yo ga tsarban// sgra brda dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// lag gi phyag rgya chen po ni// gar thabs g.yas g.yon bskor nas kyang // se gol brdabs pa 'dren pa'i
52a8(rnying rgyud): brda/ bskor nas thal sbyar phyag rgya'i badz+ra/ shin tu bskor nas spyi bor dgrol// 'di ni mchod pa bzhes pa'i brda// bskor nas snying khar bcas pa ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje bstan pa'i brda gar
52b1(rnying rgyud): bskor shin tu gnyis bstab pa// mchod pa stobs par byed pa'i brda// gar bskor dbang mo'i spyi bor gzhag/ sbyor ba'i don la 'jug pa'i brda// thabs kyis spyi bor gnag pa dang // shes rab
52b2(rnying rgyud): dbang mo'i snying kha ro// thabs kyis gsang ba g.yas bcug na// shes rab thos byed gsang po yin// thabs kyi nas g.yas btags na// shes rab na sa g.yon bteg pa'o// thabs kyis rje/ 
52b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bstan// shes rab pad+mo'i phyag rgya bstan// thabs kyis smin ma g.yas bskyod na// shes rab smin ma g.yon bteg bya// thabs kyis phyag g.yon brkyang ba dang // shes rab g.yas kyis
52b4(rnying rgyud): 'khyud tshul bstan// phyag rgya gar bskor thal brdabs shing / dbang mo lce la reg pa ni// tshogs mchod dus la bab pa'i brarda// lag gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thor// de nas dpa
52b5(rnying rgyud): lce la reg 'dza' gad 'drim pa'i brda thab so// ma hA ging chen/ karma dang // rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin lnga// sogs pa'i/ brda yi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor can gyis spyad na 'grub
52b6(rnying rgyud): lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya'o// zhes smra ba'i seng+ges gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor brda'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas / 
52b7(rnying rgyud): smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnal 'byor rol pa'i tshegs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs
52b8(rnying rgyud): kyis gsol pa/ smra ba'i seng+ge chen po chos thams cad ni rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong ngo // zhes gsol pa dang / smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i
53a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje tshogs yin par shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol ba// sems dpa' chen po/ 
53a2(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ rdo rje lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad gsol/ sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshig/ 
53a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam ste// rnal 'byor kun gyis spyad pa'i lam// sa mchog bgrod pa'i lam 'di dag/ 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya/ 
53a4(rnying rgyud): brtsam pa las kyi dang po pa// rdo rje tshegs la 'jug pa na/ khyad par rim pa ci bzhin du// las mchog 'di yi rang ba bzhin gyis// ji bzhin rim par sbyangs nas kyang // sa rab
53a5(rnying rgyud): mchog tu bgrod pa la// thabs mchog lnga yis bgrod bya ste// / rdo rje tshogs dang bsnyen pa dang // nye ba dang ni bsgrub pa dang // bsgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya// ji ltar grangs dang dus chen
53a6(rnying rgyud): dang // mtshan ma byung bar bcas rnams las// gab pa'i sgra thabs de sbyar nas// sus mi rig pa'i thabs chen bye// de dag gsang ba'i bdag po yin// gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag/ 
53a7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten rdul las grangs nas kyang // 'gyur dbang ma nges sar gzhag ste// ci phyir dang po yin pas na// byis pa blo shes ma bye bas// bzang ngan bde sdug mi shes shing // bstan dang gsapa
53a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i dmigs mi phyed// rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bka' sgo 'dir// gsang sgo mi dbye skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngang tshul ma rtogs pa'i// so so'i skye ba'i byis pa las// snod med snod byas pa/ 
53b1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis// rnal 'byor 'tsho ba'i srog gcod cing // ma nges ldog 'jug bcas pa yis// gsang ni bcas dkar 'gyur phyiro// des na 'di yi spyod pa yang // ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar// de nas/ 
53b2(rnying rgyud): smra ba'i seng+ge de thabs kyi rdo rje tshogs kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams mi snang bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa// smra ba'i seng+ge chen po ches
53b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni thabs kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyis mtho // sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di dag ni brgyud sbas pa'i tshogs yin/ 
53b4(rnying rgyud): par shes par bya'o// rdo rje rnal 'byor tshogs ldan lta// thabs chen phyag rgya sbas tshogs lnga// rdo rje 'dzin stsogs bcu drug drang // bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// bri bya yang na bsam/ 
53b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'am// brjod dam bsngos sam mtshan ma la// 'jig rte/ dbang po'i chos lugs kyis// mos pa la bskyed dran bya/ sa ste// rang bzhin yul nas phab nA ni// phyag bya la sogs ma
53b6(rnying rgyud): ba yis// rdo rje sman dang rtsir sbyar ba'i// yo byad chen po la sogs pas// rdo rje thabs kyis tshogs la dngul// rdo rje rnal 'byor glu blangs te// mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas// mchod dang / 
53b7(rnying rgyud): dam skongs 'dod pa bya// snod rung ba'i slob ma dag/ dpa' mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis// 'jug tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol// rdo rje tha tshig rnam lnga yis// bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rig par
53b8(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyi rim par byon nas ni// rdo rje gal chen mna' 'dor ro// de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams// ji ltar 'dod pas nan tan gyis// rdo rje rnal 'byor bkar bya'o// mi nus la sogs mi gnang ba'i/ 
54a1(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dag gis nan chags bya// rmongs pa gsang phyir sems bskyed// ngo mtshar tshig gi 'du shes bsgyur// shes nas mig la shes bya'i yul// thams cad rim gyi bsdu
54a2(rnying rgyud): bar bya// drod can 'khyil pa'i blo ldan la// rnal 'byor na spar mdzod sgo dbye// rtsing po sgros kyi dmu rgod la// gcan phrang 'khor po'i g.yeng rnams bstan// rdo rje lung gyi tshad can la// ji ltar nus pa de
54a3(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur// brtsal med mi nus yul can la// phan pa 'ba' zhig sngags pa yin// gnas 'dir yod dang med pa dag/ 'od mi bsrub cing ljid mi dbab// rdo rje blo yi yul can la// rtsal chen spongs shre/ 
54a4(rnying rgyud): gdams par bya// rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang gral du// rdo rje don gyi lta dang chen bsher// rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye// so so rig ngas kyi phyag rgya dag/ spyi 'am yang na re re'o// de nas smra ba'i seng+ge de
54a5(rnying rgyud): shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom sa par zhug so// ting 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang / 2sa pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// chos thad/ 
54a6(rnying rgyud): kyi rang bzhin ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du gda' bar bdag cag rnams kyis mthong // de skad ces gsol ba dang / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos
54a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin las byung zhing // shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gas so// 
54a8(rnying rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ sems dpa' chen po shes rab gzungs kyis rang bzhin bdag cag rnams la rgya chen bshadu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / sems dpa' chen po
54b1(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhin no// rgya cher bshad kyis shes par gyis// ji ltar thabs kyis tshogs sbyar ltar// gang dag rnal 'byor/ 
54b2(rnying rgyud): ldan rnams// rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa// lha mo'i tshogasu sbyar nas kyang // gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya mtshan mar sbas// rdo rje snyam pa'i gzungs rnam la// mnyam/ 
54b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya// bro gar klu tshig la sogs pas// rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor ma sgrub ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad thabs dang shes rab pan/ 
54b4(rnying rgyud): tshun dra bar 'brel ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang // 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni/ 
54b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab du 'bral ba'i rang bzhin can du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong // zhes gsol to// de skad ces/ gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus
54b6(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad ni thabs dang shes rab tu 'brel pa ste/ gnyisu med par shes par gyis shig/ de nas 'das pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsol pa/ sems
54b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' chen po chos thams cad dra bar 'brel ba'i don bshad gsol// sems dpa' chen po bka' stsal pa// 'brel ba'i don ni 'di lta ste// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// phan tshun 'brel
54b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du snang // chos kun na mkha'i mtshan nyid las// sprul pa bye ba cir yang snang // gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchog yin te// rtsal dang ldan pa'i
55a1(rnying rgyud): gsang sgo ba// 'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya// gsang 'dir chud pa'i bu rnams la// rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' 'di bsgrags// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di/ 
55a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas// lnga nyid zung du 'khril ba ni// g.yas nas g.yon du 'khril 'khyud sbyar// g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang // rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o// g.yon gyi sgra
55a3(rnying rgyud): bstan dril bu dang // rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la// 'phyo zhing 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas// chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni// seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa// rdzogs pa'i
55a4(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te// kha dog lnga yis 'od 'bar bas// bcu drug chas ni sgeg pa rnams// rims kyis skyed dang gcig car bskyed// dbang po'i rim par sbyar bar
55a5(rnying rgyud): bya// gsang nyid tshogs kyis 'khor rnams kyang // gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// phyag rgya rgyal por rgyal mor bcas// brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khril 'khyud
55a6(rnying rgyud): sbyar/ sa dang na mkha'i spyar rdo rje// byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal// nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni// gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyos sbyor ba// bsam bya la sogs de bzhin// rdo rje sgo dang ba
55a7(rnying rgyud): po ni// rdo rje 'khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs// rnal 'byor long spyod che sbyar bas// mnyes nas skongs phyir rim bzhin dbul// gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis// gsang ba'i don rnams
55a8(rnying rgyud): sgrub par byed ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje kun tu 'brel ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
55b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje dra ba'i dbyingasu bdag cag rnams kyis mtho // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa
55b2(rnying rgyud): de'i tshogs dra ba'i dbyingasu shes par gyis shig/ chos thams cad ni thugs kyi rig pa las byung la thugs kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyir// 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa Na
55b3(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje dra ba chen po'i tshigs bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bsha gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje chen po rig pa'i don/ drab
55b4(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa'i dbyings nyid ni// nges par gshad kyis rtse gcig nyon// thugs kyi gsang chen rig pa 'di// nges pa'i rdo rje yi na bas na// rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pa'i don// thams cad 'dud
55b5(rnying rgyud): bas dbyings shes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin sogs bca/ sa// 'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te// gzugs brla/ ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas// rim pa'i tshul bzhin sbyar bya/ 
55b6(rnying rgyud): nas// ji ltar 'dod pa de ltaro// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de thams cad dus bzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas te dz+ra/ 
55b7(rnying rgyud): de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang // 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid gcig par mthong // 
55b8(rnying rgyud): zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid dogs pa yin te/ chos thams cad ni dus bzhi'i ngang du rdzogs
56a1(rnying rgyud): par shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang la dus snga phyir snang ba medo// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa chen
56a2(rnying rgyud): dus nyid bdag cag rnams la rgya cher ba sha du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dus pa chen po'i tshigs/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dus rig na// dus shes bya
56a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i ming yang med// dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhi no// rdo rje dus kyi lha mo'i tshogs// 'das dang da ltar byung ba dang // mi 'byung ba yi cha rnams la// dbang sgyur mnyam
56a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal mo rnams// 'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang // 'gag dpar gyur pa de dag tu// rdo rje rnam thar tshad med dang // sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi// shes rab 'khor dang dpal gyi
56a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin rim par rdo rje yi// glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis// mchod dang 'jug tshul gong ma bzhin// cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar// lha'i nyi ma rnams la'o// bde ba chen
56a6(rnying rgyud): po la sogs pa// tshom bu 'am yang na phyag rgya rnams// spyir ram re rer sbyar bar bya// 'das la rnam thar tshogs bskul te// da ltar byung dang mi 'byung la// tshad med sems dang mnyam par bskrun/ 
56a7(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i rgyal por de 'gyur te// bde gshegs dus kyis rgyal por 'gyur zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi zla'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
56a8(rnying rgyud): bar zhug so// de nas yang ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nyi zla'i chog su mthong ngo // / 
56b1(rnying rgyud): skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub sems dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yin par shes par bya/ 
56b2(rnying rgyud): shig/ chos thams cad ni byang chub sems las byung zhing snying rje'i rang bzhin can yino// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje dang byang chub sems kyi don bdag cag
56b3(rnying rgyud): ba sha du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// yo byad de dang ma ldan na// don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyuraro// rnal babyed
56b4(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems rdzogs par// byang chub rdzogs pa'i zla rgyas tshul// snying rje ye shes shar ba ni// mkha' la nyi gsal shar ba'i tshul// don gnyis rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa// rnal 'byor de
56b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa pa yin// nges pa'i sa la bgrod pa ni// rdo rje dus kyi// rgyun tshogs kyis// tshogs chen rnams gnyis bskrun// par bya// skar tshogs dbus na zla nya ba// bcu drug zhag gis
56b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa bzhin// bcu gsum rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i sa// bcu drug tshogs kyis rdzogs pas ni// mdzes pa'i nyi ma bcu drug gis// zla dkyil 'od kyi phyag rgya la// mdzes par spras pa'i bde
56b7(rnying rgyud): pa de// bcu drug tshogs kyi bsod nams bskrun// phyed rdzogs tshegs 'phel de phan chad// mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs yin// je zhi je zhi mi dmigs par// mtshan ma zhes bya ba bsrabs pa ste/ 
56b8(rnying rgyud): bsod nams tshegs kyang mi dmigs pa// mnyam pas stong par gyur pa na// thams cad chos skur rdzogs pa ste// sdug bsngal byang chub gnyis med// 'di la rmad 'byung sems bskyed de// zla ba dus
57a1(rnying rgyud): kyis mtshan ma dang // gsang ba gnyis kyis mchod pa bya// phra ma'i drod du byung ba dang // smrar te rang las byung rnams la// rtsa ba gcad phyir yongs rdzogs pas// the tshom med par dang dang / 
57a2(rnying rgyud): nas// dus de nyid du nyi ma 'char// dus 'di rgyun gyi bar chad na// bsnyen bdag gis zlog par dka'// bar chad byung na gso zhing bskang // mkha' la zla gsal gra rgyas na// sa la rnal 'byor grar rgyas pa
57a3(rnying rgyud): bsod nams spel po chen po dang // bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya// des ni 'bras bu chen po yang // nyi zla zhen nas 'gro ba yi// rig 'dzin sa la slebs phan chad// dpal chen bcu drug sa la 'grub ce
57a4(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de rgyun du gnas dpa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bzhed ngas pa dang // 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'dra
57a5(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad ni yi ge rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos thams cad ni rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rang bzhin yin la/ rgya
57a6(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad ni yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du shes par gyis shig/ gsol pa/ yi ge'i phyag rgya'i don gang lags pa bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshad gsol zhes zhus pa la ba
57a7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te// rgyal ba sku gsung thugasu gsal// sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya dag/ yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la rdzogs// yi ge'i phyag rgya'i/ 
57a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams// rgyun du bsgrub par bya ba yin// des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin 'thob// rgyun gyi rgyun tu mi gcad pa// rdo rje nam dang nyi tshod la// yi ge'i tshogs bskyed tshegs sbyar la// phud lhag
57b1(rnying rgyud): bcas sbyar de bzhino// 'di ni don la nye ba'i lam// bsod nams bskrun par de myu ro// kun rdzogs tshogs kyi rgyu des ni// yang dag tshogs chen ci 'dra ba// mchog gi bde ba dam pa dang // de nyid chen/ 
57b2(rnying rgyud): por de nyid 'gyur// 'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba 'thun// thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshegs// 'ja' 'phrod sman dang dgyes sbyor ldan// lha dang rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor
57b3(rnying rgyud): ril/ ma lus tshegs pas chos 'di spyod// skad cig yud dam thang cig gam// yud tsam nyin zhag zla re 'am// lha yi nyi ma bkra shis kyis// tshegs la babs pa'i dus 'di dag/ byin gyis brlabs
57b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus chen yin// ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams// phyi dang nang gi khyad par gyis// gtsang ma'i kha zas 'byung po la / rnam rtog rtog bral rgyal ba la// ji ltar 'byor bzhin na// 
57b5(rnying rgyud): tan bya// bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang // chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i// skyon bzhi po dag spangs nas ni// de las bzlog pa'i tshul ldan pas rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur
57b6(rnying rgyud): gdung ba'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// ji bzhin 'dod par nye bar sbyar// lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang // bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang / don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir// las 'dir spyad par shin tu
57b7(rnying rgyud): gces// tshogs 'di blo chung gsar zhugs pa'i// mdun du brjod par bya mi rigs// rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang // ces 'dul de ltar stobs kyis sbyar// des na las 'od khyad par yang
57b8(rnying rgyud): tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te// bsnyen pa bdag goms byas nas// bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i
58a1(rnying rgyud): mdo las rnal 'byor bde ba'i tshogs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'das pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la/ 
58a2(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugaso// de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang // 'dus pa chen po'i tshegs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags zab mo spod pa'i
58a3(rnying rgyud): skyon dang yon tan ci lags pa bdag cag gi rig pa la snang bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'das pa chen po'i tshogs gsang sngags chen po'i don 'di/ 
58a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu spyad par bka' bar shes par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyi dar zhe na/ gsang sngags kyi tshogs ni shin tu me dang 'dra ste// me ni rgyun tu bcangs shing sprad legs na ji ltar 'dod/ 
58a5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du rgyun tu spyad du yod do// me nyi ji lta ba bzhin du spyad na me'i phung por 'gyur te/ spyod par byed pa nyid kyang bsre gas// khyim nas khyim yang bsregs// rdzas kyi dngos po/ 
58a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyang bsregs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste/ chu thabs kyis zin cing sprad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' bder spya du yod de// chu la
58a7(rnying rgyud): dga' bder thar chu chen po la 'bogs pas nuso// chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la ma goms pas ni spyod par byed pa de g.yeng zhing 'chi bar byed// gzhan yang gsang sngogs chen po 'din
58a8(rnying rgyud): gcan zan gdug pa can dang 'dra ste// gcan zan gyis sems can gzhan gyi srog bcod par byed pa yang thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du dbang du 'du'o// thabs kyis
58b1(rnying rgyud): ma zin na srog gcod par byedado// gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste// sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu thabs kyis yongasu
58b2(rnying rgyud): zin na ni dbang du 'du zhing sprad yod la// thabs kyis ma zin na ni 'tsho ba'i srog dang 'dral bar byed do// de bas na gsang ba chen po 'di ni spyad par dka' bas sngon gyi dus kyi tshe na yang spyad nyes pa'i log
58b3(rnying rgyud): lam pa can mang por byung ngo // don dang lam la mkhas pa'i skyes bus thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na/ ma nor ba'i lam du zhugs pa yang mang por byung bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs spyad pa'i
58b4(rnying rgyud): thabs la yongasu mkhas par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ce das gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags log pa'i lan
58b5(rnying rgyud): las byung ba ni gang gang lags spyad legs pa'i thabs las byung ba ni gang gang lags// bdag cag la rgya cher bshad gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi
58b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs nyes legs kyis rim pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang nga ni dran pa thog ma'i tshe// gsang ba spyod pa'i
58b7(rnying rgyud): don 'di dag/ nges don phal cher nub par gyur// tshul 'dra tsam zhig gnas pa la// kun kyang phal cher spyod mod kyang // don dang phrad pa ngas ma mthong // kun kyang log pa'i lam spyad// log pa
58b8(rnying rgyud): can nyid gang zhe na// 'di la mi gnas 'di nyams dang // 'di las log dang log tshul spyod// 'di tshul ma yin 'dir ma nges// g.yo sgyus bden bcos 'gal ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ 
59a1(rnying rgyud): bskal pa kun bkod bya ba'i tshe// sangs rgyas mngon byang rgyal po de// mya ngan 'das par gyur 'og tu// byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang rgyan te// mi shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams
59a2(rnying rgyud): la/ tshul 'chos log pa'i tshogs bskyangs pas// tshom bu lnga brgyar bcas pa zhig/ don las gol zhing 'khor bar log/ de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rmad byung gsang ba'i bstan pa 'di/ 
59a3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshad ma rnams// phal cher mi gnas skabs dag tu// mi shes ngan rtog can rnas kyis// dkrugs 'gyur bka' bslad gzhung bor te// nor bas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing // bdag
59a4(rnying rgyud): yin gzhan 'di ma yin zhe na/ bdag stong gzhan la smod pa 'o// dag/ de yang ji lta bu zhes na// bskal pa de nyid dus dag dal// rnal 'byor dpa' sbyin bya ba zhig/ don la blo shed ma bye/ 
59a5(rnying rgyud): zhing // lam gyi thabs la mi mkhas pas// nges don bka' yi bzhung bor nas// chos ma yin pa'i chos spyod cing // gzhan dag nges don spyod pa la/ khyod kyi de ni don ma yin// 
59a6(rnying rgyud): don mchog bdud rtsi gang yin pa// de ni nga yi chos 'di yin// zhes ni bdag stong gzhan la smod// 'di yang srid pa log pa'i lam// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ sngar byung rgyud kyi rjes gan
59a7(rnying rgyud): pas// rdeng med bzhin du dpon bstabs na// tshig gnyer dregs pa'i dbang des ni// mi shes bzhin du ras gcod pa'i// tshul 'chos sems kyi gya gyu can// smon thabs blun pa'i sdig can
59a8(rnying rgyud): yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe no// dge slong dri med spyod pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor tshul 'dra zhing // don la mkhas pa'i rjesu byung // tshem bu 'bum gyi 'khor rnams kyis// rgyud kyi rjesu byung ba yis/ 
59b1(rnying rgyud): don med dge slong de nyid la// tshig gi gnyer chen lding bab pas// gdung 'tsho ba ces ni dpon bstabs te// che ba chen po'i dregs pa skyes// mi shes bzhin du tshul bcos te// 'dra tshul log par
59b2(rnying rgyud): chos spyad pas// tsham bu 'bum dang bcas bzhig/ dregs pa chen po'i ru trar lhung // de 'dra tshul du ma spyod cig/ mdza' 'dren bsrung ster zhing rnams dang // rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba'i 'khor/ 
59b3(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi dbang du gyur dogs nas// sgo ris chung chen se sor gcod// 'khor 'di bdag gis smin bya yi// gdul bar bya ba'i zhing yin gyis// gang dag 'di dang ma 'brel nas// nyon mongs tshig gra
59b4(rnying rgyud): sgo byed no// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor na ni gnas pa zhes// bya ba'i tshum bu lnga brgya zhig/ shin tu gsang sa dgus spyod do zhes// dgon pa'i gan su 'dug nas ni/ yug bcwa
59b5(rnying rgyud): chen po de dag gis// gnas par gyur pa'i mi rnams kun/ gdul bar bya ba'i zhing du spyod// gzhan gyi sde bar rgyu rab yi// dge slong don dang ldan pa zhig/ yul der chedu'
59b6(rnying rgyud): nas so/ rnal 'byor nges pa'i lam mchog cig rgya cher bstan par bsam pa las// dge slong dgon par gnas pa des// nyon mongs tshig gi sgo 'byas/ 'khor 'di bdag gi ning yin gyis// khyod mocha/ 
59b7(rnying rgyud): lam gtog shes// sgo dang tshan dang ris bcas pas// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i lam du lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor chen por bsngos gyur la// sna 'gags ci rgyal gsog 'jog
59b8(rnying rgyud): byed// gcig yid gcig gis 'byin byed pa// nam zhar longs spyod thob pa min// de yang ji lta bu zhes na// rnal 'byor bde ldan shes pa zhes// bya ba'i chom bur bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba'i rgya
60a1(rnying rgyud): cher spyod pa las// 'khor na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma// bud med bzang ldan bya ba zhig/ tshogs sbyor ging du bskos pa las// 'byor pa'i yo byad de dag la// ser sna'i sem
60a2(rnying rgyud): kyis gsog 'jog byas// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// yi dgas khyi yi lusu skyes// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ gzhan yang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs// log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni// 
60a3(rnying rgyud): logs lha spyi btil gtum khro che// sdig spyod don dang mi ldan yang // bdag ni yang dag yin no zhes// bab tshol bka' rku slu byed bslang // de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ chos skyong ba yi rnal 'byor pas// 
60a4(rnying rgyud): pra ma de zhes bya ba zhig/ don dang lam la mi mkhas par/ bdag ni mkhan po yin no zhes// kun la rgya cher sgra dwa sgrags nas// rgyal ba'i bka' brkus 'gro ba rnams bsgra
60a5(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa'i rnam smin gyis// log pa can gyi 'jig rten pa/ mu stegs spyod pa'i khamasu lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ tha tshig nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pas don
60a6(rnying rgyud): la khas 'ches phyir// rdo rje rgyal dbang thab 'dod pa// khrel med spyi gtol mun sprul 'tshal// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor sngags kyi tshul spyod pa// be na ya zhes bya ba zhig/ tshom bu rgya dang
60a7(rnying rgyud): bcas pa byung // rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs// dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis// don la mkhas pa'i tshul bcos phyir// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang mnos pas// ri bos srog chags mnan pa bzhi// 
60a8(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yis// 'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa'i// srog chags phag pa'i rig su lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ mnyam pa'i don nyid ma rtog par// tshig tu mnyam zhes rjod
60b1(rnying rgyud): byed cing // chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'phel ba// rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge slong bde sbyin bya ba zhig/ tshom bu stong dang bcas par de// rnal 'byor
60b2(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i las la spyod// la la chags la mngon par 'phel// la las sdang chen gsod par spyod// chags sdang las kyi rnam smin gyis// rak+Sha srin po'i khamasu lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod
60b3(rnying rgyud): cig gang dag rnal 'byor blo chung rnams// rdo rje gral tshegs don glengs na// de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te// spa zhum mi dga' 'byol byed blun// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// dge slong lha sbyin bya ba/ 
60b4(rnying rgyud): zhig rnal 'byor dang po'i sar slob tshe// rnal 'byor don ldan dmang po rnams// phal cher tshogs par gyur pa la// dngos don gsang ba'i don glengs na// lha byin 'khor bcas de la
60b5(rnying rgyud): byol// don glengs pa la mi dga' zhing // ngan pa'i sems kyis phrag dog skyes/ rang gi gnas su song nas ni// mkhas pa de la mi snyan brjod// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// bskal
60b6(rnying rgyud): pa dpag tu med pa ru// yang dag don las gol bar 'gyur// 'khor ba don med gnas su 'khyams// de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ rnal 'byor nyid kyis rnal 'byor la// shin tu gdug par
60b7(rnying rgyud): dug mdas gtong // tha tshig gcan po rdzong lta bu// 'joms byed rnal 'byor rang bgegs so// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rnal 'byor rnam dag blo gros zhes// bya ba'i don ldan mkhas pa zhig/ mi
60b8(rnying rgyud): 'jigs blo gros zhes bya ba'i// thabs dang don la mi mkhas pa// sde pa mang po'i skyong ba'i sar// rnam dag blo gros 'khor bcas 'ongs// mkhas pa don ldan bzod thob la// rngan sems byar
61a1(rnying rgyud): ka'i sgro skur btab// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// mi 'jigs blo gros mnar med ltung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ lta ba dmigs bu dang bral bas// yang dgung du/ 
61a2(rnying rgyud): ma'i lam mi gsal// spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa// de ni rnal 'byor long ba'i tshogs// de yang ji lta bu zhin// rgyal po rab gsal 'dzin pa zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig byung // shes
61a3(rnying rgyud): rab lta ba'i mig med par// rnal 'byor ming tsam tshul bzung nas// sgra thos tsam gyis gzhung spyad pas// mig med 'khor ba'i khamasu lhung // de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/ de la sogs pa'i
61a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// log pa'i tshogasu 'gyuraro gsung // des na 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// shin tu gsang ba'i chos 'di rnams// gol sa che bar rgyal bas bshad// thabs
61a5(rnying rgyud): la mkhas pa'i spyod pa yis// den dang ldan par bya ba ces// thabs la mkhas par spyad pa yis// legs pa'i/ lam gyi rnal 'byor pa// sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi// 
61a6(rnying rgyud): rtsal can rnams kyi don bshad pa// skyes bu mchog gi spyod pa 'di// yon tan sgra bsgrags sus thos pa// ming tsam gyis kyang de thob cing // dran pas ngan 'gro las skyob yin// de yang ji
61a7(rnying rgyud): lta bu zhe na/ shin tu gsang ba'i spyod pa 'di// lha gnas gsum du grags pa las// lha'i bu ni 'od ldan te// mi rtag 'chi ba'i dus bab nas// 'chi ka'i lnga ltas byung ba'i tshe// mi dga' bar ni 'dus
61a8(rnying rgyud): gyur// phyi ma'i 'du shes bskyed pa las// mi gtsang zasu za ba yi// blun pa'i srog chags lus len par// rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong // shin tu 'jigs pa'i 'du shes kyis/ skyabs/ 
61b1(rnying rgyud): kyi yul rnams yid la byas// gzhan gyi dran pa mi gsal bar// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs chen gyis// mtshan ni rna ba'i dbang pos thos// thos pa yid la dran byas pas// ngan 'gro'i lam/ 
61b2(rnying rgyud): las slar log ste// tshogs chen spyod pa'i skal ldan pas// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnasu skyes// de bzhin zos pa dag par spyod// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs 'di la// gang zhig dga' zhing 'dun
61b3(rnying rgyud): skyed pa// gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar// ji ltar mos pa de myur 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze'i bu ni byams ldan te// gsang ba chen po'i tshogs 'di dag/ spyod par mos nas kun tu btsal/ 
61b4(rnying rgyud): btsal bas rnyed par ma gyur te// sa phyogs zhig tu 'dus nas ni// shin tu ngus nas smras pa ni// e ma ho bdag gi la das re bam// skyes nas rgas par gyur par du// tshogs chen zab
61b5(rnying rgyud): mo'i don btsal na// don dang ma phrad las re ngan// da 'ang ji ltar btsal na rnyed// btsal byas rnyed par yong mi 'gyur// thugs rje bdag la skyabasu mchi// gdung ba sgra cher byung ba la// 
61b6(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i khams las sgra phyung ste// skal dang ldan pa'i bram ze khyod// de ltar yid dam la brten pa// khyod ni don gyi skal ba can// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis// khyod la byin gyis/ 
61b7(rnying rgyud): rlobs par mdzad// de bas lta ba ma g.yel bar// sgrib pa sbyang ba'i thabs dag la// mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te// rang gi rtsa rnams bkros nas ni// khrag chen dag gis mchod pa de// 
61b8(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags dag pa tsan ngan chus// dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod nas// de ma thag tu don thob 'gyur// de skad lung bstan thob nas ni// dga' ba'i bsam pa cher g.yos te// lung bstan pa
62a1(rnying rgyud): ltar de spyad pas// rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i sras gyur// de bzhin mos pa dag par spyod// mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs pa// thams cad yang de bzhin te// tog ni / 
62a2(rnying rgyud): mor gyur pa bzhin// yongs kyi nub pa ma yino// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// lha'i bu zhes bya ba ni// dge ba'i rgyal po bya ba de// tshem bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/ gsang ba rgya cher spyad pa las/ lha bu'i/ 
62a3(rnying rgyud): chen 'od ldan de// shin tu dad pa cher g.yos te// lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang // bcas nas gsang ba'i gnas der phyin// dga' zhing 'dun pa'i tshul gyis ni// gus par gyur te der gnas pas/ tshe
62a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul chen po bzhi thob ste// lha gnas kun tu bgrod pa dang // 'thung chen lus las sprul pa dang // ri bo 'degs dang 'bang ba dang // mi 'chi tshe la gnas pa thob// rgyal mtshan
62a5(rnying rgyud): rtse mo'i tog bzhin du// mthong ba dag pa'i chos de nyid// bska bar nub par ma gyur to// de bzhin 'jug pa dag par gyis// mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pas// ye shes smon
62a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i mig rnyed nas// bla med snying po can rnams kyis// lam rnyed lam du zhugs pa bzhin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// bram ze kun ri bya ba zhig/ chos kyi mig ldan don mthong nas// gsang chen gzhung bzhin spyod pa
62a7(rnying rgyud): la// bram ze ke ni bya ba zhig/ dad pas don gyi rje su 'brengs// gsang chen 'dus pa'i tshogs mthong ba// chos kyi mig dang ldan 'gyur te// don gyi snying po mthong bar 'gyur// lhun grub rtsal chen rdzogs pa yi/ 
62a8(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin chen po'i sa nyid thob// de bzhin mthong bas dag par gyis// gzhan dag 'dir ni mngon spyod la// dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa// de ni dngos dang 'dra ba de// 'bras bu la yang mthong man
62b1(rnying rgyud): med// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan zhes// bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig la// tshem bu bcu dang bcas pa'i 'khor// rig 'dzin spyod pa'i don la zhugs// sngags spyod 'bras bu cher
62b2(rnying rgyud): thob ste// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po dag/ thob pa kun tu grags par gyur// de la gzhan gyi sde pa yi// bram ze dge slong bya ba zhig/ shin tu dag pa'i sems bskyed nas// 'jug cing bslab par zhugs pa
62b3(rnying rgyud): las// rgyal pos ma gnang gsang sgo bsdams// bram ze dad pa ma log par// 'byor pa'i yo byad ci yod rnams// rgyal po'i 'khor du phul nas kyang // rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogasu// yid kyi phyog
62b4(rnying rgyud): te smo lam btab// rtse gcig par ni smon lam btab// rjesu/ yi rang dam par ni// yid la byas pa'i bsod nams kyi/ sa// bsgrub par byed pa'i rgyal po dang // sgrub dang mi ldan bram
62b5(rnying rgyud): ze gnyis// 'bras bu mthon dman med par thob// 'di ni tshegs med don po che// thabs la mkhas pa'i rig 'dzin yin// de bzhin spyod pa gzhan dag la// dga' bas rje su yi rang gis
62b6(rnying rgyud): dge ba spyad dang ma spyad gnyis// 'bras bu mnyam par thob par gyur// bsam yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyal rnams 'dir bslabs 'dir mkhyen pas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bshes gnyen
62b7(rnying rgyud): du/ kun gyi bdag por gyur pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// sngon gyi bram ze gsal byin gyis// gsang chen 'di yi don bslabs nas// rang gi sems la goms byas nas// sems nyid bden pa
62b8(rnying rgyud): don mthong ste// chos rnams kun la mkhas par 'gyur// kun gyi rtsa ba sems yin pas// sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas// chos kyi rgyal por der gyur nas// sangs rgyas smra bar/ 
63a1(rnying rgyud): sing+ge zhes// zhing khams kun tu grags par 'gyur// de bzhin bslab pa dag par gyis// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// skye la nyan thos bsam yas la// sbyin pa'i
63a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen spel bas ni// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// ci phyir zhe na gcig mnyes pas// rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin// nam mkha' khyab pa'i rgyal ba dang // nyag gcig snang ba'i rgyal
63a3(rnying rgyud): ba gnyis// so so ma yin tha mi dad// sku dang gsung thugs gcig las med// 'dul ba'i ngo gang khyad par las// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan par zad// des na khyad par de ltar snang // de yang ji
63a4(rnying rgyud): lta bu zhe na// las rnams dag pa'i bram ze ni// dge ldan gas la ldan bya ba gnyis// dga' ba'i dad pas so sor skyes // gcig la gcig ni tha tshig byas// gcig gis nyan thos
63a5(rnying rgyud): bsam yas la// mchod sbyin bya ba rgya cher byas// gcigagis tshegs mchod rgya cher byas// tshogs la spyod pa'i gsal ldan ni// 'di tshe gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// sbyin pa
63a6(rnying rgyud): spel ba'i dge ldan ni// bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis grub// de bas gnas 'dir spyod pa dag/ rnal 'byor gas ldan tshul bzhin spyod// 'di dag rtag tu su 'chang ba// rdo rje sems dpa'
63a7(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa'i// tshe yon rtag tu ci 'dra bar// don gyi gzugs dang bcas par 'thob// de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ khyim bdag med sbyin bye ba de// tshom bu brgya dang bcas pa zhig/ rgyun gyis
63a8(rnying rgyud): par 'di spyad pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa ni// 'khor dang bcas pa ci 'dra ba// skye ba de yis nges par thob// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// don du nges par sgrub pa'i tshogs// rtogs
63b1(rnying rgyud): nas smra ba'i gang byed pa// goms dang brjod dang smos pa yis// chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhes// yon+tan spyi gtsug nyid du 'gyur// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// drang srong rnal 'byor ka la ya nas// drang srong
63b2(rnying rgyud): rnam pa mang po la// tshogs 'di yon+dan rgya cher bsgrags// don rnams nges par bshad pa las// drang srong mang pos rig 'dzin thob// ston par byed pa'i ka la yan// gsang bdag chos kyi rgyal por
63b3(rnying rgyud): gyur// 'on kyang gsang ba'i don 'di dag/ snod dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba la// bstan tam bshad dam brjod par gyis// des ni yon tan chen po dang // nga yi spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur// des na 'das pa chen
63b4(rnying rgyud): bo'i tshogs// rgyal ba kun gyi thugs dam ni// rnal 'byor gas nga ba'i tshogs 'di yin// rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan/ dpas// skad cig tsam 'am thang cig la// rgyal ba'i tshigs
63b5(rnying rgyud): 'di rab bskrun na// rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor mtha' dag dang // tha tshig zas mo skongs nas kyang // chos kyi mig ni thob par 'gyur// des ni
63b6(rnying rgyud): / tshochogs spyad yon+dan dang // log par spyad pa'i skyon rnams ni// sngon byung glengs bzhi bshad pa yin// zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsung so// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdol
63b7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa sngon byung gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de'i zhal du shin tu re zhing ba
63b8(rnying rgyud): sdod pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing kun tu brjod par 'khor gyis bskul ba'i sa la sta gon du gnas shing cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas 'khor phal mo ches rnam par bskul bar rig nas rnal
64a1(rnying rgyud): gyi phyag lus kun sa la brdabs nas a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab pa/ e ma rdo rje sems chen po// rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye / 
64a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar// mgon po yon+tan bsam las 'das// rgyal thob khyod la phyag 'tshalo// e ma rang snang dbyer med sku// rnam dag bsod nams mtshan gyis brgyan// dpe byad 'bru bkod lta mi
64a3(rnying rgyud): ngoms// sku lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshalo// e ma rnam dag na mkha'i dbyings// gcig gsung snang tshegs sgrar rig mkhyen// bsam 'das brjod med rdo rje'i gsung // gsung lnga'i
64a4(rnying rgyud): mchog la phyag 'tshalo// e ma gsang ba na mkha'i thug// / mnyam nyid mi g.yo so sor gsal// kun rig snying po ye shes mchog/ thugs lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshalo/ e/ 
64a5(rnying rgyud): ma mi mdzad mdzad pa che// ma chags chags bral 'od chag/ sa mdzod// thams cad sgrol ba'i las chen po// phrin las mchog la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal 'tshab khyod la gsol
64a6(rnying rgyud): ba ni// byams mgon thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// sprul pa'i go chags ru bsnyams te// 'khor ba'i skyes lings chen po la// sdug bsngal shin tu gsad pa'i phyir// thams cad dur khrod chen
64a7(rnying rgyud): po ru byin gyis brlabs pa'i las chen mdzod// e ho zhes gsol ba btab pa las// sems dpa' rdo rje chen po des// rnal 'byor pa'i phyag byas te// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
64a8(rnying rgyud): gi bdag po la zhus pa// a la la ho bde ba chen po'i mchog gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po// yang gsang bla na med pa'i bdag nyid// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rma du byung ba'i tshogs shin tu rtul
64b1(rnying rgyud): bod pa gsol ba 'tshal ba 'di shin tu ngo mtshar lag so// 'di dag 'dul ba'i dbang du dgod te/ ji ltar 'tshal ba'i bsam pa rangs par mdzad gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ bcom ldan
64b2(rnying rgyud): 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des kun tu 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas bka' gsang rmad du byung ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba// dur khrod rgyan gyi rol pa las rmad du byung ba'i ting 'dzin la snyam
64b3(rnying rgyud): par zhug so// snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i tshig 'di gsung so// hUM ho haM phaT/ hUM hUM bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN Da la a ra li i u li ta pa liM tra s+t+waM/ kha li ho/ na sha staM b+ha ya
64b4(rnying rgyud): hUM pu tsa khA hi phaT phaT ha la hUM zhes gsung so// // 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad dur khrod kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas// g.yos rab tu ga
64b5(rnying rgyud): shin tu rnam par 'thor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gas ba mchog gi bdag po des sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po/ la 'khor gzhan gyis yid tshe du mi 'gyur ba'i sku'i chos ba/ 
64b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni sku kun tu dur khrod kyi bdag po chen por bsgyur nas dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad dang / he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang / dpal gyi chas brgyad dang / dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po dgu dang / don gyi rtags
64b7(rnying rgyud): chen po bco brgyad dang / dur khrod kyi longs spyod sna tshogs pa bstan pas zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gzigs pa las sems dpa' rdo rje des mkhyen te/ bka' gsang dbang chen po 'dis
64b8(rnying rgyud): don du ni bshad/ tshig tu bsgrags par rig nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la shin tu ldem dgongs kyi tshig tu smras pa/ bka' gsang rmad byung chen po 'di// sbas pas zab cing rtogs dka' ba/ mtshon
65a1(rnying rgyud): pas don 'byin mi shes pas// nyon mongs rang dga' spyod mnyam pa'i// shin tu byis pa'i blo zhan pa'i// nges pa'i shes rab mig ldongs te// don gyi rtsal shugs chungs
65a2(rnying rgyud): pa yis// dga' ba de'i longs spyod bskrun snyam nas// mtshan ma rang dga' sprad bsgrubs kyang rang bzhin 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyud phung 'bras bu tshig gyur nas// myug gu brlag ste ga la
65a3(rnying rgyud): 'byung // gtan tshigs de bas 'di don dag/ rtsal gzhan dag la bstan min zhes// gsang bdag rgyal po kun gsung na// ci khyod rnams kyis mi shes sam// zhes rnam par smras pa las// 
65a4(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis slar gsol pa// e ma ho sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i rgyu tshig chen po dag 'khor gyi dal 'khor gyi nang dam pa 'dir gsung ngam// 'on te mi spyod
65a5(rnying rgyud): dam// cang ma lags grang / ci blang dor mdzad dam/ e ma sne/ du ma gyur pa ni gang mchis/ thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can lags na// thong kun tu rab tu thong / rnam par
65a6(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsungs/ 'gag pa mi mnga' ma 'gog gsungs// ci phyir mi gsung thogs med sras// rgyal ba'i sras po dus 'di lags// gsang ba'i snying po snod 'di lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor
65a7(rnying rgyud): gnas 'di lags// gsang ba'i dur khrod tshul 'di lags// snying rje zher sems khyod la 'dud// gsang ba yang gsang khyod la 'dud// gsang ba ye gsang khyod la 'dud// dkyil 'khor rgyal po
65a8(rnying rgyud): khyod la 'dud// 'khor lo snying po khyod la 'dud// gsang chen snying po tshul ci lags// bka' gsang dkyil 'khor thabs ci lags// 'bras bu bde ba'i don ci lags// ma 'ongs pa yi rnal/ 
65b1(rnying rgyud): 'byor dag/ bsgrubs na dang len 'tshal ba yi// rig par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci lags// 'byung chen rgyal pos bshad gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa las// sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de shin
65b2(rnying rgyud): tu bzhad pa chen pos rnam par bzhad de// a a he he'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pas 'khor thams cad kyang gad rgyangs kyi sgra chen po sgrogs par mdzad// dgyes pa'i 'od zer las shes rab kyi
65b3(rnying rgyud): dpal de dgyes pa'i rol mo sna tshogs ling long byed par byungo // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des lus kun bsrang ste// dur khrod kyi chas sna tshogs bsar zhing rtags bco brgyad 'bar bar
65b4(rnying rgyud): byas nas brjid pa'i gsung gis gsang sngags rgya mtsho dang // rnam grangs sna tshogs don gyi bsgrub pa brtags kyi rol pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag bshad do// 
65b5(rnying rgyud): gcig tu yang dag nges grub pa'i// don la rton byed rnal 'byor rnams// thog med nyid du 'grub 'dod pa// ji ltar tso blag mkhan dag gis// ras dkar sbyangs pas chen ba/ 
65b6(rnying rgyud): ltar// rnal 'byor las rnams dang por ni// skongs dang sbyong ba'i las rnams gces// zab mor 'jug pa'i sngon logs nas// sems nyid gting nas tshar gcad phyir// theg pa dman pa'i
65b7(rnying rgyud): skye bo dang // lhan gcig ci la'ang mi brna lo// de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag/ rus sbal mgo la 'ongs pa dag/ shin tu 'khrug pa'i sems chen gyis// rgya mtshos bshugs te spang bar bya// 
65b8(rnying rgyud): gal te gang zag dbang gis ni// nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba na// mgon tshun chos nyid chu bab nas// skong zlog cho ga rgya cher bya// sgrub rtsom sngon nam yang sngon nam// zhag grangs dag gi sngon logs nas// 
66a1(rnying rgyud): sdig sbyangs byang chub sems bskyed// dge ba'i don la 'dun par bya// slongs mo dang slong la dga' ba// slong la 'tsho ba'i tshe spyang rnams// sde dang mtshan dang grwar byas te/ 
66a2(rnying rgyud): rmi khung ba'i ning dug// sman dang 'bru dang rtsi rnams dang // bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa dag/ btags sam bye mar sbyar nas kyang // klung ngam chu klung mtsho chen du// don te chags med sbyin par bya// 
66a3(rnying rgyud): dge ba'i yon bdag dang blangs te// nad gso shes slob spyod sgom gra/ btsugs te bsti gnas mchog bya zhing // dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chen bya// gsung sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs pa yis// glegs kyi
66a4(rnying rgyud): mo kun bsten te// brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyi// rgya cher yangs pa'i las rnams bya// ye shes chog/ rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir// shes rab tshigs kyi sbyin mchog dag/ 
66a5(rnying rgyud): bstan tam glegs bam la sogs pa'o// blo mchog ldan pa rnams la sbyin// bsgom dang goms par bya ba yin / kun bzhi dag par bya ba'i phyir// ting 'dzin bye ba mang po la// / 
66a6(rnying rgyud): mchog yid kyi rtsal de sbyangs// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te// rgyud sbyangs lhag pa'i shes rab blta// sho gam srang dang sho gam lam// mi bde'i gnod pa kun gsal te// tshad med snying rje
66a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bskor// sbyin pa'i 'khor lo rgyun mi gcad// chu 'am sa 'am na mkha' 'am// me 'am de bzhin rlung rnams la// sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams// brtsam pa'i las chen/ 
66a8(rnying rgyud): 'khor lor bya// mtshams med zlog par byed pa yi// lus sems rgyud la rdul rlags te// 'phags pa'i skyon tshegs pho brang du// rdul snyed lus kyis mchod sems bshags// rgyal mnyes
66b1(rnying rgyud): las ni gyis shig pa// thabs chen sbyong ba'i las chen las// rnam bzhi me yi las mchog bya// des ni mtshams med thogs pa yin// thugs rjes 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dag/ gang ltar gos
66b2(rnying rgyud): ltar 'bad rtsol bya// bstan pa skyong ba'i tshogs rnams la// sbyin mchod spel ba'i las rnams bya// de la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs// don du mi 'gyur kun spangs la// nan tan tshogs kyi/ 
66b3(rnying rgyud): dpung chen bskyed// 'di ltar las chen ltang sogs pa// gzhan du bskyed pa ma yin te// rtse gcig don ldan rnal 'byor pa// rgyud ldan stong ldan bya phyir dang // gal te rtsal zhan ma grub na// dge
66b4(rnying rgyud): bsags ltang chen kun sdoms de// las kyi bsags de pa don bgrangs shing // gdung ba'i shugs phyung rtsal/ sprugs nas// nyi shar chu klung zla brnyan ltar// rang bzhin shugs
66b5(rnying rgyud): kyis 'grub par gces// de phyir phra mo yan chad kyang // bdag gis don du 'gyur bar bya// de ltar sbyang ba spyod ba yi// phra mo'i rnal 'byor blo 'phel bas// chung ngu chung sogs
66b6(rnying rgyud): mthar zad nas// skong ba'i rnal 'byor 'khor lo yis// zhig dang ral dang chags 'dres dag/ bskang gso gzhug pa'i las 'di bya// las chen bskor ba'i khyad par gyis// gnasu brtagapa
66b7(rnying rgyud): nges med de// mi sdug skyon can bkra mi shis// spangs te med par gyur pa yi// shin tu sar pa'i gnas chen dag/ bskang ba'i gnasu de 'gyuraro// de ltar yid 'ongs gnas gtsal nas// drod
66b8(rnying rgyud): ldan bla ma spyan drangs te// sr-i zhu rgyal chos spyi bos bkur// de yang dmigs kyis zhu ba dag/ maN Dal khar sil tsam dag la// me long snying po ltar byas te// gtsang ma'i rgyu las rdzas
67a1(rnying rgyud): byas pa// yid 'ongs rnam lnga'i mchod pa la// rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis// rgyan te klubs pa'i sprin phung rnams// mnyes nas bskongs phyir rgyal la dbul// 
67a2(rnying rgyud): phyi 'khor skyong ba'i mgon po la// 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi// yid bzhin long spyod rkyen dang bcas// yon+dan cha las snod bcol mchod// mnyes nas skongs pa'i stongasu 'gyur/ khams
67a3(rnying rgyud): gsum snying rje'i gnas rnams la// yo byad sbyin tshogs chen po lnga// 'dod pa'i bsam pa rangs byas nas// mgu bas skongs pa'i stongasu 'gyur// bgegasu gyur pa'i bgegs ris kyang
67a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i don gyis sems mi 'byung // dmigs kyis kha zas sna tshogs las// bgegs rnams mgun thams cad kyang // mnyam pa'i don gyis skongs pa'i rgyur// cung zad
67a5(rnying rgyud): tsam du snang ba yin// de ltar skong ba'i las rnams kyis// bskang bar bya ba'i dmigs rnams ni// rnam pa lngar ni snang ba ste// kun tu nyams pa chen po dang // rtsa ba nyams
67a6(rnying rgyud): dang yan lag nyams// de bzhin zlas nyams zhar nyams lnga// bskang ba'i thabs kyang lnga yid// sprad pa'i las kyis bskang ba dang // rdzas dang nor dang ting 'dzin dang // man ngag gsang ba'i
67a7(rnying rgyud): thabs che no// de dag la yang lnga lnga ste// spyod pa'i tshul gyis bskang ba la// rnam pa lnga ru bshad par bya// dang po 'bum lnga khri gsum ste// rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsumo// yan lag nyams/ 
67a8(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa la// stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya// zlas nyams brgya lnga bcu gsumo// zhar gyis nyanas par gyur pa la// bcu lnga gcig gsum dag gis skongs// rdzas kyis brkang ba'i
67b1(rnying rgyud): thabs mchog ni// gal te bsrung ba 'ga' zhig las// byang chub tha tshig ral gyur na// gti mug rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // mdangs rigs snga ma spyan drangs la// nyes 'gal mi bcab stong
67b2(rnying rgyud): du bshags// gser la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlabs nor des blu// byang chub sems bskyed rgyud sbyangs mnyan// rdo rje tha tshig ral gyur na// zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig
67b3(rnying rgyud): bskang // rje'u rigs bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas ma bcab 'bum du bshags// shel la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// bsam gtan ting 'dzin / 
67b4(rnying rgyud): brtson bya// rin chen tha tshig nyams gyur na// nga rgyal ri/ des kyi tha tshig bskang // rgyal rigs bla ma spyan drangs te// nyes byas mi bcab brgyad khrir bshags// bai DUr+ya la sog
67b5(rnying rgyud): rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlags nor des bla// sku gdung ring bsrel rnam par spel// pad+ma'i tha tshig ral gyur na// 'dod chags rigs kyi tha tshig bskang // gdol rigs bla ma
67b6(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab brgyar bshags bya// byi ru la sogs rdzas chen gyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// bshad bya zab mo'i glegs bam brjod// las kyi tha tshig ral gyur na// brag dog
67b7(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi tha tshig skang // bram ze rigs shes spyan drangs la// nyes byas mi bcab bcu lngar bshags// in dra la sogs rdzas rnams kyis// tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu// mchod sbyin bsod nams
67b8(rnying rgyud): las chen bya// des ni bskang ba'i las chen 'grub// don gyis bskang ba'i thabs mchog kyang // rnam lnga'i tshul du bshad par bya// chos kun namakhar bsgoms nas kyang // bag chags bzang ngan tha
68a1(rnying rgyud): kun// ci yang med par blo la gzhag/ de la goms byas nyes pa med// kun la mkhas pa'i bla ma la// rgya che yangs pa'i chos nyan te// bsam pa'i las rnams rgya cher bya/ yid
68a2(rnying rgyud): kyis dmigs pa'i las dag na// rtsa ba nyams pa skong bar 'gyur// gal te yan lag nyams gyur na// chos nyid na mkha'i don ston pa'i// glegs bam zam mo kun brtags te// don rnams rgya cher ba/ 
68a3(rnying rgyud): par bya// des ni yan lag nyams pa med// zlas ni tha tshig nyams 'gyur na// bla ma skyes bu mkhas pa la// gzhung chen tshugs pa'i bstan pa zhig/ ston pa'i yon bdag gnyer blangs te// blo yi rtsal
68a4(rnying rgyud): can kun bsdus te// dam chos bsdud rtsi bstan pa bsgrags// // gal te zhar gyis nyams gyur na// bstan pa'i glegs dab ma rgya cher rnams// bris nas chos kyi sbyin par bya// des ni
68a5(rnying rgyud): zhar nyams bskongs par 'gyur// ting 'dzin rtsal gyi thabra/ mchog ni// bag chags can gyi spyi gtsug tu// rtsa dmar 'od ni me long tsam// shin tu 'bar zhing 'tsher gsal bas/ 
68a6(rnying rgyud): chags dang bcas pa'i phung po bsregs// rnam grol sems kyi rang bzhin dang // 'od kyi rang bzhin gcig pa las// dkar dang dmar dang mthing ka yi// 'od kyi thig le gsum du 'gyur// dkar po sgra/ 
68a7(rnying rgyud): pas khyab par che// dmar por spos pas chags pa che// mthing ka thugs kyi sa bon te// rnam gsum gcig tu 'dus pa las// ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags bsregs// sku gsung thugs
68a8(rnying rgyud): kyi dam tshig skongs// dkar po rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la// dmar po 'bud pa'i rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i bag chags rnam par gtor// dmar po chu zla'i dkyil 'khor las// mthing ka ye shes
68b1(rnying rgyud): chu byung bas// dngos po'i ldan ldan thams cad bkrus// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// rdzas sreg pa la me dgos kyang // bag chags tshig la me mi dgos// 
68b2(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i ye shes me byung bas// mtshan ma yi ni bud shing bsregs// 'jig rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang // mtshan ma gtor la rlung mi dgos// rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas// mtshan ma'i rdul
68b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnam par 'phyag/ lus bkru ba la chu dgos kyang // sems bkru ba la chu mi dgos// mnyam nyid chu'o khrus kyi rdzing // ye shes chu bo'i rgyun byung bas// bag chags ldan ljin thams cad bkrus// 
68b4(rnying rgyud): oM kro d+hi shwa ri sarba pA baM sho d+ha ya/ oM AHhUM/ raM yaM khaM/ de skad tshig tu brjod pa yis// nyams pa'i chad pa mi 'byung ngo // gcig tu bskang ba'i las chen yang // rigs kyi rdzas dang yo
68b5(rnying rgyud): byad rnams// gan su bsags nas byin brlabs te// phyi nang / mtshams cad brtan byas nas// so so rigs kyi dam chi/ ga la// 'gal bar gyur pa gang dang gang // mchod dang bshags/ 
68b6(rnying rgyud): dang gnod bkur te// yan lag brgyad kyi tshul bzung nas// bsam gtan gnas sbyangs rdzas bsab pa// gti mug rigs kyi dam tshig la// shes nas rtogs par bya rgyu las// ma rig lag pa'i mthu
68b7(rnying rgyud): yis ni// tha tshig drag po yal gyur na// pho brang na mkha'i ling ga la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// a yi rang bzhin 'od gsal bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na// phaT kyis drag
68b8(rnying rgyud): tu brdebs pa yis// 'od 'dris bskal pa'i mkha' gsal bas// gti mug ri bo'i mun bsal te// byang chub myu gu 'bar bar 'gyur// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // rnal 'byor can gyis
69a1(rnying rgyud): tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o bde gshegs tha tshig las// byang chub sems bde gsal 'bar ba// don du mi gtong gzhi bskyed// sangs rgyas gdung chen rgyud snyam las// 
69a2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar zla ba ra ri ltar// rgyu las byung ba'i rang bzhin las// byang chub myu gu nub ma khang // gzugs kyi phung po'i zhing khamasu// bde mchog mkha' mnyam dbyings chen gsal// gnyen pos 'joms
69a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs chen las// bskar bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// byang chub bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs gyur bsab pa'i don du sbyangs// sarba ta
69a4(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta pu ta sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // spyi ba brda'i tshul phyag rgya sbyar// zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig las// pho zang rnam shes ling ga la// rdo rje bum pa'i dbus gnas par// hUM gir
69a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na / phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa yis// 'od 'dril rdo rje pa lam gyis// zhe sdang ri bo blags nas kyang // shes rab ma long / 
69a6(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o rdo rje tha tshig rnams// sems can ye shes gsal 'bar ba// thugs mchog gdung chen rgyud snyam las
69a7(rnying rgyud): ji ltar ral gri so rgal ltar// de las gyur pa'i rang bzhin las// shes rab me long nub ma khang // rnam shes phung po'i zhing khamasu// gsal 'bar ye shes thig le 'phro// gnyen pos 'joms
69a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs chen gyis// bskang bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// thugs mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // bskongs 'gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang // 
69b1(rnying rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // snying gi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// nga rgyal rigs kyi dam tshig las// snyoms nas dang du blang rgyu las// log pa'i nga rgyal de ma
69b2(rnying rgyud): choms tha tshig drag po yal gyur na// pho brang skye rgyu'i ling ka'i dkyil// rin chen 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// swa yi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na/ 
69b3(rnying rgyud): paT kyis drag du brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril rin chen 'khor lo yis// nga rgyal de'u chen brlag 'gyur nas// bsod nas ljon shing me tog 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal
69b4(rnying rgyud): 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma rin chen tha tshig lha // bsod nams yon+tan 'od 'bar ba// don du mi gtong ba zhir bskyed de// rgyu mchog gdung chen rgyud bsnams las/ dza
69b5(rnying rgyud): ltar mkha' la 'khrigs 'thibs ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// me tog 'od mdzes yal ma khang// tshe/ ra ba'i phung po'o zhing khamasu// che ba'i ye shes mnyam 'bar
69b6(rnying rgyud): bas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bskang bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// sku mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang // skongs 'gyur ba
69b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i don du sbyang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta rad na sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // bral ba brda' yi tshul phyag sbyar// 'dod chags rigs kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyad par bya rgyu las
69b8(rnying rgyud): 'dod log rgya mtsho ma ngoms te// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur nas// pho brang pad+ma'i ling ga'i dkyil// pad+mo 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par// oM gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug
70a1(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa na// phaT gyis drag tu brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril pad+ma'i mtshon cha las// 'dod chags rgya mtsho bskams gyur nas// pad+ma chos kyi ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal ba
70a2(rnying rgyud): gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o pad+ma'i tha tshig las// pad+mo'i ye shes 'od 'bar bas// don du mi gtong bzhi bskyed de// gsung mchog gdung chen rgyud bsnyams nas// 
70a3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bad stong tsher ma ltar// rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad+mo'i ye shes nub ma khang// 'du shes phung po'o zhing khamasu// rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'od 'phros pas// gnyen pos 'joms
70a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i thabs chen las// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bska// gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// gsung mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams// skongs gyur bsam pa'i
70a5(rnying rgyud): don du sbyangs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ya ho// de skad tshig/ tu brjod nas kyang // lce'i brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// phrag dog rigs kyi dam tshig las// rtogs nas spyad par bya rgyu wa/ 
70a6(rnying rgyud): phrag dag log bzung dbang gis na// tha tshig drag po yal 'gyur ba// pha brang gsang ba'i ling ga'i dkyil// rdo rje ral gri dbus gnas par// ha yis rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar// gsal 'phro 'khrug
70a7(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa na phaT kyis drag du brdabs pa las// 'od 'dril rdo rje'i ral gri yis// phrag dog mtshon cha bsibs gyur nas// rdo rje ral gri ye shes 'bar// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na// rnal 'byor can
70a8(rnying rgyud): gyis tshig 'di brjod// e ma'o phrin las tha tshig las// rdo rje ral gri 'od 'bar bas// don du mi gtong bzhi bskyed de// phrin las gdung chen rgyud bsnyams las// ji ltar nyi gsal sprin bsgribaltar
70b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rdo rje 'od chen nub ma khad// 'du byed phung po'i zhing khamasu// ye shes mtshon cha'i 'od 'phros pas// gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las// bska'o// 
70b2(rnying rgyud): bskal ba'i thugs dam bskang // gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis// phrin las bskal pa'i thugs ngam rnams// skos gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang // oM sarba ta thAg ta karma sa ma sa
70b3(rnying rgyud): de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang // lus kyi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar// des kyang skong ba'i las chen 'grub// man ngag thabs kyi don mchog ni// rtsa ba yan lag de rnams las// gang dag nyams par gyur/ 
70b4(rnying rgyud): pal// man ngag thabs mchog lnga yis bskang // nyams pa chen dbor lhung 'gyur na// bla mar gyur pa'i skyes bu dag/ rgyal dbo dgu yi spyan lam du// bsgrub pa chen po dgu brtsam zhing // 
70b5(rnying rgyud): mchog chen dgu yi brtul zhugs spyad// rang gi gzungs ma ga nga yin pa// bla ma dgu la gzungs mar dbul// de bzhin rtsa ba yan lag dang // zla dang zhar las nyams pa la// 
70b6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa don gyi khyad par rnams// bdun nam lnga 'am gsum 'am gcig/ rim pa bzhin du sbyar byas na// des ni skong pa'i mchog du 'gyur// bskang ba'i yul yang rnam lnga ste// bder gshegs/ 
70b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba mtha' dag kyang // mdo ru bsdu na rnam lnga ste// gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags phrag dog 'di lnga dag/ rtsa bar gyur pa'i don gyis na// gzhi yang thams cad 'dis bsgyur
70b8(rnying rgyud): bas// nyams dang ma nyams tha tshig dang // longs spyod spong len thams cad rnams// yid rgyu yin par rig bya ste// rgyu nyid rgyur brtags dbang gis na// bsgyur bas dug 'gyur sman chen lhan
71a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid tha tshig btsan por sbyar// 'dul ba'i dbang gis khyad par gyis// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+mor las lnga'i rigasu 'dus// de dag thugs dam mchog nyid
71a2(rnying rgyud): kyang // rnam lngar 'dus par bstan pa la// rtogs nas bsrung bsgrub dam bcas pa// so so 'gal zhing chag nyams na// so so nyid bsab par bya// sku yi chag nyams gnasu gzhug/ gsung
71a3(rnying rgyud): gi 'gal 'khrul sau ru bsab// thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul gsor med de// rdo rje snying po'i tha tshig la// bskang pas skongs par gyur pa yi// rtags chen dag kyang 'di lta ste// rgyal ba sangs rgyas
71a4(rnying rgyud): rigs 'dzin gyi// gdung chen dag las byung ba yi// sha ri ram zhes bya ba de// thams cad lta su ston par byed// shel gyi za ma rtog nang du// dag par bcug ste btsas pa
71a5(rnying rgyud): las/ nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba'i tshe// kha dog gnag cing 'bros par 'gyur// nyams pa skongs sam ser chud/ cing // gal te dam tshig ma nyams na// kha dog dkar zhing // 
71a6(rnying rgyud): 'tsher bar 'gyur// legs pa'i yon+tan 'byung ba'i tshe// grangs mang rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te gnag gam mi gsal na// smrar te bsgribs nas bskor bzlog bya// 'on tang nyam
71a7(rnying rgyud): pa mi phog cing // de dag so ru gso ba na// rtags chen 'di ni bsten bya ste// 'di dag shin tu brtags nas ni// dkar la 'tsher bar gyur pa na/ rtsa ba yan lag nyams pa rnams// skongs te sor
71a8(rnying rgyud): chung rtags yi no// des na rnal 'byor las kyi gtsor skyong dang skong pa'i las rnams bya// bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungs pa dang / 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i bdu
71b1(rnying rgyud): kyi sde pa las lha'i rigasu gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi 'khor 'phags pa'i rigs 'dzin pa nyon mongs pa lha'i bdag po lha chen po lnga la sogs pa bka'i snod du rung bar byin gyis brlabs te 'khod pa las// 'dod
71b2(rnying rgyud): chags thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje bram ze thod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ltar ma gyis na ma dang ma gus 'gal 'khrul du gyur pa'i chang pa'i
71b3(rnying rgyud): skye gnas dang rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur// bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bshadadu gsol zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyis bdag po la sog/ 
71b4(rnying rgyud): pa rnams dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa'i skye gnas 'dri ba legangs kyis yid tshim par byed pa bshad kyis nyon cig/ rtsa ba yan lag 'di dag las// gal te zhig gam nyams gyur na/ 
71b5(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor las kyi dang po las// lung gi gsang sgor zhugs pa 'i tshe// don dang ldan pa'i bla ma yis// rdo rje tha tshig byin brlabs nas// lce la dag tshig chu bzhag pa// dmyal ba rdo rje/ 
71b6(rnying rgyud): dmod btsug nas// yi ge hUM du byas pa des// snying gi dkyil tu thim nas kyang // lcags kyi sdig pa mgo dgu pa'i// khro bo rak+Sha zhes bya ba'i// khrag 'thung chen por gyur nas ni// snying khrig gzhibs te/ 
71b7(rnying rgyud): 'thung nas ni// sdug bsngal chen por bsad nas kyang // dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur// gal te tha tshig ma nyams na// lce la bzhag pa arga ste// snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang // ye shes
71b8(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' che na gang bar// gyur te sgrib pa kun sbyangs nas// sangs rgyas sras su skyed par byed// 'dod chags dam tshig nyams gyur na// mngal gyi grong khyer chen por 'gro// zhe sdang ngam/ 
72a1(rnying rgyud): tshig tam gyur na// rak+Sha srin po'i rig su 'gro// gti mug dam tshig nyams gyur na// mi gtsang zasu za ba yi// rmongs pa'i lag chen lusu ltung // nga rgyal dam tshig nyams 'gyur na/ 
72a2(rnying rgyud): rul sbal nag po'i lusu ltung // phra dog dam tshig nyams gyur na// chu srin mgo dgu'i lusu ltung // dam chen po'i kun nyams na// ru tra nag po'i lus su ltung // las kyi rkyen dang ma phrad na// thar pa'i
72a3(rnying rgyud): skabs ni mi srid do// sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsung so// nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po rig 'dzin rnams kyis shin tu cho nges chen po 'byin cing dus der e ma'o bcom ldan 'das bcom
72a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na/ bdag la ltung rgyu mchis te/ dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la btags pa'i tshe// bka' la ma dang ma gus pas bka' la skur cing spras
72a5(rnying rgyud): btags pa dang / ston pa dang grogs la smad cing spyad long btags pa la sogs pa ltung ba'i rgyu mang po bgyis pa sa/ da ni bdag kyang chad pa'i skye gnasu mchi bar nges na
72a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bzung ste/ bka'i 'khor du bkod pas da ni thar pa thob lags grang // 'on kyang 'gyod pa drag po'i dbang gis yid kyi sgrib pa ni byang chub sems kyis bshags
72a7(rnying rgyud): ngag gi sgrib pa ni tshig tu 'don cing smes te bshags/ lus kyi sgrib pa ni lus gdan khri la phul te bshags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes gzung 'tshal na/ gnyen po ni gang lags/ thabs
72a8(rnying rgyud): ni ji ltar bshags// yul ni gang la bshags// rgyu ni gang mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bsha du gsol/ bde bar bshags pa thugs rjes bskyang du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 
72b1(rnying rgyud): phul ba// rig 'dzin chen po mi thong can rnams nyon cig/ ltung bar gyur pa'i gnas rnams la 'gyod par gyur nas nus pa leg so// ltung ba'i gnyen po ni gang zhe na/ nyes byas rnams bshag/ 
72b2(rnying rgyud): par 'dod na gang 'gyod pa drag po skyen nas pa spu ni gzings mchi ma 'byin pa yin// thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de// gang zhe na/ shes rab chen po'i rgyud kyis bag chags thams cad rang bzhin med
72b3(rnying rgyud): par shes pa dang / ting 'dzin chen po'i mes bag chags thams cad bsregs te med par bya ba dang / byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis bag chags kyi mun nag thams cad bsal te de dag dag par bya/ 
72b4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / spyod pa brlabs po che'i chus bkru ba'o// de la bshag das par bya ba'i yul ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rig 'dzin dang / lha dang bla ma dang / glegs bam dang / grogs po dang
72b5(rnying rgyud): rten du gyur pa rnamaso// bshags par bya ba'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa che chung bshags pa'o// nyon mongs pa rigs ba mngon du rgyu ba bshags pa dang / bag la nyal dang shes
72b6(rnying rgyud): bya'i sgrib pa bshags pa'o// de'i phyir ltung bar gyur pa'i las rnams 'gyod pa drag pos brten la thabs la mkhas pas spyad de/ sgrib pa che chung cha shas kyis phye la gus par bshags pagyi
72b7(rnying rgyud): shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rig 'dzin chen po mi'i thod pa can rnams mgu zhing rangs te/ rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas// 'gyod cing gdung ba'i glu 'di blangaso// oM ye shes sku
72b8(rnying rgyud): mchog rang bzhin dkyil 'khor na/ zla rgyas bzhin du spros pa mi mnga' yang // thugs rjes nyi gsal 'od bzhin snyoms mdzad lha// bder gshegs bzhugs shing bdag la dgongasu gsol/ 
73a1(rnying rgyud): brjod med shes rab mi g.yo chos mchog dbyings// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i gtso// chu 'phrul sprul pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshalo// dngos su 'byor dang yid kyi
73a2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa yis// kun du bzang po'i bla med mchod sprin gyis// mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgya cher yongs bkang nas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya chen mchod// kun du bzang me'i yum gyi b+ha ga la/ 
73a3(rnying rgyud): 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang du ro gcig pa'i// gnyis med byang chub sems kyis mnyes gyur cig/ sems kyi rang bzhin chos dbyings na mkha' che// chos nyid rnam dag rgya che 'od gsal bas// 
73a4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor nyid dbyings smra bsam la 'das pas// mnyam nyi dang du byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dud// kun bzangs rdzogs chen ye nas bdal ba la// phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
73a5(rnying rgyud): bkod pa ni// snang srid rnam dag kun bzangs yum gyi dbyings// / 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum lhun rdzogs rnams// gsang chen rab rdzogs bzungs chen bdag nyid ma// gnyis
73a6(rnying rgyud): med thig le chen por 'od gsal bas// cir yang snang bas bad chen g.yu drung lha// 'du 'bral med pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan yab yum dang // byang
73a7(rnying rgyud): ldum dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs// rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag/ ma ltar byams zhing sring ltar gdung la sogs// nyes legs ltang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod ma// dbang gyur
73a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dam can dgongasu gsol// thugs rjes gdung 'tsho ba rdo rje thod pa can// bdag cag dregs pa'i bdag po 'dir tshogs kun// 'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub sems bskyed de// bla med ge/ 
73b1(rnying rgyud): 'phangs thob par bya ba'i phyir// bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i 'dul khrims dang // sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog/ 'da' dka' rdo rje dam tshig gtan gyi gnyer// spyi dang lhag pa ni/ 
73b2(rnying rgyud): khyad par dam tshig rnams// snga phyi mnos shing gnyer du rma'o 'tshal// don las gol zhing ldog sems ma mchis kyang // gdod bya long yod snyam pa'i le lo dang // klong du ma gyur rtsal shugs
73b3(rnying rgyud): chungs pa yis// shes bzhin mi ldan dam tshig 'gal 'gyur te// dang po'i tha tshig bka' la btags pa'i tshe// bka' las ma gus 'gal bgyis dpyas long gtogs// bar du bslab pa'i gnye
73b4(rnying rgyud): chen phog po'i tshe// bslab la mi brtson don la g.yel ba dang // tha ma 'di tshe 'bras bu sgrub pa na// dka' dang gzhung bzhi dan ma lcogs don las 'gal// tsher dang mtsher sgrib pa che chu
73b5(rnying rgyud): rnams// shin tu mi shes ma rig dbang gis na// ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal bgyis pa// dpa' bo thu/ gas kyi bdag la bzod par gsol// 'khor ba thog ma
73b6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dus mtha' nas// las kyi dbang gis bdag cag ring du 'khyams// nyon mongs log par lta ba'i dug 'thungs te// sdug bsngal nad kyis shin du gdungs pa la// bde gshegs
73b7(rnying rgyud): thugs rje sman pa'i rgyal po yis// dam tshig bdud rtsi thar pa'i sman stsal bas// nyon mongs 'khrul pa'i nad rnams zhi mdzad cing // bla med byang chub snying por 'tsho mdzad pa// byams mgon// 
73b8(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes bdag la skyabs su mchi// zhes ngus nas/ a la la ho zhes brjod de gnyen po drag por bsten nas lus gdan khrir phul te// byang chub sems kyis rnam par bdud pa'i don la/ 
74a1(rnying rgyud): rnam par sbyangs pas lus gcir bu zang mar phyung // gnod pa drag po'i 'gyod pa byas pas// bde bar gshegs pa rnams mnyes par gyur to// des sgrib pa byang zhing
74a2(rnying rgyud): bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i rtags lus gos dang phral nas ldan pa'i thod pa yang zla ba tshes brgyad par gyur to// sa thob pa'i rtag su de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs rten du gnas par
74a3(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de nas sems pa'i rdo rje dgyes te bka' stsal pa/ mi'i thod pa can rnams 'gyod pa'i las kyis bshags pa legs te/ nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par gyur to// de ni shes
74a4(rnying rgyud): bya'i sgrib pa dag cing ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i daphyir nyan pa'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs la gsang sngags kyi sgra rnams nyon cig/ des ni sa nas sar
74a5(rnying rgyud): 'phar zhing 'bras bu yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsungs pas 'khor bsam pa rangs par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo lnga
74a6(rnying rgyud): skong ba las kyi bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog nyid ting 'dzin rgyas shing rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
74a7(rnying rgyud): zhug so// sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po yang ting 'dzin rnamasar 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyang sna tshogs 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyems par
74a8(rnying rgyud): zhug so// de nas 'dus pa bal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad ci yang med par mthong ngo // chos thams cad ci yang med par gsal bar gyur pa dang / chos nyid stong pa'i na mkha' las brag cha'i tshu
74b1(rnying rgyud): du sgra 'di byung ngo // mi gnas mi rtogs bsam dang bral// ma chags chags bral yul las 'das// ci yang mi 'byung cir ma yin// rang byung rang zhi brjod dang bral// zhes sgra byung bas ston pa
74b2(rnying rgyud): ni don gyi che ba byung // 'khor rnams ni rtsal sbyangs// thams cad don ya ngam zhing chos nyid kyi na mkha' mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po nyid snying rje rgyun gyi nyi
74b3(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas chos nyid kyi nam mkha' la snying rje byang chub sems kyi gzugs bsnyen nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor zhig shar bar gyur to// de nas 'dus pa bal mo che'i
74b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor rnams yang dag par rtog pa 'di ltar skyes te// e ma chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'di ltar yin pa las 'di da ltar ma shes pa'i 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying
74b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'di yod snying rje zhes snying rje byang chub kyi sems skyes par/ gyur to// de nas nyi ma'i snying po'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra phyung // yongs la khyab pa'i nyi ma'i 'od// snying rje byang
74b6(rnying rgyud): chub sems yin te// rnam rtog mun pa sel bar snang // yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'o// zhes sgra byung ba las chos thams cad byang chub sems kyi 'od zer du gsal bar gyur to// de nas yang bca
74b7(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog gi bdag po de nyid// cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis nyi ma'i snying po las chos
74b8(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyud yi ge a dkar po shar bar mthong // de nas a la cho 'phrul sgra byung // a ni chags med yi ge'i mdzod// cho 'phrul rtog pa kun gyi rgyu// nyon mongs skyon bral zla ba'i mdog
75a1(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// zhes sgra byung bas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// chos thams cad cho 'phrul gyi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan
75a2(rnying rgyud): 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de ci yang mi mdzad pa tshe 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du snang bar gyur to// de nas yum chen mo na mkha'i dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba de chos thams cad nam
75a3(rnying rgyud): mkha' b+ha gar byin gyis brlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// zhugs par gyur pa dang 'das pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad na mkha' khyab pa'i rang bzhin du ma
75a4(rnying rgyud): ngo// de nas yum gyi b+ha ga'i snying po las 'od zer mthing ka 'phros nas nyi ma'i snying po'i a la la bskul bas yi ge e mthing rakra 'bros te lding gnas pa las cho 'phrul gyi rang sgra 'di byung ngo //
