75a5(rnying rgyud): a ni e yi rang bzhin te// a las e byung mkha' khyab bdal// mi 'gyur thog med bsam las 'das mtha' dang dbus med kun du bdal// zhes sgra byung bas// thams ca
75a6(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i rang bzhin du cham chad par gyur to// de nas yang yum chen mo las kyi dbyings phyug mas yang zhing g.yo ba rlung gi dkyil 'khar zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so// des 'dus pa phal mo che'i
75a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyis chos thams cad rlung gi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong // de nas rlung de las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ngo // a yi byin brlabs ye shes las// rlung gi cho 'phrul yam du shar// thams
75a8(rnying rgyud): cad 'degs pa'i stobs ldan zhing // rang bzhin g.yo zhing thogs med 'phyo// zhes sgra byung bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur to// de nas yum chos kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya
75b1(rnying rgyud): pa nges 'bar 'phro me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong ngo // de nas me'i 'od zer la cho 'phrul gyi byung
75b2(rnying rgyud): ga a yi byin brlabs ye shes las// cho 'phrul me yi snying por shar// 'bar bas gsal byed ye shes 'phro// dngos po kun zad me klong 'tshub// ces sgra byung bas me'i bskal pa 'byam kla
75b3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba des sdud pa rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// des 'dus pa phal po che'i 'khor gyi chos thams cad chu'i rang bzhin du gnas
75b4(rnying rgyud): par mthong ngo // de nas rlabs kyi 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di bya // rgyu yi yi ge 'od zer las// chu yi snying po'i tshe 'phrul shar// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o// rlung mtsho
75b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgyas par gyur// zhes sgra byung bas thams cad yu/ ma rin chen dbyings phyug ma'i rang bzhin gyis khyab paraganaso// de nas yum chen mo rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya
75b6(rnying rgyud): bas zhing khams thams cad byin gyis brlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad sa rnams yongasu rdzogs pa'i rang
75b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin du mthong ngo // de nas sa rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba// mi dmigs pa las sna tshogs par// snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di byung ba// rnal 'byor sa bcu rdzogs pa'i
75b8(rnying rgyud): don// lhun gyis grub pas bde ba che// zhes sgra byung bas sa dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag du thugasu chud par gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de ri bo brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
76a1(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhug so// des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bor mthong ngo // de nas de'i 'od las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung // rnam dag
76a2(rnying rgyud): shes rab mkha' glong nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bo shar// rgya che gting zab nam 'phang gcod// rtog pa'i ri bo 'joms par byed// ces sgra byung bas rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bos nyon mongs pa'i ri bo tham
76a3(rnying rgyud): cad zil gyis mnan no// de nas dbyings phyug ma chen mo lnga// shes rab zab mo'i gzhal yas yum gyi mkha' glong rnam dag ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// b+ha ga'i snying po las
76a4(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo // b+ha ga gsang ba'i 'od zer las// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang // na mkha 'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med// dus gsum rgyal ba mtshod
76a5(rnying rgyud): dbyings// zhes sgra byung // byung bas na mkha' thams cad pho brang gi gzhal yas 'byam klas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog de nyid chos thams cad sku la
76a6(rnying rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin nam phyag rgya thams cad rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan
76a7(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa'i chos thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas// dbu'i gtsug tor man chad du rdzogs par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'khor ba
76a8(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa khams ni chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor rdzogs// 'khor ba gzugs kyi khams ni zhing chen gyi sa bzhi bdal ba la rdzogs par mthong ngo // keng rus la gzugs med pa'i khams rdzogs
76b1(rnying rgyud): par mthong ngo // ri rab kyi kha mu tig gi btsal dang / as ma gar ba'i 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrigs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i brag gtams pa la/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
76b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdzogs par mthong ngo // nor bu chen po che'i steng du rdo rje rtse gsum dang rtse lnga'i brag gtams pa la kri ya dang a pa ya dang yo ga rnams rdzogs par mthong po/ rdo/ 
76b3(rnying rgyud): rje drag chen gyi steng na pad+ma dkar po'i maN ral la bskyed pa'i rnam 'byor pa thams cad rdzogs par mthong ngo // pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang // zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyor du bkod pa lta
76b4(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug po nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo // dbang phyug po mo'i steng byol song gi gtso bo ba rgyad ni rig 'dzin chen po'i rnal 'byor nyon mongs pa sbyangs
76b5(rnying rgyud): nas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir dpal brtan stag dang / 'jigs byed seng ge dang / gdug pa'i gzigs dang / gtum pa'i dom dang / stobs kyi glang po dang / brjid pa'i ma he dang / 
76b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa'i chu srin dang / zhe sdang gi sbrul rnams la rig 'dzin thams cad sa la yongasu rdzogs par mthong // gzhal yas chen po 'bar ba la yum kun tu bzang mo rdzogs par mthong // me dpung
76b7(rnying rgyud): chen po dgu la ye shes kyi sgo dgu gartsegs du yongasu 'bar bar rdzogs par mthong ngo // zhabs brgyad la gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang / sgom bzhi rdzogs par mthong ngo // dur khrod kyi rgyan chen
76b8(rnying rgyud): po bco brgyad ni me chen mo bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs par gsal lo// phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni 'phra men ma bcu dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na khrung bcu 'bar ba'i kha nas mtshon cha sna
77a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'phro ba// mkha' 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na seng+ge kha glal ba brgyad kyi kha nas ral gri 'bar ba brgyad 'phro ba/ shugs 'gro brgyad dbyug par
77a2(rnying rgyud): 'khyar ba'i lag na stag mche ba brtsegs pa brgyad kyi kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba// ma mo brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na mi mgo brgyad rdo rje lu gu brgyud kyis btags nas klad la
77a3(rnying rgyud): bskor ba 'bar ma brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na me dpung 'bar ba brgyad las mthu lum 'phro ba ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyisu gsal lo// phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni khrag mthung 'bar
77a4(rnying rgyud): ba bzhi/ ging po dgu mo dgu/ zo byed po bcu gsod byed ma bcu ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su gsalo// zhal nyi shu rtsa gcig/ ni srid pa za byed gsang ba'i dur khrod nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsalo// 
77a5(rnying rgyud): spyan 'bar ba drug bcu rtsa bzhi ni he ru ka yab yum drug bcu rtsa bzhir gas lo// dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig ni dus gsuM gyi sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig du gsalo// g.yas kyi dbu bdun
77a6(rnying rgyud): gyi spyi gtsug nas sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa re re 'bar ba/ dbus kyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi dbu re re byung ba'i sku la rin po che'i mchod rten
77a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba bdun du gsal ba/ g.yon gyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la nor bu rin po che bdun du gsal ba/ 'khor lo dang mchod rten dang / rin po che de dag gi lte ba/ 
77a8(rnying rgyud): dang / bum pa dang / rtse mo las rgyas mtshan chen po bcu 'bar ba ni rgya bye'u lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang / gdul bya sha ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / gcan zan gzig gi rgyal mtshan dang / sprul pa rdo rje
77b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang // rin chen sprul nag rgyal mtshan dang // dpa' bo stag gi rgyal mtshan dang // gzi mdangs mi'i rgyal mtshan dang // dmar gsal khrag gi rgyal mtshan dang // rtsal chen seng+ge'i rgyal
77b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang / gtum chen dom gyi rgyal mtshan dang // rgyal mtshan de rnams kyi rtse mo gcig du 'dus te// gser gyi gtsug tor rtog stong 'bar ba'o// de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis zhas
77b3(rnying rgyud): kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad tu yongasu rdzogs par mthong ngo // dbu las byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rgyal mtshan chen po bcu la rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor log
77b4(rnying rgyud): su rdzogs par mthong ngo // dbu'i gtsug tor rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gser gyi rtog gtong ni rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid du gsal bar mthong ngo // de ltar mthong zhing gsal
77b5(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa dang // chos thams cad sku la yongasu rdzogs pa'i don la 'khor thams cad dam zhingango mtshar skyes par gyur to// rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyis sku la yongasu bstod pa/ 
77b6(rnying rgyud): e ma'o chos kun sku la yongasu rdzogs pas chos kyi sku// rdo rje che mchog phyag 'tshal he ru ka/ chos nyid mkha' la skar tshogs rgyas pa'i sku// sku dbyar gyi char sprin gtibs pa lta bu'i gzugs/ 
77b7(rnying rgyud): chu brlabs lta bur brjod pa'i zhal gdangs shing // nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bdal ba bzhin// theg chen dgu dgu 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun// phyag rgya gcig tu bkod nas rdzogs pa'i sku/ sku
77b8(rnying rgyud): gsum lhun grub chos sku tog stong 'bar// dbu skra khams nag ral ba'i gcod pan can// klu rgyal 'bum gyis klubs shing mchod kun 'dul// rdo rje gsung gi ljags sgra brdabs pas kyang // hUM da
78a1(rnying rgyud): phaT gyi sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// theg chen don dam gsang sngags sgrog pa'i tshig/ 'bar ba'i smin ma mun rum glog ltar 'gyur// spyan dmar bzlog pa'i sdang mig
78a2(rnying rgyud): ltar 'bar// 'bar ba'i shangs nas bskal pa'i tshub nag 'khyil// rdo rje thog dang gnam lcags ser chen 'bebs// rno dpal che bzang yag gtsigs pa yis// nyon mongs log lha'i tshogs la ngam
78a3(rnying rgyud): zhing 'khrul// thod rus sha khrag rkang rus 'bu dang rnag/ za byed rngam pa'i zhal du chem chem gsol// sbrul gdug ko rlon la sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan// rngam pa'i sku la shin tu brjid par rgyan// za byed
78a4(rnying rgyud): rngam dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshigs// 'bar ba'i phyag mtsha na sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad// 'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams kun// dpa' bo chen po'i gdan du brjid cing rol/ 
78a5(rnying rgyud): 'gran gyi zla med che btsan gcig pu nyid gsang mchog 'ab bo'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// de skad ces bstod/ pas chos thams cad sku la yongasu rdzogs shing sangs ma rgya
78a6(rnying rgyud): pa med par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de nyid phyag rgya thams cad phyag rgya bkod pa'i pho brang du gyur to// spro ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya'o// de nas
78a7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog gi bdag po chos nyid rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// chos kyi rgyun gyi ting 'dzin 'di gsungaso// na mkha' don gyi
78a8(rnying rgyud): glegs bam la// skar tshogs rigs pa'i yig bris te// 'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas// gsang sngags chos kyi rgyun mi 'chang // chos kyi rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya ba yongasu rdzogs/ 
78b1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang po mchog gi bdag po des bdud rtsi rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsung so// stong gsum pan da'i bzang khong du// srid gsum
78b2(rnying rgyud): sems can dug chen las// dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsa sbyar bas// bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis rdzogs zhes gsung so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mchod pa rgyun gyi
78b3(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsung so// 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yo byad rnams// mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan yin te// srid pa rgya mtsho'i mtha' yas kun// kun bzang mchod pa'i
78b4(rnying rgyud): sprin mchog tu rol zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa da'i rdo rje snying po de bzlas brjod rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la snyom sa par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsung so// 'khor ba chos
78b5(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings nyid las// sems can sangs rgyas snying po shar/ sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa// thams cad bzlas brjod sngags kyi tshig ces gsung so// de nas yang sems dag
78b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje snying po des sbyor ba rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsung so// 'khor ba shes rab yum nyid la// snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis// 'du 'bral med par sbyar bas ni
78b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed cing gsungaso// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sgrol ma rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsung so// 'khor ba
78b8(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/ ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis// rang bzhin med par bsgral nas ni// mnyam nyid chos sku chen por bston zhes gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po/ 
79a1(rnying rgyud): de sku gsung rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces gsung so// 'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la// gzugs khams bang rim khri 'phang brtan ga
79a2(rnying rgyud): med bum rten bum par bcas// gdung chen chos skur rgyun du gnas zhes gsung so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so// nam mkha' me chus rlung rnams// rmang gzhi ri rab rten du snang // 
79a3(rnying rgyud): bang rim ri bdun bcas pa rnams// de nyid bang rim khro 'phang brtan// ri bo bum rten bum par bcas// 'di yang chos sku rgyun mi chad// sems dpa'i rdo rje des yang 'di skad ces gsung so// 'dzugs pa'i yan
79a4(rnying rgyud): lag bzhi rmang rten// 'khor lo tshigs chen khri 'bang brtan/ yan lag dang po bum rten bcas// lcang lo gcod pan phreng bas klubs zhes gsung so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des shis
79a5(rnying rgyud): yongs su slong ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// ro yi sgrub lugs chen po ni// dud khrod chen po'i gnas rnam/ su// ro yi rdzas rnams btsal nas kyang // 'dod pa bsgyur ba'i
79a6(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi gdab// ro yi gnyen por bdag bsams nas// ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad pas bzlas// ro la bkrag dang mdangs byung na// grub par 'gyur ba'i rtags yin te// rgyun mi 'chad par ting 'dzin bya// 
79a7(rnying rgyud): ro ni 'gul bar gyur pa dang // gser 'gyur rtsis ni byug par bya// ro yi yan lag kun bcings nas// sngags ni dag par zlas par bya// ro nyid langs par gyur pa dang // ro yi cho 'phrul ston par byed// 
79a8(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// de che ro yi lce gcod nas// ro la brdabs na gser du 'gyur// de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi// rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur// lce bcad ras gri mtshon
79b1(rnying rgyud): chache des// ro yi ban da bcad pa dang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste// ban da go ru bzung nas ni// lce yi ral gri thog nas ni// lha min g.yul yang bzlog par 'gyur// ro langs grub pa'i rkang mgyo
79b2(rnying rgyud): ni/ dpa' ba'i tshad las 'das pa ste// skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa bzhis// phyogs bzhi dag du kha bltas nas// dus gcig mda' yi rgyang 'phangs nas// mda' ni sa la ma 'babs par/ bzhi ka
79b3(rnying rgyud): bar snang las blangs nas// skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten skor// skyes bu lag tshod ma yal bar// de ma thag tu gan su slebs// ro la 'dod pa kun 'byung zhes// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad ces
79b4(rnying rgyud): gsung so// ro langs bsgrub pa'i ting 'dzin to// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rdo rje na mkha'i them skas zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ngal snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// nam mkha'
79b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer sgoms nas kyang // ting 'dzin red par gyur pa na// ban phun gya gyu'i thabs tshul du// rdo rje skas la bgrod nas ni// nam mkha'i dbyingasu song nas kyang // snang srid 'jig rten khams
79b6(rnying rgyud): la blta// des ni sems yul yangs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rgya mtsho chen po gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'di skad ces
79b7(rnying rgyud): gsung so// rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams par ni// ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang // rgya mtsho chen por bgrod na ni// rgya mtshor gnas pa'i sems can rnams// ting 'dzin rdo rjes bsgral bar bya zhes gsum
79b8(rnying rgyud): so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de thogs med rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// nam mkha' dag gi ling ga la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 
80a1(rnying rgyud): bsgoms te ting 'dzin rtas pa dang // zhing khams kun du bgrod par bya zhes gsung so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la so// 
80a2(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// nam mkha' dag gi ling ga la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bsgoms te ting 'dzin rtas pas dang // mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gsal zhes gsungaste
80a3(rnying rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sred pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// rnal 'byor sdig 'dzub rtse mo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal 'bar// bsgoms
80a4(rnying rgyud): teting 'dzin rtas pa dang // chu rgyun babs te gzhil bar bya zhesagasung so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des stong gi 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
80a5(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor/ las kyi dkyil 'khor du// stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa dang // ting 'dzin
80a6(rnying rgyud): rtsal can rab sbyang phyir// nam mkha'i khamasu 'phangs nas ni// sa nas sa ru spar bar bya// de skad ces gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
80a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso// rnal 'byor sdig pa'i 'dzub mo la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba las// 'od zer 'bar ba 'bum 'phros pas// 'od zer de dag/ 
80a8(rnying rgyud): re re las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'phros pas// des ni mun pa thams cad sel zhes gsung so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de 'byung ba chen po bskal pa'i chu rgyun zhes bya ba'i
80b1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// rnal 'byor lag pa'i 'khor lo las// chu zla'i snying por rab shar ste// bdud rtsi chu bo'i rgyun babs pas// sreg pa'i bskal pa'i mechen
80b2(rnying rgyud): bsod ces gsung so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de sku'i phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'od skad ces gsung so// rin chen 'bar ba'i lang ga la// sangs
80b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas ye shes dpal gyi sku// rin chen 'bar ba'i ngos brgyad la// rig pa'i ma mo dpal 'bar ba// brgyad du gsal bar gyur pa dang // ye shes rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs zhes gsung so// de nas
80b4(rnying rgyud): yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des gsung gi phyag rgya 'bar bzhi das bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// pad+ma 'bar ba'i ling ga la// rin chen 'bar ba'i
80b5(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru brgyad// shin tu 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du ba// gsung gi cu ba'i phyag rgya yin zhes gsung so// de nas yang sems dpa/ 'i rdo rje de thugs kyi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
80b6(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ling ka la// yi ge hUM gi 'bru yis bskor// mtha' ma rin chen yig 'bru brgyad// kha dog mthing kas bskor ba ni// thugs kyi gas
80b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i ye shes yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des ting 'dzin gyi mdo 'di gsungs so// sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te// ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang // mdo bzhin snang bar
80b8(rnying rgyud): ma gyur kyang // sems nyid brtags pa de ltar 'gyur// gdos bcas dmigs bus mi mthong yang // mngon shes yid gzugs can gyis mthong // gang ltar brtags par yun brtags na// rtog
81a1(rnying rgyud): rtas pa'i 'bras bu ni// mngon sum gsal bar red par 'gyur// dge dang mi dge'i bag chags dang // yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin rnams// bag chags/ 
81a2(rnying rgyud): rtas pa kho nar zad// de bas ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso zhes gsungaso// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / 
81a3(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des gsang sbyor chen po sgrub pa 'di gsung so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor rnams// shin du gsang ba'i sgrub pa 'di/ bde gshegs rgyal ba'i gshegs shul
81a4(rnying rgyud): te// 'jig rten gang zag lam yang yin// ma rtog pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs 8// log pa'i lam bzhi mtha' bsal nas// bde gshegs rgyal
81a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam la 'jug/ des na sgrub pa'i lam mchog 'di// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya// shin tu gus pas mnyan par gyis// de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis
81a6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po bdag cag rnams la gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/ bka' gsang ba chen po ye shes rmad byung ba
81a7(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i shul yang dag pa'i don bdag cag rnams la bsha du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de btsun mo'i tshogs la dgyes par 'jug pa zhes bya
81a8(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso// b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad+ma ni// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i pho brang ste// sngon 'das rgyal ba brnal ba'i dbyings// da ltar bzhugs pa gnas pa'i
81b1(rnying rgyud): rten// slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul// rgyal ba rnams la de ltar snang // de ltar ma shes 'khor ba'i lam// rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis// yul gyi mchog ni 'dir bzung ba// mtshan ldan
81b2(rnying rgyud): bkra shis gsang ba'i yum// smin dkyus ring la lag sror phra// tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad// kha nas ut+pal ngad ldan zhing // yid 'ong mtshan ldan na skabs phyed// skra 'jam mthon ting lhung lor 'khril se/ 
81b3(rnying rgyud): dkar tshags dam smin dkyus ring // zar ma'i me tog rgyal 'dra'i spyan// dpral ba'i dbyes che skra mtshams 'khyug/ sna bzang mdog gsal pad+ma'i rigs// lus drang ske ring sems ma'i tshul// nu ma'i dkyil 'khor zla
81b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas 'dra// sha dkar chags dam 'khril bag can// khong ngal 'gro/ na gom pa 'jam// skad ni ngang la gzhen sgrogs// ci yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshwa ldan// skyes bu bla mas yum du gzung // gzungs su byin gyis
81b5(rnying rgyud): brlabs pa ni// de yi gzugs kyi phung po la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'phro 'du gsal bar/ gyur pa de// rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs
81b6(rnying rgyud): yum lnga'i sku mdog gsal// rdo rje thabs la'ang de bzhin te// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // yul gyi mkha' la me yis bsgom// gsang ba dbus kyi zla gam la/ 
81b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi spro sdu bya// gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin// chags pa'i mkha' la de bzhin no// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa/ rig pa rang sna mnyam pa'o
81b8(rnying rgyud): mkha' dbyings rnam dag bde chen glong // mi gnas bde ba chen po'i lung // rig pa thabs kyi rang bzhin las// byin brlabs rang dbang ngang gis gsal// bzhin mdog mang ba sogs ka la
82a1(rnying rgyud): dpral ba'i dbyes tshe smin dkyus ring // mig gi mdangs gsal dkyus su ring // dung chen thags dam shel mdog chags// bzhin gyi bzangs ring kos sko phra/ 
82a2(rnying rgyud): lus la zhim pa'i dri ldang zhing // kha nas ga pur ngad ldang ba// nu ma'i dkyil mtho nu mar 'khyil// pad+ma can zhes bya bar grags// dung can ma zhes bstan pa ni// dkar mo zla ba'i mdang su gsal/ 
82a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin lus dung ltar g.yas su g.yo// gtsug bud mthon ting g.yas su 'khyil// skad che gdangs snyan tshig du gsal// bong chung lus ni mdzes par snang // bu mo mig rings zhes bya ba// shes
82a4(rnying rgyud): rab gsal zhing 'dod pa che// gtso bo nges pa'i brtul zhugs can// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung kar lci/ rnam par bajig cing 'khyil pas ni// kun gyis drod ni yong mi
82a5(rnying rgyud): lon/ gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs la mkhas// phyi nang rlung kar gser ltar lci// rtog pa med cing don la gzho la// bzhin ni gru bzhi'i dbyibs ldan la// mig ring phra
82a6(rnying rgyud): bshad 'khyil bag chags// dkar dmar mdzes pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan// ljon pa dag gi rigs smos pa// sdong po yal ga mang po'i dkyil// shin du 'dab rgyas yal gar legs/ 
82a7(rnying rgyud): mthon 'thing sgra yi rang bzhin ni// byang chub sems 'drar lcang lor bshad// sted smad kun tu bral legs// srid du ring zhing ldem dag can lcug phran zhes bya'i mtshan ma ni// bcu gnyis
82a8(rnying rgyud): shu rtsa lnga pa// rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phrog cing // mu la rag tar ldan pa la// phra zhing bshad la gzangs su ring // ban glang ser mo gru bzhi la// kham la mig 'bur smin tshegs che/ 
82b1(rnying rgyud): skra kham ma la so che zhing // sna ring 'gram skyongs ring ba yin// ri mo can gyi bud med ni// nag mo gri gsum rtsing mgo ma// khro gnyer can la gel bag chags// sdong gcig yan lag
82b2(rnying rgyud): gtan med pa'o// skye ba'i rgyu med bkra mi shos// mi reg yal ga mes tshig yin// spyir ni de ltar bstan mod kyang // gang dag dang ldan brtul zhugs can// yid du 'di dang ma 'ong rnams// 
82b3(rnying rgyud): dad nga chags shing lus 'bul na// thugs rje'i yul bas kun snyoms bya// rnam rtog spong len gang byed pa// de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas// rmad du gsang ba'i mchod pa la// gsang ba'i phyag
82b4(rnying rgyud): chang gang byed pa// las kyi sgrib pa kun bsal te/ dman ngag gsang ba'i dmigs bu 'thob// de ltar brtagadas pa'i yum de la// dri spos tsan dan la sogs pas/ 
82b5(rnying rgyud): a ka ru dang sbyar ba'i chu// khrus kyi tshogs dag par bya/ dri zhim la sogs sna tshogs kyis// lus la byug pa sna tshogs bya// de nas nang gi khrus chen yang // shin tu dag
82b6(rnying rgyud): bya ba ni// rdzas kyi chu dang rdzas sbyar bas// nang gi rdzas rnams dag par bya// bur shing snying po la sogs pa// ro yi mchog tu gyur pa kun// rtsi 'am bcud dang sbyar nas kyang // nang gi rdzas rnams sbyar
82b7(rnying rgyud): bar bya// rdzas kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs phyir// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi don// rgya cher shin du bshad par bya// phung po
82b8(rnying rgyud): sgyu mar snang bas na// sems la rang bzhin med par nges// snang srid na mkhar gcig pas na// 'khor ba sgyu ma yin par nges// kun gzhi chos kyi mdzod yin pas// sangs rgyas gzhan/ 
83a1(rnying rgyud): na med par nges// byams la dang ma chags pas na// sdang la sems mi 'khrug par nges// gnas la nges pa med pas na// sa rnams bgrod pa med par nges// sems la skye shi
83a2(rnying rgyud): med pas na// 'pho 'gyur dag la nyam ming // des na thams cad sgyu mar snang // sgyu ma rang bzhin med shes pas// thams cad chos nyid snying po yin// mtshan ma rtog pa'i dri ma dag/ chos nyid chu bo des bkrus
83a3(rnying rgyud): na// 'dzin pa'i dri ma dag par 'gyur// de nas rgyan gyi cho ga ni// rdzas kyi yo byad yin pas na// rlob cing 'phur ba'i chas gos dang // rin chen phrog dang rna char bcas// 'jol sgeg mgul rgyan la sogs pa
83a4(rnying rgyud): dpung rgyan do shal se mo do// nor bu rin chen la sogs brgyan// / rkang gdub lag gdub la sogs pa// gser dang dngul dal sogs pas brgyan// rol mo sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dani
83a5(rnying rgyud): mchod rdzas sna tshogs thogs par bya// de nas 'dran pa'i cho ga ni// gsang ba'i tshig gis bsre ba na// rdo rje lce yi dam tshig gis// tshig gi brdas ni mtshon par bya// sa ma ya/ 
83a6(rnying rgyud): ho zhes brjod na// sa ma ya snyom zhes kyang bsre// ra ga ya mi zhes brjod na// ra ho taM zhes brjod par bya// ti pa su ki zhes brjod na// gan de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon// a ti pu ho zhes brjod na// pra ti pu
83a7(rnying rgyud): ho zhes pas mtshon// g.yas kyi smin ma bskyod byas na// g.yon gyi smin mas mtshon par bya// na sa g.yas kyi mtshon byas na// de bzhin na sa g.yon gyis mtshon// btsug tor gtsug du mtshon byas na// 
83a8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin dpal be'u'i ling gar mtshon// rdo rje ling ga 'od 'phron// pad+ma ze 'bru 'bar 'phro 'khyil// zhes pa'i tshig gi don rnams bsre// bskul ba'i cho ga khyad par yang // don gyis 'di ltar bskul bar rigs/ 
83b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od la bskul// bskul ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang // mchod pa'i yo byad dbul bar bya// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nga du
83b2(rnying rgyud): gsal bar gyur to// shes rab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsol bar gyur to// de nas nyi ma'i zer gyis 'di skad ces bskul to// mo g.yo mchog gi rgyal po dgongasu gsol// rnam par mi rtog shin tu
83b3(rnying rgyud): dri med sku// 'od zer mdangs ldan zla ba rgyas 'dra'i zhal// dgyes pha rol pa'i don la bzhengasu gsol// de skad ces bskul ba dang // zla ba'i 'od zer las 'di skad ces bsku lo// yid 'ong 'byor ldan rgyal ba rgya
83b4(rnying rgyud): mtshe'i dbyings// shes rab zab mo'i rnam dag pad+ma'i mdangs// / sgyu 'phrul rabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma// yid da'ong 'byor ldan cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan// zhes gsungs so// 
83b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yo byad kyi tshogs thams cad shin du 'bul ba zhes bya ba'i cho 'phrul byung ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer las sgra byung ba/ pad+ma'i ze 'bru 'bar ba 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul
83b6(rnying rgyud): lags na// dgyes pa'i rdo rje cho 'phrul las// byang chub char sprin dbab du gsol// zla ba'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba/ e ma yid kyi dga' 'ad mo// gdung ba'i snying phreng shes rab gzungs// 
83b7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i ga'u 'khyil pa la// bde ba'i rdo rje byang chub 'bar zhes sgra byung bas// phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'khor ba thams cad thugs rjes
83b8(rnying rgyud): yongasu gzungs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thabs mchog zla ba zhes bya ba'i las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung ngo // 'dod pa'i dbang po thams cad ni// chags pa'i 'gying ba'i gtso mo yin
84a1(rnying rgyud): gachags pa'i rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// 'dod pa gnasu drang bar bya zhes gyur pas// 'khor ba thams cad thugs rje chen po'i lhung bzed kyis bzung // de nas sems dpa'
84a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje de sgrib pa sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ling ga la// a yi ye shes 'od 'bros pas// chags pa'i sgrib pa'i bud shing
84a3(rnying rgyud): rnams// me yi ye shes kyis dbyingaso// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje des// b+ha ga byin gyis rlob pa la snyoms par zhugs nas gsungs pa/ 'khor bar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// b+ha ga'i snying po
84a4(rnying rgyud): rab gsal ba// yum gyi lus kyi yan lag rnams// yum lha'i rang bzhin nyid du gsal// zhes gsungaso// de nas sems da pa'i rdo rje snying po des chags pa thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba
84a5(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso// chos nyid na mkhar rtogs gyur na// sbyor sgrol mang po rtsa byas kyang // chags sdang drang ba'i thabs yin te// rdul cha tsan
84a6(rnying rgyud): yang snang ba med ces gsung so// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad la dgyes pa'i rol pa la zhugs par gyur te/ mi dmigs pa'i bde ba la ci yang mi g.yo bar gyur to// 
84a7(rnying rgyud): de nas byang chub sems kyi char chen po pad+ma'i snying po rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par gyur to// 'khor ba thams cad ni rgyal ba'i sras por bskyed// rgyal ba 'gog pa pa ni byang chub sems kyis brlan par mdzad
84a8(rnying rgyud): cing srid pa'i myu gu mngon par bskyed/ rma du byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ling long phyed par byung // rigs 'dzin gyi sems dpa' thams cad ni shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs nas
84b1(rnying rgyud): chos kyi sku'i nang du brlan par gyur to// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'gro ba thams cad la dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// 'khor ba'i
84b2(rnying rgyud): sems can rgyu las byung // 'khor ba'i sems can rgyun chad na// sangs rgyas rgyun yang 'chad par 'gyur// 'khor ba chos nyid rang bzhin du// shes nas smra bar gang byed pa// rig pa'i yis rang dbang de// 
84b3(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i sras zhes gsung so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des chos thams cad grub pa smon lam gyi sgo nas 'jug par mkhyen nas smon gnas chen po'i lam 'di gsung so// 'gro drug
84b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po 'di// ma rtogs log pa'i 'khyams pa rnams nga // rgyal ba'i srasu bskyed nas ni// 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams gca da par bya// nyi zla'i nang du bzhag nas ni// bcu drug sa la rdzogs par
84b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// des na rigs ldan mtshan bzang la// don dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa yis// sbyor ba'i yan lag kun rdzogs nas// / yum gyi mkha' dbyings zla gam la// grub pa'i gzhal yas
84b6(rnying rgyud): du skyes/ rtsibs brgyad zla gam dgur gsal la// byang chub sems las phyag rgya'i tshogs// lha dgu gsal ba'i ye shes skyed// des ni thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur zhes gsungaso// rgyud kyi rgyal po
84b7(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rje bkod pa'i kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las/ gsang sbyor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mi 'gyur ba gtan 'pho ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting na
84b8(rnying rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin gang zhig rnams// mi 'pho bar ni gnas 'dod pa// lo gcig gam ni zla gcig gam// de bzhin zhag gi rnam grangs kyang // 
85a1(rnying rgyud): bco lnga 'am yang na bdun par du// tho rangs thun tha'i dang po'i tshe// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po// shar gyi phyogasu kha bltas te// shar phyogs na mkhas bsdus pa yi// 
85a2(rnying rgyud): lha klu gnod sbyin 'jig rten bcas// thams cad khong du bsdus nas kyang // dbugs de slar la mi dbyung bar// rang gi khong du bstim par bya// ba mar sna yi nang du sri// de ltar mang por bsgrubs pa dang // 
85a3(rnying rgyud): dpal che gzi brjid thams cad 'thob ces gsungs so// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gang zhig rten la
85a4(rnying rgyud): gnas 'dod pa// mtshan ma bzang po'i gnas mchog tu// tha ma sa cad 'byor par byas nas ni// sa las byas pa'i steg bu ba sha ram// dbus kyi pad+ma mdab brgyad la// zla gam dmar po sgo bzhin
85a5(rnying rgyud): ldan// mtha' ma rdo rje ra bas bskor// dpal ldan tshe'i phyag rgya dgod// rin chen lugs kyi bum pa la// tshe rdzas rgyas par byas nas ni// mtshan ldan snod kyis kha dog pa bya// rdo rje
85a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs kyis brtags nas ni// tshe tshad med par mnga' gsol la// dbus su de bzhin bzhag par bya// rin chen bum pa bzhi rnams la// gsang ba'i bu mo bzhi bkod gzhag/ ya mtshan byung ba'i bu
85a7(rnying rgyud): pa la// rigs bzhi sangs rgyas yab yun dang // so so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams// thabs dang shes rab sdebs nas ni// phyogs phyogs gnas su tshum bur bri// sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi rnams
85a8(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ sems kyi phyag rgya kun bkod nas// nyi zla ga 'ur A yu ni// 'khyil 'bar 'tsher zhing gsal bar bya// A yu byang chub sems su zhu// rgyal mtshan mchog ldan rin chen gter// dngang
85b1(rnying rgyud): skur dpal ldan mdzod ldan ma// gsang ba'i bu me che gter 'dzin// A yu yum bzhi'i thugs kar 'phros// de bzhin tshum bu rim par brgyud// rdo rje tshe mchog kun bsdus nas// dkar dmar 'od
85b2(rnying rgyud): kyis bdag la bstim// de nas rdo rje tshe 'phreng bzlas// nub phyogs tshe yi dbyings mchog gis// pad+ma dbang gi zhing khamasu// byams ldan ye shes tshe dpag med// thugs kyi dpal be'u chen po ni// 
85b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis gsal 'od kyi ga'u na// byang chub sems kyi A yu 'bar// dmar gsal 'bar ba'i tshe mchog de// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor rnams la 'phro// 'phros pa dgu lung dam pa yis// rtsi ta'i ra
85b4(rnying rgyud): la bkrag du bslan// tshe nyams rgyu drug kun spangs nas// gzi byin skye ba'i rgyu lnga bsgom// byang chub sems kyi A yu de/ skye med dbyingasu sbas nas kyang // phyag rgya'i tha mar bdun gyis
85b5(rnying rgyud): bshad// dang po sku gsung thugs kyi rgyu// gnyis pa gnon pa 'i rgya gram 'bar// gsum parta mchog dpal gyi rgya// ba ni po rin chen dpal be'u ste// lnga pa gser gyi 'gu h+ya'o// drug
85b6(rnying rgyud): pazla gam dmar po la// bdun pa nyi zla ga 'ur 'bar// tshem ngo bo rgyud gsum po// srog gi ngo bor gzhal yas khang // leb rgan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du// A yu dmar po 'od 'phro ba
85b7(rnying rgyud): 'chi ba med pa'i srog btsugs te// 'gyur ba med pa'i g.yung drung yin// chos nyid dbyingasu tshe sbas pas// dus gsum rgyal ba dgrar langs kyang // de la gzung zhing bstan du med// de nas kyi
85b8(rnying rgyud): spyad par bya// rdo rje tshe sgrub pa'o// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de rdo rje khro bo che kun du 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// gnas 'gyur
86a1(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal 'bar byas la// ye shes khro bo 'bar ba yi// thugs kyi dpal be'u'i 'od zer las// dbang gi lha mo mang po 'phros// za ma tog dang bcas pa yi// lcags
86a2(rnying rgyud): kyu dkar dmar lag na thogs// de yi 'gro drug thams cad kyi// tshe dang gzi byin thams cad phrogs// za ma tog tu bsdus nas kyang // tshe yi rigs 'dzin rnams la bstim// ji ltar 'dod pa gong
86a3(rnying rgyud): ltar sbyar/ rdo rje gzi mdangs 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas
86a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// // snyoms par zhugs nas dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi dkyil
86a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor zhes bya ba 'di rgya cher bshad do// dkyil 'khor dkyi 'khor thams cad kyi// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa' de// 'khor ba thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor can la
86a6(rnying rgyud): bcad par bya// nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs// sgrub pa'i gnas mchog dam pa dag/ skyon yon gnyis kyi bye brag las// nges par brtags te shes pa las// blang dor gnyisu sbyar bar bya// ri bo
86a7(rnying rgyud): chen po 'dus pa'i rtse// gangs dkar shes kyi 'dab chen ni// seng 'phrug 'khra ba'i gnas yin te// thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gnas// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i dkyil// dgon pa chen po'i
86a8(rnying rgyud): phug chen ni// gcan chen 'khra ba'i gnas yin te// mngon spyod chen po bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod ngam grog bshung ba'i gnas// sum mdo grog gle rtsub pa'i ri// dur gcan 'khra ba'i gnas
86b1(rnying rgyud): yin te// chags pa bsgrub pa'i gnas yin no// nags tshal dra bas gtibs pa'i nang // shin tu btsan zhing 'jigs pa'i ngogs// stag gzig 'khra ba'i gnas yin te// 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i gan
86b2(rnying rgyud): su shis// chu mdo chu 'jigs rgya mtsho'i gling // chu yi rabs kun bskor ba// chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin pas// bya ba med pa'i las la bya'o// der ni yo byad phun sum tshogs// ci 'dod bltas
86b3(rnying rgyud): te ma thogs par// kha na ma tho bcas dang bral// 'byor pas nan tan mchog bskyed pa// khams las gyur pa'i nad chen rnams// bcud kyi mchog gis zlog bya'i phyir// rtsi 'am bcud ngam thar pa
86b4(rnying rgyud): rnams// nyer rdzogs su ni gzhag par bya// 'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad// dug las gyur pa'i nad rnams kyis// rkyen dgyes bar chad 'byung srid phyir// sman dang mkhas pas bcas
86b5(rnying rgyud): te sbyar// ka pA la dang lcang lor bcas// ga'u chung la sogs pa'i rdzas// phyag rgya che dang ldan byas la// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten du bya// sgrub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ skyo
86b6(rnying rgyud): yid rnams gsang phyir dang // gti mug mun pa gzhom pa'i phyir// dung dang khar rnga rdza rnga dang // cang te'u pi wang ko ki la// snyan par rdzogs pa'i rdzas rnams kun// sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rol mo ste// nyer rdzogs
86b7(rnying rgyud): su ni 'byor par bya// shin tu gtams pas tshogs chen ni// bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal// gsang ba sbyor ba'i dus chen du// grub chen sgrub pa'i rnam 'byor rnams// snying rje byams dang dga' snyoms dang // 
86b8(rnying rgyud): gdung ba'i byang chub sems bskyed do// de yang shes dang shes bya yi// rtsal chen kun tu rdzogs pa ni// rdo rje snying po 'bru mchog dag/ shin tu gtams pas tshogs pa ni// bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal yon
87a1(rnying rgyud): tan mchog gi gter gyur cing // srid pas zhus kyang zad mi shes// rkyen thub dbang lung rdzogs par gzung // rdo rje kun gyi gzugs 'dzin pa// kung sdud kun 'byung
87a2(rnying rgyud): 'khrug med cing // nam mkha'i khyon ltar kun la khyab// ma ltar byams pa'i yum mchog gzung // rgyud sbyangs brtul zhugs mchog 'chang zhing // thogs med the tshom som nyi bral// 'dzin chags
87a3(rnying rgyud): med cing blang dor med// brtan ldan gzungs thub rdo rje ging // rdo rje drod kyi dus 'dzin cing // tshig gi 'phen sdud skabasu sbyor// yon tan rlabs kyis 'phang bcad// legs nyes dmigasug la
87a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzugs so// rdo rje tshig gi gdangs skad can// rdo rje mthong ba rnam par dag/ ngag gi dbang phyug tshig la mkhas// las da kyi phreng ba rdzogs byed pa// 'di ltar sbyar ba'i dus chen yang // nges
87a5(rnying rgyud): par brtags te mdo gzung ba// rigs byed dag gi yan lag las// shes par bya ste legs sbyar ba// bkra shes lha yi nyi mo dang // 'byor dang dus tshigs bzang po rnams// 
87a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten mtshan ma'i rtog pa ste// rtag na bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung // dus cha bzhi yi dang po ni// mchog nyid mngon spyod ro langs yin// dbyar tshe ston sman shis pa ste// zhi dang rgyas pa de bzhin/ 
87a7(rnying rgyud): sbyar// dbang du bsdus pa'ang dbang yin te// bam chen gsang ba'i dus su bshad// nor 'dod rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang // cha bzhir khyab par sbyar bya'o// bsgrub pa chen po'i rdzas mchog dag
87a8(rnying rgyud): gal te dus la bab gyur na// dus 'di dngos grub dus chen te// dus 'di mkhas pas yong mi bcag/ rnal 'byor las kyi dang po rnams// ci ste 'dod pa'i mtshan ma dag/ yid 'ong 'byung zhing
87b1(rnying rgyud): rtags rnyed pa// dam tshig gzungs 'du dus chen yin// sbyangs pas rtsal gyis mthar phyin cing // shes blo'i yon+dan tshogs rgyas pa// 'di dag chad la bab pa ste// dus kyi mchog 'di nye bar brtag
87b2(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar rgyu bzhi 'byor pa las// 'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa ste// gru dang mnyan pa mkhas pa la// brten pas rin chen lon pa 'dra// ji srid gnas pa'i rgya mtsho rnams// rang bzhin med par kun
87b3(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// bdag med phyogs bral lhun gyis grub// gcig las rnam grangs ngang gis med// tha snyad dag par yongs chud na// nges pa'i don chen de nyid de// thams cad dag par 'gyur ba'o// bdag
87b4(rnying rgyud): dang gzhan du mi gnyis pas// bdag nyid bdag gi rang ba bzhin te// sangs rgyas zhes bya gzhan na med// bdag nyid lhun grub dbang phyug che// gang 'dod pa yi dngos po dag/ ji lta ba
87b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin grub 'gyur te// rdza mkhan 'phang lo srub pa ltar// / gang ltar dmigs pa de ltar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i kham/ sa su gzi che zhing // 'byung chen lnga la dbang bsgyur ba'i// ngo mtshar
87b6(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyi khyad par dag/ gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin// de ltar brtson pa'i bsgrub pa dag/ rdzas dang yo byad la sogs te// shes dang yon+tan phun sum tshogs// gzhan du reg las med pa ni/ 
87b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad tshang bar rdzogs pas na// phun sum tshogs shes de la bya// gsang chen sgrub pa'i las 'di dag/ 'khor ba'i las dang 'thun spyad cing // nyon mongs lnga ltar spyod snang yang // 'od kyi
87b8(rnying rgyud): mun pa snang 'gyur ltar// skyon ni yon tan chen po la// g.yo mtshang dngos grub chen por 'gyur// de ltar 'khor ba'i rga bzlog pas// mi gnas ye shes rgya mtshor 'khyil// gnas rab brtag/ 
88a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gal chen yang // nam mkha' 'khor lo rdo rje dang // rin chen zur brgyad pad+ma'i dbyings// rgya gra mo la sogs 'dra bar brtag/ sa gzhi yang ni de bzhin te// ri bo brtsegs/ 
88a2(rnying rgyud): dang bzur ba dang // de bzhin bsgreng dang gtams pa'i tshul// 'dra bar mkhas pas brtag par bya// de yang rigs kyi khyad par ni// lnga la sogs pa so so yi// gnas gnas dag tu rtogs nas ni// nor bu
88a3(rnying rgyud): rin chen de bsgrub bya// skyon gyi gnas dag spang ba ni// gshin rje gdug pa'i gdung rtse dang // ma mo rngam pa'i sbar shad dang // srin mo ngus pa'i mchi rjes dang // gnod sbyin khro bo'i rbab shul dang / 'byung
88a4(rnying rgyud): po kun gyi 'jil la sogs// gnas kyi skyon rnams dgra dang kun// mkhas pas nges par spang bar bya// kha na ma thor bcas pa dang // nyams pa las byung nyon dang bral// ma dag pa yi yo
88a5(rnying rgyud): byad rnams// gdug can spang du 'ongs pa ltar// wa yi brtul zhugs chen po yi// bskal pas bshugs te spang bar bya// / mgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// bkra shis mtshan
88a6(rnying rgyud): ma 'byung ba dag/ dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba yi// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir// snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsgrub pa brnag pa mthar dbyung phyir// rgyal po/ 
88a7(rnying rgyud): rten dang 'khor bcas la// bden pas bsgo ba 'am yang slang ba// dgongs shig thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha// lha klu gnod sbyin sde dpung bcas// gangs ri rtsi dang rin chen ri// kun dga' ldum ra bskye
88a8(rnying rgyud): mtshal// mtsho rdzing lu ma 'bab chu'i gnas// 'jig rten 'jig rten thams cad kyi// gang dag bdag por gyur pa rnams// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag nyid kyis// sa 'di lhun gyis grub bya'i phyir/ 'jun
88b1(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i sa slong na// 'khor dang bcas pa 'dir 'khor la// rin chen gter gyi sa gni bsrang // zhes pas rin chen sna tshogs kyis// sa la gnas pas de mgu bya// des ni bdag gis de 'gyur zhing // 
88b2(rnying rgyud): nyes pa de dang bral ba yin// byang chub spyod pa g.yo ba dang // bsod nams dga' ba skyed pa la// shes ldan rdzu 'phrul can gyi bu// ma skrag phra dog yong ma skye// rnal 'byor mchog gi bsgrub pa po// 
88b3(rnying rgyud): bdud 'dul phyag rgya rdzogs pa'i tshe// ru dra tshogs kyi rgol ba la// skyes bu las kyi don bgrangs te// don gyi dbang po'i phyir sbran pa// rgyal ba dbang phyug thams cad kyis// don mchog yang da// 
88b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i tshe// skyes bu rtsal gyi khyad par las// 'di tshe dbang ma nga khyen dmigs 'byed ma// sngon tshe dpal chen gar dbang gis // ru dra sde bzhi bsgral nas ni// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyas
88b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad nas// 'gro drug thugs rjes bsgral ba ltar// rnal 'byor sa la sbyor tshe 'dir// lha mos mkhyen par mdzad nas kyang // bde chen sa la bgrod pa'i tshe// ru dra'i rgol ba 'byung
88b6(rnying rgyud): ba'am// spyan ldan khyod kyis dbang mdzod cig/ sgrub pa'i las mchog khyad par gyis// brtsam par bya ba'i las rnams kun// mtshan mas mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// ro lnga'i mtshan ma brtag par bya// 
88b7(rnying rgyud): dge bar gyur na der gnas bya// gal te shis par ma gyur na// skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa yis// gnan nam spo ba'i las kyis sbyar// der ni bsod nams gter ldan phyir// rin chen lnga la sogs
88b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas// sa gzhi gter chen rgyas par bya// bkra shis mchog tu bsngags pa yin// sa zhag spos chen rnam lnga'i bu// bsres pas kun tu gru bzhi ni// maN+Dal rgyas pa'i dbyibs 'dral// ting
89a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin phyag rgya sngags ldan pas// mtshan ma'i dngos po kun sbyangs te// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i rten du bya// rdo rje byin rlabs 'byung gnas dang // gnas rnams shin/ 
89a2(rnying rgyud): tu brtan bya'i phyir// mchog gi sbyor ba dag pa yis// sa gzhi gzung zhing byin gyis brlabs// de dang der ni sa sbyangs te// thig gis yul bcad skabs dag du// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang/ 
89a3(rnying rgyud): der// rdo rje drag po'i gang chen gyis// lce bog nag po'i dud pas bdug/ rgyun mi 'chad du byas nas ni// khro bo drag po'i sngags zlos shing // rdo rje khro bo'i stabs kyis bskor// shes rab yul rgyu
89a4(rnying rgyud): 'jo tshul gyi// rnam gnyis rdzas kyi 'degu dag/ srin bal ye'u sbyar ba yis// kun tu zla ba'i thig le bya// rdo rjedal po 'phags rnams kyis// so so'i sngags dang rtsa ba'i
89a5(rnying rgyud): rgya// so so'i stang stabs sbyar nas kyang // de dag gnasu byin gyi sa rlob// gsang ba'i don la zhugs bya'i phyir// gsang / ba'i las kyi sngon logasu// bstan pa skyong ba'i mgon po la
89a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin mchod bsrung ba'i las chen bcol// gzhal yas gnas kyi phyi rol du// mgon po gnas pa'i rten gzhi dag/ rin chen 'bras sam 'byung khungs sam// shing ngam pa so de dag las// lugs
89a7(rnying rgyud): sam phyag rgya'i gzugs byas te// mgon po bzhi ru mnga' gsol te// gnas kyi sgo srang so bar bya// ri rab gling bzhi'i phyogs phyogs nas// rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gi mthus// 'jig rten skyong
89a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i tha tshig can// mthu chen mgon po sde bzhi rnams// so so'i bgegs ris 'dul la mkhas// chos skyong longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'phrin las rnam bzhi mthar phyin pas// rigs bzhi kha/ 
89b1(rnying rgyud): dog so sor gsal// rang rtags lha'i mtshan ma thogs// phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rdzu 'phrul can// bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal sbyong gis// rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod// bsgrub pa'i rtsal/ 
89b2(rnying rgyud): 'di mthar dbyung zhing // rkyen gyi bar chad gsal ba dang // gsang ba'i man ngag spyad pa'i phyir// 'jug srid dam sri gnan par bya// dur khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i gnas
89b3(rnying rgyud): dag tu// dngos grub chu la rdul 'jug cing // khro bo hUM chen kun 'dus nas// gsad cing gnan pa'i las bya ste// ri rab chen po'i rmang du gtang // ya ma ra dza'i zasu sbyin// chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdad
89b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas gnan// bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag gyur nas// nams kyang ldang bar mi nus te// / byang chub sems ni skyes na btang // badz+ra mu sti bam/ ma ma
89b5(rnying rgyud): ba sha ma ku ru nan// sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni// de ltar drag po'i sgra ra ba yis// sgo nas phyi rol par khang du// mkha' 'dra'i khung bu byas nas ni// dug dang rtsub pa'i phye ma dang // khrag sna
89b6(rnying rgyud): tshegs dang mi ro yis// shin tu bsrub cing gnan par bya// de nas rdo rje nang dag du// seng+ge'i lta bas bltas nas ni// rdo rje gom pas phyogs nas ni// khro mig 'bar bas phyir bltas te// 'gying bag tshul
89b7(rnying rgyud): du brjid pa yis// 'bar ba'i rdo rje spar nas ni// phyi nang rdul chen gsal bar bya// hUM stong gsum stong gyi 'jig rten na// skye 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal dang // yod mthong snang grags ji snyed pa// kun kyang
89b8(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba khrag mthung ste// rngam chen gtum thung she dag 'bar// dur khrod dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rak+Sha yak+Sha he ru ka/ rak+Sha kro d+hi dz+wa la kha// ha la ha la tiSh+Tha phaT// zhes pas khro bo rol pa yi/ sta
90a1(rnying rgyud): dang mamo'i rngam tshul dang // phra men lpags pa'i rngam stabs kyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// rdo rje dkrigs pa'i phreng ba dang // tho ba lcags kyu 'bar ba dang // 'khor/ 
90a2(rnying rgyud): ral gri la sogs rdzas// kun gyi phyag rgya mtshan mas bskor// de las 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang // mig las 'bar ba'i me mched pas// me 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dis// dmigs sam dngos sgyur nas
90a3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba drag po'i yi ge las// sreg pa'i dpal chen gur du gtams// hUM raM rdo rje me yi ri// lhun po 'bar ba'i rtse brgyad la// 'bar ba'i lnga brgyad bsgyel nas kyang // dbang chen rdo rje bka' snod
90a4(rnying rgyud): gnas// shin tu mi bzang 'bar ba yis// gtum chen ha la darngam pa'i gzugs// lha chen khyab 'jug pag bshus nas // zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i na bza' bsnams// gshin rje ma drang
90a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba yi// ro dbyug chen po phyag na 'phyar// 'phra men dgu khri mang po dag/ 'bar ba'i tshogs ni gtibs thag bcad / gang la cis 'dul der ston pa'i// tsi ta 'bar ba'i me phreng
90a6(rnying rgyud): gis/ do shal mgur chu phreng bas sbrengs// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong // srid pa'i rtse mor 'khyil cing 'phro// na mkha'i khams kun me dpung gtibs// rdo rje 'khor lo me lce 'phro// dur khrod
90a7(rnying rgyud): dgon pa'i sa phyogs dag/ me yi ri bo 'bar ba la// me yi yi dgas ma dag las// gang yang gnas par mi phod pa// steng gi me lce 'bar ba ni// 'og gi phyogasu 'phro zhing 'khrug/ 'og gi me lce 'ag
90a8(rnying rgyud): ba yang // gyen du 'khyil zhing steng du thal// me lce dgu phreng 'bar ba dag/ 'ur che ma 'chad pas 'thab cing 'khrug/ dur khrod me ni smug cing 'bar// zhe sdang 'joms pas mthing nag 'tshub// nga rgyal sreg
90b1(rnying rgyud): pas ser nag 'phro// 'dod chags bsnams pas dmar nag 'phro// phra dog sregs pas ljang nag 'khyil// gti mug sel bas smug nag 'khyil// 'bar chen klong gi 'khor los gtam dz+wal
90b2(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal ha la ha la re// me'i ri lag chu'i phyag rgya yis// gnas sam dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// chos nyid bdal ba'i na mkha' la// ye shes lnga yi 'byung chen brtsegs// kun gzhi bdal ba'i namakha'
90b3(rnying rgyud): la// bskyed ma'i 'byung chen rnam lnga brtsegs// bruM las rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal// mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// ta la'i bskyed cing gser tseng dril// zla gam dam po dbang gi rgyu// bruM khaM traM kha la ti bruM/ 
90b4(rnying rgyud): zhes pas rnam lnga'i byug pa yis// gtor zhing kun tu byug par bya'o// sgrub mchog skyong ba'i rnal 'byor rnams// rdo rje tshig dgis gtab nas ni// rgyal sras rig 'dzin bka' 'khor lo/ 
90b5(rnying rgyud): 'bras bur red phyir byin gyis rlob// rdo rje rgyal dbang chen po das / sgrib pa sreg pa'i yi ge ni// phreng bar byas te gnas su 'a bro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag te// rig 'dzin pho mo'i/ 
90b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan mas gdab// rnam lnga'i byug pas kun la gtor// rtags kyi phyag rgya lag du sbyin// rnal 'byor chen po'i lug su spyad// 'jig rten spyod tshul thams cad ni// sgyu ma yin phyir shin tu yang / 
90b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod tshul dag/ ji ltar 'byung de ltar sprad// e ma dur khrod gsang ba yi// rmad byung zhing khams dga' tshal 'dir// bska ldan dbang phyug rgyal ba'i sras// 'dus pas tshogs
90b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i rig 'dzin rnams// e ma ho// dga' mchog bde chen grogs// dam tshig srog gi lu gu rgyud// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// sprul pa'i gsheg sprugs grwa rgyas pa'i// tshegs gnyis
91a1(rnying rgyud): rtsal gyis rlabs sbar nas// chos nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs// a yaM dza laM khaM lhan/ de ring phan cad rgyal ba'i sras// dbang phyug yin pas ci bder spyod// rnal 'byor
91a2(rnying rgyud): longs spyod bskyed pa dang // dug rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yi// maM las skyes pa'i ye shes kyis// zangs kyi dngos po 'ju 'dul bya// dam rdzas yo byad longs spyod rnams// gong nas cha gsums
91a3(rnying rgyud): so nas/ sham ma 'dres par sta gon bya// phyi yi cha la 'jug pa yi// mchod sbyin spel ba'i yo byad bya// de gnyis gnyis pa'i tshe dag las// 'jug gi rgyal chos longs spyod bya// rmad 'byung nang gi
91a4(rnying rgyud): cha dag ni// thams cad gcig tu byas nas ni// ras sam shing khyon dag tu ni// bsdus te bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyis dgab// / dbyug pa chen pos de la gtor// lci pog nag po'i dud pas/ 
91a5(rnying rgyud): bdug rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya dang // 'bar ba'i lta bas brjid par bya// tsham ngan chen po'i stabs kyis bskor// sna tshogs gsur gyi dri chen gdon// de nas rgyal po'i byin brlabs kyis
91a6(rnying rgyud): yo byad de dag bdud rtsi lnga// dam rdzas ngo bor bsdus nas ni// de la 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las// zhu nas phyag mtshan rnam lngar 'bar// dag pa'i bdud rtsi chen por zhu// shes rab lha mo'i rig 'dzin
91a7(rnying rgyud): mabazhi 'am yang na rnam pa brgyad// rdzas sam yo byad rang bzhin pas// zas mchog gar gyis spyir blangs te// long spyod spel ba'i dbyangs 'dis bstan// bdag cag rig 'dzin shes rab na/ 
91a8(rnying rgyud): rgyal sras lha yi dngos gru 'dzin// dgyes pas tshim po'i longs spyod dag/ ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu 'am// dpag bas ma shing ljon 'dod 'jo'i ba// ma rmos lo tog rgyas pa ltar// rnal
91b1(rnying rgyud): longs spyod chen po dag/ na mkha'i khams su gtibs nas kyang // rdo rje dgyes tshogs kun 'dus nas// skal ldan rnams kyis rab sprul cig/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang bsgyur nas// sgeg pas lhan
91b2(rnying rgyud): 'jo tshul dag/ 'dud cing sdod pa'i tshul gyis ni// rol mo'i tshogs kyis dga' ba bskyed// oM shri badz+ra lA s+ye hUM hUM// badz+ra mA le traM traM/ badz+ra gir ti hr-i hriM/ badz+ra nir ti a oM rdo rje dkarma'i thabs mchi/ 
91b3(rnying rgyud): gis/ rdo rje glu 'di gzi byin skyed// rdo rje bdud rtsi longs spyod 'di// rtsi mchog bcud kyi snying po ste// gezi mdangs rgyas par byed pa'i mchog/ bkrag 'dzin gzugs mchog dran pa'i dpal// rdo rje can gyis/ 
91b4(rnying rgyud): byin stobs kyis// bskal pa can gyis zas su bya// skal me dad rnams kyi dug du 'gyur// dper na sbrul las 'o ma pa zhin// sa ma ya dzaHku su rtsa ma ma// smug zil lha mo gnyen
91b5(rnying rgyud): gsal ma// rlan rnams bdud rtsir sbyar byed ma// bdud rtsi chu rgyun dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal chu rgyun 'bebs// shing lo mdab las bdud rtsi sgyur// 'bru thogs
91b6(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin// rang ginyer las skal 'bras bur skyed// lha mo sra bstan dbang sgyur ma// khu ba bcud las bdud rtsir 'gyur// bdud rtsi zhun chen dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las
91b7(rnying rgyud): skal brtan par byed// rdo rje lha mo shel mdog ma// nyi zer bdud rtsir sbyar byed ma// gsal ba mdangs kyi dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal gzi byin skyed// lha mo khro gnyer sngo bsangs ma/ 
91b8(rnying rgyud): dur khrod rdzas las bdud rtsir sbyar// sha chen sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las bskal byin 'bebs ma// rtsi yi lha mo blo gros ma// rtsi thog bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma// rtsi mchog kun gyi
92a1(rnying rgyud): dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer las skal tshim byed ma// sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun// dug rnams bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma// bdud rtsi sman gyi dngos grub 'dzin// rang gnyer la skal/ 
92a2(rnying rgyud): 'di kun yang // rdo rje glu yi brten nas ni// rnal 'byor chen po'i yo byad du// rol mos dga' ston long spyod bya// de nas las kyi gnas skabs 'dir// phyi nang 'thun 'jug bka' sdod pa'i// gshi
92a3(rnying rgyud): rje chos kyi phyag rgya yis// bran gyi bya bar dbang bsdus nas// phyi mtshams bsrung bar dbang bsgyur te// 'bur ram lugs sam ri mo 'am// ci 'dra bar ni byas nas kyang // phyi khyams sgo yi phyi ro/ 
92a4(rnying rgyud): du// ma he khri la bzhag nas ni// 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis mgu byas la// de tshe 'di yis bskor bar bya// gsang chen lha ngan grub po brang nas// las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang nas/ 
92a5(rnying rgyud): ldan chos rjes bka' stsal pa// de bzhin rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos// bka' gsang gzhung chen 'di sgrub cing // yang dag don la nges 'jug na// 'di dag nor bu rin chen te// 
92a6(rnying rgyud): 'di la rtod cing bar gcod pa// lha srin sde brgyad 'byung po kun// khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog yin te// rnam par smin pa'i chos shod la// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pas// bla med 'bras bur
92a7(rnying rgyud): ma gyur tshe ra// sa 'di yan chad ma gtang bar// dpal chen mi 'pham bka' ma 'da'// bdag cag ye nas gnyis med de// de tsam don gyi dbyingasu gcig/ phyi rol skyong ba'i mu ran la rdo rje yal
92a8(rnying rgyud): dam thub par mdzod// badz+ra ya ma ra dza sa ma ya s+t+waM// zhes pas gshin rje mnas bsgrags te// gal te 'das ni kho bdag 'tshig/ brtsam par bya ba'i las chen po// dngos grub 'byung bar byed kyi
92b1(rnying rgyud): rten/ phyag rgya che dang gzugs mchog gi/ stegs bu legs par sbyangs na 'grub// mtshon pas khrid par byed pa yi// rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams la// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor bshad bgyi ba// so sor gagra
92b2(rnying rgyud): te bshad bgyi ba// brtan zhing ngos 'jam khang bu la// 'bur khung khong snyoms 'phang mtho ba'i// kha dog lnga yi gzugs byas nas// des ni mtshan ma'i dngos grub ste// shing shun ras sam dur khrod kyi/ 
92b3(rnying rgyud): zhing chen ras la kha dog lngas// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i gzugs bris na// de yang mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten// rdo dang shel rdo la sogs pa'i// dung ngam ba so'i rgyu las ni// mkhas pas 'bur du gtod byas
92b4(rnying rgyud): nas// mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur// gser dngul rin chen la sogs pa// zangs lcags khar ba'i rgyu dag las// / mkhan gyis blugs te ma nyams na// de yang mtshan ma'i// 
92b5(rnying rgyud): rten du 'gyur// blag sha byang chub shing la sogs// rgyud shing yal ga mnyen pa las// phyag rgya'i gzugs de leg sa sbyar na// de yang rten du mkhas pas bshad// mnyen cing
92b6(rnying rgyud): sbyin pa'i mchog rnams la// bzhin dang 'dril khug legs sbyar te// phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs byas na// de yang brten pa'i 'osu 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams la// yi ge 'am yang na mtshan
92b7(rnying rgyud): rtags sam// ming ngam thig ler rdzas la bri// bsgrubs na mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur// de las re shig 'dir bshad pa// stegs pu la brten mtshan ma dag/ bsgrub pa'i don du brtag bzung ba// ba
92b8(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// gong du smos pa'i rgyu rnams la stegs bu mdzes shing mnyam byas te// kun tu gru bzhi cha skams la 'du rtsi lnga'i sbyor ba ste/ me long lta bur snying por bya// snang byung yang dag byin
93a1(rnying rgyud): brlabs can// ye shes rang byung grub pa'i rdzas// bka' gsang rmad byung pho brang du// dur khrod rdzas lngas brkyang nul bya// rdo rje srad bu'i thig gdab pa// cho ga rnam par
93a2(rnying rgyud): bshad bgyi ba// gsang ba'i lcang lo 'khril mangs dang // rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs pa// ring thung maN+Dal 'khor khyud la// 'jur mdud can du ma gyur pa'i// sum sgril snyoms pa'i tshad ldan la// 
93a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal// rgyu de byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// yi ge gnyis kyi 'phro 'du las// dkar dmar 'od kyi gser phreng 'phro// rdo rje gsang
93a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs kyis da// byang chub sems 'dren 'khal ba'i yum nga // nges par brtags te 'dir bzung ba// mtshan ldan pa dkr-i shis gsang ba'i yum// smin dkrugs ring lag sor phra/ 
93a5(rnying rgyud): tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad// kha nas ut+pal dang ldang zhing // lus la ga bur tsan dan dri// yid 'ongs maHna ldan rked skabs phyed// skra 'jam mthon 'thing g.yasu
93a6(rnying rgyud): 'khyil// so dkar tshags dam dkar dmar phyed// mig gi dkyus ring smin dkyus legs// zar ma'i me tog rgyas 'dra'i spun// dpral ba'i dbyes phye skra 'tshams 'khyig/ sna bzang mdog gsal
93a7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs// lus drang ske ring sems ma'i tshul// nu ma'i dkyil mtho zla rgyas 'dra// sha dkar chags dam 'khril bag chags/ khong dal 'gro na gom pa 'jam// skad ni ngang pa gzhon nu sgrogs/ 
93a8(rnying rgyud): cir yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan// skyes bu tha mas yum du gzung // gzungs mar byin gyis brlab pa ni// yum gyi phung po gnas lngar ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'phro 'dugs pa
93b1(rnying rgyud): bar gyur pa dang // sangs rgyas byin brlabs dbang skur nas// bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mchog gsal// rdo rje yab la'ang de bzhin te// de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // yum gyi mkha' la mor/ 
93b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// gsang ba dbugs kyi zla ga ma la// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du bya// gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin// yum gyi mkha' la de bzhin no// de nas rdo rje tshig 'di yis// lus kyi yum
93b3(rnying rgyud): la nges par sgo// shes rab lha mo gsang ba'i yum// 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i 'phrul mo che// chags pa'i tshul gyis thabs la 'dud// g.yon du 'khril cing g.ya su 'khyud// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis zla
93b4(rnying rgyud): gam sbyor// gsang ba'i byang chub sems 'dren pa// khyod ni lham ngargyal ba'i sras// rang bzhin chos kyi mtshan ldan ma// rdo las kyi yum yin gyis// gsang ba'i las rnams kun gyi
93b5(rnying rgyud): shig/ lag pa 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// nyi zla 'bar ba/ 'i tshogs bkod de// gsang ba'i byang chub dkaradamar 'di// thig le yi ge'i ngo bor gdab// las kyi
93b6(rnying rgyud): rje 'bar ba yi// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya yis// byang chub sems kyi thog 'di drongs// rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di drangs// rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di gyis// oM tsan dra d+ha ra hri zhes pa'i// gsang ba'i
93b7(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// rdzas mchog 'bar ba'i thig le yis// gnas lnga dag gi gzhal yas su// gsang ba'i thabs kyi thig le bya// srad bu'i sbyor ba de rdzogs nas// gol sgrib rtag chad skyon
93b8(rnying rgyud): bral ba'i// che chung ya yo med pa yi// rdo rje dbu ma'i thig 'di dgye// chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yasu// mi dmigs bdal ba'i maN+Dal la// ye shes lnga yi thig 'phros pas// bde chen rnamatha
94a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshogs// kun gzhi na mkha'i gzhal yas su// nyon mongs rtog pa'i maN+Dal la// ting 'dzin 'od zer thig 'phros pas// phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs mkhan
94a2(rnying rgyud): dbyings gsang ba'i gzhal ya su// zla gam pad+ma'i maN+Dal las// byang chub sems kyi thig 'phros pas// ye shes sems dpa' gsal ba'i tshogs// bkra shis dben pa'i gzhal yas su// 
94a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma rten gyi maN+Dal la// rdo rje srad bu'i thig 'phros pas// cho 'phrul gzugs brnyan phyag rgya 'bar// stong gsum gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rmad byung rdo rje'i thig 'gyed na// gsang ba'i
94a4(rnying rgyud): dam la gnas pa yi// 'byung po skye bo gdol pa can// rdo rje cil gyi hUM rings las// rdo rje mtshon cha'i bu yug 'chu/ dag/ phyogs mtshams bla 'og khro bos gdams// 'bar bags/ 
94a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i mtshams gzung ste// phyi rol sde pa'i 'dul rnams gcad// rdo rje mtshon cha 'bar ba'i tshogs// sreg dang joms pa'i drag shul can// rdo rje lce yis 'dir bdeg bya/ rdo rje
94a6(rnying rgyud): nyi ma'i gzhal ya su// rdo rje dpa' be'u 'od kyi thig/ me long ye shes rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya// de bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal// pad+ma zla ba'i 'khor lo yi// dpag med/ 
94a7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i gzhal ya su// rigs kyi dpal be'u 'od kyi thig/ ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya// rdo rje mkha' la 'khor lo bskor// thabs dang shes rab zung ya bzhis// 
94a8(rnying rgyud): so so'i phyag du gnas nas ni// na mkha' dbus kyi snying po la// srad bu bzhi yi rgya ram bre// de nas rdo rje brtan pa'i sa// dbus kyi pho brang dgu pa ni// rdo rje sras bu'i thig chen gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas
94b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kun// che chung med par snyoms par bya// 'dir ni rdo rje mu khyud bdun// 'byung ba'i rim pa drug par du// 'khor lo drug brtsegs snying por 'bar// gru chang brtsibs mtshan me ri 'phro// mu khyud
94b2(rnying rgyud): tshar gsum 'bar ba'i phreng // bar khyams bzhis mdzes phyi khyams dang // lngar gsal sgo dgu shar du brtseg/ pho brang de'i gnas gnas su// phyag rgya'i tshul rnams 'byung ba ni// mu khyud
94b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' zad yan chad du// yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// cho 'phrul dam tshig tshad med pa// rol pa 'jigs byed 'jigs byed che// ka tsa li la sogs par bri// de bzhin za byed yab yum bzhi
94b4(rnying rgyud): las kyi lha ste he ru ka/ 'khor lo mtha' ma'i rtsibs la dgod// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dag/ gru chang phyi dang na la dgram// hUM chen bcu yi yab yum dag/ shin tu mdzes
94b5(rnying rgyud): par dang po la'o// de nyid la ni ma brgyad dang // ging chen bco brgyad rgyas par dgod// gnyis pa'i khyams la ma kha' 'gro brgyad// shugs 'gro brgyad kyang de bzhi no// gsu
94b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i khyams la 'phra men brgyad rnams bri// bzhi pa'i khyams la phor thogs brgyad// de bzhin srin mo gnod thogs brgyad// kun tu mdzes pa'i bri bar bya// lnga pa'i khyams ni tha ma la// rdo rje
94b7(rnying rgyud): dang bran mo dang // pho nya la sogs rgyas par dgram// de yang tshul du dgod pa ni// gong ma dag ni rgyu rnams las// ka tsa li la sogs pa dang // ji ltar 'byor pa de ltar bri// mchod pa'i yo byad
94b8(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang // rma du byung ba'i rdzas mchog dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i rims kyis bkod// rdo rje gsang sgo bye nas ni// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs nas// rang bzhin yul nas 'banas/ 
95a1(rnying rgyud): ni// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor der rdzogs bya// 'dir yang don gyi khyad par gyis// rigs 'dzin che ba'i sa spar ba// shar gyi gdan gyi khyad par la// rdo rje seng+ges btegs
95a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo// zla ba nyi ma g.yos g.yon gyi// zhabs rten tshul gyi maN+Dal ni// rdo rje rgyal po yab yum bzhugs// lho'i gdan gyi khyad par la// glang chen rdo rjes bteg 'khor lo// pad ma g.yas g.yon
95a3(rnying rgyud): zhabs brten tshul// rdo rje rgyal ba yab yum bzhugs// byang gi gdan gyi khyad par la// pad+mas rdo rje gtog rgya gram// rdo rje karma yab yum bzhugs// nub bam phyogs sam mtshams gzhan du// 
95a4(rnying rgyud): gzhi rnams gcig tu gyur pa la// maN+Dal rgyun ma chad pa la // rdo rjes gtams shing sbrel byas nas// ba ma phyogs ga cig cher 'bar ba// kha dog 'bar ba'i 'od kyis dkrigs// rtsal
95a5(rnying rgyud): 'phang che chung khyad par gyis// bskal dang ldan nam mi ldan nga'i// la la dag la zla ba ni// rangs pa'i gdan gyi ma tsham ma la// de yang rtsal 'phang che chung la// la la rtse gsum
95a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rjes mtshan// la la rdo rje phyed mas mtshan// la la ma rangs zla gam kha// nang du bstan pas mtshan par bya'o// la la rtses 'bigs rnam par mtshan// la la pad+ma brtsegs pas mtshan// la lang / 
95a7(rnying rgyud): la mtshan ma med// la las gdan de mi non te// nar ma gang zag mi yi rdzas// so so'i bde ba'i thabs su sbyar// kun tu bde bar sbyar ba'i phyir// pi par stan zhes grags pa ste// kun tu khyab par lus
95a8(rnying rgyud): bder sbyar// smang byung sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi las rnams bya// 'dod par bya ba sgrub pa dang // gtor ma la sogs rdzas kyi rnams// chags
95b1(rnying rgyud): ngag la dgos nas kyang // gcig ni sbyin bsreg las mchog bya// gcig la rnal 'byor longs spyod gter// gcig ni mkha' 'gro'i 'khor tshogs bskyang // gan su bkra shis la sogs kyis/ 
95b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa rdzogs pas mthar dbyung ngo // dur khrod gsang mchog dbyings nyid la// dkyil 'khor dgu brtsigs dpal gyi rgya// ye shes dgu yi khong gsong gsal// me ri 'od kyi thig thag cad// 
95b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo tshegs chen bsgrub pa'i sa// rnal 'byor rtsa yi dkyil 'khor te// dur khrod gsang ba mchog gi mdo// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las tshogs
95b4(rnying rgyud): chen 'dus pa'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam ba des/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa chen po'i tshig
95b5(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin thams cad nges par 'grub par 'dod na 'diltar rig par bya'o// de bzhin thams cad kun rdzogs nas// rigs kyi khyad par 'di dag dbye// so so'i rigasu bsgrub pa/ 
95b6(rnying rgyud): bya// rdo rje can la dpal be'u ni// dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'bar ba'o// de bzhin rin chen rin chen te// pad+ma dmar po 'od kyi dkyil// las ni kun tu rgya gram 'bar// de bzhin rin chen 'khor lo 'bar/ 
95b7(rnying rgyud): so so'i rigs rnams gtser gzhag ste// 'khor ni de bzhin mi 'gyur bar// rnam par bkod de legs sbyar nas// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// bsgrub dang bsgrub chen rdzogs par bsgrub/ ting / 
95b8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni// so so'i rigs ni gang yin pa// ting 'dzin bye brag mang po la// yid kyi sbyor ba gsal bar bya// des ni rig 'dzin gang 'dod pa// gsal bar nges par 'grub pa yin zhes
96a1(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje ga 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas yang sem
96a2(rnying rgyud): dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni blang dor med par rig par bya'o// chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la// bzang ngan rtog pa'i tshig dang bral bdag
96a3(rnying rgyud): dang gzhan du dbyer med de// gtsang ngam mi gtsang gnyis su med ces gsung so// de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rigs 'dzin ma'i thod pa can mang po dag rnam par bgod pa rnal 'byor gyi gral
96a4(rnying rgyud): nas langs te/ a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po brjod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa dal ba/ bdag cag shin tu gnas par 'tshal na/ bdag
96a5(rnying rgyud): cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs so// zhes gsungs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ mi'i thod pa can rnams rang rang ji ltar dga' ba'ide/ 
96a6(rnying rgyud): tshig rnams spobs pa skyed la/ phul cig ces gsungs pa las/ 'dod chags kyi rig 'dzin bram ze mi'i thod pa can rdo rje thal ba'i dbyangs shes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sa
96a7(rnying rgyud): cag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gyi// bud med thams cad thams cad la// 'dod pa'i chags pa ci spyad kyang // yang dag rig na mi gos so// zhes gsol
96a8(rnying rgyud): to// de nas rig 'dzin rak+Sha mi'i thod pa can zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste/ bdag ni gsod la dga' ba ste// sems can thams cad bsad nas
96b1(rnying rgyud): kyang zag pa mi gtsang snyings ma dang // mi sha la sogs thams cad kun// zos na dag tshig mchog lags te// mthu dang gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur// bdag gi dam tshig de lag so// zhes gsol to de
96b2(rnying rgyud): yang gnod sbyin rig 'dzin yak+Sha mi'i thod pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig 'di lta ste/ mi yi bdag po thams cad la// 'dod pa thams cad 'phrog pa dang / 
96b3(rnying rgyud): gser la sogs pa brkus spyad kyang // yang dag rig na mi gos te// 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog du 'gyur// bdag gi dam tshig de lagaso zhes gsol to// de nas yang mu stegs rig 'dzin 'od bsrung / 
96b4(rnying rgyud): ral pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ mi yi mgo bo bcang nas kyang // bzang dang ngan ni bye brag rnams// rig pas
96b5(rnying rgyud): brtags te shes byas nas// bzang ba'i rtag can brten bya ste/ dkar po ra ri lcang lo can// 'di dag rtag tu su 'chang ba// / 'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa ste// rgol ba thams cad
96b6(rnying rgyud): 'joms par nus// yid bzhin nor bu ci 'dra bar// de'i yon tan 'di las 'byung // bdag gi dam tshig de lags so zhes gsol to// de nas yang bram ze shal dga' ba dang // sha za mo'i rig
96b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig 'di 'di lta ste/ ba glang khyi sha rta sha dang // mi sha glang chen sha la sogs// sha rnams 'dra bar gtsang sme
96b8(rnying rgyud): med/ zos na yon tan sna tshogs 'grub// bdag gi dam tshig de lag so zhes gsol to// de nas yang srin mo'i rig 'dzin khrag 'phog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
97a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ srog chags sems can thams cad kyi// bsad pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag/ 'thungs na gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur// 
97a2(rnying rgyud): bdag gi dam tshig de lag so zhes gsol to// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo la sogs pa bud med kyi tshogs thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig 'di lta ste/ blo
97a3(rnying rgyud): gar glu tshig chen po ni// thams cad brten pa'i mchog lags te// bro yi 'jo tshul stabs chen dang // glu yi snyan dngogs don bsgrags nas// yid kyi dbang po thams cad 'phrog/ bsten pa'i thabs
97a4(rnying rgyud): kyis 'khrig spyod pa// 'di ni dga' ba'i dam tshig ste// bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags te// zhes gsol to// de nas rig 'dzin de kun gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
97a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi spyi'i dam tshig ni 'di lta ste/ dkar nag las ni ci sprad kyang // rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang // rab 'bring tha dad bye brag med// de bzhin 'di la bde snga
97a6(rnying rgyud): gam// dge dang mi dge'i rtsod pa med// rnon po'i mtshon gyis gcad du med// ci phyir rnam pa bdun stong pas// thog pa med pa'i don phyir ro// srog kyang bcad cing gas du med// ci phyir rdzas 'di 'jig
97a7(rnying rgyud): paso// sdig pa chen po'i las rnams kun// bdag gis byas sam gzhan byed bcug/ gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// sems can de la sbyin byin dang // de bzhin gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// sems can thams
97a8(rnying rgyud): cad gsad pa gnyis// yang dag rig la tha dad med// namapa' dag la rdul dang chus// ji ltar mi chags pa bzhi no// gang zhig khrel dang 'dzem ldan na// dogs pa'i rtog pa de gzung bas// dmyal ba
97b1(rnying rgyud): chen por ltung bar 'gyur// chags pa'i spyod pa la sogs kyis// lus rnams gdung bar byed pa yi// sems can de ni 'du shes chung // zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje
97b2(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma ho thod pa can gyi tshogs/ khyed kyis smras pa'i tshig 'di rnams// mdud pas bcings pa'i tshig yin te// khur dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag yang dag ces smra
97b3(rnying rgyud): ba// yang dag nyid kyi mdud pa ste// mdud pa'i bkrol ba ma byas na// tha ram phyed par mi 'gyuraro// chags pa'i las rnams sbyor ba dag/ chags pa'i dbang gis der sbyor na// de dag de'i grong khyer
97b4(rnying rgyud): gnas 'gyur de'i sems can yin// 'du shes sgyur ba'i la ngas chen dag/ sdang ba'i dbang gis sems shor nas// shan pa gsod pa'i rig 'dzin du// ltung 'gyur sdig pa'i ri// 
97b5(rnying rgyud): bo yin// rgyal ba rnams ni gtsang ba na// gang tshe bder ga/ shegs rgyal ba'i zhal// mi gtsang rnam pa sna tshogs/ kyis// yongs su bstabs par gyur na ko/ de tshe las kyi rnam
97b6(rnying rgyud): smin gyis// thar med nad kyis bzung nas ni// 'dam du bying bar mo 'gyur ram// sha dang khrag la sogs pa'i zas// bku ba'i rngad zas chen po ste// gang gis zos pa'i lus rnams la/ 'byung
97b7(rnying rgyud): po dri za kun 'dus nas// dri snom ro dang bcud rnams 'byin// des ni gzi mdangs yal 'gyur na// ci phyir ci ste de rnams bza'// sems nyid rin chen yod bzhin du// gzhan gyi rin chen spyod
97b8(rnying rgyud): byed pa// log pas log pa len pa'i chos// 'di dag mdud pa dam po yin// dkar nag las la khyad med ces// thams cad khra bos spyod pa ni// rigs med rigs chad log pa'i las// 'bras
98a1(rnying rgyud): bu log pa'i khamasu 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la// yan lag tshig du ma dag na// nyes byas las kyi rgyu des ni// gang gi dus rnams thams
98a2(rnying rgyud): cad// dbang po'i yan lag ma tshang zhing // dran pa'i snying po nyams par 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bder gshegs rgyal ba sgom zlos pa// cho 'phrul khro tshul bstan pa ltar// 
98a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma nyid du der go na// las kyi srin po'i rig 'dzin yin// rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad kun// mtshan ma nyid brtags gyur na// ci la'ang rtog cing chag pa yi// 'dzin pa'i phur pa/ 
98a4(rnying rgyud): chen por 'gyur// a dang hUM la sogs pa yi// rgyu yi yi ge thams cad kun// mtshan ma nyid der rtags na// tsan+dan sbrul gdug la sogs par// ltung 'gyur rtog pa'i gags// 
98a5(rnying rgyud): chen yin/ khrag la sogs pa'i rdzas chen lnga// de nyid dang sa bor de rtags na// 'byung po khrag gi dri snom pa'i// lus len rigs ni 'dzin pa yi// ma bdun rngam pa'i cha
98a6(rnying rgyud): lug su// gang zhig rtog par der go na// srin mo mi sdug sha za mo// lang ka'i yul du de dag 'khor// mtshan ma'i bla thabs mgo brnyan can// der brtsan der bzung dmigs pas ni// sho gam
98a7(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi gcan chen rigs// 'dzin cing gnas der rtog par 'gyur// las kyi dbang brtsan bran mo'i tshogs// de 'dra nyid de brtags na// gnod sbyin chen mo'i tshigasu 'gyur// gzhan gyi tshe la
98a8(rnying rgyud): 'tshe ba yin// des na mdud pa chen po 'di// khur du bshal ba'i gdos yin te// 'chal pas lta ba'i mig long ste// sems kyi nor bu rin chen de// rtag chad khamasu stor bar 'gyur// 
98b1(rnying rgyud): de lta'i skyon chen spang bar gyis// de skad ces bka' stsal pa las// thod pa can gyi tshogs rnams rtog pa'i 'du shes kyis zin cing rang rang gi spyod pa la skyo ba skyes par gyur to// de nas brtse
98b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni log pa'i dka' thub tu 'gyur ba lags na// 'di dag yang dag pa'i dka' thub tu
98b3(rnying rgyud): gnas par 'tshal na/ chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste// cir yang 'gyur ba lagaso// gsang sngags chen po'i sgo ni bskal pa me dpung lta bu ste// bdag cag rnams kyis rtag pa
98b4(rnying rgyud): so sor ji ltar mos pa ltar bsha du gsol/ zhes zhus pa la sra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgyes pa chen po'i gzhad pa mdzadra nas// rigs kyi bu rnams ni de ltar zhu ba legs kyis shin tu
98b5(rnying rgyud): nyon cig/ khyed rnams kyi spyod pa mi dgag par ji ltar dga' kha'i bsam pa so sor rangs par bya ste/ 'jig rten ma/ tshan ma'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams gsang
98b6(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi dka' thub chen por bya'o// rang rang gi spyod pa ma bkag par sgo gsum lhag par spyod cig/ de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungaso// e ma ho thod pa can gyi/ 
98b7(rnying rgyud): tshegs// bud med bud med thams cad kun// bskyod par byed pa'i rten yin te// 'bras bu smin pa'i zhing yang yin// bsgral zhing gdon pa'i gnas yin te// shes rab dga' ba'i yul
98b8(rnying rgyud): yino// 'di la sems gsum gnas pa ste// ye nas dag pa chos nyid sems// mkha' dang sbyor ba byang chub sems// snying rjes sgrol ba gsum sbyar te// chos nyid gsang ba nyi shar khyab snying/ 
99a1(rnying rgyud): sgo ba gsum gyis sbyar/ ting 'dzin byin brlabs ye shes kyis// chos nyid dur khrod mkha' la sbrul// bsgral ba'i rgyu mchog man chad nas// shel chen tsa ra
99a2(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// de la rgyu drug sa bon gdab// rang bzhin ye nas de gzhom bya// khyad par 'das pa'i yi ge lnga// gnas bkod 'phros pas mtha' yas bkang // thams cad stongs shing zad byas
99a3(rnying rgyud): nas// 'dus pa'i yi ge lnga ru gsal// de las phyag mtshan ye shes lnga// mi gnas ye shes ngang du thim// sgrib pa'i phung por smin pa de// rdo rje rol pa'i rngam tshogs kyis// 'jo tshul stab
99a4(rnying rgyud): kyis sbyar bar bya// kha T+wAM la sogs sngags bcas pas// bsgyel te ma rig sgo dbye bya// rnam shes dbugs dkyi sgrom drangs la// rdo rje rgyal po'i rlung sgrom du// bsdus te/ 
99a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dbugs can la// hU~M byas sgril ma de la bslan// gas ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// mtshon gang 'dod du bstim par bya// yu ti a haM gis sbar te// gsalen
