99a6(rnying rgyud): dang mnyam du gsal// rdo rje tshe la bslan par bya// rdo rje rlung gi dbugs sbar te// thugs las rlung sgrim lam du sbar// na mkha' chos kyi gzhal ya su// nyi ma'i steng du hUM du gsal// ye shes
99a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen gang ba// nyi zla ga bu'i bar du gsal// a yang phaT kyis bskyod 'phangs pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dkar 'phros// ye shes sems dpar gsol ba la// dngos por
99a8(rnying rgyud): snang bar 'dzin dang bral// g.yo 'gul 'bar 'phrog ma chad par// rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te// rigs kyi lha dang snying po sbyin// rdo rje gdung ba'i glu blangs te// man ngag gnas kyi smon lam gdab/ 
99b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi tshal dag tu byas nas ni// sman gyi bslabs te phung por brtsal// 'khor ba'i phung po sdus la// rdo rje stabs dang klu yis sbyang // gnas gnas ngag tu sngo bar bya// phung po mchod pa'i rdzas su/ 
99b2(rnying rgyud): bstim// rdo rje pra ya~M las rnams gdab// des ni mnyes dang skongs pa dang // rdo rje las rnams 'grub pa yin// rnal 'byor las kyi dbang phyug che// mtho gtsang shes rab gangs rum nas// rig pa'i
99b3(rnying rgyud): sder mo sbar shad can// nga rgyal dregs pa'i glang po 'joms// rnal 'byor rtsal rgyas seng 'brug rnams// rdo rje rtsal chen 'di sbyangs pas// rnal 'byor lha mchog gshegs pa'i rten// dngos grub 'byung
99b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rin po che// mthu stobs skye ba'i thabs chen po// byin brlab das phebs pa'i dbang mchog 'dis// rgyal ba'i dngos grub dman chad nas// mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul thams cad dang / dregs
99b5(rnying rgyud): pa ma rungs sde pa rnams// thams cad dbang du 'gyur nges na//  nga po gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'khor ba'i skam gling chenabo la// rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ rgyud drug
99b6(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i rnam shes srog/ dus gsum mtshon gyis bsad pas na// rtag chad mthar shi'i ro gling nas// gti mug bam chen ro blangs nas// bdud rtsi sman chen ye shes kyis// rtag chad mtha' wa
99b7(rnying rgyud): ro blangs shing // byang chub sems su gsal ba'i phyir// ro yi rdzas rnams btsal bar bya// khro tsheg rngam par bdag byas te// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mi gnang nas// mthing nag hUM gi ser chen ni// 'khor ba'i
99b8(rnying rgyud): ro gling khams su spro// bsgral ba'i dur khrod mtha' dag kun// ye shes rol pa'i zhing du blta// khro bo gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis// tsham ngam chen po rngam tshul gyis// dpa' bo rdo rje'i 'dzur 'gros sbyar
100a1(rnying rgyud): thabs chen bco brgyad stabs kyis sbyar// 'jo tshul thabs kyis 'gro stabs kyis// 'dzem tshul lta zhing rnam par rtsen// sgra skad bsgyur zhing he hes sgrogs// 'thab cing rtsod
100a2(rnying rgyud): pas rnam par rngam// 'bri tshugs lta zhing 'drog tshul spyod// g.yas su lta zhing g.yon du 'gyur// yid ma ches te phyir yang lta// sdang mig logs kyis khyab par blta// rdo rje 'gros su rgyug cing 'gro ha ha
100a3(rnying rgyud): ru lu'i rngam sgra sgrogs// so so'i brda' skad 'byin byed cing // bstod pa'i tshul gyis mchod zhing rgyug/ yid bzhin gter chen kha phye nas// 'dod 'byung rin chen phung po de// 'khor ba'i rnam smin dbyis
100a4(rnying rgyud): phyung nas// rnam gsum dug chen gtan sprugs nas// thugs rje rngam pa'i kha long kha// rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis // dngos grub lo tog phral nas kyang // rdo rje bzhin phyogs ma
100a5(rnying rgyud): nor bar/ shel phur gnyis kyis gsang gnas gzung // nges par gshin pa'i gzhi ma la// cung zhig brtod de nye 'khor bsdu ra// bzhin phyogs gang ltas legs nyes brtag/ phyi yi bzang
100a6(rnying rgyud): ngan de nyid ni// nang du nges par gsal ba yin// nyes pa'i mtshan byung mkhas pas gnan// gal te dri bas gleng slong na// de'i the tshom bsal ba dag/ dngos por spyod la zhugs rnams kyis// mtshan
100a7(rnying rgyud): mar rtog pa 'di dag rnams// 'jigs byed dka' las rtags pa yi// 'dod chags bdag po nga la gsol// ji skad smras pa de bshad kyis// mtshan ma'i rdzas rnams rtogs par gyis// 'jig rten mgon
100a8(rnying rgyud): khyod bdag la gson// bdag cag spyod pa gsol bar bgyi// snod kyi mtshan nyid bzang ngan gyis// nyes dang legs pa 'di las byung // skyon gyi mtshan ma bdun pa ste// kha sgrub pa dang gdan las bskyod// 
100b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud mi 'phel dang mtshams su gas// bar chad 'byung dang bgegs ldang ba// mtshan ma ngan pa 'byung ba'o// 'di dag mkhas pas yongs mi 'chang // legs pa'i rgyu ni bcu cig ste// gsum gyi dngos grub
100b2(rnying rgyud): thob pa dang // rig 'dzin lam 'gro na mkhar 'phur// khams gsum dbang bsdu rdo rje spyan// pha rol g.yul zlog zil gyis gnon// mthu dang byin rlabs tshe 'phel dang // mtshan ma gsal po 'byung / 
100b3(rnying rgyud): ba dang // slob mchu yi rgyud 'phel ba dang // dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'grub pa dang // phyi mar sangs rgyas myur ba dang // dngos grub rnams gsum thob pa ste// smon lam bzhin du 'grub pa'o// de yang bye brag
100b4(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste// byed du 'gyur na thob thang yin// sum cha tsam la ba tang snyoms// de yang so so'i mtshan rtog su// brtag cing ming du brjod bya ba// dkar po spros med chos kyi sku// lcang lo tu/ 
100b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs longs spyod ldan// ma 'ongs sprul pa'i mdzad pa'i rgyun/ 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i// rnal 'byor sa la 'gro/ ba'i rigs// bder gshegs dus gsum 'byung ba'i rtags
100b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen gter gyi ga'u 'di// thabs kyi rgyal po dpal gyi dkor// pho brang rtags ldan snod bcud rdzogs// 'phrul zhal yid bzhin 'dod zho'i ba// rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba'i mchog/ ngo mtshar
100b7(rnying rgyud): thog dkan sgra can// rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang sgra dag/ rig 'dzin rtsal can kun la sgrogs// nga ni skyes mchog rtsal can gyi// rmad byung bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas// su zhig dngos grub gang 'dod pa che tshe
100b8(rnying rgyud): med par dus 'dir long // gang dag bka' ltar mi byed cing // su zhig dam la mi gnas par// nga yi gzugs mthong tsam gyis 'tshig/ sgra thos tsam gyi brlag par 'gyur// zhes pa'i sgra byung cho 'phrul ni/ 
101a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i gzhal yas kun las bsgrogs// 'di dag don dang ldan par spyod// 'di ltar grags pas nges don ni// rnal 'byor can gyis shes bya ba// thams cad dpal/ 
101a2(rnying rgyud): ldan lcang lo can// la la bkra shis mtshan ldan te// de bzhin pa tsa ku la yin// la la dpyad kyi na sha yin// de bzhin mi 'gyur sra mkhregs yin// ma hA ke sa dpal dang ldan// ye shes lnga ldan zhes ni b+ha
101a3(rnying rgyud): A yu pA la tshe'i mchog/ la la me le de byi brtan// la la de bzhin kha swa kha// kha hu pa yi dpal dang ldan// bkra shis don 'byung de lta'o// bde gshegs mtshan ldan rdzogs pa yin// gtsug bud dge/ 
101a4(rnying rgyud): gtsug dpal dang ldan// dz+nyA na mUr ti de bzhino// la la dz+nyA na kA Da li// de bzhin khro bo kuN Da li// e ka dza Ti mtshan ldan dag// a bi mu ka rdzogs pa'o// 'dod pa brtan zhing bde ba skye/ 
101a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med don ldan thob pa'o// pu tra mang 'phel lcug phran rgyas / rdo rje bse phor mtshan rdzogs nas// shel phor gsang ba'i don 'byung ba// sku gsung lhun grub ka pA la// thams cad reb
101a6(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin skong // de bzhin yon+tan rdzogs kun rjon bkra shis mtshan ni kun ldan pa// de bzhin mi 'gyur g.yung drung brtan// mi shigs mdzod yin kun 'byung ba'o// cho 'phrul rtags 'byin dam pa 'byung // 
101a7(rnying rgyud): srid pa yongs sgrol las kyi mchog/ khams gsum dbang sdud khyad par ldan// drug gsum gtan sprugs las mchog can// mtshan ma'i spros bral nges pa'i don// rigs drug mdog drug dbyibs drug pa
101a8(rnying rgyud): yon+dan skyon rnams sbyar bar bya// mang dang nyung ba'i gsang ba ni// bcas dkar 'phel dang mgon mi 'byung // rjes 'dra la sogs skyon rnams spang // dug gsum stongs mdzad rgyal ba'i bka'// sku gsu
101b1(rnying rgyud): smin pa'i g.yu drung rtags// spa thabs gsang ba'i man ngag 'di// skal ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyi ni// skal med kun gyi rtog pa'i bdud// ming tsam 'dzin la ga la brtan// mkhas pas brtag
101b2(rnying rgyud): cing bzang po brten// dngos grub 'byung ba'i dus chen yang // gcig dang gsum ni rab tu bshad// de bzhin lnga bdun 'bring du grags// dgu ni dngos grub tha ma ste// bcu gcig phan chad yal
101b3(rnying rgyud): bar bshad// de bas rnal 'byor rtsal can gyis// nges par brtson de brtag par rigs// 'dod chags bdag pos de skad bshad// mtshan ma yin phyir der nges pa// mtshan ma can dang 'thun bya'i/ 
101b4(rnying rgyud): phyir// thabs kyis de dang 'thun spyod la// yang dag don la kha lo sgyur// de dag rnam par sbyang ba dang // 'gro drug shin tu dgayeng ba can// yid rnams drangs te brten byas nas// thab
101b5(rnying rgyud): kyi don la sbyar ba'i tshig/ rgyu drug 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la// glu bri gar gyi rol pa yis// srid gsum zil gnon dbangasdud pa// 'jig rten 'thun 'jug spyod par bya// dper na 'jig
101b6(rnying rgyud): rten khams dag na// 'gro bas 'gro ba 'dul byed pa// de dga'i las la de zhugs te// de dang bsam pa 'thun spyad pas// de dang 'bris nas de dga' byas// de nas de yi drod len nas// de yi 'du shes sgyu
101b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshig/ de snga bdag gi grogs khyod kyi// las la zhugs pa shin du nor// 'dir nyes las kyis bsags pa bgrang // nyes kyang bdag gis khyod dgar bya// da ni bdag dga'i las 'di la// grogs
101b8(rnying rgyud): khyod shin tu 'jug dgos so// byas pas de'i snga sems de// zin pas gcig gi phyi sems kyang // 'dzin cing de dga'i las la 'jug/ spyod pa'i las kyang 'di lta ste// rgyu drug 'dus pa'i phung po la// 
102a1(rnying rgyud): ngan song gnas 'joms rdo rje'i brtags// ye shes thabs kyis snyan pa'i glu// rmad 'byung gsang chen sgrogs pa'i tshig/ nyon mongs lnga'i sa gzhi la// yi ge ye shes
102a2(rnying rgyud): gsal bas// 'bar ba khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin// khyu mchog lnga yi stobs kyis rol// sing+ge nga ro rngam pa'i glu/ rdo rje don rab sgrogs pa'i tshig/ rmad byung rol pa'i don byung ba// e ma ngo mtshar
102a3(rnying rgyud): ya mtshan che// dgyes pas rol pa'i byin rlabs las// rgyud drug rtsad gcod ngo mtshar che// mnyam pa chen po'i nam mkha' las// ye shes 'bar ba me byung bas// 'khor ba'i khrag gi rgya mtsho
102a4(rnying rgyud): skams// sdug bsngal dbyings su zad mdzad do// mi gnas da glong nas cho 'phrul pa// gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor 'bar// khrag 'thungs 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas// srid
102a5(rnying rgyud): gsum khrag mtshe rdo nas skams// dpa' bo tsham ngam gyad/ kyi stabs// srin po ma grangs khrod pa'i glu/ theg chen rmad byung gsang ba'i tshig/ chags pa'i rtod pur gting nas phyung // 
102a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' bzhi dbyings kyi bde klong nas// tshem bu 'bum gyi cho 'phrul 'phros// dgyes mchog rol pa'i 'phrin las lba/ la la shes rab thabs la rol// la la thugs rje las la rol// la la gdul bya'i
102a7(rnying rgyud): yul la rol// la la ye shes dbyings la rol// thabs kyi rgyal po rtogs pa'i dbang // che ba lung gi khyad par las// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i stabs// chags med ma
102a8(rnying rgyud): la gsal ba'i tshig/ dus gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i glu/ 'jig rten rim gyis sbyang ba'i phyir// 'jig rten khamasu rol pa byung // 'jig rten drug gi snying la rol// bdag po gtso bo ril mnan nas
102b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor ni snyan pa'i tshig gis bsten// 'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyud gcad nas// rnam thar na mkha'i ngang du bslan// gar mchog glog ltar 'gyur ba yis// rmad byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// yi ge/ 
102b2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul 'phros// 'gro 'du skar ltar 'khrug pa las// khams gsum bud shing thal bar blags// rdo rje bu yug skar ma'i stabs// rdo rje 'brug chen ldir ba'i glu/ don grub rdo rje gsang ba'i
102b3(rnying rgyud): tshig gdug pa'i dpung rnams rnam par 'joms// rdo rje sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bas// thabs kyi byang chub sems sprin spros// dbang sdud chags pa'i khyad par las// 'jig rten bu mo drug dang rol/ 
102b4(rnying rgyud): seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i stabs// rdo rje byung skad 'gyur ba'i glu chags pa rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshig/ rdo rje rol pa'i don na nu bo// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// mtshon cha
102b5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i yig 'bru 'bros// rgyu drug ngo bo rtsad nas gcod// hUM/ lnga'i phung po rnam par spros// ye shes rno dpal mtshon chen po// chos nyid bdal ba'i glong nas 'phro// thabs mchog
102b6(rnying rgyud): dbyigs gi rtsal shugs las// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha char ltar 'bab// yi ge ye shes mtshon cha'i char// rdo rje lce yi shugs kyis dbab// rin chen gter gyis longs spyod rnams// rtog pa'i ri bo
102b7(rnying rgyud): gzhom pa dang // dug gsum phung po gzhig pa'i phyir// 'khor lo lcags kyu la sogs pa// rten dang gsang chen til mchog dang // dngas ma la sogs sgo kun rnams// so so'i cha ru phye nas ni// thugs rjes
102b8(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs spyod ba yi// so so gnyer gyi rang bskal du// phyag rgya so so'i skas su gdab// de ltar rdzogs par gyur pa dang // maN Da la kun gyi tshad 'dra la// dbus su thig bani le tshe dgu/ mtha' bskor 'al
103a1(rnying rgyud): lo'i brtsibs brgyad bya// de la sgo bzhi sgo khyud bya// mtha' zang bskal pa'i me ri bri// dbus su dkar dmar kha sprod bri// phyogs mtshams brgya du khaM brgyad bri// 'khor lo'i// 
103a2(rnying rgyud): bar mtshams mu khyud la// nang du bltas pa'i khaM brgyad gsal// rtsibs la nang du lta ba brgyad// mu khyud brgyad la phyir lha brgyad// gru chad bzhi la nang du lta// thig le rnam bzhi bri bar bya// phyi rim par
103a3(rnying rgyud): khyams de dag la// thig le nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// phyi ru lta ba bri bar bya// bskal pa chen po'i me khyams la// thig le phyir lha bcu gsal bri// de la phyag rgya rim par dgod// maN+Dal sgo ru bam chen cig/ glu bro ga/ 
103a4(rnying rgyud): gyis rnam sbyangs te// dbus su bzhag te shar du bstan// de yi phud po gzhal yas khang // b+h+rUM las bskyed de gsal bar bya// // de ru phyag brgya'i tshogs chen bsgom// rdzas kyi gnas rnams
103a5(rnying rgyud): so so la// rigs kyi lha rnams rim par dgod// de nas rdo rje bsnyen pa bya// byin phebs rtags lung mgu ba na// bam de byang / shar mtshams su bsgral// rdzas rnams so sor sngos nas kyang/ 
103a6(rnying rgyud): phyag brgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnamasu// ma nor bar yang dgod de sbyar// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod dgu la// rma du byung ba dgu bkod de// 'bar ba chen po'i gnas gnasu// brjid pa'i tshul du gsal bar bsgo
103a7(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gzhan yang rdzogs par dgod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang chen zla gam skar tshogs bkram// rdo rje mi phyed dgur 'bar ba// che ba dgu yi khyad par las// dpal chen dgu ni sku
103a8(rnying rgyud): la rdzogs// yum chen dgu ni dbyings la rol// dpal be'u dguni thugs la 'bar// 'byung chen dgu ni glong du 'khyil// khu byug dgu ni rang skad rdzogs// ban da dgu ni dpal dang ldan// zla gam
103b1(rnying rgyud): ni yum gyi dbyings// thig le dgu ni byang chub sems// nyi zla dgu ni 'od 'phro 'bar// de ltar dgu dgur gsal ba yi/ dgu glong bla ga gcig gi dang // dgu bkag gcig bye thig le'i don// thams cad
103b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa rgyas byas la// bam dgu phan cad sman du sbyar// rdzas kyi dngos grub blangs te spyad// ces bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun du
103b3(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i mdo las rmad byung rdzas kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni mngon
103b4(rnying rgyud): sum du shes shing rig par bya'o// mngon sum gang zhe na/ dran pa ma don du bzhag pa'i yul la mi gnas pa'i chos thams na dad dang / phyis 'byung ba'i chos thams cad dang / sngon du byung ba'i
103b5(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad mngon sum mar rig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon sum mar shes pa ni ye shes chen po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyiraro// de yang ji lta zhe na/ chos thams cad rgyu ma'i rang
103b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du dran pa mngon du bzhag na mngon du gyur pa ni chos nyid phyin tsa ma log par shes pa yin// chos nyid phyin ci ma log par mngon du gyur na mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po nyid de yino// de bas
103b7(rnying rgyud): na mngon par shes pa rnams dran pa mngon sum mar yid la byos shig/ de skad ces gsungs pa dang // mngon shes rig pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma
103b8(rnying rgyud): bar shes pa ni bdag cag rnams kyis dam tshig lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rnams kyis dam tshig bsha du gsol zhes zhus pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
104a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin chen po rnams ye shes chen po'i rgyu mngon par shes pa ni rnam pa lngar rig par bya'o// mig gi dbang po thams cad las// zhib du btags pa'i phye mar bya// bcu
104a2(rnying rgyud): snying por sbyar byas nas// mthong ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na// thams cad ma lus mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni mig gi mngon shes so// rdo rje lce yis rjod pa'i tshig/ dus sam rgyun tu brjod par
104a3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// badz+ra tsak+Shu gar+b+ha bid+yA hUM// rna ba'i dbang po thams cad kyang // btags sam phye mar byas nas ni// bcud kyi snying po sbyar byas te// thos pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas nas// sgra yi bye brag thams cad
104a4(rnying rgyud): thos// 'di ni rna ba'i mngon shiso// rdo rje tshig tu rtag pa ni// badz+ra gar+b+ha sta ma si hau// sna yi dbang po thams cad kun// bskams sam phye mar byas nas ni// bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te// dri
104a5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs dang bsres pa las// tshor ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na// sna yi mngon shes thob par 'gyur// rdo rje tshig tu gzung / ba ni// badz+ra na ma si te hUM// lce yi dbang po thams cad kun bas/ 
104a6(rnying rgyud): sam phye mar byas nas ni// bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te// ro ya mchog la sogs pa las// ro yi snying po 'bum bzlas te// smra byed lce yi dkyil 'khor ni// stegs bu khru gang gru bzhi la// dbus su
104a7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i rdo rje bri// mtha' ma lce yi pad+mas bskor// lce la tshig gi 'od zer 'phro// smra ba'i bsgrub pas 'di rdzogs na// smra ba'i dbang po kha dbye zhing // ro rnams thams cad shes par 'gyur// 'di ni lce
104a8(rnying rgyud): yi mngon shes yin// rdo rje tshig tu rtag pa ni// badz+ra pa sha sid+d+ha hUM/ snying kyi dbang po thams cad kun// bskams sam phye mar byas nas kyang // snying po mchog dang sbyar byas shing // dran pa'i snying po 'bum
104b1(rnying rgyud): bzlas shing // dpal be'u tsi ta'i dkyil 'khor nas// dran pa'i rten gyis yongs bskor te// snying gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // dbang po thams cad gsal ba dang // thams cad ma lus shes par 'gyur/ 
104b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyi sems ni shes pa'i mchog/ badz+ra tsi ta ta sing+ga hUM/ lus kyi dbang po thams cad kun// btags sam phye mar byas nas ni// sra mkhregs bcud dang sbyar byas te// reg bya'i snying po 'bums/ 
104b3(rnying rgyud): na/ lus kyi mngon shes thob par 'gyur// mngon shes 'di dag kun rdzogs na// mi gnas ye shes chen po'i rgyu// phra mo'ang nan tan mchog tu bya'o zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje ba/ 
104b4(rnying rgyud): ba kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mngon shes rig pa'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so// 'dus
104b5(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i tshigs mchog chen po'i bsgrub lugs ni 'odadi ltar rig par bya'o// don la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas// la kyi stegs bu chag byed pa// me ris bskor te 'bar bar bya/ dkyil
104b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor de'i maN+Dal ni// sum rtsegs byas pa'i dbus zla gam// brgyad kyis mdzes par bya ba'o// phyi mtha' thod pa'i phreng bas bskor// de mtha' me dpung 'bar bas bskor// de'i phyi mtha' dmar chen rtsa
104b7(rnying rgyud): zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar// zla gam brgyad la gnas bdag brgyad// mthing nag ya tha me rir 'bar// de 'og thod pa tshar gsum dang // sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis bskor// sgo rtseg sgo khyud
104b8(rnying rgyud): tha ma bran// thams cad gang yin de ltar sbyar// phun sum tshogs par gyur pa na// rnam bzhi las kyi maN+Dal brtsam// 'jigs byed bskal pa'i dkyil 'khor du// za byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// thar
105a1(rnying rgyud): pa tsar bsgral ba'i phyir// drod ldan man ngag 'chang ba des// mchog gi byin brlabs bzhag par bya// dag pa gsum gyis gzhung bsrang nas// gnas mchog dben pa'i
105a2(rnying rgyud): bo rtse// rna nyan phag sag can dang bral// 'du 'dzi 'gro 'ong chad pa dag/ gsang chen spong ba'i gnas su shis// rnam bzhi las kyi rtags nyung na'ang // gcig gnyis ldan na 'bring du bshad// bsgrub pa'i
105a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po gdeng ldan pa// shin tu brjid cing sran tshugs pa'i// khu 'phrog rtog bral brtul zhugs can// las kyi phreng ba lhag tshad med// dri zhim dag pa'i sman dag gis// phyi bkru shi ni 'da'
105a4(rnying rgyud): hu las// nang yang dag pa chen por bya// tshad mar sbyar ba'i ba dka' dang ni// ldan nas dus btab shin tu brtsam// de ya dra rtag pa'i gal chen ni// bkra shis mdzes dang ldan 'gyur ba/ 
105a5(rnying rgyud): bong tshod lo ni dar la bab// rigs lnga'i mtshan dang ldan/ ba la// bsgral ba'i rdzas su rung ba dag/ yid 'ong 'a/ khyor ldan btsal nas ni// bsgrub pa'i rdza su bya ba de// de 'dra'i/ 
105a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan rtags yod pa ni// sa sbyangs sa la slebs pa'o// bsgrub pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni// 'da' hu man 'das dbang po bsgyur// rdo rje phra mkhan phab nas ni// snang srid thams cad dri ba 'am/ 
105a7(rnying rgyud): legs nyes thams cad dri bar bya// dbang po sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor du// bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i thig le gdab// rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo lnga ru// so so 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams gdab// so so rigs/ 
105a8(rnying rgyud): kyi phyag rgyas gdab// phyag brgya bkod de nyon mongs bsgral// bsgral sbyar thams cad sbyangs nas ni/ mchod dang mnyes dang dam skongs dang // dngos grub rnam gsum gang thob blang // thob nas thams
105b1(rnying rgyud): cad ci bder spyad// ces gsung so// de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs bar du gcod pa thams cad bzlog pa'i sgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar rig par
105b2(rnying rgyud): bya'o// gom ma bzhin du las brtsams nas// thar pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni// rus pa rdo rje thal bar bsgrub// rus pa'i tshogs ni thams cad kun// bsregs dang lce pog nag por sbyar// khyab 'jug ga'u kha
105b3(rnying rgyud): sbyar du// bcug ste 'joms pa'i phyag brgya dang // drag po sngags kyis bsgrub byas nas// grub na rnal 'byor don ldan gyi// bar chad zlog pa'i gnyen por sbyar zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdoH/ 
105b4(rnying rgyud): bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje thal chen gyi bsgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / dre nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus
105b5(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i tshogs phra thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// / maN+Dal gru bzhi pa gcig la// zla gam sgo cig rdo rjes/ bskor// mtha' khyud sgo bzhi ldan par bri// rgyu mchog dbang ngo
105b6(rnying rgyud): phyed ldan shis// phyi'i khrus rnams byas nas ni// shar du kha bston dbus su gzhag/ lce la gzungs thag sna lngas gdags// rnal 'byor rnams kyis bskor bar bya// phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par
105b7(rnying rgyud): dgram// de yi khong du gzhal yas bskyed// rim par brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// 'bar ba'i 'byung chen 'bar ba lnga// don gyi lha mo lnga ru gsal// kun gzhi kun tu bzang mor gsal// de yi
105b8(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi khong thag tu// thig le zla ba nya rgyas la// ye shes sems dpa'i tshon gang pa// thugs kar nor bu rin chen 'bar// dbus su nyi ma'i ga'u la// dpal be'u yungs 'bru'i bum pa la// hUM dmar
106a1(rnying rgyud): til 'brur gnas pa ni// bde chen byang chub sems shes bya// rdo rje gsang zag rgyun mi gcad// rdo rje kha brag dab par bya// de nas mtshan byung gyur na// ngos gru
106a2(rnying rgyud): tede bsgral la// bskams te bdud rtsi rtsa bar bya// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchog phran thabs kyis bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun
106a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungaso// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni rgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir nan/ 
106a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu ma ni dngos por snang yang rang bzhin med pa yin te/ rang bzhi/ don med pa'i don ni chos nyid rdo rje yi no// de bas na sgyu ma'i chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas 'khor de su
106a5(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs bdag rgyu ma mkhan zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis dam tshig ni sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul la gnas shing sbrum
106a6(rnying rgyud): che du bgyid lags kyis bdag cag rnams kyi don che du sgyu ma'i chos thams cad bshadu gsol zhes gsol ba las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshogs bdag chen po sgyu ma'i tshe drus
106a7(rnying rgyud): ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// chos rnams thams cad sgyu mar snang // sgyu ma'i rang bzhin stong pa ste// stong pa'i don rnams gang yin pa// mi 'gyur mi shig rdo rje'i don// stong pa nyid la sgyu ma yi/ tshe// 
106a8(rnying rgyud): 'phrul bye ba mang po 'byung // de bzhin sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul yang // gyi nad tsam gyi rgyu rkyen las// cho 'phrul gzugs ni tha dad snang // snang yang dngos por ma grub ste// 'gyur 'jig med pas rdoH/ 
106b1(rnying rgyud): don// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyang // rde'u dang shing bu'i rgyu dag las// sman dang sngags kyis rkyen sbyar nas// 'bras bu sgyu ma'i tshe 'phrul 'byung // sgyu ma'i gsang tshig sbyor ba ni// sgyu ma'i bdag
106b2(rnying rgyud): pos 'di skad bshad// rgyu la 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la// she'u re ru sman gyis btab nas ni// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor bar bya// she'u re'u i na ya// a mo kha a 'gus sa 'gus// chag shi
106b3(rnying rgyud): dag gis brdabs byas na// ji ltar 'dod pa sna tshogs bya// bsdu bar 'dod na slar zlog bya// de na sgyu ma'i g.yang ba can// drang ba'i thabs kyis dkri bar bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig
106b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i mdo las sgyu ma rdo rje'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad dpa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshigs
106b5(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya 'o// phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan nas// stegs bu kun tu gru bzhi la// mu khyud gcig tu bskor nas ni// zla ba
106b6(rnying rgyud): kham pa'i dbyibs su sbyar// sgo bzhi gru chad bzhir ldan bya// dbyibs kyi thig le zlum po la// rdo rje dang ni nyi mas bskor// dbus su ban da dpal ldan la// dpal chen yab yum sbyar la gzhag/ 
106b7(rnying rgyud): tshal bu brgyad la gnas brgyad sbar// lte ba bskor te rim par gzhag/ thig le shar gyi sgo gang du// rdo rje rnal 'byor gsang ming dang // dngos grub gsol bya bris la gzhag/ mchod pa'i khyam su
106b8(rnying rgyud): gyur pa la/ bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa rnams// rim pa bzhin du mdzes par dgra/ rdo rje rnal 'byor de dag rnams// rdo rje lhag pa'i rtags kyis mtshan// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas
107a1(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs mchod pa kun bsogs te// 'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang // dbang bskur las rnams kun rdzogs nas// rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dang // cha gsum dag pa
107a2(rnying rgyud): sbyin bsreg bya// bar ma mi zad gter du sba// byang chub sems kyi chu bo dang // chos nyid na mkha'i dbyings chen dang // b+ha g.yum gyi sa gzhi la// shin tu sba ba'i tshul du sbyar// cha cig gzhal yas shar
107a3(rnying rgyud): nas// bcu gsum gcal bar stegs bu bya// der ni gnas bdun gtso rnams kyang // de bzhin bcu gsum lan re la// gnas kyi 'gron ni ma sring rnams// bdun bcu bar du kun rdzogs bya// tha mar/ 
107a4(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal zla gam la// nus na mkha' 'gro na mkha'i ho ma// rdzogs bya ma lus de mgu bya// lhag mar gyur pa kun rdzogs bya// / snyigs mar gyur pa thams cad kyang // sba 'am bsreg gam/ 
107a5(rnying rgyud): chu klung 'dor// rdo rje gnas chen de bsrungs te// gnas ni sba phyir su dag gsang // ma rig phyir na mtshan ma dag/ rang rang gnasu slebs par bya// gang dag 'du 'tshe'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni tha/ 
107a6(rnying rgyud): gcig pa yi// bsgrub lugs yin par rgyal bas bshad// 'di dag sgrub pa'i skyes bu ni// zla ba'i 'khor lo la gnas nas// nyi ma'i 'khor lo thog nas ni// yang dag chos kyi dbyings nyid la// dbang sgyur
107a7(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur zhes gsung so// yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// 'di yang rims kyi gong ma ltar// thams cad tshul bzhin sbyar byas/ 
107a8(rnying rgyud): nas// phyir kun tu gru bzhi la// thig le zla ba gcig tu bya// de la srad bu bzhi bsnol bas// le'u che dgu ru gyur par bya// phyi rol mu khyud thod pas bskor// gru bzhi gru chad rab mdzes brgyan// de mi
107b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' zang khyabs gcig la// sgo gdod sgrub pa po la lta// dbus su thig le dkar dmar la// kha sbyor bar dag rdo rjes 'brel// der ni dpal chen yab yum bzhugs// byi mtshams le'u
107b2(rnying rgyud): de brgyad la// zla gam brkyang ba brgyad byas te// ye shes gnas kye ma brgyad dgod// phyi rol sgo gcig khyams de la// bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes par dgram// bsam bya bsgrub pa la sogs
107b3(rnying rgyud): kun// thams cad de bzhin 'dir sbyar bya// 'di ltar grub pa'i skyes bu gang // chos kyi rgyal por gyur pa ste// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// skyes bu chen por de 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so// de nas
107b4(rnying rgyud): yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des cho 'phrul thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byo ra ba// 'di yang thams cad de 'drar sbyar// kun tu gru bzhir
107b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'gyur ba// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag tu bya// glu chad bzhi ma phyi rol du// sgo bzhi dag dang ldan par bya// phyi khyams/ dmar nag me ri glong // shin tu brjid cing 'jigs par bri/ 
107b6(rnying rgyud): thig le dbus kyi snying po la// zla gam 'bar bas mtshan par bya// rtsibs mchog brgyad la zla gam ni// nang du lta ba de brgyad bri// brtsibs mtshan brgyad la'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje sgo ma bzhi rnams
107b7(rnying rgyud): te// phyag rgya rim par bkram byas nas// bsgrub pa'i las rnams kun rdzogs bya'o// de ltar grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las// 'das pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad las
107b8(rnying rgyud): dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje dkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las thig le sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// 
108a1(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa' rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor rnams dregs pa can gyi tshogs thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na 'di ltar/ 
108a2(rnying rgyud): rig par bya'o// 'di ni byas la sogs pa'i las// 'di ltar sbyor dang phun sum tshogs// thabs la mkhas dang yo byad dang // ji ltar rig par 'di sdu bya// de nas mi rtul 'dra cig la/ dung
108a3(rnying rgyud): khrod mgo ma yang du bya// zur bzhi maN+Dal bzhi byas la// bzhi las de bzhis chags res bstod// de nyid ma tang gzugs su bya// snying ka man chad dbus su bsnol// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'og tu ga / 
108a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo 'bar ba'i thig btab te// dpal chen lnga yi phyag rgya bya// khyams gnyis dag gis mdzes pa la// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya bkod// sgo bzhir rdo rje sgo ba bzhi// yan
108a5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas// phyi khyams rdo rje mer bya// de yi/ phyi rol phreng chen gtams// skam dang ra ri rlon pas bskor// de yi phyi rol me gur 'tshub// bskal pa'i bu yug
108a6(rnying rgyud): bri bar bya// rdo rje sgo khyud sgo gang du// gu gu thul dang zar tshags// zhing dang sbrul gyi chun po bri// de nas ban da dpal ldan la// rdo rje dpal gyi yi ge dag/ bris la kha sbyar spug ste gzhag/ ga'u chung la
108a7(rnying rgyud): ral pa can// brgyad bris 'byung ba'i gnas su gzhag/ las byed brgya dang bcu gnyis la// las byed bcu gnyis bris la 'god// thar pa gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du// gdol pa 'byung po nga
108a8(rnying rgyud): rgyal can// chags sdang rnams kyis bslad pa'i rgyu// de yi dug gsum gshig pa'i phyir// don gyi bsgrub pa chen po bshad// ru dra lnga yi tshogs chen te// ting 'dzin ye shes lngas bcom ma/ 
108b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje drod kyis rnam par sbyar// mdo yi sa la stabs gcig tu'o// bgegs kyi bgegs te bgegs chen po// dug lnga rtog pa nyid las skyes// phyed dang gsum gyi dur khrod nas// gzhi rtsa ngag
108b2(rnying rgyud): dang lus sems so// brjid ldan dpal chen dur khrod bdag/ bdag rtog rtog 'joms ting 'dzin gyis// srid gsum ru dra dur khrod// tshogs bdag chen po de brgyad bya// ma rig mun khang sgo
108b3(rnying rgyud): phyed nas// glang chen smyon pa de bzung nas// gzung 'dzin dam po'i rtod thag gcad// dug gsum rnam rtog rtod phur dbyung // ngan song 'dam nas drangs nas ni// nyon mongs dpung rgod de/ 
108b4(rnying rgyud): btul nas// ye shes thabs kyi rnam sbyangs te// nam/ 'i klong du dmigs med pa// bde chen mchod pa'i tshe dgas chen dag/ ro mchog lnga dang mnyam sbyar bas// chos kyi
108b5(rnying rgyud): longs spyod rgyas par sbyar// mnyam nyid bde ba'i snying rje mi sa// dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang // 'khor ba'i dra ba gcad pa'i phyir/ khro tshogs 'bar ba'i sprin 'khros pa
108b6(rnying rgyud): gtum thung rngam pa mgyogs pa'i tshogs// phyag brnyan char chen phab nas ni// 'khor ba'i tha ba spangs nas ni// bde ba chen po'i zhing bzlog ste// byang chub myu gu bskyed nas ni// byang chub ses
108b7(rnying rgyud): dpa'i lo rtog bskyed// dur khrod chen po'i bzhin phyogs ni// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bting // rkang pa byang shar mtsham su bting // nga ni dur khrod dbang phyug che// sangs rgyas sku ste yaMs
108b8(rnying rgyud): yin// thugs rje rnon pa'i dmag tshogs la// ye shes rnon po'i mtshon cha yis// lo tog 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod// gru bzhi kha bzhir rdo rje yi// dbyibs 'dra'o thab ni brtsigs nas kyang snyi
109a1(rnying rgyud): khar 'khor lo'i thab tu bya// rigs kyi yam shing lnga brtsigs te// hom lnga 'brel pa'i las chen brtsig/ thabs chen lnga yi hom khung du// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
109a2(rnying rgyud): yam shing la// ye shes chen po'i me glong du// nyon mongs lnga yi bsregs sbyangs rdzogs// bya bar sbyor ba mtha' dag kun// ji ltar 'byor cing 'tsham par 'os// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgya
109a3(rnying rgyud): po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dregs pa can gnan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus
109a4(rnying rgyud): papa chen po'i tshogs 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zad par byed pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i don 'di ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// 'di yang de 'drar kun sbyar nas// 'khor kha/ 
109a5(rnying rgyud): nas kyi gzhal yas su// khru gang gru bzhi'i tshad de la// bzhi ni 'khor khang khyams de dag/ phyogs bzhi dag tu brtsu ma par bya// dri zhim tsan dan 'de gu gtang // dri spos tshem bu rin chen
109a6(rnying rgyud): phrog sbyin mchod rgyas par de bsham bya// lha yi dge bsnyen rnam pa bzhi// phyogs mtshams bsrung ba'i las rnams bsgo// khyams kyi nang rim phyogs mtshams su// chag phyed pa yi stegs bu bcu// 
109a7(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bris la// sna tshogs rgyu las byas pa yi// 'thun pa'i gzugs bcu dbang bskur te// khro bo gar gyi nang mtshams gcad// de nas ma trang gnan par bya// dregs pa ru dra
109a8(rnying rgyud): can 'di// nams kyang bsgral ba'i zhing yon te// dzaHhUM ba ho/ ma hA shrI he ru ka ma trang rudra ha ha pra be sha phaT/ khacwa phyag rgyas bsgyel nas ni// ma rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas// rnam shes a ru byin rlabs te/ 
109b1(rnying rgyud): gsang chen thugs kyi klong du bstim// sbubs ni gzhal yas 'bar bar bya// stegs bu ma trang gzugs 'dra la// 'gyel thabs bzhin phyogs ci 'drar bya// kha dog sngo skya gan rkyal thabs// che chung tshad
109b2(rnying rgyud): med gnas kyi sbyar// de yi snying khar bang rim gsum// dang por dmar po gru bzhi brtsig/ gnyis pa mthing nag gru gsum bya// gsum pa smug nag zla gam bya// yan lag bzhi dang mgo mtshan drug/ gsang
109b3(rnying rgyud): sgo gnyis te brgyad dag la// stegs bu chag byed gru bzhi brgyad// de yi mtha' rim yongs zad du// zla gam gsal ba'i maN+Dal bya// de dag me klong 'bar bar bskor// ya thog zla gam steng dag tu// dpalang
109b4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i lha mchog bzhugs// mthing nag gru gsum dme dpung bri// gru bzhi'i dmar po bang rim la// rigs pa/ zhi lha mchog dpal ldan gzhag/ yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yen
109b5(rnying rgyud): brgyad// dbang phyug gnas kyi bdag mo brgyad// bri bya yang na mtshan ma gzhag/ tshigs chen brgyad la yul bdag brgyad// ji ltar 'os pa de ltar bya'o// sgo bzhir gsang ba sgo
109b6(rnying rgyud): mar gzhag/ mtha' zad yongs kyi zla gam la// bud med nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhag/ ming ngam mtshan ma brten te gzhag/ de yi kha la thab tu brtsigs// pad+ma dpal be'u dbyings 'dra thab// mkhas pas
109b7(rnying rgyud): yam shing brtsam par bya// bya ba'i bya ba thams cad kun// gong du sbyor ba de ltar sbyor// zhes gsungs so// // rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'khor ba thams
109b8(rnying rgyud): cad sgrol ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des dug gsum thugs su dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di gsungs so// 
110a1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// dug gsum dbang du sbyar ba yang // 'di ltar khong du chad par bya// dug gsum rang bzhin gang yin pa// sku gsum nyid kyi ngo bo ste// gzhan nas
110a2(rnying rgyud): btsal ba ci yang med// de ltar shes par 'gyur ba dang // kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar bsgyur// thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar la// stegs bu 'dom gang ba zhig la// phyir dmar po rgyas par bya// de nas
110a3(rnying rgyud): thing nag gru gsum brtsig/ de nas dmar nag zla gam bya// zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar// dbang phyug gnas brgyad zla gam mtha'// bang rim par la du khrod 'bar// mtha' mar dmar po gru bzhin
110a4(rnying rgyud): sgo bzhi sgo srungs bcas par bya// de yi mtha' ma me ris bsko// khro bcu 'bar ba'i rtags rnams dgod// bsgrub dang 'jug dang dbang bskur rnams// gong ma bzhin du spyan pa
110a5(rnying rgyud): bya// des ni thams cad rdzogs pa yin// dug gsum thams da zil gyis gnon// zhes gsungs so// // rgyu de kyi la po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dug
110a6(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des bud med thams cad dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
110a7(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chags pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'dod na 'di ltar bya'o// bud med chags pa'i rang bzhin te// chags pa khrag gi rgya mtsho yin// las
110a8(rnying rgyud): kyis 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bying // chags las rnam grol 'gog pa ste// chags pa de nyid khrag ces bya/ khrag gi rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir// bud med khrag
110b1(rnying rgyud): gi rgya mtsho rnams// 'tshe ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bsgyur// de ltar shes par gyur pa dang // kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar sbyar// las kyi brtsam pa phun sum tshogs// rim pa bzhin du brtsams nas
110b2(rnying rgyud): kyang // maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// 'khor lo bzhi yi thig tu gdab// mu khyud phyi rim gru chad bzhi// de nas sgo khyams dmar por bya// kun gyi phyi rim lag chu hA'i// mi ri 'bar bas gtib
110b3(rnying rgyud): thag gcad// dbus su shar lta zla gam bri// ban da dpal ldan yab yum dgod// 'khor lo bzhi la rigs bzhir ldan// bar khyams gnyis la gnas yul rnams// zla gam thig ler ldan
110b4(rnying rgyud): par bya// sgo khyams sgo bzhi zla gam bcas// phyi khyams la/ ga chu hwa yi me// me yi khro bo thig ler bcas// du khrod rgyan gyi kun brgyan bya// ting 'dzin rdzogs dang dngos grub dang / 
110b5(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa dbang bskur dngos grub rnams// gnas gsung la sogs rdzogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// // rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las
110b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dbang sgyur gyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa chen po'i tshigs chos
110b7(rnying rgyud): thad ni bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi don rtogs na ni 'tsho ba chos nyid kyi rtsi yin// ma rtogs na ni 'chi ba 'khor
110b8(rnying rgyud): bapa'i dug yin// de bas na chos 'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o// de ltar shes nas kun rdzob du 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o// ji bzhin 'byung ldan bde sbyar nas/ ma trang
111a1(rnying rgyud): khog pa'i snying ka ru// mngom gang tshad dang 'thun pa la// rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i 'khor lor gdab// me yi 'od kyis bskor bar bya// rdo rje rabs bskor ba yi// 
111a2(rnying rgyud): mtha' ma sgo khyud 'bar bar bya// dbus su rin chen zur brgyad bya// der ni phyag rgya 'bar bar dgod// lang ka bsgral ba'i gnas mchog 'dir// ral pa can gyi tshogs 'dus te// rak+Sha 'joms pa'i
111a3(rnying rgyud): mthu chen kun// srid pa gsum ril 'dir sgrol ba'o// dus bzhi mchod pa'i dam rdzas kyis// de dag ji ltar rig par mchod// dus bzhi bcud smin snying po yis// dngos grub chen po'i rdzas su bya// 
111a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdzas chen rnams// rma du byung ba'i ral pa can// 'byung ba lnga la dbang bsgyur mdzad// 'byung ba lnga yi/ cho 'phrul sgrub// dbyar chu ston me dgun sa ste// dpyid rlung nas/ 
111a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' gsang bar sbyar// cho 'phrul de la dbang thob nas// de dag ral pa can la bsgrub// ting 'dzin rnam pa lnga gsal bas// 'byung lnga las byung sha rigs lnga/ khyi sha ba lang rta/ 
111a6(rnying rgyud): dang // bya dang ri dgas sna tshogs ni// rdzu 'phrul shugs su sgrub pa'i rdzas// sgrub pa'i rdzas chen 'byung chen lnga// 'jig rten kun la dbang bsgyur ba'i// de ltar rdzas rnams 'byor pa dang // ting 'dzi/ 
111a7(rnying rgyud): sgom dang bsgrub pa dang // thams cad gang dang 'thun sbyar nas// 'jug dang dngos grub dbang chen rnams// ci rigs par ni bde bar sbyar// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi rang byung dkyil 'khor
111a8(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungaso// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// gzhan yang bdud rtsi chen po ni// gong ma bzhin du legs sbyar nas/ 
111b1(rnying rgyud): maN+Dal tshad dang 'thun pa la// pad+ma dmar po 'od kyi mkha'// phyi rim zla gam dmar po bzhi// rdo rje 'bar bas mdzes pas bskor// me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni// zla gam mtha' zad bri bar bya// rin chen ge/ 
111b2(rnying rgyud): sar phreng bas ni// pad+ma'i lce la bskor bar bya// sgo bzhi rin chen 'bar bas bya// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha bkod na// dbus su gser por sul med la// dung chen 'khor ba can gyi sbyar// shar du shel
111b3(rnying rgyud): phor sul 'greng la// rin chen mdzod spu gsal bar sbyar// lho ru rin chen sul mangs la// rin chen lo 'dab rgyas pas sbyar// nub tu rgya phor zla gam la// bzhin mtshams rin chen 'bur
111b4(rnying rgyud): gnyis sbyar// byang du bse phor rgya gram la// gtsug tor rin da chen 'bur bzhi rgyas// rtsa ba lnga ni phyogs phyogs sbyar// sgo lnga'i gtso bo rigasu sbyar// dbus nas shar lho nub byang
111b5(rnying rgyud): du/ ka kau la dang du ru ka/ 'dza ti ba la kha dri zhim// lce bogadakar zhes rim par sbyar// de bzhin gong gi rim pa bzhi na// a ru ra dang ga pur dang // gur gum pad+ma li ga tur/ 
111b6(rnying rgyud): de na ra sa ya na rnams// thams cad rigs dang kha dog dang // las dang 'thun par sbyar bar bya// sa bon lnga ni rim par sbyar// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod nang du// yab yum snying po rim bzhin bya// 
111b7(rnying rgyud): dbus dang pad+ma lce la dgod// gnas yul la sogs mdzes par gzhag/ dur khrod rdzas dang bkra shis rdzas// 'byor pa'i yo byad thams cad bshams// de nas byin bab dngos grub gsol/ 
111b8(rnying rgyud): thams cad rnam par sbyar bar bya// dam pa de nyid gsang chen gyi// rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis// thams cad sbyang ba'i mchog tu bya// de nas khrol bu sbyang ba na// bsal bsngo/ 
112a1(rnying rgyud): bsdu dang dbye ba dang / khrus bya ba dang bshag pa dang // yon+tan brjod dang byin dbab bya// de nas skad cig thang cig gam// zhag cig dag gis sbyar bar bya// rtags dag bya
112a2(rnying rgyud): na der 'byongs pa'o// phyed ma'i mchog tu sbyar ba ni// snod kyi sman rnams shes rab mas// bsdus te btag pa'i cho ga yang // yu gyis bzung zhing yab kyis btag/ rig 'dzin rtsal can dbab cing dra
112a3(rnying rgyud): so so las kyi sngags brjod cing // gtan gtun thabs dang shes rab ste// sman nyid byang chub sems su sbyar// rdo rje glu 'di lha mos blangs// kun tu bzang mo'i gzhal yas su// thabs dang shes
112a4(rnying rgyud): rab ldan pa na// 'khor ba bdud rtsi sman du sbyar// ye shes nga lnga ru gsal ba las// 'bras bu sku gsung thugs su rtso gras// 'chi med bdud rtsis gcod rnying sbyang // mtshan ma btag phyir
112a5(rnying rgyud): gcal nas ni// rdo rje dpal ldan kha sbyor blugs// kha do/ ga rigs lnga'i ras kyis bkri/ rdo rje dbang gi rgya yis/ gdab// rdo rje sngags kyis gzungs kyis gdags// dpal
112a6(rnying rgyud): chen sku lngar mnga' gsol te// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// maN+Dal dag tu dgod par bya// kun gyis bskor zhing dngos grub dbab// rtsi dang sman gyis bdag po dang // rtags ldan rigs
112a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin phra mo dag/ rol mo cha byad mang pos bsten// bsgrub pa 'bru mchog gtams pas dgang // bkra shis gos kyis rgyas par klub// gzungs thag gnyer can rigasu dbul// ting 'dzin me yis
112a8(rnying rgyud): rnam par sbyang // rtags chen lnga ni gang byung yang // sbyor te dngos grub blang bar bya'o// bdud rtsi sgra las drangs nas ni// dpal ldan pad+ma ldan pa ru// thams cad bdud rtsir sa ma ya// mkha'
112b1(rnying rgyud): klong yangs par bde chen rdzogs// rang nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// gzhan nas bsgrub pa ci yang med// 'jug pa la sogs thams cad kyang // tshul bzhin du ni rgyas par bya/ 
112b2(rnying rgyud): zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi bye ma'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa' rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// thams cad de 'drar sbyar
112b3(rnying rgyud): nas kyang // maN+Dal 'khor lo brtsibs brgyad pa// phyag rgya'i lha rnams rdzogs byas nas// sman sbyang btags btsags gtsal nas kyang // sbrang chang 'o mas gong bur bya// bse bar
112b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan ldan nang du bzhag/ legs par kha sbyar ras kyi sa dkri// gong ma bzhin du kun sbyar nas// dngos grub mchog rnams bdag gis bya// zhes gsungs so// bdud rtsi
112b5(rnying rgyud): ri lu'i cho ga rnam par bshad pa'o// de nas yang sem/ dpa'i rdo rje nges 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// skyo ma'i cho ga 'di lta ste// thams
112b6(rnying rgyud): cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas// mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang // phye ma chu tshags nang nas dbyung // phye ma'i mchog tu gyur pa dang // phye ma'i rgyal mo de dag ni// bse phor kha sbyar nang du blugs// 
112b7(rnying rgyud): rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas// bzlas brjod 'phro 'du rgyun mi chad// sbrang chang rgya chang bu ram chang // rgun chang 'o ma la sogs pa// bcud kyi khu ba thams cad sbyar// rin chen
112b8(rnying rgyud): ga'u mtshan ldan du// blugs te kha sbyar rgyas btab nas// 'bru 'du bzlas brjod gong ma bzhin// byas te mtshan ma byung ba dang // dngos grub chen po blang bar bya// phye ma'i bsgrub rdzas de nga
113a1(rnying rgyud): ni cha lnga dag tu bgos nas kyang // rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams las// ci ran tsam gyis cha gcig dang // sbyar chang cha lngar bgos pa las// rnal 'byor so so
113a2(rnying rgyud): cha rnams las// sbyar te dngos grub rten du bya// zla ba gcig tu zos pos ni// baspu rangs shing gnyer ma rangs// zla ba gnyis zos byas na// gzi mdangs thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ zlab
113a3(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi phan yon gyis// nad kyi bskal pa dag las thar// zla bani phan chad gang zag gi/ zas dang ma 'dres brtson bsgrubs na// gzhan gyi nang rnams 'joms par nus// drug dang bdu
113a4(rnying rgyud): dang brgyad rnams la// bdud rtsi bcud kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur// / dgu dang bcu la zag bzang // bcu gcig rig 'dzin na mkhar 'phur// zhes gsung so// bdud rtsi sgo ma'i bsgrub pa
113a5(rnying rgyud): rnam par bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje dra 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje rig 'dzin rtsal lnga'i zas// 'de gu'i cho ga chen po
113a6(rnying rgyud): ni// 'di ltar khong du chud par bya// sbrang rtsi bu ram rgun 'brum rnams// lo yi 'tshe bar sbyar nas kyang // kha dog mtshan ldan dmar po'i ba// lo yi 'tshe bar gzung zhing bsrel// sman gyi rgyal
113a7(rnying rgyud): mo ram mnye bas// rgyun tu gsos pa'i 'o ma de// rig 'dzin zas kyis mchog tu 'gyur// bdud rtsi rgyal mo rab mnye ba// phye ma'i mchog tu byas nas kyang // lo yi 'tshe ba'i sbyar byas te// sus
113a8(rnying rgyud): mthong ba'i sa phyogs su// bsgrub rdzas de dag bkram nas kyang // bdud rtsi bsgrub pa de bzhin bya// dus bab pa'i tshad rnams la// bsgrub rdzas de dag thams cad kyang // ba yi 'o mas lde gur sbyar/ 
113b1(rnying rgyud): cha res skyed cing bza' bar bya// zos pa'i yon+dan bsam mi khyab// zag pa zad nas na mkhar 'gro zhes gsungaso// bdud rtsi lde gu'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o// de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje
113b2(rnying rgyud): des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// 'di yang gong ma ltar byas te// de dang mi mthun bsgrub rdzas rnams// bdud brtsir 'gyur ba'i sman rnams kun// thams cad za
113b3(rnying rgyud): bsdu bar bya// til chen la sogs zhun gyi mchog/ thams cad bsdus shing sbyar byas nas// gnas kyang gong ma bzhin btsal te// bdud rtsi bkram nas bsgrub par bya// 'phro 'du bzlas brjod
113b4(rnying rgyud): rgyu ni mi gcad// grub pa'i rdza su gyur pa dang // sman rnamadas phye mar btags par bya// de dag phye mar gyur pa dang // zhun chen dag dang sbyar bar bya// sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang / 
113b5(rnying rgyud): dngos grub mchog ni blang bar bya// gzhan nam gzhan gyi sde pa dang // lo yis bshugs te 'phrang mi bya// 'tshe ba bdud rtsi zhun gyis sbyar// bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtags chen ni/ 
113b6(rnying rgyud): ba spu langs dang gzi mdangs 'bar// kham gyi zas bral bde bar 'tshe// shes rab gsal zhing thogs pa med// zag pa zad nas na mkhar 'gro// zhes gsung so// bdud rtsi zhun chen gyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o// 
113b7(rnying rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rlon pa'i rdzas la sman bsgrub na// thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas// maN+Dal thig le lnga pa la/ bkra
113b8(rnying rgyud): shis dpal ldan lnga bzhag nas// gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// rlon par bkod nas yi ger sbyang // ting 'dzin bzlas pa'i me sbar bas// dang po ro 'byung skams pa dang // de nas btags btsags gong
114a1(rnying rgyud): ma bzhin// sbyar nas rigs kyis bsnyen pas sbyang // des ni mtshan ma byung ba dang // de bzhin gong ltar tsar bder spyad// ces gsungs so// bdud rtsi rlon sbyor gi sgrub pa
114a2(rnying rgyud): bshad pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las bdud rtsi sman gyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje chen
114a3(rnying rgyud): bopo des bsgrub pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang chen thugs kyi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad do// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad ni dbyingasu shes par bya ba ste/ 'khor ba'i chos thams
114a4(rnying rgyud): cad ni dbyings su 'dus la// mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni ye shes su 'dus so// de gnyis su me dad pa ni chos nyid byang chub sems kyi bde ba chen por 'dus pa
114a5(rnying rgyud): shes par gyis shig/ de bas na chos thams cad ni thugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'dus te gnyis su med do// de ltar na kun rdzob tu 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ gnyis su med
114a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// dam pa'i don gyi chos rnams kun// thams cad rang gi sems la rdzogs// kun rdzob chos rnams gang yin pa// lus dang / 
114a7(rnying rgyud): ngag la rdzogs par bshad// des na chos 'di thams cad kyang // rtsa ba rang la rdzogs pa ste// 'di dag bsgrub pa'i thabs mchog kyang // rnam par rtog pa'i rdul gsal nas// bsgrub pa'i rgya
114a8(rnying rgyud): po yab yum gnyis// don la mkhas par byas nas ni// so so'i thugs la thig le dag/ zla gam dkar dmar gdab par bya// de yi rdzas mchog chen po yang // thabs kyi ga bur chen po dang / 
114b1(rnying rgyud): rab gsang ba'i tsan dan gnyis// dkar dmar zla gam chen por bya// yab kyi thugs kar dkar po la// thig le kha ni mar lta ba'o// yum gyi thugs kar dmar po la// thig le kha ni yar lta ba'o// 
114b2(rnying rgyud): yab kyi thig le'i dbus su ni// dpal be'u dbus su nyi ma bri// dbus su oM gsal nang du hUM// yum gyi thig le'i dbus su ni// pad+ma dbus su zla ba bri// dbus su a gsal nang du hUM// de ltar gsal bar
114b3(rnying rgyud): gyur pa na// kun tu bzang po yab yum du// gnyis su med par bsgyur bar bya// ting 'dzin gsol bar gyur pa dang // rang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi yis// gsang ba gnyis kyi mchod pa bya// rang las byung ba'i
114b4(rnying rgyud): dngos grub dag/ rang nyid la ni bstim par bya// 'di ltar sgrub dpa gtsor byed na// bdud rtsi'i yo byad thams cad dang / bcud kyi mchog du gyur pa rnams// lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas
114b5(rnying rgyud): kyang // bsnyen bsgrub yan lag rnam bzhi las// bsnyen pa dag gi dus su ni// gang zag mi yi zas la brten// de yang lo yi skad cig gam// gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du sbyar/ 
114b6(rnying rgyud): lo yi skad cig bar du ni// bdud rtsi yo byad rnams la brten// de nas lo yi skad cig ni// gcig gam gnyis kyi bar dag tu// rang las byung ba'i rjes rnams lngas// 'phags pa mchod cing rang gis
114b7(rnying rgyud): bza'// des ni dros la gnas par 'gyur// drod thob gyur pa phan chad ni// lo'i skad cig thang cig gis// ting 'dzin zas kyi ro rnyed nas// kham gyi zas dang bral bar 'gyur// drod chen rnam gsum
114b8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas ni// rtags chen dag ni thob par 'gyur// rtags kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni// rin chen phung po 'dod pa na// sa rdo la sogs byas na 'grub// chu dang mkha' la 'gro 'dod na// brtsams pas mi
115a1(rnying rgyud): 'bying thogs med 'gro/ me yi phung po 'jil 'dod na// sdig pa'i 'dzub mo phyar nas kyang // bden pa'i bsgo ba byas pas 'grub// de la sogs pa thams cad nus// rtags
115a2(rnying rgyud): thob phan chad sangs rgyas yin zhes gsungs so// gsang chen thugs kyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud las bka' gsang chen 'khor lo'i
115a3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje rdo rje me glong 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas 'dus pa'i chog
115a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis chos thams cad mo'i rang bzhin du snang bar mtho ngo // de nas 'khor rnams kyis shin tu bstod pa// e ma'o/ sems dpa' che ba che// ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che// cho 'phrul
115a5(rnying rgyud): chen po sna tshogs che// thabs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo// chos kun me glong bzhin du snang // me nyid ye shes gsal kha'i glong // 'bar 'phrogasal bar gyur pas ni// mun gsal
115a6(rnying rgyud): dngos po thams cad bsregs// bde chen dbyings su kun rdzogs par// dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa lags// thugs rje chen po a la la// don grub chen po a la la// sgeg pa chen po a la la// 'jig
115a7(rnying rgyud): byed chen po a la la// dgyes pa chen po a la la// dregs pa chen po a la la// dpa' bo khyod kyis byin rlabs kyis// bdag cag rnams la bshad pa shod// me yi rang bzhin chen po dag/ bdag
115a8(rnying rgyud): cag rnams la bshad par gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa las// sems dpa'i rdo rjes dgyes te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag
115b1(rnying rgyud): kyis khyed rnams gus par nyon// rdo rje me yi las mchog 'dis// rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas// rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsreg skongs// don grub las kyi mchog tu bshad// skye ma
115b2(rnying rgyud): rnam dag hom khung du// chos can skye ba'i yam shing la// spros med byang chub ye shes mes// mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim// rnam dag b+ha ga'i hom khung du// chags pa'i yam
115b3(rnying rgyud): shing spungs pa la// bde chen byang chub me sbar te// 'khor ba'i dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim// dpal chen zhal gyi hom khung du// nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la// ye shes lnga yi me sbar te/ 
115b4(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin rdzas rnams bsregs sbyangs thim// snang srid na mkha'i hom khung du// 'byung ba bzhi yi yam shing la// / phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi me sbar te// snang srid dngos po bsregs
115b5(rnying rgyud): sbyangs thim// las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis// phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas// ji ltar yin pa de ltar sbyar/ shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar// mthing ka nag po thal
115b6(rnying rgyud): mdog sbyar// zlum po pad+ma le'u rtse zhi// 'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas// zla gam grwa chad gzhu dbyibs dbang // gru gsum b+ha ga kha mngon sbyor// sum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes// 
115b7(rnying rgyud): las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis rgyas// ye shes rdo rje'i las rgyud ldan// bla ma gsum gyis thabs mchog sbyar// dag pa'i mtha' 'dzin nyes mchog 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar// mchod
115b8(rnying rgyud): pa gsang ba dus tshogs sbyor// rdo rje lam gyi smon lam sbyar// gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas// ba shar gad ba zhi pa'i lha rgyud dang // rgyas dang dbang ba shar rgyud ba shar bas// lha dang sngags dang / 
116a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya dang // de bzhin rgyud dang 'byor par bya// rigs kyi lha rgyud lha rnams ni// so so'i rigs su bshar btab te// glong yangs 'khyil ba'i com khung du// dam rdzas
116a2(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis// sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg byar 'os// bsreg rdzas skye ba'i chos yin te// skye bar snang ba'i chos thams cad// 'dir ni dngos po bzhin snang te// chos can rkyen dang 'byung nas dang
116a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin nyid las cho 'phrul ni// skye ba nyid 'dod pa yin// 'di ni skye ba'i chos can te// rang byung sreg rdzas rang zhir thim// nyon mongs lnga yi dam rdzas dag/ ye shes lnga yi glong du dbul// phung po lnga ni
116a4(rnying rgyud): dam rdzas rnams// thabs mchog yab lnga'i sku la bstim// / 'byung lngas bsdus pa'i bsreg rdzas rnams// shes darab yum lnga'i glong du btab// rnam shes brgyad kyi bsreg rjes
116a5(rnying rgyud): rnams// ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyadado// yul gyi g.yeng ba rnam pa brgyad// dmigs med dbyings kyi bye brag brgyad / skye bzhi las kyi bsregs rdzas rnams// rnam thar sgo bzhi'i
116a6(rnying rgyud): glong du thim// thabs mchog la sogs rgya mtsho'i tshogs// so so'i yon+tan thams cad dag/ rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang // de dag mnyes pa'i mchod pa brtsam// mchod pa thams cad rdzogs bad
116a7(rnying rgyud): sgrib byang ma byang don chen rnams// grub dang ma grub don rnams ni// me la mkhas pas rtag par bya// me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis// 'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnam drug/ de dag yongasu/ 
116a8(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// gal te mtshan ma mi sdug na// bkra mi shis pa'i rtags yin pas// bsreg sbyang chen po rgyas par bya// de nas 'dod pa'i rtags byung na// me la 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams rnam
116b1(rnying rgyud): gsum gang ltar grub pa blang // ro yi rdzas rnams bsreg sbyangs nas// rol sngags kyi btab nas kyang // shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// rol byug cing bkru bar bya// bdud rtsi thun chen khu ba/ 
116b2(rnying rgyud): yis// ras la byug pas ro bkris te// ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par// sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas// phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag ni// gtsu
116b3(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i phyag rgya rnams// du 'byung ba dang mnyam pa'i// sdong bu'i grangs de ltar bya// sdong bu re la lha rnams kyis// ma nor rtsa ba'i snying po dag/ ras chen dag la bris te gdags// ro yi sbyor ba rdzo/ 
116b4(rnying rgyud): ba dang // ro yi byi shul thams cad la// 'khor ba'i bag chag dkun bkod de// ras sam shing shun shog shog la// 'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod// nyon mongs lnga dang dug
116b5(rnying rgyud): gsum bcas// skye ba'i lam lnga rgyud drug rnams// ming ngam gzugs su byas nas ni// gnas gnas dag tu do/  par bya// khams dang skye mched phung po lnga// gzung 'dzin ming du
116b6(rnying rgyud): bcas pa rnams// brda'i tshul du bris nas ni// ro rnams khyad par dgod par bya// de nas ro yi phung po de// rten nam glegs sam stegs bu yi// steng du mkhas pas gzhag par bya// thabs kyi
116b7(rnying rgyud): cho ga brtsam pa ni// maN+Dal 'khor khyud tsam zhig la// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang yin pa'i// phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag/ thig gis yul gcad so sor bya// de yi steng du shing brtsigs
116b8(rnying rgyud): pa// dbyibs ni gru bzhi gtams pa la// zur bzhi ka ba bzhis brtan bya// sum rtsegs yang thog par khang bcas// mtha' ma shing gis brdzang bar bya// bar khang dag gi glegs ma la// ro yi bzhin
117a1(rnying rgyud): phyogs shar du bstan// ro yi steng gi khang pa la// ras sam shog shog la bris pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsol bar dgod// ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la/ 
117a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje gzungs thag bzhis btags nas// phyogs bzhi bla ma bzhi la dbul// shing gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // shing gi byi mtha' stegs bu la// phyag rgya'i lha rnams rim par dgod// sngags
117a3(rnying rgyud): bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang // rdo rje las kyi bskos gdab pa// rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la// 'khor ba bsreg pa'i mnga' gsol te// ting 'dzin ye shes rtse gcig pas// me yi 'du 'phro rgyun tu bya/ rje
117a4(rnying rgyud): las kyi karma la// las rnams rdzogs pa'i mnga' gsol te// las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya// rdo rje chen po'i bla ma zhig / ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas// las kyi bsags pa
117a5(rnying rgyud): bgrang zhing bshags// rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma yis// bdud rtsi skabs kyi mchod pa sbreng // rdo rje bro gar glu tshig gis// skabs kyi glu gar mchod pa dag/ rol mos drang te dbul
117a6(rnying rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje gnas kyi smon lam ni// skabs dang las kyi 'jug du gdab// rdo rje las kyi ljang 'dzin pas// rtsa brgyad las kyis grangs bzung ste// dkar byang bla ma'i phyag du dbul// ro
117a7(rnying rgyud): yi las ngan ltang 'dzin pas// grangs med grangs su bzung nas ni// mtshan ma nag po byang bu dag/ ye shes me yi glong du bsregs// me yis sbyor ba'i cho ga bya// me yi lha ni gang yin/ 
117a8(rnying rgyud): ba ka me yi sangs rgyas snang mtha' yas// me yi lha mo gos dkar ma// rgyal ba kun gyi 'od mchog ste// 'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing // thams cad kun gyi drong bdag yin// srid gas
117b1(rnying rgyud): bsreg par zhal gyis gzhes// 'khor ba'i sreg pa'i 'phrin las la// thugs dam dbang gis yong mi 'da'// me yi cho ga thams cad ni// yum chen dkar mo nyid la bsgo/ de
117b2(rnying rgyud): nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas// ro yi bsgrib pa byang ma byang // me yi dngos grub thob mi thob// me las mkhas pas gong bzhin brtag/ mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na// bsreg sbyang tsho
117b3(rnying rgyud): ga rgya cher bya// gal te mgun dngos grub thob// ro yi thal ba chen po la// btags nas thal ba'i bdud rtsir bsgrib// des ni bsod nams chen po ni// dpag tu med pa thob par
117b4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod rab kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje me'i cho ga bsgrub nga'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / 
117b5(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des dkyil 'khor thams cadabyin gyis brlob pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sngags kyitshig 'di gsungs so// // sarba ta
117b6(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru badz+ra tsaN Da/ sarba duSh+TAn saM shrI he ru ka ta ka ha na pa tsa hUM hUM/ sa sa sa sa sa ma ya sa nu ne sa nor ba ra badz+ra gar+b+ha/ rang na gar+b+ha/ pad+ma gar+b+ha/ karma gar+b+ha/ mai tri gar+b+ha/ 
117b7(rnying rgyud): ka ru Na gar+b+ha/ lo ke gar+b+ha/ bi du ma gaR+Sha / yak+Sha kA se/ bi shwa/ te shwa/ ke shwa/ pa shwa/ bai shwa/ trakra shwa/ hri shwa/ ka shwa/ bA ka shwa/ ru d+hi/ rag ti/ khA hi/ sa hA/ sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ 
117b8(rnying rgyud): sa sa sa sas sa sa/ sas sa sa sa sa sa/ rba rbarba rba rba rbarba/ rba rbarba rba rba rbarba/ rba rba rba rbarba rba rba/ rba rba tharba rba rbarba/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ tata ta ta ta ta ta/ tata ta ta ta ta ta/ 3
118a1(rnying rgyud): thAthA thA thA thA/ thablas thuzla ba thA/ ba thA thA pra thA thA/ tha zlag thathub thA/ gag ga ga gag ga/ gag gagagag ga// gagagag gagag/ gag gag ga ga ga/ tata ta ta ta tata/ 
118a2(rnying rgyud): kA d+hA k+sha tA sanam ma sa / seM ma sa ma/ mam su sa/ mamams sa rna
118a3(rnying rgyud): baM bAM ba~M/ pA~M dwai r-I baM bA~M baM trA~M/ r-I 'aM Sh+T+r-i R+R-i shA shriM ba~M nA~M nA~M tra~M gra~M wa~M/  che chem che/  tshig te/  'i/  ru du/ rAnadu na/ 
118a4(rnying rgyud): ru ru/ ru ru ru ru ru ru ke/ ke ke ka ka/ kaka ka ka ke ka/ dkaka ka ka ke keka/ kakak+Sha ka kak+ShakA/ ts+tsha nAM Sh+T+r-iH/ 
118a5(rnying rgyud): shwa shwa shwa shwa/ shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shA/ shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shAshwa shwa shwa shA shA shwa shA/ ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ri r-i rai re re ra ra~M/ ri re r-i r-i ri r-i r-i/ r-i r-i r-i ri r-i r-i rau/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha ba/ 
118a6(rnying rgyud): kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu muM/ mu~M mu mu~M muM muM mu muM/ mu mu muM muM muM mu~M mu~M/ mu mu~M mu mu mu~M mu~M muM/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+wadz+ra dzAr+tha/ gau ri/ tsaur/ pra mo/ 
118a7(rnying rgyud): hata be tA li/ g+hasma ri/ puk+ka si/ sh+ma shA ni/ tsaN Da li/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ sing ha/ byA g+h+r-i/ sri la sho na/ kr-i ta/ kang ka kha kha hu lu/ mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/ kha kha kha kha kha kha ga ba/ he he he he he he he he/ bab ba ga
118a8(rnying rgyud): rdzadz+radz+ranga?/ laT phaT la phaT/ wi ts+tsha ba hom Ar+ya te tsa te ma rba shaM stu loka pa/ b+hes+sa ya toho/ pa ba babababababapa la/ dz+ra dza dz+radz+wa dza br-ing+ka tratra dri la la khro mo kro ma kro kra kro d+ha d+had+ya da d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ rlu
118b1(rnying rgyud): nAd+hu d+h+rat+ma/ maN maN maN maN maH/ rkan gan ga la la la la la/ a gar+m+ma/ ya karma/ ra ga ta/ bsnika ta/ ra dza la ko ru d+hi/ dz+ra dz+nyAn/ baM ban d+ha/ ha ka pA la/ d+hA na bar bar/ bung drA kA ya/ ma dA bA// dz+dza
118b2(rnying rgyud): ta/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ e h+ye haM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo dzaHdzaHbadz+ra sa ma ya mu dra hUM a/ badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ tiSh+Tha sa ma ya lhan/ ma hA shrI he ru ka ha ha haM/ sa ma ya ho phaT/ badz+ra Aral+li phaT/ a ti pu ho pra ti pu hi// i buH
118b3(rnying rgyud): d+hu ba kha l-i ti dza ho/ kha raM khA hi/ ma hA ra ka ta/ ru d+hi smika ta/ bai tsa a mr-i ta/ tsita ta/ ba su ta/ go ro tsa na/ DA ki nI/ yau gi nI/ ma hA tsita ta/ kha raM khA hi/ kha kha le/ sha ta ba khA hi/ a la la ho/ sa ma ya
118b4(rnying rgyud): haM/ i da na de na ra gaM/ u tsi ra sa ma ya phaT/ badz+ra sa ma ya A be sha a a/ zhes gsungs pra las kyi 'bar ba'i cho ga zhes thams cad shin tu 'bar zhing rgyas par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po
118b5(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje gsang / sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des sbyar ba phyag rgya'i le'u 'di
118b6(rnying rgyud): rgya cher gsungs so// rnal 'byor mchog gi lag gnyis la// nyi zla 'bar ba'i ling gar ni// a dang pad+ma gnyis gsal te// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyar// mnyam pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa la// 
118b7(rnying rgyud): me'i steng du a nyid gzhag/ bya ba thams cad bral ba'i rgya// a dang ma yi 'bru bcu rnams// 'phro 'du bya zhing kun tu bsgyur// g.yas su 'khyil zhing g.yon du 'khyud// 'di ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu/ 
118b8(rnying rgyud): a dang ma yi 'bru rnams bcu// so sor bcangs te myu gur bya// shin tu bstod de kun tu bsgyur// 'di ni snying por gyur pa'i rgyu// ma yi sbyin pa gtong tshul la// a yis thams cad skyob byed pa// 'di ni/ 
119a1(rnying rgyud): tshad med chen po'o// ku la snyoms pa'i phyag brgya yin// ma nyid khrag 'phrog pa yi snod// a nyid so phreng mche bar sbyar// 'di ni thams cad rol pa yi// / 'jigs tshul
119a2(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i phyag rgya yi// a dang ma gnyis rting sbyar te// sor 'phreng mche ba'i tshul gyis ni// shin tu kha glal pa yi tshul// 'di ni 'jigs byed chen po'i rgya// ma yis bzung ste 'then nas ni// 
119a3(rnying rgyud): a yis gdengs shing 'joms byed pa// 'joms byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin// ma dang a yis mgo 'jug na// bzung ba'i tshul du byas nas ni/ kha yis 'drad cing 'then byed pa// za byed che/ 
119a4(rnying rgyud): po'i phyag rgya yis// a dang ma yis shes rab las// g.yas g.yon tshul gyis bsgyur byas te// so so ji ltar yin thab ngas sbyar// gnas dang yul gyi gtan tshigasu// bsgyur ba gar gyi
119a5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyar bshad// dpa' bo gdan la bzhengs nas ni// phyogs mtshams kun tu bltas byas nas// shin tu 'gying zhing bar+Na/ da par byed// a dang ma yis 'bru rnams ni// so sor brdabs
119a6(rnying rgyud): nas bskur brten bya// 'gying ba'i tshul gyis spyang byas nas// stag gi stabs kyis kun tu bskor// de nas rgun bya stabs kyis ni// gong ma bzhin du bskor bar bya// de bzhin rus sbal gzig dang stag
119a7(rnying rgyud): spyang gi sing+ge dom stabs dang // phag chen dred kyi stabs kyis ni// thams cad thams cad bskor bar bya// de bzhin 'dab chags thams cad kyis// 'jo tshul stabs rnams rdzogs byas nas// dkyil la
119a8(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje dkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las sgyur ba phyag rgya'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// 
119b1(rnying rgyud): de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so// hUM 'byung ba chen po na mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi mdzod// na mkha' las ni 'dod pa 'byung // 'dod pa'i mchod pa
119b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung gyur cig/ zla rgyas la sogs snying po mchog/ ma sa la sogs rnam lnga'i rdzas// me tog la sogs tsan dan phreng // sna tshogs mchod pa 'byung gyur cig/ mi mo rnams kyi reg bya mchog/ 'khril
119b3(rnying rgyud): 'khyud sgyur ba'i gzungs chen ma// dbang po sbyor ba'i dgyes mchod de// bde ba'i mchod pas tshim gyur cig/ rdo rje rol pas tshogs mchod 'di// mchod sprin kun du rgyas gyur cig/ dug gsum
119b4(rnying rgyud): brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi glong du bstab// / dug lnga rol pa'i tshogs mchog 'di// ye shes lnga'i/ nang du thim// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di// dbyings
119b5(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes glong du thim// 'khor ba mtshan ma'i chos can 'di// chos nyid dbyings kyi ngang du thim// phung po tshogs kyi yan lag 'di// rnam grol phung po lnga ru thim// 'byung chen rgyu yi
119b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma 'di// mkha' glong 'bar ba lnga ru thim// rol pa chen po mchod sbyin la// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams rol// bla med bstan 'gan mchod pa 'di// sngon chad rgyal bas bgrad
119b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i lam// dug gsum gting nas gsod pa'i thabs// sngon gyi thugs dam bzhin du bzhes// 'chi med bdud rtsi g.yung drung chu// ro yi khams rnams slong bar byed// dug gi phung po 'joms
119b8(rnying rgyud): byed pa// rtsi mchog sman gyi mchod par bzhes// zhes mchod pa'i tshogs rnams ling long phyad par byung bas rgyal ba rgya mtsho tshogs longs spyod des mnyes par gyur to// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
120a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje klu'i
120a2(rnying rgyud): le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dir ni rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams// bsnyen par snang ba'i dbang thob nas// bsgom dbyings yi ge 'bru brgyad spro// yi ge klu yi rgyan yin te// glu yi yi ge bcu drug
120a3(rnying rgyud): las// yi ge yan lag bsgyur bsdebs nas// glu yi bye brag bsam mi khyab// dang por glu yi don byung ba// oM gyis glu rnams rab tu 'dren// oM yang a yi cho 'phrul te// a ni chos kyi yi ge/ 
120a4(rnying rgyud): yin// a las oM byung rgyal po'i thugs// rgyal bachis kyi dngas las byung // a las aM byung gsung gi mchog/ gsung sa las klu yi yan lag 'byung // dbyangs kyi yan lagaH
120a5(rnying rgyud): bcur grags// glu yi yon+tan bsam mi khyab// sngon gyi rgyal kha glu yis grub// rigs 'dzin rdo rje glu yis 'dren// rnam 'byor dbang phyug glu yis 'grub// bstan pa rgya mtsho glu yis/ 
120a6(rnying rgyud): spel// srid pa'i bu mo klu yis bsten// bdud dang srin po klu yis 'dul// dngos grub rgya mtsho glu yis 'bebs// chos nyid dbyings kyi glong dkyil nas// dpal be'u nyi ma dgu shar bas// rnam pas
120a7(rnying rgyud): sgo bzhi rab gsal yang // ma rig mun gnag 'thibs pa yis// bsgribs par rig pa'i sgo mo bya// 'khor ba'i mun gnag glong rum na// byang chub sems kyi zla shar bas// mun gsal na/ 
120a8(rnying rgyud): thar sgo bzhir snang // rin chen 'bar ba'i nyi ma rnams// dpal chen thugs las 'od shar bas// bag chags sprin mthongs bye ba ru// rnal 'byor thugs kar mer bab pas// mun bsal rig
120b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgo phye ste// rnal 'byor don la 'jug par bya// rig pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// ru lu'i 'od zer sgo phye bas// spros pas cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // srid pa gsum gyi bye brag byed// 
120b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgya mtsho gting nas skems// nyon mongs rgyu drug gnas nas sgrol// dug gsum rtsa ba brtsad nas gcod// bdud dang srin po gdug pa 'dul// byin brlabs dngos grub char ltar 'bebs// ji ltar
120b3(rnying rgyud): dbang po'i sgo phye nas// 'dzum mdangs gsal bar 'byung ba ltar// dpal be'u thugs kyi sgo phye bas// ru lu'i 'od zer yig 'bru shar// 'thing nag ser nag dmar nag ljang // smug nag 'bar ba'i
120b4(rnying rgyud): 'bru rnams// yig ge rigs kyi phreng bar drang // rgyangs kyis/ bskul dang dkar gyi dbab// bsten gos nye bar gyur pa la// / 'jim gos mngon sum gsal bar bya// 'bir kAs
120b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa la// 'dren kos yi ge'i phreng ba drang // de ni da la ni glu drug ste// sha ta ba dang gar ta ba// cang ka de'u dang pang ka de'u// breng nge ba dang dung nge ba// glu yi yan lag
120b6(rnying rgyud): sum brgyas ni// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// klu yi rgyal po 'di drug gis// don grub yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// sha ta pa yi glu blangs pas// gdug byed thams cad spa yang skong / 
120b7(rnying rgyud): gar ta ba'i glu blangs pas// gnod byed thams cad rdul du rlog/ cang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor me ltar mchod// pang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas// drag po gtum po lhan ner/ 
120b8(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// drang nga ba yi glu blangs pas// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'gyed// dung nge ba yi glu blangs pas// srid pa'i bu mo dbang du sdud// yi ge 'bru dgu'i rang bzhin la// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'am
121a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad rdzogs// de bzhin 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// khyams dang sgo khyud gsal ba'o// srid pa mthong yod snang grags kyang // thams cad sngags kyi tshig du// 
121a2(rnying rgyud): yi ge rgyal ba kun dang 'brel// 'khor lo'i sa la nye ba'o// yi ges dmigs pa thams cad 'grub// chags med lhun grub don po che// rnam bzhi las kyi khyad par yang // bya ba med par don du 'gyur// yi ge gas
121a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'phro 'du yis// rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad mnyes// de kun yi ges rnam sprul yang // rang bzhin dngos med chos kyi dbyings// yig 'bru 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul las// dam pa'i ngo mtshar sna tshog/ 
121a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung // de bzhin sgrib pa'i bud shing bsreg/ gti mug mun sa dal ye shes 'bar// rig pa'i nyi ma gsal bar 'bebs// bdag nyid dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs// cing ta dpal be'u/ 
121a5(rnying rgyud): zur brgyad 'bar// rin chen yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal/ dpal chen rin chen 'bar ba'i thugs// dpal be'u swa ga bo zur brgyad las// gser gyi nyi ma dgu shar ba// 'od
121a6(rnying rgyud): zer ru lu yig 'bru brgyad// rdo rje 'bar ba'i rlung sgrom du/ shin tu 'bar 'phro 'khrug byas te// spos pas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gi/ nas g.yas su grang bar bya// go ro tsa na'i gzhal ya su// sen
121a7(rnying rgyud): zlum tsam gyis rgya khyon la// gser gyi nyi mgo'u dgu/ shar ba'i dkyil na yig 'brung gu/ gsal bas 'od kyi gzhal yas khang // dngos po'i bag chags kun bsregs te// sems ni gas/ 
121a8(rnying rgyud): chu zhun ma bzhin// lde ma la 'tsher zhing 'od 'bar ba// rtsal las gyur pa'i zla dkyil 'khor// nyi ma steng na dpal be'u 'bar// de la ru lu 'gro zhing 'dra// dpal be'u tsing ta'i dkyil 'khor / 
121b1(rnying rgyud): yig 'bru 'bar ba'i gzung gas la// dad+mo bar ba yi ga'u 'di// yi ge 'dreng ba 'khyil ba'i gnas// dper na me tog 'bar ba las// bcud len bung bas bcud blangs te// rtsa yi bur bu sog pa
121b2(rnying rgyud): ltar// dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// rin chen 'od kyi me tog 'bar// ru lu'i yig 'bru bcud kyis rgyas// rnal 'byor sems las byas pa yi// bcud 'byin bung ba mang po 'phro// par
121b3(rnying rgyud): ldings yi ge'i bcud phyung nas// tshur ldings sems kyi ga'ur bstims// dang po shel gyi kha dog la// shin tu gsal zhing 'tsher 'bar ba// gnas dgu dag tu zla ba yi// thig le dkyil gyi dpal
121b4(rnying rgyud): be'u la// 'bru bkod gsal bar gyur pa dang // shel gyi bung ba mang po dag/ khyung chen ldings pa'i bong tshed tsam// par ldings bcud phyung tshur gsibs pas// yig 'bru ye shes
121b5(rnying rgyud): me 'bar bas// bag chags bud shing phung po bsregs/ phar spros thugs rjes sa la bskul// ji ltar nyi gzer tshachu ltar// rgyun mi 'chad par rtse gcig 'bar// bar du byi ru'i kha
121b6(rnying rgyud): dog la// gong ma bzhin du bkod gsal la// byi ru bung ba mang po dang // gong ma bzhin du 'phur ldings pas// bcud phyung bstim zhing slar la 'phro// ji ltar me mgal 'khor tshul du// dpal be'u
121b7(rnying rgyud): smug po'i glong du bstim// kun gyi tha mar bsdu ba ni// bkod pa'i gong ma thags cad kun// mthing nag 'bar ba bsgyur nas ni// khyung chen gzan la 'dzums tshed tsam// hUM sgra 'byin cing phan tshun
121b8(rnying rgyud): ldings// ru lu bcud 'byin dngos grub rlob// dran pa'i dkyil nas dza phyung ste// lcag kyu 'bar ba ga'ur bcas// dpal be'u'i dkyil na spungs pa yis// ru lu rin chen phung po dag/ bsdus shi/ 
122a1(rnying rgyud): drangs te gnas su bstim// 'bab pa'i shugs sam byin brlabs ni// mtsho la ser chen 'dril lta ro// 'di ltar yi ger sbar ba'i tshe// rnal 'byor nyag cig ma yin gyis/ 
122a2(rnying rgyud): lha mchog dbyings nas zhugs pa yang // chos nyid dang du mi dmigs kyang // rnal 'byor mchog gi bskul ba'i tshe// thugs rje chags pa'i mdangs phyung nas// srog rtsol dran rig gsung gsung ltar/ 
122a3(rnying rgyud): 'gur chu yan lag 'gul 'gul ltar// rdo rje yi ger 'bru 'bar ltar// gug skyeng glad kor tsheg par phyin// ra rilal khol sgrib med par// ye shes don la mkhyen rig rgyas// de lta mod kyang 'dul
122a4(rnying rgyud): dbang gyis// rgyal ba bskul ba'i sa la bzhes// rnal 'byor/ ra gso ba'i cho ga byed// lha dang gcig tu bya ba'i phyir// bzlas brjod grangs dang bsnyen pa dang // sbyor bas don la nye bar
122a5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// 'di ltar stor ba'i dus dag na// byin rlabs phebla sam nye ba yi// rtags sam drod dam mtshan ma ni// rnal 'byor nyid dang bsgrub rdzas dang // yod mthong sgra thos kun la
122a6(rnying rgyud): 'byung // lus kyi drod dang rmi lam dang // sems kyi rtagasu gsal ba dang // dbugs dag la yang nges par 'byung // shing bal lta bur yang ba dang // mi bde'i gnod pa bral ba yin// rigs pa/ 
122a7(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gsal ba dag/ rmi lam du yang mos par 'gyur// dang zhing dga' la mgu ba skye// gdung ba'i byang chub sems skyes shing // ngo mtshar skyes pa de nyid// 'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang
122a8(rnying rgyud): thob ste// dgag dang dbyung ba ji lta ba'o// rdzas ni 'bar dang 'phar ba dang // dri dang 'od 'byung ro mchog skye// mi zad mang du 'phel ba dang // mngar 'jam dang zhing ro mchog rnyed// lha la mi gnod mgri
122b1(rnying rgyud): la min// zos na bzhin 'gyur lus brtas 'gyur// sil snyan yid 'ong sgra snyan gzugs// dri zhim 'byung ba de lta'o// rdo rje bra rnams bzang ba na// rtags dang mtshan ma phebs pa ste// smar te dngos
122b2(rnying rgyud): grub blang bar bya'o// deng dang ga'u'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje bum pa'i 'phro 'du yis// dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la dbab// yab yum sbyor ba'i lhag sems ngag/ ma phebs pa'i bar du dag/ shes ra
122b3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i lha mo bzhis// lha sta mau long ban d+ha dang // zhing chen phreng ba la sogs dang // kha dog lnga yi dar g.yab kyis// g.yab cing rig 'dzin mang po bod// rol mo cha byad mang po dag/ rdo rje gar
122b4(rnying rgyud): dang snyen pa'i glu/ srid pa'i ma mo kun rten cing // byin brlab das chen po dbab par bya// phebs ma thag tu dngos grub pasti/ dam// 'di ni rdo rje glu 'khor// ye shes rgyan gyi las yino// zhes
122b5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje glu'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu pa'o// / de nas
122b6(rnying rgyud): yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di gsungaso// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir// gang dag 'jug par byed pa'i/ 
122b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rigs kyi bu rnams kun// snod du gyur pa kun bsdus nas// byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed// tshig 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o// e ma bde mchog dga' 'tshal 'dir/ 
122b8(rnying rgyud): bdag cag kun tu 'jug par 'tshal// dga' ba byang chub sems bskyed nas// gsang ba'i don 'di spyad par bgyi// de skad gsol te zhus pa dang // gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis// rgyud sbyangs
123a1(rnying rgyud): rgyud drug las sgo gcad// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun// dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bton te// phyag rgya dbang dang bcas pa'i// 'khor ba'i rgyud rnam
123a2(rnying rgyud): spangs par bya// 'jug pa de yi gnas lnga ru// rgyud drug sa bon bskyed nas kyang // hUM lnga dag gis gnan par bya// bcug pa de yi spyi bor ni// ba yi ye shes la bskrun pa// pad+ma kha bzhi lte ba
123a3(rnying rgyud): lo// mi dang lha'i sa bon dgod// shar lho nub dang byang dag tu// lha min dud 'gro yi dgas dang // dmyal ba rnams kyi sa bon gdab// hUM gis lam sgo gcad par bya// lag gnyis mthe'u chung
