123a4(rnying rgyud): mthe bos gnan// sor mo gsum sbyar dpral bar bsnol// lha dang lha min gnas dag tu// mi gtang bzlog pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis bsnol nas mchan khung bsdam// me'i
123a5(rnying rgyud): nas bzlog pa'i rgya// khu tshur bcangs te 'bru bsgreng nas// g.yon gyi steng tu mnan pa 'di// byol song gnas nas bzlog pa'i rgya// thal mo mnyam sbyar gung tshe sprad// gung mo rgyab du
123a6(rnying rgyud): srin lags bsnol// mgul nas 'dzub mos 'khyud pa ni// yi dgas khams las bzlog pa'i rgya// g.yon thog g.yas kyi rgyab sbyar te// srin lag gung 'dzub gcig nas gcig/ 'khyud pa
123a7(rnying rgyud): dmyal ba'i sgo gcod rgya// lag gi phyag rgya bcas nas ni// ngag gi rdo rje rgya brjod pa// kye ma ru dra kro d+ha kyi hUM// hri sa ma pa tsa hUM/ hri sa pa dza hUM// 'di ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang // sgrib pa dag
123a8(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog gi lha// 'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal mdzad pa// rdo rje can la phyag 'tshalo// byams mgon khyod la srub su mchi'o/ des
123b1(rnying rgyud): gsol ba btab pa dang // rnal 'byor chen po'i zhabs nyid la// 'jug pa de'i spyi bos gtug/ sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang mchog gsung las byung // srid pa gsum
123b2(rnying rgyud): gyis phyag byas pa// dbang bskur snang ba chen po sbyin// A ti ho sta hri da khaM/ de nas gnod du gyur pa dang // gsang ba'i mig ni dbye bar bya// me tog phog pa'i lha yang sbyin// de nas dam tshig chen
123b3(rnying rgyud): po bsgrags// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// dam tshig 'di las gang 'das pa// rgyal ba thams cad bslus pa yin// khrag 'thung kha 'bar ma'i tshogs// khros nas snying khrag thogs pa/ 
123b4(rnying rgyud): 'thung // badz+ra sa ma ya oM ngan then ra ga na// ba ra hri da ya na ma ba sti nAn// sa ma ya rak+Sha sid d+hi bid+ya badz+ra a mri dong khaM/ rdo rje tha tshig chu blung nas// rdo rje gal chen mna' dor ro / 
123b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig sdom pa rnams// thams cad thams cad dpog par bya// slob pa'i gnyer yang dpog par bya// kye rig 'dzin rdo rje bu mchog khyed// rnal 'byor rgyal ba'i
123b6(rnying rgyud): sras kyis yin// gzhan yang gsang ba ma smra shig/ gal te smras na dmyal bar 'tshig/ khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo// rgyal ba'i sras po gdung rgyud 'dzin// gsang ba mchog gi ming sbyin gyis// 
123b7(rnying rgyud): zhing khams kun tu bde bar spyod// des ni sangs rgyas zhing du skye zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes
123b8(rnying rgyud): bya ste/ sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rjes yongs su rdzogs pa dbang gi le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ srid
124a1(rnying rgyud): pa gsum gyis phyag byas pas// bla ma'i sa la gnas pa ni// gsang mchog sum cu rtsa drug yin// phyi'i dbang dang nang gi dbang // bsgrub pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i da
124a2(rnying rgyud): bcu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum dang // rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur// de la dang po sbyin pa'i dbang 'di yin te// oM hU~M sa hri ha/ kun gyis 'da' bar dka' ba yi// tshig btsan yul
124a3(rnying rgyud): la dbang sgyur ba// rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang // sku lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// rigs rnams so so'i rgyud 'dzin cing // rtags kyi mtshan ma chen po ni// sbyor ba chen po'i phyag
124a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan te// dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur// shes rab gzungs kyi gsang mchog ni// don dang ldan par gyur pa yin// mtha' gnyis dag tu mi gtong ba'i// gzungs ma'i rgyal
124a5(rnying rgyud): mo chen mo yin// gnyis med yongasu rdzogs pa na// thams ca da bde ba chen po'i ngang // byang chub sems dang don du 'brel// shes rab chen po rdzogs pa'i dbang // bkra shis chen po bum
124a6(rnying rgyud): pa ni// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i pho brang ste// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur pa yi// dbang chen de la sbyin par bya// gsang ba'i bstan pa rgyas nas ni// yun rings gnas par 'gyur ba yi// bkra shis
124a7(rnying rgyud): rdzas kyis dbang mchog kyang // gnang ba chen po sbyin par bya// don rnams grub par 'gyur ba yi// 'dod dgur re skong rin po che// rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis// rgyal po mchog tu dbang skur ro// 
124a8(rnying rgyud): rin chen pad+ma seng+ge'i khri// bla mar gyur pa'i gdan mchog do// khyad par chen por gyur pa'i dbang // khri chen dag la gzhag par bya// gcod pan me tog phreng la sogs// dbang mchog brjid pa'i rgyan
124b1(rnying rgyud): gyis klubs// rabu rgyan do shal se mod// dpung rgyan rkang gdub lag gdub rnams// dbang thob rgyal pos de la sbyin// dbang thob mdzes pas brjid pa'i rgyal po de// dbang phyug yin pas de la kun
124b2(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal po'o zhes par ni// kun gyis sgra chen bod cing bsgrags pa bya// gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs khyud ldan pa zhig/ rgyal po de yi lag tu bskur nas ni// 'jig rten ku
124b3(rnying rgyud): la kha lo sgyur ba yi// dbang mchog rgyal po 'di yang sbyin par bya// phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rgyal por gyur phan chad// bla med mchog gi rtags dang ldan 'gyur bas// gsang sgo phye nas nang du gzhugs par
124b4(rnying rgyud): bya/ shin tu gsang ba'i rdzas dang ldan gyur nas// gsang sgo gang las 'dod pa'i don rnams zhu// gnang chen po'i rtags su byin gyis brlab// gsang ba'i don la nyan cing slab pa'i dang
124b5(rnying rgyud): dbang thob skal can de la sbyin par bya// bdud rtsi chu 'dis sna ba gsang sgo dbye// sarba ta thA ga ta sta ma ti ho// gleg bam zan mo la sogs thams cad rnams// rig kyi bu mchog de la sbyi
124b6(rnying rgyud): par bya// des na 'gro ba'i don byed nus pas na// las rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sgrub pa'i rtags// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs rnam bzhi'i rdzas// bu mchog de la thabs kyi sbyin par bya// gzhan gyi re 'dod/ 
124b7(rnying rgyud): skong ba'i bu mchog de// rgyal po rgyal rigs rgyud du byung ba bzhin// rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyud du byung bas na// tan tra la sogs dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin// des ni slob ma'i tshogs kun skyong nus phyir
124b8(rnying rgyud): bstan pa sgrogs pa'i sa la gnas bya'i phyir// rdo rje rgyal po dpal gyi dbang mchog 'di// theg chen dgu yi rtags dang chas te sbyin// de ni bla med rgyal por 'gyur bas na// sa rnams non pa'i rtags
125a1(rnying rgyud): mchog gdan khri'i dbang // lha chen la sogs zhing chen nyi zlar bcas// khyu mchog seng+ge ma he gzigs dang stag/ gtum pa'i dom gyis sbar te sbyin par bya// rgyal po yin
125a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun// skye la dbang sgyur rgyal po mnyes pa'i gzungs// pha rol dpung 'joms srid thub 'dzin pa dang // bdag gzhan don sgrub rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan// dgos 'dod yid bzhin
125a3(rnying rgyud): skong ba'i rin po che// rgyal po de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya// de ni rgyal ba'i mchog sras yin pas na// phyag rgya chen po'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya// ras sam 'bur ram lugs su blugs pa yi// 
125a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu'i gzugs brnyan de yi spyi bor gzhag/ ye shes chen po'i don dang de ldan pas// ye shes lnga yi rtag mchog phyag rgya yis// gnas lngar gtugs te thugs kyi dbang mchog sbyin// 
125a5(rnying rgyud): / oM ma hA shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA kro d+ha sta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba ang ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa man ta dz+nyA/ na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA pra ti pra be sha swa b+hA ba
125a6(rnying rgyud): Ad ma kaM haM// oM ma hA e ta hri sha swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi// rnal 'byor bde mchog de yin pas// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang mchog 'di// rdo rje can la sbyin
125a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA be ad ma ko haM// dbang mchog oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsi ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA
125a8(rnying rgyud): ga ta a nu rAg dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko he/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad mako haM/ dbang mchog thob pa'i bu mchog de// don rnams grub par bkra shis phyir// bdud 'dul bkra shri
125b1(rnying rgyud): rdzas mchog rnams// rtags kyi brgyan te sbyin par bya// don rnams grub pa'i bu mchog de// rdo rje dbang mchog thob pa na// zhing khams kun tu grags pa yi// rtsal gyi thig le rdo rje sbyin// 
125b2(rnying rgyud): nang du 'jug pa'i dbang thob nas// de dag kun la spyod sgrub pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya// skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid la// sems kyi dbang bskur thob pa yi// / shes rab chen po rig pa'i
125b3(rnying rgyud): dbang // sems lon don gyi gtan tshig sbyin// bya ba'i mtshan ma kun bral zhing // btsal med gnas pa'i byang chub sems// snying rje chen po bde mchog gis// khams gsum kun la dbang sgyur
125b4(rnying rgyud): sbyin// sbyin gsum 'gro ba'i don rnams kun// thams cad rdzog depar nus pa yi// rtags kyi dbang mchog dam pa ni// thod deshol 'bar ba sbyin par byed// dug gsum gting nas sprug pa
125b5(rnying rgyud): yi// rtags chen ga'u rnam pa gsum// dmar chen dag gis bkang nas kyang // dbang chen thob de'i lag tu sbyin// sri da gsum sgrol bar bya ba yi// dbang mchog chen po sbyin pa'i
125b6(rnying rgyud): phyir/ ka ta ra la sogs mtshon cha rnams// dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin// 'khor ba'i chos la cir sbyar kyang // skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i// rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po ni// rnam dag rdzas
125b7(rnying rgyud): kyi pad+ma sbyin// las rnams rdzogs par gyur pa yi// dbang mchog thob pa'i rtags chen ni// sti ra'i byug pa chen po dag/ dbang thob de'i lag tu sbyin// yum dang gnyis med 'khril ba yi// chos nyid
125b8(rnying rgyud): don dang gnyis med rtags// sbrul nag 'khril pa'i chun po 'di// dbang thob de'i lag tu sbyin// gsang ba sbyor ba'i shes rab ma// dri med rnam dag lha mo zhig/ mtshan ldan shin tu brgyan byas la/ 
126a1(rnying rgyud): dbang thob de la sbyin par bya// dbang thob rgyal po chen po de// kun gyi bdag po yin pas na// rol mo dri dang zhal zas dang // 'dod yon lnga la sogs pa dang // nye ba'i
126a2(rnying rgyud): long spyod rgyan rnams kun// thams cad thams cad sbyin par bya// sgrub pa'i las la dbang thob phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa// rgyal ba thams cad bsgral dang // rdo rje tshe dang sman la sogs
126a3(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa ma lus bsgrub shig ces// bsgrub rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dbang thob de gnyis gcig pa'i phyir// rigs 'dzin rdo rje rtsal gyi dbang // rdo rje
126a4(rnying rgyud): ming ni sbyin par bya// bsgrub pa'i dbang dang rdzas mchog dang // gsang ba'i bdag po yin pas na// gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya// dga' ba byang chub sems chen po// kun tu tshim pa
126a5(rnying rgyud): byed pa yi// dkar dmar lhag pa'i byang chub sems// dab thob de'i lce la gzhag/ btsal med byang chub sems chen po / shes rab chen po'i tsal gyis ni// chos sku sgyur mar dbang
126a6(rnying rgyud): sbyar nas// rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i dbang yin pas// rdzas dang tshig dang gang zag dang // kun rdzob dbang de ma thob kyang // chos la sems kyi dbang thob na// rgyal ba'i rig 'dzin thams cad dang // srid
126a7(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang can thams cad kun// de la dbang thob bskur bar 'gyur// dbang gi tshad ni 'di lta ste// dad ldan sri nur ldan pa la// gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang chen bskur// rnam bzhi las kyi don tshang
126a8(rnying rgyud): na// las rnams byed pa'i dbang thob bo// lta ba'i dmigs pus chos mthong na// rgyal 'theb 'chad pa'i dbang thob bo// rkyen thub tshad ma gsum ldan na// bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dbang / dam pa mdzod
126b1(rnying rgyud): gsum thams cad la// phyogs med par ni 'chad shes nas// rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang thob po// dad med blo zhan rdzob pa che// tshul 'chos mkhan la ras gcod byed// de ni dbang gis 'tshig
126b2(rnying rgyud): par bshad// gsang med brjod ngas dbang mi 'chags// dad med g.yel rmugs dbang mi dgos// snod med bcud bral kun stongs pa// des ni dbang thob ma yino// snod ldan bcud rdzogs dbang / 
126b3(rnying rgyud): thob na// dbang mchog thob pa'i rgyud zhes bshad ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// 
126b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang / sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo dang bcas pa chos thams cad kyi me long yin par
126b5(rnying rgyud): rig nas/ 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu ngam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas bstod pa/ shin tu dga' ba chen po'i glu 'di blangaso// e ma ho// nyes bcom legs ldan/ 
126b6(rnying rgyud): mtshan ni mtha' las 'das// dpag med byams snyoms don gyis bdag gzhan dpal// don dam gsang sbas na mkha'i dkyil du khyol// rdo rje che mchog dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ 'dzin pa mi rtog
126b7(rnying rgyud): rus khrag la rol// thugs kyi gdung thag 'khor ba'i mtha' la rje// yul med ma skyes mtshan ma'i g.yul las rgyal// bde mchog rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// shes rab chen po na mkha'i
126b8(rnying rgyud): nyi mar gsal// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char// dpa' brtul myur ba'i shugs kyis 'gro drug sgrol// rtog 'joms ye shes rdo rje cho 'phrul 'phro// dam pa'i don gsungs gnyis
127a1(rnying rgyud): med ston pa'i sku// smra ba'i seng+ge khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rin chen gter ldan 'dod dgur kun skongs zhing // lung dang rigs pa gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod// brda can la
127a2(rnying rgyud): dag len pa'i me long gsal// rdo rje kun 'dus 'jigs byed rgyal po'i rgyud// chos kyi me long 'di la bdag cag 'dud// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las ngo mtshar
127a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rdzogs so// @/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya gaH
127a4(rnying rgyud): tatA bi ni shwa ya// bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba'i snying po kha na nyid rnam par nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus
127a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu du/ sa gzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
127a6(rnying rgyud): dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te// 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i
127a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon+dan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye
127a8(rnying rgyud): shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad dang so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil 'di
127b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ sngags pa tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs
127b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la
127b3(rnying rgyud): mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par klubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa
127b4(rnying rgyud): kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng+ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang / dadabang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa'i namamakha' lding ga/ 
127b5(rnying rgyud): dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor da gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhal thal le bar gsal zhing maH
127b6(rnying rgyud): ngang dpe byad ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dkyil mo gu
127b7(rnying rgyud): du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
127b8(rnying rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin pa
128a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang 'thing ka dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / leb rgan dang / ljang bu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo ngam pa snang ba'i bya
128a2(rnying rgyud): dang / sra ba'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun me'i tshogs dang gnyis med par chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni/ 
128a3(rnying rgyud): 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhug so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang / byang chu
128a4(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang / mnya na par bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myong bar bya ba'i tshe gas dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub tsha
128a5(rnying rgyud): po rdo rje thos byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / de ltar dang / 'byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms
128a6(rnying rgyud): pa chen po reg pa dang / 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang / 'joms pa chen po reg bya dang / 'joms pa chen po reg shes dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / 
128a7(rnying rgyud): bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshegs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang / gnyi su med par bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang // 
128a8(rnying rgyud): gnyis med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang / thugs dang / yon+dan dang / phrin las rdo rje las phyung // e e e ma'o// de bzhin nyid dbyings nyi
128b1(rnying rgyud): dbang sgyur// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang // rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzin// gzugs brnyan sgyur ma rnam dag gsal ba ni sku gsung thugs yon+dan phrin las sel med pa'i yon tan yid
128b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u
128b3(rnying rgyud): ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa'i rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rje btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mo la 'ju
128b4(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin ga/ shegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
128b5(rnying rgyud): nyid la che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'i rdo rje phung po yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye na rje nga khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i
128b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor nyid// sa bcu spyan dang mA ma kI/ me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas
128b7(rnying rgyud): nyid las gzhan ma yino// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mnyeso zhes brjod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun mo bya
128b8(rnying rgyud): ba mos// chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang / gnyis su med par gyur nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsu/ 
129a1(rnying rgyud): nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga yid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi/ 
129a2(rnying rgyud): btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi gnyis so// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas
129a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med
129a4(rnying rgyud): las thams cad skye// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma ngo ma tshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang nga // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na/ 
129a5(rnying rgyud): pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa kun gyi gsang // gnas pa mdo las thams cad gan// gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos
129a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// oM ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis
129a7(rnying rgyud): gsang // 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med// ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang / mnyes pas khyab par
129a8(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang // 
129b1(rnying rgyud): ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang // gzhan du min la shin tu gsang zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan
129b2(rnying rgyud): nyid yin pas dbyer med na/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas che du brjod pa 'di
129b3(rnying rgyud): brjod do// e ma bder gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnang dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/ 
129b4(rnying rgyud): sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha shA la mdud pa dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye// 
129b5(rnying rgyud): nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshe/ gas mdzad ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la che du glengango // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na
129b6(rnying rgyud): nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang // kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen
129b7(rnying rgyud): po'i byin brlabs shes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang yan man gyi/ 
129b8(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re re thub pa bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad/ bltam pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang
130a1(rnying rgyud): / bka' thub mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs
130a2(rnying rgyud): par sten pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad du gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun
130a3(rnying rgyud): tu gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kun tu don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pas kun tu bzang ba'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang / kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 
130a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu zhal bas rnam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung bsam gyis ni khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grangs med pa
130a5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems
130a6(rnying rgyud): dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur// 
130a7(rnying rgyud): de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'dzin pa 'khrul pa las 'dogs pa dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las kyi
130a8(rnying rgyud): 'bras bus mi gos gos par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ji snyed
130b1(rnying rgyud): rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// yang dag sgyum/ 
130b2(rnying rgyud): tshul gnyisu// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma
130b3(rnying rgyud): yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyu nyid kyang // gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad gcig ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang
130b4(rnying rgyud): sbyar nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// yang dag
130b5(rnying rgyud): rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir khyu
130b6(rnying rgyud): nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu rnamasu rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las
130b7(rnying rgyud): 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pas don dang 'thun phyog
130b8(rnying rgyud): su// ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston min tshig la dngos po med// ces che du brjod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyi
131a1(rnying rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / phrin las rdo rje las byung // a ho// srid rtsa nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus pa/ 
131a2(rnying rgyud): longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmigs bya dmigs
131a3(rnying rgyud): byed med par dran dbang sgyur// ngo mtshar sku gsung thugs dang yon+ta 'phrin las zhing khams las/ gzhan na med de de nyid ltar yin zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas/ thub pa drug
131a4(rnying rgyud): gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshe dgas pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying por kho na
131a5(rnying rgyud): nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas de ba na gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas
131a6(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyingasu chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes
131a7(rnying rgyud): bya ba 'di sku dang gsun thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib
131a8(rnying rgyud): med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun/ spro zhing bsdu ba 'ang de bzhino// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub ste// brtan byung ye shes rgyu yin// a A/ ka kha ga g+ha ga tsa tsha dza dz+nyAH/ 
131b1(rnying rgyud): Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ ba pa ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa hak+ShaH/ i I/ u U/ e I/ o au// 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu
131b2(rnying rgyud): g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos nas/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// hoHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang / 
131b3(rnying rgyud): mi stong gi/ dbu ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra
131b4(rnying rgyud): yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyis// 'phrul chen pa zhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming // ming rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas
131b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston// dngos med yi ge'i rang / bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang // dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshegs kyis// rol pa cir yang
131b6(rnying rgyud): sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa' sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge mgo nas kA la rdzogs// sems kyi rang bzhin
131b7(rnying rgyud): yi ge ste// yi ge'i dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ngo mtshar 'phrul chen rab 'gugs/ 
131b8(rnying rgyud): pa// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tsheg ni shes rab ming du smra// shad ni thabs chen tshig su gcong // a ni skye med de
132a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid// A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid// Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid// Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid// D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul snang bdag nyid// Na na
132a2(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul kun du nyid// tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid// ta ni dra bas bstan pa nyid// da ni dra bas lhan ne nyid// d+ha ni dra bas 'khril ba nyid// na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur// ka ni spun gyis thugs kyi mchog
132a3(rnying rgyud): kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/ g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/ nga ni thugs kyi 'jigs byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog/ dza ni
132a4(rnying rgyud): shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dz+nyA ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ nya ni sku'ang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ phra ni snyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ ba ni shangs kyi gsung gi mchog/ 
132a5(rnying rgyud): b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gyi mchog/ ma ni gsung yang 'jig/ par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dang / pa yin// ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// 
132a6(rnying rgyud): sha ni rtag pa med pa ste// Sha ni tshad pa'ang yod ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul/ 
132a7(rnying rgyud): snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// u ni rdul snyed byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dag su// i ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// oM ni thams cad 'jig par byed// oM ni thams/ 
132a8(rnying rgyud): cad zhig pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng bas bsdus// zhes brjod do// a ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshigs dang / gnyis med pa'i
132b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang thugs dang / yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung // a ho/ thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 
132b2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshegs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i ngam// 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen
132b3(rnying rgyud): yin// ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo
132b4(rnying rgyud): bskor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phro ba 'di ched du brjod do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems / 
132b5(rnying rgyud): ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'a phrul dkyil 'khor ba ni bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor
132b6(rnying rgyud): mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang // bzhi rgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing // longs spyod 'byung
132b7(rnying rgyud): ba ngan song sbyong // cir yang gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub// nam mkha'i rdo rje sra 'byung zhing // 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang // chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te/ 'jig rten khams 'di 'dor/ 
132b8(rnying rgyud): dang / thams cad stongs shing ltung bar 'gyur// dgug dang btang dang bcing dang grol// gso dang bsad dang pham dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i// 
133a1(rnying rgyud): ming tshig gzugs sogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pags pa// dpa
133a2(rnying rgyud): tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med
133a3(rnying rgyud): yid bzhin mdzod// 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtog pa'i dbang sgyur ting
133a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dngas dang dngos me dad pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi/ 
133a5(rnying rgyud): rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// ma tshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog ma yin dbyib ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin nyid
133a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs 'byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad med la tha dad pa'i// nang dang nang gi phyir rol gyi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas
133a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes rol// 'jig med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas gtul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgyas rab bstan na// dngos grub pa
133a8(rnying rgyud): mtshan chen por 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga
133b1(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la
133b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i
133b3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por sprod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams ldan// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin srung
133b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// sing+ga grA da chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha'i lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin por rje// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyas
133b5(rnying rgyud): po rgyal mo dang // g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshigs su bcas// gru tshad la ni mthong byed dang // / thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs
133b6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug dang // mdun dang rgyab na byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyed bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas
133b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// 'thing ka dkar po ser leb rgan// ljang khu la sogs
133b8(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste/ mtha
134a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // yang dag
134a2(rnying rgyud): thar pa'i gzugs sku dang // 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// 'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston// stong nyid sgyur ma mig yor tshul// tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin
134a3(rnying rgyud): dusna tshogs pa'i// de tshe mi 'thun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang // las 'bre'i dbang gis so sor snang // dper na me long chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro
134a4(rnying rgyud): drug thams cad las// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par ba stan// dag tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang dal rnams la bse ru'i gzugs// gzhan yang theg mchog ras
134a5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog du// sku ni rnam bar snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos
134a6(rnying rgyud): rnams mjal bar ston// me long ston pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du sku la
134a7(rnying rgyud): snang // de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung // bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos sku dpag med brjod med// longs spyod zad med rin cher gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe
134a8(rnying rgyud): byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun tu maN Da la// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa ga
134b1(rnying rgyud): drung sbra// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// pad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa rig pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshes
134b2(rnying rgyud): lnga kun kyang rdzogs// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed gcig gsal bar gyur to// de nas de
134b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yon+dan phrin las rdo rje las byung // a ho/ dmigs bya
134b4(rnying rgyud): dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab// / ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi la dang // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i
134b5(rnying rgyud): ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med / ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i 'a
134b6(rnying rgyud): ste drug pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byu'o// / bruM bi swa bi shud d+he/ hUM
134b7(rnying rgyud): d+hI ka/ oM dzau na dzi ka/ sAM rad na d+h+r-ika/ AM A ro li ka/ ha pra dz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ ma d+hA twe shwa rI/ lAM d+h+we Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA ha ra taM/ bI rA ga ra ti/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ k+ShaM ha rA dzA ya/ traM a gan+tha ya/ hri ha hUM pad+ma ba/ 
134b8(rnying rgyud): da ma/ dz+haM ku ru ba na hri/ hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM ma l+ya sa maM ye ho/ hrIM gI ti ra go haM/ a na rte rA ga yA me mA/ d+hA ra swA hA/ thi li sa raM pa ya swA hA/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swAhA/ mu shrI aM raM ga ya swat+ma/ dzaHd+hu/ 
135a1(rnying rgyud): ba pra bi sa hUM buSh+pa a bi sa/ khaM dI pa su khI ni/ ho gan d+ha tsita taM/ hUM ya mAn ta krita phaT/ hUM pad mAn ta krita phaT/ hUM pra dz+nyAn ta krita phaT/ hUM bi g+hanan ta krita/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+hA
135a2(rnying rgyud): ma hA/ kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa lA hUM phaT/ oM ma hA rad na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa rA dz+wa lA ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kar+m+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUMhUM
135a3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra tsit+ta a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa man ta o/ oM mu ne hri swAhA/ oM mu ne hUM swA hUM/ oM mu ne srung swAhA/ oM mu ne gr-i swA hA/ oM mu nai k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ya swAhA/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ruH/ 
135a4(rnying rgyud): ka dri s+ya ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM aM hUM swAhA/ dab pa baM be ga pa ba ba pa ba/ dze dza dza dza dza/ pa pa pe ba ba// se sa sa sas/ pa pa be ba pa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ bab pa pa pa
135a5(rnying rgyud): ya ya ya ya ya/ pa pa pa pa paM/ oM aM hUM swA hA/ ye she sa rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ yon+tan phrin las rmad po che/ de nyid ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ phyag rgya chen por bdag
135a6(rnying rgyud): sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hoHdzaHhU~M baM hoHzhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu tham
135a7(rnying rgyud): cung du khyab par grag so// rab tu grags so// kun tu grag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim pa mdzad do// 
135a8(rnying rgyud): de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dras
135b1(rnying rgyud): las byung ngo // oM ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA A dar sha dz+nyA badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na paH
135b2(rnying rgyud): swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA kri t+ya a nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bAg badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko/ 
135b3(rnying rgyud): haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bu dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ zhes brjo/ 
135b4(rnying rgyud): bas thim par 'gyur/ gsal bar 'gyur/ 'bar bar gyur to// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ 
135b5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung // gsung cig dkyi la 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung
135b6(rnying rgyud): gi phyag rgya'i mchog/ rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// bde ldan gsung gyi don 'byung ba// thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsungs
135b7(rnying rgyud): mchog yin// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang // log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// grags nyid ma
135b8(rnying rgyud): chags dang du gsungs// gsung ba nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin sprin sangs bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis/ 
136a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad go// 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mthon man thams cad kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul bya'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar
136a2(rnying rgyud): gsung rab kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid las gsung ba med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung // ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor
136a3(rnying rgyud): gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams// de bzhin dang las ma g.yos kyang // dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhi no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa lnga
136a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dang / gsang sngags kyi le'u ste 'dun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du lhun
136a5(rnying rgyud): gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di che du brjod do// / sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad bya/ nga chub mchog gi rgyu// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying pa
136a6(rnying rgyud): rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du sprad pa las// sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang mu gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnom
136a7(rnying rgyud): nas rtse sprad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'o'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kha ra dkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsi zhing
136a8(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// muM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta// 
136b1(rnying rgyud): 'bru ba ni sbas nas thugs khar bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi smras nas thugs khar bkan/ 
136b2(rnying rgyud): bsgreng rtse mor dril gsal 'bar// ma 'bru lnga las su 'grol// btud de 'dzum pa'i mangs kyo blta// 'bru bani sgras nas thugs khar bkan// sa bsgred rtse mo rin chen 'bar// zla brtul / 
136b3(rnying rgyud): sras dril gsol zhing // 'khril ba'i 'tshal gyis chos la brtan// 'bru ba zhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// ma bsgreng rtse mer dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khrol// btud 'dzu
136b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar ba/ dan// a sgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dadril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 
136b5(rnying rgyud): 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// bye bsgreng rtse mo/ dril gsol 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ btud 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru ba ni sbas nas rba
136b6(rnying rgyud): khar bkan// hA bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan// taM bsgreng rtse mor
136b7(rnying rgyud): dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga la su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos
136b8(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo rin chen ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi wa gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng dang spos mchog dang // mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril
137a1(rnying rgyud): zhing chos la brtan// dbu rnams 'byor zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sgo ba ni khro bo'i du
137a2(rnying rgyud): rgya ni// ni mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon// thod sbrul chen pos gnon po dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho ta ho// sgo bzhir gnas bai de dag kyang // bdud tshul 'drem
137a3(rnying rgyud): ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin// sregs par dang ni pi wang dang // go cha bo ti rin chen sgrom// me dang chu ni rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos
137a4(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings// kun bzangs mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yu dam 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam// yang na
137a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na// ma bskyod ma bska la thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan
137a6(rnying rgyud): lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur// de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gi/ rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du btsun na
137a7(rnying rgyud): drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam ya su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang // phyin ci log rnams
137a8(rnying rgyud): thams cad dang // zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor 'thun par kun tu ston// dper na gar mkhan nyid dra ba// lus las ma bkod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 
137b1(rnying rgyud): 'di zhes gcig ces brjod med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// bskyod dang spro ba'ang de bzhin nyid// mdor na bsgral bskyod thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// gnas
137b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis mi gnas gnas ma yin// de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yan lag dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis rlab nas phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u
137b3(rnying rgyud): ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shin tu phra
137b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i ste// sor ni bzhi/ yi tshad bya// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang sra/ 
137b5(rnying rgyud): lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga ni rab bsnyams la// rig pas thig na gdab par bya// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi// 
137b6(rnying rgyud): bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la// tsa na'i 'bru tsam pad+ma'i gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge la// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri// bcas bu ras ni sna tshogs dang / 
137b7(rnying rgyud): brgyan phreng bro ba'i btung bas bskor// glu tshig bregar rol mo yi// sprin dpung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// yum dang 'jom sems ma yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i lam bzhin mchod// dbyibs
137b8(rnying rgyud): kha dog mtshan ldan par// zhal du gyur pa'o mo bos la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// shin tu phra ba
138a1(rnying rgyud): pa yis// bsam yas dag la'ang de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs pa
138a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi// sna tshogs rin po che yi bzhi// mdzes pas bris shing spras pa dang // kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu ze/ 
138a3(rnying rgyud): mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal// glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyan sem/ 
138a4(rnying rgyud): do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes dpar brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis// bro gan la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu na mkha'i kham
138a5(rnying rgyud): bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// bskal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na gcig car du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// ma
138a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor sman drang mchod// mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig
138a7(rnying rgyud): mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// sred gsum 'gro ba thams cad la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan
138a8(rnying rgyud): pa yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na
138b1(rnying rgyud): mi gnas mi dmigs pa// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni namakha' bsgom// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bum/ 
138b2(rnying rgyud): des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ 
138b3(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying
138b4(rnying rgyud): rjes chud ma zos par gzung // yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas/ phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni// dkyil 'khor 'dzub gang tshwa du bya// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// yang na sa gzhi rab
138b5(rnying rgyud): bsnyams la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lu/ sa gang tsha ste// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phur bu srad bu mtshon phye dang // gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid
138b6(rnying rgyud): 'ong grogs// thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgribs te bya// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang // nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams
138b7(rnying rgyud): bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang bgod// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad tsam// na mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// 
138b8(rnying rgyud): ma mthong rmongs pa brtan phyir mtshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga yang // lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge'am / 
139a1(rnying rgyud): 'am snying po 'am// phyag rgya 'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs la bya
139a2(rnying rgyud): rgyar byas// rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs nas// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil
139a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drangs nas// rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kunas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i// 
139a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin po ched/  'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod
139a5(rnying rgyud): nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad po che// gan/ nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs la brtan pa'i she sa rab nyid// de lta bu yi ngang du byung // shes rab dbyings kyi
139a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon 'byung skyob pa dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de
139a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje brtsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// mnyam
139a8(rnying rgyud): 'jug la rab brtson pas// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis
139b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas pa'i// rgya dang bral ba
139b2(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsungs las don 'byung ba// mthun
139b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i shes rab snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par to// 
139b4(rnying rgyud): brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor/ 
139b5(rnying rgyud): na// stangs dbul gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dang ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa'i yid 'ong mnyam par 'a gyur// skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar 'byung/ 
139b6(rnying rgyud): ba yin// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur// zhes che du brjod// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // 
139b7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gas
139b8(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyun// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor bskyil// rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal ya su// gsal ba thig le'i ngo bo nyid// traM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin
140a1(rnying rgyud): chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog las// gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid rtag pa las// gzhan du smra bar
140a2(rnying rgyud): ba yin// gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim// oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen/ 
140a3(rnying rgyud): go// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung // rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// haM gi phyag rgya'i/ 
140a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs mchog las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis// las rnams ma lus ka/ ngan gyis shig/ pho nya mang po'i 'du 'phro kun// khyod kyi dgos
140a5(rnying rgyud): pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal/ ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hri yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mtsho/ las// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// oM chos
140a6(rnying rgyud): kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// 'thun pa'i gsang bsgrags gzhan du mon// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yasu// gsal ba'i thig
140a7(rnying rgyud): le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM oM swa aM ha rnams las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro 'phreng bsgom// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// 
140a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs rtson pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu brgyan
140b1(rnying rgyud): cod pan phreng ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' gtung dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus 'di phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang / 
140b2(rnying rgyud): tshe ring bde bskyed phun sum tshegs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhes brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de
140b3(rnying rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis/ 
140b4(rnying rgyud): brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// / thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin oM du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i
140b5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin muM du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid bsgom// yang na
140b6(rnying rgyud): khre mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gos brgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung gis// hUM du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// lha mo klu me rig
140b7(rnying rgyud): ngan mo// dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin
140b8(rnying rgyud): tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam tshogs kyi sbyin pas bsting // bsgrub pa nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blangs// mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhid
141a1(rnying rgyud): sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom// hUM du gyur pas rnam sa
141a2(rnying rgyud): dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phros pas brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye shes skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma
141a3(rnying rgyud): snang ba mi g.yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul bya tsam yang gos pa med// snod bcud rgyu rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor
141a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i zhing // byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs parashes pa yis// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis
141a5(rnying rgyud): nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// chom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de
141a6(rnying rgyud): bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi
141a7(rnying rgyud): te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshem bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang // pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshegs// ci bgyi la sogs tshe// 
141a8(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing // spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa// thams cad / 
141b1(rnying rgyud): nas dbyer med pa'o// rdo rje rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul du bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyi / 
141b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'gro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar gru
141b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro breng bsgom// chags pa
141b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i tshul gyis// 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin sa
141b5(rnying rgyud): dang yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom/ so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag sa ser gsal// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // mnyam
141b6(rnying rgyud): blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo skyid snyoms med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa
141b7(rnying rgyud): thob// bsgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni// rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la che du gleng // gsang ba'i
141b8(rnying rgyud): snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ brgya
142a1(rnying rgyud): bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya
142a2(rnying rgyud): 'du 'phro yis// 'dzum lam na mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub/ 
142a3(rnying rgyud): bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs/ 
142a4(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// / rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang / tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang // khyad par sa la/ 
142a5(rnying rgyud): gnas 'gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs// thab dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab mchogaH/ mchog gyur pa// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum// rgyu 'bras/ 
142a6(rnying rgyud): khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dkyil dag pa'i dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs dbul bsgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas kun// ma lus par ni bsgom par 'gyur/ dus
142a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil
142a8(rnying rgyud): 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang // skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med// ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
142b1(rnying rgyud): pa las tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba
142b2(rnying rgyud): cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes po chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
142b3(rnying rgyud): du brjod pa 'di brjod do// tsa/ ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// tsha/ 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang / wa/ rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgra
142b4(rnying rgyud): rtags ming tshogs las// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtsho na te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la
142b5(rnying rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mtsho/ ga/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes
142b6(rnying rgyud): rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// 
142b7(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi ye shes lngas bltas shing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes
142b8(rnying rgyud): sgyu mar rang snang ba'i// rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon
143a1(rnying rgyud): tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ 
143a2(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i/ 
143a3(rnying rgyud): mchog/ sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam sgom pa mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun nam lhan
143a4(rnying rgyud): gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur dag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs
143a5(rnying rgyud): dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i srasu dgongs par 'gyur// skal ba ni nga gi rdul snyed// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i// 
143a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas// brnyes/ 
143a7(rnying rgyud): nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i/ 
143a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/ thos bsam bskem la rab sbyangs pa'i/ 
143b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung // snod ldan nga tshul bzang la brtan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la phyar bas gal te sbyin// dus mi/ 
143b2(rnying rgyud): par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang sbrebs par yun rings gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la che du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin
143b3(rnying rgyud): tu gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so// oM phyogs
143b4(rnying rgyud): dus pazhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// sna stong thig le kun tu rdzogs to// hUM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje
143b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa/ rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho// oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzog sa pa che// yon+tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas lhun
143b6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che ho// oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs
143b7(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs chen po ho// oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul rnyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub bo// oM zad/ 
143b8(rnying rgyud): mi lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le ho// zhes che du bsgrags so// gsang ba ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
145a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i las mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi khro/ 
145a2(rnying rgyud): bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang / rtags pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang / bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs
145a3(rnying rgyud): par sbas pa'i gsang ba pa la mngon par 'chel nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skye so// de rab tu tsha ba'i
145a4(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang / 'di bas shin tu grang das yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngalo drag po dag gis rab tu nyen
145a5(rnying rgyud): pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang / shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgya du 'jig rten gyi khams/ brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su nyam su
145a6(rnying rgyud): myo'o// de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang / yi dgas ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yidadu mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna
145a7(rnying rgyud): tshogasu gyur pa dang / yong med par yang gyur cing shin tu rid cing skam pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang / dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur/ bskal pa chen po drug du skyes so// de nas las kyis
145a8(rnying rgyud): pa rtsub me'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas/ yi dgas srin po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo brgya pa dang / mgo sna tshogs pa
145b1(rnying rgyud): dang / lus brgya la mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / 'khor rab tu mang po dang // 
145b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sgra skad sna tshogs pa sgrogs pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa dang / rab tu 'jigs
145b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rlung nag dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun tu khams 'khrug par byed na// nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i
145b4(rnying rgyud): rigs dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ros dang / tshangs pa'i res dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsngos so// de sngon brten pa'i stobs kyis thams cad
145b5(rnying rgyud): mkhyen pas gzigs nas/ thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur/ to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bkod pa sgyu// 'phrul dra bas 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsu
145b6(rnying rgyud): gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid chen po bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po
145b7(rnying rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba chen po rnam par spros pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug ma chen
145b8(rnying rgyud): mo mngon phyung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis// pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas no// gnyis su med par dgyes pa'i 'khril bas thim nas/ byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hUM hUM hUM ba shwa badz+ra
146a1(rnying rgyud): kro d+ha dz+wa la ma Na Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la hUM/ zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas khyab par gyur to// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi
146a2(rnying rgyud): tshetshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam/ phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos so// 'ur 'ur rab tu bur 'ur
146a3(rnying rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem che ma me// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig go// gtor gtor rab tu gtor/ kun tu
146a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu gtor gtor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang / gzi brjid ste pra dang / mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rgyal rab
146a5(rnying rgyud): tu brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes ba chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa skye/ bung zhes byed pa 'bar ba chen po'i khrag 'thung / sku smag
146a6(rnying rgyud): gnag cir yang 'gyur ba/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag
146a7(rnying rgyud): gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng 'bar ba chen po'i lde lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so// 
146a8(rnying rgyud): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sngon phung gi tshogs thams cad de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/ shar phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin poH
146b1(rnying rgyud): gyur te lho phrogs su bzhug so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te/ nub phyogs su bzhugs so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su gyur te/ byang grogs su/ 
146b2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs so// de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gshin
146b3(rnying rgyud): rje la sogs pa khyo shug gis gdan byas pa la bzhugs so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so sor skul 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs// de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs/ 
146b4(rnying rgyud): pa gtum po'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan nas/ mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros glang ba'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po tsa
146b5(rnying rgyud): de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin tu gdug pa'i sem/ kyis khros nas rnga mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ dgyes pa chen po dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad
146b6(rnying rgyud): gnas nas/ thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas rngam pa'i skad kyis/ hUM hUM hUM ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa
146b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshogs chen po de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nang khrol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs nas rus pa kun 'cho so// de nas hUM hUM hUM b+h+yo e a
146b8(rnying rgyud): ra li dza dza zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam gyi nang du chud par bsduso// de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal
147a1(rnying rgyud): po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung ba thams cad kyi rje mo yang rje mo srin po chen mam 'a srin mo sa rnam sa khrag mo dang / dbang yod pa / 'jug sreng mo dang / 
147a2(rnying rgyud): dum dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang / be tshon mo dang / srin mo dang / bab mo dang / dga' mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung mos pa dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog mo dang / grub mo dang / rlung mos
147a3(rnying rgyud): gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag mo dang / gsus sor nag chen mo la sogs pa bran
147a4(rnying rgyud): dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog dang / 'khor zhing gi rdul skyed bsdus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dang la khrag 'thung chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs
147a5(rnying rgyud): lnga'i 'jigs byed chen por snang bar byas nas/ de dges/ bar rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thug
147a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las 'di dag phyung // oM hUM aHbadz+ra pra be sha a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung mo'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yod g.yos nas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ 
147a7(rnying rgyud): dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la srin mo'i mtshan mi'i srin mo dang / dmar mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / 
147a8(rnying rgyud): gsong byed mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i skul tshangs ma da
147b1(rnying rgyud): 'khrug mo dang / dmar mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dang laM khrag 'thung chen po rin po che'i sbrul bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang / khe chen mo
147b2(rnying rgyud): dang / za ba mo dang / srin mo rnams 'khrilo// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+ma chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma dang / gcig pu spyad ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang rlung
147b3(rnying rgyud): mo rnams 'khri'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las kyi sku la me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo rnams 'khrilo// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
147b4(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hUM zhes pa rjod pas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha zhes pas byang
147b5(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyis sprin dag las dkar me'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs me'i tshogs dang / thal byed/ ma'i tshegs dang / spos mo'i tshigs dang / gtum mo'itsha
147b6(rnying rgyud): dang / rme sha can gyi tshigs dang / ma tshegs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du bcas nas 'thon to// mthon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas
147b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi lag cha dang bcas nas 'khod do// de nas dgyes te he he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 
147b8(rnying rgyud): wa gdong chen mo'i tshegs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / gzhang gdong chen me'i tshogs dang / kang ka'i gdong chen me'i tshogs dang / du bya'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 
148a1(rnying rgyud): 'ug pa'i gdung chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du byas nas/ 'don par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyu
148a2(rnying rgyud): shar gyi phyogs nas 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par khyab par byas nas phaT ces brjod pas/ rdo rje
148a3(rnying rgyud): srid 'gro ma'i tshegs dang / rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs dang rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyurate/ 
148a4(rnying rgyud): 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnaso// de nas dgyes pa 'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad
148a5(rnying rgyud): khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga lab der yud tsam gyis phyin par dkye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag
148a6(rnying rgyud): / kun thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung oM badz+ra ma hA a mr-i ta ma hA a mri ta ma hA kro d+hi aM aM aM
