148a7(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi snrums na bton nas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtsho chen por chud pa las/ gnas nas/ 
148a8(rnying rgyud): khro bo u tsuswa kro d+ha phyung nas 'dam khu kun 'thungs pas dran pa slar rnyed/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgya
148b1(rnying rgyud): sku'abar ba chen po dal na bzhugs par mthong ngo // ngo dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu srid pa gsum gyi bdag po drugs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs pasas
148b2(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pang so sor snang bas dris gcig tu gtu'o// de nas dag shin du 'dir shing rab tu bred cing nus pa'i nga ros smras pa'i tshigs/ 'bangs sumachi/ 'bangs su mchi// 'dings sunan tanaH/ 
148b3(rnying rgyud): bgyis na/ mgo dang lus ni brgya rigs shing // snying yang 'gas shing gtubs 'gyur cing // rul tshu gas tshig nas brlag pa dang // dpral bar ltung nas 'dod par shog// ces 'angangs su mche ba sa/ 
148b4(rnying rgyud): bor nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag// thams cad kyisam dgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dadang // ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// pa la 'khor chen por bste/ 
148b5(rnying rgyud): gsol dang 'bo lnga ga zhesagasol/ dag tsug so 'khor bcas kyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di// ming tsam 'dzin/ par byed pa yang // gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo rgyu/ 
148b6(rnying rgyud): med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs te spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag te bkur bar bya// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga
148b7(rnying rgyud): 'dir// smras pa bzhin du ma bgyis ma bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // bkas gtubs dum bur rul par 'chi// zhes smras so// de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshegs dang / sring mo dang ma dang
148b8(rnying rgyud): bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi// 
149a1(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo chen po bdag cag rnams// las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gis nga
149a2(rnying rgyud): bskur nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / 
149a3(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo'i tshogs
149a4(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa de dag gis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung / oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na
149a5(rnying rgyud): da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+Ta/ ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rad na ma hA shri he ru ka/ ma hA tsaN+Da sarba tuSh+TAM ta ka hA na da ha pa tsaM hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+me
149a6(rnying rgyud): ma hA shri he ru kaM maM hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ta thA ga te ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI sarba tuSh+Ti hUM phaT/ oM mahA
149a7(rnying rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sur+ya rid na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM hri sha ta sa ma ta pad+ma ma hA kro d+hi shwa r-I kha~M hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha karma ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI bi sha hUM
149a8(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra ke'u ri ha/ badz+ra tsi'u ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra be li ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da li he/ badz+ra pu ka si ha/ badz+ra gasma ri ha/ badz+ra sma sha na~M ha/ badz+ra sr-id ha mu ka he/ badz+ra bya kri mu ka he/ badz+ra sri la mu kaM/ 
149b1(rnying rgyud): he/ badz+ra shon mu ka te/ badz+ra gri ta mu ka he/ badz+ra kaM ka mu ka he/ badz+ra khA khwa mu ka he/ badz+ra hu lu mu ka he/ badz+ra a d+ya te/ dza tang dzaHbadz+ra a mu ka trAM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra pasmai ba la ya ba ti ho/ b+h+yo b+h+r-i g+h+naT+TAts+tsharmA
149b2(rnying rgyud): b+h+yob+h+yob+h+yo b+h+yo d+b+ha b+hU g+h+na b+h+rUM b+h+yo b+hU / hU~M b+hu g+h+ra b+h+yo hU~M b+hUb+h+rib+hUb+h+yo/ a ru la ru su ru swA hUM/ e ha te a na ya/ ma hA bco oM badz+ra krod+ha sa ma ya hU~M mo khrol khros pas ni mdzad pa/ thugs rje khrod / 
149b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshigs// 'bar po'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de ny-i du ni bdag la stsol/ oM badz+ra kAd+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra kro d+ha sma le ho/ badz+ra kro d+hasmA ya phaT/ a li u lo ta la ta pa li dang / staM go na ro'u dri kha ra ma yo gi ni khA ci
149b4(rnying rgyud): hoHhUM ha he phaT b+h+yo/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten khams phyogs bcu thams cad kun tshig/ rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu tshigo/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar/ thams cad du 'bar
149b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang / rab tu gang / kun// tu rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyi da nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor
149b6(rnying rgyud): spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bston pa'i phyir che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsings
149b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyas gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul la sogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang pos 'khrug/ khyu mcho
149b8(rnying rgyud): ma he gzigs dang rtag/ gtum pa dom gyi sbar pa yis// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs gzung // smug nag sngon gser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhadra/ 
150a1(rnying rgyud): bzhir bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs// sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlar bcas// stong gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje du
150a2(rnying rgyud): gang ba dang // ral gri sgra stag shol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes shi
150a3(rnying rgyud): slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshigs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi bstan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/ 
150a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan nga'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / 
150a5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di che du brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa/ 'di// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// 
150a6(rnying rgyud): de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i
150a7(rnying rgyud): grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs
150a8(rnying rgyud): bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// bde gshegs yon+tan rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen por rdzog
150b1(rnying rgyud): gyur cig// gsal ba yid gnyis med pa na// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to// gsang ba'i stsang
150b2(rnying rgyud): bo de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po'i
150b3(rnying rgyud): brjod do// bla med theg pa rab nges na// nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang // byas la mi sog tshogs 'gyur te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul ba'i dbang gi/ 
150b4(rnying rgyud): tshul khrims dang // ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing // sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// srog med srog gcod gas/ 
150b5(rnying rgyud): ming // srog kyang skyes bu'i log rtogs tsam// bden pa gnyis// ri dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga' tshul te ba dang med// zhan na dang ma byin med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid
150b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu la// ming dang tshig tu brtags pa rdzun// brdzun nyid la ni rdzun spyod pa// brdzun zhes brtags tsam yod ma yon// ma chag pa la chags pa dang // chags pa nyid la chags/ 
150b7(rnying rgyud): ba med/ don tshangs mchog rgyal po yin// shin tu chags pa chen po yin// bla ma mi spang bla ma bkur// bsngags dang phyag rgya rgyun ma gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir
150b8(rnying rgyud): mi bya// 'od ni rtsab lnga rnams te// sgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang ni sdang dang // nga rgyal phra dog mi spong // dka/  rtsi dmar ci dro rin chen// dag pa'i snod bcu mi ngas yan / 
151a1(rnying rgyud): bcu yi dam tshig te// ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni// 
151a2(rnying rgyud): yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yin// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das nas sangs rgyas ma yin// rtsa ba nya
151a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyal ba dag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra ma byed// nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// bsgrub pa thams cad log par gyul
151a4(rnying rgyud): yi da mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod gzhin du 'dra// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu me da cing ngan song ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas
151a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gtso/ la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dmachi/ lnga gnyis la// gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyi su dbye// dam
151a6(rnying rgyud): tshig 'di ni smad po che// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa// rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag
151a7(rnying rgyud): rgya yi// sgrub byed dam pa ma lus 'grub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa mchog dang dam pa
151a8(rnying rgyud): yis// sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlobs// bder gshegs nyid kyis yul la bzhugs// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom
151b1(rnying rgyud): ba bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis grub// nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin ga
151b2(rnying rgyud): pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs par dgyes/ 
151b3(rnying rgyud): pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlobs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum
151b4(rnying rgyud): chen rngam pa 'i// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga 'am/ zus lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa bya// bkug nas
151b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje phur pas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbu/ la// e yi tshegs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du/ sbrel bsdam nas// bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur
151b6(rnying rgyud): g.yo// myos nas gal te 'tshig par 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi chen lhun chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsung yang dbang dus/ 
151b7(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas pa byas// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par 'bul// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du
151b8(rnying rgyud): sbrel gdams nas// 'gugs 'gyur rdo rje'ang phyi bzhin 'brang // ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro gzi byin la// dga' ba'i
152a1(rnying rgyud): yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon+tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ 
152a2(rnying rgyud): rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur// mi'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud sbrel bsdams nas// gzi byin 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen 'gro// yid bzhin namakha'
152a3(rnying rgyud): gang bar 'gyur// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum po rngam po lha ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// 
152a4(rnying rgyud): gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phra dar bas gdab// 'bar ba lha ne'i tshogasu dbul// ya yi tshe gras kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyu du sbrel nas bsdams// 
152a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba lha ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma'i mchod/ sbyin 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rang bsgrags na// 
152a6(rnying rgyud): gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo/ sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ shin tu gdug cing gtum dag pa can// thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin rlabs rmad po che// lha chen la sogs
152a7(rnying rgyud): dbang bsdus nas// 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa// ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung // dam bcas bzhin
152a8(rnying rgyud): du ma byas na// ji ltar rang gi mnas bor ba'i// sdom byas de la 'da' ma byed// sdom byas de las 'das gyur na// mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun// yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur
152b1(rnying rgyud): dbas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gi/ ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// las de sngon du ma byas na// rang gis khas blangs mnas bor bzhin// nul mugs tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/ rnal 'byor das
152b2(rnying rgyud): la gnas gyur pa'i// las rnams yongs su bya ba dang // 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs// phra men ma yang dngos grub thob// bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos// zhes bsgo'o// 
152b3(rnying rgyud): khro bo sgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo 'di yino// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen po yis// thams cad thams cad ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod
152b4(rnying rgyud): lha chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// tham thas cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par dbyed// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod/ 
152b5(rnying rgyud): 'phel bar byed// sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu/ tshig chen pos ni// lhan ner 'dod na lha ner byed// rlug par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng gdong chen mo la so
152b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i khro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// gzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la
152b7(rnying rgyud): 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo yis// bro gar gla tshig chen mos ni// sprad cing gtang bar bya ba stedzad thams cad byed pa yin// ljon pa dang ni lcug phran
152b8(rnying rgyud): tshal// gdong cig ma dang me reg dang // dang ba'i dga' bas chags pa dang // khros pas ka li rab tu bya// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sbyong bar
153a1(rnying rgyud): gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas bcom/ 
153a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangaso// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyis gzi/ khro gnyer
153a3(rnying rgyud): glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche bzangs yag za byed che hoH/ hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// gtum che ma ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad// a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che// dbyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba
153a4(rnying rgyud): che hoHhUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che hoH/ hUM khro bo'i rgyal po srin chen po
153a5(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khorar yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i khros pa'i thig le hoH/ hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi
153a6(rnying rgyud): bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che hoH/ rdo rje brag ste srab bo// rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje
153a7(rnying rgyud): rlung ste 'thor rlung che hoH/ zhes che du blangs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
153a8(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di che du brjod do// kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// gzung
153b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kun// don du mi
153b2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur yang ma gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen nges pa 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa tha
153b3(rnying rgyud): la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgro dang bskur ba zhi ba yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung // de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las
153b4(rnying rgyud): skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas// zhes pa ra rjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs
153b5(rnying rgyud): kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// 'jag/ pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u ste stong phrag pa rgya las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spri/ 
153b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog go// gsang ba'i
153b7(rnying rgyud): bo de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar ska du/ badz+ra satwa mA yA dza la gu h+ya sarba A dar shA nA ma tan tra/ 
153b8(rnying rgyud): bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ oM rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tsha'o// hUM mi spyod pa la phyag 'tsha lo// e snang ba mthar ya
154a1(rnying rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag/ kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas// dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas// rgya
154a2(rnying rgyud): bkun la bstod bskor nas// spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol// e ma ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud// dri med zab mo brtag pa/ 
154a3(rnying rgyud): ba// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud// ma lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di// rdo rje sems pa ji ltar lags// sgyu 'phrul gang gis
154a4(rnying rgyud): bstan pa de// dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan// lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid// gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad// gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu// snying po'i don ni ci'i phyir// de khe 'i/ 
154a5(rnying rgyud): ces ji ltar brjod// nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir// mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs// mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o// / thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi// ston pa zhes ni ci'i phyir// 
154a6(rnying rgyud): gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu// dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu// mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya// rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod// rin tshon 'byung ldan gang gi phyir// snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir// don
154a7(rnying rgyud): yod grub pa ji lta bu// spyan dang na mkha'i dbyings ma dang // gos dkar mo dang mA ma ki/ sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir// sa'i snying po ci'i phyir// nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // phyag na/ 
154a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gang phyir brjod// sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci// byams dang sgrib sel kun bzang dang // 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir// dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang // mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod
154b1(rnying rgyud): rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil bapa ci// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod// yid dang chos bzangs gnyis kyi phyir// gtso bos
154b2(rnying rgyud): bdag la nges par gsungs// gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i// nang dang gsang ba'i gling bzhi las// ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor// dus dang sdus pa ji ltar brjod// grags pa thun mong
154b3(rnying rgyud): gleng gzhi las// ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar// bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu// skyes bu chen pos ba sha du gsol// 'di ni gling bzhi'i dri ba tshig su bcad pa'o// thun mong thun mo ma yin pa'i// gleng bslang
154b4(rnying rgyud): gnyi su ci phyir 'gyur// gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing // thob sa dang 'bras bu ci yin ston// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i nga // sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim// gang dang 'brel pa bshad/ 
154b5(rnying rgyud): gsol// 'di ni gleng ba'i tshig su bcad pa'o// skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso// sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing // / phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje// gzi brjid phung po phun su
154b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs// blta bya gang la ci yi phyir// gang gis rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs dang mi rtogs khyad par ci// rtogs pa'i sgo ni de ru gsungs// gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci// 
154b7(rnying rgyud): 'di ni lta ba'i dra ba'o// thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir// thun mong thun mong gang ci'i phyir// shes rab tshegs dang thugs rje dang // rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang // 'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod
154b8(rnying rgyud): pa ci// gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad// de yi 'bras bu gang phyir 'gyur// gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i// spyad pa'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs// 'di ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o// thun mong spyi
155a1(rnying rgyud): dang khyad par gyi// rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub kyi// dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir// de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang // 'dul thabs gnyis ji ltar su/ 
155a2(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rims gsum gang // lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta
155a3(rnying rgyud): bu// gang phyir gzugs brnyan zhes brjod cing // gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snang // phyi nang gsang bar ji ltar 'gyur// lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te// gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu/ gany+tsi
155a4(rnying rgyud): dang gsum dang drug bstan cing // don dam kun rdzob byangang chub sems// phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor// tshogs dkyi dkyil 'khor gnyis ci zhig/ gang gis gang du gang
155a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs nas// ji ltar spyad pas ci zhig 'grub// 'di dag/ bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci// gnas skabs gang dang 'dre la bar 'gyur// yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel// 
155a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'khor du ji ltar brtog/ gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po// gang dang nges pa ma rnyed par// kun gyi spyod par ma gyur pa// legs par gsungs shig rgyal mchog che// 'di ni dkyi
155a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o// gang gis gang la gang dag tu// ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs// bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi// gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel// skyon dang yon tan dzi/ 
155a8(rnying rgyud): lta bu// 'bras bu rim pa bsha du gsol// 'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga du// las kyi rim pa ji lta bu// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thabs dang shes
155b1(rnying rgyud): rab gnyis med pas// bdag gi the tsom gsal du gsol// 'di ni dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o// gang la gang gis brten pa yi// dam tshig zhes pa ci yi phyir// rtsa ba dam tshig
155b2(rnying rgyud): du zhig bstan// gang phyir rtsa bar brjod par bya// yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs// 'di dag lam dang bsnyen bsgrub dang // gang zag gang don ji ltar 'brel// bsrungs dang 'das pa'i skyon
155b3(rnying rgyud): yin ci// phyi nang gsang ba'i ji ltar gsungs// lha dang spyod dang bsgrub pa dang // shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig tu// grub dang mi spong bsrung ci zhig/ rgyal mchog skyes bus bsha gsol/ 
155b4(rnying rgyud): thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// mchog dang mchog gyur na/ de yin pa'i// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu// gang gis ga du ji ltar bsgrub// dgug dang bcing dang gso dang gsad// 
155b5(rnying rgyud): dbye dang bskrad dang pham rgyal ci// gter dang mig rnon rkangamagyogs dang // rig 'dzin go 'phang ji ltar bsgrub// rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol// 'di bsgrub
155b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dro ba dris pa'o// phrin las rim pa gang ci zhig/ gang gis gang du brtsam par bya// thabs dang rdzas dang phur bu ci// ting 'dzin 'dug stangs hom khung ci// gdul bya rim pa gang ci zhig
155b7(rnying rgyud): khyad par rim pa ji ltar bshad// 'bras bu yon tan ji ltar 'gyur// gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal mchog tso// the tsom legs par chod par mdzod// 'di ni phrin las
155b8(rnying rgyud): kyi dri ba dris pa'o// rmad byung skyes bu gang zhig gis// dang po lam tshul ji lta bu// phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir// stong pa'i rnal 'byor snying rje che// phyag rgya cig dang spros bcas ci// rnam/ 
156a1(rnying rgyud): smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid ci// mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs// phyi nang gsang ba mthar byin pa'i// 'bras bu bdag gzhan
156a2(rnying rgyud): don nyid ci// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ji ltar// gang dag rtog pa'i rgyal po de// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla na med// kun las 'bras bu thugs chud pa// cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud// skal ngan rnams
156a3(rnying rgyud): kyis ma rtogs pa'i// gsang ba gsang chen mdo sde dang // 'dul ba chos kyi phung po dag/ nam mkha' mtha' thug bshad pa kun// gsang ba'i snying po las 'bros pas// ji snyed bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i
156a4(rnying rgyud): lam// ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di// theg pa dman dang ma sbyang sa dang // rigs chad dbang dang man ngag bral// ji ltar/ bltas kyang mi snang ba// skyes bu mchog gi spyod yul bas// 
156a5(rnying rgyud): rdul snyed sbyangs pa'i gang zag la// gsang phyir gsang ba'o// thabs dag gis// dngos grub mtha' yas grub phyir bsta na// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa'i// rten dang rten par bcas/ 
156a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i chos// ji ltar grags dang grags gyur pa'i// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig kyang // rkyen stobs nus pa so sor snang // khyad par rim par gang gnas pa// rang bzhin gdul bya ba der ga
156a7(rnying rgyud): dang / 'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang // ma bcos dang la tha dad med// rang snang las kyis tha dad pa'i// bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun// de bzhin nyid la dgod bya'i phyir// rgyal mtsho/ 
156a8(rnying rgyud): bde chen yongs gang bas// dri ba'i don 'di lung bstan cing // thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur pa'i// gsang ba'i don la dgo du gsol// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi
156b1(rnying rgyud): rgyud las dri ba rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bshad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so// / de nas gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje 'chang // skyes bu mtshan dpe rab ldan cing // dpag med rgyal ngas
156b2(rnying rgyud): rab bskor zhing // rang 'byung dag pa'i gzhal yas na// thabs dang shes rab 'khril sbyor zhing // kun kyang de dang 'thun pa ste// 'dzum zhing steg pas sos 'debs shing // dgyes pa'i tshul gyis
156b3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa// dpag med rgyal bas gsungs pa dang // gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i
156b4(rnying rgyud): mchog nyon gcig da ni sems dpa' bshad// chos rnam das ma lus gnyis med pa'i// rang rig byang chub sems nyid de// tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// rdo rje zhes ni bshad
156b5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos// thabs dang she sa rab 'brel pa yis// thugs su chud cing mngon rto// sa pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar bshad// rang bzhin
156b6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang 'bras bu'i don// nus pa'i rim pa srul snang ba// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don// sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzhir bshad// tha dad mi las tha dad pa'i// ngo bo thabs dang bdag nyid dang // 
156b7(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni// drang ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin// ma brjod grags pa'i bstan pa nyid// sgro skur med dang zhal nas gsungs// dri ma med pa'i lung nyid de// las dang ye
156b8(rnying rgyud): shes spyi nyid dang // rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung nyid de// bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas// gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang // so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud// 
157a1(rnying rgyud): 'di ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston// don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas// lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin// gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs
157a2(rnying rgyud): nyid de/ rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang // thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid// gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do// rang gis dman dang ma sbyangs dang // dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang // rang brtags bas
157a3(rnying rgyud): pas sa'i khyad par// de dang de yis dbang gis na// ro myong bral phyir gsang bar bshad// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi// chos rnams thig le chen po'i don// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
157a4(rnying rgyud): rten pa// ma lus ro gcig dbyer med pa// ji snyed the dag pa'i khyad par dang // bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams// 'dir 'dus thabs 'dis mtshon pa dang // rtsa bar gyur
157a5(rnying rgyud): pa kho na yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med/ pa'i// byang chub sems nyid bde ba che// rang byung ye shes thog mtha' med// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de// rgyal ba
157a6(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs rab snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams// 'di las ston pas snying po ste// snying po dang ni 'od bzhino// rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas// snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin// 
157a7(rnying rgyud): gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems// mtha' dbus yongs su ma chad pa// dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur pa// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ 
157a8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid rdo rjes rig/ bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs// 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid// gang phyir dngos gnyis tha dad par// log par brtags pa'i snang ba rnams// mun la snang dang gser / 
157b1(rnying rgyud): ltar// ro gcig thabs kyis de kho na// de phyir de kho na zhes brjod// dngos po sna tshogs dbyer med pa'i// tha dad don min don gcig min// de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni// gzhi dang lam dang ngo // 
157b2(rnying rgyud): bo dang // nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan// gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa// 'gro ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa// ro gcig theg par nges gnas pa// nges pa'i theg pa bla na med// rang bzhin ma bcwa/ 
157b3(rnying rgyud): rang byung las// bya byed dang gis bral ba yi// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul// rang snang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o// rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa las// rgyu rkyen las kyis so sor 'phrul/ 
157b4(rnying rgyud): de nyid byang chub sems nyid de// mtha' dbus med dpar mnyam par gnas// de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud// nam mkha' dang ris phye ba ltar// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi// lam
157b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis 'brel par mngon bsgoms pas// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// bde chen thig le mngon snang ba// 'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam
157b6(rnying rgyud): du brjod// rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yis// dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis// rig pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas// khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin// theg ma med pa'i rdo rje
157b7(rnying rgyud): sems// chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid// zab mo bstan pa ci yi lung // thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas// shes
157b8(rnying rgyud): rab sbyang dang snying rje ldan// dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang // tshogs dag par sbyangs pa yis// dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin// rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// ngo bo nyid dang byin brlabs dang // mtshon
158a1(rnying rgyud): dang rdo rjer grub pa ste// rdo rje theg pa bde ba che// rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang // phyin ci log dang mi mos dang // dbang dang dam tshig med pa la// gsang phyir gas
158a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i theg par gsungs// thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// snod dang bral ba'i slob ma la// gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na// bdag dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing // sreg dang bsgribs
158a3(rnying rgyud): par yun rings gnas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i
158a4(rnying rgyud): don// thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la// phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang // dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi// rdo rje pad+ma 'brel ba yis// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas/ 
158a5(rnying rgyud): thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs lta dang shes bya// rnams// skad cig yud la gsal byas te// thun/ mong khyad par gsang ba yi// lam gnyis nges par
158a6(rnying rgyud): ston pas na// ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin// de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba// 'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang // mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyiro// thabs dang lam gyi khyad par
158a7(rnying rgyud): gyis// kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid// gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi// 'og min gnas mchog chen po der// yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas// skal med skye bo gdul ba'i
158a8(rnying rgyud): phyir// sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa// 'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa// 'og min 'bar ba'ogan
158b1(rnying rgyud): yas khang // phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// yon+dan khyad par spags pa na// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la// bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan// rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang // til 'bru'i chu/ 
158b2(rnying rgyud): du rab tu bzhugs// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i// rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni// rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba kun
158b3(rnying rgyud): gyi rten pa'i gnas// de dag nye bar mtshon pa yi// yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i// sgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs// de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang // rgyal ba sngags dang byin ra/ 
158b4(rnying rgyud): kyis// der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// bsod nams ye shes khyad par can// bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i// rdzogs
158b5(rnying rgyud): longs spyod pa chen po ni// gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi// / 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na// rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku// gcig dang du ma rnams spangs pa
158b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te// gdod nas theg mchog mdzod nyid phyir// sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la// skad cig cig gis spangs par mdzad// chos rnams sna tshogs ji
158b7(rnying rgyud): snyed pa// dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum// khyad par lpags dang tshad med dang // ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan// chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir// mu khyud zlum par kun nas
158b8(rnying rgyud): bskor// sku gsung thugs dang byin brlabs dang // thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir/ yon+dan rgyas pa'i dbyibs su bstan// rang 'byung ye shes mtha' bral bas// phyogs bcur 'gro 'ong migs
159a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i// tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir// gni rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan// gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir// ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid/ 
159a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i phyir// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i// chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te// bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i
159a3(rnying rgyud): phyir/ phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med// thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras// ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid// gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas// blo 'bur bzhi ni lhag par mdzes/ 
159a4(rnying rgyud): thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gdul bya'i rim pa mthon dadaman kun// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// thabs mang bsam gyis
159a5(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pas// lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis// 'bras bu yon+dan khyad par kun rdzogs pas// rta babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan// zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral
159a6(rnying rgyud): pas// 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te// bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas// 'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// ma chags thabs
159a7(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa dang // che ba'i yon+dan lhun rdzogs pas// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis// byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// smon lam dbang gis de dag tu// thos
159a8(rnying rgyud): pa rgya mtsho bsag phyir gnas// de tshe dus kyis tha bral yang // ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus// dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas// thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan// de tshe phyogs
159b1(rnying rgyud): bcu rgyal ba yis// bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa// 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad// dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir// 'khor gyi nang na
159b2(rnying rgyud): skal mchog ldan// gsang ba'i rdo rje 'chang bsdus nas// 'dul ba'i 'khor lo bstan par mdzad// 'das dang me byon da ltar gyi// sku gsum sku gsum thugs nges pa'i// de bzhin nyid
159b3(rnying rgyud): du thabs gang gis// gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i// thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang // pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa// zhing khams zhal dang yon+dan bsam mi
159b4(rnying rgyud): khyab// bye brag brgyad bcu kun 'dus pa'i// rgyal ba rgya dmatshe kun gyi mtshan// gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas // las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang // srid pa'i ri bos
159b5(rnying rgyud): mi bskyod pas// de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs// thab sa dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba// mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis// snang bar snang
159b6(rnying rgyud): phyir snang mdzad mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi yon+tan ni// tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste// yon tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas// rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin// dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi
159b7(rnying rgyud): sgo/ dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis// don rtags gsung dang yi ge'i sgo/ mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog/ dpag med thugs rjes mdzad pa yi// 'gro 'ong med pa'i thugs rje yis/ 
159b8(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas// don grub ces ni rnam par bstan// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang // tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing // de las thabs des mngon byas pas// der dbang bsgrur/ 
160a1(rnying rgyud): de nyid snang ba/ rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin// steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'o// sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim// gang de thabs las mngon gyur
160a2(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang ni 'du byed dang // rnam shes zag med bde ba'i ros// dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por baM shing // gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris// / 
160a3(rnying rgyud): rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog/ dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo dang ljang dang rims ldan pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyed cing // spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum// thams cad de las skyed pa lnga
160a4(rnying rgyud): tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang bzhin// sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod// na mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba// steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa// yul dang shes
160a5(rnying rgyud): rab dbyer med cing // thugs rjes shes rab 'brel pa yis// // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis med gzigs/ ba spyan gyi mchog/ zag med stong pa'i glo chen gyis// skyed da
160a6(rnying rgyud): sdu dang gnas pa'i phyir// mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// na mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'o// las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang // shes bya'i dri mam
160a7(rnying rgyud): yas pa// rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na// gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin// gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin dang // ye shes thugs rje bar med chus// gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas// 
160a8(rnying rgyud): / chu ni mA ma kI ru ba shad// gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang // ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung dag gis// bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams su// sgrol bas sgrol ma nyi du bshad// snying po rang byung ye/ 
160b1(rnying rgyud): shes nyid// kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// sa yi snying por brjod pa yin// rang 'byung snying po byang chub sems// nam mkha' lta bur bsam brjod med
160b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' dbus sgro skur gang 'das pa// de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid// gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas// 'gro ba chu bo rgal gyi bar// skyo ba med par gzigs pas na// spyan ras gzigs dbang bcwa
160b3(rnying rgyud): gtso// rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis// mtha' yi bdag rtog mtshan ma dag/ 'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste// thun mong nyid dang khyad par gyis// gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa bzhi// thun mong
160b4(rnying rgyud): yul dang khyad par ni// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// / mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// lha mo bzhi ni mngon snang ba// byang chub sems dang bde ba dang / thabs kyi
160b5(rnying rgyud): bde bas rab bsgegs pas// lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad/ grol dang ma grol 'khor ba yi// phyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun// brag cha lta bur brjod mdzad pas// bar chad med pas
160b6(rnying rgyud): phreng ba ma// tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa// dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid// dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas// de nyid rdo rje gIr ti ma// ro yis khyab cing gar sbyar ltar// bde ba chen po bzhi
160b7(rnying rgyud): yi ga ra/ khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang // mi gnas bgrol bas gar mkhan ma// rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang // yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i gar// lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhino// ma rtogs 'gro ba
160b8(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas la// rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis// yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni// 'di ni byams pa zhes bya'o// rtogs goms mthar byin khyad par gyis// las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim
161a1(rnying rgyud): sel ba 'di ni sgrib se lo// thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na// gang phyir spong len mi gnas pas// phyi nang pasnod bcud ma lus pa// dbye ba med pas kun
161a2(rnying rgyud): tu bzang // bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun// zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis// lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na// zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sku// dbang po yi ge thig ler bcas// gan/ 
161a3(rnying rgyud): dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin// dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyad// de nyid dgrol dang brod skyed dang // spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni// dri dang bde
161a4(rnying rgyud): ngag tshim zhing // yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri// phyi nang khya dpa'i dkyil 'khor la// me tog thig ler bder bkod dpas// rdo rje me tog bla na med// phyi nang sems la gnas bcas
161a5(rnying rgyud): ba'o// mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang // ye shes snang ba bla na med// rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma// hrInang dkyil 'khor ma lus la// rang 'byung ting 'dzin bde ba
161a6(rnying rgyud): yis// thams cad khyab par gnas pa'i phyir// khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma// de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis// 'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa// byang chub snying po tshar bcad pas/ 
161a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba zhes du brjod// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes 'di// gnyis 'dzin rtog pa'i gnyen po ste// rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na// ya mnA ta kring gshin rje gshe
161a8(rnying rgyud): gang byir 'khor ba'i rgya mchilas// thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las// 'joms dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na// d+ha mgrin rgyal po bshad// 'khor ba'i bdu rtsi drudus lnga la/ 
161b1(rnying rgyud): shes lnga ru gsal goms pas// gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil pa// sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bshad// gang du lus dang bcas pa yi// / dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg/ rang rgyud gcad pa'i
161b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes nyid// sgo ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// rang rgyud rtag chad zlog pa dang // gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang // thig le rig par bcas pa nyid// gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang // gang dug
161b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro bar mi nus dang // de las 'dab ba dka' ba dang // bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma// gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdams rgya dang // gnyis su med pas bde chen po// rang lus snang srid brtan
161b4(rnying rgyud): g.yo la// rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis sbyar// de/ dag ma lus dran byed pa// rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med// kun gzhi rdo rje mi phyed pa// kun tu bzang por de bshad// 
161b5(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos// ma lus zad med khyab pa'i dbyings// rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa// kun tu bzang mor de bshad// mi shigs thig le bde chen po// ye
161b6(rnying rgyud): shes lnga ldan dngas ma'i bcud// rang 'byung lus can kun gnas pa// ston pa po'i gsung can nyid// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e tshogs tshul du ni// lus sbas pa yi tshul
161b7(rnying rgyud): ngag gis// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// rang 'byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid// rgyu ba bral ba'i snying po ste// bar ma ar+tha byang chub sems// na mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong // ma ni ma
161b8(rnying rgyud): ta dran rtogs yid// rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams// ye shes namakhar gsal 'dod pa// dran rtogs rig pa 'khor du gnas// zag meng rnam shes bsam mi khyab// ma lus na mkha'i
162a1(rnying rgyud): ye shes su// bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par/ bsdus te nyams la gnas par mdzad// bde ba chen po ma skyes pa// na mkha' lta bur mi phyed pa// nam
162a2(rnying rgyud): mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas// 'di zhes nye bar bstan pa ni// e sogs bzhi yi tshul gnas te// phyi nang par 'khyams gdong par bcas// 
162a3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i 'og mon rgyan rdzogs pa'o// thig le baM dbyibs spros pa med// brjod med bstan pa gsung mdzad cing // byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa// 'khor la snang bar mdzad pa'o/ 
162a4(rnying rgyud): ma ni ma nu ma ta ste// sdom byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos// de/ las can rnam shes de dag gis// gsal bar dgo bar 'khor du brjod// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid
162a5(rnying rgyud): thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos// mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i don// byin brlabs mngon sum chu la gyis gsal// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 
162a6(rnying rgyud): thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus// bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe// bde ba chen po'i dus su 'dod// shes pa rten dang brten par bcas// thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas// rlung gis sdus
162a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i don gyis ni// rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gsal// gang dang gang la gang du ni// gang gis gang tshe gang gsungs pa// brjod 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas// gleng bzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin// 
162a8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dbyer med ye shes gcig gi ngang // rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las// sna tshogs sku ni rnam par 'phrul// de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang // lha la rdo
162b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa nyid// lA min ston pa phrag dog rje// mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste// byol song sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa// yid dgas drag pos gdung ba sel// dmya la ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal/ 
162b2(rnying rgyud): gdul ba'i sprul sku ngo bor shar// la la lha las 'pho ba dang // la lar lhums zhugs bltams pa dang // dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas// 'khor lo bskor te mya ngan 'das
162b3(rnying rgyud): gnas la nges pa yod min te// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang // mi dang lce dang lha mon te// so so'i gnas te gang yin pa// 'gro ba 'dul phyir ston pa'i gnas// lha rnams dang ni mi
162b4(rnying rgyud): rnams dang // lha min yi dgas dud 'gro dang // dmyal bu so so'i 'gro ris dag/ rang rang mos dang las dbang gis// 'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khod// rang rang mos
162b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phrad pa'i tshe// rang rang brda' skad tha dad pas// rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa// rang rang ji bzhin ston/ ba'i dus// bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs te// rang rang zhen
162b6(rnying rgyud): pa mtha' yas phyir// tshul dang mos pa'i dbang gis na// theg pa sna tshogs tshul du snang // theg cig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul// gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dgu dang brgyad
162b7(rnying rgyud): khri la sogs pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul gyis snang // sku dang gsung thugs las ngag gis// 'dul dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de tshe 'gro/ 
162b8(rnying rgyud): ba so so yang // rang gi bzhi rtsa don rig nas// rim pa lnga 'am thabs gcig gis// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas// rang rang cha 'dzin sprul pa'i lus// sar gnas 'khor gyi
163a1(rnying rgyud): po yis// de dag zhus pa'i rim gsungs pa// blo dang tshig dang yi ger bsdus// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// lta spyod
163a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbang ngam dang // sgrub pa phrin las lam rim ni// phyi dang nang dang sbas pa ste// rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa// thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs// phyogs bcu dus
163a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa// sgyu 'phrul dra bar 'dus pa ste// de ltar grags 'i
163a4(rnying rgyud): chos rnams kun// rtog pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i// da rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ thog ma par dang mthar dge ba// dus gsu
163a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'dram dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng bzhi rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
163a6(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang zag thabs ni thun mong du// blo yi yul du gang gyur pa// de ni thun mong yul nyid// gang zag thabs dang ston pa nyid// de yi spyod yul ma gyur cing // thabs
163a7(rnying rgyud): chen gsang ba dang ldan pa// de ni thun mong ma yin pa'o// de nyid skye bo 'khor gnyis don// rnam gnyis tshul du snang bar mdzad// phung po khams dang skye mched nyid// rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa'
163a8(rnying rgyud): dang // sems ma nyid lhun gyis grub// gsang yul dbang po rnam shes reg/ ma lus 'joms phyir khro bo ste// rtags sogs mtshan ma las skyes phyir// yum ste las kyis mi gnas bshad/ 
163b1(rnying rgyud): yid chos bzang po bzang mo nyid// chags sogs nyon mongs drug po nyid// thub pa sprul pa drug du bshad// de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes yul// dbang po dus dang lus
163b2(rnying rgyud): chos bzhi// mtshan ma nyon mongs yum nyid de// de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas// lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'brel pa las// byang chub sems lnga rnam par 'phrul// dngos po snang grags chos thams cad// skye
163b3(rnying rgyud): med dang 'gag med dang // gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang // 'gro 'ong med pa nyi snang // bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang // gzhan phyir de dag ma rtogs pas// rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gas/ 
163b4(rnying rgyud): shin tu gab sgras gsang ba'i don// de nyid legs par bsha/ dad pa'i don// ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la// ma ri dag log rtog rkyen dbang gis// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ngo bor smra
163b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid bde gshegs snying po de// dngos med dngos po'i snying / can// 'gro ba rnams ni smin bya'i phyir// sku gsung thug kyi rang bzhin las// sprul pa rnams ni rnam par 'phrul// sku dang
163b6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs sna tshogs kyi// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig/ yab dang yum dang gnyis med dang // gang la gang
163b7(rnying rgyud): gis gleng bslang ba// brda' dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te// bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur// len pa rlung gi sbyor ba yis// thabs des yum la gang bskul bas// gnyis med 'brel ba'i
163b8(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i 'od// sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs// bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing // namakha'i ye shes mngon byung nas// bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro// skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang
164a1(rnying rgyud): 'gro 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur// gang gis gang la gang bslangs pas// gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las// ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas// snang srid lus
164a2(rnying rgyud): dang dngos por bcas// na mkha'i ye shes cir yang snang // nang gi gleng bslang thabs chen yin// gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la// chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bskul// shes rab thabs la lan bsku
164a3(rnying rgyud): ba'ang // sha da pa yi glu gar dang // sngags sbyor ba yi rim pa yis// phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis// gdug dang bkug pa'i
164a4(rnying rgyud): thabs nyid// dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang // zlog dang ga/ zud dang sbyar ba yis// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs nga chen po// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// mthar thug rinam
164a5(rnying rgyud): pa las byung ba'i// kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste// thabs las byung ba'i thig le dang // shes rab gsang ba'i/ thig le dang // gnyis med bde ba las byung ba'i// sems
164a6(rnying rgyud): lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing // sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// sku gsung thug
164a7(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes lngas// thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis// 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o// snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// gnas gang
164a8(rnying rgyud): smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang // skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas// 'gro ba mos/ 
164b1(rnying rgyud): bo'i khyad par gyis// gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od// dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas// gang zag blo dang 'tsham par bstan// rten dang brten can las byung ba'i// rang 'byung
164b2(rnying rgyud): bde chen mi rtog pa// lus med lus la gnas pa yi// khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul// gang phyir zag med bde ba yi// ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can// rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba
164b3(rnying rgyud): dang // byin rlob nus pa'i lha yis ni// phyi nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs// ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung // rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag/ rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dang // 'phen dang sdud
164b4(rnying rgyud): ba rlung gis te// dngas mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug/ steng da 'og las byung ba yi// bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag/ drangs snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras
164b5(rnying rgyud): bu nyid// rkyen gyis nus pa phrad pa ltar// rgyu gcig nus pa so// sor snang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// / lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang // rlung ni phyi nang dngas snyigs dang
164b6(rnying rgyud): lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul las byung // gang phyir med dang nus pa med// stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis// rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing // dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur// 
164b7(rnying rgyud): phyir thun mong thun mong min// sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzigs brnyan du// gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i// sems lnga yun ring thung bcas grwa/ 
164b8(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa// lhan gcig skyes pa'i ye shes te// dngos po ma yin dngos med min// bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med min// rang 'byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid// rdo rje bca
165a1(rnying rgyud): bo rang snang ba// ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum
165a2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bye ba// kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i// mtha'/ 
165a3(rnying rgyud): dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa las// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par la// sna tshogs chos ni rnam par 'phrul// gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i// rang bzhin gyi
165a4(rnying rgyud): med de bzhin nyid// dngos med dngos po yul 'das la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba/ gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid// e ma'o gnyis med bde
165a5(rnying rgyud): chen las// sna tshogs gnas dang longs spyod dang // rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang // bde sdug dbang po bye bragadag/ rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul// sgyum chu zla 'ja
165a6(rnying rgyud): tshe na ltar// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas//  las dang rkyen gyis gang snang ba// rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis// dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i// rtog pa'i nus pa sna tshogs mthong // rang
165a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings// lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i// ma mthong log zhen rtas pa yis// 'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobasu snang // 'khor ba ma bsal dag pa yi// zhing dang
165a8(rnying rgyud): spyod yul longs spyod dang / ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang // mngon shes ye shes dpag med pa'i// sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang // yon+tan phrin las rang snang ba// bdag
165b1(rnying rgyud): gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don// sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar// ma bsags lhun gyis grub pa'i sku// sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i// kun la yid bzhin 'thun par snang // kun kyang
165b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung byang chub sems// bden pa dbyer med don du snang // gang phyir na mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// gang la de ltar snang ba las// yang dag gcig tu gzung du med// ma bcos rang 'byung zhib
165b3(rnying rgyud): nyid// rnam par dag pa'i snying po ste// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su mkhyen// sgro dang skur pa kun bral ba'i// thams cad rang snang snying po las// sna tshogs ma lus
165b4(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'phrul// dngos dang dngos po med min zhing // gang dal de nyid yul 'das pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med/ pa// phyogs ris mtha' dbus rgya dpag med// gang gis
165b5(rnying rgyud): gang la khyab pa ltar// mkha' sogs rdul bral 'byung ba'i bcud// zag pa med pa'i snying po nyid// lus can kun gyi dbang po dang // dngas mar 'brel ba gang snang yang // mthong ba
165b6(rnying rgyud): log pa'i stobs kyis sbyar// bdag gzhan med pa'i rang snang yin// ma lus thams cad dbyer med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bcud lnga'i rgyun// longs spyod thabasu bcas pa nyid// 'gro
165b7(rnying rgyud): ba kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang thabs dang shes rab kyi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems// bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid// 'das dang da ltar ma
165b8(rnying rgyud): byon gyi// rgyal ba rig 'dzin mtha' yas dang // ma lus kun gyis rtog bya ba// phyogs med khyab pa'i ngo bor gnas// gang snang ma lus de bzhin nyid// ma bcos ma byas zhi ba ste// gcig/ 
166a1(rnying rgyud): dang du ma las 'das pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// mtha' bral na mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// ma lus gnas pa de dag kyang // rtogs pa'i khyad par dbang po
166a2(rnying rgyud): yi// mthong tshul dag dang ma dag gis// rang bzhin yul du ma gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i// dbang dang man ngag 'brel pa yis// de nyid mthong rtogs don phyir bshad// 
166a3(rnying rgyud): gang phyir rdo rje slob dpon nyid// yon tan yongs rdzogs nus pa can// dad dang brtson 'grus brtul shugs can// shes rab khyad par gang ldan la// dbang dang dam tshig man ngag dang / 
166a4(rnying rgyud): rgyu rkyen 'brel ba'i nus pa yi// bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa // thabs kyi phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// gsad da ba'i gsang chen snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dngo/ 
166a5(rnying rgyud): grub ste// phyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// thabs bral kun la rgyas btab pas// mun pa'i tshegs su gyur pa yin// mun snang du// 
166a6(rnying rgyud): dang gser 'gyur rtsi// thabs mkhas rang bzhin nges 'gyur ltar// gang de'i lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis// de ma thag tu de bzhin 'gyur// dbyer med na mkha'i rang bzhin du// kha dog dbyibs
166a7(rnying rgyud): dang rdzas la sogs// ma lus tha dad med pa ltar// thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur// tha mal pa dang log pa dang // dka' thub can dang rkyen rtogs dang // byi nang can dang tha dad / 
166a8(rnying rgyud): can// gtsang sme can dang phyogs rtogs nyid// mnyam nyid lta las gang 'das pa// ngo bo nyid dang thabs dag dang // dbang po la sogs log pa yis// de nyid gnod pa'i stobs su 'gyur// 
166b1(rnying rgyud): gang la gang gis zin pa'i nad// thabs dang brtson 'grus legs pa yis// de ltar brtson pa'i khyad par gyis// de nyid ma spangs rnam par dag/ gang phyir de nyid nges pa las// rdzogs/ 
166b2(rnying rgyud): dang ma rtogs khyad par gyis// tha dad chos su gang snang ba// dngos la da ltar gnas pa min// rdo rje skye med shes rab ste// me long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang // gnyis med 'brel
166b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i mnyam pa nyid// ma lus dbyer med dam par bshad// de nas rtogs sgo bshad bya ba// gang la gang gi don med pas// lha dang spyod dang lam 'bras dag/ 'di nyid don gnyer ga
166b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'o// gang gis de dag de don du// tshig dang sngags rdzas dka' thub kyis// gang bstan de yi byin pa rlabs kyis// bdag gzhan phan par gang 'dod pa'o// 
166b5(rnying rgyud): gang las gyur pa de zhig pas// lus sems 'byung ba'i bag la gnas// phyin chad phan gnod chos med pas// dka' thub 'bad rtsol mi dgos so// gang phyir
166b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i rgyu bzhi dag/ mnyes dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir// las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis// grol zhing thar par 'dod par snang // bde bzhi bcu drug tha dad lam// khams
166b7(rnying rgyud): gsum mthong sgom song tshul gyis// rang don zag pa kun bral nas// rang don thar pa mya ngan 'das// rkyen rtog bag chags sad pa yis// 'byung med bcu gnyis rang brtags nas// 
166b8(rnying rgyud): ma rig 'khrul 'khor rgyu 'bras zad// yid bzhin bde ba mchog gis// tha dad med pa'i rig pa'i sems// bden brdzun khyad par cir bltas pas// gsal la mi rtog snying po nyid// bdag gzhan
167a1(rnying rgyud): nus pa'i stobs su snang // chos rnams rgyu ma mig yor dang // brag cha chu zla 'dra ba yi// de nyid mtha' dbus bral ba ni// bden gnyis 'brel pa dbu ma'i tshul
167a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dam pa gsum bkod de// dngos po sgyu ma las grol nas// dag pa'i brten 'brel la brten nas// ye shes sgyu ma mngon sum shar// gang phyir las dang bya ba dang // khrus dang gtsang sprul
167a3(rnying rgyud): brten nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu stibs kyis// sgo gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa// de dag las 'thun khyad par nyid// de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs nas// las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas
167a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'chang ba'i sa la gnas// ting 'dzin rigs pa gtsor byas nas// sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis// cha lugs ji bzhin mngon sbyar te// goms pas bdag gzhan don grub/ 
167a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// thabs dang grol ba'i khyad par gyis// dbang po yul/ dang rnam shes dang // snang srid phyi nang snod bcud kyi// spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur ba kun// thabs dang shes rab dbye/ 
167a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// gsang ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas// ma lus rdo rje nyid 'gyur// snang srid dpa' bo thabs chen de// rang bzhin dbyor med dag pa yi// sna tshogs 'phrul pa rang snang bas// ma lus / 
167a7(rnying rgyud): me ye shes yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa// gzhan gyis dor ba'i 'khor ba'i chos// ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur// ma lus gcig dang tha bral
167a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i// ji ltar 'thun pa'i snying po la// so so'i don ltar mi gnas pas// bskyed pa lha dang gzhal yas dang // rdzogs pa na mkha'i ye shes dang // dngos po lhan gcig skyes pa ru// snang ba / 
167b1(rnying rgyud): gyis sgyur ba ltar// ma lus de yis ngo bor 'gyur// de dag bltas pa'i khyad par gyis// rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang // nus pa'i rim pa cir snang yang // na mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin las// nyi zlas
167b2(rnying rgyud): dkar spron khu rlangs// rang 'byung rang dngas 'gyur med ltar// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// dngos dbang don las ma g.yos pas// de dag de ltar nyid gnang bas// de nyid na mkha'i khongs su
167b3(rnying rgyud): 'du// de nas bstan tshigs bshad par bya// ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la// byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas// kun gyis mthong goms bya dgos pas// so so thun mong gtan tshigs dang / thun
167b4(rnying rgyud): mongs ma yin la sogs pa// rgya mtsho glong dang chu bo ltar// ma da lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin// thun mong bzhi sogs gang yin pa// log lta phyogs 'dzin dgag pa dang // dngos
167b5(rnying rgyud): dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir// thun mong gtan tshigs brjod pa yin// gang phyir gtan tshigs thams cad kyis// rang las 'phrul phyir me long nyid// ma lus gcig dang tha dad min
167b6(rnying rgyud): gang gi mtha' las yongs grol te// dbus su gzung med gtan la phebs// gcig dang du ma bral ba'o// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu ste// thabs de gdod nas dag pa gsum// ma lus rang snang rtogs
167b7(rnying rgyud): pa nyid// mtshan nyid de yi mtshan nyid// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// ma lus rtogs pa bzhir shar te// de nyid rtog pa bzhir snang // ma skyes dang las
167b8(rnying rgyud): gang snang ba// chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na// de dang der gcig dbyer med pas// dngos po lo rgyus nyid kyis shes// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yis// rtsa ba chags sdang lnga nyid de// gzhi rtsam
168a1(rnying rgyud): bcos skad cig ma// de nyid rang spyir gang snang ba// rtogs pas spyi dang rang mtshan shes// snod bcud rgyud rnams mtha' yas dang // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam
168a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyis// dngos po snang grags chos rnams kun// ma bcos de bzhin nyi gnas// me lus snying po thig le dang // lnga bdag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rgyu// sa ya bcu gsum rtsa yan lag/ ro dang / 
168a3(rnying rgyud): gnas skabs kun las grol// dang po gnas dang gnyis pa gnyis// gsum pa ma lus khyab byed pa// nyams su myong byed gtan tshig so// thig le gnas dang yig 'bru dang // de yi byin rlabs 'gre/ 
168a4(rnying rgyud): pa yis// bde ba chen po mngon du snang // chu las chu bo tha dad de/ 8/ rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs dang // lam dang zhing sa'i 'bras bu ltar// thabs kyi khyad par snang ba yin// dngas ma lnga las gang
168a5(rnying rgyud): byung ba// ji snyed lus sems rtsa thig le// khams lnga'i ro dang / bcud snang ba// ye shes chen por gtogs pa yin// / gsum dngos brgyad sogs kha dog grangs// gnas pa gang
168a6(rnying rgyud): yin de snod de// so so'i bcud kyi khyad par las// byang chub sems nyid gsal bar snang // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// bden bzhi dbyer med dngas ma nyid// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis
168a7(rnying rgyud): snang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le gcig dang du ma nyid// bral ba'i ye shes chen po nyid// gcig dang du ma las grol ba'o// bcud 'dus thig le gnyis ro rgyu// rlung dang ga
168a8(rnying rgyud): ngag rkyen ldan pas// 'bras bu lhan gcig skyes par snang // rang la gnas pa thabs kyis gsal// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro// rtsa yig bcas pa bcud 'dus pas// thabs dang drurlung
168b1(rnying rgyud): gi gdams pa yis// ma lus lhan skyes mngon gsum gsal// bde dang stong nyid mi byed pa'i// rang rig bde chen ma skyes gzugs// ma lus 'od dang rnam pa ltar// dbyer med tshul du rang gnang
168b2(rnying rgyud): ba'o// bde ba skyed pa'i rtog pa lnga// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid// ma lus ye shes chen po nyid// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab pa'o// dbang po snod bcud bcas pa yis// yab yum 'brel bar
168b3(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i bcud// sems lnga'i rgyud du rang snang ba// mnyam pa bzhi yi tshul du gsal// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba mthar thug pa'i// gtan tshigs mtha' yas bsha
168b4(rnying rgyud): pab ste// rdo rje me long bshad pa'i rgyu// gang gis rtogs pa de ni dad ni// ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs// yon+dan phrin da las rang snang ba// zag med rang byung ngang las 'char// chos
168b5(rnying rgyud): rnams 'bras bur lhun rdzogs pa'i// bdag dang gzhan don lhun rdzogs pa// ma bcos ji bzhin dang bzhag las// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // gang dag gang la gang rten
168b6(rnying rgyud): bas// lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu nyid// ma bcos sgyu ma lhun grub nyid// dus bzhi phyogs bcu ma lus par// lhun grub 'bras bur rang snang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang
168b7(rnying rgyud): ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lta ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// spyad pa'i khyad
168b8(rnying rgyud): bar ma lus pa// 'di dag bshad par bya ba ste// rang bzhin thabs dang mngon gyur pas// spyod pa ma lus bstan pa yin// e ma'o rang rig snying po las// bde sdug gnas dang lo spyod
169a1(rnying rgyud): dang // tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa// la lar mngon par chags pa ste// la lar drag shul zhe sdang spyod// la lar ri 'os non pa nyid// la lar ldongs pa'i mun pa
169a2(rnying rgyud): nyidazha la lar phrag dog snang ba yin// la lar ser sna 'thab bcod te// la lar 'tshal dang bya ba btang // rtsol dang mi rtsol la sogs pa// de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed// chos dbyings
169a3(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas mu med pa'i// nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par// spyod pa'i khyad par de nyid do// rang 'byung thabs kyi spyod pa nyid// ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa ltar// rang bzhin dbye ba med pa'i
169a4(rnying rgyud): phyir// sgo gsum byed spyod bsam mi khyab// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// ma lus sangs rgyas gnasagyur kyang // ma rtogs thabs dang bral ba'i phyir// bde sdug
169a5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phra dog chen po dag/ byang chub lam du bde bar bshad/ 
169a6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang bya ba sna tshogs kyis// mdzad spyod dka' ba sna tshogs pa// mi dang lha las thar pa med// dper na dug dang ldan pa la// thabs kyi khyad par ji bzhin du// rtogs pa'i khyad
169a7(rnying rgyud): par ji bzhin du// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun// rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa las// brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis// mi 'thun bde sdug sna tshogs myong // ma bcos
169a8(rnying rgyud): dbyings las g.yos pa med// gang dag thun mong ngo dag las// las dang bya ba sgo nas ni// spyad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir// 'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsung // rang bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod/ 
169b1(rnying rgyud): bayis// chu dang rlabs ltar khya gyur kyang // spong len bya ba sna tshogs las// spyod pa thabs kyis zin pa med// gang phyir thabs dang shes rab dang // sgra dang rtogs pa sna tshogs kyis// blun
169b2(rnying rgyud): mong yul du ma gyur pa// thun mong ma yin thabs spyod do// la lar thun mong nyid ste// thar pa dang ni mthar ba// kun tu rgyu dang mu stegs dang // bud med dang ni ma rabs dang // rgyal po
169b3(rnying rgyud): bo dka' thub can// byis pa la sogs tha dad de// la lar dgod dang drag po dang // gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang // la ler de bzhin chags chen po// g.yo rgyu spyod dang g.yem par ston// 
169b4(rnying rgyud): zhi dang sku dang pra dog spyod// 'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang // glu bro gar dang 'jo steg dang // de bzhin 'jigs drang sdigs pa dang // ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe// zhing lam
169b5(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang // ngo mtshar tshe 'phrul du mo dag/ gang dang gang gis mdzad pa dag/ skye bo ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston// zhi la tshangs
169b6(rnying rgyud): dang khro la khro// thar pa na chung mdzes dang rol// gdung dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba// rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i// sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston// byin gyis brlabs dang
169b7(rnying rgyud): rang snang dang // brda' dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang // tshig tu chags sdang rmo nges pa dang // shin tu rgyal dang phra dog dang // 'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan// brtsu ba dang drag dang sbom phra dang / 
169b8(rnying rgyud): ring thung rol mo lha klu dang // mi dang mi min 'byung po'i sgra// khyim bdag dbang chen legs dpon dang // chags can gtum po las sogs pa'i// sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa// 
170a1(rnying rgyud): dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni// gsung gi rol pa mtha' yas snang // la lar byams dang sdang ba dang // g.yeng dang mi g.yeng rmongs dang ri// sdud dang mi sdud yal
170a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang // grol dang ma grol rno rtul dang // ma rig ye shes la sogs pa// thugs kyi rol pa mtha' yas pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang // mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid// lung
170a3(rnying rgyud): dang rigs pa man ngag gis// tshad ma dag gis gang gcal ba// shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur// de nas chos rnams ma lus pa// bdag gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i// thams cad mkhyen pa'i
170a4(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis snang // mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid// dran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis// dus gsum rgya mtsho/ dgating lta bur// mi g.yo gsal ba'i ngang gyur nas// sgom
170a5(rnying rgyud): mnyam par sbyor ba yis// dang po rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste// de ba zhin nyid la gsal brtan te// stong pa shes rab ste bar bshad// de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa// rang 'byung
170a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems nyid phyir// gang snang rang rgyud dngos med de// sgyu ma mig yor brag cha dang // rmig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa// gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs// mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom
170a7(rnying rgyud): bar bya// gang lam ltas mngon byas dang // ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med pas// kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag/ dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya// rang bzhin che du dmigs pa dang / khyab dang shugs
170a8(rnying rgyud): las gang byung ba'i// snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad// de nas sgyu ma lta bu nyid// rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis// cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir// rig pa dbu mar gang gsal ba/ 
170b1(rnying rgyud): nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar// sa bon gang las thabs tshogs// 'phro 'du zhu nas mngon gyur pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang // de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis// brtan 'bar mdzes pa
170b2(rnying rgyud): gsal gyur te// mdun dang gzhan du skabs dag sbyor// gcig dang nges med rim po dang // 'khor lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur// gang gis gang de ma brtan par// 'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de/ 
170b3(rnying rgyud): skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis// gang bsgoms gsal bar mngon du 'gyur// tha mal zhen rtog zlog pa dang // lam gyi 'brel bar bya ba dang // dngos grub 'bras la myur 'jug pas// rtag
170b4(rnying rgyud): kye lha ni bsgom par pa de ltar brtan 'gyur gsal ba la// bdag/ gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i// sgo gsum sku gsung thug sa gsol bas// thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la// sgo gsum
170b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam bzhag rjes thob med// gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir// phyogs gcig spyod pa brtsam par bya// de nas/ rtsa ba goms pa dang // bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar/ 
170b6(rnying rgyud): gang de rim par brtan 'phel phyir// yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom// lhag pa bcu gcig dgur ldan pa'i// gcig las rgyas bsdus phye ba yis// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba lha dag kyang // yab yum
170b7(rnying rgyud): gnas dgod gsal bar bsgom// de dag lhag pa'i lha dgu dag/ yan lag tshul du spros te sgom// 'dul ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis// mdzes pa'i tshul dang gdug pa 'dul// lha dang zhal bya
170b8(rnying rgyud): dbu grangs kyang // rtsa ba yan lag spros tshul gyis// dkyil 'khor grangs dang gang sbyar ba'i// rim par spros shing bsgom par bya// grangs dang grangs med tshul dag gis// dpag tshad rgyang grags
171a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' dbyings su// zhi dang khro la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas sprin tshegs sna tshogs bsgom// dang po'i bar dang tha ma'i bar// rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal brtan
171a2(rnying rgyud): nas// sku gsum thugs dang ldan pa yi// tshem bu rim par bsgom par bya// dgon pa'i rim pa'am nags tshal dang // chu 'gram ri rtse dur khro dang // skyon bral yon+tan rdzogs pa ste// dgra dang phyog
171a3(rnying rgyud): mtshams skyon med pa'i// brtag pa'i rim pa ldan pa yis// shes dang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su// gzhal yas rim rtsegs mdzes ldan pa// rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la// ting 'dzin mnyam
171a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i shes rab thabs// mi ldan gong ma'i 'od kyis sbyang // bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis// mnyam nas tshegs de la 'jug par bya// yo byad lnga ldan thogs med par// cho ga
171a5(rnying rgyud): rim pa ji bzhin btsam// bro glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas/ bar chad med par bsgrub par bya// gal te 'dod pa na rdzogs par// sgyu ma'i lus de ma brtan na// yid kyis rje/ 
171a6(rnying rgyud): gsum gsal bas// rnam pa ra smin pa'i rig 'dzin de// phyin chad 'jigs bral khyung bzhon no// de bas 'brel pa'i spyod ldan na// dbang sgyur zag med sa thob ste// brgya dang stong sogs
171a7(rnying rgyud): 'jigs bral zhing // gling dang 'jig rten brgya stong du// 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul mtha' yas snang // 'jig pa med cing mi ldogs// dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan don
171a8(rnying rgyud): spyod pa'i khyad par dag/ 'dul ba'i dbang ni sna tshogs kyis// rnam par brtse ba sna tshogs spro// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// shes rab phyi yi spyod pa ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa 'i
171b1(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nang du 'jug pa'i rim pa yi// spyod pa'i khyad par cho ga dag/ de nas rim pa 'di dag bshad// lus can 'gro ba thams cad la// tsakra bzhi dang sku gsung thugs// 
171b2(rnying rgyud): spor dang 'bar ma 'khyil ba dang // 'brel dang ma 'brel khug pa dang // 'dzin dang 'dzag dang gnas pa dang // de bzhin khyab dang 'khrul pa'i rtsa// gang du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin pas// rtsa zhes de
171b3(rnying rgyud): la mngon bshad de// de dag rgyu dang lam 'bras dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bde ba chen po skyed par byed// gong dang 'og gi rang bzhin las// spyi dang khyad par kha sbyor 'byung/ 
171b4(rnying rgyud): sa byon khyab byed 'khor lo yis// thams cad khyab cing 'ja/ dag pa'i rtsa// dngas snyigs rlung dang 'brel pa yis// gang de pho mo'i bcud rkyen gyis// zag dang zag med bde
171b5(rnying rgyud): skyed// lus kun khyab par gnas pa nyid// dngas mthur m+b+hi rlung dang 'grogs// gang na smre sbyor 'khor lo can// kyang kun khyab rgyu ba can// 'khrul zhing 'khor bas 'khor
171b6(rnying rgyud): lo ste// gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi brten// rdzogs dang ma rdzogs gang mi gsal// sgra sbyor dag dang me dag gyur// bde dang snyan dang mi snyan dang // bya dang dri za bung ba dang // chags pa'i sgra ni sna
171b7(rnying rgyud): tshogs byed// mdog dmar lus khyab klu la sogs// u tha'i rlung dang 'grogs te gnas// d+harma tsakra srog gi rten// ma lus bzhi rtsa kun gyi srog/ rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dang ldan// dngas
171b8(rnying rgyud): ma lnga 'dus kun gyi gtso// byi rim rin chen sul mangs 'dra// mi shigs thig le bde chen po// rin chen phung po za ma rtog/ sna tshogs ye shes lnga'i bdag/ thung ngu a'i rang bzhin can/ 
172a1(rnying rgyud): srog gi rlung dang 'grogs te gnas// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// chos nyid ye shes yon+dan dang // rang rgyud bzhi la yan lag brgyad// thun mong phyi mam
172a2(rnying rgyud): ba yin// 'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste// zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon shes rtsa// chos nyid rim pa gsum du gnas// rlung yang gcig gam gnyis yin te// de las bye brag dpag med pa'o// gnas pa
172a3(rnying rgyud): dang ni rgyu ba'i rlung // gnas pa srog dang ye shes te// rgyu ba bzhi ni mngon par brjod// phyi nang can dgyen 'thur can// de re'ang dngas snyigs khyad par gyis// rim pa brgya du mngon snang yin// ga
172a4(rnying rgyud): dang 'gro ba'i sa bon gyis// chags sdang dran tog kun gyis zhi// gang du gnas dang gnas ma yin// rgyu zhing 'pho ba rgyu dgis te// bde dang sdug bsngal ji snyed pa// myong zhing skyed// 
172a5(rnying rgyud): par byed pa yin// 'di ni gnas dang mi gnas kyis// srog dbang dran pa dbang sgyur bas// gnas dang 'pho ba pha ro/ la dag/ gnas pa srog gi rlung can no// gang du 'khrul
172a6(rnying rgyud): ba 'dzed pa ni// ma lus 'gyed cing spro ba yi// gyen thur 'jig cing 'gengs 'byung ba'o// sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa// drug bcu rtsa bzhi snying po can// phyi rim bzhi yi rgyun du 'khyir
172a7(rnying rgyud): dbus nas 'khyil pa thig le'i rtsa// 'phen pa bde ba'i rlung dang 'grogs// gang du'ang 'khrul cing sprul pa'i phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid// de 'og gru gsum 'bar ba'i rtsa
172a8(rnying rgyud): gyen du 'bar dang thur du 'phro// 'od kyis 'bar ba'i sa byon can// rtse mo'i 'og nas reg pa'i khams// gtum mo lte 'og 'bar ba'i rtsa// skyes bu chags pa slong ba ltar// 'di dag
172b1(rnying rgyud): bde ba bskyed pa ste// gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas// de 'og g.yo ba rlung gi brten// 'byed dang 'dzum pa'i las can nyid// de dang de gnyis gang ldan pas// lus kyi dngas snyi/ 
172b2(rnying rgyud): 'dis 'byed pa// bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rtsa// 'dus pas sku gsung thugs yin te// lte ba thur du 'dzag pa'i rtsa// rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i gnad// rgyu ba rlung ni thig mo
172b3(rnying rgyud): rten// 'gyed cing 'dud pa g.yas g.yon te// bcu drug 'dus pa'i srog rtse gong // rtsa gsum mgrin par 'das pa ni// sgra sbyor 'khor lo ngag gi gnad// de nas dngas ma'i thig le la/ 
172b4(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas// rig pa'i rtsal ba cud 'dus pas// thogs med gsal ba'i mngon she ras 'byung // phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid la// bde ba chen
172b5(rnying rgyud): bcud 'dus pas// bde chen nyams kyi skye bar 'gyur// chos nyid thig le mi g.yo ba// dngas ma 'dus pa'i/ bcud thim pas// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi// zag ma
