172b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes bde ba che// nam mkha'i dbyings na rgya che ba// thog mtha' med par khyab par 'gyur// 'di nyid rtogs dang ma rtogs la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// spyod pa sna tshogs 'bru
172b7(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur// thabs kyi khyad par phyag rgya lnga// bskyod pa rlung dang 'bar ba me// thig le chu dang 'dzin pa sa// bde chen na mkha'i phyag rgyar gsal// bde bas bde ba'i don mthong bas// 
172b8(rnying rgyud): rtsa dang thig le rlung dag dang // bde ba rang rig ma skyes pa// de nyid bde chen mi rtog pa// rang rgyud bral bas zag pa med// rang rgyu med pa'i bde ba nyid// dngas ma'i thig les kun khyab pas
173a1(rnying rgyud): phyi nang dbang por bcas pa yis// bde ba rgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'char// ma lus bde ba chen po nyid// de la de yis rgyus btab pas// bde ba mi rtog lhan cig
173a2(rnying rgyud): skyes// phyag rgya gcig tu gsal bar gnas// gang du 'khor lo rtsa bcud ldan// sa bon yi ge bde ba dang // khams lnga ye shes ro ldan zhing // stong dang bde ba'i thig le 'dres// rtag tu dran
173a3(rnying rgyud): par gnas pa nyid// re re'ang de ltar gnas pa'i phyir// 'khor lo rtsa bcud thig ler bcas// lha dang ye shes sku gsung thugs rang lus snang ba snod bcud kun// spros bcas phyag rgya'i gra
173a4(rnying rgyud): su gsal// bcud lnga ye shes kho na'i phyir// dngas snyi dngas dbyer med thig le'i don// so so'i kha dog dbyibs datshul dang // sbas pa'i sku gsung thugs dag la// dbyer med
173a5(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i rig pa yis// ma lus bde tshon mngon du gas la// de nas bde ba chen pa nyid// gar thabs rlung gis dbang bsgyur nas// ma lus bde ba'i rig pa 'charo// gca
173a6(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzem pa bral gyur nas// bshung ba lnga dang 'dod pa lnga// thig le bcud dang dngas mar bcas// thig le chen por 'dres pas na// mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe la gnas// rang rig bde ba chen po
173a7(rnying rgyud): nyid// thog ma tha ma med par gnas// thig le rgyu ba rlung dang bcas// zag med dngas ma'i snying por thim// mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med// dngas ma'i snying por lam mthar phyin// de nas
173a8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba bshad bya ba// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag/ thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i// bden gnyis nyi zla'i khyad par las// ma lus thams cad gsal bar gnas// gang du thabs
173b1(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba yi// gnas dang bde sdug btang snyoms dang // longs spyod che dang kha dog dang // bdag dang bdag gir zhen byas pa'i// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg drang dran pa sna tshogs
173b2(rnying rgyud): kyis// zhen dang bcing ba'i rang bzhin gyis// rang bzhin bzhi ni gsal bar 'gyur// de las tha mal 'khor ba'i lam// thog ma med pas lus gnas pa'i// bde chen na mkha' snying
173b3(rnying rgyud): bo nyid// lus gnyis rtsa bcud ma lus pa// thabs dang shes rab sku gsung thugs// srin bu 'khyugs pa'i yi ge ltar// dbang po gnyis dang 'brel te gnas// thabs dang man ngag
173b4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yis// rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze dang // dmangs darigs chos ma gar mkhan ma// rdol ma nyo tshong ma nyid dang // ma dang sgyug mo sring mo dang // mthar sgeg lus 'tsheng
173b5(rnying rgyud): ma la sogs// dngos grub skye ba'i zhing du bshad// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug dang // bcwa brgyad bcud ldan rab yin te// nyi shu la sogs 'bring du bshad// rtsa lnga/ 
173b6(rnying rgyud): tha ma'i tshad yin te// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// las dang bya ba ma lus pa// cho ga'i sbyor ba rab tu btsam// gnas pa 'byung ba'i bcud bzhi la// 'byung bzhi gsal rkyen gang phrad
173b7(rnying rgyud): pas// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gang thabs las// lhan cig skyes pa gsum gcig las// nyams su ye shes lnga shar ba// ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur// gnas bzhi rtsa bcud thig le las// thab
173b8(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag rgya bzhir ldan mnyam sbyor bas// dngas snyigs rlung gis ngos bzung nas// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa dag/ bdag po gdung can sbyar ba'i// 'phro 'du
174a1(rnying rgyud): btang dang bzung ba dang // bzlog pas nyi zla dbyer med myong // dang po 'jug pa la sogs nas// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bdag par// lam lnga sems lnga mthar byin/ 
174a2(rnying rgyud): bas// stobs kyi khyad par gsal bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'og min na mkha'i shar sgo nas// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la// dus tshod gza' yis gang bzung ba// 
174a3(rnying rgyud): nyin mtshan med pa'i ye shes nyid// 'phen pa rlung gi sbyor bas 'byung // rnal 'byor rig pas snang ba yi// khyab pa na mkha'i 'jig rten na// bde chen mdzes pa'i me tog la// bcud kyis khya
174a4(rnying rgyud): par gang gnas pa// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// shes dang byu ru'i bung bsdus nas// rnal 'byor bcud kyis rgyas 'gyur nas// bcu gsum sa la lhun gyis grub// 'byud/ 
174a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i gar thabs las byung ba'i// bde ba'i chen po mi rtog pa// skad cig cha las byung ba yi// zag med ye shes/ snying po ste// ma lus dngas ma'i blo snang ba// zhen bral stong
174a6(rnying rgyud): rtog mi gnas pa// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ste// ma lus khyab par gnas pa yin// 'du shes zad pa'i rang bzhin te// skye dang 'grib pa'i thig le nyid// bcwa lnga rdzogs pa'i tha
174a7(rnying rgyud): ma nyid// sbyor ba kun zad stong pa'i ngang // de nyid byin brlabs las gyur pa// phyogs dus snod bcud ngo bo nyid// thig le rdul bral zhen pa med// sgyu ma gzugs brnyan brag cha sogs
174a8(rnying rgyud): ma lus bod chen rang bzhin du// thun mong dran rtogs rab bgegs dang // bde chen sgyu ma mngon sum snang // bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// bcud lnga zhu ba'i ye shes ro// thams cad
174b1(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig dran pa nyid// dbyer med thabs dang shes rab ste// dran pa gcig tu myong ba nyid// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// sa ya bcu gsum grangs med pa'i// thig le bde ba nyid
174b2(rnying rgyud): snang ba// rang rang ma 'dres thig le la// sku gsung thugs dang dran pa dang // ye shes lnga'i rgyas btab ste// ma lus thig le'i tshegasu snang // rang 'byung bde chen rig pa'i lha// gcig dang grangs lnga
174b3(rnying rgyud): 'das pa yang // nyi zla gnyis kyi gdan la bzhugs/ khyab pa thig le'i gur nang nas// bzhugs nas bdag po rten bdag can// rtsa bcud 'brel ba'i rgyan dang bcas// dka' ba gsum dang po
174b4(rnying rgyud): brang bzhi// lde mig gnyis la 'byed pa bzhi// sgo bzhi phye ba das gzhal yas khang // lha dang bcas pa mngon du 'gyur// / dgon pa du khrod ldan pa yi// gsang ba'i 'og min 'bar
174b5(rnying rgyud): ba nyid// rim pa phyi nang par ldan par// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng sa nas// dus gsum thig ler ro gcig pa'o// bde chen gnyis su med par bzhugs// thabs dang shes
174b6(rnying rgyud): rab dbyer med pa'i// tshem bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// thun mong dam tshig ting 'dzin dang // byang chub shes rab snying rje lnga// gzhan du thabs dang shes rab dang // spyad dang glu gar rgyan dang
174b7(rnying rgyud): bcas// ma spangs rol par long sprad pas// ye shes nyi zla rgyun 'char ba// rlung sems ye shes bcas pa nyid// rgyu ba med pa'i zag pa bral// nam mkha'i mthar thug par nyid du// zag
174b8(rnying rgyud): med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad// de nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor te// bde chen mngon du gang bar snang // de dag lam la zhugs pa yi// phyi nang gsang ba ma lus pa'i// spyod pa'i khyad par tham cad
175a1(rnying rgyud): kun// 'dir ni rgyas par bstan pa yin// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa// skabs la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang
175a2(rnying rgyud): rung bas spyad par bya// dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i lam spyod la// spyad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de// thams cad blang dor med par spyad// thabs kyi lta sprod ting 'dzin gyi/ 
175a3(rnying rgyud): pad+ma la ni 'dom bzhin nam// mun snang gser 'gyur thabs bzhin du// thabs la mkhas pas spyad par bya// skyes mchog thabs dang ldan pa yis// zhing dang spyod yul dag pa la// chags bral bde bar
175a4(rnying rgyud): gang spyod pas// nam mkha' dbyings kyi longs spyod la// bde ba chen por longs spyod cing // lhan gyis grub pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing // don med lam la
175a5(rnying rgyud): ma 'brel bar// sgra dang tshig la brten pa yis// gsang / ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa// gang bsgrubs snang bar mi 'gyur gyi// nus med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar// bdag bzha/ 
175a6(rnying rgyud): gnyis ka brlag pa dang // mthong ba'i chos la sdug bsngal zhing // ngan 'gro log pa'i gnasu 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrus drapagasda ba me long gi rgyud chen po las spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa'i
175a7(rnying rgyud): le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang // lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang // byang chub sems dang tsheH
175a8(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor don ni bshad par bya// gang phyir dbang yul rnam shes kun// gzhan snang tha dad ma yin pa'i// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// ma bcos rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ 
175b1(rnying rgyud): ma lus kun gyi snying po ste// phyogs bcu 'das dang ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// sna tshogs
175b2(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dbyer med pa// de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin// de nyid 'jig rten brten g.yo ste// ji ltar snang grags thams cad kun// nges pa'i rang bzhin bzhi bcu gnyis// rang bzhin long spyod
175b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs skur bshad// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs te// kun tu sku dang gsung dang thugs// yon tan phrin las bsam yas mchog/ rang bzhin sprul sku bsam mi khyab// ji snyed 'gro ba ma lus kyi// lus
175b4(rnying rgyud): can snying la gang gnas pa'i// rang 'byung zag med ye shes gzugs// mi shigs thig le bde chen po// nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa// mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin// de nyid
175b5(rnying rgyud): rtsa ba'i rang bzhin las// ma lus snod bcud rang bzhin can// rtog pa ma lus dkyil 'khor te// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// de nyid thig le phra rags par// 
175b6(rnying rgyud): snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// de yis de 'dul snang ba'i rgyu// sprul pa rang bzhin zhes bshad do// gang 'dir phung po 'byung ba dang // rnam shes dbang po yul dus dang // nyon mongs rtag/ 
175b7(rnying rgyud): chad yid chos bcas// gang la mngon par mi snang yang // rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor te// kun la khyab par snang ba yin// rang snying dngas ma lngar ldan pa// dngas ma'i phung po 'byung ba
175b8(rnying rgyud): dang // dbang po yul du bcas pa yi// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba// ma lus kun la rgyas btab po// bcud 'dus thig le chen po nyid// nyi zla 'dres
176a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis// thabs kyis mngon du gyur na yang // gnyis med thig le bde ba'i ro/ 
176a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro kun la rang bzhin snang // de dag yab yum sku gsung thugs// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// 'du 'bral med par ye gnas pa'o// gang phyir rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zag med
176a3(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang snang ba// dpag med yon+dan rgya mtsho nyid// ye shes 'og min pho brang ste// zag med yon tan rgyan ldan pa'i// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i pho brang dbus/ mi 'jigs phung po'i gdan
176a4(rnying rgyud): stengs na// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor// bka' sdod skyes bu mdun na gnas// gzhan yang rgyal ba rgya ma tsho'i tshegs// sku gsung thugs dang yon+dan las// rang rang
176a5(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga gang gyur pa'i// rnam thar dbu dang ye shes bya/ ga/ so so'i bzhugs tshul ldan pa yis// mdun rgya/ kha phyogs bcur 'khod pa nyid// yab yum 'brel ba'i
176a6(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis gnas// rang 'byung ma bsgribs ye shes phyir// zag med tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i// nam mkha'i khams dang rgya mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten drangs med rdul dang bcas// god
176a7(rnying rgyud): pa phun sum tshogs par gnas// gang de zag med ye shes kyi// phyag dang zhal dang thabs ldan pas// zhal mthong rigs la dbang sgyur bas// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// rgyal ba de
176a8(rnying rgyud): dag ma lus pa'i// gsung mchog brjod med pa nyid// namakha'i dbyings kyis mthar thug pa// brda' dang don dang byin rlabs dang // gsang ba las sogs ci rigs par// dam pa'i
176b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu rgyamatsho tshugs// zag med ye shes rgya mtshol// byin brnabs tshe 'brul mngon shAr ba// a A/ mA s+t+wa~M/ sU m+b+ha e maM/ ma // ma ma la/ sa sa/ kA k+Sha kras pa
176b2(rnying rgyud): dza d+ha ka ta thaMd d+ha na/ Ta Sha Da rmA/ na pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ shaSha sa hak+Sha/ 'di dag rab tu phyung ba yis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// nam pa'i dbyings dang rgya
176b3(rnying rgyud): dang // 'khor ra yug dang lhun po dadu 'bab chu steng ka mtshe'u bswa/ de na gan nga 'gro ba rnas/  rang po spyod pa de sdug bcas/ byin snod bcud bcas pa na ma// ma lus g.yo zhing ldeg pa byed / smra nga rlo pa byed/ de dag spungs na
176b4(rnying rgyud): mi gnas par// gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te// de dag stong nyid la thim pas// ma lus stong pa nyid 'gyur/ 8/ a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma dmigs su'ang yodas
176b5(rnying rgyud): ji snyed snang grag chos rnas kun yi phreng ba nyid lagan// gang phyir yi rang bzhin yang // rang bzhin tshe 'phrul ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba bris par gang snang ba// rig pa'i khyad par/ 
176b6(rnying rgyud): snang ba yin// rtsa ba dang ni rgyan zhes dang // lha yi yi ge mngon snang ba// rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid de// khyab pa'i tshul gyis ma lus snang // gang du thugs rje byin rlabs dang // ting 'dzin
176b7(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i cho 'phrul te// rang rang khyad par mngon snang yin// 'di dag rang bzhin sna tshogs pa// gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun// yi ger ma gyur med par gnas// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thad
176b8(rnying rgyud): kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i gsang ba'i thugs// mthar thug med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// zag med rgyas pas kun khyab can// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// gcig dang du ma med
177a1(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis// ye shes ma sgribs gsal ba yis// na mkha' dbyings ltar gsal mkhyen pa// dus gsum chos dang 'gro ba dang // zhing khams rgyal ba dang ga med pa/ 
177a2(rnying rgyud): ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa// snga phyi ma bsgribs da lta nyid// me long lta bu'i mngon du snang // dang ldan na mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab can// kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha
177a3(rnying rgyud): thug med// na mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen po// mngon shes rgya mtsho pha rol byon// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// sad dang sangs pa'i bdag nyid can// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag
177a4(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po sgyu ma nyid// rang byung thugs las gzhan pa min// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang ba bzhin te// gdul bya gang gi ngo dag tu// sna tshogs mngon par
177a5(rnying rgyud): 'phrul pa yin// gang du 'khro gtum gdug ldan pa'i// srid gsum dregs pa'i bdag po dag/ thugs rjes 'khros pa sa gdul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i de bzhin gshegs par mdzad
177a6(rnying rgyud): sku ni ri rab lta bu nyid// zhabs dang phyag ni rdul rnyed de// gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dang // dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag la sogs// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul
177a7(rnying rgyud): sogs// de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i// phyag zhabs zhal yang de bskyed de// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa des// ji snyed phyogs bcu 'jig rten du// cho 'phrul bzhi la sogs pa yi// 
177a8(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis// dregs pa che dang dbang phyug dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug rgya byin dang // dri zag shin rje gnod sbyin bcas// gdug pa'i nga rgyal rgyu 'bras can// rgyu 'bras/ 
177b1(rnying rgyud): rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// ma lus pa dag ma btang bar// nga rgyal khro gtum zhum pa yis// ji skad smras kyang rang rang gi/ nyon mongs rgya mtsho ma skams par// thugs rje zhe la mnan tshul gyis
177b2(rnying rgyud): de dag mngon du brtul bar mdzad// la lar dpal chen khrag 'thung nyid// la lar rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// la lar rin chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar pad+ma de bzhin gshegs// la lar sna tshogs las su
177b3(rnying rgyud): bcas// rang rang btsun mo tshogs dang 'khril// rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// mdog dang cha lugs de bzhin te// de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang // pho nya yang sprul la sogs pa// rdo rje ba spu/ 
177b4(rnying rgyud): bu ga nas// pho nya bye ba drug bcu dag/ phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas dbakye ste// na mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yi// gdug pa'i tshogs ni de dag kun// ma lus dus gcig btul nas ni// phyir
177b5(rnying rgyud): mi ldog pa'i sa la bkang // de dag gsung yang sna tshogs te// sprul 'gyed pas gsung gcig tu// khams gsu/ sgra yis gang bar mdzad// nA hUM hUM bi shwa kro dA dz+wa la maN
177b6(rnying rgyud): ShaT pheT// ha la ha la ha la hUM phaT/ phaT phaT phaT/ tra ta trata/ kro Ta kro Ta kr-i Te/ ha la ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Thi tiSh+Thi tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ha da ha daH/ gr-id+ha gr-i d+hi gr-id+ha/ btsab tsa pa tsats+tshaH
177b7(rnying rgyud): ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ gardzag rdzagardza/ hUM hUM hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phaT dz+wa la raM zhes pa'i sgra yis thams cad gang // ji srid na mkha'i mtha' thug par// ri dang gling dang rgya mtshor bcas// 'khor yug stong gsum
177b8(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten bcas// ma lus g.yo zhing spros bkong ste// gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa// gang gi dbang du ma btang bar// gdug pa dus gcig btul bar mdzad// de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog/ 
178a1(rnying rgyud): kyang // zhum pas smras shing gsol btab nas// rang snying phul nas dam mnos te// smod bcugs rang gi lam la bzhag/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag / 
178a2(rnying rgyud): la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad// la lar tshogs la chags chen po// la lar g.yem la g.yem par ston// sdang la drag shul spyod pa ste// nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon// zhi las slong/ 
178a3(rnying rgyud): dang zhi ba nyid// gsal dang zhe la gnon pa dang // chags khro dang ni sdang khro dang // rmongs khro gnon khro la sogs pas// bskal pa zhing gi rdul rnyed// rang gi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// gdul
178a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs su// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs dpa'i// thugs kyi sprul pa snang bar mdzad// gang phyir/ spros med goms pa nyid// de nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor
178a5(rnying rgyud): te// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa kun// rang rig rgyal por gnas pa nyid/ 'di nyid pho mo ma ning dang // mtshan med la sogs gang yang
178a6(rnying rgyud): min// dngos dang dngos med las 'das pa'i// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// rig pa skye ba med pa'i ngang // 'di nyid gsal bar sgom par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba Ad ma kro haM// skyes
178a7(rnying rgyud): dang ma skyes las sogs pa'i// tha snyad ming la mi gnas shing // blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas// 'di ni de bzhin nyid ces bshad// 'di la rim pa med pa ste/ skyes bu mchog gi yul du
178a8(rnying rgyud): / gsungs// ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid/ khyab pa'i tshul gyis na mkha' ste// rnam dog rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid// gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas// phyi nang chos
178b1(rnying rgyud): rnams thams cad kun// goms nas spros med de bzhin nyid// de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid// mi shigs thig le dngas ma'i bdag/ bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med// rtsa bcud thig le/ 
178b2(rnying rgyud): bcas pa nyid// thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes lnga yi ri dang bcas// bde chen skye ba med pa'i don// zag med khyab pa mngon du smin// ye shes na mkha'i gzug can nyid// 
178b3(rnying rgyud): phyi nang med pa'i rang byung ste// gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can// thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas// lus can kun la gsal bar skye// gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dngas ma nyid// rten can
178b4(rnying rgyud): brten par bcas pa nyid// rang 'byung thig le bde ba nyid// phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas// bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur// rang 'byung snying po dngas ma'i lus// 'byung ba/ 
178b5(rnying rgyud): zag med snying por thim// thig le spros pa med pa ste// tha/ mas cad ma lus khyab par snang // rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun// snyigs mad sa mar smin byas te// dang sa ma ye
178b6(rnying rgyud): shes snying por gsal// de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi// rang 'byung thog la spros pa med// dngas ma zag med stobs las snang // gang phyir skyes dang sprul pa dang // brtags pa'i gzugs ma las byung ba dag
178b7(rnying rgyud): po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las// skad cig bcu drug mtha' yi tshe// nyi bla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal// sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid// brjod med rang snang
178b8(rnying rgyud): bstan pa nyid// ma lus su gsung thugs gnas pa// 'khyud pa'i gar gsum bsdam pa yis// gnas dang 'thung ba ma lus pa// rang rig ye shes gzugs sdang // thabs dang shes rab dbyer de/ 
179a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig le ste// rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid// rang nyid gsal bar byin brlabs nas// ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad// lhan cig skyes
179a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngo bor gsal// ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs// dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor nyi du bshad// gang phyir mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor
179a3(rnying rgyud): pas// dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'i// rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba// de bzhin nyid de dang por bsgom// de nas snying rje na mkha' ltar// gsal la
179a4(rnying rgyud): stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom// yang na sgyu ma brag cha dang // chuzla'i tshul du bsgom par bya// de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid// gsal la brtan zhing goms pa yis// ma dag pa ni sbyang
179a5(rnying rgyud): byas te// dag pa'i mkha' lnga bsam par bya// e yaM baM su laM/ sa tshu me rlung na mkha' dag/ rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgo ma// de dbus rin chen khang pa dag/ mdzes pa'i tshul
179a6(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pa ste// brtsibs pani 'khor lo lte bar bcas// mu khyud zlum po thog mtha' med// gru chad blo 'bur bar khyams dang // sgo bzhi rta babs them skas dang // lnga rtsegs pa gu dra phyed dang / 'ad
179a7(rnying rgyud): yon ka bzar chags// mi sgrib gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan// mi 'jig la sogs lnga dbus gdan// nyi zla pad+ma la sogs pa// lnga dang gsum dang bzhi gcig/ rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan stengs su// 
179a8(rnying rgyud): sa bon chog las byung ba// gtso gzungs mthong / rdo rje 'dzin// 'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byon rlabs te// dbang bskur chog lnga ldan pas// sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod// chos kyi/ 
179b1(rnying rgyud): dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin// mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho// sor rtog pad+ma dmar po nub// bya grub ral gri ljang khu byang // btsun mo rigs 'thun dril 'dzin 'khyil// 'khor lo'i rtsibs mtshan shar
179b2(rnying rgyud): lho nas// sa snying dkar po myu gu 'dzin// sgeg mo dug mdog me long 'khril// nam snyeng sngon pa ral gri 'dzin// phreng 'dzin mA le na mkha' mdeg/ spyan ras leb rgan pad+ma dkar// 'gi ti bi wang dmar
179b3(rnying rgyud): mo mdog/ rdor 'dzin ljang khu las kyi rigs// phyag gnyis brkyang nas gar mdzad ljang // gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin// byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel dmar ser glegs bam bsnams// 
179b4(rnying rgyud): kun bzang dmar ljang rin chen ste// 'jam dpal dkar ljang ut+pal bsnams// brdzun mo rigs dang 'thun pa ste/ spos dang mar me me tog dri// 'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin
179b5(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du// stobs chen gshin rje gshed pi dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzhi// lcags kyu zhags pa lcag sgrog dril// mthing nag ser nag das
179b6(rnying rgyud): nag dang // ljang nag rdo rje thod dbyug dang // thod sbrul rdo rje rgya gram dang // yum yang so so'i phyag mtshan bcas// bsgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor bzhugs/ khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab du ni// kun ba
179b7(rnying rgyud): yab yum na mkha'i mdog/ phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs te// mnyam bzhag ye shes 'pho ba'i steng // rdo rje dril bu mtshan pa'o// thub drug dkar ser mthing ka dang // dmar nag ser nag dud ka ste// phyog
179b8(rnying rgyud): bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul// pi wang go cha seg par sgom// po ti me chur shes par bya// mi bskyod byed po la sogs pa// rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par rgyan// gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te// ya
180a1(rnying rgyud): nAn ta krid rtag pa'o// thub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid// sku gsung thugs 'bar byin rlabs ldan// rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan// cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya// dngas// 
180a2(rnying rgyud): ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid// ma bcos de bzhin nyid yin te// ye shes na mkha'i ngang dang 'brel// kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yis// khyab byed bde ba'i snying po nyid// tha mal rtog pa gang dag nas// bde ba
180a3(rnying rgyud): chen por byin gyis rlob// 'byung lnga dang sa ma'i snying po nyid// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te// d+harma tsakra chos kyi dbyings// mi shigs thig le kun gyi gnas// nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi thig
180a4(rnying rgyud): le'i gzugs dang tsher ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// rgyal po lnga ru ba shadad pa yin// 'byung lnga dngas mar bcad pa ni// dgyes pa bskyed/ 
180a5(rnying rgyud): phyir btsun mo ste// mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang // de ni/ ngo bo yul bcas ni// gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas// nang gi sems dpa' yab yum nyid// so so'i
180a6(rnying rgyud): bcud gnas pa'i rten// dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid// phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni// gnas dang dus kyi phye phyiro// gang de dang se mas bskyed pa yis// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas// 
180a7(rnying rgyud): sgo bzhi yab yum shes par bya// bde chen yid chos rang rig nyid// kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyid// nyon mongs drug gi yul rnams su// sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar pa'o// 'dul ba bzhi yis don/ 
180a8(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa// sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// kun kyang dngas ma'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yiraro ldan pa// gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa// ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pa'o// sa bon sku
180b1(rnying rgyud): ste yi ge gsung // bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan// 'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas// ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas// yan lag nyid 'di shes bya// stong nyid rdo rje la sogs pa// sngon byas/ 
180b2(rnying rgyud): rang rgyud med pa yi// rigs rtags gzungs ma blang par bya// rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas pa// lha yi rnal 'byor lus su bya// rdo rje snying po ge sar nyid// sra ba sa dang gsher ba chu// drod me bskyod pa rlung
180b3(rnying rgyud): de// bde ba'i dngas ma na mkha' nyid// bruM dbyings b+ha ga bde ba'i gnas// sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang // nyi zla pad+ma nus pa'i gdan// che ba'i yon+tan rdzogs par ldan// thabs dang shes rab
180b4(rnying rgyud): 'brel pa'i ro// lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi// rang bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas// ye shes phra rags gnyis su med/ thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// dbang po yul dus rnam shre
180b5(rnying rgyud): bcas// rang rang bde bar skyes pa'i lha// lhan cig skyes pa'i shes nyid// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas// thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer
180b6(rnying rgyud): ngag gis// brtags pa rang gi rtog pa zlog/ dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la// zlog bya ngas kyang ma dmigs so// bde ba'i thig le sa bon la// thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis// dga' ba'i tshad ldan
180b7(rnying rgyud): nus pa bcas// dngos 'di lhan cig bskyes par brtan// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// bcu
180b8(rnying rgyud): 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni// yon tan kun gyi ngo bo bas// che ba'i yon+tan kun rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas// de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang // rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis// ma lu/ 
181a1(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir// gsung gi snying po brjod par mdzad// bruM bi shra bi shuH/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ o dzi na dzig/ sr-i rang na d+h+r-ig/ oM a ro lig/ ha prar+d+ha d+h+r-ig/ mu~Md+hA tra sha ra
181a2(rnying rgyud): dwe sha ra ti/ me mo ha ra ti/ byaM rA ga ra ti/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Sha te rA dza ya/ traM a ga ra b+ha ya/ hrI ha pad ma pad ya/ d+h+wi ku ru ba na gr-i hUM la swe sa ma ya s+ho// traM mA le sa ma ya'o// sdig t+ye dge Ne/ a na t+yai reg ya mi/ 
181a3(rnying rgyud): maime d+hi ra na sA hA/ b+h+r-i ni sa ra pa ya swAhA/ hUM swa ra dza sa sAhA/ mu shrI a ra ga ya sAhA/ dza d+hu be pra be sha/ hUM bul+las be sha/ bdI pa su ki ni/ ho gan d+he tsing ta/ hUM ya mAn ta krid dza dzaT/ hUM big+ha nan ta krid hUM phaTahU~M \u0f7f
181a4(rnying rgyud): na ta kring baM phaT/ hUM pradz+nyA na krid ho phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA rad na d+ha ra ma hA kre d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA
181a5(rnying rgyud): kar ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsI ta hUM/ a a a badz+ra pa tra sa man ta aM/ oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mu ni hUM druM/ oM mu ne srung swA hA/ oM mu ne pr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne shaM swA hA/ oM mu
181a6(rnying rgyud): ne ye swA hA/ oM e ha hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ka ru NA~M kau trai sha ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AHhUM swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+wa dz+ra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhU~M swA hA/ oM s+phu wu
181a7(rnying rgyud): dra ba gnyis med pa'i// gsang ba zab mo sku gsung thugs// gdod nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'i// de ltar nyi dbyer med shog/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya he/ dzaHhUM baM ha~M/ 
181a8(rnying rgyud): brjod pas/ sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dag/ gnyis med ro gcig 'dres nas kyang // stong gsum dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// oM yA hUM swA hA/ mu ma laM pa te/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ tra~Mtra tra~M pr-ir+N+Ne d+hAd+d+haH
181b1(rnying rgyud): a ya sa ya/ hA hUM d+hU d+hU d+hU Sh+Ta d+hU hrAd+hUdz+dza/  d+hU d+hU d+hA d+hA r+m+mA d+hUd+hU b+h+rUM/ dzaHd+hUbato/ rab ldan pas// gtso bo lnga dang gco mo lnga// 'brel ba sum cucu gnyis dang // rdo rje khro bo khrim dang // sgo bzhi rab 'jam la/ 
181b2(rnying rgyud): pa// dkyil 'khor rgyas par snang bar mdzad// 'khor le nyis rtsegs rtsibs su bcas// 'khyams dang sgor bcas lha yi rim// rang rang phyag mtshan gdan dang bcas// bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas
181b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de nas rgyal ba de dag gis// dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la// dbang bskur byin brlabs bya ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad// oM ma hA shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&6/ 
181b4(rnying rgyud): oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA pra tra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM ma hA sa man ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA kri ta a nu sta na badz+ra swa b+hA/ 
181b5(rnying rgyud): ba Ang ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ya da ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bAkra badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsid ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba A
181b6(rnying rgyud): ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu ra ka badz+ra swa b+hA be Ad ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma kaM haM/ zhes brjod ye shes sku gsung thugs// rtse gcig thim par gsal bar
181b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// tsid ta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas// rin chen 'bar ba'i rdzogs pa'i mdzod// mi shigs thig le za me tog/ rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// tsing ta'i khams lnga'i snying po la// bde ba'i
181b8(rnying rgyud): thig le 'phra rags nyid// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por marjod// gang de dngas ma ye shes lnga// gang du mi phyed rdo rje gsal// dug lnga ye shes bskyed pa dang // btsun mo dag
182a1(rnying rgyud): bde'i ngo bor brjod// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid// rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs// rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid// thugs kyi sems dpa' nyid du
182a2(rnying rgyud): bshad// de yis gang la dbang sgyur ba'i// yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud// sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba// yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste// dbang sgyur gnyis med gang yin pas/ yab yum 'brel
182a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i ngo bor bshad// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rten// so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid// gang la de dbang de yi phyir// 'di ni phyi yi rim par bshad// gong la khams lnga'i bde ba yis// mnyes dang / 
182a4(rnying rgyud): thig le bkod pa dang // nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang // / de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te// zag med bde ba'i rang de bzhin gyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad// 
182a5(rnying rgyud): dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang gsal// thabs lam bcu du 'brel bar gsungs// gang de thabs chen gsal bya/ sa pas// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs// bde ba'i thig
182a6(rnying rgyud): le rang snang ba// ma lus 'joms la khro bo'o// bcud las 'das pa'i hUM gsum nyid// byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid// yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings// ma lus rnam dag kun tu bzang // dngas
182a7(rnying rgyud): snyigs snying por 'brel pa yis// nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas// thig le btul nas bstan pa 'chad// sprul pa'i sku ru bshad pa yin// kun kyang ye shes lnga'i ro// khyab par gnas
182a8(rnying rgyud): pas rgyas btab cing // snang srid bde chen sku gsung thugs// dran pa rtag tu gsal bzung ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus// phyi nang rim pa'i
182b1(rnying rgyud): dbu rtse can// ngo bo byin brlabs 'phags pa ste// yon tan byin rlabs kun gyi gnas// gsang ba'i pad+ma'i rang bzhin du// rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta// nyi zla zil ba'i thig le nyid// phan
182b2(rnying rgyud): tshun 'dres pa rlung gis phye// gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol// snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas// dngas ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal// gsang
182b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa// dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes// rigs mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga// snyigs ma bral ba'i dus na blta// thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams// rang rangab cig
182b4(rnying rgyud): le bde bar gsal// ye shes rnam shes dngas ma rnams// bde ba chen po gsal bar shes// dam tshig bde ba'i/ chas kyis sgregs// sgo gsum 'brel cing thig ler chags
182b5(rnying rgyud): gang du bde ba'i sgra sgrags te// bskyod cing 'phro ba'i gar rgya sa mnyes// thugs gang thig le brten pa'i gnas/ gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i// rten dang bcas pa'i bde ba
182b6(rnying rgyud): yis// rang rang thig le skyed par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thugs dang thig ler bcas pa nyid// dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gnas pa dang // thig le rlung dang bstod smad bsdams
182b7(rnying rgyud): bskyod dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin te// tshim dang thig le dor ba dang // ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas// rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags// gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang // 
182b8(rnying rgyud): rnam shes gang yin teta krid de// bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas// rtag chad mtshan ma bdag med pa// sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags// shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags// shes pa
183a1(rnying rgyud): gsum 'das sgrib zad pa// rang rig byed pa yid ces bya// rgyun gsum zad pa'i chos dbyings nyid// rtogs bya kun tu bzang mor bshad// 'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mong
183a2(rnying rgyud): bcas// zil pa'i thog sngon lam bzhin du// thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du yis// gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston// sa bon thig le ma skyes gzugs// bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan// 
183a3(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i yan lag sum rgya dang // drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas// tha mal zhen pa rang grol nas// rdo rje ze'u 'bru 'brel bskyod pas// rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags// yab yum lnga phyi
183a4(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis gzung // nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od// rtse nas rtse ru phyi/ na pa yis// 'khor ba'i mun pa kun bsal nas// ma lus// lhan cig skyes par gsal// de nyid gsang bar shes par
183a5(rnying rgyud): bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bzhi bcu rtsa lngar gnas pa yi// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid// rang rang mtsho na pa'i rtags yin te// rgyas dang bsdus pa'ang de bzhin du
183a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// dril bu pad+ma rin po che// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim bshad pa'o// gzhan gang gnas su rdo rje shes// dang po thugs dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar
183a7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dkar po rdo rje che// ut+pal klu shing spos+pho ti ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi wang gar skyusgyur bog me dang // byug pa so so rim shes bya// nr-i mge rdo rje thod rgya gram// lcags kyu zhags
183a8(rnying rgyud): ba s+pho ta ho// 'od 'phro mnyam bzhag rdo rje thal// ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril// thugs la brtan pa nyid du gsungs// thub chen nges par phyag gnyis shes// sreg par go mtshon pa
183b1(rnying rgyud): wang brdab sgrib stob spre ti chos 'chad tshul// me dpung bum par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'thun pa skabs kyis brtag/ mi 'thun khyad par rgyas par bstan// rdo rje rin chen bcwa
183b2(rnying rgyud): dang // rgya gram dril bu brgyad shes bya// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol// rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so// pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce// rgya gram khu tshur go cha mche// gzhan yang skabs dang 'thun pa ste/ Sha/ 
183b3(rnying rgyud): rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i// thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas// gcod dang mi phyed dga' ba dang // ma gos bde ba bskyed pa nyid// rnam par mi rtog rim par shes// 
183b4(rnying rgyud): yon+dan bskyed dang tha mal gcod// de bzhin mgos ye shes dang // se so yon+dan cha las byung // rang rang rtsa bcud thig le'i dadabyibs// so so nyid ltar rang gnas te// bde ba'i thig
183b5(rnying rgyud): le nyi shes// rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le nyid 'brel ba'i hUM la gyi kun snang ba khu bcu'i dbyi brag drug nyid/ ra rang lnga dang rtog pa dang / snying po phyag mtshan dbyibs bzhin pas// bde chen buH
183b6(rnying rgyud): su gsal brtan pa// thugs kyi dus su shes par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thog le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las// thugs mtshan che ba'i ye shes nyid// dpag tu med par ra
183b7(rnying rgyud): snang ba// bde ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od// ma lus de der snang ba nyid// ma lus gnyis med thig le yi// bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga// de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo// thugs kyi rang rtags
183b8(rnying rgyud): bsam mi khyab// bde ba thugs las gzhan ma yin// gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang // thun mong gnas su bsgoms pa dang // mi shigs thig le'i snying po la// sku gsung thugs nyid
184a1(rnying rgyud): gsal bar bya// don dam thig le pad rtsel// rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya// de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsalnga bar ban
184a2(rnying rgyud): cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis// rang snying rgyu yi sa bon hUM// dag pas rim pas gsal ba la// rang rgyud 'byung lnga nyon mongs lnga// rang byung lnga ru snang ba'i phyir// 'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya// 
184a3(rnying rgyud): e yang \u0f7fra su ke ra/ so so las rnams byas nas ni// nam mkha' gru gsum zla gam rlung // khrag gi dba' klong 'khrug pa dang // gti mug re dang nga rgyal ro// zhe sdang ma nyid bsgom par bya// mad/ 
184a4(rnying rgyud): kyang rim par shes bya ste// las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin dbartag/ bruM las dur khrod gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo dartsibs bzhi thod phreng dang // bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang
184a5(rnying rgyud): bcas// thod phreng sbrul gyi zar tshags// zhing gi gdul dang / kha ste// sprin nag dur khrod brgyan dang bcas/ khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo dang // thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can// nyi zla'i
184a6(rnying rgyud): rgyan can bsam byas la// dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang // dri za gshin rje gzhon par bcas// de bzhin gsal bar bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// cho ga las byung rim pa/ 
184a7(rnying rgyud): yis// gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir// dbang bskur byin brlabs rim bzhin bya// sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis// gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni// rang rang rim pa gsal gyur nas/ 
184a8(rnying rgyud): hUM gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs// ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba// dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshegs// rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma// spos mo dang ni gtu mo dang // sme sha can dang
184b1(rnying rgyud): mtshogs ma'i// so so'i cha lugs rngam 'thon nas// sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing // rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrogs// 'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya// he brgyad sa bon las byung ba/ 
184b2(rnying rgyud): stag dang seng+ge wa dang khyi// bya rgod kang ka 'ug pa dang // pho rog la sogs 'phra men rnams// 'phro 'du las dang phyogs mdog mtshan// rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bsam// phaT bzhis rta/ 
184b3(rnying rgyud): dang phag gdong dang / sbrul dang spre'u gdong rim par bzhin// las dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang // rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin// de dag 'khor la dbus dang lnga// yab yum phyag rgya 'brel
184b4(rnying rgyud): par gnas// rtsibs 'chan gru chad bzhi dag la// gnas kyi dam mo dgod par bya// bar 'khyams dang por 'phra men brgya dang // phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya// sgo bzhir
184b5(rnying rgyud): sgo ba rngam tshul gnas// bar khyams tha ma dag la ni// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// sku mdog phyag mtshan bcu gas tshul nyid// rim pa bzhin du bkod par bya// rin chen
184b6(rnying rgyud): thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag/ gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya// sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te// yan lag dkyil 'khor nyid bshad gang phyir na mkha'i ye shes nyid// spros med dam pa
184b7(rnying rgyud): nyid 'dod// bde ba'i thig le kun khyab la// chos nyid snying rje kun tu snang // thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu// zag pa med pa'i snying po yin// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can// thig le gong 'og
184b8(rnying rgyud): kun dang 'brel// gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gis// ma lus kun la khyab pa yin// dz+ha sgo g.yo ba'i sa sgo can// bskyod dang las kyis khyab byed pa// lus khyab gnas dang las dag ni
185a1(rnying rgyud): khyad par so sor snang ba yin// de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhin// 'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid// zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa// drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa yin// thig
185a2(rnying rgyud): le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud// gsher dang 'dzag pa'o baM snying can// sdang dang bebs pa'i rang bzhin can// lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya// gang la gang brten de yi brten// thig le rtsar bcas pad
185a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i rten// de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa// brten pas sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid// 'khor lo gzhal yas rang bzhin te// rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can// lus la gnas pas dur khrod de// kha dog
185a4(rnying rgyud): rtsa dang bcud bsdus pa'i// rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa yin// gang la rten pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha// / sa bon yi ge bde ba yis// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa nyid// 
185a5(rnying rgyud): gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde ba'i ros// ma lus khyab pa'i chu/ la gyis gnas// lus la thig le chen po gnas// gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// 
185a6(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i ye shes dpag tu med// 'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad// thig le gcig gis khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid// yul dang bcas sha
185a7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin las// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // gnas kyi thig le bde ba can// dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste// gnyis med 'phra men nyid bshad// thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid/ 
185a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel// snying po thig le nyid du sbyor// gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las// bde ba chen po skye ba med// ma lus bde ba chen po nyid// khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o// ma lus
185b1(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i bde ba'i ro// sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'// rang byung khyab pa chen po'i gzugs// kun 'dus thig le chen por gsal// rnam thar gsum ldan e yi gzugs// bde ba bskyod
185b2(rnying rgyud): dang thig le bskul// 'phro dang bsdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung // rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pa'i sa// rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa// shu kra'i thig le gang gsher ba// gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin// de dag phyag rgyas
185b3(rnying rgyud): gang sbyar bas// bde ba'i drod ni rang 'bar skye// bruM las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying po can// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te// yon
185b4(rnying rgyud): tan rdzogs pa'i dngos bzhi can// dga' bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan// 'bab 'dzeg thig le'i skas dang ldan// bde ba nyid zla rgyal la bzhugs// thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro// nyi zla
185b5(rnying rgyud): ba bde ba'i lha// 'thung dang rngub pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor/ ba'i sa bon zad ces pas// za byed khro bor de bshad pa'o// dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang // sa ya bcu gsum po
185b6(rnying rgyud): brang na// bde ba chen po ye shes gzugs// sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig bzhugs// 'du shes gsum ldan byin brlabs te// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas// dbang thob rnams la rgyas btab bo// 
185b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba thig le chen po ni// rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid// rnam rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi// rdo rje pad+ma'i bar na gnas// 'og sgo snying po pad+ma ni// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid/ 
185b8(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bcu du gyur pa na// de yi bde ba chen po nyid// khyad pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs// ye shes rgya mtsho lhan cig/ 
186a1(rnying rgyud): skyes// gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro// nyi zla 'dres pa'i tshul gyi snang // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad// de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun// gdul
186a2(rnying rgyud): bya bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyis mthas gtugs par// rdo khro bor snang gyur te// bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi// drag po lnga'i sngags dag dang // de yi gzhal yas snang ba
186a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad bruM bi shwa bi shud+d+he// dz+nyA na kA pa la rad na pan tsa hUM/ ma hA de ba sti ra baM/ Ar+ya tsan tra maN Da la hUM/ de steng so so'i sku nyid dag/ gsal ba'i rim pa dgod par bya// oM b+hU ta ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA
186a4(rnying rgyud): tsan Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ke ha na da hA pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rad na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha ba/ 
186a5(rnying rgyud): tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru kaM ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta
186a6(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hi shI ri sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra da ra kro d+hi shri dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rad na ma hA kro d+hi shwa re bi da ma hUM phaT/ oM shrI ta sa man pad+ma ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri kha hUM phaT/ oM sarba a ma
186a7(rnying rgyud): ka ma hA d+hi shwa ri bi sha hUM phaT/ badz+ra kau ri ha/ badz+ra tsi ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra be ta le ha/ badz+ra pu ka sa~M ha/ badz+ra g+ha sma ri ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni he/ badz+ra tsaN+Da li ha/ badz+ra si ha mu ka he/ badz+ra bya kri mu ka ha/ badz+ra sri la muka
186a8(rnying rgyud): he badz+ra sho na mu ka he/ badz+ra kri ta mu ka he/ badz+ra kaM ka mu ka he/ badz+ra kha kha mu ka he/ badz+ra u li ka mu ka he/ badz+ra Ar+ya te tsa teng tsa/ badz+ra a mo g+ha hUM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra pa smi ba la ya pa to ho// d+h+we b+he b+h+ye b+he b+h+yob+h+yaH
186b1(rnying rgyud): b+hUb+hU b+hUb+hA b+h+ya b+h+yag+h+ra b+hU b+hU b+hU b+hA b+hA b+hUg+h+na b+hA b+hA b+hA b+hAb+hU b+hU g+h+ra badz+ram nu g+sa sa/ badz+ra blan mi / badz+ra ga badz+ra ba sdug ba gom pa/ badz+ra yin tran/ badz+ra su ye/ badz+ra dag lam/ badz+ra so mi/ badz+ra sa mr-id/ badradun dam/ 
186b2(rnying rgyud): badz+re ra k+Sha se/ badz+ra bo ga shi sa~M/ badz+ra ra ti sa~M/ badz+ra ru to ra ma taM/ badz+ra e ka dza raM/ badz+ra na mo ha raM/ badz+ra si ti kaM/ badz+ra ba ya be/ badz+ra ma hA mA ra na/ badz+ra ag ne/ badz+ra bar hi/ badz+ra rtsa mu ti/ badz+ra pA dza na/ badz+ra ba run
186b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ma hA ka la/ badz+ra tsakra la/ badz+ra sum ba ka lan/ badz+ra lam bo d+hA ra/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi/ a na ya/ dza hUM baM ho/ ra/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khro dpal
186b4(rnying rgyud): rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+rakro d+hi sa ma ya phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/ a li u li ta la
186b5(rnying rgyud): ta pa ti/ dan+t+ra g+hon ro ti/ khar yo gau ni khA hi ho/ hUM ha he phaTad+d+haHgsang sngags drag po mthu yos ni/ phyogs bcu tshig/ cing rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu tshig par 'gyur// 'bar / 
186b6(rnying rgyud): rab 'byam kun tu 'bar// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khyor khro tshogs kyos// gang zhig rab gang kun tu gang // 'khrugs dang rab 'khrugs kun tu 'khrugs// 'thor zhing rab 'thor kun tu 'thor// 'gul
186b7(rnying rgyud): zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang la yi// sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa// thul zhing rgyal nas myos gyur te// de dag bde bas bslang
186b8(rnying rgyud): byas te// bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i gar// phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthar thug par// rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed// rdo rje gsang ba'i rang bzhin las// thig len po'i dkyil nga
187a1(rnying rgyud): bsgyur// gdod nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid// ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid// ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa// na mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid/ 
187a2(rnying rgyud): ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid// khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin te// mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che// snying rje chen por brjod pa yin// kun gyi rgyu ni thig le ste// ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid// mi shigs/ 
187a3(rnying rgyud): snying kha'i pho brang nyid// ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang // nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid de// rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas so// nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid// gdul ba thub
187a4(rnying rgyud): pa nyid bstan// phung po nyon mongs lnga dag pa// rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te// rang snying dngas mar bcas pa nyid// dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid// rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid// 
187a5(rnying rgyud): rten dang brten par bcas pa yi// bde ba 'phra men bcu drug/ nyid// phyi lta nang lta dkyil 'khor nyid// dgug dang 'dzin dang thig les bsdams// thig le'i rang bzhin gnyi su med/ 
187a6(rnying rgyud): dbu ma'i thig le bcas pa'i lam// dbang phyug na mkha'i dbang mo tshogs// dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas// thig le dbab pa'i thabs bzhi yis// phab pas rang rgyud dngos po bsreg/ dran 'byu
187a7(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i 'phro 'du tshogs// bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug/ gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar// sku gsung thugs kun gsal bas// gnyis med thim pas mnyes par mdzad// rang bzhin bde
187a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim// dran rtogs 'byung ba nyon mongs kun// tshig pa gsum du shes par bya// ye shes bde ba chen po nyid// 'bar ba gsum du shes par bya/ 
187b1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis// ma lus gang zhing khyab par gyur// thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid// thig le gong ma nyid 'og tu// 'og ma nyid ni steng du 'bar// gcig gnyis lus kun khyab pa 'thor/ 
187b2(rnying rgyud): lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang // ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang // bde bsad dbang bsgyur tshim pa'i sgra// ma lus khyab par sgrogs par byed// sku gsung thugs kyi b+ha ga nyid// bde ba chen po
187b3(rnying rgyud): namakha'i dbyings// 'byung ba ni rdo rje pad+ma nyid// reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba yin// re dogs rgyu ba chang pa nyid// de bzhin nyi du blta bar bya// thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis// sa yang bcu gsum khyabs
187b4(rnying rgyud): yid// ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i// rang 'byung phyogs med kun tu snang // thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis// 'bru rang bzhi rim pa'i dngas ma ste// sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags
187b5(rnying rgyud): b+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten// sangs rgyas rin po tshe yi snod// phung po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga// ye shes lnga yis
187b6(rnying rgyud): zil gyis mnan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na// ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan// gdul bya 'joms pa'i
187b7(rnying rgyud): khro bo lnga// 'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan// myong dang yul bcas rnam shes yul// 'phra men nyi shes par bya// phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi// sgor bcas nyid du shes par bya// sgal
187b8(rnying rgyud): tshigs 'jug pa'i thig le nyid// dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya// gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba chen po spyan drangs pas// rtog pa bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug/ rim pa gnyis
188a1(rnying rgyud): med brda' mjal mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid// gnyis su med par thim par mdzad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug po mo kun// bde ba chen po mnyes par
188a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas gang tshe snying po la// ma lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan// thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro// ye shes lnga ldan zag pa med// phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin
188a3(rnying rgyud): te// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// lhan gcig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i// thig le rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid// gnyis med 'khril pa zhes bya ste// rang
188a4(rnying rgyud): rig bde ba chen por thim// sangs rgyas rin chen de yi dbyig/ kha sbyor snying po za ma tog/ sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las// ma lus thig le gnas par mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi po rang ni// 
188a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de// rdo rje snying po rtsa dang 'brel// gnyi/ sa med bde ba'i thig ler gnas// gsang ba'i thig le/ chen po ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud yid de// gsang ba yo// 
188a6(rnying rgyud): tan rdzogs pa'i mdzod// snying po'i lam la gnas par bya// rdo rje nya ma'i snying po la// rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// gnyis med thaM/ ga les gang ba yi// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char// brten
188a7(rnying rgyud): nas babyung ba'i rten can nyid// gang la gang gis mnyam sbyor bas// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// rang rang thugs kyi dkyil
188a8(rnying rgyud): nyid// gdul bya'i ngol dgongs mdzad/ zugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad// rdo rje rje dro'i bu dang // 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas pa 'gas// de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs pa
188b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dgra sta dang // kha T+wAM rab tu 'khrol ba'o// nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang // rdo rje dgra sta rab tu rdebs// chags mchog pad+ma chen po dang // dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrogs pa'o// las ni ral grig / 
188b2(rnying rgyud): chen dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste// bar ma rdo rje dung mar 'khrug/ stir chen po rab rdebs pa'o// brdzun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang // 'khril bas pad+ma rag ta stob// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya
188b3(rnying rgyud): ni// byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang // byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul// byis snying dung dmar byis rgyu dang // mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas// steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang // byos ldag kheg
188b4(rnying rgyud): badral zhing lte// rgyu mgo nong khur rgyu gri dang // rdo rje lcags kyu 'di na pa'o// lcags kyu zhugs pa lcags sgrog dang / dadril bu 'khrol bas spong bar byed// slas dang bye mo bran mo/ 
188b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// kun mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bcas// zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khri
188b6(rnying rgyud): tshul can// dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings// sha da ba yi klu len cing // dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul// snam zheng che la rked pa phra// nu 'bur stod smad bye zhing 'gying // dmar la klan zhing
188b7(rnying rgyud): 'dud tshul can// gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang // so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni// srin mo smug nag thod glon 'chang // tshangs ma dmar ser pad+ma bsnams// lha chen kar ljang tri shU la// 
188b8(rnying rgyud): gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang // gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phel// brgya byin dkar mo in 'dra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo can da 'thung // bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams// zla ba dkar mo
189a1(rnying rgyud): pun ta ri// be con ljang gnag dbug tho 'byar// srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung // za ba ldang nag pa su 'dren// dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang // stobs chen
189a2(rnying rgyud): dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma// rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mnga' gzhu 'gyengs// nor srungs dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba ngan 'phyar// gsod byed dkar me ral gris
189a3(rnying rgyud): me mo dmar mo gsal zhing 'chang // phag mo nag mo mche zhags can// rgan byad dmar mo zhing chung za// sna tshogs dkar mo thong khrag 'thung // chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje nag mo lcags
189a4(rnying rgyud): kyu 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo ra mgo zhags// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ljang gnag dril 'khrol 'gying // so so brjid pa'i stabs ldan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya/ 
189a5(rnying rgyud): ste/ rnam par spro ba'i rgyas pa'i phyir// sku dang gsung dang thug/ sa nyid dang // yon tan 'phrin las khro bo'i phyir// lnga na cu brgyad ldan bye brag lnga// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang / 
189a6(rnying rgyud): sku mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag/ rigs rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba rtag/ de ltar bsams dang bris pa dang // brjod dang mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar 'tsham par bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan
189a7(rnying rgyud): 'das dgyes pa chen pos// rngam pa'i zhal gdams spun zlog cing // mche ga rtsigs phyogs bcur gom pa yis// 'jigs pa'i stang stabs gar mdzad pas// 'jigs byed bcu ni rnam par 'phrul// 
189a8(rnying rgyud): ma ma ma ma ma mam ma ma lo// babab ba baba'ab ga/ rdzangadra drung gra rjes gro thab tha thatha tha / nga / dru ba rdzal/ na lang tag yoman tag sa
189b1(rnying rgyud): sa thalas mdzaH/ ar+g+haM A /  ba ja/ mahA /  ya la ga gas pagu phas ya/ dang rdzun du byung ba mas// dbos gan
189b2(rnying rgyud): byed cing // rgya mtsho ma lus 'khrug pa dang // sngags kyi sgra chen grags par 'gyur// hU~M mdzod rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can// gshed po gzhan 'joms rta mgrin dang // mo g.yo bdud rtsi khams gsum rgyal
189b3(rnying rgyud): stobs chen khro bo 'di dag gis// rang rang bgegs kun rnam par gzir// ma lus 'jigs shing 'joms par mdzad// gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+ma tshaMH/ 
189b4(rnying rgyud): tshir+b+ba bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ s+pho Ta s+phoT hUM hUM hUM hUMHhUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT paHdang Ta phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po dug kyang // blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal ba'i
189b5(rnying rgyud): me ri nang rol du// bri 'am bsams mami dmigs bya ba/ mthing ka dkar po mthing nag dang // ljang sngon dmar nag/ dud ka ldang // dkar ljang dung dmar mdog tu snang // khro mo lus
189b6(rnying rgyud): dang grib mar gnas// 'khor lo ni mgo rdo rje ster// drang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang // gshin rje'i rkang bzung zhing dbyug 'phyar// ral gri bden bral stir dbyug gshog/ ba dan brgyad thogs
189b7(rnying rgyud): ram nyid// rin chen ni mgo gsum gyi dbyug/ rdo rje rtse gsum ni mgo dang // thong gshol gtun shing g.yas g.yon thogs// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste// blo ldan rnam par bsams nas
189b8(rnying rgyud): ni// bgegs dang gdug pa rnam par 'jig/ pho brang 'khor dang rnam par bsgom// de nas gzhan yang gshad bya ba// rang lus rten dang rten pa yi// dkyil 'khor nyi du gsal bar rtag/ lte ba snying
190a1(rnying rgyud): ste sku gsung thugs// thig gis cha chen cha chung bcas// gnas bzhi dngas ma 'byung ba ste// khog pa du khrod gzhal yas khang // ka ba gdung dang rta babs dang // bla bre rdo rje/ 
190a2(rnying rgyud): ra ba dang // 'khor lo dra ba dra phyed dang // nyi zla skar khung rdzing bu dang // skyed shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs// cod pan nyi zla pad+mar bcas// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang // rang 'byung
190a3(rnying rgyud): rtsi rta'i 'khor lo na// thig le ye shes lnga bdag nyid// ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros// cho 'phrul bstan pa'i gdug pa 'dul// so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi// ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i tshul tu bsgom
190a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung bzhi dang ma yum nyid de// bde ba'i dngas man mkha'i khama?/ 8/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rang bzhin kham sa lnga'i rang bzhin bcud// zla ba nyi ma gnas pa yi// shrI ra tsi shi
190a5(rnying rgyud): thig le la// nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang // spyod yul bde ba/ rwa sgyur ba dang // thig le so sor dgod par nus// phye bra rim pa'i 'khor lo ste// bsdus pas thig le chen po nyid/ 
190a6(rnying rgyud): thig le ye shes lngar ldan pa// thabs nyid dang sa ma yum du bshad// rnam shes thig le nyams myong nyid// tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang // gnas kyi thig le tsar bcas pa// 'phra men nyid
190a7(rnying rgyud): shes par bya// gnas bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo nyid de// sgal tshigs la rten bde ba'i bcud// 'phro zhing sdud pa dbang phyug ma// gnas brten bcu yi thig le la// 'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed/ 
190a8(rnying rgyud): nyams myeng skye dang rnam pa med// spyod yul dag pas mang du bshad// zla ba nyi ma la rten te// sku gsung thugs kyi lam rgyud de// thig le g.yo dang 'bar ba dang // re dogs med par rnam par dran// bde ba
190b1(rnying rgyud): yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur// 'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya bzhis// rdo rje snying po'i pad+mar 'brel// bskyod pa rlung dang mnyam sbyor bas// nyi ma zla ba dus gcig 'char// de nyid kun tu khyab pa las// ma lus
190b2(rnying rgyud): lhan cig skyes par 'gyur// bde ba chen po gnyis med pa// kha sbyar bsrub pa'i thabs las skyes// thabs las byung ba'i gsang thig le// ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud kyiro// rten las rten can nyams myong / 
190b3(rnying rgyud): ba// lhag pa'i ye shes thabs las skyes// chos dbyings la sogs ye shes lnga// thugs nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste// gang la rten dang 'bar dang 'dzag/ bde ba'i rlung dang na mkha'i khams// de bzhin
190b4(rnying rgyud): btsun mo dgyes skyed pa// mi phyed gnyis med lhan cig pa// gang de thabs las byung ba yi// dngos gnyis yum dang dbang po de'i tshogs// lhan cig skyes pa'o thig le nyid// ma lus bde ba
190b5(rnying rgyud): rang snang ba// gnyis med 'dus pa'i stobs las byung // gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig ler bstan// dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdams dang 'bebs// ye shes 'jug pa'i sgo yin te/ 
190b6(rnying rgyud): sgal tshigs brgyud pa'i thig le'i rgyun// dbang phyug mar ni shes par bya// ba spu thig le 'brel pa nyid// 'phra mo bsam mi khyab snang ba// grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste// bsam byas na mkha'i
190b7(rnying rgyud): zhing du sbyar// sku bzhi las byung gsang thig le// khams gsum bcud 'dus pade chen po// yungs da/  lhun med brtan pa las// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang // thig le bde chen thabs skye
190b8(rnying rgyud): ba// thob dang goms pa'i rang bzhin las// zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas// rang dbang med pa'i rtags 'byung ste// sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya// snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos// bde ba
191a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i thig ler brtan// nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar// bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don// ma lus bde chen rgyan tu snang // de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ba
191a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa// rang 'byung ye shes chen po ste// de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog/ ji snyed brtan g.yo snang ba'i chos// chen po rags pa gnas pa'i chos
191a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus kun la 'thun snang ba// rang 'byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// de dag gdod nas ma skyes pa'i// rdo rje shes rab ston nyid de// gang yang dngos min ngo bo nyid// shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin// ji snyed na ma
191a4(rnying rgyud): mthar thug pa// rang 'byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs// ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dpag med 'thun par snang ba ste// me long dang ba'i rang bzhin nyid// sna tshogs gzugs dang 'bre
191a5(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin/ ma lus rigs pa'i thig le las// ma lus sku yi/ dkyil 'khor snang // ji snyed rab 'byam ma lus pa'i// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang // zin dang ma zin gnyis ka'i sgra/ 
191a6(rnying rgyud): nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa// brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang // byin rlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba// byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog ste// nam mkha'i sgra dang
191a7(rnying rgyud): brag cha ltar// rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid// bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed par// ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas// gang du na mkha' mtha' klas par// 
191a8(rnying rgyud): bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar// na mkha' char dang chu bur dang // sprin dang chu rlabs phung ngo ltar// ye shes bde dang sngags bsngal dang // nges dang ma nges dam pa dang // dman dang chags dang chag
191b1(rnying rgyud): bral dang // zin dang zhen dang b.lenapa rna ba rnam med rtags pa'i chos// dran rtogs rig pa gang yang rung // ma lus rig pa rang snang ba// snga ma dran pa'i rnam pa'am// rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar// sna
191b2(rnying rgyud): tshegs snang yang rang rgyud min// gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i// ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams// rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// gzugs/ 
191b3(rnying rgyud): brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rang 'byung ye shes skye 'gag med// ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs// rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid// yon+tan lhun grub rang snang bas// de yi brnyan pa rang
191b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin 'char// mtha' bral rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni/ cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir// yang dag brtan pad mi gnas pas// ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor shar/ 
191b5(rnying rgyud): bde chen rang 'byung lhun grub nyid// yon+tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu / dpag med chos su snang ba'i phyir// bde ba chen po'i/ gzugs brnyan te// skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i// gdul byam/ 
191b6(rnying rgyud): dman rig pa la// rig sbyang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir// dang po nas bzung mthar thug par// rang rang bsam pa de bzhin du// de dag ngo la de ltar snang // gzugs brnyan phyi yi rim pa ste// thun mong yul
191b7(rnying rgyud): du gyur phyir ro// ma lus tha dad med pa yi// phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus// bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i nas// mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos// rang nyid bde ba chen po'i gzugs// 
191b8(rnying rgyud): dngas snyigs 'brel pa'i nus mthu las// zag pa yod dang med pa yi// dngos po gnyis kyis chos su snang // rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la// nus pa'i khyad par so so yis// 'byung ba dang ni yum nyid
192a1(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po la sogs pa// thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang // ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid// thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs// rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni
192a2(rnying rgyud): bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba// ma lus rten can dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus snod bcud kun tu snang // thabs chen gsang ba'i rim pa nyid/ khams bzhi las brten thig le nyid// g.yo dang 'dzag
192a3(rnying rgyud): cing gnas dang thim// bye brag gsum las rgyud pa yis// gru dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la// zhugs dang 'thungs pa'i spyod yul lam// me long lam dang ba'i ri bo yi// rtser byin ma lus bltas pa
192a4(rnying rgyud): ltar/ bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid du snang // rim pa bzhi yi thig le nyid// bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba// gnas bzhi'i thig le'i bye brag gsal// mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa
192a5(rnying rgyud): ltar// 'jig dang 'bar ba'i thig le nyid// til 'bru 'bras bu smin pa ltar// ma lus til gyi phung po ltar// thig le'i lus su gnas pa yin// nyams myong gsal bar 'bar
192a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshe// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang // 'bar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar// rnam par rol pa'i tshigs su snang // snang srid bde ba chen po nyid// tha ma la nub cing brtun gyur na// thig le nam pa
192a7(rnying rgyud): stobs kyis sbyang // rtse gcig na mkha'i mthong stobs kyis// thig le stong par thim pa na// ye shes namakha'i gzungs su nges// snang sring snod bcud ma lus kun// bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnan
192a8(rnying rgyud): du// rgya mtsho 'dzangs nas bltas pa ltar// ma lus de ltar snang ba yin// rig pas nyam su myong ba dang // spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad// rang byung bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i gang zag
192b1(rnying rgyud): gdul ba dang // gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi// cho ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing // dbang bskur byin brlabs sbyangs pa dang // brgya phrag gsum dang drug
192b2(rnying rgyud): bcu dang // drug bcu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis// chu skyes snying po rdo rje can// nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba// rang 'byung rlung gi phyag rgyas bskyod// nor bu chu 'dzag rang dbang med// ma lus rig pa'i thas
192b3(rnying rgyud): ler bsdus// rgyu ba'i rlung ni chad pa na// rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim// a ta la' rten thig le'i rim// rgyu dang ma rgyu'i rang bzhin las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par snang // gsang ba thig le
192b4(rnying rgyud): la brten pas// ma lus bde chen 'khor los sgyur// 3das kyi thig le dang por te// de nas rig pa'i thig le yi/ na// de nas ye shes thig le nyid// tha ma chos nyid thig ler cim
192b5(rnying rgyud): de nas dus gsum 'du 'bral med// bde chen na mkha'i khams nyid de// zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi// rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan/ 
192b6(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzug brnyan te// rtog par nya myong gzug brnyan nyid// mthar phyin ye she gzug brnyan 'di/ dman dang yan lag ma tshang dang // dbang dang man ngag med pa dang // dka' thub can dang ma smin dang / 
192b7(rnying rgyud): skal med yal ba'i yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid// de nas bzhan yang bshad bya ba// lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid// tha mal brod pa skyed pa'i phyir// cho ga
192b8(rnying rgyud): rgyas par bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'od kyang // ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la// lhag par 'di yis rtogs gyur pas// lhag pazhes ni bstan pa yin// gang gis gang la
193a1(rnying rgyud): gang mtshon pas// lhag par mtshon par nye ba dang // gang la rten te gang bsgrubs pa// lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// 'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod// gang lag
193a2(rnying rgyud): de thabs 'di yis// mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs// thabs de gang gis mngon ston cing // dngos bzhi ma yin pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan nyid bstan pa/ 
193a3(rnying rgyud): yin// gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis// de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar// ma mthong mos pa'i gdul bya la// de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de// dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no// rgyal ba kun gyis
193a4(rnying rgyud): bzhi no// dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rang 'byung lnga'i gzugs// zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang // de yi yon tan gzugs brnyan gyis// zag bcas mos pa'i
193a5(rnying rgyud): gang zag la// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid// 'dra bar ma/ tshen phyir gzugs brnya no// gang phyir chos dbyings rnga po la// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang // mos dang drag po'i dbang
193a6(rnying rgyud): gyur te// gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas// thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir// long spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan// zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can// thabs dang drag pos tshar gcad phyir// 
193a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar so so'i 'tsham pa ste// lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis su bshad// gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i// steng 'og phyogs bzhi par mtshams dag/ legs pas yid 'ong bar chad med/ 
193a8(rnying rgyud): phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog/ rang gi sa gzhi legs brtags la// pra dang nyams kyi ltas brtags la// ma dag mtshan ngan spang byas la// dag cing nyams dga' blang bar bya// sa gzhi byin brlabs
193b1(rnying rgyud): bkra shis pa// gal te rtsod pa zhi bya'i phyir// snang dang mi snang bdag po la// mgu bas bar chad med par bslang // gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir// cho ga'i yan lag kun brtsams te// mchod dang mnyes
193b2(rnying rgyud): pas tshim byas la// sa gzhi bdag gi dbang du bya// thun mong skyon gsal dag byas nas// mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing // dngos grub myur zhing nyams dga' ba'i// phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang // rang
193b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos// gdod nas ma bcos gan pa la/ lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med pas// lha dang gzhal yang por brlag/ gang de'i bar chad srung ba'i phyir// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal / 
193b4(rnying rgyud): la// rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo spro// hUM bzhi sngags dang bcas pas ba srung // de dag legs par gzung ba'i phyir// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad de// las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas// rgyal ba kun la
193b5(rnying rgyud): gsol btab la// 'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa'i bar// dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung // gang phyir bshad pa'i cho ga yis// ma dag pa dang ngan pa dag/ rtogs dang ting 'dzin tshe/ 
193b6(rnying rgyud): yis// mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas// dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin// tshad ni rjes su 'thun pa ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// yang na sor bzhi tshad tu ste// yang na 'dzub gang
193b7(rnying rgyud): tshad tu bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum bzhi nyid// yang na bcwa brgyad nyi 'am// nyi shu lnga yi tshad bya// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad de// rang gi rig pa rjes 'thun par// namakha
193b8(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang mnyam pa'i tshad// tshad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor te// yid 'ong byug bdug nyi shu lngas// mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni// gang dang 'brel ba'i cho ga brtsams// gzhan du longs
194a1(rnying rgyud): spyod ma byas pa'i// ras bal dur khrod rgyu las byas// gsar zhing grims la 'jur mdud med// byin brlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs// thim pas ye shes thig
194a2(rnying rgyud): skud de// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsad pa'i 'phro 'du de bzhino// dkyil 'khor yid 'ong pho brangs// mnor gsal bas thig tu bshad// gang gis gang ma
194a3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin te// kha dog lnga dang phung po dang // khams dang skye mched rnam shes sogs// ye shes dkyil 'khor mtshon phyiro// rtogs pas 'khor ba'i rgya dral phyir// mtshon zhes kyang ni brjod pa nyid// ma mthong
194a4(rnying rgyud): rmongs la ston phyir mtshon/ kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga'i tshe ngan gyis bri bar bya// gser dang dngul dang bedu// pad+ma i dan+ta ni la nyid// rin chen lnga dang ldan pa yis// mkhas pas 'bye
194a5(rnying rgyud): ldan ci bder bri// yang na 'bras dang sa lu la// kha dog bsgyur khas de bzhin// dman dang 'byor pa chung ba yis 'byung khu sa lnga yis bri bar bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o// 
194a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba bcu nyid thim pa yis// ye shes rin chen phyi nang med// dag pa'i ngo bor blta bar bya// oM a hUM swA hA// sarba pany+tsa rad na sa ma ye hUM/ 'bru bcu spung zhing 'bun pa yi// sngags dang phyag
194a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas byin gyis brlabs// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// ye shes rin chen rtsig pa ste// dra ba dra phyed rta babs dang // rdo rje zla phyed 'dod yon dang // rin tshon sa gzhi skyed shing dang // rdzing bu dril bu
194a8(rnying rgyud): g.yer khas spras// rtag tu bri zhing bsgom par bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor la// thod pa sna lnga sna gsum dang // thod skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin// tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa// ma/ 
194b1(rnying rgyud): chen brgyad ni yin par 'dod// lhag ma rnams kyis thog phub ste// gza' brgyad nyi zla'i glo skar ldan// sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng ba nyid// dra ba dra phyed rnam par spras// phyi nang rgyu 'bras bdug pa dag gdu
194b2(rnying rgyud): bya'i rta babs bzhir bshad de// sor 'breng thod pa'i phreng ba dang // dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas spras// khro mo sha lnga bdud rtsi dang // du khrod 'dod yon ldan pa'o// du khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas// skyes
194b3(rnying rgyud): bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad// rag rta'i mtshe brgyad rba rlabs 'khyil// thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung // 'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan// zhing 'phen phyogs mtshams brgyad da
194b4(rnying rgyud): bcas// lha chen thod pa sbubs bstengs na// tsi ta'i tog laHda'od zer 'phro// he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus dbri zhing bsgom par bya// ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas// rin
194b5(rnying rgyud): che na 'phreng dang rgyan du ldan// mi 'jigs stobs sogs kun ldan pas// stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin/ spyod la skyon gyis ma gos pas// pad+ma 'bar bas mdzes par sna/ 
194b6(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bde chen don las mi 'da' bas// 'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs// sku gsung yon+dan 'phrin las thugs/ 
194b7(rnying rgyud): yongs rdzogs sku'i rgyan du gnas// lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams// rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul// thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas// chu srin klu drug bzung ba bzhin// thugs rje
194b8(rnying rgyud): tshachad mi mnga' bas// 'brel pa bar chad med par gnas// brtson 'grus 'khor ba spong ba'i phyir// ri dgas dag ni mnyan par gnas// zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs pas// dge sdig spun gyis gzigs
195a1(rnying rgyud): par bstan// ma lus zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir// bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing // nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel ba/ 
195a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje gdugs kyis 'khor lo bstan// ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na// tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan// lha rnams so so'i rnam pa ni// sku mdog
195a3(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bzhugs tshul dang // gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas// pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams// de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang // gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis// gtso 'khor/ 
195a4(rnying rgyud): phyi nang lta tshul gyis// bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan/ rang rang snying po gang yin pa// kha dog so sor phye nas ni / gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o// rim pa bzhin du gsal
195a5(rnying rgyud): par bya// rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa/ kha dog dbyibs/ dang bcas pa nyid// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa/ 'i phyir// rim pa ji bzhin dgod pa bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil
195a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor yang // dung chen ras chen la sogs pa// sku gsung thugs kyis 'khor lo nyid// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod// de bzhin nyid la dmigs med// stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid// gang la
195a7(rnying rgyud): rtog spyod mi gnas pa// chos dbyings de bzhin nyi du bsgom// bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas// phyogs med snying rje na mkha' ltar// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya/ 
195a8(rnying rgyud): rang 'byung ye shes rnam pas ni// yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las// zhen 'dzin sbyangs nas yig 'bru yi// 'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis skyed// bruM gis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas// gzhal yas khang lta/ 
195b1(rnying rgyud): yin par bsgom// rnam pa'i gang yin de dag dang // rang rig sa bon gnyis med las// 'dres pas gang yin gtso bo nyid// bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// 'khor yang mi phyed 'dres par
195b2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// yongs rdzogs smin cing rtas pa la// dzaHhUM baM hos gnyis med de// 'dod pa mthar thug bar du bsam// las kyi bya ba kun zin nas// thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang // kun bzang mchod pa la/ 
195b3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// lha mo brgyad dang bcu drug gis// mchod pa'i rim pa btsam par bya// rin chen rnam lnga rta glang dang // 'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang // bu dang chung ma bran khol dang // gnas dang zhing dang / 
195b4(rnying rgyud): na bza' dang // rgyan phreng bza' btung longs spyod dang // rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang // mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang / ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal// khor yug dang lhun po dang // skye bo ma
195b5(rnying rgyud): pobro glu dang // nam kha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i// mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par chod// dpa'o sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang byug pa mchog/ 
195b6(rnying rgyud): dag tsang legs par 'bul bar bya// thar pa la sogs zhing gi mchog/ dngos dang lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis// sgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te// rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya// lha mo mi mo rig pa mo// cho ga'i
195b7(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin// dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba chen po rol mo yis// phyi nang na mkha'i khams bkang ste// rin chen lha mo yo byad dang // reg pa nyam myong bde ba yis// rgyal sras
195b8(rnying rgyud): zhing gi rdul snyed la// gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod// rol mo klu dbyangs bcas pa yis// dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis// mtshan ma legs par sna
196a1(rnying rgyud): ban k+Sha snang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bstan pa'i chog dag/ rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya// dkyil 'khor da yi phyogs bani du// rnam pa na las kyi mtha
196a2(rnying rgyud): la// dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis// lnga bani tshul gyis mchod par bya// de nas gnang thob dbang drung nyid// dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas// thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral ba'i byor/ ska
196a3(rnying rgyud): ldan slob ma gzhug par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// mngon du mthong zhugs bsod nams gang // 'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin// gang du sku gsung chu/ 
196a4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa// gang du mos pos spro bskyed phyir// rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de// sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad// 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang // gdul bya zhing dang khri ba la// sa/ 
196a5(rnying rgyud): so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag/ bris dang brdung dang blugs pa dag/ so so'i gnas su legs par dgram// ma lus sku gsung thugs
196a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor// 'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med// gang du dbang dang 'brel ba ni/ bco lnga'i rim pa'i byin brlabs phyir// bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor la// yab yum bco brgyad gnas
