196a7(rnying rgyud): bapar bya// bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la// bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la// rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod// 'di dag lugs dang 'bur dang bzo// bri dang bsgom
196a8(rnying rgyud): pa dag kyang rung // 'di ni phyi'i dkyil 'khoraro// zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sor bzhi 'dzub gang la rten te// phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes 'brang min// mthong dang brtan
196b1(rnying rgyud): dang goms pa ni// rim pa bzhin du gsal bas 'byung // brgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis// mthar byin nyams su myong bar 'gyur// dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis// byin brlabs man ngag
196b2(rnying rgyud): yid ches bya// 'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// de bzhin gnas skabs bzhan du yang // thun mong tshegs la sbyar ba'i phyir// 'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang // mkha' dag byin brlabs so sor
196b3(rnying rgyud): gdon// rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas// gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub
196b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyir// 'chi med tshe'i dkyil 'khor dang // mtshan ma pra dkyil 'khor dang // dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang // cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa// gang bsgrub don phyir ga
196b5(rnying rgyud): bshad pa// de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// las bzhi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// rigs dang 'thun pa'i sa gzhi la// thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can// phrin las dkyil
196b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor nyid du bshad// slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan pas// rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa// sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba// rnal 'byor ska ldan
196b7(rnying rgyud): spyod yul te// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mtshan ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mthong bya don la sgrib pas na// de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad// tha mal
196b8(rnying rgyud): zhen pas brtags pa'i don// lhag pa'i bden gnyis rtogs bsgoms pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg/ dkyil 'khor lha'i mtshan ma dag/ rnam pa ji
197a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa dag/ rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid// mtshan ma thig le'i ngang du sbyangs// thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te// phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems// dngos dang / 
197a2(rnying rgyud): dngos med kun sbyangs te// rang rig byang chub sems kyi me// phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud// rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis// gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na// dang por nyes byas gsum
197a3(rnying rgyud): sbyang phyir// rnam gsum khrus kyi rim pa btsam// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// bar chad bgegs dang dbral byas la// dkug bcings bstim la rnam du gzhag/ bsrung dang byug bdug rgya/ 
197a4(rnying rgyud): gyis brgyan// 'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de// las kyi tshe/ gra thim pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis// 'khor ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya// de tshe sdong bu gnas bkod de
197a5(rnying rgyud): bu re la lha rnams kyi// snying po tshang bar gdags pa dang // gsol btab gnang byin sras su bskyed// 'jug dang dbang bskur las rdzogs nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhi/ 
197a6(rnying rgyud): te// las bzhi me'i las byas nas// rtog tshegs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i// rang rang gnas su dag pa la// sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod// las kyi bya ba kun zin nas// thig le chen po dang la
197a7(rnying rgyud): snga// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// ma lus byang chub sems nyid de// de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya// chos rnams ma lus thams cad dang // dkyil la
197a8(rnying rgyud): memo lus thams cad kun// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang 'byung mthon dman med pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid// ma lus gzhi rtsa snying po/ 
197b1(rnying rgyud): ste// rang 'thung byang chub sems la 'dus// de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba// dngos po ma yin dngos med min// gnyis kam yin gnyis med min// mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i// zab cing / 
197b2(rnying rgyud): yangs la rgya che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
197b3(rnying rgyud): kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid las skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 
197b4(rnying rgyud): 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi tshe das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyis la gan
197b5(rnying rgyud): ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las tham sa cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma// 
197b6(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshang rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gre 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid la 'gro 'ong med// ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems// dngos med dngos po
197b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid// g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas pa yis// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang 'byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang // 
197b8(rnying rgyud): bsams dang dmigs dang gongs pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang // lha dang lha min gsang ba dang // sha za 'byung po mi 'am ci// grul bum yi dgas klu rnams dang // rgyu ba'i srog
198a1(rnying rgyud): chags ma lus dang // rtsi shing gel pa 'bras bu dang // phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa// ma bcos don gyi lha nyid de// byang chub semasu khyad par med// lha zhes gzhan du
198a2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa yang // tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad// byang chub sems la gnyis med par// rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang // gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas// ma
198a3(rnying rgyud): lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// mi 'gal don du rab sbyor ba// kun rdzob byang chub sems su rjod// ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i tshes// ma lus mtha' yas bstan// 
198a4(rnying rgyud): ba kun// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te// na mkha'i cho 'phru la ji bzhin du// sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med// / de dag ji ltar gnas kyang rung // byang chub sems las gan/ 
198a5(rnying rgyud): min yang // thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad// rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la// rang 'byung 'khor lo drug ga nas pa// g.yo ba yang gis bskyed byed pa// 'gro ba kun gyi
198a6(rnying rgyud): la gnas// 'phen dang sdud pa'i rang bzhin can// snying ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char// smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas// rnam thar sku gsum rtsa bdud can// 'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gan
198a7(rnying rgyud): rang lus bde chen smin byed pa// de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen gab co la// thung bus snying lte bar gnas// 'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa// rdo rje dbu ma'i lam dang 'bren/ 
198a8(rnying rgyud): khyab cing rgyas pa'i snying po can// sum bcu gnyis gnyis rtsa yig ldan// d+harmA tsakra snying po'i gnas// rtsa bani yan lag brgyad kyi dngos// dngas snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi rten// rgyu ba bzhi yis shes pa/ 
198b1(rnying rgyud): bya/ dngas ma 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// a la brten pa'i hUM gis bdud// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// bde ba mngon shes chos nyid la// rim pas mthar phyin 'byung bar 'gyur// bcu drug/ 
198b2(rnying rgyud): sgra sbyor thig le can// 'dab ma a li ldan pa yis// ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can// khyab pa gsung gi bdag nyid can// sde tshan bcu dang ldan pa nyid// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin
198b3(rnying rgyud): te// thabs dang shes rab bskul ba yis// bde ba 'byung 'gyur the tsom med// sum bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor na// thig le de yi snyam pa'i dbyings// ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cing // lus can
198b4(rnying rgyud): kun la khyab par gnas// kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso// ma da lus kun 'dus gnyis su med// spyi gtsug 'dus pa'i snying po nas// rkang zil gsang ba'i gnas yan chad// sku gsung/ 
198b5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi bka' bas bzung // snod bcud rgyud rnams rang bzhin bcud// dngas snyigs 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// skad cig rim pa skye
198b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ro yi stobs// sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur// 'di nyid gsum du bshad pa ste// skabs kyi rim pas sbyar ba nyid// rtsa dang thig le bde ba yis// phyi nang / 
198b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i tshul du bshad// de nas rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // bram ze gdol pa gar mkhan ma// yid 'ong na tshed dar la bab// nus dang chags pa che ba dang // bka' blo bde zhing yid mi 'khrug
198b8(rnying rgyud): lus ran sha mdangs dkar dmar byed// skad snyan dran pas yid 'phrog ma// bco brgyad bcu drug bcu bzhi dang // bcu gnyis ldan pa'i bu mo la// sbyor ba tshang zhing rtags byung nas// tha mal spas
199a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa'i// gsang dbang 'dus pa'i khams lnga las// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel ltar// thabs dang shes rab gzhi
199a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// nyi ma zla ba rtse phrad pa'i// ma lus 'dus pa'i rtse 'khor lo// 'byung 'jug gnas pa rlang dang 'grogs// ldang bas tha mal shes pa 'gag/ g.yo bas nyams nyid rtse gcig pa// smon pas yid
199a3(rnying rgyud): gcig 'dres pa ste// 'jug pa dzaHhUM baM hoHste// shes pa bde bar 'jug pa nyid// gnas pas yun ring gnas pa ste// mthar phyin 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// brjod bral thig le'i bstan pa 'char/ 
199a4(rnying rgyud): tha mal zhen pa nub gyur nas// zhen pa ldog cing rig pa thim// rna ma shes brgyal ba la sogs 'byung // yid 'ong gzi ldan phyag rgya ma// mthong bas lus sems bde ba dang // drad pas
199a5(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur// 'dres pas bde ba brtan po'i/ byung // thabs dang ldan pas spyad gyur na// skal pa/ sbyangs pas mi 'byongs pa'i// rnam rtog zhen pa log gyur nas/ nga
199a6(rnying rgyud): lte bde ba chen por smin// thob pa brtan 'dod rnal 'byor pas// mthong dang thos dang lhan cig gnas// 'khyud dang 'phrad dang spyad pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes skye// dbang dang mi ldan skal ngan dang / 
199a7(rnying rgyud): dman pas mi rtogs yul min pas// gsang ba zhes ni bshad pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rim pa'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin nas// sku dang gsung dang thugs ldan pa'i// tshem bu gsum
199a8(rnying rgyud): par ldan pa yi// sum bcu'i dkyil 'khor sgom par bya// gang du rgyas pa'i dbang gyur la// rigs lnga ye shes lngar ldan cing // sku gsung thugs dang yon+tan las// bdun bcu'i rim bsgom par bya/ 
199b1(rnying rgyud): chos chub gsang bar spyod 'dod pas// tshem bu gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor te// bcu 'am yang na bco brgyad pa'i// tshem bu tham bsgom par bya// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor kun 'dus pa'i// tshogs kyis/ 
199b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bsgom par bya// gang du gdug pa 'dul ba yis// dkyil 'khor rim pa de bzhin te// rim pa bsgyur ba'i khro ba ni// rim pa ma 'dres tsam du bsgom// rnal 'byor yo byad tshogs pa yis// dkyil
199b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ting 'dzin spyod tshogs pa// ma lus tshogs pas tshogs zhes bya// dang por dang dang brtson 'grus dang // dam tshigs lha sogs sngon song shong // rim bzhin ting 'dzin mthar phyin pas// nus pa
199b4(rnying rgyud): yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// skal ldan drod chad mnyam pa'am/ dam ldan 'phro 'dus sbyangs pas 'grub// rab tu dade na zhing yid 'ong ba// ri rtse gsang 'dab chu gleng ngam// dur khrod
199b5(rnying rgyud): bor nags 'dabs te// skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing // bar chang bral ba'i sa phyogs der// rnal 'byor rdul ngo lta bu'i phyir// rin chen yid 'ong mdzes rkun pa'i// 'khor
199b6(rnying rgyud): phyi nang par ldan pa// 'chags ser bcas par btsam par bya// rnal 'byor po mo grangs mnyam pa// lha spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig tshang // bro gar 'dus 'phro yo byad dang // glu tshig sgra yi yo byad
199b7(rnying rgyud): dang / bza' dang btung ba'i yo byad dang // rgyun dang bgo ba'i yo byad dang // A li ka li mnyam sbyar zhing // nyi zla brtsegs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs// lha dang mi dang yo byad dang // gnas dang spyod pa kun
199b8(rnying rgyud): tshegs pas// de dag tshegs su bshad pa yin// thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur nas// ya bo yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin la// mtha' thug med pa'i rgyal ba rnams// nam mkha'i char bzhin
200a1(rnying rgyud): kun bkug la// yab yum gnyis med 'dres pa la// dbang bskur byin brlabs brgyan btags te// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // bza' btung lha la lha rol zhing // 'od/ 
200a2(rnying rgyud): kyis ma lus tshim pa dang // 'gro mang bde ba thob par bya// bro lnga gar lnga sta bas tshig lnga// bro gar rtse 'jo brjod pa yis// rigs kyis 'od zer 'phro 'dur gsal// 'gro ba'i phyi nang mun bsal te// rig
200a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin sa nas sa ru sbyang // glu lnga tshig lnga rigs lnga yis// phyogs phyogs bltas te brjod pa ni// 'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing // chos kyi dung chen sgra yang sgrogs// phyi nang rgyan gyis yo byad ni// rin
200a4(rnying rgyud): ze'u brog rna chas dang // lag gdub rkang gdub mgul to dang // na bza' rgyan gyis gang brgyan pas// yid 'ong ting 'a'adzin gsal ba dang // 'gro bas lta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// rlung dang nus pa
200a5(rnying rgyud): stobs ldan zhing // sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te// byin brlabs rlung la dbang thob pas// A li kA li mnya/ ma sbyar ba// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas// bdag po gdung
200a6(rnying rgyud): can phrad pa'i tshe// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba'i tshe// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas// mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid skye// zla ba 'am zla phyed dus mtshams sogs// bde/ 
200a7(rnying rgyud): chen nyams myong rgyun mi 'chad// mthong ba'i don la mnyam gzhag pas// brtan zhing nges pas gdeng du gyur// sku ni phyag rgya chen po ste// bde chen zag med ting nge 'dzin// bskal pa brgya phrag stos/ 
200a8(rnying rgyud): yang // bde ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad// sprul pa'i longs spyod mdzad pa yis// 'jig rten khams mang 'gro ba dag/ de tshe 'gro ba'i dbyings su sbyor// rdo rje lus thob de phyin chad// skye shi med pa'i gsung
200b1(rnying rgyud): drung yin// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi
200b2(rnying rgyud): khyab mtha' yas mchog/ gang zag rig rim par 'jug pa rnams// dang por dngos don mthong ba yis// tshe 'dis sa la bgrod bya zhing // bsam byas lhun grub nyid thob phyir// lta spyod ting 'dzin ci/ 
200b3(rnying rgyud): 'brel pas// bar chad med pa'i lam la 'bad// gnas skabs rim pa ji snyed kyang // tha mal pa dang log spyod dang // mos pa la sogs yul min te// nus dang grub pa thob pa yis// gsang ba
200b4(rnying rgyud): lam dang 'brel par bya// rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas// rim nas rim par brtan gyur te// gsol ldan mig yo thob pa la// nyam nga med pa'i stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni
200b5(rnying rgyud): 'dam bzhin te// spyod pa so so gnas pa yis// rtsa ba spros pa/ ces rnal 'byor te// sgrub pa dus kyi tshogs la gan/ sa// yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs// gang phyir dkyil 'gro/ 
200b6(rnying rgyud): nges bstan pa// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phros 'khor lo'i tshul// 'jig rten 'das pa dkyil nyid de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad// rig pa'i don nyid
200b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil nyid de// cho 'phrul rab 'byung 'khor du gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo'i dang // khro bo khro mo 'khor du bshad// lha yi ting 'dzin dkyil nyid de// spyodapa
200b8(rnying rgyud): yo byad 'khor du bshad// gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa// goms dang rtas pa'i dbang gis na// ji ltar snang grags chos thams cad// de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems pa'i rgyu 'phrul/ 
201a1(rnying rgyud): dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor ma lus par bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang skur
201a2(rnying rgyud): / cho ga phun sum tshogs// thabs kyi sa la sbyor byed pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang chen po// ma lus pa yi rgya mtsho nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs te// 'khor tshegs la
201a3(rnying rgyud): shes rgya mtsho la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lhan cig tu// ye shes lha mo la brtan nas// ye shes chen po'i dbang bskur bas// gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur// ye shes rgya mtsho dbang phyug
201a4(rnying rgyud): gis/  dang po nas bzung bcu pa'i bar// ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i dkyi la 'khor du// rig pa'i lha mo la brten nas// ting 'a dzin chu bos dbang bskur bas// sa dang ye shes zhing khams dang // 
201a5(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i rim par 'phel// mthong lam rdo rje sku thob pas// nges 'byed nyams ldan rnal 'byor la// rig pa nyams kyi dkyil 'khor du// rig pa rtsal gyis gzungs
201a6(rnying rgyud): brten nas// zag med rdo rje sku la spyod// rig pa brtan thob rnal 'byor pas// las dang skal ldan rnal 'byor la// lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor du// rig ma'i phyag rgya mdzes ma la/ 
201a7(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur byin brlabs brten byas nas// cho ga thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing // brgyud pa dbang gi man ngag gis// sbyor ba nyams len rnal 'byor thob// ye shes rgya mtsho blo ldan zhing // 
201a8(rnying rgyud): thugs rje rgya mtshos 'gro ba skyob// dam tshig dbang dang rig pa'i drod// rim par brgyud pa'i dbang thob cing // dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang // rkyen thub sa bon gzi brjid che// las
201b1(rnying rgyud): dang bya ba marmongs shing // ma yangs brtson 'grus par chad med// ri dgas rgyal po seng+ge ltar// gzi chen gzhan gyi nyam nga med// byin brlabs 'dus pa'i nus pa can// tshig dang bden pa'i
201b2(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs 'grub// de yis dbang bskur tshig brtsam// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa dang // snying rje che la slob la brtson// brtson 'grus shes rab phun sum tshogs// bskal pa zhing gi rdul
201b3(rnying rgyud): snyed du// thos bsam bsgoms la rab gnas pa'i// 'gyur med brtan pa'i bsam pa yis// tha lam bsam pa spang byas te// bla ma la ni de bzhin gshegs// 'dul dbang thabs mkhas
201b4(rnying rgyud): bsam par bya// bla ma sangs rgyas des kyang ni// snying rjes nad dpa bzhin bsam zhing // skyon dang mnar dang smra se mas spang // rang rang nus pa ldan pa dang / bdag gzhan don nus
201b5(rnying rgyud): brtson 'grus ldan// brtul zhugs gsum dang rab ldan zhing // dngos grub don du gnyer ba yi// gsang chen rwa/ gas su nges pa dang // gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur na// dbang
201b6(rnying rgyud): dang man ngag sbyin par bya// ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa mod// ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i tshul// tsan dan dri gsung ldan pa'i ri// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// phyi dang / 
201b7(rnying rgyud): nang dang gsang ba yi// ri bo dgon pa yon tan gnas// ma lus 'dus pa'i dgon pa der// rnyed dang der ni gnas par bya// sa bcu mthar phyin gang zag la// zhing khams mtha' thug med
201b8(rnying rgyud): gnas su// rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang chen pos// ye shes lha mo la brten to// skad cig ye shes dbang bskur bas// bco brgyad yon tan ldan grub pa// skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs te// pad+ma sman gyi
202a1(rnying rgyud): sa la gnas// yi ge 'khor lo sa la smin// bdag gzhan 'byed pa med pa yi// bde chen phyogs ris med par dgongs// 'phel 'grib med pa'i rang bzhin / 
202a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan don yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// sa thob goms bstan skyes bu la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i pho brang du// rgyal tshab skyes bu mtha' dag gis// rig pa'i lha mo na so med// rig bral ting 'dzin
202a3(rnying rgyud): stobs las grub// de la sleb mas nges brtan nas// ji ltar chu la ji bzhin du// ting 'dzin byin brlabs dbang bskur bas// rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni// nyam myong dbang du rang shar te/ 
202a4(rnying rgyud): dang brtan dang gos pa yis// 'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu // 'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te// skad cig nyid la rag lus pas// rgyal 'chab chos kyi rgyal por
202a5(rnying rgyud): bshad// lam zhugs rigs phyed rtags thob la// slob dpo/ mthar nye lam gnas pas// rgyang grags dpag/ tshad la sogs par// rdo rje thig chad sbyor brjod pas// phyag rgya
202a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsal ldan pa// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog du gsungs// sna tshogs rig pas dbang bsgyur ba'i// sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor du// stobs ldan phupa la brten te// thabs dang / 
202a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dbang bskur bas// rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing // tshe 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur// dang po yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rigs su nges pa'i bu mchog ste// dang brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa
202a8(rnying rgyud): yi// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la// drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa// rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis// lhag pa gzugs brnyan byin ldan du// dad mos brtson 'grus 'jug pa'i// mi ldog dang
202b1(rnying rgyud): brtan tshul gyis bzhugs// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba// rang bzhin ngo bos gnas
202b2(rnying rgyud): tshul la// rdzas thabs ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas// nus pa'i byin rlabs mngon shar nas// theg chen rdo rje rigs su 'gyur// de nas skal ldan slob mnges// tha mal 'du shes kun bzlog ste/ 
202b3(rnying rgyud): rang rang lhar bcas gsal ba la// nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas// nyan pa'i dbang dang bsgom pa dang // 'chang dang phrin las byed pa dang // rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang // rang bzhin ngos
202b4(rnying rgyud): gnas pa la// ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // thabs dang ti 'dzin dbang bskur bas// mi nus nus pa thob pa'i datshad// mi nus pa la bskur ba min// tshad ldan rnams la rim
202b5(rnying rgyud): par bskur// rig ma las kyi phyag rgya mo// bcu drug bco brgyad ldan pa yi// dri zhim yon+dan ldan pa la/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyal ba kun gyi bcud
202b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa'i// rdo rje pad+ma'i rtsa 'khor lo// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa// thabs dang shes rab snod kyi mchog/ thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad
202b7(rnying rgyud): kun// nyungs dkar tshad tsam rdo rje sems// rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las// gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs te// rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid// mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur pas// bde chen
202b8(rnying rgyud): nyams dang rtags thob pa// da ltar nyid 'byung the tsom med// rdo rje'i nyi ma rab ldan pa'i// bcu bzhi bcu drug rab lon pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i yon+tan nyid// byin rlabs rig ma lha mor byas/ 
203a1(rnying rgyud): chags pa bskyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid// blo dang ldan pas mngon sum bya// de nas chog kun rdzogs nas// bla mas gnyis med gtang bya'i phyir// byin brlabs s+ho/ 
203a2(rnying rgyud): ba byas nas yang // gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni// slob ma 'di la legs btang la// gsang po'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin// di ring phan chad du tsha
203a3(rnying rgyud): khyod// sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas// tha mal sman pa'i lta ba spangs// bde ba chen po nyams myong bas// dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spangs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa// bde
203a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos// brtan pa bar chad med pa bsgoms// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la 'gro/ de bas skal ldan ri gas bzangs kye// gtan tu 'bar bar ma byed cig/ sbyor ba'i
203a5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang ting 'dzin dang // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// thig le'i las la thogs pa med// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyidas
203a6(rnying rgyud): yang bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa// nyams myong brten cing gnyis med sbyar// rlung gis brten pa'i thig le nyid// ro gcig dus mnyam tshul byung ba// drag pa ma yin dal ba min// dgongs pa nyams
203a7(rnying rgyud): dang zhen chags min// A li kA li zhu ba'i sems// sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyis su med// rdo rje pad+ma rab bskyod cing // 'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya las// nyi zla rtse phrad 'byor pa na// byed pa rlung gi
203a8(rnying rgyud): thig le bzung // rgyu ba gcad cing la mnan// shes pa na mkha'i ngangal gtad// dbang po shes rab che chung gis// lan gsum brtan par gyur pa 'am// ma thob par du sbyin par bya// rdo rje
203b1(rnying rgyud): 'od mdzes ldan ma// dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs// rdo rje dbang pos ma phog cing // gzhan dbang longs spyod ma byas pa// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcwa lnga'ang rung // thabs dang / 
203b2(rnying rgyud): spyod lam gyis// bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// rdo rje lce dang srin lag dang // srin lag bcos ma la sogs pa// thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis// gsang ba'i pho brang rgyab
203b3(rnying rgyud): par bya// 'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po// myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob// gal te rtsa dang bral ba na// phaT dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur// dngas rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur// 
203b4(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hUM gis shes// sdud pa'i hUM gis bsla dmas gnas pa// thig les lus la khyab par byed// dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste// gnyis pas nus pa bskyed
203b5(rnying rgyud): pa yin// gsum pas nyams myong skyed pa yin// bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed// lnga pas brtan pas nyam/ sa blangs pas// mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'gru/ 
203b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob pa// nus ldan rab gnas cho ga brtsams// de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug/ sgo gsum nyes pa kun bral ba'i// sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la// 
203b7(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya// dbang gi nyams myong brtan bya'i phyir// gdams ngag rjes 'thun sbyin par bya// gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste// lam mthar phyin pa 'bras
203b8(rnying rgyud): bu nyid// drod mthar phyin dang sa brgyad dang // grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la// rang rig rtag dang thug rje yis// 'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang // mkha' dang sgra dang gzug
204a1(rnying rgyud): can gyi// pad+ma can zhes grags pa yi// sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang // gzugs tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur// dbang bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil la
204a2(rnying rgyud): ni// ma bcos rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste// bsgrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin// dang la rtsa ba'i dbang thos nas// phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
204a3(rnying rgyud): dbang thob bya// gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la// thun mong tsam du nges pa med// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin// bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa
204a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro// dus gsum rgyal ba das byin brlabs pa'i// ma nor lam ston slob dpon la// mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing // rang rang nus shing 'jug/ 
204a5(rnying rgyud): pa la/ dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin par// gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang // bsgom dang bsgrub pa la sogs pas// bskal pa bye ba dpag med du// 'bras bu thob par
204a6(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur gyi// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// de ni dam pa kun brnyas pas// nad dang sdug bsngal mang po dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe// de nas nges par 'chi bar
204a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// byin rlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa'i// rigs nges skyes bu mchog nyid la// thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na// rgyal ba dang ni
204a8(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang // rigs 'dzin grub pa po mo yis// tshe 'dir bsam pa kun snyengs shing // byin rlabs dbang dang dngos grub kyi// phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang gis ga/ 
204b1(rnying rgyud): la dbang bskur bas// tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas// dngos grub gang la thog med de// las rnams gang brtsams 'grub pa dang // 'dod pa'i don la ro/ 
204b2(rnying rgyud): ba yis// sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas// pad+ma spyan gyis thob ste// yi ge 'khor lo sa la gnas// sku gsung thugs dang yon+dan las// nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa// dbang gi 'bras bu rang wa
204b3(rnying rgyud): shar// thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// brtson pas 'bras bu tshol byed pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stongs par 'gyur// gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang // dkyil
204b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du// las dang ting 'dzin byin rlabs kyis// 'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi
204b5(rnying rgyud): gsang chen po// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po// ma lus cho ga rgya chen po// dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi/ 'jug pa 'o rim pa ji bzhin du// gsang ba kun la shes par bya/ 
204b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis// cha byad gus ldan mdzes pa yis// me tog ldan pas 'khor lo nyid// mngon byas sku gsung bskul ba yis// dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i
204b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor du// gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje slob ma byin brlab phyir// slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste// khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gon// dad dang gu/ 
204b8(rnying rgyud): ldan rin chen bcas// gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni// lus dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sbyor ba yis// bar chad sbyor bsal bsrung ba bya// chogs
205a1(rnying rgyud): yin lhar bskyed la// mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga// 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin// snying khar rdo rje brtan byas la/ 
205a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig legs par dbog par bya// tsan dan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu// lan gsum blud la snod dor ro// de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te// gsang ba'i don la nges par bya// rang rang
205a3(rnying rgyud): 'brel ba'i lha nyid la// rin chen dor de brtag par bya// sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la// bstim la dbyer med gnas pa la// rtag tu byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir// legs par brtan
205a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i cho ga bya// mi shes rab rib bsal byas la// 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya// de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi// dag pa rims kyis bstan par bya// de nas bla ma sangs rgyas
205a5(rnying rgyud): la// ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya// byin brlabs cho ga dag ba yi// dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgoms pa dang // zhugs pa'i yon+dan bsam mi khyab// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'gyur
205a6(rnying rgyud): des na rigs su nges pa yis// dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan// rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskuraro// de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub
205a7(rnying rgyud): par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud las dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad
205a8(rnying rgyud): bya ba// rdo rje dam tshig bla na med// sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa// 'di dag legs par bshad par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'das dang ma byon dus gsum du// rgyal khrim
205b1(rnying rgyud): tha tshigs bkas bcad ltar// rim pas dmod bor bkas bcad pa'i// byin brlabs rang bzhin 'da' bka' ba// kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad// gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i// 
205b2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang // rigs 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang // lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // klu dang mi min
205b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang // dam pa 'das pas 'tshig par 'gyur// dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la// sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams
205b4(rnying rgyud): leg par spyad pas tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyis bka' bcad cing // byin brlabs dmod par rang bzhin pa grub// dam pa 'di las gang 'da' ba// rdo rje can yang tshig par
205b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la// dbang dang byin brla bas thob pa yis// dam pa'i tshul bzhin nges spad na// mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur// de phyir dus gsuM
205b6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis// dam tshig ces ni rnam par bsgrags// bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// mtha' dbus 'gro 'ong las grol ba// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems
205b7(rnying rgyud): nyid de// gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa// don dam byang chub sems su brjod// ma skyes byang chub sems nyid ni// skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid snang ba// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste// ma lus der snang
205b8(rnying rgyud): ngo bo gcig/ rang lhar sgo gsum gsal rtogs pa// kun rdzob byang chub sems su bshad// gsang ba bshad dang dbang bskur dang // man ngag lung dang nyams chag skong // mchog dang thun mong
206a1(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa// dngos grub ster zhing grol byed pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir// skad cig gdung ba nyams mi bya// rang gi lha dang gnyis med nas// phyag
206a2(rnying rgyud): rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pas// rang gi sgo gsum ma nyams par// chu bo lta bur bar chad med// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// theg chen gsang ba nyid yin pas// snod med dman
206a3(rnying rgyud): sogs log pa la// bsang bcu la sogs brjod mi bya// dang por gsang bar srog gcig pas// byang chub snying por mi 'bral bas// rang srog rang gis gcod kyang bla// brtse gdung dam chi// 
206a4(rnying rgyud): bral mi bya// lam dang bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba dang // dngos grub kun ra gyi rtsa ba dang // 'di dag nyams na kun nyams pas// rtsa ba zhes su bstan pa yin// yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang // 
206a5(rnying rgyud): thun mong min par bshad par bya// dang por gsang ba'i lung / thob nas// nus pa mngon du snang bar du// bdag dang / gzhan gyir thun meng gi/ 'gal dang sgro kur kun 'das shing/ 
206a6(rnying rgyud): kun dang bsam pa dga' byed pa// thun mong ngam las mi 'gal ba// thun mong dam tshig yin par bshad// thun mong ma yin gang zag gis// thab chen thun mong ma yin pa// nyon mongs lnga dang / 
206a7(rnying rgyud): spyad pa lnga// bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga// grub pa lnga yi chos rnams nyid// skyes bu rigs byed spyod yul te// thun mong rnal 'byor yun min pas// thun mong ma yin zhes su bshad// dang
206a8(rnying rgyud): nanos bzung rtags thob par// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// lus sems ma yengs rtse gcig pas// rnam pa dang bcas dang du zang // sa thob goms dang mthar phyin par// ting 'dzin don la
206b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i tshe// 'gal ba'i sgo gsum mi 'byung bas// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig la// rnam pa'ang tshig ma lus 'dus// don las langs tshe snying rje dang // rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin// 
206b2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa na// 'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig ste// rgya mtsho rlan bzhin thob spangs med// bsrung byed ye shes dam tshig ste// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// bsnyen pa rtags pa/ 
206b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa du// spyi yi dam tshig bsrung bya zhing // bsgrub pa gang yin 'grub pa na// khyad par rang rang rtog pa yi// dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur// gang zag gang la dga' ba la// dam
206b4(rnying rgyud): tshig dka' thub sgo nas ni// gsang ba'i don la dgod bya'i phyir// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan/ dang po las can rnal 'byor la// rtsa ba thun mong dam tshig
206b5(rnying rgyud): bstan// bstan nas nyams ldan gang zag la// thun mong min pa'i dam tshig bstan// rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la// mda' nyams med pa'i dam tshig bstan/ 
206b6(rnying rgyud): sa thob goms mthar phyin pa la// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan// dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ 
206b7(rnying rgyud): ba yan lag bcas pa 'di// thob nas dam par gang bsrungs pa// yon+tan chung yang 'grub par bshad// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa// cho ga ga
206b8(rnying rgyud): dang ting 'dzin gang // bsgrub pa gang dang gang yang rung // mnyams tshul du rab brtson pas// myur du 'grub pa nyid 'gyur// gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na// rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur/ 
207a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi yon+tan nyid// dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas// dam pa 'di la gang brten pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad
207a2(rnying rgyud): kyi// sku gsung thugs dang yan lag gi/ bsrung bya dka' thub dam pa 'di// kun gyis 'da' ba ma yin zhing // gnas pa dam pa nyid yin te// las dang skal ba dman pa dang // rigs dman le
207a3(rnying rgyud): lo che ba dang // rang bzhin ngan pa'i gang zag gis// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed cing // dngos grub gnyis la rgyab phyogs nas// dam pa rnams la smod byed pa// sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pra// 
207a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag pa/ rar mdzad// mkha' 'gro ma dang rigs 'dzin dang // kha 'bar gtum 'khrug rngam pa'i tshogs// de ma thag tu srog
207a5(rnying rgyud): bcad nas// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// gal te/ 'jig par gyur na ni// 'jig rten gzhan du skye 'a/ gyur zhing // ji srid na mkha' 'jig pa 'am// phyi yi rgya mtsho zad
207a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe// thar te gzhan du nam yang min// dam pa'i bla ma spong ba dang // rdo rje mched la 'khu ba dang // byang chub sems nyid mi dran zhing // sdug dang phyag rgya yal ba dang // snod min gsang ba
207a7(rnying rgyud): bshad pa dang // gsang ba'i don la bskur ba ni// 'dir yang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing // skad cig 'gegs pas de ma thag/ bar ma'i lus dang bral gyur pa'i// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar
207a8(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// gang du rtsa ba yan lag bcas// bsrung dang dpog par bya ba'i ches// thun mong dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i// thun mong spyi yi yul gyur pa// de ni thun mong bsrung bya ste// 'di ni phyin
207b1(rnying rgyud): dam tshig go// thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba'i sems// thig le'i sems lnga'i lam gyi rim// rig pa ma lus gsal ba'i tshe// thig le gnyis med nyams su byung // bde ba'i thig le'i bcud sgyu
207b2(rnying rgyud): bas// tshogs drug rang snang thig le'i grogs// ma lus thig les byin brlabs pas// thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// thig le rig pa khar dbyung min// 'khor lo kha sbyor bde ba yis// tha
207b3(rnying rgyud): mal bde bar dbang por bsgyur// rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod thabs kyis myong // tha mal zhen pa rnam par bzlog/ thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i don// rang snying 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lnga// 'char dang nub pa
207b4(rnying rgyud): rim pa yis// thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le ltar// shes de nas spang du med par gnas// rang byung gnas pa'i ba cud lnga ni// rang lus rten pa'i don snang ba// khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul
207b5(rnying rgyud): dag gis dngas snyigs gnyis kyi tshul du gnas// rang lus rtog pa dngas snyigs dang // kha dog yan lag nyid/ lag gis// bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes dang // bde ba chen po
207b6(rnying rgyud): nyid du gsungs// khams lnga bcud las skyes pa yi// ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas// rgyal ba lnga ru yang dag gsungs// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril/ 
207b7(rnying rgyud): nyi zla rim pa'i 'od gsal ba// sems lngas mkha' la gsal ba'i tshe// rten can rten dang gnyis med pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes snang // ma zin rdo rje lce yis blang // gnyis kyi rtog pa ma
207b8(rnying rgyud): lus pa// bde chen ro gcig byin gyis brlabs// skad cig bral med bde ba'i sems// dus gsum mi 'bral brtan par gnas// rlung dang thig le'i bzlas pa yis// thams cad bde chen gyi
208a1(rnying rgyud): rgyar gsal// bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis ste// brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min// gnyis sbyor phrad pa'i bde ba yis// tha mal zad dang bde chen sbyor// 
208a2(rnying rgyud): gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa// da ltar nus pa rang gis myong // gzhan gyis brdzun pa'i don 'di ni// thabs kyis bde bar mngon du bstan// tha mal zhen pa spang ba'i phyir// kha na ma tho
208a3(rnying rgyud): bag tsha bral// skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe// rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub// rang gi rtsa bcud so so las// bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas// 'byung lnga dbang po gzugs sogs
208a4(rnying rgyud): bcas// thabs ldan sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bde na dan lhan cig skyes par shes// nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi// / mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las// zhen pa med pa'i thabs
208a5(rnying rgyud): chen pos// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las// ye na sa lnga yi ros gang bas// ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru grub/ 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// rang bzhin dam tshig chen po
208a6(rnying rgyud): yin// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa// shin tu bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis// 'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid dang // yan lag bcu ru shes par bya// shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni// spyir ni sum
208a7(rnying rgyud): brgya drug bcu ste// rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang // dus bzhi rgyal mchog nyid dang ni// bsgrub med mnyam par rdzogs pa nyid// lhun grub bde gas
208a8(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dang // rnam dag byang chub bzung 'dzin bral// rtogs nas don 'dzin dam tshig dang // sems la gnas bcas dam tshig dang // yi nas ma bcos dam tshig dang // 'dus byas rnam dag ngas
208b1(rnying rgyud): tshig dang // chos rnams dbyer med dam tshig dang // thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang // g.yung drung tshe 'phel dam tshig dang // thams cad bsrung du med pa ste// 'di dag lta ba'adi tshig yin/ 
208b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang // ma lus bsgral ba'i dam tshig dang // ma byin len pa'i dam tshig dang // brdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig dang // thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang // dang
208b3(rnying rgyud): rdzas spyod pa'i dam tshig ste// 'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum ni// rdo rje'i skye gnas dam tshig dang // 'dren byed gnas stobs dam tshig dang // lam la ston
208b4(rnying rgyud): byed dam tshig dang // rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig dang // sgyur byed byang chub dam tshig dang // thams cad dbang bsgyur dmya tshig dang // rig 'dzin gnas stobs dam tshig ste// bsgrub
208b5(rnying rgyud): bya rtog pa'i dam tshig yin// yum gyur dbyings phyug dam chu ga dang // thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dam tshig/ shes rab thabs su sbyor de bzhin// glang po brjid gnon dam
208b6(rnying rgyud): tshig dang // thams cad mi chud dam tshig dang // thams cad bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang // ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig dang // tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dam
208b7(rnying rgyud): tshig dang // tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang // tshegs kyi 'phrin las dam tshig dang / 'phra men tshim byed dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa'i phrin las dam tshig yin// yang dag don ston dam
208b8(rnying rgyud): tshig dang / gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang // thams cad skad mjal dam tshig dang // yi ge med 'jal dam tshig dang // stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang // ye shes
209a1(rnying rgyud): gsung mchog dam tshig dang // bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig/ mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dam tshig ste// bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin// shes bya ting 'dzin dam
209a2(rnying rgyud): tshig bzhi// nam mkha' snang byed dam tshig dang // rten byed sa yi dam tshig dang // bsreg byed me yi dam tshig dang // 'khru byed chu yi dam tshig dang // g.yengs byed chen po'i dam tshig ste// shes
209a3(rnying rgyud): rab lnga yi dam tshig dang // phung po lnga yi dam tshig ni// thabs mchog lnga yi dam tshig yin// chos rnams gzugs brnyan dam tshig dang // sgra ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang // dri ltar / 
209a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dam tshig dang // ro ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang // reg da ltar shes pa'i dam tshig ni// gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang // phyogs
209a5(rnying rgyud): lnga yi ni dam tshig dang // dbang lnga yi ni dam tshig ste// gsu ma po spyir khyab dam tshig yin// bde ba'i ngang nyid dam tshig dang // lhun grub ye shes dam tshig dang // mi 'dzi/ 
209a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal mchog dam tshig dang // mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dam tshig dang // phyogs dus dbyer med dam tshig dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang // chos la skyon med dam tshig dang // 
209a7(rnying rgyud): brjod med spros med dam tshig dang // phyogs dus gnyis med dam tshig dang // gnyis mod byang chub sems dam tshig/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad rgyas 'debs
209a8(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dang // thams cad mi 'gog dam tshig ste// ngo bo ting 'dzin dam tshig yin// grub par bya ba lnga bstan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig dang // rin chen 'byung ba'i da
209b1(rnying rgyud): dang // pad+ma chags med dam tshig dang // don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang // 'jigs byed rdo rje dam tshig dang // de bzhin sku nyid dam tshig dang // thams cad 'byor ldan dam tshig ste// sku
209b2(rnying rgyud): yi dam tshig bdun du bshad// yang dag don ston la sogs pa// gsung gi dam tshig brgyad po nyid// rang la rdzogs par shes bya ste// 'bras bu'i bsrung bas bsgrub bya yin// rang rig dag
209b3(rnying rgyud): bsgyur dam tshig dang // cha mchog rnam dag dam tshig dang // rang bzhin 'od gsal dam tshig dang byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang // thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig drug/ thugs kyi dam tshig/ 
209b4(rnying rgyud): nyid du bshad// byang chub zhing bkod dam tshig dang // ye shes pa zhugs gnas dam tshig dang // gzhal yas khang bsta ngan dam tshig dang // sna tshogs kun sbyar dam tshig dang // zad med
209b5(rnying rgyud): gter ldan dam tshig dang // bsgrub pa zad med dam tshig dang // zad med gter chen dam tshig ni// yon+tan dam/ tshig bdun du bshad// thams cad byin rlob dam tshig dang // 
209b6(rnying rgyud): bdud sde tshar gcod dam tshig dang // sems can don byed dam tshig ni// phrin las dam tshig gsum du bshad// spong ba rdo rje dam tshig dang // chags pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang // gti mug
209b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i dam tshig dang // phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig dang // nga rgyal bde mchog dam tshig dang // nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig ste// mi spang ba yi dam tshig yin// gtan du ma yengs bsrung/ 
209b8(rnying rgyud): pa ni// mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig dang // bden pa dbyer med dam tshig dang // sku gsung thugs sbyor dam tshig dang // lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad bde sbyor dam tshig dang // rdo rje leg/ 
210a1(rnying rgyud): 'joms dam tshig dang // 'khor ba zil gnon dam tshig dang // ma bcos lhun grub dam tshig dang // thig le bde sbyor dam tshig ni// lta ba rgyun bsrung dam chig/ 
210a2(rnying rgyud): yin// ting 'dzin rgyun bsgom dam tshig dang // bcing ba phyag rgya'i dam tshig dang // bzlas pa sgra snyan dam tshig dang // sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang // shes rab ba sbyo dam tshig ni// 
210a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig yin// tha snyad zil gnon dam tshig dang // spyod lam bde 'byor dam tshig dang // rig pa thod rgal dam tshig dang // ma bcos gnas dag dam tshig dang // rang 'byung gnas
210a4(rnying rgyud): bral dam tshig ste// gcig car gnas pa'i bsrung thabs yin// thams cad skyed byed dam tshig dang // rgyud drug skye dar byed dam tshig dang // rtogs pas tshim byed dam tshig dang / 
210a5(rnying rgyud): khyab pa na mkha'i dam tshig dang // gzhan don shugs grub dam tshig ni// dam tshig che ba bstan pa yin// dmyal tshon dmyal ba phal pa dang // yid dgas byol song srin po da
210a6(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin mngal srin kha 'bar lce// lha dang lha min ru dra dang // rtsangs pa la sogs 'khor ba ste// chad pa'i skye gnas bstan pa yin// bsrung ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// gal te stong pa
210a7(rnying rgyud): don rtogs na// bskang dang nyams pa'i tshul med de// chad pa'i yul las 'das pa yin// gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin// gal te rtsa ba'i dam nyams na// bla ma grogs po brgya dag
210a8(rnying rgyud): la// bshags pa stong phrag brgya ru bya// bzlas pa bye ba phrag bdun bya// gtor ma 'bum phrag bdun du bya// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bcu gcig bya// de nas slar yang blang ba'am// bla mas
210b1(rnying rgyud): gnang nas gnas par bya// gal te yul de mi gnas sam// lo gsum pan chad 'das pa'am// gal te bshags pa'i tshul mthong bas// ma dang 'dod pa'i sems skyes nas// bskang ba rtsa
210b2(rnying rgyud): las 'das pa skye// bskal pa chen po brgyad khri'i bar// bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te// rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar// mi bzang sdug bsngal myong nas ni// ji srid na mkha' gnas pa'i ba/ 
210b3(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// zla ba bdun du smra bcad bya// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgya du bya// bzlas pa'i bye ba tshad 'bum gcig/ gtor ma khri phrag
210b4(rnying rgyud): gcig tu gtang // de nas slar yang blang ba dang // ngag dang tshangs par bsgrags par bya// dag pa'i snod dang mi ldan par// gsang ba stong cing 'chad pa dang // dbang ma thob par bka'
210b5(rnying rgyud): 'gom dang // bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang / tshad dang ldan pa'i snod min la// gsang ba tshad du sgrog/ sa pa dang // gsang ba nyams su mi len par// 'phyar bas
210b6(rnying rgyud): kun la spel ba ni// tshad las 'das pa'i gang zag ste// sangs rgyas kun la brnyas byed pas// dus gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yis// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad// bla ma dang
210b7(rnying rgyud): ni grogs rnams dang // pha ma gnyen pa shes rgyal blon dang // rgyal 'bangs nyes med sdang ba ni// dam tshig nyams pa'i brtags su bshad// zab mo dag la gags 'byung dang // bsgrubs pas 'dod pa
210b8(rnying rgyud): mi 'byung zhing // bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang // mnyes yal ga 'byung ba dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su bshad// dang por bla ma'i lung thob nas// rang gis nyams pa ma tshor zhing / 
211a1(rnying rgyud): bde legs bsam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // bdag gzhan bsam pa'i khyad par dag/ sngon du yid bzhin nor bu bzhin// 'grub cing bsngags pas thob pa ni/ 
211a2(rnying rgyud): ma nyams don dang ldan pa'i rtags// rnal 'byor dbang phyugs rgyal po yin// gal te ma nyams rtags byung na// bskang gso'i cho ga myur du brtsam// gal te nyams la rtags med cing // legs/ 
211a3(rnying rgyud): par snang na mi rung ste// bdag gis sa bon chog pa ste// bde ba zad byas gtan du sdug/ ma nyams rtags byung myur bskangs na// sngon gyi bag chags zad par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu
211a4(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dam tshig ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mchog dang thun mongs la
211a5(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus la sa// thun mong dag la mos zhugs pas// thun mong yo byad/ 
211a6(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin dang // sngags dang phyag rgya 'bral goms pas// rtags dang nus pa mthar phyin pas// gang ltar dmigs pa 'grub 'gyur te// zag bcas thun mong dngos grub yin// de las @/ 
211a7(rnying rgyud): pa bshad par bya// gang du mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// dbang dang dam chog ting 'dzin dag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i rim thob nas// mi ldog brtan pa'i rnal 'byor thog/ mthong nas bsgom lam
211a8(rnying rgyud): ma nges rigs// ting 'dzin gang bsgom par chad med// tshe 'dis dbang bsgyur 'jigs bral te// de nas sku mnga'i bdag nyid thob// mchog ldan mchog gi mchog thob pas// mchog gi
211b1(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thun mong min// dad dang dam tshig shes rab dang // brtson 'grus brtul zhugs bzod pa thob// brtan cing snying rtse dbang rdzogs shing // bsgrub dang lam gyi sbyor ba shes// yod thub
211b2(rnying rgyud): mi ldog brtan pa can// nyams thob dang du len pa ni// gcig dang lnga gsum gang zag gis// ri be ro sul gsang bar dang // chu gling ngam grogs brag rdzong dang // dur khrod ri phug chu mdo dang // 
211b3(rnying rgyud): yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' bar// cho ga byin brlabs rdzogs pa nyid// las kyi cho ga gang yin pa// bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa ni// bdag dbang bkra shis phun sum tshogs// dam
211b4(rnying rgyud): tshig dbang dang lta ba dag/ sngon du bya ba rdzogs pa yis// sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thob bam// dang po yid pa/ rten gang yin kyang // gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de/ tshe
211b5(rnying rgyud): ga ting 'dzin 'bel pa nyid// rang rang rtog pa ji bzhin du// tha mal pa dang le lo dang // the tshom dad pa'i stobs kyi sa te// gal te de dag mi ldan na// sa thob kyis kyang ma yin// 
211b6(rnying rgyud): na// gang zag skye bos smos ci dgos// gal te dgug pa'i las bya na// bdag nyid dbang drag khro bo'i ste// dmar thag dud ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// gang ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'du ni// zhags pa
211b7(rnying rgyud): lcags kyu she dag ste// dmigs pa brtan cing brtags thob nas// mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni// rang sngags brjod pa de yi mthar// che ge mo zhig dzaHhUM zhes// dgra dang bgegs dang lha dang gca
211b8(rnying rgyud): mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan yang rung // tha mal dbang med bzhin du dgug/ gal te de yi dgos pa dag/ myur du grub par ma gyur na// de dag legs par grub kyi bar// gang yin mkhas pas ba
212a1(rnying rgyud): bar bya// ngag dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bdag nyid dbang drag gsal ba yi// lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam// yi ge
212a2(rnying rgyud): gsum ldan dgu bkod nas// 'od kyis na mkha'i khams bkang zhing // pad+mar ga zhu 'dra bas// gang thim bdag gi dbang gyur zhing // bden pa bdar zhing ngag gis bcing // yang na gang la gang chags
212a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i// rdzas la ring du 'dod pa ltar// 'dod pa grub na dam bcas zhing // yid 'ong 'dul ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dga' ba'i thabs kyis brten byas na// gal te 'gro zhing 'phro 'dod na// dbang drag
212a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas bsdigs bcing gzir// dga' ba'i thabs kyis yi dra 'phrogs nas// rol mo sgyu mkhan dag de yis// 'dus pa'i gang zag chags pa can// bya ba thabs kyis bral ba ltar/ 
212a5(rnying rgyud): bral ba med par gnas par 'gyur// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i/ nus pa yis// gang yang rung ba'i sems can de// sna tshogs khro bo khro mo yis// 'od dang phyag rgya 'bar ba yis// 
212a6(rnying rgyud): bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta// dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'// ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par 'grub// mod las dngos por nges grub cing // mi 'thun brgyad sogs nges
212a7(rnying rgyud): 'grub na// yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag/ dbang pos bsgyur ba smos ci dgos// gal te gso ba'i las byas na// las ni gnyis te brtsams pas 'grub// bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas ni// dag
212a8(rnying rgyud): bskur byin brlabs kun bstibs nas// mdun du shel gyi bum pa ru// thugs las chu yi lha mo bskyed// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba der gyur nas// bum par lha mo 'od du zhu// nad dang sdug bsngal
212b1(rnying rgyud): byang bar bsam// dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang // sman dang rin chen spos dang 'bru// bdud rtsi snying po che rkyen la// mA ma kI yi sngags kyis gdab// oM mA ma kI sarba pA pa du ru du ru swAhA// nad dang
212b2(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal ldan pa'i lus// bkrus pas 'tsho bar the tshom med// bdag nyid brtul zhugs bde ldan pas// sngon du bye ba sngon song bas// dgon pa bas mtha' rab dben par// ma smras ma
212b3(rnying rgyud): rul tshad ldan pa'i// dur khrod zhing chen mtshan ldan la// khrus dang byug bdug kun byas nas// pho mo la sogs pa yin pa yi// las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur// de dag maN+Dal gtsang
212b4(rnying rgyud): ma yi// dbus su legs par bzhag nas ni// bdag nyid khwa po gang yang rung // gsal bar tshangs pa brgya byin rung // rang sngags srog snying dza yis dgug/ phyag rgya bzhi yis
212b5(rnying rgyud): dbab par bya// gal te 'dar dang rgod pa dang // ngu dang 'jig pa'i sgra byung na// dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// dam chu byin la mnas bsgrags te// gang 'dod las la
212b6(rnying rgyud): mngag par bya// gal te 'jig rten the tshom zos// de yis zos dang brgyal ba dang // 'phral du bdag nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// gang zhig ting 'dzin brtan pa yis// bar chad med par bsgrubs
212b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe// mdangs ldan yid 'ong dang po ste// dri zhim 'od chags gnyis pa yin// dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs gsum pa yin// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams sod yin// zhing chen kha nas hri byung na/ 
212b8(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rdo rje so yis bcad// ro langs brdabs na gser du 'gyur// lce yi ral gris de bcad na// cis kyang mi tshugs go mtshon te// lha min g.yul yang pham byed na// dpa' bo stob
213a1(rnying rgyud): ldan smos ci dgos// de yi dbang po lnga dag la// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub yod// rang gi rtog pa ji bzhin du// mkhas pas bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur
213a2(rnying rgyud): gal te bcu bdun bco brgyad ma'i// zhing mdzes klu zhing byugs byas te// rgyan dang gos kyis legs par gdags// dri zhing dbang po dag pa la// bdag nyid dbang drag rnal 'byor gyis/ 
213a3(rnying rgyud): shes 'jig rten gang rung ba'i// lha mo yid 'ong 'ad 'bar ma// sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bcings nas// rtags byung bar du bstim par bya// dri dang sgra dang 'od dag dang // 'dar dang
213a4(rnying rgyud): 'gul dang rgod pa dag/ dang po'i rtags ni yin par bshad// / lha dang gtam dang gnyis pa ste// dngos su langs pa tshad de yin pas// dam bdar mnas bsgrags dbang du snga// gal te
213a5(rnying rgyud): sbyar du sad pa na// cho 'phrul che zhing log ston na// dbang drag rgyal chen po yis// dbang du bsdu dang zil gyis mnan// de dag chags pas rol spyad na// skad cig cho 'phrul pa
213a6(rnying rgyud): thob ste// skye shi med par gnas pa dang // ma lus bde chen 'bar ba dang // zhing khams kun tu bgrod pa dag/ thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// gtsang ma byis parma med pa// yi 'ong sa
213a7(rnying rgyud): pa btsal blangs nas// dag cing bdud rtsis dri byugs la// mda' drum tas legs blugs la// kha dog lnga yi gzungs kyis gdags// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // lha mo gang rung snying / 
213a8(rnying rgyud): bos dgug/ rtag tu phyag rgya bzhis bstim zhing // bdag nyid ha ya gr-I ba 'am// ya mAn ta ka la sogs pa// gang rung khro bor gsal bsgoms la// drag tu dgug cing bstim par bya// gas
213b1(rnying rgyud): byung mthar thug mngon gyur nas// legs nyes de yis smra bar 'gyur// gal te 'dar zhing mi brjod na// oM gyi 'od dang a mri tas// lce la thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing // ha ya grI bas gang mos
213b2(rnying rgyud): bsdigs// legs par smra bar the tshom med// gal te gsad pa'i las byed na// gsal la brtan thob rnal 'byor pas// dur khrod shing gcig bzhi mdo 'am// lha 'dres mngon du gnas pa'i sar/ 
213b3(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// dud kha nag po 'od 'bar ba// spyan bzlog mtshon cha me ltar 'bar// sprul pa'i char ltar 'khrug par bsam// mdun du hom khung khru gang chad// gru gsum dur sol
213b4(rnying rgyud): khrag chen byug/ nang du ling kha bdud rtsi lnga// chags pa'i rgyu dang cha ba dang // shes pa chags pa'i rten la byas// po das ming rus bcas bkug la// bstims la phyag rgyas bcing
213b5(rnying rgyud): bapar bya// lcags sam nag po'i shing las byas// drag po'i phur/ bas gnas gsum gdab// hrIHSh+T+rIHdrag pos g.yas pa yon nas/ khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg byas nas// de nang
213b6(rnying rgyud): drag po tsher ma can// nam phyed gcer bus bsregs byas nas// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// gal te dbye ba'i las byed na// bdag nyid ya mAn ta ka ste// rngam zhing gdug gtum nga rgyal can// 
213b7(rnying rgyud): shin tu 'jigs shing sdigs par bsgom// nyi mas 'jigs pa'i dang rung dang // mun pas 'jigs pa'i gung ru la// gang yin de nyid bris la bla na// lha dang lha min gnyis la gtad// rlung gi/ 
213b8(rnying rgyud): phyogs su de yis bskyod// sprul pa pho nyas g.yul 'gyed cing // 'thab cing rtsod par rnam par bsam// bar du khra dang bya rog 'thab// me chu rlung gis 'bud bsams na// / de ni gang yi
214a1(rnying rgyud): su yang rung // 'bral zhing 'thab pa nyid du 'gyur// rgyal po bram ze blon po dag/ gdug pa gnod pa can gyi rigs// mi gnas bskrad par bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid aH/ 
214a2(rnying rgyud): tsita ste// drag po khros pa'i tshul du sgom// dgra bgegs gang yang rung ba yi// 'og tu rlung snying bcas pa bri// steng du ming rus bcas bskyon la// mdun na gnas pa'i gdul bya de// rlung ldan
214a3(rnying rgyud): me'i steng du zhon// pho nya sprul pa mtha' yas kyis// 'khrig cing 'tshogs par rab bsams la// gshin rje'i drung du khrid par bsam// 'dis ni dbugs med brgyal ba 'ang // gzhan du drag/ 
214a4(rnying rgyud): pos phyin 'gyur na// srog dang ldan pas smos ci dgos// ga la te dgra dpung pham 'dod na// bdag nyid mi g.yo mgo ngan po ste// ji ltar gnas pa'i rab tu bsgom// de yi gzugs
214a5(rnying rgyud): brnyan bris nas kyang // cho gas de ru byin brlabs la// snga gas ni bdun 'bum la sogs pa// lcags sna bdu na las bcu gnyis tshad// ral gri snying por bcas pa la/ 
214a6(rnying rgyud): gsal bar de dag rtags byung bzlas// 'od dang sgra dang sa g.yos dang // ral gri skad ni 'don pa na// phyung bas g.yul las ldog pa dang // bskor bas dmag dpung 'bros pas 'gyur// 
214a7(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid rgyal zhing che 'dod na// bdag nyid gsal zhing brtan gyur nas// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal byas la// dur khrod ras la ming rus bri// sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bstims la// nges
214a8(rnying rgyud): par bstan pa'i ltas byung nas// he ru ka yi zhabs kyis mnan// rta mgrin gad mo drag pos bsdigs// khyung gshog phyag rgya zil gyis mnan// bdag dang khyi'i sgoms nas gdon// bdag cis
214b1(rnying rgyud): them pa'i 'og tu mnan// yang na bdag gi 'og tu mnan// rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis// steng nas mnan cing bden pa bdar// bdag nyid de yi rgyal por 'gyur// dbul po gter dang phrang
214b2(rnying rgyud): 'dod na// bdag nyid las la goms pa yis// rigs lnga lhag pa'i lha gsal nas// so so'i phyag mtshan yungs 'bru tsam// dbang por mthong gi bar du ni// bsam zhing sngags bzlas bde// 
214b3(rnying rgyud): pa bdar// mtshan ma brtan po gsal ba na// gang na yod pa'i phyogs der dong // bden pa ting 'dzin sngags bcas mthus// 'dug gam smra 'am mthong ba 'am// phra mo der ni ltung bar 'gyur
214b4(rnying rgyud): de nas gter dang phrad gyur nas// dbul ba kun las thar pa dar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pas// mngon shes/ mig dang ldan 'dod na// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pa// 
214b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mig sna lnga dang bdun pa'i zhag sa// de yi zhun mar dud par bcas// 'phrul gyi 'o ma dag gis sbyar// rdo rje pra yis zhags bdun bsgrubs// nyams
214b6(rnying rgyud): dang drod rtags thob pa na// mig la legs par sngags kyis byugs// skad cig stong gsum bcas pa yi// phyogs bcu mngon par shes pas mthong // gang zag rgyun ni brtag pa dang / 
214b7(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal drag pos zhen bzlog cing // so so dag pa'i zhing khams kyis// yid bde grub par bya ba'i phyir// mngon shes mtshan mas legs par bsgrub// rkang mgyogs thob par// 
214b8(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas// brtan zhing bar chad med thob nas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste// yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ste// skad cig dpag cha
215a1(rnying rgyud): brgyar 'gro ba// de la gnas bsam ma yengs pas// rlung gis khyab pa ji lta bar// dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yang // skad cig tsam gyis bgrod par 'gyur/ 
215a2(rnying rgyud): te rdzu 'phrul bzhi dag gis// rigs 'dzin go 'phang 'gro 'dod na// sngon du dag pa'i don thob nas// phyag rgya gsal bar gyur pa'i tshe// namakha'i ling ga zla ba la// hUM las rdo rje cho ga gsum li/ 
215a3(rnying rgyud): par bstan pa'i dbang thob nas// dngas ma'i phyag rgya la brten pas// rdo rje zlar bcas rlung brten pas// gang 'thang zhing du bskyod pa'is// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yis// zhing khams dag pa'i
215a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba 'grub// mdun gyi na mkhar zla ba la// oM la cho ga'i tshul gyis bsgyur// brtan pa'i 'khor lo zla rlung gris// mdangs ma'i stobs kyis lus gnas pas// de bzhin
215a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin pa// zhing khams so sor bskyodabyas nas// rang gi bsam pa bsgrub par bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi zla ba la// tra las skyes pa'i cho ga yis
215a6(rnying rgyud): rin chen rlung zlar bcas pa yis// ting 'dzin drag po bskyod pa'i shugs// mdangs ma lus yid bcas pa yis// dge pa'i zhing khams kun bskyod de// lhag pa'i bsam pa 'grub par
215a7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mar bcas pa'i zla ba bsgom// hrIHlas sna tshogs chos mchog sems// gsal brtan rlung gis stobs bstan pas// dngas
215a8(rnying rgyud): ma'i lus yid gang yin pa// zhing bskyod bsam pa grub par 'gyur// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal byed sna tshogs bcas pa bsgom// a 'am ha las rang nyid kyi// 
215b1(rnying rgyud): las kyi phyag rgyar goms par bya// brtan nas dngas ma rlung stobs kyis// zhing khams gang du mngon bsam pa'i// 'dod pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'das ni 'byung ning dbang med/ 
215b2(rnying rgyud): cing // 'chi med rlung la dbang thob nas// cho 'phrul bzhi yis zil mnan nas// mngon shes bdug pa 'dul ba yis// las rnams mi 'grub gcig kyang med// de nas gzhan yang chags
215b3(rnying rgyud): ldan rim// bskal ldan dman dang sbyor bas zad// bde ba'i don 'dod dka' thub can// 'di dag don la thabs kyis dgod// thabs ldan lus kyi gong bu la// rang rang cho ga'i thabs ldan
215b4(rnying rgyud): nitu bde chen gar thabs sna tshogs po// rnam par 'phrul pa ro yis byed// bde chen longs spyod chos kyi gnas/ sprul pa'i thig le bde ba'i ro// mA lus mkha' lnga'i rang
215b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyis// rang lus mi bcos gnas nyid bde// brtum zhugs thig la gsum thob nas// sgrol ma dang ni thog le dang // gnas dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// bye brag
215b6(rnying rgyud): brgyad bcu kun 'dus pa'i// thabs kyis mtshon pa las byung bas// dngos grub cho ga sna tshogs 'grub// rang rten thig ler bcas pa yis// dngas ma'i rang bzhin khyab gnas pa// bskur
215b7(rnying rgyud): ba thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// ma lus bskyod cing 'gugs par byed// dngas snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i// rlung gi thig les dbang bsgyur nas// 'phro zhing 'dzag pa'i thig le nyid// rlung gis
215b8(rnying rgyud): 'ching ba nyid yin te// thig le snyigs mar nyams gyur pa// thabs dang rlung bcud stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni chu bzhi no// rang 'byung thig le'i rang bzhin las// rten dang zag pa snyigs
216a1(rnying rgyud): ma dang // 'khor ba'i rtsa dngas bon dang // log rtog thig le zhen bcas pa// rang byung nam mkha'i thig les 'jigs// rang lus bde chen snying po la// namakha' sprin ltar
216a2(rnying rgyud): mi byed cing // dngas snyigs bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid/ thig le chu dang 'o ma dang // gnas pa rlung dang rten stobs kyis// dngas snyigs phye la dngas ma bstim// rang snying lus la 'od snang ba'i
216a3(rnying rgyud): phyi nang dngos rtog ma lus pa// rlung sogs 'khor lo'i 'phen stobs kyis// der mi gnas par goms par bya// gang du sa bon snyigs bcas pa// na mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bar
216a4(rnying rgyud): bas// gang du rgyu bar bcas pa'i yid// de ma thag par na/ ma par brlag/ rlung dang rtsa dang thig ler bcas// dbas kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas// ma lus thig le'i rang
216a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin pas// mi mthun zhen pas rnam grol bas// rang sems rten bcas thig le ni// dang sa ma'i ye shes blo ldan pa// kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can// gsang ba'i rig
216a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gter kha 'byed// phyi nang rgyu ba thig ler bcas// snying nang bde bar 'bar gyur nas// rang lus rtags su bde chen 'bar// mngon shes rin chen rtsal phog/ rig pa'i mngon shes
216a7(rnying rgyud): lnga ru 'char// de nas mi 'gyur stong pa'i rtsa// 'gyur med kun snang rlung la thim// dman pas mi 'grub khyad par thabs// gsang ba'i thig le 'bab zhon gyis// rtsa bcud ting 'dzin 'brel pa
216a8(rnying rgyud): stobs// bskal pa du ma'i stobs 'gags te// dngas ma'i ye shes rlung du 'grub// byin pa med par mthar song ba// bde chen goms pa'i stobs las gyur// bcud lnga 'dus pa'i thig
216b1(rnying rgyud): le ni// ro lnga 'dres pa'i bde chen de// bsgom dang mthar phyin khyad par gyis// bde ba chen po rigs mchog gnas// de nas gang yin brjod bya ba// zab mo kun rdzogs brtul zhugs can// 
216b2(rnying rgyud): dbang po dar zhing smin pa yi// chags can nyi zla 'dzin nus pas// spyi gtsug thig le'i 'khor lo dang // gsang ba'i 'og min nus ldan pa// 'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid gnas// thabs dang rol
216b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i khyad par dang // ting 'dzin rlung gi dbang thob ste// 'byung bzhi snyigs phye dngas dus su// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu// rol pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsen
216b4(rnying rgyud): pa// bye brag brgyad cu gnyis 'dus pa'i// pad+ma'i snying po kun bkug ste// thig le dpa' bo lnga yi stobs// mi sngo/ dad 'phro ba'i rang bzhin nyid// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor
216b5(rnying rgyud): gyis// bcings la bzung zhing gnas par bya// de dang rtse phra de gnyis bzlog pas// bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas// tha mal zhen pa kun bral nas// rtog dang lhan cig gang skyesapa/ 
216b6(rnying rgyud): dngas snyigs phye ma'i nyams dag gis// snyigs ma bag chags zhen bcas pa// de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i thig le stobs ldan pas// rigs ngan tha mal zhen chags
216b7(rnying rgyud): dang // dran rtogs ma lus pham byas te// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du// ma lus dpung btsugs rgyal bar mdzad// rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po la// dga' ba'i rol pa'i
216b8(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i ro// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i ro// zag med yon+tan gter chen po// gsang ba thabs kyis stobs las grub// bde chen snying po
217a1(rnying rgyud): thig le'i ro// dbab dang gzung ba zlog 'byongs pa yis// rtsa gsum gang zhig thim pa'i tshe// bar chad med pa'i bde ba dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon/ 
217a2(rnying rgyud): shes dang // skye shi med pa'i tshe 'thob cing // mi 'gyur chos sku thig le la// rgyu ba spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas// gsang ba'i zhing khams dag
217a3(rnying rgyud): byed cing // gsang ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bde chen nyams dang dga' ba'i gar// chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pas// ji srid na mkha'i mthar thug par// klu ni sna tshogs len byed ce/ 
217a4(rnying rgyud): mdzes dang ngo tsha spangs pa'i tshul// mdog dmar rlan dang ldan pa yis// rol pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis// rdo rjebacud chen zlar bcas pas// nyi ma chags pa dang bcas
217a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i// pad+ma'i snying po'i sbrengs mdzad cing // dga' ba'i 'od nga 'khyud pa'i gar// rlung gi snying po brjod byed cing // srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' sku
217a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las bsgrub pa ma lus par bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rtog pa'i rgyal po mi
217a7(rnying rgyud): lus pa/ bya ba las kyi rim pa dag/ bzhir ni gsal bar gsungs pa yin// dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te// de 'og rgyas pas rgyas phyir ro// rgyas pas dbang du bya ba dang // dbang mo
217a8(rnying rgyud): 'du ba bsgral phyir ste// thun mong khyad par yon+dan rdzogs// bya ba'i las la ma rmongs shing // nus pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rim pa ji bzhin brtsam par bya// gangs dkar bang ga/ 
217b1(rnying rgyud): dang yid 'dang ba// zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal// 'bras ldan rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no// sum mdo ngam grog gting zab pas// dbang du bsdu ba'i gnas su bshad// dur khrod mtshan gcig rgya gram/ 
217b2(rnying rgyud): gnas// 'byung po 'du sar drag po shes// zhi la sa gzhi dkar ldan pa// zlum po sum rim oM dang bcas// 'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa// zhi ba'i thabs kyis rang bzhi no// rgyas la ser po
217b3(rnying rgyud): tsan dan bcas// gru bzhi rim gsum tra dang bcas// rin chen 'od zer 'phro bcas pa// thab ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin// dbang las dmar chags 'od can// zla gam gzhu 'dra bad+mas
217b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan// rim gsum hri dang bcas pa ni// dbang du bya ba'i thab yino// drag po sa nag dur sol can// gru gsum rdo/ rje rtse gsum gdeng // thod phreng 'od nag rim gsu/ 
217b5(rnying rgyud): hUM// drag po thab kyi rim pa yin// 'o ma can dang gser cu na dang // chags pa can dang tsher ma can// phrin las bzhi ni so so yi// yam shing bsreg shing nyid du bshad/ 
217b6(rnying rgyud): ling ga kha dog so so ste// gnas kyang thab khung bzhin dang mtshungs// mar dkar 'bas dkar til dkar dang // nas dkar chen dang 'o ma zho// dngul phye gtor ma dkar por bcas// zhi
217b7(rnying rgyud): bsreg gtor rdzas su bshad// mar snying bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // 'bras dang chan rnams ldong ros dang // me tog gser dang tsan dan bcas// gser phye gtor ma ser por bcas// 'di dag
217b8(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid de// dpal dang gzi byin rgyas par 'gyur// tsha ba'i mar dang chang sbyar dang // ram bu pad+ma rag ta dang // 'bras dmar tsan dan zangs phye dang // gtor ma dmar po dbang / 
218a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas yin// tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum// klung chen sha khrag sran chan dang // dug gsum thal chen tsha ba'i mar// ske tshe phye gsum mi khrag dang / mi
218a2(rnying rgyud): rus spel mar bcas gtor mas// bsgral pa drag po'i rdzas su bshad// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgyu mdud rtsi zlum po// logs la zhi ba'i lha bkod la// de bzhin ga
218a3(rnying rgyud): par gsal bas gdab// gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo rtse rgya mdud gru bzhi bcas// logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms te// rin chen nga rgyal bcas pas gdab// zangs
218a4(rnying rgyud): sam byu ru dmar shing rnams mgo bo rgya bdud rtse zla gam// lo gus la dbang gi lha bkod la// chags pa rdo rjer gsal bas gdab// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la/ man
218a5(rnying rgyud): po rgyu bdud rtse zur gsum// logs la drag po'i lha ba/ kod de// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal bas gdab// oM dang traM hri hA nyid las// 'byung lnga'i rim pa gsal stengs su/ 
218a6(rnying rgyud): e baM ma ya bruM las bskyed// gzhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla gam gru gsum ji bzhin dbyibs/ kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin bskyed// rang rang sa bon gdan stengs la// 'od
218a7(rnying rgyud): 'phro 'dra'i cho ga yis// las bzhi gtso bo'i las bzhin bskyed// 'khor yang gtso bo'i cha 'dra ba// phyag mtshan rang rang thugs rtags la// las bzhi rtags kyi mtshan ma ste// ladzi/ 
218a8(rnying rgyud): las kyis dbye bar bshad // dbang bskur las bzhi rigs kyis brgyan// las bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'du can// tshogs gsal bar bskyed byas la// spyan drangs bstim sogs las
218b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs bya// las dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis// las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya// gang du dmigs pa rtse gcig pas// las bzhi bya ba'i cho ga dag/ ma lus bdag 'grub 'gyur na/ pra/ 
218b2(rnying rgyud): mo'i las rnams smos ci dgos// shar phyogs su ni kha bltas te// dang pa'i yid ni mi g.yo bas// rdzogs pa'i dkyil krung la gnas te// ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar byed lho phyogasu ni kha ltas te/ 
218b3(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i she rtse gcig pa// rin chen kyi la krung la gnas bas dpal dang gzi byin 'phel bar bya// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// chags dang zhen pa rtse gcig pa// pad+ma'i dkyil dkrung la gnas te/ 
218b4(rnying rgyud): ma lus dbang du bsdu bar bya// byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis so bca' zhing // ru sbal/ dang ni gyad stabs kyis// gdug pa bsgral te lam du gzhug/ 
218b5(rnying rgyud): so so'i sngags kyi rim pa dag/ snga dro zhi ba'i las byas te/ gung la rgyas pa nyid bya// dgongs ka dbang gi dus nyid de/ drag po nam gyi gung la bya// nam zla dus bzhir bsgrubs pas
218b6(rnying rgyud): na// nges par las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur// oM che ge mo shan ting ku ru swA hA// sA che ge mo pus ting ku ru swA hA// hri che ge mo pa shi ku ru swA hA/ hUM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT// ling ga'i gnas kyang las
218b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i dbyibs// dgug dang phur bu bzhi btab la// ri lu 'am lhag ma gtubs pa ni// so so lha yi zhal du bstab// rtse mo zhi byed yal ga rgyas// sdong po dbang la rtsa ba drag/ kha dang mngar sbyar
218b8(rnying rgyud): tsha ba'i shing // ro yi mchod pa de bzhin te// rgyud bzangs rgyal po smad 'tshang ma// shan pa'i khyim nas me blangs te// las dang 'thun pa'i raskyes mnan// sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin
219a1(rnying rgyud): ba pa ka dang dbang chen dang // gzi byin can dang 'joms byed bzhi// sku mdog las bzhis phye ba ste// 'gu 'de sgrom dang zhags pa dang // rtse gsum g.yon
219a2(rnying rgyud): ba bgrang phreng nyid// rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu// spyan drang mchod bstod las rdzogs nas// lto bar brum las gzhal yas su// las dang 'thun pa'i lha bskyed la Sha/ 
219a3(rnying rgyud): rang rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin// bsreg dang bro gar las byas pas// gang yang 'grub par the tsom med// zhe sdang can dang nga rgyal can// sdug bsngal gdug sems nad gzir ba// de 'drani par
219a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i las ni rtsom pa yin// tshe thung nad/ mang dpal longs spyod// phongs dang nyam nga 'jigs pa dag/ dngas snyigs zad nas snying por thim// thig le mi
219a5(rnying rgyud): shigs bcud 'dus pa// stong nyid thig le'i ngang du 'gag/ rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob cing // mngon shes skye 'jigs thob bral bas// bde chen na mkha'i ye shes nyid// rdo rje thig
219a6(rnying rgyud): le 'gyur 'jig med// steng dang 'og las gang sbyor bas// sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang dag/ bde chen til 'bru bcud bzhin du// nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar// 'bab pa thig le zla ba'i/ 
219a7(rnying rgyud): gzugs// kha bcad rlung gis gzung bya zhing // 'og gis phul zhing steng gis drang // ma lus bde chen khyab par gnas// mi rtog gsal bar mthar phyin pa// seng phrug zla ba rdzogs pa ltar/ 
219a8(rnying rgyud): thabs dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i ye shes chen po la// ma lus yon tan rdzogs par gnas// chags can brtul zhugs bral ba yi// lus dang dran rtogs bag chags
219b1(rnying rgyud): rigs dang rigs min gang yang rung // sgo gsum ma lus bcas pa dag/ steng sgo'i gdul bya des 'dul yin// dang por gsang ba'i rim thob pas// rlung dang thig le'i las goms nas// bde
219b2(rnying rgyud): chen byang chub sems kyi ro// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gang snang ba// g.yo thob brtan pa'i nyams nyid kyis// lus dang phyi nang dran rtogs bcas// na mkha'i gzugs can nyid du skyed// lus
219b3(rnying rgyud): dang snang bar bcas pa yi// na mkha'i mtha' ltar mi phyed pa// bde chen thig le a dang gnas// thig le stong pa'i ri mo can// gsal bar shes pa rgyu bas mngon// 'og nas bskul zhing
219b4(rnying rgyud): steng nas mnan// dngas snyigs bsre ba'i thabs la 'jug/ bde ba'i rlung can yam gi sgo/ bskyod pa'i sbyor bas kye/ dan du phul// rgyu ba rlung gi snying po can// dpa' bo lam nas
219b5(rnying rgyud): thur du 'then// rig pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung // stong nyi da na mkha'i dbyings su thim// phyi nang rgyu ba chod pa dang / rig pa thig le'i ngang la gnas// bde ba'i rtags ni 'byung
219b6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur te// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang // sgra dang lus bde rgyug pa dang // rgod dang brgya la sogs gang byung ba// brtan dang sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// mi mthun log pa'i chos brtags na// thabs kyi// 
219b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i cho ga yis// gdon dang spos dang gnan pa dag/ ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya// rang lus thig le'i nyams myong la// bar chad med par gsal 'jug pa'i// tha mal zhen pa bsgyur
219b8(rnying rgyud): ba dang // bde ba'i dbang phyug smin pa dang // dran rtog rgyud sogs zhi ba dang // bde chen rgyas pas khyab pa dang / rlu dang bde ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang // dran to// 
220a1(rnying rgyud): a yi ngang du gnas// 'di ni nang gi rim pa yin// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// gsang ba'i phrin las
220a2(rnying rgyud): bzhir 'byung ba// dka' thub can dang tha mal dang // thun mong lam las zlog phyir// 'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin// tshad ldan yum dang bcas pa yi// bde chen dgon pa ji/ 
220a3(rnying rgyud): lo'i gnas// yon+dan khyad par kun tu rdzogs// gnyis med 'khril ba'i ngo bo ni// bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i gnas// gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa ni// zhi rgyas dbang drag tshul bzhin dang
220a4(rnying rgyud): nus pa byin brlabs gang ldan pa// gsang ba'i thig le tshul la gnas// pad+ma gsang ba'i thab khung du// gas dang ba'i sbyin sreg gang phul ba// lo dang zla ba ma yin pa
220a5(rnying rgyud): myur du bde chen lus su gyur// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// dngas snyigs bcud dang bag chag/ sa dang // nyi bla khu bar bcas pa ni// bde chen gsang ba ma
220a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas// gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang // zhen rtog de nyid chags pa yi// rang gi ling ga de nyid la// gsang ba'i phur pa bzhi rdzogs pa// gsang ba'i yul la btab pa yis// ldan gcig
220a7(rnying rgyud): skyes pa'i ting 'dzin la// las bzhi ma btsal rdzogs par ldan// rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis// pad+ma rdo rje snying po'i rtsa// nyams dang sbyor tshul gang yin pa// gsang ba'i sbyor
220a8(rnying rgyud): dus su blta// gnas brtsa yi tshul dag ni// kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas// mchod rdzas nyi zlar bcas kun la// gzar bu gnyis bcas thabs phul bas// thig le chen
220b1(rnying rgyud): por 'bab par 'gyur// gsang ba'i don la dga' ba dang // rig pa'i rdul zhugs spyod pa dang // dbang po dar cang smin pa dang // thig le'i don la mos pa dang // rlung dang bcud la gorma/ 
220b2(rnying rgyud): pa yi// rnal 'byor po mor bcas pa kun// dran rtog phyi ma bcas pa'i yod// gdul ba'i don du de bshad do// gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang // dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis Sha
220b3(rnying rgyud): dang sbyor ba la brtson zhing // nyi zla rtse sbyor dbang thob nas// bzung zlog 'byongs pa'i gar thabs kyis// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i don// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gsal bar skye// nyi zla non
220b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// kham sa bzhi 'dus pa'i snying po las// bde chen thig le/ mi rtog pa// thabs kyis da ltar mngon du snang // thabs
220b5(rnying rgyud): dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// skal med las kyis dman ba la// dbang dang rgyud pa bral ba yis// tshig dang ri gas pas ci bstan kyang // rigs ngan rgyal sar banag/ 
220b6(rnying rgyud): pa ltar// bdag phung gzhan rlag 'jig par 'gyur// gang du gsang ba'i thig le nyid// gsang ba'i lam lngar nyams skyes pas// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mkha' 'gro gsu
220b7(rnying rgyud): la gang brten pas// ye shes thig le rgya dpag med// rim par mthar thug gnas su 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la 'dris goms pas// rgyu ba thig ler thim pa dang // dran rtog na mkha'
220b8(rnying rgyud): gsal ba dang // bde chen sngon du smin pa yis// 'chi med sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// 'jigs pa kun las grol ba dang // lha mo tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas// rol rtsed sna tshos
221a1(rnying rgyud): bsgyur byed cing // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing // rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas// yi ge 'khor lo
221a2(rnying rgyud): chotsho gas mchog mnyes// na mkha'i mthar thug par du ni// bde chen ye shes zag pa med// ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor//
