221a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las phrin las mtha' yas pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad
221a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba// gsang ba'i lam la gang dga' bas// thun mong // ma gyur gsang ba'i lam// rim pa nyid du bshad par bya// dad dang brtul zhugs che ba dang // theg pa chen po
221a5(rnying rgyud): rig nges shing // snying rtse dbang dang dam tshig ldan// sgrub la brtson pa'i gang zag gis// lus dang longs spyod 'tshe ba dang // bu dang chung ma rgyal srid kyis// dang por bla
221a6(rnying rgyud): ma mnyes byas la// thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang byung ye shes rang snang ba// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// bden pa gnyis med 'brel
221a7(rnying rgyud): ba nyid// byin brlabs sgra dang gtan tshigs kyi// rang 'byung ye shes mngon du snang // rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// rtog ge'i spyod yul ma gyur pa// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// 
221a8(rnying rgyud): 'phel dang dga' bde longs spyod phyir// rgyas pa'i las la 'bad par bya// dbang chen gzi byin che ba dang // rgyal rigs blon po bram ze dang // gdug pa dbang du snga ba'i phyir// rjes dgug
221b1(rnying rgyud): dbang gi las brtsam mo// ngagra dang dgegs sogs ma rungs pa// gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa// gzir zhing 'du shes bsgyur ba'i phyir// drag po bsgral ba'i phrin las brtsam/ 
221b2(rnying rgyud): gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la// dang po mi mthun zhi bar bya// de nas yon+tan rgyas par bya// de nyid dbang sku las la sbyar// gal te dbang du ma gyur na/ dran pos gzir te bsgral bar bya// gal te
221b3(rnying rgyud): log par lhung srid pas// 'og min gnas su phaT gyis 'phong // nges par 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za// dang por sngon bya'i las kyis ni// nus dang mi nus khyad par brtag/ de nas nus pa thob
221b4(rnying rgyud): ba ste// de nas bde ba'i rtsal thob nas// thogs pa med pa'i daphrin las 'grub// zag med lam la goms sbyangs pa/ sa// tshe 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las bzhi// gdul bya zhing dang
221b5(rnying rgyud): nus mthu dang // byin brlabs rtsal gyi khyad par 'phags// mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas// ma rtsal chu dang rlab sa bzhin du// dpag med yon+tan ngo bo'i phyir// lhun gyis
221b6(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i phrin las yin// las dang nyon mongs gdug pa dang // sdug bsngal rtog pa ji srid pa// cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// lhan ni lhang nger zhi bar 'gyur// nga rgyal rin chen
221b7(rnying rgyud): gzi brjid kyis// dpal dang long spyod 'phel ba dang // tshe dang lang tshe stobs ldan zhing // yon+da na na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 'dod chags rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// bdud dang gdug pa rgyal
221b8(rnying rgyud): po dang // lha dbang srin po mkha' 'gro ma// phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur// zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// cho ga rdzas dang sngags ldan pas// chos sku rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na// gzhan lnga/ 
222a1(rnying rgyud): smos kyang ci zhig dgos// rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings// rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas// sbyor ba rlung gi goms stobs can// dkyil 'khor nang la
222a2(rnying rgyud): gnas gyur pas// nyams kyis las bzhi gsal gyur te// rim pa ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang // rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa// nus pa bstan pas mngon du 'gyur// gzhan min 'khor lo
222a3(rnying rgyud): pho brang nyid// gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang // bstim zhing gnas pa gang yin pa// de dag nyid du bshad pa yin// d+harma tsakra gzhal yas khang // rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na// e
222a4(rnying rgyud): baM ma ya las bzhi dbyibs// kha dog las kyis gtsor gyur pa// bag chags sa bon snyigs ma dang // rtog dang tha mal shen pa'i rdzas// nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir gnas te// 
222a5(rnying rgyud): thig les de nyid zhi bo dang // rang lus phyi nang thig les/ rgyas// rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas// nus pas/ dbang du 'dus pa dang // thig les ma bcos na mkha'i
222a6(rnying rgyud): srog dang thig ler bcas bsdus pa// a yi ngang du thim 'gyur te// rgyu ba dngas shing 'phar ba gnan// mi 'gyur dbyings la gnas par bya// rang lus thabs kyi ngo bo las// 'khor lo/ 
222a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang me rlung dang // bskyed pa rlung gis las rung bas// na mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// thig les rgyus dang lus rgyas pas// bde chen dbang thob zhen chags bral// ting
222a8(rnying rgyud): sbyor bas gang bskul na// rim pa'i rtags dang nus pa byung // kha dog grangs dang snying po dang // dbyibs dang ched dang thig lo yi// khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa// bzhugs tshul
222b1(rnying rgyud): nyid de bzhin no// 'khor lo bzhi yi thab khung du// gtum mo byin pa'i las bskul bas// dngas snyigs rtog pa'i bag chags dag/ mi shigs thig ler mchod pa phul// phyi nang rgyu ba ma
222b2(rnying rgyud): lus pa// rang 'byung 'khor lo thig le mchog/ spyod yul thun mong ma lus pa// phyi yi rnam pa lam byed pas// thun mong phyi yi lam du bshad// de nyid nang du rtsa 'khor lo// thig les na
222b3(rnying rgyud): du nyams bskyed pa// rim pa 'di ni nang du bshad// dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa// skal ran rigs chad yul min pa// gsang bas gsang ba zhes bshad// dang por blo ldan gang zag
222b4(rnying rgyud): ni// ma lus bden pa dbyer med la// rang bzhin rig pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// phung po khams dang skye mched la// // thabs dang shes gnyis med pa'i don// ye nas sangs
222b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas rdzogs pa nyid// de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa/ gang la brten nas rtogs pa la// lam gyi yan lag/ kun rdzogs te// sa bcu rim par ma bkod rdzogs/ ma
222b6(rnying rgyud): lus yon+dan rang shar bas// thams cad ma lus ma 'da' la// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid// dbang po gcig char spyod yul yin// gang su blo dang mos pa dang // rtogs
222b7(rnying rgyud): chung mtshan ma dga' ba la// thun mong sgo 'thun khyad par can// rim pa'i rnal 'byor brlab par bya// dang por phyi nang snod bcud kun// rang sa nyid na mi dmigs pa// ma bcos ma
222b8(rnying rgyud): bsal mi gnas pa// dngos po ci'ang mi brtag cing // de nyid la yang mi rtog pa// 'dzin rtog zhen pa mi gnas par// bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis// bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus / 
223a1(rnying rgyud): gang gi ngo bor ma grub pa// ci la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis// rang sar mi rtog ngo bo nyid// bcos pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom// gal te mtshan ma'i rgyu ba
223a2(rnying rgyud): dag/ chu las rnyog pa'i tshul byung na// ma bcos rang bzhin bzhag pa yis// ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur// nam mkha' dag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ 
223a3(rnying rgyud): sprin kyang rang 'byung dag pa ltar// byung tshor dran rtog ma lus pa// chos nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no// gang du snang srid ma lus pa// phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid de// de nyid stong pa'i rang bzhi// 
223a4(rnying rgyud): du// goms shing nus pa brtan pa'i tshe// de nyid rnal 'byor de de nyid ni// stong pa chen po rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum bye dad spyod ma bcos pa// ma brtags mi rtogs cir mi gnas// 
223a5(rnying rgyud): 'od ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas// bya ba spangs pa'i spyod pa ni/ na// de nas de las langs pa'i tshe// sgyu ma chu zla smig rgyu dang // 'ja' tshon lbu ba chu bur ltar// snang yang dngos por
223a6(rnying rgyud): gnas ma yin// rig pa phyi nang ma lus par// stong pa'i chu 'phrul snang du zad// ma lus rig pa'i ngo bo ste// de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar// zhen chags med pa'i tshul du bsgom// ye shes
223a7(rnying rgyud): sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni// dpag med ngo bor rang snang yang // byin rlabs cho 'phrul rang snang ba// de ltar ma rtogs dman pa la// rang 'byung snying rjer 'char ba'i phyir// snying rje chen po rnal 'byor
223a8(rnying rgyud): yin// 'gro ba gang dang gang dag las// snying rje chen po gang gzigs pas// sna tshogs mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis// de snyed spyod la mtha' yas te// don dang 'thun pa 'ba' zhig ston// tha mas
223b1(rnying rgyud): ba dang thabs nyid dang // lus ngag yid kyis ci 'tsham par// don 'gyur spyod pa bsam mi khyab// gang du byams dang snying rje yis// mi khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te// theg pa chen po'i rigs
223b2(rnying rgyud): chad cing // dman pa'i rigs su gyur pa yin// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// nam mkha'i ris dang dbyer me ltar// ma lus rang rgyud bral ba yi// ngo bo bde min / 
223b3(rnying rgyud): brdzun pa min// chos rnams ming tsam dngos po med// sgo gsum 'di ltar brtan pa ni// thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin// de nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin gnyis med rig pa'i/ yi/ 
223b4(rnying rgyud): ge hU~M du gsal bar bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// / 'phrul 'dus hUM du gsal bar bya// rdul phran de snyed 'a/ dus pa las// thig le mi dmigs stong par blta// ma dang a
223b5(rnying rgyud): las nyi zla'i gdan// gang bsgril hUM bcas gsal bar bya// rang rang gsung yang 'gal ba med// sgril ma'i snying po phyag mtshan ste// 'phro 'du 'phra mo'i rang bzhin sku// gsal la skyon
223b6(rnying rgyud): dang bral bar sgom// de nas rang rang tshad gyur pa'i// rags pa'i phyag rgya chen po nyid// zhi dang khro bo skabs dag du// ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// yang
223b7(rnying rgyud): na zhal gsum phyag drag bsgom// gnas gcig gnas gsum gnas lngar yang // yan lag lha ni tshang bar sgom// goms nas bstims te spyod yul kun// de ltar gsal bar brtag par
223b8(rnying rgyud): bya// rtsa ba gcig pa'i lnga bsgom pa// phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum bsgom la rab 'byor pas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos spyod 'das// ma lus rtsa ba'i spyod pa ste// phyogs
224a1(rnying rgyud): cig pa yi spyod par gsungs// de nas rtog pa'i yan lag dag/ gnyis ka thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags te de ltar bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'phro ba 'brug su/ 
224a2(rnying rgyud): nyid// yang na ye shes lnga nyid de// gnas gcig snying por gnas par bya// de bzhin gtso bo gtso mo dang // sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo khro mo sprul pa dang // yid chos dag
224a3(rnying rgyud): la'ang shes par bya// zhal dang phyag dang lha grangs dang // tshem bu spros pas spros bcas yin// sku gsung thugs dang yon+tan las// tshom bu lnga la khros bcas bsgom// yang na sku gsum thugs
224a4(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i// tshem bu gsum dang bcas pa yi// khro bo khrom 'khor du bsgom// rigs kyi gtso ste thugs kyi mchog/ khro ba cha dgas dang bcas pa yi// mos pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba yis// tshem
224a5(rnying rgyud): bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// slob dpon mthar nye'i wa/ gnas pa'i// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa/ rdo rje thig tshad bor tsam gyis// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
224a6(rnying rgyud): gsal ldan pa// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsungs// dang po rgyang grags dkyil 'khor te// de nas dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas
224a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// de nas yo byad lnga ldan pas// ting 'dzin mos pa spyod 'thun pa'i// skye bo tsam du grangs mthun pas// tshom bus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya// thabs dang shre/ 
224a8(rnying rgyud): rab 'brel ba yi// pho mo 'dus pa'i gangs mnyam par// yo byas 'dus pa'i tshogs ldan pas// dgon par 'khor khang par brtsigs te// rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags
224b1(rnying rgyud): te yo byad longs spyad cing // rdo rje glu bro gar thabs kyis// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// tshe la dbang bsgyur zag med thob// de nas rgya brag tu
224b2(rnying rgyud): drug gis// sku lnga lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa// rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs zhes bya// 'byor pa'i longs spyod tshang ba ni// bde ba'i longs spyod tshegasu bshad/ 
224b3(rnying rgyud): lha dang dam can kun 'dus pas// 'dus pa chen po'i tshegasu gsungs// thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin pas// tshogs gnyis rgyun tu rdzogs byed pas// tshogs chen po ru nges par bsha
224b4(rnying rgyud): bar chad med pa'i lam rdzogs pas// rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med// lha mi cha byad 'dzin mod kyi// 'byung lnga cho 'phrul dbang sgyur thob// zhing dang longs spyod dag pa yis/ 
224b5(rnying rgyud): gong nas gong du mnyam par sbyor// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku// zhing khams kun la gnas par byed// gal te ma tshan mor zhe na dbang gis// rtogs pa'i stobs ni chung gyur
224b6(rnying rgyud): na// byang chub phyag rgya rdo rje sku// mtshan dang depe byad la sogs pa// cha lugs mngon du byung ba yang // zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min// gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang // thun mong lam dang
224b7(rnying rgyud): skabs gnyis su// nus pa'i khyad par che chung gis// 'phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni// dkar mo bong chung skad che la// bzhin lus gtsug pud g.yasu 'khyil// yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal
224b8(rnying rgyud): zhing // rlung khar ci bas zhi ba bya// zla dang yan lag mang ba dang // bra zhing bshad la bzangs su ring // bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas// rnam 'phyangs sha dang nu ma rgyas// 'phel ba'i
225a1(rnying rgyud): dus su 'di dag bzung // bzhin mdog bad 'dra sogs ka la// smin sbrus ring la stod spad phyed// lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing // bde ba ldan zhing yan lag med/ 'di
225a2(rnying rgyud): ni bsdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// nag mo gru gsum rtsid mgo ma// khro gnyer byis pa'i lus ldan zhing // gtum zhing brlang tshig 'dzem pa med// rtsang sme'i rtog bral bsod par bshad// gang
225a3(rnying rgyud): du nus pa brtan thob pa// de dag sa nas sar sbyong ba// rig pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid// rnal 'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa// ma skyes mnyam la dbang sgyur zhing // ma lus gsal bar mthar
225a4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// rang rig ye shes rgyud don phyir// rang snang rig pa ma/ dngon byas pa// rigs 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub pa'o// / ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu med kyang // sa sbyong sems dpa
225a5(rnying rgyud): bskyed du med// bde gshegs nyid dang spyod yul gcigarig pa'i skyes bu'i lung thob pa'i// gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na// bdag nyid sgo gsum lhar lta zhing / khrung
225a6(rnying rgyud): pa bsags pa'i lus las grol// ting 'dzin phyag rgya chen por smin// khyung drug sbubs dang bral ba ltar// ma lus phyag rgya sgyu ma'i mchog/ rnam par smin ces de la brjod// zag bzang
225a7(rnying rgyud): brdo rje lus// phyin chad 'gyur 'jig chos dang bral// bde ba chen po'i lung thob pas// zag bcas bslab pa'i chos dang bral// zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus// ting 'dzin longs spyod da / 
225a8(rnying rgyud): tu med// sgrubs pa'i nus pa gang brtan pa// rdo rje lus gyur 'jig pa med// 'jigs pa lnga bral zag pa dang // dbang bsgyur gsum la dbang thob pas// bde ba longs spyod dpag tu mang/ 
225b1(rnying rgyud): grangs med bskal par don byed cing // mthong bas de bzhin gnyis med rigs// rgyal tshab skyes bus sbyong ba// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing // mtha'
225b2(rnying rgyud): dbus bsam pa'i rgyun las 'das// 'jigs bral dbugs phyin mya ngan 'das// rang snang dpag med zhal mthong bas// gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral// ting 'dzin rig pa goms pa'i/ 
225b3(rnying rgyud): mthu// mtshan ma sdug po yul las 'das 'jig rten stong phrag dbang sgyur zhing // gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i rigs// nam mkha' mtha' thug med pa ltar// bsgoms dang nus pa'i rtsal stobs
225b4(rnying rgyud): kyis// bag chags mtshan ma'i tshang tshing la// ting 'dzin rig pra'i me 'byung bas// zhing khams rgya bral dpag med// / ting 'dzin rigs pas gang sbyangs pa// bsgoms dang ting
225b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rig pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa// phyag/ rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin// de nas rig pa'i rtsal/ rdzogs shing // ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// mthar
225b6(rnying rgyud): phyin rig pa'i skyes bu ste// zhing khams bye ba'i dbang thob cing // rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi sras// dbang dang cho 'phrul kun thob pa// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab// mnyam bzhag rjes
225b7(rnying rgyud): thob khyad par gyis// rgyal ba'i lung mnod bka' la gnas// zhing khams dag par kun spyod kyang // rmad 'byung bsang ba'i rang bzhin la// spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs drag
225b8(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' mi mthong bas// dbang dang dgongs pas mthar phyin 'gyur// dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs te// dang po bslab pa mthar phyin cing // thig le rdzogs par 'dod pa yi// gsang ba nang gi don / 
226a1(rnying rgyud): sbyor thun mong bya ba mthar phyin nas// lus dang spyod yul bcas pa dang // lha yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa// bde chen thig le nyid du blta// lnga dang bde bar mnyam
226a2(rnying rgyud): bas// thig le bde bar snang ba nub// sku bzhi dkyil 'khor khams thig le// dngas ma lta ru mnyam sbyor ba// ngo bo dang ni rkyen dag gis// thabs kyi rim pa bskul las shes// bde
226a3(rnying rgyud): thig le nyams myong ba// mi rtog bde ba tshe shas med// mi shigs thig le kun gyi bdag/ stong nyid 'brel pa'iri mo can// tha mal bya ba kun bral ba// spyod pa nyid du bstan pa yin// thig le/ 
226a4(rnying rgyud): bzhu pa'i rang bzhin gyis// 'dzag 'bar thim gang bde ba ni// / sa yang bcu gsum bde bas brgyan// lus kun khya/ pa pa'i thig le shum/ til 'bru bcud kyis khyab pa ltan
226a5(rnying rgyud): ma lus khyab pa'i ros gang ba// ma lus 'od dang snying po ltar// snang srid thig le chen po nyid// bde ba chen pos khyab par gsal// ma lus 'dus pa'i thog le ni/ khams
226a6(rnying rgyud): 'dres pa'i snying po ste// mi shigs thig le bde ba'i bcud// ma lus bde ba'i rgyas btab pas// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste// thig le
226a7(rnying rgyud): gcig gis kun khyab pas// bde chen snying rjes gcig tu 'khyil// de nyid bde chen phyag rgya ste// nang gi phyag rgya gcig par bshad// de nyid nges par las rung bas// thig le bde chen dang / 
226a8(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i// bye brag brgyad cu ma lus par// so so'i thig ler sku 'phros shing // khams lnga ye shes ro dang bcas// sa bon thig le bde bas brgyan// mi rtog thig le thugs mchog sgra/ 
226b1(rnying rgyud): rang lus smin nas snang bar spro// gang nas gang la spros gyur pa// de srid thig le'i phyag rgya ste// bde ba'i thig le grangs las 'das// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// mi phyed ro yis
226b2(rnying rgyud): gang khyab pas// grangs 'das bde chen tshegs rdzogs nas// ma lus bde ba'i phyag rgyar snang // gang de de yis rgyas btab pas// de nyid bde chen thig ler smin// rnam pa phyi nang snyigs
226b3(rnying rgyud): mar bcas// bde chen thig le'i ngo bor smin// snyigs ma 'byung ba'i lus las 'das// snying po bar chad med pa'i lus// thig les tha ma'i snod gang bas// ma lus bde ba chen por smin// de
226b4(rnying rgyud): nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang // rlung gi 'dren pa'i stobs da ldan pa// rin chen lung gi thig ler zhugs// skad/ cig mngon shes lngar smin cing // 'gro ba ris dang tha/ 
226b5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// mi shigs a la thig le thim// 'byung 'ju/ ge med pa'i rlung 'thob cing // 'gyur 'jog med pa'i lus la gnas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i bde ba nyid// 
226b6(rnying rgyud): snang ba thig le nyid du ste// thig le thung du a ru thim// gnyis med bde ba cha shas bral// 'di ni zag med rang byung ba// rkyen dang bral ba'i bde chen nyid// dper na me dang tsha ba'am// rgya
226b7(rnying rgyud): mtshe dang ni rlan bzhin no// rlu dang thig le rig pa dang // tshe dang longs spyod 'byung ba dang // 'dod lnga kun la dbang sgyur thob// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// ma lus zag med thig le ste// 
226b8(rnying rgyud): rgya bral rig pa'i thig le nyid// snyigs ma'i zag pa rlung zad pas// ting 'dzin bde chen thig ler gsal// rig pa bde chen ror gsal bas// ci mthong bde chen phyag rgya nyid// 'dung
227a1(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba'i spyod yul lam// mun gyur drug rtsi ji bzhin du// rgyu dang bral ba'i ning khams dag/ bde chen drug rgya chen por 'gyur// gang dag snyoms paja
227a2(rnying rgyud): skyes bu ni// tha mal pa dang brkam chags pa// rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa// bsgoms dang ched du ma byas par// bde chen thig ler lhun gyis grub// dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nam// rgya
227a3(rnying rgyud): mtsher phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar// goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin// rkyen dang gnod pa ma lus pa// reg dang mthong thos dran pas kyang // bde chen thig le nyams su 'bar// 2ska
227a4(rnying rgyud): pa du mar gnas gyur cing // 'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul ku dan// rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub// gsang ba de'i lam la goms byed na// mtshon byed rig pa'i bde ba yis
227a5(rnying rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs// mthar phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub// dbang po dar zhing chags pa dang // bde chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas// e dang baM la gan
227a6(rnying rgyud): pa yi// byang chub rdo rje dril las 'byung // dngos po lhan gcig skyes pa yis// ma lus bde bar rtog byas la// phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// gang zhig rtags dang ldan pa'i tshe// gas
227a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas// bde chen mchog la rol par bya// ye shes nyi zla ro dang mnyam ldan pas// re dogs chad pa'i thig le 'byung // lhung med gnas dang thim pa dang // ba
227a8(rnying rgyud): po gdung can phrad pa las// nyin mtshan bral ba'i snang ba ltar// dus gcig nyid zla shar ba'i tshe// ma lus bde bas khyab gyur na// g.yo ba med pa'i thig le 'char// gal
227b1(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i ltas byung na// thabs dang nyams dang rol pa yis// rim pa bzhin du bslab par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le nyid// dngos bral
227b2(rnying rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi phyag rgya yin// lhan cig skyes la gnas pa'i tshe// ma lus bde chen ro gcig pas// bde chen phyag rgya gcig tu gnas// rdo rje pad+ma'i thig le nyid
227b3(rnying rgyud): sa ya bcu gsum phrag gnyis rtsa// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// so so bde ba'i phro brang du// thig les gang bar spros pa'i tshe// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// nyams
227b4(rnying rgyud): myong ro yos rgyas btab bo// lus kyi bde ba mthar phyi dan nas// rgyu gyen rten 'brel las 'ad pa'i rig dpa'i bde ba la gi nas bya// gal te nyams na bsam pa'am
227b5(rnying rgyud): blta dang mnyan pa la sogs pas// bar chad med par/ bsgom par bya// rig pa bde bar gang smin pa sa// sgo gsum bde ba chen por smin// spyod yul rlung dang tha
227b6(rnying rgyud): ler bcas// goms pa'i thabs la dbang bsgyur bas// rton dang brten par bcas pa yi// thig le rlung la dbang bsgyur zhing // lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo// mkha' 'gro rnams la/ 
227b7(rnying rgyud): dbang byed nus// thig le dbab dang 'dzin pa dang // zlog dang sbyor la dbang bsgyur te// gal te mkha' la 'phros pa'i tshe// dngos grub lam dang bral ba yin// phyin chad mchod dang nus pa sbyin
227b8(rnying rgyud): rang gi skabs ni ma gtogs pa// gzhan du thig le mi ltung zhing // dbang sgyur lam la goms par bya// nyi zla 'dres pa'i bde ba nyid// zag med snying por thim pa'i tshe// sems kyi bde bar
228a1(rnying rgyud): rang snang zhing // sems kyi bde ba bar chad med// gsal byed stobs dang bral ba'i tshe// ma lus bde chen phyag rgya ste// lus sems mnyam du gnas pa nyid// 
228a2(rnying rgyud): tshad dang rgyu dbyings ro las 'das// dpag med bde ba'i rol mo ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgyes chen te// thig le sa bon zab pa bral// bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi chad// rang nyid thig la
228a3(rnying rgyud): nyams myong pos// snying po'i thig lo bral ba med// phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med// rdo rje thig le dril bu nyid// 'bad rtsol med par rang snang ba// bral thob me pa'i ngo bor gnas// gang
228a4(rnying rgyud): du yon+dan tshegs kyis rab rgyas pa// bde chen chu rgyun lta dbu'i rgyun las byung // tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs pa gra gzhan lhun gyis grub// gzhan na med de rang nyid snang ba
228a5(rnying rgyud): zad// rang bzhin gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med// zhen pa bzlog pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong // rdo rje se mas dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen
228a6(rnying rgyud): po las lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma lus kun gyi bsgrub bya nyid// phyogs bcum/ 
228a7(rnying rgyud): lus rdul snyed kyi// che ba'i yon+dan pa shad par bya// mthar byin lnga yi rang bzhin ni// rtogs dang 'bras bur gnas mod kyi// mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid// thun mang 'bras bur yang // 
228a8(rnying rgyud): bshad// yang dag mthar phyin 'bras bur no// thabs tshon thabs las byung ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// dpag med yon+tan lhun rdzogs pa// tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das pa/ 
228b1(rnying rgyud): bsam las lhun gyis grub pa ste// nam kha'i mtha' ltar dpag med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni// ma lus mchog gi gter gyur pa// bad 'phel med pa nor bu ste// malun
228b2(rnying rgyud): kun la mnyam du gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// rgya dbyings tshad las 'das pa yi// ngag dang ma dag ci snang yang // blang der phyogs ris yongs kyis med// rang 'byung 'od/ 
228b3(rnying rgyud): gsal maN+Dal lo// ma lus gcig gi rang bzhin te// thugs rje'i byin brlabs tshad med pas// ma lus bsam pa skong bar mdzad// rang byung ye shes lhun grub ni// chos rnams
228b4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi ngo bo bas// ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang / zhen dang chud du byas pa med// sa dang lam la sogs da pa yi// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni// rang rang ltos pa'i
228b5(rnying rgyud): mthar thugs kyang // che mchog lhun grub mnyam dang bral// skad cig nyid le lhun rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dang / ga med yon+dan rnams// rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang chen gyi/ 
228b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// nyi zla'i bde ba sngon thob ste// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la bkod// dpag med rgyal ba thams cad kyi// 'gro ba'i gdul bya mtha' yas pas// sku gsung thugs
228b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin te// bzhugs tshul dpag med rnam par snang // che ba'i yon+dan lhun rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te// namakha'i mthas gtugs mtshan pa yi// bde chen
228b8(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyas pa gnas// bcu drug nag gis rdzogs pa ltar// ma lus rdzogs pa'i ye shes nyid // sa mthe'i nyes pa kun bral ba/ gakun gyi mo nan bdag nyid gnas// sangs rgyas na/ 
229a1(rnying rgyud): khams mtha' yas pa'i// na mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni// gdul bya'i sbrul snyed gnas kyi bar// skad cig 'du 'bral med par gnas// bcud 'dus
229a2(rnying rgyud): le chen po ni// bde ba'i zag med thig le ste// a dang bde bar 'brel pa yis// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs// thig le'i bye brag brgyad bcu'i rtsa// bcud 'dus gsang ba'i theg
229a3(rnying rgyud): ro// ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing // ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni// zhing khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa// zag med thig ler ro gcig pas// na mkha' gzugs can de bani
229a4(rnying rgyud): nyid// sku bzhi 'dus pa'i khams thig le// dngas ma lnga 'dus dasnying po can// gsum 'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste// bde das gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po// thig le ro yis gang
229a5(rnying rgyud): pa// dpag med sku gsung yon+tan thugs// bsam gyis rma khyab yang snang ba// thig le phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// phyi nang dngas snyigs ma lus pa// rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le
229a6(rnying rgyud): nyid// gzhan med phyogs med rang snang ba// phyogs med bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon+dan rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste// bde ba chen po'i snying po las// dpag med yon
229a7(rnying rgyud): tan rnam par 'phrul// bde ba chen po'i thig le ni// 'du 'phro brel bas zag pa med// phyogs ris 'das pas ma khyab med// thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyis
229a8(rnying rgyud): bzhin te// thig le ro la mnyam bzhugs pas// na mkha'i mthas gtugs chos thams cad// bde ba chen por gsal bar myong // mtshan dang dpe byad chad 'das pa// rang la rdzogs
229b1(rnying rgyud): thig le nyid// ji snyed bde ba'i rol pa kun// rang la rdzogs pa nyid du gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni// rang 'byung thig le chen po ste// A li kA li zhu ba las// nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba
229b2(rnying rgyud): 'byung // gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi rgyu// na mkha'i thog le gsang ba'i ngang // khyab pa chen po phyogs cha med// lus gnas rang bzhin ma skyes pa// bde ba'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs
229b3(rnying rgyud): na mkha' lta bur dpag tu med// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thig le bzhugs pa'i gnas// dpag med til 'bru rdul snyed kyi// rgyal ba kun dang lhan cig tu// ma
229b4(rnying rgyud): lus bde ba chen po'i ro// lhan gcig skyes pa'i rang po bzhin gyis// ma gsungs rig pas nyams btang bas// mi 'dzin longs spyod chen po'i gnas// rang 'byung nyi zla na
229b5(rnying rgyud): gyi ro// ma spangs 'dus pas 'du 'bral med// gsang ba'i tha ga le bcud 'dus pa// nam mkha' gang ba bde ba'i ro// gnyis med 'khril pa'i stobs las byung // mkha' dpying
229b6(rnying rgyud): byang chub 'byor pa'i sems// ma btang ma spros thig le che// na mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du// bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med// yab yum gnas pa'i grangs tshad kyang // nam
229b7(rnying rgyud): khams kyi rdul snyed de// re re'ang bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdul snyed na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// yab yum gnyis med 'brel pa yi// thabs dang shes rab bcud 'dus pa// gang yang
229b8(rnying rgyud): mi sgrib thig le'i ro// snang gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa// sangs rgyas rin chen kun gyi bcud // bye ba rdul snyed grangs 'das pa'i// ma lus kun dang lhan cig tu// mos dang cha/ 
230a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i khyad par gyis// cha lugs mtha' yas snang ba ni// la lar chags par lta ba'i tshul// de bzhin 'jam par smra ba dang // la lar 'khyud cing lta ba ste// la
230a2(rnying rgyud): lar sen thabs zhal sbyor zhing // la lar mnye dang rdebs dang 'bud// 'gyed dang 'dud dang 'gying ba yi// dkar 'dzin ston dang lte ba ston// 'o dang 'chir dang rgod pa dag/ sna tshogs rol pa
230a3(rnying rgyud): 'di dag gis// ma chags pa dag chags byed cing // chags pa myur du nyams par byed// tha skam myur du khengs byed cing // bde chen lo thog skyed par byed// bye ba rtul snyed bcas pa ste
230a4(rnying rgyud): lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pas// steg cing 'dzum pas da lhan cig tu// rol cing glu ni len par byed// e ma ho sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin bde ba che// lhan cig skyes
230a5(rnying rgyud): pa mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba ste// rdo rje pad+mar bcug bskyod pas ni brtags pa'i snang ba nub// ma lus khya pa pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang dbang po rlung gis/ 
230a6(rnying rgyud): rlabs/ bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang bar byed// rgyu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde chen ni// na mkha'i rgya mnyam yun yang de srid bar du gnas pa ste/ 'dod pa'i
230a7(rnying rgyud): yon+tan lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba ste/ bdag ni khyod la bsten cing dga' bas mig brteg ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du blta/ gang tshe 'gro ba'i tha ma la bder spyod yul la chags par zhugs pa na// 
230a8(rnying rgyud): dga' dang bde dang rtse gcig yid 'ong 'dod par rab zhugs pas// dbang po gnyis rol nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog skyes che// skye rga na 'chi re dogs ngo tsha mi cha grags pa'i chos brgyad
230b1(rnying rgyud): chod kyang byis pas mi shes so// gang zhig thabs dang shes rab bral bas gsang ba'i don 'jug pa// rgya mtshol ni sa bon btab bzhin 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// nyan pos rang / 
230b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal byang chub sems dpa' thabs tha skabs te// rgyal ba nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub myu gu gtan nas skams so// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// rdul snyed bcas
230b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rang rang brgyan dang gos dor ste// dpa' bo sgeg mo'i tshul 'dzin cing // dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du// glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis// tha mal yid rto/ 
230b4(rnying rgyud): bcad nas ni// bde chen yid ni 'phrog par mdzad// de ba bzhin dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang // zhing thabs bde dang rmad 'byung ba// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa// dpag
230b5(rnying rgyud): med mtha' yas cir snang yang // rang byung ye shes byang chub sems// thig le gcig gi ngo bo las// mdzad pa'i ga ra thabs sna tshogs kyis// 'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro/ tha
230b6(rnying rgyud): la thabs kyis dbang sgyur bas// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// thabs chen sgyu ma rmad du byung // sgyu ma skye 'gag med/ 
230b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings// sku gsung yon+dan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// kun nas 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ste// kun gyi rang bzhin
230b8(rnying rgyud): 'byung gnas nyid// bya ba byed la byas pa med// zad dang 'phel ba med pa yi// dngos grub gter chen bsam mau khyab// ye shes thig le rang snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mcho/ 
231a1(rnying rgyud): mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni// gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med// na mkha' rang byung rtag paltar// 'pho 'gyur med pas de bzhin no// namakha' mtha
231a2(rnying rgyud): dbus med pa bzhin// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med// ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal// sangs rgyas sems can grol thar kun// ma lus rang rig 'od/ 
231a3(rnying rgyud): gsal bas// rang 'byung ye shes rang snang phyir// mkhyen dang bsgribs pa chung zad med// mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyag cig la// rang gi cha shas chos bral bas// na mkha'i mtha' thug chos
231a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kun// skad cig ma 'dres tshul du mkhyen// rang rig byang chub sems nyid khro// mthon dman blang dor mad dmigs pas// 'khor ba'i ngo bor rang snang yang // ma chags
231a5(rnying rgyud): skyon med pad+ma 'dra// dpag med yen+dan ngo bo rnams// rang 'bru nga rig pa rang snang bas// ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams// rang snang gzhan las thob bya med// byin brlab
231a6(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// rang 'byung nyid las rnam par spro// tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// ngag dang ma dag khyad par gyis// ngo bo gcig las ma g.yos kyang // mos pas mthong tshul de
231a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin// gsung ni namakhas khyab par ni// phyogs bcu khyab par sgra sgrogs pa// mos pa bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// bsam yas 'dul thabs sna tshogs snang // thugs ni ma lus mkhyen pa'i
231a8(rnying rgyud): thugs// phan pa dang bcas brtser ldan pa'i// mngon shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes spro// ye shes thugs la khyad par med// yon+tan chad khyad bral ba ste// na mkha'i nor bu gter 'chang ba/ 
231b1(rnying rgyud): dpag med bsam pa bskang ba'i phyir// byin brlabs yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// phrin las byin brlabs rang snang ba// 'gro 'ong med pa'i don tshul gyis// dpag bsam bum dang rin chen/ 
231b2(rnying rgyud): gyi// bya byed med par don rnams rdzogs// ma lus spros pa rnam dag cing // rang 'byung rig pa mtha' dbus med// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas te// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// 'dod pa
231b3(rnying rgyud): longs spyod thams cad ni// gnyis med ngang la kun rdzogs pas// de nyid tshad bral mnga' brnyes pas// longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// sku gcig thig le'i ngo bo las// 'jig rten
231b4(rnying rgyud): khams ni thams cad du// ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku// mo byung ma skye das don rtogs pas// ma lus dbyer med rdo rje nyid// mi
231b5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs gnyis po kun bral ba// rdo rje sku zhes rnam par ba ston// gang du mngon par byang chub pa'i// 'od gas la na mkha' mtha' dbus med// sku bzhi mtha' yis ma/ 
231b6(rnying rgyud): reg pa// dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o// ma lus dbye ba mtha' spangs shing // de ltar kun dang mnyam par gnas// don gyis ma lus khyab 'gyur ba// brjod med don gyi gsu
231b7(rnying rgyud): nyid do// sku dang phyag rgya gzigs tshul gyis// ting 'dzin dgongs pas 'dul ba la// brjod med tshul gyis gang ston pa// brda' yi gsung du rnam par bstan// gang yang rung ba/ 
231b8(rnying rgyud): mthong thos tshe// dpa' bos bltas pas g.yul sel ltar// dngos pos byang chub na mkhar rtogs// byin brlabs rtogs pa'i gsung zhes bya// gang gi don du gang snang ba// 
232a1(rnying rgyud): gnyen po bar chad mi gnas shing // gzhan dag 'am byed mi thub pa// zil gyis gnon pa'i gsung du brjod// tshig gcig brjod pas tshig mtha' yas/ 
232a2(rnying rgyud): mos pa de snyed rnam grol cing // yon+dan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// 'di ni brjod pa tshig gsungs// ji snyed mang por rnam spros kyang // chos kyi dbyings la khyad par med// rtog la nA ma/ 
232a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma yang // mi rtog ye shes grol ba'i thugs// gnyis med bde ba chen po yis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la rol// ma lus bde bar snang ba'i tshe// 'di ni bde ba chen po'i thugs
232a4(rnying rgyud): bdag gzhan phyi nang mi mnga' yang // rang 'byung gnyis kyi phyogs bral bas// gdul bya'i bsam pa kun mkhyen// pas// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i thugs// ji snyed rig
232a5(rnying rgyud): don snang zhing // ma lus kun gyi ngo bo la// skye 'jig gnyen po gdod nas stong // mi 'gyur rdo rje thugs rjes bya// bag med na mkha'i zhing khams dang // che ba'i khyad par
232a6(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i gdan// zag pa med pa'i rgyan rnams dang // ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// 'od zer tshogs ni rnam par snang // gzhan 'a
232a7(rnying rgyud): yon+dan chen po ni// mtha' dbus med pa'i na mkha' ltar// dpag cing gzhal bar mi nus te// zag med che ba'i yon+dan snang // gzhan yang mdzad pa'i phrin las ni// gdul bya'i yul ni
232a8(rnying rgyud): ji snyed pa// mdzad pa'i sgo ni bsam yas te// mtha' thug med par rnam par snang // 'di dag bsdus pas bshad bya na// zhi rgyas dbang drag la sogs pas// mtha' yas bzhes ni rnam/ 
232b1(rnying rgyud): par bsdus// lhun gyis grub par kun kyang 'grub// mdor na 'bras bu'i rnam grangs ni// bsdus pas nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyung
232b2(rnying rgyud): chen po las lhun gyis grub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// gsang
232b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod// gter 'dzin rgyal po stobs po che// rang gi lag gi rdo rje nyid// dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis// rab tu bskor ba byas pa yI/ 
232b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten drug tu bcas pa dag/ 'khrugs shing rnam par ga/ yo mdzad de// kun tu rab g.yo rnam par g.yo// stong gi/ sum 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// 'od dang sgra yis gang
232b5(rnying rgyud): mdzad de// rmad 'byung sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rnam par snang // ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad 'byung gi/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // 'dod yon lnga yis
232b6(rnying rgyud): khyab mdzad de// rgyal ba'i tshigs kun mnyes par byas// kun kyang dga' zhing mos pa yis// zhing khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi// 'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa 'di// sna tshogs sgras
232b7(rnying rgyud): ni glu ru blangs// oM AHhUM a la la ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs ni mi skye ye shes bde ba'i thugs// mi rtog gsal ba'i thugs ni kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas
232b8(rnying rgyud): ma yin 'dus ma byas min skye 'jig med// dam pa'i thugs la byung tshor g.yo 'gog ci yang med pas bde ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sku ni sna tshogs 'od 'bar bde ba'i sku// sna tshogs mtha'
233a1(rnying rgyud): yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben// de nyid 'du ba'i thabs kyis de ltar yid 'phrog tshim pa'i sku// mtha' yas sna tshogs bye brag ji ltar gsal yang na mkha'i dang
233a2(rnying rgyud): du bye brag med to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo dpag med rgyas par snang // 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes
233a3(rnying rgyud): mod par mdzes// rgyal ba ma lus yon+tan rdzogs par snang la de dag mtha' thug med do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsung ni zab tsang rgya cher na mkha' 'dra// ma lus go zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra byin
233a4(rnying rgyud): snyan sgrogs pa// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas mos dang 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par snang hi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed
233a5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba ma lus kun 'dul ba// thabs dang shes rab 'du' bral med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol/ ho// de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa la
233a6(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// bye ba rdal snyed bcas pa la// gsang ba 'di ni gtad par mdzad// nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa kun gyi rang bzhin te// ma
233a7(rnying rgyud): lus kun gyi thabs su snang // gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi rgyud// chos rnams ma lus kun snang ba// gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi rgyud// rgyal ba rdul snyed
233a8(rnying rgyud): kun 'dus nas// dam pa 'di la bsngags par mdzad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po// zab mo'i lung gi nges don 'di// rigs chad dman pa'i gang zag gis// thams cad la ni me long ltarakhaN+Da/ 
233b1(rnying rgyud): kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bas// ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing // brtags pa phyi rol chos la zhen// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang // rdo rje spun la sdang sems che// zab mo'i don la sku
233b2(rnying rgyud): byed cing // gsang rgyud don la 'phya ba dang // ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che// dad dang dam tshig mi ldan zhing // rgyal srid rin chen mi gtong ba'i// phyi nang gnyis lha'i gang zag la// bskal pa
233b3(rnying rgyud): zhong gi rdul snyed// lus sems bral ba'i byed gyur kyang // gsang ba'i glegs bam mi bstan na// dbang dang dngos grub rnams kyang min// rmongs pas gal te byin na ni// de nyid mnar med
233b4(rnying rgyud): dmyal bar ltung // dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// phun su dam tshogs pa kun gtong zhing // dam pa'i yo byad ldan// gyur pas// lus dang srog la'ang mi lta na// dman pa'i lo
233b5(rnying rgyud): spyod nams kyang min// theg pa che la mos pa dang // brtul zhu gas snying rtser gus par ldan// rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen pa kur zhing // skyon dang spro ba yongs su bzod// bskal par 'gro// 
233b6(rnying rgyud): kyang yid mi 'khrug/ nyes dang legs pa ci la yang // ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med// rang bzhin bzang dang tshul shis dang // 'grogs pas dug nad mi ldang ba'i// dam pa 'di la gsang ba ba
233b7(rnying rgyud): slob dpon man ngag mi ldan cing // gsang ba'i don lam goms pas// rang rtags logs pa'i tshad ma yis// gsang ba'i sbas don gtan la 'bebs// blun po mun pas chod pa rnams/ 
233b8(rnying rgyud): log par zhen pa'i rjes 'brengs nas// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar smin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di// ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas// 
234a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas gsal bar gang byed pa// dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste// bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub// rdul snyed nang la bsnyer bkur nang / 
234a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi bla ma bsten byas pa'i// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// de bas rgyal byas gcig gi yul// rnyed dang bkur bstis 'tsho ba yi// grags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spra sa// 
234a3(rnying rgyud): a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / rdo rje sems pa/ 
234a4(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkha na po bai ma la mi tra dang / ban de dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing
234a5(rnying rgyud): nus te gtan la phab pa'o// slad nas bi ma la mi tran+ta de la bram ze mo dge slong mas yang dang yang du nan du zhus pa 'di gzhan la sbrel na dam tshig nyam so// 
234a6(rnying rgyud): bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// de bzhin gshegs
234a7(rnying rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i ba/ 
234a8(rnying rgyud): nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dang dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te// rig min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gni chad med pa'i ye shes kyi
234b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo khyab par stsal pa la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongasu mtshad pa/ yon+dan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru ba nir gyur pa/ 
234b2(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i blo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shwa kun tu 'byi
234b3(rnying rgyud): pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs te/ rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi
234b4(rnying rgyud): phreng ba dang // chun 'byung dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang // ga zugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyi phyog bcur 'khrigs
234b5(rnying rgyud): par rang byung la/ mi bsgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan pas/ ma gyis mi khyab pas klubs pa/ rnam par thar pa ba zhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyod cen// rnam par thar pa
234b6(rnying rgyud): kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang med par kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng+ga'i khri dang / stobs kyi glang po'i khro dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rta'i khri dang / dbang gi rma bya'i khri dang / 
234b7(rnying rgyud): thogs pa med pa na mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'di gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad
234b8(rnying rgyud): du yang zhal thal le bar gsel zhing / mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad tu sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu snang ba// lhun gyis grub pa
235a1(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye
235a2(rnying rgyud): shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal
235a3(rnying rgyud): po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
235a4(rnying rgyud): 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang mthing ka dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / leb rgan dang / ljang khu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa'i snang ba'i dbyings
235a5(rnying rgyud): dang / sra ba'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro 'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyis dbya
235a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa/ 
235a7(rnying rgyud): dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myong bar bya ba'i chags dang / 
235a8(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang / byang chum chen po rdo rje sdom byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje srong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da
235b1(rnying rgyud): padang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa chen mo rig pa dang / 'joms pa chen po rag byed dang / 'joms pa chen po rag shes dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad pa
235b2(rnying rgyud): ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
235b3(rnying rgyud): btsun mo'i tshogs dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang thugs dang yon+dan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // e e e maho/ 
235b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang / dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rang rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzi dan gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni sku dang gsu
235b5(rnying rgyud): dang thugs yon+tan phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin no/ ra bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid de// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu
235b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang
235b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum ma
235b8(rnying rgyud): g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul ba// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba// 
236a1(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir// nang
236a2(rnying rgyud): phyi rol lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas pa yi// sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de// kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs shes brjed pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo la/ 
236a3(rnying rgyud): 'jug par gyur to// zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yod kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde ba la mnyam par gnas te// ched du
236a4(rnying rgyud): brjod pa brjod do// sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga' bsams yas na// ni la lha/ 
236a5(rnying rgyud): bu'i gter 'byin pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis / rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas// byang chub mchog gis nang gdan dgrol// mnyam sbyor pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 
236a6(rnying rgyud): 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas// 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to// zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gas
236a7(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la
236a8(rnying rgyud): du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e mato rdo rje dung ngo'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// sre mchod khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor nyid
236b1(rnying rgyud): sachu spyan dang mam kI/ me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// na mkha' dbyings kyi dbang drug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las
236b2(rnying rgyud): gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun mo bya ba
236b3(rnying rgyud): me chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e maho phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes dben// srid pa
236b4(rnying rgyud): gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas/ 8/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal// nyid/ 
236b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do zhe/ sa brjod pas thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bani na gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de
236b6(rnying rgyud): kho na nyid nges pa las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed pa
236b7(rnying rgyud): 'di gsungs so// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid ni skye ba med// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ 
236b8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e maho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gas
237a1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e mato ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gas da rigs pa da
237a2(rnying rgyud): / thad dmigs// darigs pa nyid na dad gra ba med/ e matong mtshar rmad kyi chos rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med ces brjod pas de
237a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes pa khyab par gyur to/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas che du brjod pa 'di
237a4(rnying rgyud): brjod do// e maho ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gas // gzhan du min la shin tu gsang // zhes brjod pas de
237a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med/ na/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa la 'gro ba
237a6(rnying rgyud): lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas tshod du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma ho bde gshegs snying po las// rang
237a7(rnying rgyud): gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin// sus kyang mi 'ching bcings med de// bcing
237a8(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dir// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan gyi
237b1(rnying rgyud): spro ba sna tshogs mdzad ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i
237b2(rnying rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs/ 
237b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// gton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel gzhi dang / yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i steng gsum gyi stong
237b4(rnying rgyud): chen po'i re rer thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam gzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de bltams padang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka' thub mdzad pa dang / sa
237b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas pa dang / bdud brtul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das ba la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen
237b6(rnying rgyud): pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud tu kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi bsnyon gyis kun tu gsan pa dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kun tu
237b7(rnying rgyud): don spyod pa dang // zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug dang // kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 
237b8(rnying rgyud): kun tu nal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med par phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// de ltar snang ba
238a1(rnying rgyud): gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje go 'bang chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa
238a2(rnying rgyud): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por
238a3(rnying rgyud): kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsung so// gsung ngo // gsung bar gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul
238a4(rnying rgyud): pa la dgongs pa dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi da za ba dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / gos pa med pa'i ston pa'i mthar thug/ de nas
238a5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor ba'i skye/ na dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon+tan bstan pa'i phyi/ ra de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la che du brjod pa'i brjod do// 
238a6(rnying rgyud): e ma ho// dkyil 'khor bsam yas par// snying po bla med ji snyed pa'i// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs rang bzhin rgyal// mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
238a7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e mdo ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par// byi nang rten
238a8(rnying rgyud): 'brel gnyis su 'khor// rtog pa'i bag chags stug po yin// mi mthun pade sdug myong bar 'gyur// de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang // rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste/ 2
238b1(rnying rgyud): nyid la nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings pas// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go// bdag dang bdag gi gan
238b2(rnying rgyud): rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang // gzhi rtsa med/ 
238b3(rnying rgyud): de skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi
238b4(rnying rgyud): yis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras buraganas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang de bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod
238b5(rnying rgyud): mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rigs smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir// 'byung gnas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang / 
238b6(rnying rgyud): dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par// phyogs bcur kun tu rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros
238b7(rnying rgyud): te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags/ 
238b8(rnying rgyud): pa tsam// ston pas don dang 'thun phyogs su// ming nyid tshig tu rtags nas bstan// ston cing tshig la dngos po med ces brjod pas// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun
239a1(rnying rgyud): gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang
239a2(rnying rgyud): ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon+dan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho srid rtsa'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'bros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas pa
239a3(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmigs pa dmigs med med par dran dbang sgyur
239a4(rnying rgyud): ngo mtshar sku gsung yon+tan zhing khams la// gzhan na med de de nyid da ltar yin zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// / thub pa drug gis sprul pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md/ 
239a5(rnying rgyud): kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyi dnges pa las chos tha~Md bstan pa las chos thad gtan la phab 'i
239a6(rnying rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang / rigs
239a7(rnying rgyud): rgyud drug tu yang bshad// de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod do// nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / na mkhas kun la khyab kya
239a8(rnying rgyud): rnam par thar pa'i don ma rtogs na me long g.yas g.yog pa dang 'dra ste gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// mnyan
239b1(rnying rgyud): nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang // rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar// bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// a ho/ bdag med
239b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa// sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam// bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten
239b3(rnying rgyud): 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/ dge ba shes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs// byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog/ bden
239b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yis// ye shes bcu drug cha/ sbyangs rab zhi pa'i// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim pa dar sbyangs nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru
239b5(rnying rgyud): 'gro/ theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i// yang na kun la 'thu na nas 'jam par 'jug/ yang na nges med 'di zhes pa rtag tu med// 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// dge
239b6(rnying rgyud): bcu spyod cing mi dge slong byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun tu
239b7(rnying rgyud): khyab gyur kyang // rang rig rtog pa'i skal dang mi ldan na// ji ltar dmus lang mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis// bla
239b8(rnying rgyud): mod theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang // so so rang rig blo la snang bar zad// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang // 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la
240a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba med// mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog/ log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na// dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur/ 
240a2(rnying rgyud): yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong // theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtog pa ni// ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas// nam
240a3(rnying rgyud): dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par// nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang // 'ja' tshon sprin mangs sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang // nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med// mi
240a4(rnying rgyud): dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung yon+ta/ dan phrin las rmad 'byung dang // 'jig rtog gtso mcho/ dag ma lus thams cad dang // 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal
240a5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs rnam mang yang // de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang rigs rgyu
240a6(rnying rgyud): chad pa dang rigs brgyud so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'o
240a7(rnying rgyud): tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs
240a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las phyung ngo // a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de las mang
240b1(rnying rgyud): tshetshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing sdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// a ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta wa Da T+Ta Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ ba pha ba d+haH/ 
240b2(rnying rgyud): ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ oM I/ uM u/ e e/ o oM/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos kun tu g.yos nas chos
240b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis che du brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad mi tsa sangs rgyas
240b4(rnying rgyud): kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang dpa'i// ka las sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ni rang gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de/ 
240b5(rnying rgyud): nyid nges// e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyis// 'phrul chen bri/ zhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming // tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa 'i gnas// sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston// dngos med
240b6(rnying rgyud): yi ge rang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang // dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus pani gshegs pa yi/ ye
240b7(rnying rgyud): shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge mgo nas k+Sha las rdzogs// sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med
240b8(rnying rgyud): de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo tshe// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyis// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni
241a1(rnying rgyud): de phyir brjod/ mgon ma nor lam yin te// chog ni shes rab mang du smras// shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni s+thi med de bzhin nyid // dzan spu 'phrul / 
241a2(rnying rgyud): nyid// Tha ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid// Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid// D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid// Na ni kun tu sgyu 'phrul nyid// tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid// ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid/ 
241a3(rnying rgyud): da ni dra bas lham me nyid// d+ha ni dra bas 'khyil ba nyid// na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur// ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/ bla ni
241a4(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa 'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dzA ni ljags kyi sku 'i
241a5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ nya ni sku yang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ pa ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste// ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin// b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi man
241a6(rnying rgyud): ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag med dag pa ste// Sha ni chad pa'ang
241a7(rnying rgyud): yod ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul
241a8(rnying rgyud): snyed mi rnams su// u ni rdul snyed byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dgas su// aM ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// oM na thams cad 'jig par byed// oM ni thams cad 'jig pa
241b1(rnying rgyud): yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus// a ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyigs
241b2(rnying rgyud): ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon+dan 'phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // oM ho/ thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba'i smin grub ngo mtshar
241b3(rnying rgyud): ming tshegs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshegs pa'i mthu chen yin// a ho/ rdo rje gsang
241b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs paHmas cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bkod
241b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyir/ 
241b6(rnying rgyud): dang nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bco brgyad du bstan/ gtsug lag thams cad la yang khams bco brgya du bstan pa yin/ lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir/ khams
241b7(rnying rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin/ gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul gnyi ka yang skye mched dang khams thad
241b8(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyi nyi nyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma 'o ye nas gsang ba'i
242a1(rnying rgyud): chos// tham cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// ngang gis dag mnyam gtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang // gzhan du min la shin gsang // don nyid kyis
242a2(rnying rgyud): ni gsang ba'i rgyu// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsung // 'di ni byang chub snying po mchog/ a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i
242a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor// skye mched khams rnams bco brgyad po// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// thams cad bang
242a4(rnying rgyud): chub sems ma yi// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus// rdo rje dbang po gsang ba'i thabs// dbang po yul nyid shes ra rab dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad
242a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gter nyid dang // thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid de// de yi sa ma bskyed gang yang med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das ba'i rgyu// de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung // kun gyi phyag rgya
242a6(rnying rgyud): rgyu yin te// bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas// de las bskyed cing de las spro// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas// dbang po rdo rje pad+mor ldan// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro na// mi dmigs
242a7(rnying rgyud): bde dang longs spyod 'phro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang // mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi// 'jug dang ljang dang gan dang smon pa'i byang chub sems// gso
242a8(rnying rgyud): dang bskyod dang ldan dang gnas// 'gug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te// bsdus dang 'khril pa 'do sgrub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang sbyar te// bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// shin tu rnam
242b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bar// dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyed pas phyogs bcur g.yo// kun tu tshim byed bro gsung thim lnga
242b2(rnying rgyud): mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'phro bas kun tu 'bar// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyangs// a la la ho// gsang ba'i dbang por ldan gyur nas// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ 
242b3(rnying rgyud): pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa cu rims kyis bkod med rdzogs// kun tu 'od gsal pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang
242b4(rnying rgyud): ldan// thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs// bsod na dmas ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol// a la lA daho// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las// khams ni nyi shu rtsags
242b5(rnying rgyud): ste// bco brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin// gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ bco brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin// bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyur
242b6(rnying rgyud): yin// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal// yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas
242b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro// dkyil 'khor rdul rnyed grangs med dang // phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams// gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed// 'di ni rtse gcig yin par
242b8(rnying rgyud): gsungs// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas na// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur// khob len gis ni lcags sdud lnga
243a1(rnying rgyud): mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya// shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa
243a2(rnying rgyud): yis// blo brtan snying rje che dang dad ldan dang tshul bzang la brtan// gzhan du rnams kyang sbyin mi bya zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa
243a3(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bsdus nas thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa
243a4(rnying rgyud): 'di chad du brjid do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnam sa kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te/ yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor
243a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khorathams cad grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung
243a6(rnying rgyud): ba dang // bzhi rgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing // longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong // ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub// namakha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing // 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang // chur 'gyur
243a7(rnying rgyud): 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang // thams cad stengs shing ltung bar 'gyur// 'gug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol// gso dang gsad dang pam dang rgyal// ting 'dzin dang/ 
243a8(rnying rgyud): mos byed par 'gyur// danyid la shes rang snang ba'i// ma chog gzugs tshogs med bzhin gyis// sun la snang byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mtshad sa
243b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med brlag/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub
243b2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams
243b3(rnying rgyud): nyid na dngos med par// rtogs pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos kyi dbyings ma yin// de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa// 'jigs pas
243b4(rnying rgyud): dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs / rgyud min// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su
243b5(rnying rgyud): ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad min la tha dad pa'i// nang dang
243b6(rnying rgyud): nang gi phyi rol pa// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas// 
243b7(rnying rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pan
243b8(rnying rgyud): sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di byung ngo // e ma'o snying por lam bcas pas// 'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen
244a1(rnying rgyud): po// byang chub lhun grub bdal ba'i ngang // snying po nyid ni snying por kun bcas kun tu gnas// de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas/ aho// 
244a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal ba
244a3(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sngags 'chang rnams lhar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod/ e
244a4(rnying rgyud): ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams cad bdag
244a5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal// ga cig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros/ med zlum po'i tshul// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye
244a6(rnying rgyud): rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor// thugs rjes byin brlabs 'phros pa yis// ye shes bzhi'i dkyil 'khor spro// 
244a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab// rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas
244a8(rnying rgyud): khang // dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye nas
244b1(rnying rgyud): 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma chags pad+mo 'bar ba'i gdan// zag med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin
244b2(rnying rgyud): chen 'bar ba'i gdan// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhon gnas// re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir// dpag bsams shing gi rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin
244b3(rnying rgyud): rin chen brgyan gyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// thams
244b4(rnying rgyud): cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyil/ 'khor mchog/ 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin
244b5(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tshe gas mchog brten zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ shin tu gsang ba'i
244b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsdus nas lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma
244b7(rnying rgyud): med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas/ che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi sa
244b8(rnying rgyud): brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spong // 'khor lo brtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas
245a1(rnying rgyud): gru chad bzhis brgyan par 'khyams dang // kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor ba zhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan
245a2(rnying rgyud): seng+ge glang chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha' lding gi khri chen lo// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos / 
245a3(rnying rgyud): padang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshigs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // tho byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas// bar 'khyams la ni thub drug dang / 
245a4(rnying rgyud): mdun dang rgyab du byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gring
245a5(rnying rgyud): bu 'bar/ ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul ma nyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ka dkar po ser le ba rgan// ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lcug 'bri/ 
245a6(rnying rgyud): ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun stag gzi byin can// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khyil ba ste// dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor
245a7(rnying rgyud): bsam yas lhun gyis grub// sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang // 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// 'thun byas sku ni sna
245a8(rnying rgyud): tshogs ston// ston nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs bzhin// de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin/ 
245b1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis ma bcos kyang // las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang // dper na me long chu bzla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la
245b2(rnying rgyud): dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems
245b3(rnying rgyud): dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra te// sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston// me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis/ 
245b4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med/ me long bzhin du sku la snang // de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung // bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos sku dpag
245b5(rnying rgyud): med brjod med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul/ pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad tham/ sa cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun tu maN+Dal// tshogs chen gnyis
245b6(rnying rgyud): kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung skra// nyon mongs kun gyi zhong du gnas// zad mi shes kyi gter du gyur/ 
245b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' sra/ 
245b8(rnying rgyud): mu med pa/ thams cad dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon+dan chen po'i
246a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon+dan phrin las rdo rje las phyung // a ho// dmigs bya dmigs med ming rigs dpag med bsam mi khya
246a2(rnying rgyud): ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams spro spros pa med// yaM nas kun khya
246a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khar bsam yas zhang ga rdul skad du// ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed// ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// #
