246a4(rnying rgyud): zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pra las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u sna bcu pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa
246a5(rnying rgyud): nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams/ cad kyang nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing / kun tu bzang dgyes te phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi
246a6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa rgyas pa/ mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba
246a7(rnying rgyud): la bzhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med// kun nas dkyil 'khor yongasu ma chad pa'i// srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te/ ma
246a8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung // dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla mod rjes 'dod dang / 
246b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang // gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa// bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tsha
246b2(rnying rgyud): gcad pa'o// 'das dang ma byon de bzhin nyid du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba// rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom// stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'di
246b3(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i// zag med bsod nams tshigs kyi brgyan par 'gyur// b+h+rUM rang byung nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugasu chud pa yi// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la 'o/ 
246b4(rnying rgyud): pa mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas nyepa// dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i// sku gsung
246b5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las 'byung // spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas
246b6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam po'i dbyings mkhyen pa// mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya// rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku// shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs
246b7(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam pa sbas pa yi// dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa// thabs dang shes rab
246b8(rnying rgyud): dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa// shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chang ba// thugs rje byin rlabs sna tshogs phro ba'i khade
247a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// yid bzhin rin chen ma zad par ldan 'gro// rang rig rgyal po che yis rtog par 'gyur zhes nyid la nyid du rjod
247a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas de bzhin ga
247a3(rnying rgyud): bapa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung // b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he/ hUM badz+ra d+hika/ oM dzi na dzig/ swa rad na d+h+rika/ oM A ro l-ig/ hA pradz+nyA d+he// 
247a4(rnying rgyud): mu d+hA tu shwa ri/ la dwe sha ra ti/ ma mo ha ra ti/ bai rA ga ra ti/ badz+ra ra te/ k+Shi hi rA dzA ya/ tra A ka gar+b+ha ya/ hr-i da hUM bA d+haM ma/ dz+nyAM ku ru ba na ra/ hU lA s+yAM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ tra mA le sa ma yo ho/ 
247a5(rnying rgyud): hr-i gai t+yai rA ga ha a nr-i tre rA ga ya me/ me d+hA ra na sArbA/ b+hIn/ ra ma ba swAhA/ hUM swar dzA ya sa/ mu shrA a rA ga sr-i/ dz+nyA d+hA/ pra bo sha/ hUM puSh+Ti a be sha bdI ba su ki ni/ ho gan d+he tsita
247a6(rnying rgyud): hU ya mAn ta krita phaT/ pra dz+nyA na ta kri ta/ hUM bag+h+nAn taM kr-ita phaT/ hUM pad+mAn ta krita phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dzI la ni phaT/ oM ma hA rad na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dzA la ne phaT/ oM mahA/ 
247a7(rnying rgyud): bid+me d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA kar ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsi ta ta hUM/ a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa man ta ma/ oM mu ne kro swA hA/ oM mu ne dru sa hA/ oM mu ne/ 
247a8(rnying rgyud): su sA hA/ oM mu ne b+hi swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga bAn+da/ ma hA ka ru NI ka/ tri sha ho/ sa ma ya sto/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AHhUM swAhA/ ba ba baM be badz+ra dz+wa dz+ra dzA rmis sas
247b1(rnying rgyud): sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon+dan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig/ 
247b2(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grags so// 
247b3(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang // bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis
247b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad// de nas byig das bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyi dra chen pos bdag nyid chen po ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes
247b5(rnying rgyud): bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra bas phyung// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA/ a d+ha ri shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata mo ko&hi/ oM ma
247b6(rnying rgyud): hA pra te na bai k+She na sha n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ka&haM/ oM ma hA sa man ta shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ad ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA krita ta a nush+tsa na shru n+ya rA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko&haM/ aM
247b7(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bAka badz+ra pra b+ha ba Ata me ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsita ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ata ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta/ 
247b8(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga ne badz+ra swa b+hA be Ata ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to// gsol bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyu/ 
248a1(rnying rgyud): to// e maho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung / 
248a2(rnying rgyud): gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las// bde ldan
248a3(rnying rgyud): gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang // thams cad pad+ma'i nga gyur na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji ltar brjod kyang gsung mchog ste// theg pa mthon dman thams cad dang // log 'gro
248a4(rnying rgyud): ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus // bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// sgra ny-id dam chags dang du gsungs// gsung ba nyid na brjod du med
248a5(rnying rgyud): brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing sis ra mjal// dper na de bzhin sbrid bsangs bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yas thams cad go// 'di ni gsung mtsho
248a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po yin// theg pa mthon dman bsam yas kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid kyis gsu
248a7(rnying rgyud): pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung // ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal// gsal nyid gsang gi rdo rje mchog
248a8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams// de bzhin dang las ma g.yos kyang // dper na brag cha'i sgra ban no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang / gas
248b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgyu ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di che du brjod pa 'di brjod / 
248b2(rnying rgyud): oM hUM badz+ra satwa d+hu/ badz+ra pra b+hA na hUM mu badz+ra gan d+ha hUM/ oM tsakra maN Da la a/ laM badz+ra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha laM/ swa ra ta na pra b+ha ni sAM/ oM badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha aM/ oM pad+ma pra ba na a/ paM badz+ra gan+d+ha
248b3(rnying rgyud): pra b+h+r-i na paM/ haM khaMng ga tik+Sha pra b+hA hai/ ta/ ta badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA na taM/ shI rad na pra b+hA naM shI hUM/ badz+ra gan d+ha pra b+hA na g+ho Sha hUM/ tra kha ta ga pra b+hA na traM/ traM badz+ri gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na tra/ 
248b4(rnying rgyud): hriHpad+ma pra b+ha na hrIHbadz+ra gan d+he b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hriHha badz+ra/ gan d+ha b+ha ShaM prab+hAn haM/ a badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra d+ha na a / me ka la pra b+hA na me/ hUM badz+re gan d+ha pra b+hA ne b+ha Sha trUM/ tha pra/ 
248b5(rnying rgyud): b+hA na miN+Da Da le thA/ swA badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha tsa pra b+hA sraM/ d+hu ta/ na swa sA d+ha b+ha dra preb+hAnA swA hrIHbadz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hin dza~M/ mu ud pal no la bri b+hA na mu/ a bedz+ra gan dr-i bA
248b6(rnying rgyud): b+h+r-i na a/ phaT badz+re a ma/ mud g+ha ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA na a~M oM/ phaT ma hA badz+ra pra b+hA na phaT pheT/ hU ma hA ra ta na badz+ra gne d+ha b+ha She pra b+hA na hUM hUM phaT hriMHpad+ma mudaH/ 
248b7(rnying rgyud): ra pra b+ha na hrIHhrIHoM ma hA badz+ra pad+ma badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+ha na hrIHhrIHa kar ma mud g+ha ra badz+ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ a karma badz+ra gan d+ha b+hi Sha pra b+hA na hUM/ a a a zhes brjod pas phyag rgya
248b8(rnying rgyud): gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// 'ber bar bye gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung
249a1(rnying rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las chos
249a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad na mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas cha du brjod pa 'ang brjod do// yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nges pa'i don chen
249a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar thim// thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings// sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun// thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim// gsal
249a4(rnying rgyud): 'bar sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi thig le ni// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin// yon+tan mchog gi snying po ni// rtog ge/ 
249a5(rnying rgyud): spyod yul yong ma yin// zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i// gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan na/ btsal zhing brtag tu med// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan ta
249a6(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang // rgyal po mngon byung thams cad kun// na mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na med// dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mag/ 
249a7(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim// thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab dbyings nyid
249a8(rnying rgyud): 'byor pa yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le yin// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang // rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis// kun la khyab cing mo gnos pa// yon tan mchog gi/ 
249b1(rnying rgyud): gnas yin te// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma zin gang yang med// rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang // gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i
249b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun// de la gsad cing gzung du med// kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas// de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis
249b3(rnying rgyud): de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni// rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshon nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus// tshogs
249b4(rnying rgyud): chen gnyis kyang rtogs par rol// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings dal zhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun// rgyal ba yum \u0f7f/ 
249b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings su thim// thams cad ma lus chos skur 'du// ho/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad yum gyi dbyings
249b6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis
249b7(rnying rgyud): rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ched brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pas// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'// 
249b8(rnying rgyud): mi bskyod nyi mi'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang mu gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtser
250a1(rnying rgyud): smad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po'i sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs dkar bkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar/ khwa
250a2(rnying rgyud): bskul 'bru sbal dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nos thugs dkar bkan// mung gi rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// 
250a3(rnying rgyud): btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs dkar bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis
250a4(rnying rgyud): chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs dkar bkan// lam gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga la das su 'khrol// btud te 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ 'bru
250a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// suM brtser 'bar ba rin/ po che// zla brtu 'bru sbal dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la bstan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thug
250a6(rnying rgyud): kar bka na// mung gyi rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud te 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// am gyi rtse mor/ 
250a7(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril bsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// b+hu bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru/ 
250a8(rnying rgyud): las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan//  kyai rtsi mer ram gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsol zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos tshe
250b1(rnying rgyud): brtul// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// taM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud te 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// ut+pal la sogs klu shing
250b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng ba
250b3(rnying rgyud): spos mchod ma// mar me byug la sogs pa yis// las la 'khril cing chos la brtan// dbu rnams byon nas bdud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi
250b4(rnying rgyud): nga du thim// sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni// ni mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes gnon// thod breng chen pos gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu zhags
250b5(rnying rgyud): pa s+pho Ta ho// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khrim pa gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tsha gas te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yino// seg par dang ni
250b6(rnying rgyud): bi bang dang // go cha spo ti rin chen sgrom// me dang chu ru rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyangs// kuni bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs ba
250b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po tshegs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na// ma ba
250b8(rnying rgyud): ma bskul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sum 'phror 'bar// de ltar
251a1(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis// rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du// bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'bro 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus pa ni
251a2(rnying rgyud): bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg pa mthon dman thams cad dang // phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang // zhi khri tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor 'thun byas
251a3(rnying rgyud): kun tu snang // dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus las ma dgod sna tshogs ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes gcig ces brjod med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par
251a4(rnying rgyud): 'phro// bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid// mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// / gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa'ang min// de skad dag
251a5(rnying rgyud): mchog nyid kyis bshad// mthe bo 'dzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// maHbo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin// srin lag mthe bo cha gas pa che// mthe'u chung mthe bo legs pa mchog tuH
251a6(rnying rgyud): 'dzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen mchog/ gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjid don// srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog/ bzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe'u chung sprang tri 'ung 'jug mo steng 'og chos kyi
251a7(rnying rgyud): ste ga 'dza pal mchog/ srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/ mthe'u chung ste sho/ ka/ spu gsung yin// hriHbA Ta~M haM/ 'dzub mo rgya gram las kyi mchog/ gung mo rgya gram bsrung bar byos// srin la/ 
251a8(rnying rgyud): rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog/ mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas par bshad// ha truM a b+he/ phyag rgya brda' tshig chen po 'dis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang // rang bzhin dkyil
251b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor phun sum tshogs// glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa// dag pa
251b2(rnying rgyud): gsal bas phyag rgya yin// yi ge so so gsal ba yis// gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das// dza dang ho la sogs pa yis// gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer 'ching // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na
251b3(rnying rgyud): nyid nges pa las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so// hUM
251b4(rnying rgyud): lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas// ye shes rdo rje rang gsor zhing spro// e ma
251b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje che mchog ni// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang nga mi shigs mi byed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang
251b6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rdo rje 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rdo rje 'chang zhes bya// hUM ji ltar rgyal por
251b7(rnying rgyud): gi rgyas/ rgyal po gcig la btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'dir dka' ji bzhin
251b8(rnying rgyud): mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen por mtshan ma'i gzugs// hUM phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir// rdo rje rdo rje
252a1(rnying rgyud): drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul
252a2(rnying rgyud): phran bzhin// brtsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad rdo rje nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las rdo rje gsang 'byung ba'o// oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na lA Na NAM phaT
252a3(rnying rgyud): oM lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// snang mdzad 'khor lo dpa' bo yin// snang mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing spro/ 
252a4(rnying rgyud): e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gso dal pa ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed pas// ces kyang dam g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas
252a5(rnying rgyud): na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnam sa kyi thugs nyid las// 'khor lo 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su brtan pa'i phyir// mi phyed 'kho/ 
252a6(rnying rgyud): lo 'chang zhes bya// hUM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun
252a7(rnying rgyud): la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ nyi
252a8(rnying rgyud): kyi lus ni brtan phyiro// oM 'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyi dang // 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing gzhog dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs
252b1(rnying rgyud): shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// hUM rtsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dri// thams cad 'khor lo nyid pas na// na mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las 'khor lo gsung 'byung ba// oM
252b2(rnying rgyud): tsakra dz+wa lA na lA rka hUM phaT/ oM lus ngag yid gsum pad+ma ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// pad+ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// pad+ma sems dpa' rang gnas
252b3(rnying rgyud): bas// pad+ma dgra sta gsor zhing spro// e ma ho pad+ma che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi byed la// ces kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu rgya
252b4(rnying rgyud): bas na// kun kyang phyags rgya bzhi rgyas btab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// pad+ma 'chang rgyal thams cad kyis// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi byed pad+ma
252b5(rnying rgyud): 'chang zhes bya// oM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun
252b6(rnying rgyud): la de ltar 'bebs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// hUM/ bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus
252b7(rnying rgyud): ni brtan phyir ro// pad+ma dgra lta drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran
252b8(rnying rgyud): bzhin// brtsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad pad+ma nyid pas ni// na mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las pad+ma'i gsung phyung ba// oM pad+ma dz+wa la lA rka hUM baTasa? lus
253a1(rnying rgyud): ngag yid gsum rin chen ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// yon+dan chen po dpa' bo yin// rin chen sems dpar dag
253a2(rnying rgyud): pas// ye shes dbyugs pa gsor zhing spro// e maho rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ kha
253a3(rnying rgyud): chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bani rgyas gdab// sa rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rin chen 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rin chen
253a4(rnying rgyud): 'chang zhes bya// swa ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po 'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying lag/ nas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad
253a5(rnying rgyud): kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' ka ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yi
253a6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyi ro// rin chen dbyig pa drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phyi zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing
253a7(rnying rgyud): ba rdul phran bzhin// brtsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad rin chen nyid pas na// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las rin chen gsung 'byung ba// swa rad na dz+wa la
253a8(rnying rgyud): lA rka s+t+waM phaT// haM lus ngag yid gsum phrin las ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// las kyi sems dpar nga / 
253b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pas// ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro// e ma ho/ las kyi che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pa

253b4(rnying rgyud): cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shig/ nges pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyi dra chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa
253b5(rnying rgyud): yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyi ro// haM ral gri ral gri drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phyi zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/

253b7(rnying rgyud): ba'o// haM karma dz+wa la na lA ka hUM phaT// mu lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las// sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por 'gyur// bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du// rdo rje lan gsum gsor
253b8(rnying rgyud): ba yis// lha mo klu mo rigs den mo// dam can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i// thams cad gcig tu 'dus par ni// yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur// mi
254a1(rnying rgyud): bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas// oM dang ha ni mthal bar// lan gsum gsor chen gur dkar bsgom// lha ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// oM dang
254a2(rnying rgyud): ni thal tsam du/ kun tu gru bzhir bdag gnas te// lan gsum gsor la gang brtson pa// tshe dang bskal pa 'bol bar 'gyur// longs spyod ci 'dod grub par 'gyur// de nas zla gam
254a3(rnying rgyud): mdog dmar sham// 'brel pa mnyam par lan gsum gyis// khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas// yid la dmigs dang las thams cad// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ 
254a4(rnying rgyud): de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas te// drag tu phaT ces badz+ra dad pas ni// kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing / bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa// khros te dgug
254a5(rnying rgyud): nyid dag tu// rgyang ni ring du 'phags pa dang // ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges// oM badz+ra da ha dz+wa la ha na pra dz+ra pa tsa dz+wa la badz+ra hUM phaT// chos la bstan pa phyag bsdus
254a6(rnying rgyud): pa/ sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te// shes rab yum gyi tshegs su brtag/ skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo// lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das// chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las// rab tu gsor la gang
254a7(rnying rgyud): brtson pas// muM la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'bar// muM ge tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu dbang sgyur yid 'ong ba'i// 'dod pa bzhin du 'thun pas 'grug/ 
254a8(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra g+han+da pA sha d+harma d+ha ra/ hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu/ 
254b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched
254b2(rnying rgyud): brjod pa 'di brjod do// shin du phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag 'thil du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya// 'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying
254b3(rnying rgyud): po lnga dang sman lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis rab snyams la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi// 
254b4(rnying rgyud): bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la/ tsa na 'bru tsam pad+mo gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyis yi gre las// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri// bcos bu'i ras ni sna
254b5(rnying rgyud): tshegs dang // rgyan phreng dung dang bro bas bskor// glu tshig bro ga/ rol mi yis// sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mtsho da// yum dang 'jom sems ma dang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i la
254b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin mchod// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i// zhal du gyur pa'i me 'os la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
254b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin te// shin tu phra ba sbyangs pa yis// bsam yas dag la de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis
254b8(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yis// sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang // kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar// 
255a1(rnying rgyud): dbyibs legs rdzing bu zo mchog bas// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag bsams ljon pa'i tshal// glu dbyangs tshigs su bcang
255a2(rnying rgyud): sgra/ bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung rgyun se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo brdul bsnyed kyi/ 
255a3(rnying rgyud): bri ga ra la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu na mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rims kyis yang na
255a4(rnying rgyud): gcig char du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing / mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// gsal ldan dam 'am byin rlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul
255a5(rnying rgyud): du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// mas nas 'grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus
255a6(rnying rgyud): mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus pa// dga' ba chen pos khyab par gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus
255a7(rnying rgyud): dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad // gang na mi gnas mi dmigs pa// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba
255a8(rnying rgyud): yis// na mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom// goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu
255b1(rnying rgyud): mchog des rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug la sogs lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thad
255b2(rnying rgyud): mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang // rim pa/ 
255b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chud mi zos par gzung // yang na thal mo rab snol nas// phyag chen po yi phang du ni// dkyil 'khor 'ju ba gang tsha du byo// mkhas pas cho ga bzhi/ 
255b4(rnying rgyud): du bya// yang na sa gzhi mnyam pa la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lus ngag tsha du ste// yang na da lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phur bu srad bu tshen phye dang // gos
255b5(rnying rgyud): rgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs// thig gdab cho ga pun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrimasate/ bya// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang // nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya/ 
255b6(rnying rgyud): rig kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam// na mkha' dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil
255b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog
255b8(rnying rgyud): yi ge 'am gdan nam snying po 'am// phyag rgya 'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs rkun gyi dam// sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas// rnam
256a1(rnying rgyud): grol rim par thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyog/ sa dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs
256a2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// sku gsung
256a3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi ye shes ni// kun tu bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin// kun tu bzang mo rang gnas pas na// ye shes dril bu bsil zhing spro// e ma ho sangs rgyas yum chen gyi// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ 
256a4(rnying rgyud): cis kyang mi shigs mi byed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres dbas// bde chen yum du gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya la ma lngas btab// mu kun tu bzang mo'i thugs nyid las/ rdo
256a5(rnying rgyud): yum chen thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya// mu ji ltar rgyal po'i gan sa bshams te// rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar/ 
256a6(rnying rgyud): bde chen yum du gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyi
256a7(rnying rgyud): yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyi ro// muM dril bu dil bu grags snyan dang // yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs
256a8(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo yis// phye zhing ba shig dang btsam la sogs// dkrugs zhing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// brtson zhinga'i 'bar ba'i 'dro du 'dis// thams cad dril bu nyid pas na// nam khal laH
256b1(rnying rgyud): kun bkang ba yin// de las chos su gsung 'byung ba// mu g+ha dz+wa la lag muM zhes brjod pas// phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying bod kho na nyid nges pa las mtshon chang
256b2(rnying rgyud): tshig phyag rgya klu'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos thabs dang shes rab 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 
256b3(rnying rgyud): denas yid dang chos 'thun par// thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang // shes rab dril bu chos la brgyan// hUM dang muM gi snying po 'bar// de las rdo rje rtsa bcur 'bar// oM dang muM gi mchog tu brta
256b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab nye zer zla rgyas thabs// 'bar ba'i phung pos chos dal brtan// de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni 'brus phyag rgya nyi du ste/ de las rdo phyag bsdus gsod de lnga 'khor lo phyag bsnas gso
256b5(rnying rgyud): de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa// de las pad+ma phyag bsnams 'dzin// de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod// de nyid rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// thabs chen drug tu yang dag gso/ 
256b6(rnying rgyud): de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis// oM dang mu gyi mtshon bzhin du// rdo rje rtsa bcu thabs chen po// thugs kar bstan pa'i tshul du 'bar// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag na mi
256b7(rnying rgyud): thugs kar 'dzin// muM las phyag rgya chen po ni// dril bsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum// mchod gnas chos la brtan par 'dzin// thams cad kun tu phyag rgya yi// thabs dang shes
256b8(rnying rgyud): rab rdo rje 'chang // sku gsung thugs ni thams cad sonan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du darigs// de las rdo rje mchog bsdams
257a1(rnying rgyud): pa// de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam// sku gsung thugs kyi yonan las// oM hUM sraM kyi rtser 'dzin pa// nyid las yang dag bskyed tshul du/ shes rab sum dun
257a2(rnying rgyud): brtags// rdo rje 'bar bas rab brtan pa// thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med// de las 'gro dan phrin las 'char// yid dang tshi su rab brtags pa'o// rdo rje
257a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal tshul chen las// rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsor// gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bas
257a4(rnying rgyud): shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin chen dbyig dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas
257a5(rnying rgyud): yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid / de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung // shes rab dbyings kyi dang zhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la
257a6(rnying rgyud): ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje rtsen po mchog
257a7(rnying rgyud): ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug pa rab brtson pa// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu
257a8(rnying rgyud): bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam/ 
257b1(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i chog/ 
257b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don byung ba// 'thun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo // gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang
257b3(rnying rgyud): dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ thugs
257b4(rnying rgyud): rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // bde chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dbul dganyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dang ldan rab zhugs na 'ad
257b5(rnying rgyud): pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams ni phung bar 'gyur zhes
257b6(rnying rgyud): ched du brjod do// rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs
257b7(rnying rgyud): brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// thad
257b8(rnying rgyud): ma lus ma tA la// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la// rig pa rang 'byung gyur pa yis// mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas pa'i// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'jig rten brtan/ 
258a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis// rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtog/ 
258a2(rnying rgyud): bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan// rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang // yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin chen sna tshogs pa la sogs dang // 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnas kun/ 
258a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu// gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag/ ye shes chen po rab 'byam gyis// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/ tham
258a4(rnying rgyud): cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi thugs la bstim bya ngas te// thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// dkyil 'a/ 'khor rnams gsum dag byas pas// na mkha'i dbyings
258a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis// thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che// yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad bar gyis// ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te// 
258a6(rnying rgyud): mA ma kI'i rgyun chags la// yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che// de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal sgoms nas// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dri med/ 
258a7(rnying rgyud): chos sku phyag rgya gsal// dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par// ting 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur nas// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi
258a8(rnying rgyud): snying po mchog rnams kyang // byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs// 'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor// a haM/ chos sku phyag rgya de dag las// las lnga'i dkyil 'khor
258b1(rnying rgyud): bsgrub/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// drag po gtum po gtul ba'i phyir// bdag nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis// 
258b2(rnying rgyud): bgegs kyi ling ga gnan par bya// gtum po rngam po'ang brlag par 'gyur// mo mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog/ 'di dang 'gro ba thams cad du// shin du stobs drag che ldan 'gyur// thams cad ga
258b3(rnying rgyud): med dbyings bsdu'i phyir// bdag nyid ha ya gri bar bsgom// dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te// mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gding // ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na// 
258b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu// mthu chen dag kyang phyed/  na 'brang // ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// thams cad yon+tan 'phel bya'i phyir// bdag nyid rgyal
258b5(rnying rgyud): khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom/ gang 'phel chos sku gdan du bzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na// yon+tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 
258b6(rnying rgyud): dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom/ 
258b7(rnying rgyud): gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan// de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na// gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dul ba nyid 'gyur// 
258b8(rnying rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// lhun 'grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// a ho/ chos sku
259a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po ni// dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges// nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa// phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgoms the tshom med par gru
259a2(rnying rgyud): deni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam// the tshom med de ngas 'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi lha sgrubs na// lha yi snying po gang yang rung // bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// ldang nye bar / 
259a3(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na// chos kyi don rnams rtags 'gyur te// rang dang spro yo don rtogs nas// skye rgan 'chi med par rtogs// phyag rgya chen po de dag la// nyon mongs/ 
259a4(rnying rgyud): las rnams sbyong byed pa'o// snying po ma nor don bris na/ dang na song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang // dpag tshad med pa'i phyag/ 
259a5(rnying rgyud): rgya che// sku gsung thugs na rgyun mi chad// zhing khams brdul ding mnyam// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu 'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis/ 
259a6(rnying rgyud): dngas grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'i// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting
259a7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas che brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje lam las pad+mor bskyal// rtse nas bstim ning
259a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor sku// nyan byeng 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo ba nyid// trang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim// traM gsang bas
259b1(rnying rgyud): gsang chen gsang mchog dang // gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs pa las// gzhan du smra bar bya ba min// gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba
259b2(rnying rgyud): thig le ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung // rgyal ba thams/ 
259b3(rnying rgyud): cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi
259b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor gsal spro thim// oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas// las rnams ma lus kun byos shig/ pho nya 'du 'phro ma dang po kun// khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor la/ 
259b5(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas su// gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// hrIHyi bya ga rgya tshogs mchog las// chos kyi 'khor logs spro thim// oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// da ldan skyes
259b6(rnying rgyud): bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la// 'thun par gsang bsgrags gzhal du min// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal ya su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM oM swA a
259b7(rnying rgyud): rnams las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin de spyod/ 
259b8(rnying rgyud): slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // gan
260a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang / gdugs dang bum pa bzang btung dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan sa
260a2(rnying rgyud): med pa dang // gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// kun tu bzang po la sogs mtshan// mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur// lus dang phung por
260a3(rnying rgyud): bcas pa'i sa// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa// bla med kun tu bzang por 'gyur// yum dang sgeg mo las sogs la// de nyid byin gyis rlob par
260a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams// sangs rgyas bka' las mi 'da' zhing // de yi dgos pa byed pa dang // sgro dang bskur pa la sogs pa// de ni myur du brlag par 'gyur// tshe ring
260a5(rnying rgyud): bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyu ra zhes che du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u sti'i gcig pa'o// 
260a6(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsung so// de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor
260a7(rnying rgyud): phyir// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas// mchog tu bde ba'i ning gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing // byang chub sems
260a8(rnying rgyud): par gzung // bya ba med las bya byed bya// mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a// shin tu 'tsher nang gsal bsgoms nas// 'od 'phro 'bar bas thams
260b1(rnying rgyud): cad khyab// dus gsum ngan song gnas bsrogs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 'bar// a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar// phyogs bcur 'joms
260b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i mun sel zhing // nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mkha' la 'ja' tshen sprin mang yang // na mkha
260b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'dus// thams cad yi ge hUM du gyur// hUM nyid gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil/ 
260b4(rnying rgyud): 'od zer 'bros pas 'bru ga sum ste// yang na 'od zer 'bru dalnga yi// lnga pa'i don spros bzhi bcu lnga'i// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bas yis mchog/ ma bcos ngang gis gar+tha
260b5(rnying rgyud): pa la// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// sen ts+tsha/ ma zla ba gang pa yi// thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par/ bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang pa yi// gzhal yas 'o/ 
260b6(rnying rgyud): zer 'bar ba'i khang // pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che// de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing nyungs 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang // gnas lnga dag tu rab tu
260b7(rnying rgyud): shes rab spyan la 'dris pa dang // nri yi mig gis bltar yod par// shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom// shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snye du/ 
260b8(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i byin rlabs bsam yas spro// spros kyang hUM las nyams pa med// bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med// spro med bsdu med de bzhin las// yi ge mu~M du thim par gyur// tham
261a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur dbyings nas phyag brgya 'bar// shin tu gsal nang 'bris pa dang // phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom// sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar
261a2(rnying rgyud): nas// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgoms// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam// zhal gsum phyag dru/ 
261a3(rnying rgyud): rtag tu bsgom// gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar/ 
261a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po de dag las// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang // nyi zla gza' skar dkyil 'khor gdan dang rgyan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// thug
261a5(rnying rgyud): rje byin rlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi ba phyogs gcig shes/ bya spro// sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing // bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed// de ltar sgrub pa'i
261a6(rnying rgyud): mchog de// 'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang // sdug bsngal thams cad yong mi 'thung // lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongasu 'grub// theg pa dman par yong mi skye// bde gshegs 'byung
261a7(rnying rgyud): skol mi 'gyur// byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin zhes nyid la nyid gsungaso// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i
261a8(rnying rgyud): leru ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas tshe du brjid pa 'di
261b1(rnying rgyud): brjod do// rgyu gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul// byin gyi rlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam pa ni yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnams shes
261b2(rnying rgyud): kun// rnam smin oM du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin muM du shes par bya// yum
261b3(rnying rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor nyi du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshegs kyi sprin phung la// hUM du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar sma du byung
261b4(rnying rgyud): ba yi// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar// / bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i// grub pa dang ni sgrub chen
261b5(rnying rgyud): po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshegs ma lus pa// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// grub pa'i/ 
261b6(rnying rgyud): nyi zla snying po de// 'gro drag dus gnas de dag nyid// mchod pa chen por mnyes sbyar zhing // dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang // mkha' 'gro gsal bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin
261b7(rnying rgyud): sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed sgom// hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag/ dbyings
261b8(rnying rgyud): su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// 
262a1(rnying rgyud): rgyu ma snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam nyid
262a2(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing // byed spod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi// rnal 'byor
262a3(rnying rgyud): tshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga zhing lnga dang sbyor ba yi// tshem bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par
262a4(rnying rgyud): sgom// de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+mo'i ri gas dang sku gsung thugs/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshem bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi
262a5(rnying rgyud): rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bug cig gi lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo tshags chen dang / 
262a6(rnying rgyud): po nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi la sogs pa rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhan
262a7(rnying rgyud): grub dang gnas shing // spyod pa ci la'athogs med pa'i// thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'i// rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom// chags med
262a8(rnying rgyud): tshul gyis bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis
262b1(rnying rgyud): med dbyings kyi bang du thim// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas// sngags
262b2(rnying rgyud): 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro breng bsgom// chags pa med de'i tshul gyis ni// 'od zer rnam pa mang ba ste// gnyis su med par
262b3(rnying rgyud): bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom// sems sa dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so sngags
262b4(rnying rgyud): dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// ga de nas dang long spyod ci bde dang // ma nyams blo ni rab lnga/ na pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sgyid snyom
262b5(rnying rgyud): med pa yi// the tshom med par bsgrub byas nas// dkyil 'a khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog/ dam pa thob// sgrub pa'i zhag dang chos grangs ni// rgyud
262b6(rnying rgyud): smos pa bzhin du bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
262b7(rnying rgyud): tshegs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gang bye ba dgyes pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyas
262b8(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam na mkhar 'gro bar
263a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// glu tshig sgra la phyag rgya yis// chos kyis dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang dgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal ba zags med 'grub pa
263a2(rnying rgyud): dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni// yod bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub// A li ka li'i phyag rgya yis// sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 
263a3(rnying rgyud): shes 'dug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// reg 'dzin rgyal po'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam
263a4(rnying rgyud): dngag 'dzin mod kyi// khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsu/ 
263a5(rnying rgyud): rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dbyings dang / ba'i dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs 'byal sgra/ ma// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus par
263a6(rnying rgyud): ni bsgoms par 'gyur// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du mtshol cig/ 
263a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na// skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med ces che du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis
263a8(rnying rgyud): mnyes par gyur to// rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur ste sku gsung thugs dang yon+tan phrin las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // a ho ma mthong rmongs la chags pa yis/ 
263b1(rnying rgyud): chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam// 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshegs khyad par rab snang ba'i// zab chen spyod yul log par rtogs brtags ming tsam du// A li kA li la sogs 'dod pa'i
263b2(rnying rgyud): snying po nyid// phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs// thugs kyi thugs chen yon+tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsal// mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dbyal
263b3(rnying rgyud): yon+dan mchog ste sngags kyi phrin las rdzogs// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshegs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// 
263b4(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas
263b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu ga sang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ma rtogs pa dang
263b6(rnying rgyud): log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgra btags ming tshegs la// brten pa'i
263b7(rnying rgyud): tshig gis rab mtshon ste// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil
263b8(rnying rgyud): 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' ba'i// bder gshegs
264a1(rnying rgyud): kun gyi snang po rdzogs// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po shes rab de bzhin te// byang chub sems na rdo rje tshogs dbang ba yul dus rig pa
264a2(rnying rgyud): rnams kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lngas lta zhing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rel mo yos// ye
264a3(rnying rgyud): shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sa
264a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs dpa'i// sku gsung yinan 'phrin las thugs// ma lus dbadag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin/ 
264a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las/ 
264a6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa
264a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor la// thos bsams bsgoms pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun nam lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ 
264a8(rnying rgyud): gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis// nye ba'i sras su dgongs pa
264b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing // dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'das dang
264b2(rnying rgyud): da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas// brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang
264b3(rnying rgyud): chen nges pa yis// 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di yis gsang ba'i nges don med// btsal kyang rgyal pos mi rnyed do// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog
264b4(rnying rgyud): thos bsams bsgoms la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab dmig ldan rnams kyis gzung // snod ldan dang tshul da bzang la brtan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// 
264b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la phyar bas gal te sbyin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsreg sa dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas// shes de bzhin ga
264b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid la che du brjod do// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dal 'khor bgyi
264b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun
264b8(rnying rgyud): tu bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o// thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog/ gdod nas ma
265a1(rnying rgyud): ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems// rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing // ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho min// 'gro 'ang med par dus gsu
265a2(rnying rgyud): gcig char rdzogs// dbye bsal med cing bzang ngan blang dor med// rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te// rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod med// bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon
265a3(rnying rgyud): sbyangs pa// khri la 'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing // snga rabs phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i// mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la// bskal pa 'ga' nas shes
265a4(rnying rgyud): rab blo sbyangs pa// dad ldan 'ga' yis 'tsham par ci ga go/ bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa// / gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis// stan
265a5(rnying rgyud): kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba// bdag cag gzha na du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas// de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing // bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi
265a6(rnying rgyud): nus te// shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing // bya byed las 'phags gyen 'da' 'dug byed pa// gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob// ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med
265a7(rnying rgyud): pas// dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de// ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la// blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang // mchod cing brten pas byang chub thob ma
265a8(rnying rgyud): te/ namakha' gzung bas sprin gyis khobs par 'gyur// na mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na// sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid// rnam par rtog pa'o g.yung drungs
265b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas la// thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cang // mi rtogs ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad// skadu med pas sna chags 'thung ba yin// bdag med bdag chen thams cad du/ 
265b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i gter// ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i// thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdag su med// ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing // thob rgyu med pas ye nas de// 
265b3(rnying rgyud): gshegs yin zhes brjod pas chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid
265b4(rnying rgyud): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshe dag 'di phyung ngo // e ma'o ma bsgrubs grub chen po// grub
265b5(rnying rgyud): pa chen po ye shes che// blang dor med pa'i sa chen po// rma g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs// rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter// thams cad la yang me long bzhin// 
265b6(rnying rgyud): bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo // gang na gsang chen 'di yod par// me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs la// spu gri se ni btams pa la// 'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos// khong na
265b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i yang khong du// lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo// dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir// dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod// de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das// rdo rje gsang
265b8(rnying rgyud): tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying ba de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
266a1(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen pos mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par ston te che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'das dang dalda
266a2(rnying rgyud): ma 'ongs dang // 'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam yin par// nges pa med par yang dag gsungs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// rang dang spri ru bstan/ 
266a3(rnying rgyud): pa dang // ji snyed bstan g.yo la sogs pa// sgyu ma mag yor tshul yin te// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing // sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa// de dag gnyis
266a4(rnying rgyud): med dbyings su sbyor// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// / thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog/ ji snyed brjod
266a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i kha rgyud kyang // yang dag don gyi snying po ni// gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin// / de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa de
266a6(rnying rgyud): yin te// da ni ma nor lam yin par// a yis bo d+ha rab tu bsdus// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni// gcig gam 'di zhes brjod med// gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro// byin \u0f7f/ 
266a7(rnying rgyud): bsam yas mtha' yas mchog/ don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis// de las lhag pa'i don smra ba// de ni rnam dag lam min te// rang blos bsams pa'i 'khrul ba yin// 
266a8(rnying rgyud): thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad// tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing // 'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs chen te// 
266b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas// bya ba med la byas pa med// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter// bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod// za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal// gzhan
266b2(rnying rgyud): nas yod 'ong ma yin te// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
266b3(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pas brtags pa
266b4(rnying rgyud): la mngon par zhen pa dang yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba/ dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i/ gsang ba la mngon par 'chal nas rgyu dang 'bras bu rlos
266b5(rnying rgyud): pas// srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtsham med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// de ba tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang 'dodapa
266b6(rnying rgyud): gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba
266b7(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa brgyad dang shin tu grangs pa la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo // de nas rnam par smin
266b8(rnying rgyud): pa de zad pa dang yi dgas rtogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogasu 'gyur ba/ 
267a1(rnying rgyud): dang // yod med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang // lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang // bskal pa chen
267a2(rnying rgyud): drug dang du skyes// de nas las kyi bsgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dgas srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa
267a3(rnying rgyud): gtum po lus gcig la mgo rgya ba dang // mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgya mgo cig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan log mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs dang / gdug
267a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang // 'jigs pa'i gzungs sna tshogs dang // 'jigs dpa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrogs pa// gzugs dang / nga ro dang / drid
267a5(rnying rgyud): kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa/ rab tu 'jig/ sa pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs ku/ na tu khams 'khrugs par byed pa/ nad bzhi rgya rtsa ba zhes
267a6(rnying rgyud): 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang // lha ma yin gyi ris dang lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu
267a7(rnying rgyud): che man cad dbang du bsdu so// de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dus par gyur te/ thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i klu 'di
267a8(rnying rgyud): blangs so// e maho 'gro ba yongs ni bder gshegs lam yin te// sdug bsngal sreg mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang // yon+ta na rmad 'byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di// sdug bsngal kun
267b1(rnying rgyud): bshes gnyen mgon po yin// rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms// kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste// rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam yas pas/ 
267b2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms// sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam yas la// rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing // byang chub sems
267b3(rnying rgyud): kyis lam la gnas par mdzad// 'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu pa// a ho dgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzad// byin brlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang
267b4(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun nas rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo rje bkod pa'i
267b5(rnying rgyud): rgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal che/ na po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa
267b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i
267b7(rnying rgyud): tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis
267b8(rnying rgyud): med par 'khyil ba'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las// hA hU hUM bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la na maN ra la phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug
268a1(rnying rgyud): gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon pa/ 
268a2(rnying rgyud): gyur pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos// rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ tshim tshi ma rab tu chem chem/ 
268a3(rnying rgyud): kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// shig shig rab tu shig shig kun tu shig shigo/ gtor gtor rab tu gtor gtor/ kun tu gtor gtor ro// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thad
268a4(rnying rgyud): na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug ma na po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal dbar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po
268a5(rnying rgyud): nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa'i spyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku sdug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong
268a6(rnying rgyud): kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag khrig gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po ri rab
268a7(rnying rgyud): kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhug so// khros
268a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen por gyur te sher phyogs su bzhug so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lho phyogs su
268b1(rnying rgyud): bzhug so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te nub phyogasu bzhug so// la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu lasu gyur te byang phyog su bzhugs so// de ngag
268b2(rnying rgyud): kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang // rngam pa'i nga ro dang 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang gnod sbyin dang // gshin rje la sogs pa khyod shug
268b3(rnying rgyud): kyis gdan du byas pa la bzhug so// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhug so// rigs lnga'i ho ru ka las gcig tu bstim te bsdus nas/ 
268b4(rnying rgyud): gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dri dgas pa chen po la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan nas mgrin gcig tu
268b5(rnying rgyud): 'dug pa'i nga ros brlang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong zong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes la ra zhing shin tu gtu mi sems kyis rngam nas khros so// de nas
268b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos thams cad kyi bdag nyid des dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgya du gnas nas rngam pa'i skad kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shi
268b7(rnying rgyud): tu khros nas hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nang grol kun drangs/ yan
268b8(rnying rgyud): lag kun bci gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs// rus pa kun 'choso// de nas hUM hUM hUM e a ra li dza dza zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' dang bcas
269a1(rnying rgyud): nyungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'ang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma/ 'byung po thams cad kyi
269a2(rnying rgyud): chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo srin mo chen mo mo'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsim
269a3(rnying rgyud): dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / zab mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos byed dang / gcig spyod mo dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed
269a4(rnying rgyud): mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen po dang / ra mgod/ mar ser chen mo dang / bum rna sngog nag chen mo dang / gsu
269a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa/ bran dang / yang bran g.yog dang / yang g.yog 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang ba snga so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal
269a6(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung chen po'i 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pha rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
269a7(rnying rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM hUM a~M badz+ra pra be sha a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid
269a8(rnying rgyud): g.yos nas bad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas// dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'i skul srin mo
269b1(rnying rgyud): mo mo srun mo dang / dmar mo dang / dga' mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo gnag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril to// bcom lda
269b2(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sku la tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhonu mo rnams 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rin po che'i
269b3(rnying rgyud): skul bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / za ba mo dang / srin mo rnaMs 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung pad+mo chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos pa dang / gcig pu
269b4(rnying rgyud): spyod pa dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo rnams/ 'khril to// bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen dpe'i kun tu las kyi sku la me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan bya
269b5(rnying rgyud): mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha me rnams 'khril to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'gro ra de dag gis hUM hUM zhes brjod pas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ 
269b6(rnying rgyud): tshegs bsdus nas shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te/ he zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal/ 
269b7(rnying rgyud): byed ma'i tshogs dang / spos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshegs dang / sme sha can gyi tshegs dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang
269b8(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang gi lag chas chas nas 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng
270a1(rnying rgyud): gdongs chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / gzhad gdong chen mo
270a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang / kang ka gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / dur bya gdong chen mo'i tshigs dang / 'ug gdong chen mo'i tshigs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 
270a3(rnying rgyud): 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i ning du ma lus pa
270a4(rnying rgyud): khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje bsrings 'gro ma'i tshegs dang / rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten dma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi
270a5(rnying rgyud): lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes pa
270a6(rnying rgyud): po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga la bar yud tsam gyis bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes
270a7(rnying rgyud): pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / 
270a8(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra ma hA a mri ta ma dAkre d+ha a a a zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sna nas 'thon to// mi gtsang ba'i 'dar gyi rgya
270b1(rnying rgyud): btsud pa las gnam nas uts+tsha sma kro d+ha phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs te/ dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya
270b2(rnying rgyud): zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo // de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun tu dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs
270b3(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul to// de nas de dag shin tu 'bar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros/ 'bang su mchi 'bang su mchi/ 'bang sunan
270b4(rnying rgyud): tan ma bgyis na// mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing // / snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang // dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par
270b5(rnying rgyud): shog ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas dkyil 'khra ra gyi gdan la bzhug go// thams cad kyis mgrin gcig/ tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyis mchis brang dang / 
270b6(rnying rgyud): ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhesu gsol/ dpa' bo lha rdza bzhesu gsol// bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// 
270b7(rnying rgyud): ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang // gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar// g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i// sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo yi// gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi/ de
270b8(rnying rgyud): yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir// smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubaso na// bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying // gas
271a1(rnying rgyud): btubs dum bur rul bar mchi zhes smras so// de nas de'i chung ma'i tshegs dang sring mo dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad
271a2(rnying rgyud): kyis mgrin cig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor tshegs thams cad kun// dpa' bo chen po'i 'bang su mchi// dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag rnams// las kyi dngos grub stsal du stsol zhes
271a3(rnying rgyud): smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bkod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro
271a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor
271a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub pa bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen btsun mdang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje
271a6(rnying rgyud): rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo // oM ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI hi ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da d+ha/ sarba duSh+Ta~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da d+ha sarba duH
271a7(rnying rgyud): ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa hU hUM hUM phaT/ oM rad na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da d+ha sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na de ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI hi ru ki mi hA tsat+ta d+ha sarba duSh+Ti ta ka ha na da ha paM tsahU hUM hUM pha/ 
271a8(rnying rgyud): oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ki mi hA tsatA d+ha sarba duSh+Ta~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ta thA ga ta ma hA krod+ha shI ri dz+wa la ni sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M pheM g-i i ma
