271b1(rnying rgyud): sUr+ya rang na ma hA kro d+ho shwa ri bi d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM hri d+ha ba d+hA ba mu kha ma hA kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri bi shra hUM phaT/ badz+ra go ri ha/ badz+ra tsau ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra/ 
271b2(rnying rgyud): pi ta li ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da li ha/ badz+ra puk+ka si ha/ badz+ra gasma ri ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni ha/ badz+ra si ha mu kha ka he/ badz+ra bya gri mu kha ka he/ badz+ra sri ga mu kha ka he/ badz+ra kri ta mu kha ka he/ badz+ra ka kha mu kha ka
271b3(rnying rgyud): sa bzla ba kha mu kha he/ badz+ra hU lu ka mu kha ka he/ badz+ra dza dza/ badz+ra a mu ka hU/ badz+ra lo ka pa/ badz+ra ba shrI ba la ya ba tiH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo g+ho b+huM g+h+r-ib+h+yAM g+h+rA b+hUM g+h+ya b+h+yAM g+h+r-ib+h+yAM D+D+h+ya g+h+yab+h+yAMr+m+mad+hAg+h+nad+d+ha
271b4(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi a na ya dza hUM/ baM ho rA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa dam ya~M phaT/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad bo// thugs
271b5(rnying rgyud): khros dang la rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+hA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/ a li u li/ ta la ta
271b6(rnying rgyud): tid+ha staM go na ro/ tri kha raM yo gi ni khA ha ho/ hU~M ha he phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig/ rab tu tshig/ kun tu che go// 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu 'bar ro
271b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang / kun tu rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi
271b8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms pa
272a1(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod// dbang po'i yul dus rig pa rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // mnyam pa'i pa nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad
272a2(rnying rgyud): bde ba chen po rgya// bskyed chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro bo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhil 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// bla med chen
272a3(rnying rgyud): de skad gsungs// yan lag snying po rtse la rtse dgu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen
272a4(rnying rgyud): re re bskyod na ni// pad+ma chags med re re 'byung // rdo rje pad+ma de dbyor na// sems can thams cad bla na med// byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang/ 
272a5(rnying rgyud): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te// dbu yi dkyil 'jam bskul bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tham sa cad g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rig 'dzin
272a6(rnying rgyud): zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen gnan mchongs na/ sdug bsngal mi zad thams cad dang // bdud dang log 'dren thams cad gnan// yan lag thams cad bcu
272a7(rnying rgyud): bsigs na// ba spu bu ga re re nas// khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro// de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed/ khro bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// thugs/ 
272a8(rnying rgyud): rjes 'dul zhing dbyingasu bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang // khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dul// thams cad rdo rje'i brag spangs dang // me ri dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar// 'di
272b1(rnying rgyud): ni spyi rgya chen po yin// steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo ni mgo gdengs// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i// rdo rje thong gshol ni spar dang // rdo rje gtul che/ 
272b2(rnying rgyud): dril bu'o// shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang // sti ra chen po'i dbug pa'o// lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang // gshin rje chen po
272b3(rnying rgyud): rkang bzung ba'o// nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// sbrul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang // khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs// rgya mtsho che rnams rked par gtub// byang gi bgegs rnam
272b4(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba ni// rin pa che yi dbyug to dang // ni mgo gsum/ pa'i dbyug to can// gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar// gcod pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba
272b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi dag gis gdul bar 'gyur// gal te de yis ma dul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul pa// rdo rje rtse gsum ni mgo gdangs// oM sha nyid kyang phyag
272b6(rnying rgyud): bsnams// 'byung po de kun rab tu btul// shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje ye shes mi lce 'bar// me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed// drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams
272b7(rnying rgyud): me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdus// lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje dang ni srin po'i mgo/ rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar// bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// srin po
272b8(rnying rgyud): tshegs rnams dbang du bsdus// nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rlung gi ba dan ni mgo gdengs// shin tu drag po'i glang po'i brjid// tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// 
273a1(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad dbang du bsdus// 'og tu 'jig rten bgegs 'dul byer// phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste// bag chen po ni phyag na bsnams// 'og gi bgegs / 
273a2(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'o// gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis// tshe dang drang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// ma~M ya~M dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus bsreg par byed// chu yi dkyil 'kho/ 
273a3(rnying rgyud): chen po yis// thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed// gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lor bcas// mda' gzhu
273a4(rnying rgyud): chen gri chen dang // rdo rje mdung chen dgra star bcas// ma che gtsigs spu gri so dang ni// mnga' dang mdung dang stird // gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshog so// dbus kyi he ru'i phyag rgya ni/ 
273a5(rnying rgyud): spyir dbyug to chen po dang // 'khor lo chen po rab tu 'angar// / dung chen dmar gyis gang ba las// rdo rjes dkrun tung rab tu gsol// shar gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// snyi
273a6(rnying rgyud): de'i dbyug pa dang // rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar// rje mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol// lho yo phyag rgya chen po ni// stir chen po'i dbyug pa dang // yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su/ 
273a7(rnying rgyud): dmar gyi arga rab tu gsol// nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// stir chen po'i dbyug pa dang // pad+ma chags med rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// byang gi khro bo'i rtsa
273a8(rnying rgyud): rgya na// skar chen po'i dbyug pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis dkang ba gsol// khro mo rnams kyang khri dang 'thun// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// rlud gan/ 
273b1(rnying rgyud): dag dang 'thun par bshad// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// 'jig rten 'das mdo tsha las bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum cu/ 
273b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa// gru
273b3(rnying rgyud): tshad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchogs
273b4(rnying rgyud): he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa'i dam gyis sbar bas ni// dbang phyag lha chen la sogs bzung // smug gnag sde gan dag ser gnag dang // dmar gnag ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku/ 
273b5(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang // ke rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par bsgrogs// sbrul dang thod 'breng nyi zlar bcas// steng gi 'jig rten khor
273b6(rnying rgyud): yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / 
273b7(rnying rgyud): sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing // slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi gtso// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas shes brjod pas
273b8(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje spu 'phrul dra
274a1(rnying rgyud): ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di byung // a ho/ bskal par bcas shing dag tshogs 'bar ba yi// nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i
274a2(rnying rgyud): ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa// re tshogs khrag la brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas/ zhen pa'i gdug mo shin tu gsal dka' ba'i// mi mngon dbyings nas gzug
274a3(rnying rgyud): kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis// snyigs mar bcas shing mtshams sbyor kun ngam zil gyis gnon// rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi khyab// de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun 'byung
274a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu gsal// ho/ chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod mi lang // dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang // 'dod pas zhen pa'i las kyang ji snyed ji srid par/ 
274a5(rnying rgyud): drag po brdo ba'i rlung chen bsam mi khyab// bde bar bcas pa gzhan du med par brjod mi lang // bskal par bas gas pa'i dug chen rab rtog kun tu rtog/ de rnams zil/ 
274a6(rnying rgyud): gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par// rkyen du bcas nas sbu bus 'bras bu smin pa rab smin ltar// dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i chags// dpag med bsam
274a7(rnying rgyud): yas lhun grub pas// rab tu 'dul bar shin tu gsal// ho// khro bo'i rang bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin zhing // zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yong ma yin/ 
274a8(rnying rgyud): de nyid gnyis min pa'i cho 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun tu khyab// rigs lnga khrig 'thung 'dzags pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rab ston pa'i// rnam dag byang chub mchog gi dbyings te/ 
274b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu gnas par gsal// ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan par
274b2(rnying rgyud): le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos nyid kyi byin rlabs dang ston na ston pa zhes bya ba 'di che du brjod pa 'di brjod// oM sangs
274b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnal 'byor chen po ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snying po'i mchog nyid de// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid// 'di yin gzhan na med pa ste// rol pa kun
274b4(rnying rgyud): la mnga' brnyes shing // srid pa 'jig rten thams cad ku/ na// sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du// ma g.yos kyu na gnas snying po ste// rang bzhin che ba'i yon+tan las// 
274b5(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa// snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis// nga rgya la nyid kyi sku chen bstan// gdug cing gtum pa'i khams
274b6(rnying rgyud): gsum na// 'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyong zhing // phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad// ye shes ngo mtshar tsham ngam gyis// chos bzhi rnam dag che ba'i lha// ye shes sku ste khyad par che// 
274b7(rnying rgyud): chags pa'i tshogs kyis mtshan ma ni// 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku// gtum ngam gdug pas mtshan pas na// zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sku// 'dul bya zhing du rab sbyong zhing // chos nyid
274b8(rnying rgyud): mnyam las bzhengs pas na// gti mug chen po nyid kyi sku// snod btsud dag pa'i spyod yul pa// thugs sku gsung las 'phros pa dang // rgyal ba nga yas mtshan pas na// nga rgyal chen
275a1(rnying rgyud): po nyid kyi sku// gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis// thig le thugs su bsdus pa nyid// gzhan du mi gtong mtshan pas na// de nyid phrag dog nyid sku rdzogs// stong / 
275a2(rnying rgyud): gsum stong gyi stong chen po// 'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa// rdul dang bye ba la sogs pa'i// bgrang ba las ni rab 'das mtshan// de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid// 'jigs byed sku gsu
275a3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dbyings// chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog/ snying po thig le bsam yas nyid// 'jigs byed dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag/ sgyu mas mtshan
275a4(rnying rgyud): dra ba yin// de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags/ gcig la gsum du mchog tu sngags// yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do// bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid// thabs dang shes
275a5(rnying rgyud): rab phyag mtshan pa// gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes che// ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa// phyag dang zhab su/ rnam par brtags// brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku// 
275a6(rnying rgyud): ci yang med las cir yang snang // bskal bzangs mchog gi sgyu 'phrul pa// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// rtags pa zil gnon chos nyid spyan// spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid// 
275a7(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin dbyings kyi yul la sbyor// rol pa'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa// gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs// pad+ma 'khyil ba nyid sku gsung // mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig
275a8(rnying rgyud): ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrad las// khro gnyer glog steng 'gyu ba yi// mi yi tshogs kyi gzhan phug glog/ bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas ni// bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin// sku nyid mnyam/ 
275b1(rnying rgyud): pa rdzogs pa las// sna tshogs 'char bar rab son pa// ye shes sgyu 'phrul stobs chen po// mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni// shes rab tshogs la 'phrus
275b2(rnying rgyud): pa dang // thugs rje dra ba'i byin brlabs kyis// 'khor yug ji rnyed mtha' klas pa// dbyings nyid bde la spyod pa ste// 'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don// rta yi gar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis// 
275b3(rnying rgyud): gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mthas klas par// rtsed mo mchog gi phyag rgya ni// brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te/ 
275b4(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don// rab dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba// thig le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs// dbang phyug lha chen
275b5(rnying rgyud): la sogs la// zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams// nga rgyal gdu ga pa'i zhe sdang gcod// gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul pa// 
275b6(rnying rgyud): dra ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni// khros po'i dam tshig snying de yis// mnyam pa'i thig ler dgod pa ni// gshin rje gshed por gdug pa'i rgyal// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mchog
275b7(rnying rgyud): sgrol bden// 'gro la mgon du gyur pas na// dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa'i// chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i sbrul// dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag/ dur khrod rdzas dang khrag
275b8(rnying rgyud): 'thung ba'i// g.yang gzhi stag gi lpags chen bgos// 'jigs byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni// skye shi rtsa ba gcod mdzad pa// mi g.yo mgon zhes mchog tu bsgrags// nga rgyal lag
276a1(rnying rgyud): gis 'du byed pa// nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig ste// kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la// sngags kyi snying po de nyid pa// hUM hUM hUM gis sdud za 'thung // rdo rje chuH
276a2(rnying rgyud): kyi byin rlabs kyis// hUM mdzad ches ni rnam par bsgrags// mi mched gti mug chen po ni// nyon mongs rgya mtsho rngub pa yi// ban+d+ha glong chen 'thung b.ri snang // 'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin
276a3(rnying rgyud): chen po// bskal pa las kyi zil gnon pa// rdo rje mi yi 'bar ba 'byung // nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par byed// 'jigs byed thams cad dam tshig gis// bsam yas 'jig rten
276a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor yug bcas// rang gi sku yi gzhal med bsdus// / sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes ni// zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling // tshem bu gnyis kyi lha chen po// rdo rje sku
276a5(rnying rgyud): yi byin rlabs kyis// thig le mi g.yo bde ba las// rang bzhin rol pa chen pos ni// rdo rje 'phra men po nya tshogs// khams gsum 'dul bar yang dag mdzad
276a6(rnying rgyud): ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid// ha ni thig le zhi khro snyoms// ha ni thig le dbang chen yin// ha ni thig le drag po nyid// ha ni thig le rol pa nyid// ha ni thig les phrin las nyid// ha ni thig les
276a7(rnying rgyud): chags dbang 'dul// ha ni thig le las kun rdzogs// he ni thig le ye shes thugs// he ni thig les gsung snyan pa// he ni thig les tsham ngam l+ye// he ni thig le rol pa nyid/ he/ 
276a8(rnying rgyud): ni thig le dbang rtags yin// he ni thig les drag shul ba// he ni thig les thugs chen rdzogs he ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba// 'jigs byed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te// dra ngas kyi
276b1(rnying rgyud): gnon lam 'gog go// hUM ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// hUM ni ye shes thugs sku nyid hUM ni yis thug sku gsu hU~M ni yis ying bzhin lwa dz+nyA ni thig le ye sheso// phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni
276b2(rnying rgyud): gsung gi gsung gi thugs// phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs// phaT ni chos thugs thugs kyi thugs
276b3(rnying rgyud): sgra 'phral dra bas dgyes pa ho// dbang phyug chags pas dgyes pa ho// gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho// skra gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho// yon+da na las kyi dgyes pa ho// pho nya
276b4(rnying rgyud): 'du 'phros dgyes pa ho// kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho // byin gyis rlabs kyis dgyes pa ho// chos kyi sku la da dgyes pa ho// ye shes rol pa dgyes pa ho// ci yang min
276b5(rnying rgyud): pas dgyes pa ho// gnod pa sdud las dgyes pa ho// chos kyi dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho// des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dgyes par gyur te/ chos
276b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin tu gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya las dgyes pa chen po'i byin rlabs dang // yon+tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum
276b7(rnying rgyud): cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ched du
276b8(rnying rgyud): brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// ni dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ 
277a1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo
277a2(rnying rgyud): rnams// 'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs
277a3(rnying rgyud): chen de dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin rlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnamasu// 'jigs
277a4(rnying rgyud): byed rin chen rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// da zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs
277a5(rnying rgyud): tshon de dbusu// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcom tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgom// yang na rigs dbang dkyil la
277a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs pa'i phrin las rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dag
277a7(rnying rgyud): dang rgyas// las bzhi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin rlabs nas// bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas/ sku
277a8(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs// yon+dan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom// rgyan dang cha lugs
277b1(rnying rgyud): sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i tshegs ni ji bzhin par// tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom// glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang // shes rab thabasu shes pa dang // byang chub sems kyi mchod pa/ 
277b2(rnying rgyud): dang // brda la sogs pa'i yon+tan dang // bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyi// mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
277b3(rnying rgyud): nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil
277b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir che du brjod pa'/ di brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugadas// chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro// gsang
277b5(rnying rgyud): sngags spyi yi dkyil 'khor las// shes 'jug yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rgyang grags dpag tshad la/ sogs dang // lus gang lus ngo gsum gyi tshad// rang gi
277b6(rnying rgyud): rig pas ci nus par// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gnod bskrad sa gnon byin gyis brlab// ljon pa lcug phran sdong gcig dang // ma reg tshon gyis ji bzhin du// gom
277b7(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab// 'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas// gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni// tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag/ dang por mchod sbyin da
277b8(rnying rgyud): pas mchod// gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni// ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod// 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas// khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya// bar chad
278a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog/ gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te// 'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing // thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/ 
278a2(rnying rgyud): bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul du// de yi gzugs bzung mchog tu bstim// dza zhes lan gsum brjod pas na// de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing // ye shes lnga yi dngos grub
278a3(rnying rgyud): sbyin// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams// de yi dgos pa byed par 'gyur// yang na sa gzhi rab mnyam la// phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// dkar
278a4(rnying rgyud): rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// rdo rje dung chen dmar rtsis dag// / dung dang srog shing gsar snying dang // zhing 'gyur ma/ cho ga dang mchog phran dang // ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams
278a5(rnying rgyud): kun// 'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang // nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdeng dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis// re ba
278a6(rnying rgyud): med par rab tu bsgrub// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos// zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na// dkyil 'khor 'thun pa nyid du sbyar// zhag ni sum cu phrag
278a7(rnying rgyud): drug gam// drug cu dgu cu rtsa drug tu// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus dbul// de nyid dkyil 'khor nyi du brtag/ 'da' bar mi
278a8(rnying rgyud): mdzad dam tshig las// nams kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshi gi le'u su cu bzhi pa'o// / 
278b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sngags kyi snying po 'di che du brjod do// a ki dun dza la maN Da la phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM / 
278b2(rnying rgyud): ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM ma hA badz+ra shri he ru ka bidz+ra kro d+ha shwa ri sarba duSh+Tan hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU ru lu ru lu hU b+hU hU~M/ oM rad+da me hA shA he ru ka rat+na ma hA
278b3(rnying rgyud): d+he shwa ri bi d+hi mu kha hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ oM hrIHpad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka pad+me ma hA kro d+hi shwa re khA hi hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma yo hU ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hUM/ oM karma ma
278b4(rnying rgyud): gr-i he ru ka sarba a ki ma hA kre d+he shwa ra bo shwa rU be hUM phaT/ ru/ lu ma hA sa ma ya hU ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ma hA/ sahA sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na pad+ma e mai g+ha ma hA badz+ra shrI
278b5(rnying rgyud): ru ke/ ma hA sa ma ya ha he hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pad+ma shrI he ru ka man+ta dz+wa la ma hA maN+Da la kA ya bka tsit+ta/ oM oM oM hUM hUM hUM/ sraM sraM sraM/ 
278b6(rnying rgyud): AM AM AM/ hAM hA hAM/ badz+ra ma hA ka pA la khang+ga datA na dzo la sid+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka a me du me sid+d+hod b+ha be/ saM ha ra na hUM hUM hAM/ ma hA yo ga ad+d+ha ma hA sa ma ya/ ru lu ru a le le hai// ho sems
278b7(rnying rgyud): nyid thig ler rab gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis nyid rdzogs// sangs rgyas rdo rje he ru ka/ tshom bu dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi// sku gsung thugasu bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra
278b8(rnying rgyud): kro d+ha sa ma ya ho// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM aM hUM su ra staM/ ka ma la ma hA su kha mA le ma nu sa ma na dz+wa la ni d+ha na a ba yo ga khA hi a la a la haM// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
279a1(rnying rgyud): pa las 'jigs byed chen po sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i ngam
279a2(rnying rgyud): tshig chen pos phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched sbyin pa'i ting 'dzin la zhugs te 'dug pa'i tshigs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga
279a3(rnying rgyud): tapad+ma sa ma yo gi ni dza zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun tu pad+mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa las
279a4(rnying rgyud): dbu dang // phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snye du srid pa/ 'i rtse mor thugs par gnas par gyur to// de nas yang dadakyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lasgom
279a5(rnying rgyud): par bzhugs te// ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyi sa 'dril zhing oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na zhes brjod pas lnga 'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / sr-i/ 
279a6(rnying rgyud): po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang ha ha a bi ra tsa tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas la la ni lus shin tu brjes
279a7(rnying rgyud): tori rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// la la ni mngon gsum gcan mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang sa 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang
279a8(rnying rgyud): che ba dad pa med cing rdo rje theg pa smod bzhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs nas// oM badz+ras ma ya ga ni mu mu ru lu ru lu suM zhes
279b1(rnying rgyud): pas kun tu sku chags pa'i bdag nyid dang / kun tu gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang / kun tu thugs chags par gyur pa dang / kun tu rin po che chags pa chen po dang / kun tu phrin las chag/ 
279b2(rnying rgyud): pa chen por gyur te/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / dbus chen por khrag gi dpa' klong keng rus chen po'i ra rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid snang bar gyur te// da yang kun tu
279b3(rnying rgyud): lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jigs byed bsam gyis mo khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs lnga'i rol pa dang / 
279b4(rnying rgyud): zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jigs pa dang / rigs da lnga tshem bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to// de las mchog gi snying po chen po ma hA rat+na ti la kha'i dbur gyur las
279b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jig sa byed chen po'i thig le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag/ drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhug so// de nas de nyi
279b6(rnying rgyud): du sku dang / phyag dang zhabs dang / 'khor stong khams kyi rdul snye 'jigs byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par mthong ngo // de nas yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes
279b7(rnying rgyud): bu chen pos 'dzin gyi bdag po thong thong ji lta bu byed dam zhes pa las de nas yang dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na hUM hUM hrI zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan pa
279b8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje theg pa smod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog du bcas pa'i bdud chen po dadag nyid kyi yid kyis gdus
280a1(rnying rgyud): te rab tu rgyal nas ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnasu phyin par
280a2(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+Tha badz+ra aM aM zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang phral/ mi mthun pa'i lus brjes te lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
280a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhus/ 
280a4(rnying rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon+tan dang 'phrin las las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje
280a5(rnying rgyud): thig le chen po'i dam tshig sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung // oM khrag mangs dpa' klong 'khyil ba yi// keng rus tsheg sa kyi ri rab 'bum// 'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga'i ri// 'khor
280a6(rnying rgyud): lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang // gru chad bzhis brgyan rab brjid pa'i// grwa bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid
280a7(rnying rgyud): stan mang po lha chen brtan// dgyes pa chen po kun tu bzang // phyag dang zhabs ni brgyad pa yi// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i// rdo rje snyi/ 
280a8(rnying rgyud): po thig le thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dgrang // khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni// dgyes pa chen po'i tshul 'chang ba// phyogs bzhi grwa dang bcas par ni// sprul pa
280b1(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor 'phra men rnams// ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas// 'bar bas phyag bsnams chen po ni// rdo rje dug chen gang ba dang / pad+ma'i gzhal med rde'u chung brdung // zhing gi zhags pa/ 
280b2(rnying rgyud): 'ching ba dang // kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par// bran mo'i tshogs
280b3(rnying rgyud): chen mang po rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i chog
280b4(rnying rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs dpa gcig tu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhi/ 
280b5(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa nyid la che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// byed pa rje mchog nyid kyi// sgyu 'phrul lam gyi dkyil 'khor las / dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs par// 'jug pa
280b6(rnying rgyud): yid kyi dgongs pa yin// shin tu phra la sbyangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes// tshem bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu// spro ning bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// yid du 'ong ba'i
280b7(rnying rgyud): sa bzhir ni// rkang 'thil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri// oM dang muM gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de las phra mo rdo rjes dgang // phra rab sa brdul 'jal du gzung // yum gyi chogasu shes/ 
280b8(rnying rgyud): bas brtags// gang gi yul yang dbang du 'gyur// mi mthun gzugs su brtags pa ni// dra ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin// lugs ma bzhin du ha du brtag/ de las 'od bzhin gyi/ 
281a1(rnying rgyud): du gzung // gsang gnas ngag lam haM du bya// rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ drag po lce yi sbyor ba yis// gling khams gzhan du shin tu btang // bdag nyid du nyid
281a2(rnying rgyud): hUM gi tshogs bcas pa// ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom// bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs// muM du byin brlabs yi ger bstim// brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du yis// nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu na
281a3(rnying rgyud): brtan 'gyur a yi snying po zlas// nyams su lon par ma gyur tshe// 'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor// dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang // rnam pa mang por mnyam du'o// de las mi snang gzugs ni/ 
281a4(rnying rgyud): pa// rab tu blo yi theg gnas ni// gzhan du nam kyang mi gastan ci// gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs// longs spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang // rdzus kyi nor phyir ma yino// rmongs pa
281a5(rnying rgyud): dang brtson 'grus zhan// nams kyang sbyin par ma gsungs te// smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du// sus kyang byon bar ma gsungs la// srog chags kha yi gtam bzhin du/ 
281a6(rnying rgyud): nams kyang smra bar mi bya'o// byed pa rdo rje ga sha yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa bani gling bzhi'i lam// kun tu bzang po'i thabs tshul ba// tshem bu gsum gyi lha rnams sgom// chos khams bya/ 
281a7(rnying rgyud): pa a yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong ba// kun tu bzang mo shes rab tshul// gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// de ni chos khams
281a8(rnying rgyud): a la bstim// chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings// kun tu babang mo bde ba'i yum// de yi ngang du tshogs kun brtags// sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams// de yi dbyings nas 'thung bar ni// 
281b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag/ mi gnas na mkha'i mthas klas par// goms par 'dod pa thod pa dang // chu las sa bzhin 'gro ba dang // bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang // 
281b2(rnying rgyud): rlung gis btegs nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// 
281b3(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag
281b4(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlab// k+Sha lam a bi tshon bzhin du// sgyul/ phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lug su drug/ sa mi bzhin du ni// de nyid yid lam mchog grub pa'o// de
281b5(rnying rgyud): nyid bsal bar mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// oM lam a yaM chen bzhin du/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs
281b6(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du ni// de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub pa'o// de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// sau lam a yi tshen bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra/ 
281b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lug su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid khyad pa la mchog go// chos dbyings rtog pa mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlabaM/ a lam/ 
281b8(rnying rgyud): a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lug su blugs bzhin du ni// de nyid gsum mchog grub pa'o// chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas
282a1(rnying rgyud): kun bdag byin gyis brlab// haM lam a yi tshogs bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de ni 'phrin
282a2(rnying rgyud): las ye shes so// de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid no// rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom// de nyid ha dang ka nyid de// muM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams / 
282a3(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las// dri ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// de nyid hUM lam phyag bsnams pa// rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// yang na rtse lnga thugs kyi thugs// dbus
282a4(rnying rgyud): nas hUM ge lo tsa na// lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing // hUM hUM hUM gis lan gsum du// rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab// muM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul// 'bru lnga
282a5(rnying rgyud): rgya bcings byin gyis brlab// bskyed pa rdzogs par ga/ sor ba yis// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri// zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis// de 'dod las rnams grub
282a6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// bcu pa drag po mthing nog dbu// 'gying ba'i bar gyis gsor ba yis// gsung snyan sgra yo bro rdebs pa'i// phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bar na// phaT phaT hUM gis gsor ba yin// 
282a7(rnying rgyud): snying po thugs brtags phyag bsnams pa// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po las// bsod nams lus 'jig dbang du 'gyur// ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad// brgyan pa sgegs pa pho nyad/ 
282a8(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang // mdor na bcu gnyis gleng gi bdag/ drag shul mthu yi dregs pa can// sngags shing brgyal te blo stor nas// bum pa bzang po 'bul bar gyur// 
282b1(rnying rgyud): lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang // rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang // gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang // gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang // ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul// de la bran bzhin gyi
282b2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad ni// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi
282b3(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms
282b4(rnying rgyud): par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye// nas rnam dag chos sku la// log rtog rnam pa gnyis dasu 'grub// thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes// thams
282b5(rnying rgyud): cad gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam rtog mi mthun so sor gyur// la la'i sman le la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las// mi
282b6(rnying rgyud): mthun khyad par so sor snang // sus kyang ma byas su byed yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcings// sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang // khams gsum phyin ci log
282b7(rnying rgyud): bzhi dang // dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad sbyong // rnam par thar pa lha rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs/ 
282b8(rnying rgyud): de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya// kun la phun pa'i sman yin pas// de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog 'or// thams cad mnyam pa nyid spyod// rtsa ba byang chub
283a1(rnying rgyud): sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin la sprod// snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi'i
283a2(rnying rgyud): don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi gnas ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi las ni rnam rtog spong // bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// 
283a3(rnying rgyud): ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris 'grub// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub// rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang // rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i
283a4(rnying rgyud): dug/ klu dug spong gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje chen dpo'i byin rlabs kyis// dug rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom// gnas
283a5(rnying rgyud): lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim// oM hAM traM hriHa/ yang na yi ge yau gyis bya// yang na yi ge hri las btang // dug rnams bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su
283a6(rnying rgyud): thim par bya// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hUM bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed// nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing // byams pa'i thugs dang / 
283a7(rnying rgyud): ldan pa'o// oM bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang // thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi// traM bdag nyid nga rgyal yon+tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel
283a8(rnying rgyud): par byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyingasu sbyor// yon+ta na rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hri bdag nyid 'dod chags gsum mchog ste// nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed// nyon mongs sdug
283b1(rnying rgyud): bsngal rnam par dag/ chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o// a bdag nyid las kyi sems pa ste// don rnams ma lus grub par byed// log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog phyogs
283b2(rnying rgyud): bcu dus bzhi 'phro ba'o// mu bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// le lo g.yeng ba sel bar byed// thugs rje myur ba las byung ba// rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o// nyon mongs las rnam
283b3(rnying rgyud): dag byed cing // dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsung ste// lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga// 'khor ba'i rtsad gcing shes rab mtshon// hUM du bsdus shing ho
283b4(rnying rgyud): yis g.yeng // raM gyis bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phang // / thabs dang shes rab 'bel pa yi// thig le'i dbying su thim par bya// de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas// ye
283b5(rnying rgyud): shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// 'bru gcig 'bru ga sum 'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// nga
283b6(rnying rgyud): med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal// de nas longs spyod lnga kun dang // ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang // lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom// oM hUM trAM hrIHaHoM badz+ra a mri ta kun+da li ha na
283b7(rnying rgyud): ha na hUM phaT/ oM b+hi shud+d+he a mri te hUM phaT/ oM d+harma a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM AHhU~M ces brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur// bdud rtsir gyur/ sa chu me rlung na mkha' rnams// rang ba zhi/ 
283b8(rnying rgyud): med par gzhig pa'i phyir// gcig le lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // muM gyi dbyingasu bstim par bya// 'byung ba che rnams de dag la// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rags pa thabs kyi phyag
284a1(rnying rgyud): rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing // 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de// yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do// rgyur byas
284a2(rnying rgyud): gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na// de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a ho e ma'o// 
284a3(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge oM dang muM// gnyis dang bdag dang dbyingasu thim// bdag nyid bdud
284a4(rnying rgyud): rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la// nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan// lha dang lha me tshogs kyis bskor// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil
284a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// slas dang byi mo tshegs kyis bskor// a ho 'khoralo brtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil
284a6(rnying rgyud): ba ste/ shar gyi rtse la rdo rje'o// lho yi rtse la rin po che// nub kyi rtsel snang mtha' yas// byang gi rtse la don yod grub// thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya rnams kyang gas
284a7(rnying rgyud): bar bsgom// snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas// de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni// bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar// re ba yid bzhin bskor bar byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel
284a8(rnying rgyud): bar byed// 'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed// dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o// bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed// bsgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan par byed// a mri ta yi rgyu nyid ni// byang chub
284b1(rnying rgyud): sems dang sha chen dang // dri chung chen mang sar bcas// pad+ma ka la sogs dang // gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar// bdud rtsi nyid byin gyis
284b2(rnying rgyud): brlab// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sme med par dag par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel
284b3(rnying rgyud): zhing // dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang // bskal par yun rings gnas pa dang // dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsungs// bdag nyid
284b4(rnying rgyud): yi ge hUM gyur nas// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// oM AHhUM du gyur par bsgom// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro// slar 'dus 'od 'phros bdud rtsir 'bar// shin tu
284b5(rnying rgyud): gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgomo// gzhan yang yi ge'i chog/ se bas gdab// 'thung na ngan song sgrib pa byang // tra ta/ brtag brten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// bzhi pa
284b6(rnying rgyud): rtsa bzhi nad sel cing // lha la rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// gzhan yang
284b7(rnying rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyi// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob 'gyur na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// the tshom med par bsgrub par gyis// rtag tu spyod
284b8(rnying rgyud): cing dbyings su thim// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen
285a1(rnying rgyud): pos de dag gi byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di che du brjod pa 'di che brjod// de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// khas dang 'byung / 
285a2(rnying rgyud): bapa nyid la gnas// de gnyis sgyu 'phrul thabs mkhas pa// dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa// phyogs bcu
285a3(rnying rgyud): gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam kun khengs par// hUM gi tshogasu rnam par bsgom// lus nyid ha yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs gzung bas// kha deg
285a4(rnying rgyud): nag po'i tshe na phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ 8/ dza zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// mgyogasu 'gro bar lcags kyis spang // dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang // gang
285a5(rnying rgyud): du bya ba byin par byed// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzang la// dal bus hUM/ zhes bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ 
285a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi bstan gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// oM gyi tshegs su shin tu bsgom// 
285a7(rnying rgyud): lus nyid a yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dkar po'i mtshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ mad
285a8(rnying rgyud): pos bskur ba rgyal chen po// blo rno yid 'dzangs bzhin bzangs dang // snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas bdag
285b1(rnying rgyud): gis gzugs gzung la// dal dbus oM zhes bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la gzud bar 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa// phyogs kun
285b2(rnying rgyud): gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam kun khebs par// saM gyi tshe gsu rab tu bsgom// lus nyid saM gyi tshogs la stim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs gzung nas// kha dog ser po'i ma
285b3(rnying rgyud): phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// sraM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas nor mang blon po yid 'dzangs la// blo rno snga bas long spyod 'dra// de yi 'khor lo longs spyod cing // gnas ni dag
285b4(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// rgyas dpas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus swaM zhes brjod pa yis// bdag gi lus la tshod par 'gyur// thams
285b5(rnying rgyud): cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur/ pa// phyogs bcu gang bas gsal 'bar bsgom// de nyid ngag la lus khengs par// aM gyi tshegasu shin tu
285b6(rnying rgyud): bsgom// lus nyid aM gyi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dmar ngo'i mtshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// aM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas
285b7(rnying rgyud): nas// rgyal mo zhang blon dbang chen dang // ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur// de yi 'khor la long spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na/ 
285b8(rnying rgyud): dbang gis bad gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus aM zhes brjod pa yin// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa
286a1(rnying rgyud): phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// haM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lu nyid ha yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya
286a2(rnying rgyud): gzugs bzung nas// kha dog ljang khu'i mtshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// haM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod gzugs// dmag mang
286a3(rnying rgyud): mthu dpung go mtshon bzang // zhe sdang can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dod chags can rnams 'dul ba dang // nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur// de yis bstan pa 'dzin par byed// de yi
286a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor la longs spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// snyoms pas khro yi gzugs bzung la// dal bus haM zhes brjod pa yis// mi snang ba
286a5(rnying rgyud): yi gzugasu 'cha ro// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// gling ngam dur khrod gnas rnams su// nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la/ 
286a6(rnying rgyud): dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// 
286a7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyis che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung
286a8(rnying rgyud): ngo// dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs muM du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang batsha/ 
286b1(rnying rgyud): pa// muM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// de bzla'i ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ 
286b2(rnying rgyud): lam du zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// de bzhin rigs rnams aM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshegs kyang gsal bar gnas
286b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun par rnam par bsam// brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid
286b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshegs bsgom// phyag rgya shin tu gas dal ba na// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags// 'phrogadu rigs dang 'thun pa'i grangs// bsgoms nas bzlas dang ma
286b5(rnying rgyud): sum na// lcags kyu mchog gi phyag rgya bcad de na 'dod pa pazhi na du 'gyur ba bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas// gzhan dang / nga ma yin rdo rje rigs// dpal ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum// shin
286b6(rnying rgyud): tu chos kyi bsgrags pa la// gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngar byin brlabs lam du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// lam gyi tshogs
286b7(rnying rgyud): lha rnams bsgoms// sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las// rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas
286b8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje tsan ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs// pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzum thabs yin// srubs nas zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde
287a1(rnying rgyud): gsal spro thim// rdo rje rigs rnams hUM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sog/ 
287a2(rnying rgyud): rigs dang 'thun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa ha yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshegs bsgom// 
287a3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par grangs// sgoms dang bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bskul bar gsungs// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya
287a4(rnying rgyud): yis// rigs dang 'thun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom// yon+tan skug/ dasung yid bzhin gter// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog/ chen mo// chas shing bsgregs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni ljon
287a5(rnying rgyud): lcug phran la sogs la// dbab pa mchog gi las bya ba/ spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs oM du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// oM
287a6(rnying rgyud): gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba la// rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlobs// de nyid mtha' bral mi dgyes las// yon+tan gter gyi gzugs bcas na// sangs rgyas
287a7(rnying rgyud): rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// sbub su zhags la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal
287a8(rnying rgyud): spro thim// rin chen rigs rnams sraM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun
287b1(rnying rgyud): par shin tu bsam// brtan pa saM gyi 'bri 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshegs bsgom// phyag rgya/ 
287b2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun pa ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// dam tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi// 
287b3(rnying rgyud): rigs dang 'dud 'phro 'thun par bsgom// gso dang gsad dang pha ma dang rgyal// gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang // ci 'dod 'ong dang smra yang rung // mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang // bcing
287b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i las dang mtshon las thar// dpal ldan pad+ma mtsho/ dag gi yum// bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa// / dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa'i lcug
287b5(rnying rgyud): phran la sogs la// dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlab sa// de nas gnas lnga shes rab bsgom// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// las bzhi 'bru bzhi pa du brtags/ 
287b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// paM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba la// rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ 
287b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas gsung chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// 
287b8(rnying rgyud): sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// ming dang snying po bcas pa dgug/ rdo rje gsung rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// 
288a1(rnying rgyud): yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun par shin tu bsam// bstan pa oM gyi 'phro 'du ltar rnam
288a2(rnying rgyud): shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// chos dbang yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal bar nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'dra rigs dang 'thun par ni// 
288a3(rnying rgyud): bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// chags pa'i lcags sgrogs mchog gis cing // chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas/ 
288a4(rnying rgyud): ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags// dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phral pa// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// lho nu pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka
288a5(rnying rgyud): mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs btang du brtags// de ni a yi tshogs yin te// de nyid goms las gsang ma/ tshan pa// me yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms// de nyid
288a6(rnying rgyud): steng gi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// don yod ngang tshul de bzung nas// don yod mchog gi tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rgya// 
288a7(rnying rgyud): gram byin rlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// sbub su zhugs la de lus dgang // rgya gram tshon gyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug/ de goms
288a8(rnying rgyud): blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje la la rnams haM bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs
288b1(rnying rgyud): dang 'thun pa nyid bsgom// brtan pa ha gyi 'phro 'dra ltar// rnam shes byin rlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshegs bsgom// phyag rgya
288b2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan cing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs
288b3(rnying rgyud): dang 'thun pa nyi du bsgom// phyogs bcu 'gro dang dbrog pa dang // tshe btung ba dang las rnams dang // mngon sum ci 'dod smra ba'i mchog/ rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur// srid pa la
288b4(rnying rgyud): 'phags mya ngan 'das// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed paragyur zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yonan nyid mkhyen to// mkhyen
288b5(rnying rgyud): nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyungango // a ho bsam/ bya bsam par zin pa yi// bsam pas mi zin bsam mi
288b6(rnying rgyud): khyab// bsam yas lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag med bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shes// ngo mtshar srid lam mtha' bral dmigs med pa/ de
288b7(rnying rgyud): nyid yon+dan mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin// a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon+dan ston pa zhes/ 
288b8(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos che ba'i yon+tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin
289a1(rnying rgyud): gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba chos dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams// kha dog grangs bcas ma brla
289a2(rnying rgyud): pas// shes pa blo che khong yangs la// zab par spyod la mi skyo bar// zas srung gos rjes dam zas sbyin// dung chen snod du chu yis bsing // rten du rung bar ting 'dzin dang // dbang dang sgrub pa mcho
289a3(rnying rgyud): kyang bstan// mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig dpog/ oM dang muM gyi blo bstan nas// gsang bas mtshan ma lnga nas spang // sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// phung po khams dang skye mched
289a4(rnying rgyud): sbyar// longs spyod lnga ldan mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje ngag laM gsung chen bzlas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzi na oM/ oM bA dzA ku la hUM badz+ra ku la hUM badz+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta swa rad na sraM/ 
289a5(rnying rgyud): oM pad+ma ta thA hri da ya a ro lig/ ha br-idz+nyA hai/ tad+de shwa ri muM/ dwe sha ra ti laM/ oM ha ra ti aM/ rA ga ra ti paM/ badz+ra ra ti ta/  mu mu/ laM l-i laM/ aM i aM/ baM paM paM/ taM taM taM/ e baM ma ya bab
289a6(rnying rgyud): ba ba ba/ dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra dz+ra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ s+t+waM ho/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs
289a7(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang / spyan chen mo dang / mA ma kI chen mo dang / gos dkar mo chen mo dang / dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol
289a8(rnying rgyud): ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du kun tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
289b1(rnying rgyud): bani bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos sgyu 'phrul chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par zhugs nas deban/ 
289b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo // sgeg mo mchod pa sbyin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang 'thun pa'i brtsa
289b3(rnying rgyud): brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs ya nyid sbyin// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// ya yi tshegs kyi lha rnams
289b4(rnying rgyud): bsgom// de nyid hU~Mg lha rnams dang // bdag med mtha' bras mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs ra rgyas rdo rje can ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de la
289b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzum thabs yin// sbub su zhugs la de lus dgang // rdo rje tshon gyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying po maung yang bod// de ga
289b6(rnying rgyud): blo bde gsal spro thim// ming yang snying po bcas pa dgug/ rdo rje lha rnams hUM du bsgom// snod gnas sgeg mo khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya
289b7(rnying rgyud): snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsam// brtan pa ha yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas/ 
289b8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje'i sprin tshegs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal pa nye bsnyen pa// 'ab 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni// bskams nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgom bzhi yi phyag rgyabacing // rjes su chags pa'i
290a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya bzhis rigs dang 'thun pa nyid bsgom// rin chen phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// 
290a2(rnying rgyud): spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs e nyid sbyin// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yi ni// de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa// e yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms
290a3(rnying rgyud): de nyid sa gyi lha rnams te// bdag mid mtha' bral mo dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rin chen tsan ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo
290a4(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // rin chen tshon gyis khe/ ngas pa dang // so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug do/ 
290a5(rnying rgyud): blo bde gsal spro thim// rin chen lha rnams sraM du bsgom// snod gnas phreng ba khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la
290a6(rnying rgyud): sogs// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsam// bstan pa saM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs
290a7(rnying rgyud): bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgom bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya
290a8(rnying rgyud): bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyi bsgom// pad+ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan
290b1(rnying rgyud): 'bru lngas byin rlabs paM du brtags// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// baM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid aM gyi lha rnams te// bdag me/ 
290b2(rnying rgyud): mtha' bral mi dmigs laso// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas pad+ma tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin rlabs te// pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzul thab/ 
290b3(rnying rgyud): yin// sbub su zhugs la de lus dgang // pad+ma'i tshogs kyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// pad+ma'i lnga rnams oM du bsgom// snod
290b4(rnying rgyud): gnas dbyangs ma khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gas la bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// ri gas dang 'thun pa nyid bsgom// brtan pa haM gyi 'phro 'du
290b5(rnying rgyud): ltar// rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa/ 'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i sprin tshegs/ bsgom// phyag rgya gsil ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'dug/ 
290b6(rnying rgyud): dang 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom// gar mkhan las
290b7(rnying rgyud): kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rig dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs ma nyid sprin// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'alo/ 
290b8(rnying rgyud): bsgom// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid haM gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi darigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// 
291a1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas las rnams tsan ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin rlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus
291a2(rnying rgyud): dgang /  las kyi tshogs kyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// las kyi lha rnams haM du bsgom// snod gnas gar mkhan khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi
291a3(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang 'thun pa nyid bsgom// brtan pa haM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i/ 
291a4(rnying rgyud): sems nyid las// sangs rgyas las kyi sprin tshogs bsgom // phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'dra rigs dang / 'thun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// sgom
291a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// / rigs dang 'thun pa nyid bsgom// dkyil 'khor ba ni bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// lha rnams mngon du snang ba dang // sgo ba
291a6(rnying rgyud): sgom mang po dang // dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang // lha dang klu'i tshogs bcas las// mngon du smra bar bya bar 'thun// rgyal srid dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang // bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang // 
291a7(rnying rgyud): gsad dang bskrad pa'i tshogs bcas dang // bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang // nor 'dod pa dang ci bya ba// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dus med par ni mched dang phrad ces brjod pa/ 
291a8(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las byin bsdu ba dang tshig dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs
291b1(rnying rgyud): rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas dgyes pa chen pos long spyod chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul chen po
291b2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las byung // rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rnams kyis// nges par bsgom par bya ba ni// 
291b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas// gzugasu bri 'am rten bcas la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// goms par dza nyid mdog dmar bsgom// de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus// 
291b4(rnying rgyud): rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snyi dka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs paM du rtags// dgom sa gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dza zhes rgya bcings drang bya/ 
291b5(rnying rgyud): zhing // goms par gsang gnas zhugs tshul du// lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdu// oM las sang+yas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// mang dang snying
291b6(rnying rgyud): goms par dgug/ mngon gsum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yis// rjes su chags pa'i mchod pas bsham// yid las goms pa gsal ba na// 
291b7(rnying rgyud): gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// blon po'i sa 'dzin mchod pas bsham// yid las goms pa gsal ba na// gang bya ba kha dang snying ka mtshan// goms par dza nyid mdog dmar bsgom/ 
291b8(rnying rgyud): de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan// 'bru lngas byin rlabs baM du brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor
292a1(rnying rgyud): bsgom// dza zhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang gnas zhugs tshul du// lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdus// oM nas sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ 
292a2(rnying rgyud): snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang snying po goms par dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mcho
292a3(rnying rgyud): bapar bsham// de la las su stsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// yud tsam rtags par 'dod sgrub rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis bye bar 'gyur// dbang phyu/ 
292a4(rnying rgyud): lha chen lha dbang po// rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la// chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan// 'dod spyod dbang ba ra blo 'chang rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur
292a5(rnying rgyud): de yi dgos pa thams cad pa// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos kun tu gsal bar gyur nas/ 
292a6(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod chen po kun tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
292a7(rnying rgyud): ba las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshe/ 
292a8(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi snang bar gyur to// gdug pa'i las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i che
292b1(rnying rgyud): brjod pa 'di brjod do// klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang / rigs gsum pa dang / rigs tha dad pa dang / phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs
292b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir gogs gsal ba lnga zhes bya ba 'di 'thon
292b3(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa 'di che du gsungs so// sgrub pa 'dug pa mi gnas dang // sa gzhi bdag tu dbang ba dang // sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa// gdug pa'i sbrul rnams gsal ba dang / 
292b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la// gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing // ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// dgadug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir// lnga pa zhes ni rab
292b5(rnying rgyud): tu bsngags// bdag gis gdug par mchod pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las// bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog/ lag ni zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin
292b6(rnying rgyud): mgo la gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu// nyi shu brgya 'am stong dang khri// bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po// kha dog nag po lce gsum 'bar// gdug pa klu'i tshegs mangs pas// 'khor
292b7(rnying rgyud): mang 'jigs brjod kyi bung bas// mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca' bya// mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams// phral te go ran byas pa na// gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding // nA ga tu
292b8(rnying rgyud): ka la nA ga phaT ces brjod// 'di la goms par gang brtson pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung na// me lce'i tshogs la phung po bzhin// rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por/ kun la
293a1(rnying rgyud): snang bar gsal gyur nas// rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang // de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// sa la bdag tu bya ba ni// thog ma sa gzhir/ 
293a2(rnying rgyud): mnyam te// oM dang muM gyis tshogs kyis dgang // rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor las// 'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la gshog pa rab brkyang ste// rdo rje thal mo drag tu
293a3(rnying rgyud): rngardab/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha du na mu ne du nA gats+tsha/ de nas yig 'bru shin tu ga shig/ de nas yig 'bru tha ma bsgreng // de nas yig 'bru 'phral skyed pa// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste// sa gzhi
293a4(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la shin tu sngangs 'gyu/ dar te// phyogs bcu kun du 'bros par 'gyur// de la bra den bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'khor du gtogs pa yi/ 
293a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor// 'khor mang ji snyed mchog byed pa// gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir// rdzas la mes ni rab sba ra nas// nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung // de la yig
293a6(rnying rgyud): 'bru drug brjod na// de la gnod par mi nus shing // gdug pas mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur// de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur// mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brnyan dang // mchog
293a7(rnying rgyud): dang tha ma 'bring rnams la// gdug pa'i tshogs kyis zhen pa ni// snying khar aM gyi 'bru rnams te// kha dog dmar po 'bar ba'i nang // gzugasu snang ba kun bzhun te// thub pa'i
293a8(rnying rgyud): nga tshul de bsgoms nas// rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam// de las rab tu 'jigs par rkyang // yi ge dang po tha ma mig/ aM gyi tshogasu 'bar ba gzhan// mi bskyod nyid mas becon
293b1(rnying rgyud): 'chang // thod pa'i dbyig bar chas nas ni// lce la sngags 'di dran pa yis// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // gdugs pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'gyur te// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros
293b2(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// de la mchod dang bran du 'gyur// oM mu ne pad+ma sa ma yo gi hUM hUM dza dza// 'di la goms par gang brtson pas// nga yi cha lag 'di bzung nas// bkur gnas mchod par byed pa dang // sgrub pa dzad
293b3(rnying rgyud): myur bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thub po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste ba ni bcu lnga pa'o// 
293b4(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i tshogs zi ral gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di'i tshe du brjod pa 'di brjo ngo// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis
293b5(rnying rgyud): kyi lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid sdug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum dang lngar// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas te/ 
293b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog sgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur pa ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// rang gi rang bzhin
293b7(rnying rgyud): de sbyar nas// sman dgrang mche btsigs sdang mig 'bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig drag du gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas ni// de bsnyen nyam su lon pa
293b8(rnying rgyud): yin// de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// gang la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// lce la drag du phaT ces brjod// brgyal 'gyur aM nas dmar rtsi
294a1(rnying rgyud): dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yin// dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshem du
294a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum lnga bdun// de yi dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin
294a3(rnying rgyud): goms par bsnyen// rdzas la mtshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// brtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal// gshin rje khros pani
294a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal mor sbyor// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan da dgrang mche gtsigs sdang mig par// brkyang bskum rngam dpas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na // 
294a5(rnying rgyud): yi snying po bzlas nas kyang // oM zhes pas ni rked par bcad / des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa la gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa nyid ni// ji bzhin ji bzhin
294a6(rnying rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// de las 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar nges pa'i brtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsogs sdang mig
294a7(rnying rgyud): drag pos blta// oM gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod// brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// ngag las aM zhes bya bas ni// bzlas brjod bcas de bdag nyid bstim// de nas 'dod bzhin du
294a8(rnying rgyud): nges// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// oM las drag tu phaT ces pa// 
294b1(rnying rgyud): brgyal 'gyur aM las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yin// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// 'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa// byang chu
294b2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi kun ngo bo// phyag rgya bzhugs yul la sogs pa// gcig pu cha yi ting 'dzin rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin gongs par
294b3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur
294b4(rnying rgyud): nas// spyan dgrad mchi brtsigs sdang mig par// brkyang / bsgom rngam pas zhing steng bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang // oM zhes bya
294b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i rked par bcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa rdzi lta ba// ji bzhin ji bzhin grub par nges// de las 'dod pa/ 
294b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin du 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos lta// aM las drag tu
294b7(rnying rgyud): phaT ces pas// brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// mchongs par 'dod ni langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul chen po/ 
294b8(rnying rgyud): de nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil// bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan dgrang mche brtsigs sdang mig par// brkyang
295a1(rnying rgyud): bskum rngam pas zhing sdeng bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa las// mgyogs par phyog su song ba na// de sa snying po mchog bzlas nas// hUM zhes pas ni
295a2(rnying rgyud): bskul ba yis// dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams
295a3(rnying rgyud): lon pa yin// oM la drag tu phaT ces pas// gang la bya ba mngon bsams nas// se gol snol mar gtogs pa yis// brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// yid la bsgoms
295a4(rnying rgyud): bas langs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na'odad nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed/ dpa dam tshig mchod bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// 
295a5(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dreg sa pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po rwa/ na po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong bar gyur pa sde dpon dang chung
295a6(rnying rgyud): mar bcas/ bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis gus par dam bcas shing / rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po zhes bya ba
295a7(rnying rgyud): 'di mgrin gcig tu yang smras so// dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba drug cu rnams// keng rus gsar snying gnas
295a8(rnying rgyud): su gyur// rlon pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod// thod par 'thung za med pa'i nang du// mdung thung ral gri dgra sta dang // zhags pa dbyigs pa bor ba dang // rnga dang lda ldi khrag 'thor zhing // 
295b1(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te// rang gi snying
295b2(rnying rgyud): po 'di brjod na// de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// 'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul// oM khaM d+hu ha swA hA/ 
295b3(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag nyid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu stong // me tog sol ma bkram pa dang // ras stan 'bar ma mang po dang rin chen
295b4(rnying rgyud): bcal dang brdung ba dang // rol mo glu gar rab tu snyan// rin chen khang pa'i gnas su ni// lha mo mang bor ba/ dag spyod cing // rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung // 
295b5(rnying rgyud): gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog la sogs dang // lha yi me tog phyogasu 'thor// lha yi tshig
295b6(rnying rgyud): mang kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran
295b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid// oM
295b8(rnying rgyud): sarba de bA hA u pa ha// rgyal po rnam thos yul 'khor bsrung // 'khor tshegs stong phrag mang po yi// lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni// 'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya// me tog
296a1(rnying rgyud): sil mar bkram pa dang // rgyan mang byug pa bcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams// ci legs par ni rab tu sgra// rim pa che zhing srid nu gus/ ma
296a2(rnying rgyud): par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen bcal dang 'thun pa dang // rol mo glu gar bstan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis
296a3(rnying rgyud): shing // bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod 'chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen
296a4(rnying rgyud): me tog phyogs su 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dri za med pa'i bdag po dang // dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams// 'di bzhin gus par
296a5(rnying rgyud): bdag cag bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// 
296a6(rnying rgyud): gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM sid d+ha d+hi d+hi d+hA ho swA hA// rgyal po/ 
296a7(rnying rgyud): mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po// 'khor tshogs khri phrag mang po yis// lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni// 'khor tshegs khri phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil ma bkram pa dang // rgya ni mang byug pa
296a8(rnying rgyud): bcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams// ci legs par ri rab tu smra// rim pa chen po srid zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/ 
296b1(rnying rgyud): rin chen bcal dang btung ba dang // rol mo gru gar snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmag mang 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod chang 'thung ba/ 
296b2(rnying rgyud): gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pa ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyogasu 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// gnod sbyin srin po'i
296b3(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams dang // chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mang rnams// de bzhin gus pas bdag cag bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par byed po yis// zhas
296b4(rnying rgyud): kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/ de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag/ nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus
