296b5(rnying rgyud): rdzogs par bdag cag bgyid// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM d+ha ka b+hi du b+ha bi shu pa she oM hUM// zhes mgrin gcig tu smras pas srid pa rnams thugs kyi kyi
296b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sku dang gsung dang thugs yon+tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung // a ho/ de bzhin
296b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam yas par// 'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'odas bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i// ma nor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing // de yi bsta/ 
296b8(rnying rgyud): ba'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi nus// thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyid la// gsang ba'i snying po ngas pa sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa// nga nyid 'did 'gyur gzhan lta smras / 
297a1(rnying rgyud): dgos// de nyid thugs las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu 'dul bar gyur pa gnas
297a2(rnying rgyud): dang snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / 
297a3(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te/ che du stod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smra so// e maho
297a4(rnying rgyud): ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du dpal// dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med par// dag pa'i rang de bzhin rnal 'byor thugs// kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku// ye
297a5(rnying rgyud): shes lnga'i khro rgyal gtse/ khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'dul// thugs rje bsam yas khro rgyal kun gyi gtso// khrag 'thung
297a6(rnying rgyud): kun las ches 'phags yid bzhin mdzod// ser gnag 'thing gnag ljang gnag dmar nag dang // sngo gnag ri rab lta bur brjid pa'i sku// bskal par bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus pa
297a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i// ro tshegs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i// bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi zad pa'i// skar tshogs mngal nyid zla'i 'od bzhin du// che btsan dregs pas 'jigs pa'i tshogs kun
297a8(rnying rgyud): 'joms// mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing // 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs// za byed skam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal// khrag 'tsho mtha' med skems shing
297b1(rnying rgyud): rgal tshigs 'joms// khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyur// dur khrod 'bum gyi dbu sdug 'jigs par brjid// 'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig mdzad thod rlon phreng bas
297b2(rnying rgyud): bsgegs// rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a a ha las bzhad// rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbul brgyan// smin ris khro gnyer klog bzhin rab 'gyubs// phyogs dang 'thun pa'i
297b3(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung 'gyed cing sdud// sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa// 'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang // sdang mig spun ni nyi zla rgyas 'bar bas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs
297b4(rnying rgyud): phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong // khros pas zhal gdangs deso chen gtsigs 'bar bas// srid pa'i rtse nas dam/ la khams snyigs pa ltar// 'jig rten dus gcig mi ma
297b5(rnying rgyud): lam drug gtan nas gcod// ye shes phyag bsnams phya ga mtshan 'bar ba yis// srid gsum ma lus rje/ la phran stongs par mdzad// rkan skras rol pas 'gro la
297b6(rnying rgyud): pheg brdabs bzhin// khams gsum kun lachis ston rgyas par mdzad// zasu khrag 'thung rdo rje che mchog gsol// 'jigs tshogs sad pa'i ko rlon g.yeng gzhi bsnams/ klu
297b7(rnying rgyud): 'dul yon+dan sbrul gnag stong gis klubs// 'jigs bcas klu yi tshegs kyang zhabs 'og mnan// 'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso// 'dod chags chen po 'dod
297b8(rnying rgyud): chags nyid kyi sku// mang po'i 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas// zhe sdang 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso// zhe sdang gdugs pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku// 'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis
298a1(rnying rgyud): kun bcu pa'o// rab tu brjid pa 'jigs pas 'jig pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dul pa gti mug kun gyi gso// gti mug blo sel gti nag chen po'i sku/ 
298a2(rnying rgyud): mched lcam khrag 'thung sran chen ri rab brtan// nga rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun gyi gtso// 'jigs tshegs sad nas ro tshegs mang gi gnas// zhabs dgrang mche gtsigs mtshe// 
298a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dus mtha' med// 'jigs pas phebs par dga' zhing shin tu sdang // phra dog 'dul ba phra dog kun gyi gtso// pra dog che mchog phra dog chen po'i sku/ bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor
298a4(rnying rgyud): dbus gnas shing // lam nor gdug par bcas dab phaT kyis gsod// zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa dul bar bsnams// sku 'dra 'jigs tshogs gzugs kyis sku
298a5(rnying rgyud): la brgyan// zhabs dang phyag du gyur pa bsam thag chad// zhabs chen g.yon mang brkyang bas lhag non bdud la khyab// zhabs g.yas thabs chen mang pos dpa
298a6(rnying rgyud): sdud 'dor zhing skum// rdo rje se gol phyar brdabs gnyid cher rab sel mdzad// 'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyur ba'i// 'jigs par gong na med pa'i dpa' bo khyod// zas/ 
298a7(rnying rgyud): ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag/ 'jigs byed khyod lta bu ni rab tu dkon// bskal pa bkrus kyang slar skye dri ma la// ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin rlabs dang // thugs rje dag pa'i cha/ 
298a8(rnying rgyud): gyi cho 'phrul gyis// brda' tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs las sbyong zhing // shi ba'i lam 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor du// skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char// byams sdang
298b1(rnying rgyud): mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter// khrag 'thung sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tsha lo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bka' drin dran pa'i klu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu
298b2(rnying rgyud): rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang // 'jig rten gyi khamasu gnas par bya ba'i
298b3(rnying rgyud): ched 'byung po rnams kyi jo mo'i yang dze mo// mi srin mo chen mo// mi srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrag mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang
298b4(rnying rgyud): zhi ba mo dang // bi con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo/ dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos dang / gcig dbu spyod dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / klu mo dang / gsod
298b5(rnying rgyud): byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra maH/ dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sde gnag chen mo dang / gsus
298b6(rnying rgyud): 'dzin ser gnag chen mo dang / rgyal mo dang / blon mo dang / sde dpon mo dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang / bran dang yang bran la sogs pa/ slas dang byi mo dang / bran mo rnams la ched du brjod
298b7(rnying rgyud): pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di// gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po yin// thabs chen mtshon pa'i shes rab ni// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang // gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnam
298b8(rnying rgyud): nga yi thugs las sprul pa yin// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// sde dpon 'phrog ma'i yul rnams dang // lus 'phags pan lang spyod pa dang / sgra mi snyan
299a1(rnying rgyud): dang 'dzam gling du// nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di// phyogs bcu kun tu spel ba dang // de yi gzugs la btad pa ni// yid bzhin mdzod 'byor bka' yi gnas/ 
299a2(rnying rgyud): phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos dang // stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams// spyod dang bsgom dang 'das pa dang // sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis// bsgom pa sran dang chos phyogs dang // bstan pa/ 
299a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin par nus pa yi// gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad// gzhan la bsnyad par ma yino// mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing // yid bzhin sbyor bar mos pa la// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig sta/ 
299a4(rnying rgyud): zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che// sbyor ba gnyi ga mkhas pa dang // lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang // gzhan la bsnyad par mi byed cing // bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o// nye ba bsnyen
299a5(rnying rgyud): ba dam tshig la// bsgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa// ci nus pa ra ni shin tu brtson// sems can ngang tshul kun por/ nas// gang gi yid kyang mi 'khrugs shing // mchod pa chogs
299a6(rnying rgyud): la stobs la rub// bud med 'gugs pas gtso la dbul// zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis// nges pa can la shin tu btang// gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o// thogs med phyal bar
299a7(rnying rgyud): 'dod pa spyod// bud med yon+ta na kun yod cing // 'dod chags kun dang 'thun spyod la// rtsa ba dang du blang ba dang // 'tsham par lha yi sku bstan te// nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams// nams
299a8(rnying rgyud): kyang sbyin par mi bya'o// de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas// gzhan ni bstan par ma gsung so// dang ldan srun ci blo rno ba// dad pa che zhing chos la gus// chags par ran pa bka' nyan cing / 
299b1(rnying rgyud): gnas la dga' zhing lus nyan pa// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig sgrub// mchod pa'i gnas shom sdom pa srung // bsnyen pa la ni byin phab nas// gsang sngags tshogs kyi mchod gnas// nga yigs
299b2(rnying rgyud): pa byin bab te// thogs pa med par mngon sum la// sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ba// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing // mnyam pa'i
299b3(rnying rgyud): grub pas tshogs la mchod// dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang // gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la// 'dod chags spel bar mi byed cing // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// nges pa'i don ni mi ste/ 
299b4(rnying rgyud): la// nga'i dbang dang bslab pa rnams// rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin// rigs ngan pho mo 'dod spyod ni// spro thung 'dod/ chags rab tu che// blo nan phrag dog sgro skur can// gnyid che
299b5(rnying rgyud): chang dang brtson 'grus chung // slob la mi gus nan tan med// slob dpon mi dran spun sems chung // gang te dam la gnas na yang // nga yi gsang ba 'dzin pa la// mngon du
299b6(rnying rgyud): dga' bar mi nus te// lta zhan bka' las 'das pa dang // grol ba dka' zhing nus mthu zhan// mun dang lkog dang skye bo la// gar dben phrad par 'dod spyod cing // 'dod chags 'ga' lam de dag
299b7(rnying rgyud): la// tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed pa// dngos po don dang 'thun pa las// gsang ba'i snying po sbyin mi bya// bskal ba'i 'jig rten bar du yang // thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing // nams kyang
299b8(rnying rgyud): par mi bya'o// 'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams phyir// gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni// rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de// rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin// bsregs dang sbrebs par yun
300a1(rnying rgyud): gnas// zhes brjod pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku
300a2(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs dang yon+tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung // e e ma e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yau// ngang nyid bud med gsang ba sngags pa yi// lnga drug dus btab
300a3(rnying rgyud): snang srid 'byung ba'i gter// yang dag lam rnyed mngon par kun gnas kun tu gnas// chos mang chos nyid mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las// las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul la mtshan 'di
300a4(rnying rgyud): kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bde ba gcig pu yin// tshe sa kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smad 'tsham pa dar bstan// sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni bder gshegs nyid yin/ 
300a5(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsal// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i sku nga po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig chen pos bu da med btul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// 
300a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'di brjod de la mchod sbyin chen po ni// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan
300a7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyisu med par bsgral bar bya// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ pad
300a8(rnying rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs/ 
300b1(rnying rgyud): pa yi// bder gshegs yon+dan rmad po che// gzhan na yod pa ma yin na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing / 
300b2(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni// dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to// gas
300b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen
300b4(rnying rgyud): po che du brjod do// bla med theg par nges gyur pas// nyon mo/ rangs las rnams kun spyod kyang // byas la mi stsogs tshogs gyur te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// 
300b5(rnying rgyud): bla med mchog gi dam tshig du// 'dul ba'i dbang du tshul khrims dang // ji srid sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi
300b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs shing // sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// srog med srog gcad gcad med// srog dang skyes bu log rtogs tsam// bden pa gnyis gar dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshal
300b7(rnying rgyud): de tha dad min// gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang // ming dang tshig tu btags pa brdzun// brdzun nyid la ni brdzun
300b8(rnying rgyud): spyod pa// brdzun spyod btags tsam yod ma yin// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // chags pa nyid na chags pa med// de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste// shin tu chags pa chen pa yin// 
301a1(rnying rgyud): bla med mi spang bla ma bskur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lngarnam/ 
301a2(rnying rgyud): te// khasgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod du mi dor ro// yan lag bcu
301a3(rnying rgyud): yi dam tshig mchog/ ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig/ 
301a4(rnying rgyud): 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni// mnya ma pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin// rtsa ba
301a5(rnying rgyud): nyams pa'i phyal ba dag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra ma byed// nyams 'gyur nye sa pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ 
301a6(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'did bzhin du 'du// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung // 
301a7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig/ 
301a8(rnying rgyud): la bcu phrag gnyisu dbye// dam tshig 'di ni rmad pe che// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i// rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal
301b1(rnying rgyud): mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// bsgrub med dam pa ma lus 'grub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste// 'jig rten ga
301b2(rnying rgyud): dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob// bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la zhugs// 'jig med kun tu bzang por sbyor/ ji bzhi
301b3(rnying rgyud): nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub// nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog ces brjod
301b4(rnying rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa lus dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// / 
301b5(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs ngargyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyi// ra dam tshig sum brgya pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags
301b6(rnying rgyud): 'chang rnams kyi don che du brjod pa 'di brjod// phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed// log togs mi bzang rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab// 'dul bsdom pa bas/ 
301b7(rnying rgyud): yas dang // rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yog shing spros med kyang // rang rig 'khrul ba'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mthon dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tsham
301b8(rnying rgyud): par bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtog gnyis// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur nas// de la bcom shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo nyid med na// nyon mongs spangs shing don bsgrub med// 
302a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam
302a2(rnying rgyud): skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig sum brgya drug bcu pa'i rtsa ba bcwa lnga pa mdor spung pa'i le'u ste lnga
302a3(rnying rgyud): bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 
302a4(rnying rgyud): nam mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba yi// yid bzhin sprin tshe/ dgas rnam par 'byung // sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'a daphro 'bar ro// srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te// yid kyi ye shes
302a5(rnying rgyud): me ru 'bar// haM dbang po dang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// spyod du la rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni// lhan ne lhang nger 'od du zhi// a/ zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// thugs rje
302a6(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs rmad po che// hUM/ 'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa// 'di ni byang chub mchog tu gsungs// ho/ bzhi po 'joms shing ngan song sbyong // tra to/ sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong bzhin
302a7(rnying rgyud): phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag/ bdag med gnyis kyis dag par byed// hri/ gsal zhing gzhag par bya ba med// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od bzhin du// snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med// de bzhin mnyam
302a8(rnying rgyud): gnyis ye shes kyis// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor// oM rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// phyogs bcu khams rnams dbang bsdus nas// thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su tham/ 
302b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad khro bo'i tshog su 'gyur// rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa// shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings thim// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dbyings gyur pas// 
302b2(rnying rgyud): chos rnams thams cad dbyings kyi khro bo khro mor 'gyur// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du/ 
302b3(rnying rgyud): gyur pa dang / rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi me sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyal po'i 'bar ba'i thugs
302b4(rnying rgyud): rjes gtum 'khrugs ging tshegs chen por sbyar nas/ thams cad 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa che/ du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa yis// 
302b5(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus par// bruM ding tsakra'i/ 'khor lor sprul// 'od 'phro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen hUM// gtum chen dus mtha' mo ltar 'bar// re nyi ma'i thod
302b6(rnying rgyud): sbrul mang po'i gzi// khro gnyer klog stong 'grub bzhin// rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// phaT khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar// khros pa'i me dpung rdo rjer 'bar// rdo rje 'khor
302b7(rnying rgyud): lo brtsegs par 'bar// tsakra khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya mdzes// ha he/ slas dang bran mo byi mo'i tshegs// rang gi stan dang mal cha dang // ci bgyi ne/ 
302b8(rnying rgyud): te chas te gnas// tir sgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // nri yi tsi ta za zhing rgyug/ shin tu rngam pa'i gzugasu gnas// ral pa mun dza cod pan 'bar// phyogs bcur khebs pa'i gshog pa
303a1(rnying rgyud): gdengs// rdo rje gtams pa'i brag ri 'bar// ra/ so so'i rig sngags skad gdangs dang // skad dang nga ro drag du 'don// hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo ru lu/ khro bo chen po tshugs
303a2(rnying rgyud): pa yi/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhal 'bar ba// bdag nyid gnyis su med par bsgom// so so'i rang sngags bzlas nas su// rgyud drug sems can thams cad las// ma rungs gdug pa
303a3(rnying rgyud): thams cad du// dzaHhUM baM hos bkug nas ni// lan gsum lan bdun zhal du bstim// lha yang rung sti brlag par 'gyur// ho gzhan yang chod pa'i zhal zas ni// 'byor pa rnam pa kun
303a4(rnying rgyud): gyis mchod// ni yi tshal dang tsha ba'i mar// dmar gyi a darga rgyun du dbul// a ho/ yang na lan gsum brgya rtsade brgyad// stong ngam 'bum du dbul bar bgyi// nag po'i
303a5(rnying rgyud): tsher ma dug shing ngam// gzhan yang bsregs rdzas ga/ dug gsum dang // gnan pa'i cho ga kun gyis bya// sgra 'phrul dra ba las thugs rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor spyir bsdu
303a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i ho/ oM hAM traM hri a/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las ho thams cad ma lus par 'dir 'dus pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gabye
303a7(rnying rgyud): pa khros pa'i rgyal pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las khro bo rngam pa'i tshogs su bsgoms nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod// byang chub mchog gi snying po ni// mtshan mas btsal ba ma
303a8(rnying rgyud): yin gyi/ dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing // rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis// byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur// drag po gtum po bsgrub pa ni// b+ha ga la ni ling ga bzhag/ mtshan
303b1(rnying rgyud): ming du bcas par bya// khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung // lan gsum lan bdun rtag bsgoms shing // mngon du byung ba'i zhal 'bar te// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lhar gyur nas// ring
303b2(rnying rgyud): ga yang nas yang bsdus te// dbyings kyi dkyil du bstim par bya// hUM gis bsdu zhing phaT kyis 'phang // zhal gyi rang sngags khri 'bum du// rnam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nasu// yang nas
303b3(rnying rgyud): yang du gsol bar bya// 'gro lnga sems can thams cad kun// dbang med zhal du thim par 'gyur// ya ma ya yang lhag par mdzes// skum mdog dud kha la sogs dang // mche gtsigs
303b4(rnying rgyud): khro gnyer gtsigs pa dang // zhal bgrang phyag rgya 'bar/ ba dang // gang la sogs pa bsgom par bya// bdag nyi/ dad 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste// mtshan ma bzung nas rang sngags
303b5(rnying rgyud): don// mngon par dbang pos bltar yod par// ril bu pa sdus nas dbyings su mchod// the tshom med par 'grub pa ra nges// dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa// dpa' bos dgo/ 
303b6(rnying rgyud): pa yod pa'i phyir// kun la phan pa de gyis shig/ ho hUM dzA dang phaT dang spo la sogs// 'dren pa'i mchog tu des gsung so// mtshan ma ming bsdus pa yang // ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin du/ 
303b7(rnying rgyud): smon pa byang chub lam du gzhug/ mtshan ma'i bag chags med par bya// dbyings nas spro zhing a la bstim// a ho/ thugs nyid la ni thugs brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba la shin tu
303b8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i khro bo nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po las thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas tshe du brjod
304a1(rnying rgyud): pa 'di brjod do// dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgoms shing // sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan par gnas// thams cad hUM du bsdus nas ni// dkyil 'khor grug
304a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar bar bsgom// me dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs chen du// me lha ag ne dzas bkug nas// re zhes bya ba'i me sbar te// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par/ 
304a3(rnying rgyud): bya// hUM gtum po'i tshogs chen rab tu 'bar// dud ka nag po'i mdog 'dra la// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang por 'khrugs// nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang pos brgyan// seng+ge glang chen stag rnga ma dang / 
304a4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya sna tshogs 'bar ba bsnams// phaT dang hU~M dang \u0f7fla sgra// skad drag phyogs bcur na mkha' 'khrug/  khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// yul dang gnas kyi
304a5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgyas mdzes// ha he/ slas dang byi mo bran mo dang // b+h+yo/ tsaM bgyi la sogs tshogs kyis bskor// so so stan dang lag cha dang // rngam pa'i nga ro rang sngags sgrog/ 
304a6(rnying rgyud): mi sdug gtum pa'i gzugs can dang // shin tu khro bar bsgom par bya// bdag nyid phaT kyi ngang nyid// gsal 'dris blo goms rtag tu bsgom// dzaHhUM baM hos bsdus nas su// rgyu
304a7(rnying rgyud): drug sems can kun bsdus nas// khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya// lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur// yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang 'thun// gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma bzhin// 
304a8(rnying rgyud): mchod pa'i grangs kyang spyi dang 'thun// a/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi// hUM zhal gdangs spyan bgrang khro zhal bsgom// rdo rje gtan pa gdangs pa dang // thod pa lcag
304b1(rnying rgyud): kyu rnams kyis bskor// hUM sgra drag po'i tshogs kyis 'bar// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas bkug nas su// zhal du bstim na lhag par 'grub// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// 'khor gyi tshogs
304b2(rnying rgyud): kyi snga ma bzhin// stong pa'i tshul du spong stong bya// hUM/ gtum po dmar po mchu rings po// 'bar ba rdo rje 'phreng bas bskor// 'od chen 'bar ba 'phro ba yis// 'jig rten khams rnams
304b3(rnying rgyud): dus cig brngubs// hUM khro bo'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams dang // gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshigs// so so'i rang gnas rdzogs par 'don// ha he b+h+yo/ gzhan
304b4(rnying rgyud): yang bstod tshogs 'di dag gis// hUM rdo rje thugs rje byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten khams ni kun bkang ste/ gtum 'khrugs ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje mthum
304b5(rnying rgyud): btul bar gyur// hUM rdo rje zhe sdang 'khor bcas pas// 2jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la brlag mdzad// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// 
304b6(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bo hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po pad+ma sdud pa zhes bya bas 'gro ba mang ba'i don gyi phyir ched
304b7(rnying rgyud): du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis// thams cad ma lus dbyingasu bsdus// dbyings nas ye shes 'od 'phro 'bar// thams cad ma lus dbyings sbyor// hriM dkyil
304b8(rnying rgyud): 'khor zla gam gdengs pa las// 'od zer mang po rab 'bar dang // rdo rje lcags sgrogs bsdams pas bskor// gzhan yang brgyan gyi dam pa mchog/ kun gyis de la brgyan
305a1(rnying rgyud): cing bskor// me lha spyan drangs snga ma bzhin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// pad+ma rigs kyi khro bor bsgom// dmar dmug drag po'i mdog dang ni/ 
305a2(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang sprul pa mang po yi// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi ste 'og bskor// rngam pa rang sngags drag tu sgrogs// hri bdag nyid ma chags rdo rje ste// dkyil 'khor gong ma gsal bsgoms nas// phyog
305a3(rnying rgyud): bcur 'gro ba thams cad dang // gdug pa yid can ma lus kun// dzaHhUM baM hoHs+pho tas bkug nas su// dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya// dgongs pa grub cing ngan song sbyong // hri gzhal yas
305a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mang po'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i zhal 'dral // tha ma pad+ma ljon shing dang // pad+ma rdo rje 'od 'bar bsgom nga // gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis// dkyil 'khor
305a5(rnying rgyud): kun la mdzes par brgyan// bdag nyid pad+ma'i lhar gyur pas// mchod pa lha rdzas sna tshogs dang // zhal zas bza' btung mchog rnams dang // dmar po'i shing dang dri zhim pa/ 
305a6(rnying rgyud): lan grangs gong du smos pa bzhin// rtag tu mchod pa byas na ni// 'jig rten 'di dang 'das pa yi// ci 'dod las de 'grub par gyur// sngags ni yi ge raM dang hrI/ mdog ni dmar smag 'od bo/ 
305a7(rnying rgyud): che// phyogs bcu khyab cing hri la bsdu// dgyes pa'i klu dang gar gyis mchod// hrI rdo rje pad+ma 'bar ba yis// phyogs bcu mtha' klas rab 'byams kun// dpal dang gzi byin tshe la sogs/ 
305a8(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'bar ba de bsdus nas// sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang // gzhan yang longs spyod mchog la sogs// ci 'dod las rnams dbang du 'gyur// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ 
305b1(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la dbang du sdus// dbang du ma gyur gang yang med// hri/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad ma/ 
305b2(rnying rgyud): lus dbang du bsdus te dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di
305b3(rnying rgyud): dag nyid kyi dbyings nas phyung ste che du brjod pa 'di brjed// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ bsod nams zhing 'gyur mchog tu 'bar// phyogs
305b4(rnying rgyud): bcu na mkha' gang bar bsgom// rdo rje rin po che yis bskor/ 8/ rgyal ba'i yon+d+ran mkha' dang mnyam// traM/ ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar// dkyil 'khor zhags pa rin
305b5(rnying rgyud): chen bskor// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs dang // khro bo kun kyang dga' 'phro ste// 'dod chen dkar po 'bar ba dang // phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang sbyar// lha dang lha mo rnams kyis bsgo/ 
305b6(rnying rgyud): mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang // dkar la dri zhim shing rnams dang // gzhan yang mchod yon thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor la ni rgyas par dbul// bdag nyid rin chen rab 'bar nas// 
305b7(rnying rgyud): traM/ dkar la yi ge 'od du 'bar// khro bo kun kyang de bzhin te// mngon du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// pA sha ho dang dzaHhUM gis// phyogs bcu'i lam lnga kun bkug ste// dbyingasu thim par
305b8(rnying rgyud): 'ang 'phro bsgom// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam// gzhan yang yod pa'ang ma yin te// sgyu ma'i ye shes brten pa yin// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bas ma yas ni// rin chen
306a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings la rdo rje 'bar// dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis 'khor bar bskor// gzhan yang lha dang lha mo yis// phyogs bcu khyab par mchod cing dbul// yon+tan rgyal
306a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i zhing dang mnyam// tre/ klu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus kun// mchod yon rin chen dpal 'phel gyis// phyogs bcu gang bar rgyas phul nas// rdo rje bying
306a3(rnying rgyud): kyis rgyas par rol// ho traM/ nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khas 'di rab 'byams kun// skad cig yud la rgyas mdzad// rgyas par ma gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
306a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po rgyas mdzad kyis rgyas pa hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa ba rgyad pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen pos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
306a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba chen por bsgyur nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye/ shes dkyil 'khor dbus mtha' med// bsam yas// lhun gyis grub pa yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma
306a6(rnying rgyud): lus kun// bder gshegs nyid la mi zhan shar// oM dkyil 'khor zlum por 'bar ba las// 'khor lo 'bar bas rab bskor zhing // 'od ni ser por rab tu 'bar// rma du byung ba'i sku la
306a7(rnying rgyud): sogs// bdag nyid chen pos bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sa bon yi ge oM ser te// me lha spyan drang snga ma bzhin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus
306a8(rnying rgyud): rnams// kun kyang gti mug rdo rje ste// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang // 'khor lo phyag rgya 'bar ba dang // lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis brgyan// gdan dang gnas dang dbyings nyid de// rgyal
306b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu// phyogs bcu gnas pa de dag tu// tsakra lcags kyus dkug nas su// dkyil 'khor dbyingasu bstim byas nas// gtum 'khrug gdug pa ma rungs pa/ ldan
306b2(rnying rgyud): ne ljang nge zhi bar 'gyur// oM/ gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba yi// oM dang seng+ge mgos bskor te// brgyan de'i rdo rje phyag rgya kun// rdzogs
306b3(rnying rgyud): ldan zhi bas bskor bar bya// rgyal po lus mdzes 'khor lo 'bar// rgyan rnams zhi la dkar ba dang // byang chub mchog 'bar lha ner bsgom// mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo// gzhan yang
306b4(rnying rgyud): 'gro drug ma lus kun// zhir 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gar da dang glu yis mchod byas te// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa/ ma lus pa// gdug pa'i yid ni rnam bor nas// lha da/ 
306b5(rnying rgyud): bo yi 'du 'gyur// bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar// gti mug rdza rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'a byams kun// skad cig yud la zhi mdzad// zhi bar ma/ 
306b6(rnying rgyud): gyur gang yang med// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur nas zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan
306b7(rnying rgyud): 'das dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ma/ 
306b8(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nas sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga 'am// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya gu
307a1(rnying rgyud): nas rdo rje phur pas btab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyu du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings 'gyur
307a2(rnying rgyud): bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo// myos nas gal te tshig par 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la// chags pa yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// 
307a3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// baM gyi
307a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdum ras// 'gugs 'gyur ci yang phyi bzhin 'brang // ci 'drod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshegs kyi dkyil 'khor
307a5(rnying rgyud): mchog/ 'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yi/ da kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon+tan na mkha'i mtha' dang / mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// yon+tan yid bzhin
307a6(rnying rgyud): gter du brtags// nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar dbul// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyu du sbrel bsdams na// gzi brjid 'bar
307a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang po'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtun
307a8(rnying rgyud): chen rngam po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// 'bar ba lhan ne'i tshe go la dngul// ya
307b1(rnying rgyud): yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu khu rgyu du sbrel nas bsdams// 'bar ba lhan ner byin gyis brlab// thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma
307b2(rnying rgyud): mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin// gang gi dam chog rab bsgrags nas// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgom// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ shin du gdug cing gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus
307b3(rnying rgyud): 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin brlabs rmad po che// lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas// 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs
307b4(rnying rgyud): dam bcas pa'i// ma thogs myur du mngon par byung // dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar rang gis mna' dbor ba'i// sdom bcas de las 'da' ma byed// dam tshig
307b5(rnying rgyud): de las 'das gyur na// mgo lus snying yang tshal ba ba/ dun// yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur// de ba sa rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis// ji ltar bcol
307b6(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du byos// las de mngon du ma byas na// rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin// rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/ rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i// lnga rnams
307b7(rnying rgyud): yongasu bya ba dang // 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs// 'phra men ma yang dngos grub 'thob// bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos zhes bsgo'o// khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi
307b8(rnying rgyud): gtso bo ni 'di yin// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// khro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'o// khro gar glu tshig
308a1(rnying rgyud): chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// spos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshigs chen mos ni lba/ 
308a2(rnying rgyud): ner 'dod na thim par byed// rmugs par 'dod na myos par byed// seng gdongs chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun tu za bar byed// rdul cha tsam
308a3(rnying rgyud): yang med par byed// gzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshigs chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// slas dang byi mo bran
308a4(rnying rgyud): bro gar glu tshigs tshon mo ni// skrod cing gtong bar byed pa ste// thad tha/ mas cad byed pa yin// ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal// sdong cig dang ni me reg tu// dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang
308a5(rnying rgyud): khros pas ka li rab tu bya// zhes brjod pas de bzhin ga shegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong par gyur te/ gsang ba'i snying pa de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyi
308a6(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i phrin las byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad yi dang
308a7(rnying rgyud): cho su 'das par bstan pa dang / shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir 'das// yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'ad so// thabs thams cad ni rigs bzhir 'das/ rigs bzhi yang gcig tu
308a8(rnying rgyud): 'dus te/ thams cad dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shesu 'dus par bstan nas tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod/ don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yi no// thams cad ma lus
308b1(rnying rgyud): mi lus mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de/ de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thabasu snang // thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin// de nyid rang rig ye shes
308b2(rnying rgyud): chags med sna tshogs snang // thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas// ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol
308b3(rnying rgyud): pa yin// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste// rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas// 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor// 'di ni yin bzhin rin
308b4(rnying rgyud): chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad 'du ba'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod// gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// nga dang bdag med mtshan
308b5(rnying rgyud): ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa// stong dang mi stong mi gnas de/ bzhin nyid du 'dus// rang byung rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med kyi/ la 'khor spro// 'das dang ma 'dra dkyil 'khor bas yu lhun gru da
308b6(rnying rgyud): par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzog pa// skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal phreng ldan mchog/ ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig ngang gisal// thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen
308b7(rnying rgyud): ngang du bsdus// phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang // zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen mchog chen kun// skye med dbyings dang rang gi gnyisu yang
308b8(rnying rgyud): dag bub// mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa// ye nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas// ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes
309a1(rnying rgyud): rab mchog gis rdzogs// lam stegs nyi du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod// mnyam nyid pa yi rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan// 'gro med 'ong med
309a2(rnying rgyud): mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad// a ho/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa bcu gnyis dang // thabs kyi sa mchog dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par yid dang / 
309a3(rnying rgyud): chosu 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste dug bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 
309a4(rnying rgyud): lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang // 'bru lnga gnas pa'i byang/ chub ste// oM dang muM du 'brel pa yi// byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung // spyir na brjod pa thams cad kyang // kun kyang ming
309a5(rnying rgyud): tsam yi ge a// skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga// de ni byang chu ba sems nyid yin// dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba// gsum shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa// zad med
309a6(rnying rgyud): rin chen gter yin te// mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spags// e las 'phro zhing ar 'dus pa// gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyis dbyings// na mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba// kun la
309a7(rnying rgyud): khyab cing sna tshogs sprin// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas bsam mi khyab// byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// yon+tan mi zad gter du gyur// ho/ ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bya
309a8(rnying rgyud): dbyings las mi nan ye nas thig le'i ngang // ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul// snang phyed nyid na bya byed med par gnas// ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don// dkyi
309b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsam yas lhan gra ba dam pa ni// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnyam par gnas// dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas shing // mnyam pa rnam bzhis don rtogs
309b2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi gnas// rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus// ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus// chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler 'jug/ ye shes lnga
309b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la// ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan// thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis// dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor// chos
309b4(rnying rgyud): rnams rong bzhin nyid kyis stong // nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang // dngos po me dad dbyings skad cig ma// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam/ 
309b5(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste// ma rig pa ni ye shes gas/ la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/ tham sa cad yon+tan mchog gi gnas// a ho/ phyogs bcu'i rgya
309b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus// bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus// lnga po'i don nyid 'bru gsum nang du 'dus// gsum pod
309b7(rnying rgyud): nyid yi ge ar 'dus te// a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thim// a ho/ mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod mi lang // mi dmigs de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab/ 
309b8(rnying rgyud): ma skyes chog gis dbyings kyang bsam mi khyab// ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med// 'gro med 'ong med mi gnas pa'o// thugs rje byin rlabs rnam par 'phro zhes nyid la nyid
310a1(rnying rgyud): gsung ngo // dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal// dbyingasu dbyings kyis ye shes
310a2(rnying rgyud): 'byor pas na// byang chub sems tshogs kyil 'khor brjod mi lang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus par mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyar thim pa'i le'u/ 
310a3(rnying rgyud): ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po mtha' yas su sprul nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te// bruM dang bi/ 
310a4(rnying rgyud): shwa'i dkyil 'khor du// ma dang a yi dkyil 'khor dal// rdo rje 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te// de yis phyogs bcur gang par
310a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom// bruM dang dzaHhU~M baM hos dgug/ sku gsung thug sa kyi snying po mchog/ lus ngag sems la thim par bya// ni nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa mchog ni
310a6(rnying rgyud): bzang po yi// tshe gzhag gnas ni 'di yin te// yang nas yang du dgug bya ste// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang // dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje go cha bsrung ba yis// brtan
310a7(rnying rgyud): zhing 'khor los dgab par bya// snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim// sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus kun// rgyal ba tshe dpag med pa bsgom// sku mchog gang ri 'tsher ba la// rgyan
310a8(rnying rgyud): phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang // yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog/ rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang // gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba// bsam
310b1(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis ni rnams mi skyer na// tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu na mkha'i khams bkang nas// sgra skad drag po bton nas ni// thams ca
310b2(rnying rgyud): ma lus thul bar bya// dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur// tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang // tshe bsgrub dang ni bsgrub chen dang // thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las rnams
310b3(rnying rgyud): grub par byed// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma// dkar mo'i mdog lo 'od 'phro 'bar// phyag ni ron chen gang ba yin// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
310b4(rnying rgyud): bcu na// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin// de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med// yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di// rnam gsum tshul gyis/ 
310b5(rnying rgyud): ma 'khrul par// sngags bzlas cho ga par ma gcod// 'dris gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya// oM oM a~M oM oM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M/ sAM sAM sAM sAM sAM/ AM AM AM AM A/ hUM hAMH
310b6(rnying rgyud): hAMswaM bI bruM brA bru brA bA dwe bA bA bAM/ dzA dzA dz+ra dzA dzA/ A A A A A/ yu lu yu yu yu/ she she she she shaM/ hUM hU hU d+hU hUM/ a a a a ai/ oM tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bder gshes
310b7(rnying rgyud): la yang tshe dngag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni// phyogs bcu na mkha'i khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom
310b8(rnying rgyud): 'gro lnga tshe rnams dbang du bsdu// phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og gi 'jig rten khams bkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par
311a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams bkrugs te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang // bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las// ni tshe rab
311a2(rnying rgyud): tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i 'bra las bstims nas ni// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de// nri yi gnas lngar bstim par bya// oM oM badz+ra ka pa tsa badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a
311a3(rnying rgyud): d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra swAhU~M/ phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig to// 'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyingasu thim// oM yid bzhin bum pa'i rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen
311a4(rnying rgyud): phreng bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // 'bru lha spos lnga yungs dkar lnga// sngags mkhan rab bstan blo ldan pas// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom/ 
311a5(rnying rgyud): brgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil 'khor thams ca da 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu de yis// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs
311a6(rnying rgyud): kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las tshe'i cho ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
311a7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje sdud pa pos 'gro ba lnga dbang med par smra zhes bya bar yang bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings// kun tu bzang po thugs
311a8(rnying rgyud): rje'i ngang // sku gsung thugs ldan yon+dan rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis// rdo rje rab tu kun sbyar te// oM dang muM du 'byor par bsgom// thams cad
311b1(rnying rgyud): dbyings su thim par bsgom// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang // thig le man+ta de dag tu// ni thal man+t+ra bzang po'i thig/ rta babs sgo khyud bzang po dang // rdo rje rtse gcig 'od 'bar dang // 
311b2(rnying rgyud): 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu dam pa yis// rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum bri// dkyil 'khor rgyu dang ldan par bya// mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par 'bul// yum dud ka'i ye shes 'bros nas// a las
311b3(rnying rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dza las lcags kyu grangs med pas// de yis snying du zhugs par bya// ma lus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dza las lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying ka nas/ 
311b4(rnying rgyud): drangs te de'i khar gzhug bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dza las lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying ka nas// grangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// sngags 'di
311b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu brjod par bya// oM dzaHhUM baM hoHa nri pri du// ming bra/ bi sha/ ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya// lag gnyis/ sor mo spyir bsnol te// khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni// 
311b6(rnying rgyud): srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bo gnyis// bar du mthe bo da drangs te// oM ming pra be sha A A// thal ba yungs dkar drag tu rdeg/ ming de khong du zhugs par bya// babs nas rdo rje lcags sgrogs
311b7(rnying rgyud): zhags pas bcing // gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni// lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa// lha zhig na ni mchod par bya// gdon zhig na ni tsan dan gur gum bsres nas ni// de blud sngags 'di rab
311b8(rnying rgyud): tu brjod par bya// oM badz+ra d+ha ka kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gal te sma ru mi btub na// lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te// khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung sbyar// gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru
312a1(rnying rgyud): gtug/ sngags oM badz+ra b+ha sha bi dze pra be sha hUM hUM zhes lan mang du bzlas pas/ ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'// bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam// lces
312a2(rnying rgyud): thor to a dkar po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du// oM dza d+hi dmar po bsgom byas na// gdon mi za bar smra bar 'gyur// bdag nyid Ta ki hUM bsgoms la// a dang nI la sogs pa'i/ 
312a3(rnying rgyud): lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung // o Ta ki hUM dang rang sngags kyis// lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug par bya// pra be shas kyang bzlas par bya// gzhan yang dzaHhUM baM hoHste// gnag
312a4(rnying rgyud): cing dbab pa'i sa de ni// byis pa lo drangs bcu gnyis pa/ gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya// thig le bum pa me long 'bar// gzhan yang gnas rnams thams
312a5(rnying rgyud): ni// smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs// phyag rgya rdo rje sbar mo/ sder// dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug/ dzaHhUM dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdu// bcol cing bya ba de bani/ 
312a6(rnying rgyud): Ta ki hU~M dzas mi btab na// ha ya grI ba gnas dang yul// zur phyir mgo mjug mnan nas ni// drag tu bzlas shing lcags kyu dgug/ srog gi snying po ma nor bar// gzir cing drag du dang
312a7(rnying rgyud): bar bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dgug pa'i thabs yod ci yang rung // nem nur med par dgug par bya// bya ba sna tshogs las zin na// sngar byas bum pa lnga po la// 
312a8(rnying rgyud): sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// rigs kyi yum dang bdud rtsi 'khyil// ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang // gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang rung // oM badz+ra a mri ta a a a/ oM mahA
312b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra a mri ta phaT/ dza gad dza gad tsa zhes kyang brjod do// oM bud+d+ha lo tsa ni swAhA zhes bzlas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa der// ye shes lnga rdzogs nyid la brjod// ye shes snying po khyod nyon
312b2(rnying rgyud): cig/ yang nas yang du mngon gsal du// byang chub mchog gis rtag bsgoms shig/ de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brda phrad skad kyis dngos
312b3(rnying rgyud): grub thob ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang che du brjod do// pra dbab pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / dpal shrI he ru kas yum kro d+ha shwar
312b4(rnying rgyud): dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad nas byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang pos spros nas 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen po dang / dbang po dang / rgyal po dang / 
312b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dang / blon po dang sde dpon dang / 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa tha mas cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te 'jig byed chen po
312b6(rnying rgyud): rnams da ltar dang / dus phyi ma'i dusul la no tshe 'phel ba'i lasu bskos/ la la ni lo spyod 'phel bar bskos// la la ni 'byung ba chen mo la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos// la la ni
312b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs mi snang ba 'gro bar bskos// la la ni gzugs sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur bar bsgos// la la ni mi 'thun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos// la la ni nyams shing rmongs
312b8(rnying rgyud): bar bskos// le la ni bsgoms shing 'gro bar bzhis/ gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci 'dod pa bskos nas che du brjod po 'di brjod de// mnyam nyid rigs pa'i rdo rje yis// 'jig cen
313a1(rnying rgyud): gtso mchog dbang du bsdud// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba'i don rnams sna tshogs bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// ji ltar dmigs
313a2(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du 'grub// 'di ni rang byung lha yi lha// byams dang snying rje ldan par rol// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// thams cad kun la sbyor 'gyur yang // bag chags stsogs par
313a3(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur te// bsod nams ye shes tshegs 'gyur rdzogs// thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par// gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtogs rdul tsam med// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir/ 
313a4(rnying rgyud): rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// de nas bdag nyid rgyu dad don gong nas 'byung ba bzhin lha khro bo dang ni bde dag gang la goms par bsgom/ ting 'dzin la su
313a5(rnying rgyud): rung ba lha gsal bar gyur pa dang / rang gi lha'i bzlas pa 'duna'abum gdon to// lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir lcagasaklu zhags pa s+pho ta baM/ mahA de bA hUM dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoH/ lha yi
313a6(rnying rgyud): dbang po'i snying ka nas// yang nas yang du rnam par drang // ma ma trag sha ma hA de ba gri hA na gri ha na hUM hUM/ lha'i gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar// lus ni rin cheni kun gyis brgyan/ 
313a7(rnying rgyud): na yid bzhin rin chen 'bar// lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni// yid bzhin rin chen bum chu ga sol// yon+tan rin chen sna lnga ste// lha rnams kun gyi re bskong // btsun mo ud ma
313a8(rnying rgyud): ta gnas pa// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan// bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang // lha yi gzugs ni snga ma'i tshul// lha yi sa bon 'bum phrag du// srog dang ldan par bzlas
313b1(rnying rgyud): brjod bya// mdun nas dzaHhUM ba hos drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// je nye jenye gnyis med par// lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ lha chen 'khor ba
313b2(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyang // de grub dbang byed 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi bsgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs// byang chub sems mchog
313b3(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub tu// rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdus// bdag nyid rigs bzhi'i he ru ka/ gong don byung ba bzhin
313b4(rnying rgyud): du bsgom// lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing // lha'i gzugs/ tshul gsal bar bsgom// bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par// yang dag don du gsal bar bsgom// de nas
313b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po yul 'khor srung // gzugs ni gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// mchod sbyin 'od zer rgya dang ldan// lag g.yas rdo rje tra shul la// lag g.yon bdud rtsi bum pa gsol// in+d+ras
313b6(rnying rgyud): ya swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ tra mi tra hUM hUM su ra ta bag ta dzA dzA dzA dzA hUM hUM/ zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas// bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka 'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis// lha'i snying po'i dbang po'i snying
313b7(rnying rgyud): nas drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nyid lha'i dbang gyur nas// las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhug/ thams cad thams cad grub par byed// kun la 'byin cing kun la za/ 
313b8(rnying rgyud): lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun// ma lus par ni yang dag 'du// bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang // rgyal po 'phags skyes bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka/ sku
314a1(rnying rgyud): mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin// phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te// 'od kyi 'phro 'du byin brlabs kyis// 'phags skyes bon dbang du bsdus// d+h+r-i ta d+h+r-i ta swA hA/ 
314a2(rnying rgyud): hUM baM ho/ g+hi hA g+h+ri h+na dur bid swA hA/ hang hang hang rad na dzaHhUM ba~M ho/ zhes snying po lan 'bum du bzlas te// srog dang ldan par ting 'dzin bya// bdag nyid rang na he ru kaM/ 'phags skyes pa yi/ 
314a3(rnying rgyud): snying ka nas// ji yis rab tu bzung nas ni// bdag gi mdun du dgug par bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang // gang 'dod las de bye du gzhug/ mdog ni gse
314a4(rnying rgyud): gyis mdog tu 'bar// 'khor rnams thams cad bdag labasdu// yod bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub/ rgyal po mag ngan bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka/ sku
314a5(rnying rgyud): mdog gong gi snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te// snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas// ting dzin phyag rgya bsgyur rung zhing // lha nyid ni gsal gyur nas/ 
314a6(rnying rgyud): rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni// shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste// lag g.yas bdud rtsi bum pa gsol// lag g.yon bdud rtsi lnga yi tshul// nub phyogs klu rnams re bskong // sbrul/ 
314a7(rnying rgyud): 'go dgu yi gdengs ka can// de ni rab tu dbang sdu phyir// b+hi ru ta ka swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoHnA ga shi ni bi ya phag sha phag dzaHhUM baM hrIH'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni// de ni bdag gi dbang du bsdu/ 
314a8(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas// mig mi bzang gi snying ka nas// dza yis rab tu gzung nas drang // rgyab na rdo rje can gyis phul// de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i// dbyer med pa
314b1(rnying rgyud): ni gyur pa dang // ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus par// dbang gi las rnams 'grub par byed// rgyal po rnam thos bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid khro bo bdu/ 
314b2(rnying rgyud): rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin// gsal zhing 'od 'phro rab bsgoms shing // rang sngags snying po 'bum phrag bzlas// ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang // rnam thos dag
314b3(rnying rgyud): ni rab tu 'grub// gzugs ni rin chen bai DUr+ya// yang na mdog ni sngo zhing 'tsher// phyag g.yas rin chen dbyig to thogs// g.yon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol// dbu la rin chen sna tshogs
314b4(rnying rgyud): mdzes// bai shra ma Na ye swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoHku be re/ kang kang / yang yang / dzaHhUM baM hoH'bum du bzlas shing srog yod par// / yang dang yang du bzlas par bya// bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/ dza
314b5(rnying rgyud): yis rnam thos snying nas drangs// dbang du yang dag bsdu ba/ ra bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin 'khor rnams bran bzhin
314b6(rnying rgyud): bsdu// rin chen spros shing las rnams bsgrub// ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lha chen po bsgrub pa dang // rgyal po chen po bzhi po dkyil 'khor bkod cing
314b7(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la shin du rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangaso// hUM gtum chen
314b8(rnying rgyud): dus mtha' me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyis gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin// mche bzang yag za byed che ho// hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong 'dir// thug che ma ri
315a1(rnying rgyud): 'bum bsnyil skad// a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che// dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yug pa che ho// hUM khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che ye shes dkyi' 'kho kun tugs ra
315a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i yis kun tu 'jos// sna tshogs yis thig le che ho/ hUM khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros
315a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i thig le che ho// hUM bdud kun gyis ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho// hUM rdo rje brag chen
315a4(rnying rgyud): srab bo// rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung te 'thor rlung che ho// zhes che du blangaso// gsang ba'i snyi dang po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa
315a5(rnying rgyud): drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang
315a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dper med par yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'das shing bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan
315a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyir che du brjod pa 'di gsung so// kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i// thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing // yul
315a8(rnying rgyud): dang rtog pa gnyis med par// gang gis de ltar rig pa de// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dang 'di la
315b1(rnying rgyud): gnas// lha spyod 'thun pas zhal mthong yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med pa'i// mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub lhun
315b2(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i// de ltar gang gis rtogs 'gyur ba// de ni ye shes gnyis can te// de yis yang dag snying po mthong // de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa// shin du sra zhing brtan pa yin// rang bzhin
315b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas 'od gsal ba// sems dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs// de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin// de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub yin// de bzhin gshegs dang
315b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes lnga// rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rno/ ngag nyid bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis// lha gsal da dngos po med bsgoms na// mthong thos la sogs med pa'i
315b5(rnying rgyud): tshul// rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// 'grub 'gyur nyid na dngos po med// ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis// bdud dpung
315b6(rnying rgyud): dkyil du ta la btsugs// thams cad byang chub shing bsdus te// gdug pa dang gis mi dga' nas// ta la bcad bskams yong mi gcod// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin// bdag dang
315b7(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin mthong gyur pa// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bsgoms te// ting 'dzin shin tu 'dris gsal na// thams cad rdo rje nyid 'gyur// kun la dbang sgyur ci/ 
315b8(rnying rgyud): mi tshugs// bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med de// las 'thun ji ltar snang ba bzhin// bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod cig/ de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor
316a1(rnying rgyud): yang dag yin// chen po rags pa thabs kyis rtogs// so so'i mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtog/ gnyis med 'brel pa thabs chen yin// kun kyang shes rab ngang du gnas// 
316a2(rnying rgyud): snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos phyir// g.yo dang med pa gnyi ga med// gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru med// mnyam pa'i dbyingasu thams cad 'dus// 'dus
316a3(rnying rgyud): nyid gnasu thebs pa yis// thams cad de lta bu yi ngang // mnyam gnyis dbyer med sus mi tshugs// de nyid sems dpa' bzhugs gnas yin// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de/ ses
316a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' nyid dang rigs 'thun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la// gzhi rtsa de ba bzhin nyid gcig/ sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul// snang ba
316a5(rnying rgyud): nyid ni dngos po med// dngos nyid de nyid sna tshogs ston// phung / po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnams ses byang chub sems yul dus po de chen mo yin// bdag rtog rnam pa
316a6(rnying rgyud): khro bo yin// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo yin// de sems rang rig nyid ces bya// thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun tu bzang // de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin// gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur na// 
316a7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs 'thun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang // sgra yis mtshon nas don bstan pa// kun
316a8(rnying rgyud): kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin// gang yang dngos po ma yin te// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang // snang ba nyid na gang yang med// bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang // dngos po med de yang
316b1(rnying rgyud): dag nyid// de ni ces kyang mi tshugs pa'i// sa rdo dran med ma yin te// de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas// gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni// rigs mchog da
316b2(rnying rgyud): ba rgyu yin te// rdo rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir// de nyid rdo rje nal mthong yin// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // byang
316b3(rnying rgyud): chub sems la gnas bcas pas// dper na mngal dang sgo nga yi// mngon du ma gyur bsgribs gyur kyang // rtsal chen 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin// rnam rtogs gzugs ni bor ma thag
316b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhing // rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa yi// dngos grub mchog rnams yongasu rdzogs// bde ba can
316b5(rnying rgyud): gyi zhing yang thog// byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur/ lha mi rnams kyi ston pa po// lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ 
316b6(rnying rgyud): tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur// bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod// tha mar skye rgan mchi la sogs pa'i// sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin
316b7(rnying rgyud): te// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje rigasu 'dren par byed// bdud sde tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor
316b8(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// mi rtag pa yi tshul yang ston// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul// bla med theg pa sangs rgyas tshul/ lhun
317a1(rnying rgyud): grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings// kun la 'thun pa'i tshul yang ston// rang bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du kun tu ston// chos rnams ma
317a2(rnying rgyud): lus thams cad kun// de lta bu yi ngang du gnas zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// nyid la nyid de skad ces brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab
317a3(rnying rgyud): gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod
317a4(rnying rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir// dam tshigasum rgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas// sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du che du brjod pa 'di// brjod do// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed// log rtog
317a5(rnying rgyud): mi bzad rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khya ba// 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang // rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang / 
317a6(rnying rgyud): rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mthon dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtogs nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na/ 
317a7(rnying rgyud): de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo yod min na// nyon mongs spangs shing byang chub med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas// cir yang su// 
317a8(rnying rgyud): zhing cir yang 'grub// rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu macir yang 'grub// gnas ngan dus na log rtogs nyid// gzung 'dzin bral ba nyid
317b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs nas// bdag med ye shes rang bzhin nyid// snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis// cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// so so rang bzhin nges zhe na// yang dag lam nyid
317b2(rnying rgyud): bcos su med// de bas yang dag blo tshon gyis// thams cad dngos po med par bshad// dper na dug gi rigs shes pas// dug gis mi tshug bzhin du snang // ha la ha la'i dug rnams
317b3(rnying rgyud): kyang // bsgrubs na ra sa ya na'i sman// bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan nyid ma nor rtogs pas na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur/ sku
317b4(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang // gang na med de de yin te// nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang // rang dang spyi yi don pa rtags na// mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag/ so so'i
317b5(rnying rgyud): rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du ni rnam par spro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes ra ba dbyingasu rnam par sbyor// gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni// 
317b6(rnying rgyud): ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te// gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad// rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo nyid la sogs brtag pa/ 
317b7(rnying rgyud): rtog nyid sgyu ma klung gyur te// log rtog pa yi rgyun yin la// thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste// bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi
317b8(rnying rgyud): rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// ma rig pa ni spang du med// rig pa yang dag bsgrub du med// thams cad dbyingasu ro gcig thim// sgyu ma dngos por rtog pa ni// sgyu ma rtog nyid
318a1(rnying rgyud): dmigs pa// mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang // skyes pa nyid na chos nyid cig/ dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// de nyid chos su phyag rgya che// mi dmigs smra mar
318a2(rnying rgyud): dngos po la// rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid kyang // chos nyid mi dmigs ye nas dag/ sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// yod med gnyi ga dbyer med pas// ting 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas// thug
318a3(rnying rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// chos nyid dmigasu med pa ste// mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spros// 'dul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// de ltar gti mug spang du med// 
318a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin// zhe sdang rang dang spyir bsta/ ngan pa// kun nas mnar sems rtog pa yi// sgyu ma'i dngo// das po thams cad kun// 'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can// 
318a5(rnying rgyud): spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// zhe sdang snying rje spangs bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyingasu ro gcig phyir// sgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa/ 
318a6(rnying rgyud): dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na// sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang // chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan ste// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin ni/ 
318a7(rnying rgyud): bdag srog gso ba'i rang bzhin med// snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings// mnar sems sgyu ma chos nyid// thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin yin// kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya// 
318a8(rnying rgyud): mi dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar// rtog pa kun nas mnar sems te// chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs te// chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmig phyir don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste// ting 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyu
318b1(rnying rgyud): na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa// 'dul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid kyi
318b2(rnying rgyud): rab brtags na// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med// nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// khong nas 'gying zhing khengs sems pa// pha rol zil gyi gnon par byed/ 
318b3(rnying rgyud): spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyingasu ro gcig pas// kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying zhing // deng ni/ 
318b4(rnying rgyud): nyid las mi gzhan te chos nyid mi dmigs 'gying bar skyes nga // skye 'gying nyid na chos nyid// 'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs dag/ 'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir// chos sku
318b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu ma 'gying // 'gying bas zil gyis gnon pa nyid// chos kyi dbying las mi gzhan te// sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med phyir// don
318b6(rnying rgyud): dam kun rdzob gnyi ga gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni// nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag
318b7(rnying rgyud): rgya chen po yin// nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// zhi bsgrub nga rgyal spang du med// 'dod chags rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// sreg pa kun la zhen pa ste/ 
318b8(rnying rgyud): spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chags spangs ma chags bsgrub du med// chos kyi dbyingasu ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'dod/ 
319a1(rnying rgyud): cing chags pa sgyu ma sred// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams bdag las mi gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de
319a2(rnying rgyud): nyid sgyu mar skyes// spyod pa sgyu ma ro gcig phyir// chos nyid chos can dmigasu med// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'o// chos kyi sku yi phyag rgya yin// mi darigs sgyu mar 'dod cing chags// 'dod chan/ 
319a3(rnying rgyud): chos nyid mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// bden pa gnyi gar dbyer med gcig/ ting 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs dbyings nyid
319a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags spros pa ni// 'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// 'dod chags rang dang spyi yi tshan// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// chags
319a5(rnying rgyud): dang ma chags gnyis med pas// 'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med// pra dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// gzhan gyi/ phun sum tshogs pa la// sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gan
319a6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can// phrag dog spyi mtshan bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// phra dog spang zhing yangs bsgrub med// chos nyid ni ro gcig phyir// 
319a7(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la// phrag dog rtog pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// mi dmigs pa las mi bzhin te// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// phun sum tshogs pa'i lhag pa
319a8(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba yi// thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid de// dus gsum rgyal ba kun dbyer med pas// chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la// phrag dog rto/ 
319b1(rnying rgyud): pabar 'dzin pa dang // rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med pa'i// bden pa gnyi gar ro gcig pas// ting 'dzin gyi dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen / 
319b2(rnying rgyud): yin// mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun sum la// phrag dog rnam par spros nas ni// gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// phrag dog rang dang spyi brtan pa/ rnam
319b3(rnying rgyud): par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// dog pa spang zhing yangs bsgrub med// sems can rnam pa mang po kun// nang gi chen po lnga sogs bstan// rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// thabs dang
319b4(rnying rgyud): shes rab ma rtogs pas// ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin// de ltar nges par ci mthong na// sngags kyis yodasu zin pa'i nang // kun la gnod par byed mi nus// de bzhin
319b5(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab rtogs// dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur// thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na// lam gyi dge spyang stegs bcas kyang // mtho ris lha dang mi
319b6(rnying rgyud): ru skyes/ skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob// thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni// mtshams med sems can ma lus kun// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rjes bsad// bsod nams dpag tu
319b7(rnying rgyud): med pa thob// ma bsad na yang sems can yal bor te// snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phra dog chen po dag/ gang phyir byang chub sems
319b8(rnying rgyud): de ni// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal// nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs// ngo bo yin par gsal por gsungs// chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongasu dag
320a1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas// de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas// thabs
320a2(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// gsang sngags bla na med pa yi// thabs kyis
320a3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub// bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med// don dam cir yang ma grub la// sgra ma'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag gis zin pa ni// nyon mongs lam yang
320a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par grol// thabs chen dag gis ma zin na// dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yi ngas// nyon mongs 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang // rnam par grol
320a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyi/ ga yod pa ma yin pas// 'khor ba yongasu shes pa/ sa na// de ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// nyon mongs phyin ci log
320a6(rnying rgyud): rnams dag/ thabs la mkhas pas zin gyur yang // grol lo thar par mi 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed kun// rngon dang rmad 'tsha
320a7(rnying rgyud): ston pa'ang ltung // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang // phal la med pas mi rung na// sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yi// skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung // bdud rtsi dang du blangs par
320a8(rnying rgyud): gsungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med na// sku gsung rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur// grub pa'i rdza su de phyir gsungs// shes rab mnyam pa ma rtogs na// byol song la la chos dang ldan 'gyur 'ang
320b1(rnying rgyud): drang srong 'tsho dang rtag 'thun dang // ji srid 'tsho yi bar du 'dod pa spong byed pa// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// chos rnams thams cad yongasu dag pa yi// rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs
320b2(rnying rgyud): mngon// rgyu rnams rang bzhin dag pa dang // 'bras bu yongasu dag 'gyur te// rgyu yi mtshan nyid rnam par dag/ phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te// sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba// gzung
320b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i yul nyid 'byung ba che// rgyud nyid rang gi sems yin pas// 'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag/ 'bras bu yongasu dag pa ni// sems can kun gyi rus pa ste// rdo rje byang chub sems yin/ 
320b4(rnying rgyud): te/ sha ni pad+ma rag ta yin// dri chen dri chu gur gum chu// / so so'i lus la gnas pas dag/ don dam dmig das med dag pas ni// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang / 
320b5(rnying rgyud): gang gi ngo bo ma yin te// skye 'gag med pas ye nas dag/ kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang // chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas// mi dmigs
320b6(rnying rgyud): pa nyid sna tshogs snang // de bzhin gshegs par ye nas mnyam// de bas gtsang sme med par spyod// sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sman// gtse ru dang du blang bar bya// de bas sems can
320b7(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log/ chos rnams thad dag par ma shes te// thabs dang shes rab don ma rtog/ kha cig gis ni 'tshe ba'i bar du zos// kha cig gis ni drang srong ji bzhin du// sha spangs rtsa dang chu
320b8(rnying rgyud): la zos// zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs// rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni// rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa'i phyir// mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis rab rtogs pas// thabs dang / 
321a1(rnying rgyud): shes rab 'brel ba yi// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rtogs pa mtshan// gtsang dang mi gtsang rtogs pa mtshan ma nyid kyang rnams snga
321a2(rnying rgyud): te// mkhyen pas dbul la gnas mi 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i rdza su yang dag gsungs// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang // dri chen dri chu rag ta dag/ sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// dngos su
321a3(rnying rgyud): ya mtshan chen po 'grub// tshe la dbang dang rig pa 'dzin// mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs med 'grub// mthar ni skye med rdo rje yis// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// 'grub 'gyu/ 
321a4(rnying rgyud): 'di la the tshom med// gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis// yi dam mo spang rtag bsgom zhing // ye nas lha yi ma datshan nyid ni// dus gsum gshegs pa thams cad kyi
321a5(rnying rgyud): lha spangs dge spyang don med 'gyur// lha ni mi spang don nyid ni// lhun grub ye shes thams cad kyi// bdag dang gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i// dus gsum bde
321a6(rnying rgyud): gshegs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag po ste// yongasu rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don// dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs par spad pa'i don med 'gyur/ 
321a7(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na// yon+dan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor na su// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sku// 
321a8(rnying rgyud): gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs grub// rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya// byang chub ston pa 'dren pa po// long pa dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin// slob
321b1(rnying rgyud): dpon de la smod pa ni// dper na mun khung sgron bsad nas// mthong ba'i don ni mi rtogs bzhin// sdug bsngal nyam thag yun rings su// bskal pa mang por myong bar mngon// de bas
321b2(rnying rgyud): de la gus pa rtag tu gyis// lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po bas// shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya// drin chags bskyed pa'i pham pas// shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya// rdo rje mched dang lcam
321b3(rnying rgyud): dral ni// bla med byang chub zhing 'gro ba'i// chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthus// byang chub rin chen sar nges pas// de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni// rang la rang gis mtshon btab na/ 
321b4(rnying rgyud): rang srog tshe rabs lnga rgya'i bar// rang gis srog gcod pud de bar 'gyur// tshe 'di mi bde sna tshogs pa// mi bde ba bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang // 
321b5(rnying rgyud): ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa'i// sdug bsngal kha brgya da myong bar 'gyur// yun rings rtag tu mi thar pa 'i// shin tu nyam thag myong bar 'gyur// grub pa gcig/ 
321b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin lhan cig spyod// gnyis med dang bas rjes spyod spun// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin// shes rab gsal bas rtag tu gdung zhes gsungs// gsang ba gzhan la mi
321b7(rnying rgyud): bsgrags zhing // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis kyis// thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs nas// mnyam pa'i spyod pas la dor te// phul dang mi
321b8(rnying rgyud): 'dra yang dag rtogs// ma rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang // skye bo kun la rab tu gsang // gsang ba'i brda dag sna tshogs gsungs// thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin// gsang sngags
