322a1(rnying rgyud): skyon yod ma yin te// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas kyis// snod ma yin dang blo brtul rnams// las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang // brgya la gang zhig
322a2(rnying rgyud): gsang don 'di// las 'phro ngan la bsgrags 'gyur na// dper na gtsubs shing mes gtsubs nas// gtsubs shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang // gzhan yang tshig par gyur pa bzhin
322a3(rnying rgyud): chos don bzang po me dang 'dra// bskal pa chung zhing shes rab dman// blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams// mnyam pa nyid la skur 'debs pas// ngan song gsum du 'phangs par 'gyur
322a4(rnying rgyud): gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong gyur na// gsang ba 'phye lwa bar byed pa yang // smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing // sdug pa bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur// de phyir sems can don phyir
322a5(rnying rgyud): gsang // rlung phyogs tsam du brjod mi bya// sngags dang phya/ ga rgya rgyun mi gcad// sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags/ pa ni// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// mnyam pa chen
322a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thug/ 
322a7(rnying rgyud): dang ye shes lnga// bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya che// gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te// goms shing brtan par bya ba yin// de bas pa
322a8(rnying rgyud): chad brtson med na// dper na sa bon tshig pa las/ 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrub pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur// mi khom 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen
322b1(rnying rgyud): la zhugs pas// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la// dmigs med gcig dang du mar bral// mtha' dbus gang yang ma yin pa'i// ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med// mnyam pa'i phyag rgya chen
322b2(rnying rgyud): po yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// yon+tan skyon rnams skye 'gag med// gang ging bor ma grub mnyam// kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag
322b3(rnying rgyud): med// mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo min// chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par// snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa'i// phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang // dus gsum khams gsum thams cad dang 'jig
322b4(rnying rgyud): rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// yon+tan skyon rnams thams/ ca dang // sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas gnas// sngags 'chang rgyal po'i rtogs byas nas// bdag nyid chos nyid skye
322b5(rnying rgyud): 'gag med// ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na// phyag rgya che na po thams cad kyang // rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsu ma gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// thams
322b6(rnying rgyud): cad dbyer med ye mnyam la// mi 'dres rgya yongs ma chad pa'i// gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// sku gsung thugs kyi yen+tan bsam mi khyab// many+dzu
322b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgo// de ltar dam tshig 'di gsum ste// de la gnas na 'grub par 'gyur// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing // 'dod pa kun la long spyod bya/ lus
322b8(rnying rgyud): dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na// byang chub rab 'byams thob par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po las 'das na// nyen ni shin tu che bar gsungs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
323a1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa don grub pa// rmongs pas gal te 'das byas na// de yi srogs kyang der zad 'gyur// dam tshig bsrungs dang sngags bzlas dang // phyag rgya rgyun mi/ 
323a2(rnying rgyud): gcad pa bzhi// brtson 'grus che zhing brtan pas gzung // rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung gyur na// mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs// ji ltar ral gri so la nan tan du// skyes bus myur
323a3(rnying rgyud): du ma bzung na// lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur// de bzhin nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags la// 'chi 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni// sngags
323a4(rnying rgyud): kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal// don dam ma nyams dag byas shing // brtson 'grus cher skyed myur bar 'grub// / sngags bsgom ma nyams phyag rgya gsal// cho ga yo
323a5(rnying rgyud): byad gtsor ma gsungs// tshogs na yang ni nyes pa med// ma tshogs na yang nyes pa med// ma tshogs na yang 'dra ba par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gis lhar sbyor bas// dngos/ 
323a6(rnying rgyud): grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang // 'grub par 'gyur te nyes skyon med// ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dam tshig sum rgya pa rtsa ba bco lnga mdo bshad pa'i le'u steng/ 
323a7(rnying rgyud): cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos bzhugs gnas dang / spyod lam dang / lta stangs bstan pa/ theg pa chen po'i lhun grub don 'dod na/ rgyal
323a8(rnying rgyud): chen zab yangs shes rab myur// zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog bde// nga dang bdag med yangs pa bde// gan sa chos dbyings gnyis med bstan// thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams/ 
323b1(rnying rgyud): thams cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gtum// che chung byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor// g.yog 'khor lha srin sde mang gtso// bdag gi mtshan gzugs shin tu spags// chos dbyings mkha'
323b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil yangs pa la// shes rab myur du mngon 'gro ba// 'gro med 'ong med mi gnas pa// byang chub sems mchog a re bde// shes rab zad med dkyil 'khor la// thugs rje rol pa'i
323b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes 'byo// gnyis med dbyings sbyor a re bde// ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyingasu// ye shes sgron ma'i mda' 'phangs nas// gti mug mun pa rnam bsal te// rang bzhin 'od gsal
323b4(rnying rgyud): bde ba'i mchog/ dge dang mi dge gnyisu med// rnam rtog mtshan ma yong mi 'dzin// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gas la ba'i// dge sdig med pas shin tu bde// bde dang mi
323b5(rnying rgyud): bde gnyis med pas// ye shes chags med rnam par dag thams cad dbyer med ye shes yin// sems nyid dang bas a re bde// rgyan du dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes
323b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi// phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i ngang // ye shes blo brtan shin tu bde// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo mi 'dzin// thams cad ches
323b7(rnying rgyud): nyid ro gcig pas// gnyis med pas ni shin tu bde// shes rab chung chen ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad mo nor gzhung lugs bzhin// 'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal med// gnyis med
323b8(rnying rgyud): tshim pas a re bde// thams cad ma lus gcig pa'i ngang // lha dang lta ba gnyis ka med// ye shes sgron ma bsgreng bar ni// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong // 'di dang phar// 
324a1(rnying rgyud): gnyis med phyir// 'gro dang 'gro bar bya ba min// yan lag stabs chen ma mchongs par// phyogs bcu stong khams thams cad na// thub mchog ston pa'i spyod yul ni/ 
324a2(rnying rgyud): ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// chos rnams thams cad dmigasu med// chos nyid sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// zag med zab pas don rtags na// dag par ma gyur gang yang med// ye
324a3(rnying rgyud): shes ma bcos kun tu gsal// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o// ye nas de ltar gnas mod kyang // ma rig rmongs pa'i ling tog gis// gsal ba'i sgrol ma bsgribs gyur te// khams
324a4(rnying rgyud): gsum mun nag rgyun du 'khor// rnam rtog mtshan mar la 'dzin pa yis// lus dang longs spyod gnas dang ni// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong // de la su zhig byed pa/ 
324a5(rnying rgyud): yod// yang dag mthu chen sus ma byas// rang la rang gis ba cings par zad// thams cad ma lus cho su cog/ snying po yid pa ma yin te// sgyu ma mig yor sprul pa dang / 
324a6(rnying rgyud): smig rgyu 'ja' tshon chu zla'i tshul// de ltar gang gis rab rtogs pa// de nyid sangs rgyas yin par bshad// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// skye med phun sum tshogs yin te// 
324a7(rnying rgyud): byed med pa yi mchog kyang rdzogs// zhes nyid la nyid brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bzhugs gnas khang pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
324a8(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// rdo rje ning chen bsgrub 'dod pas// thams cad skye shi med pa'i tshul// mnyam nyid dag pa nyid bsgom// 3
324b1(rnying rgyud): po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi// dzaHhUM baM hos dgug par bya// bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par// yang nas yang du bsgrub par bya// sku rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang // zhing chen 'og
324b2(rnying rgyud): tu bzhugs par bya// dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// mngag pa'i pheM nya phyogs bcur gtang // thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// bsgrub pa
324b3(rnying rgyud): gcig gam yang na gnyis// gsum dang lnga ru bsgom par bya// pho nya mang pos ni bkug nas// zhing la yang nas yang du bzhug/ snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung // de nas bdud rtsi'i ting
324b4(rnying rgyud): gyis// lan grangs 'bum phrag mang por ni// bzlas pa'i tshul yang rnam gsum dag/ rdo rje sngags bzlas rtse mo gsum// de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung // 'od zer
324b5(rnying rgyud): lnga dang ldan par bya zhing de lde ldem por gyur dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bskul bar bya// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga dang god// gsal zhing 'tsher bar bsgom par bya// dbang
324b6(rnying rgyud): bo lnga dang dbang po'i tshul// yan lag lnga la rig lnga'i tshul// rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis bsgom// de nas zhing de 'gul 'gyur nas// zhing de drag tu 'gul ba dang // shin tu zhags
324b7(rnying rgyud): sdum par bya// yan lag rnams kyang gsum par bya// phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa bstan// ha ya gri ba'i skur bsgom shing // sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas// phyogs bcur spro
324b8(rnying rgyud): zhing zhing la bstim// de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas// rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis ni// brtan pa nyid bsgom par bya// de nas par bar byed pa dang // a nr-i pre du gang yin pa// rdo rje drug/ 
325a1(rnying rgyud): tu brdeg cing dbab// thod pa'i kha nas ni phyung nas// rdo rje ting 'dzin so yis bcad // rdo rje sngags zos khong du bstim// gnyisu med par bsgom par
325a2(rnying rgyud): bya// de nas zhing de langs pa dang // rdo rje dbyings nas dbang yang bskur// bdud rtsi chu yang blung bar bya// las rnam thams cad byedadu gzhug/ zhing des rab tu smras pa'i tshig/ dpa' bo tsa
325a3(rnying rgyud): gyi mi rgas skye med chos rnams dang // las rnams ma lus kun bgyid// de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gyis// thal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod
325a4(rnying rgyud): dang /  ri brag gnyen po bgegs gnas dang // nags khro dang stong pa tsher ma can// ro bos bskor ba'i lcug ma dan// rab tu rnam par dben pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung
325a5(rnying rgyud): gnas// de dag tu ni bsgrub par bya// dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang // bcu drug man chad bsgrub par bya/ the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad
325a6(rnying rgyud): rnams// lam lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas// 'bru rnams thams cad bcang bar bya// rtag tu tshegs chen mchod par bya// gsum dang lnga ru bar mi gcod// kha zas rnams kyang thod par
325a7(rnying rgyud): bza'// btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te// mar me rtag par gtang bar bya/ rgyu ni nri yi mar las bya// yan lag bsku ba'ang de bzhin to// sdong bu pad+ma'i rgyu
325a8(rnying rgyud): las bya// gnod ni dung chen srubs med pa// lcang lo'i yod dang med kyang rung // de byi pu tra ma byung ba// mdag ni ban lang can la yod// rdo rje bsgrub pa bar gcod phyir// rtag tu mtshams
325b1(rnying rgyud): nigacad par bya// ni yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon nas// sbom po ma yin phra ba nyid// de la kaM la ya byas nas// phur ba'i sngags dang khro sngags kyis// lan 'bum du ni bzlas par bya// lag pa g.ya
325b2(rnying rgyud): g.yon thal sor la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'od 'bar gzungs kyi sku ru bsgom// de nas gnyis med sbyor tshul du// sgrub pa rdo rje bsgom par bya// bsgrub pa dngos la ma gtogs pa/ \u0f7f
325b3(rnying rgyud): bcu rnamasu mtshams kyang gcad// dngos grub ma thob bar du ni// bsgom dang bzlas dang phyag rgya gsum// bag yod mag la me 'bar bzhin// bar mtshams med par bsgrub par bya// de lta
325b4(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis// lha ma srin rnams bran bzhin 'khol// 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang du sdud// rdo rje rigs mchog 'khor rkyen rnams// yod bzhin du ni
325b5(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni// lus sbed/ nus nas mngon du dbyung // de ma yin par shin du ga sang // sku'i bsgrub pa nges pa'i don du bka' stsal to// ro// 
325b6(rnying rgyud): langs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro bar gar rtse 'jo bro gar gyi dam tshig ces bya ba nges par che du brjedado// phyogs
325b7(rnying rgyud): bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi// thams cad dbyer med maN+Da la'i// nyi zla shar ba'i gzhal yas la// pad+ma chags med gdan gting nas// rin chen zad med pho brangs// che chung dpag
325b8(rnying rgyud): tu med pa yi// byang chub bde ldan dkyil 'khor la// bde ldan byang chub rab bkod nas// ma lus kun bsdus dbyings bsdus te// lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs dang // dbang
326a1(rnying rgyud): po lnga yi lha sprod kun// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// gong gi dkyil 'khor chad nyi zla// mi 'khrugs pa'i sa gzhi la// pad+ma ma chags gdan bting nas// thabs pa
326a2(rnying rgyud): shes rab chags med tshul// yan lag dbang po thams cad kun// rang bzhin yongasu dag pa dang // ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs lnga'o// ye nas ma bcings yongs kyis te// lhag pa
326a3(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor// yan lag bzhi la rigs bzhi 'khor// kha dog dbyibs dang phyag rgya dang // thabs dang shes rab gsal bsgor/ 
326a4(rnying rgyud): te/ phyogs bcur spro zhing ngan song sbyong // gnasu bsdud zhing dkyil 'khor spro// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// bder gshegs zhing du rnam par sbyor// yan lag
326a5(rnying rgyud): chen po lnga bskyod na// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor ma lus g.yo// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du mdzad// snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par dag/ bzang mdzes legs pa'i gos dgo/ 
326a6(rnying rgyud): na// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur// de nas mthar thug med pa'i bar// ye shes lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// rtag tu dkyil 'khor de ltar
326a7(rnying rgyud): bsgom// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting du// bdag dang dbyer med nyi du'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur nas// shar gyi phyogasu kha bstan te// seng+ge'i stabs chen mchong bar bya// 
326a8(rnying rgyud): ljags kyi yi ge traM bsgoms la// lce ni 'bum phrag bsam yas dang // hri yang bsam gyis mi khyab spro// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam ya su// gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba kams
326b1(rnying rgyud): gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag na// bsam gyis ma khyab kun tu grags// sgra dang ming tshig so sor gsal// lcags kyi dbang po bkram nas gsungs// thar dang mthar gnyi ga brjod// 
326b2(rnying rgyud): nges pa kho bo na yang dag tu// de bzhin nyid kyis yong ma gsungs// sna yi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du// traM ga~M yig 'bru gsal bsgoms nas// dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi// 
326b3(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste// traM yang bsams pas 'od 'phro 'bar// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma lus thos// 'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas kyang thos// sgra dang thos pa gnyis
326b4(rnying rgyud): med pa'o// de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams// so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas// yig 'bru'i snying po dngan ngan dgod// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// chags
326b5(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol// dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis// kun la tshim par yang dag mchog/ 'gro drug ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don yang byed// 
326b6(rnying rgyud): thabs mkhas thugs rjes de ltar ston// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms
326b7(rnying rgyud): te// tshem bu gcig gam yang na gsum// lnga yi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te// thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du// lha gsal 'od 'phro bstim byas te// dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar ba
326b8(rnying rgyud): bsgom// ting 'dzin shin tu gsal gyur nas// bdag dang phyogs bcu'i dbyer med par// gnyisu med par bsgom par bya'o// de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis// lha spyod ya char
327a1(rnying rgyud): ma gyur par// dkyil 'khor dag la bsal bsgoms na// dbus nas shar phyogs kha bstan nas// rkang pa'i stabs chen bskyod byas shing // lag gi 'du byed
327a2(rnying rgyud): kun bskyod nas// bro dang gar gyi phyag rgyar bya// dkyil 'khor 'od zer dkar 'phro ba// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag/ shin tu gsal dang 'od zer 'bar// thabs dang shes rab de grub
327a3(rnying rgyud): shog/ cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yi// bdud bzhi dag ni 'jom par byed// theg mchog rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin pa// thabs dang shes rab de grub shog/ bdag nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// nyon
327a4(rnying rgyud): mongs sdug bsngal med par shog/ me long lta bu'i ye sheras kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal gyur shog/ nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// ma rig mun pa med
327a5(rnying rgyud): par byedate thugs rje'i 'od zer nyi shar bar// thabs dang / shes rab 'od 'bar shog/ shin tu bsra zhing skye shi me // rdo rje'i thugs rje rol ston pa// 'gro la thugs rje
327a6(rnying rgyud): yongs kyis 'byung // thabs dang shes rab byams ldan shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// yon+dan phyogasu kha bstan te// lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs nas/ stob
327a7(rnying rgyud): chen dag kyang brdung bar bya// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung ba'i gter// zad med nor bu rin po che// ma lus kun gyi re bskong // thabs dang shes rab de grub shog/ na mkha'i
327a8(rnying rgyud): kyi mdog bstan pa// yang na thams cad gser btsam// dkyil 'khor bsam yas zad mi shes// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ yon+tan rin chen bsam yas kyang / 
327b1(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa'i ngang gnas nas// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes te// thabs dang shes rab mnyam gyur shog/ bder gshegs yon+dan rmad po che// ye nas chags med byang chub zhing // yang dag
327b2(rnying rgyud): nyidu thams cad gnas// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// nub phyogasu ni khams bltas nas// yan lag dang po bskyod byas te// gar rnams
327b3(rnying rgyud): shin tu gsal byas nas// stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya// chos rnams ma lus kun spyod kyang // pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhi no// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// thabs dang shes
327b4(rnying rgyud): rab de grub shog/ las dang nyon mongs nub gyur pa'i// bag/ chags mtshan ma rdul tsam med// thabs dang shesadarab myur grub shog/ byang chub chags med dkyil 'khor
327b5(rnying rgyud): ni/ gang nas ma 'ongs nyid kyi dbyings// mi gnas tshul gyis dbyings na bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab myur gru ba shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// byang phyogs
327b6(rnying rgyud): ni kha bltas te// lus bskyod yan lag gar byed cing // phyag rgya so sor gsal gyur nas// rkang pa'i stabs chen brdung bar bya// yang dag rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// bskal pa bas
327b7(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i// sgrib pa thams cad byang byas nas// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdud bzhi bcom nas mi mthun bstsal// bya byed ce
327b8(rnying rgyud): la don rnams grub// thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa// sna tshogs ma lus 'gyur ba'o// ljang gu'i tshul du mdog bstan pa// thabs dang shes
328a1(rnying rgyud): rab myur grub shog/ thams cad ma lus don grub pa// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// nan tan chen po bya ba rdzogs// thabs dang shes ra sur gru/ 
328a2(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal dra ba tshar bcad de// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun byas kyang // gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/ bde gshegs ma lus thams cad kun
328a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs dus kun tu bdag nyid che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thabs chen dkyil 'khor yang dag pas// bder gshegs kun la rnam par
328a4(rnying rgyud): 'phro// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// bde ba'i dani dal 'khor mkhas pas bsdu// thams cad ma lus// rigs bzhi yi// nang du ma lus gang yang med// de nyid bde/ 
328a5(rnying rgyud): gshegs dkyil 'khor nyid// thabs dang shes rab bde grub shog/ rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dbur bsdu zhing / ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phro// phyogs bcu gsal ba
328a6(rnying rgyud): gang gyur nas// thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/ de bzhin rigs mchog 'dzin pa yi// thams cad ma lus dbyings bsdus te// thams cad kun tu bzang por ston// thabs da
328a7(rnying rgyud): shes rab gtsor grub shog/ thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs dus gnas pa ma lus la// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// thabs dang shes rab mchog 'grub shos
328a8(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyi sku yod pas// ma mthong rmongs la na mkha'i mdog/ thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog/ skra ni sna tshogs cir yang snang // thabs
328b1(rnying rgyud): chen rnams la mnyam pa'i tshul// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// pha rol phyin rdzogs shAkya'i tshul// lha mi rnams la dge bcu tshul du
328b2(rnying rgyud): 'gro rnams la e na ya// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du ston// de lta bu yi sku ston pa// thabs dang shes rab sku grub shog/ thabs dang shes rab ldan
328b3(rnying rgyud): bsgoms nas// rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgyan// yan lag lnga la dkyil 'khor bkod// ye shes rgyan gyis pho brang brdung // gnyis med dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul// mtha' dbus med
328b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor du// lhun grub tshegs chen byang chub tu// / thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/ chos dbyings dam pa bdag med pa// mi dmigs dbyingasu ma lus 'dus/ 
328b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med pas// thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub shog/ bde gshegs dkyil 'khor dbu bskyod na// sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus g.yo// 
328b6(rnying rgyud): lag gi 'du byed bskul bskyod na// rig 'dzin zhing khams dag par byed// rkang chen dag gis stag 'chongs na// 'gro drug gnas rnams stongs par byed// spyan gyis phyogs bcu/ 
328b7(rnying rgyud): blta byas na// bdud bzhi dpung rnams pham par byed// thabs dang shes rab ma lus kun// de lta bu yi don grub shog/ thams cad ma lus de bzhin te// de ni gang yang mi dmigs
328b8(rnying rgyud): la// skye dang 'gags dang gnas pa dang // 'od dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med// rnal 'byor bro gar rtse 'jo yi// sna tshogs byed la byas pa med// de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rnal 'byor
329a1(rnying rgyud): las rnams grub par shog/ thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// de lta bu yis longs spyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid
329a2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'gro rnams thams cad las// dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa// yun rings chos kyi bde spyad nas// bla med rdo rje sems dpa'
329a3(rnying rgyud): yis// dpe byad mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan// mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen// tshegs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang sgyur te// spyod yul
329a4(rnying rgyud): kun tu maN Da la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rnal 'byor la su rung rnams kyis// 'di lta bu yi las rnams bya// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // lus ngag
329a5(rnying rgyud): yid la dbang thob nas// sangs rgyas 'byung dang dkar mi 'gyu/ 8// theg pa dman par yong mi byed// ngan song gsum du yong mi ltung // gnas ngan longs spyod mi bde ba'i
329a6(rnying rgyud): ngan pa'i sa ru yong mi ltung // rdo rje theg mchog brjed mi 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// lus byad bzang zhing yan lag rdzogs// dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med// skad
329a7(rnying rgyud): gdangs snyan zhing 'gro don byed// bdag gi longs spyod thams cad kun// gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub// tshan po che yi mthu stobs ldan// 'gro ba'i don du yang dag byed// gan/ 
329a8(rnying rgyud): la gnod pa yong mi byed// snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan// mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pa// bdag dang gzhan don rdzogs par spyod// mthar ni skye shi med pa'o sa// sangs rgyas mon/ 
329b1(rnying rgyud): tan rin po che// bkod pa'i gnal yas thams cad la// dbang sgyur spyod pa'i dngos grub thob// rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di 'dra'i don// ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// gsang don nges pa'i don sto/ 
329b2(rnying rgyud): pa// bla med mchog tu grub par shog/ dbyer med byang chub thor tshugs can// shin tu bstan pa'i ri bo gnas// mu stegs rlung gis tshugs mi 'gyur// theg mchog rdo rje de lta bu// dkyil
329b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor mi zad 'byung ba'i gter// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// byi dor ma byas shin tu gsal// bskal pa grangs med gnas bcas kyang // sku ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul// skye shi med pa
329b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje yi// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter yin te// yon+tan du don sum tshogs dang ldan// bla med byang chub 'grub 'gyuranas// ye shes rdo rje lhun grub shog/ tshogs chen gnyis
329b5(rnying rgyud): kyang rdzogs gyur cig/ thams cad kun gyi ston pa po// tham sa cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog/ de rtags kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs/ sku
329b6(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs kyang grub par shog/ rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab ldan pa rnams kyis dus thams cad 'dod yon lnga spyod cing bro thabs bya'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
329b7(rnying rgyud): bro gar rtse 'jo'o le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du byung ste 'di skad ces gsung
329b8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan pas// sgyu dang dran pa 'brel 'gyur nas// sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas// 'thun pa'i rdo rje rang snang // rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba// rnam rtog 'thun pa'i la
330a1(rnying rgyud): snang ngo // de bzhin sku mchog dri bral dang // bder gshegs sku lngar mdor bsdus te// bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs// bla med gzugs dang rdo rje sku// de la sogs
330a2(rnying rgyud): de sku bsam yas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku ston pa// thabs kyis 'gro 'dul sku ston te// byang chub mchog gi rdo rje sku// chags med zhing du sku ston cing // dbyings las ma g.yas bzhin du sra
330a3(rnying rgyud): sku snod de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// rnam dag sku ston ma yin te// log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la// so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston// de tshe skye shi med pa'i sku// las dang ma chags pad+ma'i sku/ 
330a4(rnying rgyud): thor dang mthar sna tshogs kyang // sna tshogs snang la gnasadab med// snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med// de ltar rtogs pa'i darigs mchog ni// badz+re zhes ni gdags pa yin// ji snyed
330a5(rnying rgyud): sku ston bsam yas pa// thams cad ma lus rdo rje bsdu/ sa// 'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa ni// de la sogs te sku bsam yas// byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung sku
330a6(rnying rgyud): ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang // 'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra shes na// dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad// thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor snang // gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te// 
330a7(rnying rgyud): med de bzhin yong gi so// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'grub 'dod pas// rtag tu dus gsum thams cad// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med pas// ye nas dkyil 'khor yin par brtag/ 'di ni dngos
330a8(rnying rgyud): grub mchog yin par// kun tu rgyal gyis de skad bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u sku'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni rgyud kyi
330b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal po phyi ma las bshad// bod lam gyur zhes 'byung // rang bzhin sku'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud
330b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ting 'dzin gyi rim par sbyor zhing dngos grub myur du len pa'i thabs dra ba las 'di skad ces gsung so// dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni// mad
330b3(rnying rgyud): dbyings nas don 'byin te// ma bcos ji bzhin dang bzhag dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// ting 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na// 
330b4(rnying rgyud): ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams ca da moN+Da la// ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong // longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa smon pas
330b5(rnying rgyud): 'grub// yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod pa cud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// / de nas rdo rje mnyam yin// dngos grub myur du 'gruba'o// 
330b6(rnying rgyud): na/ shin du phra zhing zab par bsgom// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs dbyingasu bsgom// ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang // thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang sbru
330b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du shes par bya// de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas// de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang bsgrubs yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgom
330b8(rnying rgyud): kun du 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra// yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid// yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdu// nri yi mig gis bltar yod par// yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang // 'od zer mang po 'dra
331a1(rnying rgyud): bar bya// phyogs bcu dus bani gang ba dang // slar yang hUM la bstim par bya// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings thim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas a dkar 'bar// shin/ 
331a2(rnying rgyud): 'tsher bar gsal bsgoms la// thams cad a ru gyur par bsgom// de bzhin nyi 'dris 'gyur nas// a las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro// e ma gsal bar 'byor 'gyur nas// nyi zlag
331a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i nyi zlar bsgom// hri gsal pad+ma chags med bsgom// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang // thams cad sdu zhing phra bar bsgom// de bzhi yi/ 
331a4(rnying rgyud): ge hUM gnas pas// mthing ka 'tsher la gnas pa yi// 'o/ dad zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom// 'od 'phro dbyingasu pa slar bsdus na/ shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom// rdo rje
331a5(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phro gsal 'bar nas// dbyingasu yang ni bstim bar bya// de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas// shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom// de bzhin gnyis med gas/ 
331a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur nas// sku gcig rdo rje dril bur bsgom// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // dbu gsum phyag drug nyod du bsgom// gzhan yang khro 'dul sna tshogs bsgom// blo yi she rab che chung
331a7(rnying rgyud): las// rim pa bzhin du bsgom par ba// yang na gcig char bsgom par bya// nyi zla gzar skar dus gcig tu// chu dkyil dngas par gsal ba bzhin// de ltar goms rtogs
331a8(rnying rgyud): rigs mchog des// ji ltar dbang bsgyur bzhin du 'grub// mkha' la 'phya dang rigs 'dzin gnas// chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul// ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul// tshul
331b1(rnying rgyud): mi 'bying mes mi tshig/ dug dang mtshon gyis 'jig mi 'gyur// mi snang ba dang mang por spru le// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur zhing // tshe dang dus la
331b2(rnying rgyud): bsring bstung dang // stong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang // ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sbrul dang gcan zan gdugs pa rnams// khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud
331b3(rnying rgyud): dang gdug pa la sogs pas// tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa// ye shes bsod nams long spyod kyis// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog/ 
331b4(rnying rgyud): brnyes// thugs rje sprul pa'i byin rlabs kyis// so sorathar pa'i lam yang ston// 'gro ba ma lus don yang dbyed// las rnams thams cad kun byas nas// skye 'chi
331b5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i g.yung drung thob// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen ldan// mthar byin bya ba med pa 'grub// bsgrub med spangs med
331b6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi dbyings// 'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid// de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad// las ngan kun tu skye mi
331b7(rnying rgyud): theg pa dman par yong mi 'gyur// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang bar bya ba rgyud dngos grub thob/ 
331b8(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pargyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hon rnams 'phrin las 'di gsung so// dang bor dang na/ 
332a1(rnying rgyud): nyi du gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// de nas bdag gi snying khar a gsal zhing 'tsher ba gcig bsgom mo// a de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang phyogs bcu
332a2(rnying rgyud): 'od du 'bros par bsgom// 'od de slar a la bsdu zhing bstim// ma dang a la nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim zhing 'tsher la gsal bar bsgom// hri las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gas
332a3(rnying rgyud): par bsgom hUM shin tu 'od 'bar bsgom// snying gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' tshon gang ba gcig phyag rgya dang bcas par bsgom/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang / yig 'bru
332a4(rnying rgyud): dang / phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas/ 'bru gsum dang 'dabru lnga yang bzlas// 'dug 'bru bzhis mtshams gcad// rtag tu hom bya/ tshogs dang mchod pa yang bya// mang po mi nus
332a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i don du hom gang bgyi yang rung // dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso bor spyi ni rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang rdo rje da bang pad+ma he ru ka/ rgyas pa rad na he ru ka/ zhi ba bud+yA he ru ka/ spyan
332a6(rnying rgyud): drang ba ni oM h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka zhes hom gang byed pa'i lha gtso bo nas spyan drang / mchod pa dang arga dbul ba ni drag po'i mgor ni sngags ril hUM/ zhi ba la mgor ril aM/ ba ra ma rnams la yang de
332a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin sbyar/ spyan drang ba ni gang mdzad pa'i gtso bo nas ni la shan ting bsnun/ spyi la so so rang sngags rdzogs/ drag po lho/ dbang nub/ rgyas pa byang / zhi pa shar/ spyi gang yang rung gru gsum pa
332a8(rnying rgyud): thod pa kha gdangaso// zla gam dang / pad+ma dang / chags medo// phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang / chos nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / thabs dang
332b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang / ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang // lhag pa'i ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnam bzhi'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// 
332b2(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'bral dra ba las rma du byung ba'i dam tshig bcwa lnga mdo 'di ltar yang bshad/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad mnyam
332b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i ngang nyid// dbyingasu ro gcig de bsdus te// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// yo na mchog gi 'dod pa ni// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor bas na// chags
332b4(rnying rgyud): pa med pa'i tshul du spyod// 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i la ma// byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas// bdi chen mi zad gter du 'gyur// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku nyon
332b5(rnying rgyud): mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni// lus dang zas kyis ba sgribs 'gyur te// yi dgas gnas nas gnasu 'gro// skom dang bkres pas nyon mongs 'gyur// rnag khrig ngan
332b6(rnying rgyud): skyugs rtag tu mthong // bde ba spyod pa'i dbang yang med// rtsub cing gdug pas bsrung bar 'gyur// thugs rje chen po'i zhe sdang ni// 'khor ba'i mya ngan sgo bcad cing // bde gshegs
332b7(rnying rgyud): lam du 'dzud par byed// yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur// thugs rjes tshul gyis khro ston zhing // shin tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jug/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba yis// yang dag mchog/ 
332b8(rnying rgyud): gi bde ba 'grub// ye shes gsal ba'i bde ba ni// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med de// rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings rol// thams cad brjod med pa'i ngang // kun tu khyab pa'i sku mnga'
333a1(rnying rgyud): shin tu 'od gsal rnam dag lam// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa spyong // sems can nyon mongs dug sel 'gyur// thams cad zhing sbyong nga rgyal ni// yon+tan
333a2(rnying rgyud): bskyed pa'i mdzod yin te// nga med bdag med mi dmigs la// su zhig de la nga rgyal bskyed// dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thubs pa'i// shin tu rgyal ba'i khyu mchog 'grub// lha srin bdu/ 
333a3(rnying rgyud): sde tshar bcad pa'i// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob// 'phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba// nga dang bdag med don rtogs na// dog dang yangs pa gnyis medade// bde mchog dkyil 'khor
333a4(rnying rgyud): yangs pa 'grub// phrag dog dngos po mi shes shing // nga dang bdag tu 'dzin 'gyur na// lha ma yin gyi gnasu skye// de de nas yi dgas gnasu 'gro/ gal te yul sa rnyed gyur na// shin
333a5(rnying rgyud): tu mi bde dog par 'gyur// gzhan yang longs spyod thams/ cad la// dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur// mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub// phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni/ 
333a6(rnying rgyud): nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang // byin ci log la phra dog ste// thams cad gnyi su med par sbyor// bde ba mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'grub// nga med bdag
333a7(rnying rgyud): med dbyingasu thim// lhan grub don mchog 'grub par 'gyur// yid la lha ni rtag bsgoms na// rgyu 'bras lhan gyis grub pa yi// bdag gis kun tu dbang sgyur te// rigs 'dzin gnas su skye
333a8(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs kyis bsgrub bya ba// sgrol dang sbyor bas mthar byin 'gyur// sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin// rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang // sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// ting 'dzin/ 
333b1(rnying rgyud): gyis sbyor sgrol dang // dbang po'i yul dus sbyor sgrol dang // thabs chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang // mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo// yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la sogs// shes rab dbyings
333b2(rnying rgyud): dang bdag tu sbyor// thabs chen sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dbyings dang dbyi su dzad sbrel// rol pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// thugs rje sprul pa bsam mi khyab// sbyor sgrol phrin las bdag
333b3(rnying rgyud): la rdzogs// byang chub sems sprul phyogs bcur 'gro// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// rigs 'dzin bde ldan thob par byed// bla med zhing rnams dag par byed// sku gsung lhan
333b4(rnying rgyud): grub phyogs bcur 'dul// rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrag/ ngas te// theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod// zad mi shes pa'i gter yang 'grub// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku/ 
333b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad ma khyen pa'i yis mchog/ thugs rje sprul pa dpag med/ kyis// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus mkhyen// 'gro ba nyid
333b6(rnying rgyud): na nyid kyi sku// nyon mongs byang chub lam du mkhyen// 'khor ba nyid ni bde gnaso// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'// dbyer med yang dag nyida'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyur phru
333b7(rnying rgyud): dra ba las rma du byung ba'i dam tshig bcwa lnga 'di ltar yang bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
333b8(rnying rgyud): dam tshig rnam par spros pa 'di nyid las che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// spros pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs rje'i ngang // dmyal ba'i gnas rnams tshar gcod pa'i/ 
334a1(rnying rgyud): brgyad gnyis bcu drug zhing du sbyor// tsha ba rnams la bsil ba'i sman// grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman// bsil dro 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa// thugs rje'i byin rlabs
334a2(rnying rgyud): de ltar ston// byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// chags pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// ji ltar bde ba'i ra myong
334a3(rnying rgyud): zhing // myong tshor nyid na rang bzhin med// chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// yi dgas gnas rnams tshar gcod cing // lus dang zas kyis bsgribs pa yi// nyon mongs gnyi ga med par ste// 
334a4(rnying rgyud): gti mug ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nga dang bdag med gnyis med pa'i// shes rab chen po'i 'od gsal gyis// dran smra med pa'i sdug bsngal bsal// rmongs med sgrib pa
334a5(rnying rgyud): dag par byas// ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis// bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol// byol song gnas ni stang sa byed cing // thugs rje'i sgron ma de ltar ston// phrag dog
334a6(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// nga dang bdag 'dzin rnams la ni// thugs rjes gnyis med mnyam sbyor zhing // dog dang yangs pa gnyis ga med// rgya chen yang
334a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i blo ldan pas// 'di la mi chud gang yang med// thams cad yangs pa nyid sbyor// lha ma yin rnams stongs par byed// nga rgyal bde mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye nas chos nyidam// 
334a8(rnying rgyud): pa la// nga deng khyod ces bya ba med// thams cad dbyingasu ra gcig ste// gnyis med mtshan nyid bsnan tu med// che chung med pa'i ngang yin pas// bya ba dag ni med par bstan// nga rgyal bdag ma/ 
334b1(rnying rgyud): rtogs pa yis// dregs pa'i gnas rnams stong par byed// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so so ma/ 
334b2(rnying rgyud): nyid gzhig byas na// rang bzhin med de yang dag nyid// rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// ye nas 'od gsal sangs
334b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas zhing // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa yi// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste// thams cad de bzhin nyid sbyor// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// 
334b4(rnying rgyud): rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis// ma lus de bzhin nyi du sdud// sdud dang mi sdud gnyis ga med// yang dag khonashid du'o// bde ba'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams
334b5(rnying rgyud): cad ma lus rnam par dag/ nyid kyi dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// bde dang mi bde gnyi ga med// thams cad dpying/ su ro gcig ste// ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang brtsan par// yang dag
334b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyis de skad gsungs// bshad dang nyan pa'ang gnyi ga med// de bzhin nyid du gnyi ga 'du// dus bzhi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thams cad kun la/ 
334b7(rnying rgyud): dbang sgyur te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid sbyor// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad dang // 'byung dang 'byung bar ma nges pa'i// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi// mnya
334b8(rnying rgyud): ba nyid lhan ner sbyor// lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// thams cad dbyer med byang chub ste// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i chos// ma bcos lhun gyis
335a1(rnying rgyud): grub pa yi// byang chub lam chen 'di yin te// thams cad dbyer med nyid 'dus// byang chub don grub ye nas rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim// rdo rje skye gas
335a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// theg pa che mchog rigasu nges// rigs te byang chub bstan pas gzung // thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings shes nas// rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin// 
335a3(rnying rgyud): skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med// las dang las kyi bag chags med// cis kyang ma gos thams cad 'joms// skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin// byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni// 
335a4(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// snang grags bsam gyi// nas mi khyab pa'i// phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag/ de bzhi/ na nyid kyi dbyingasu thim// mdor na zhing khams ma lus par// 
335a5(rnying rgyud): yon+dan rin chen bkod pa yi// ye shes rgyan gyis spros pa rnams// zhing de yon+tan bsam mi khyab// ye shes pa zhugs gnas shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gzung 'dzin bral
335a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i ye shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gsang sngags chen po grub 'dod pas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes thob// chos kyi dbyings gnas sems can ni// gnyis med de
335a7(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid gcig/ de ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni// rdo rje bzhugs gnas yin par bshad// mi 'jigs pa'i rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis// sos
335a8(rnying rgyud): yod pa ma yin te// nyon mongs gnyen pos bco su med// thams cad dbyings ro gcig pas// de la gnas pa'i gnyen po med// cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang
335b1(rnying rgyud): nga med bdag med rgyal ba'i mchog/ gzhal g.yas khang brtan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i nang du sbyor ba ni// dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu
335b2(rnying rgyud): med// sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan// ye shes sgra las grub pa'o// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// zag pa zad las grub pa yi// nams kyang 'jigs med chos kyi dbyings
335b3(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs kun sbyor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gdol pa tsan gyi chos min pas// ci ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'grub// rig pa rang dbang gyur pas na// stong par bya ba 'am mi stong bya// thams cad
335b4(rnying rgyud): dbyer med dang yin pas// kha dog dbyibs dang rin po che// tha ma sra cad khyab par yungs 'bru tshul// bsam yang mtha' dbus med pa'o// 'dren byed gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ma rig/ 
335b5(rnying rgyud): log rtogs bsam yas kyis// 'jig rten khams rnams pas/ ma yas pa// 'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma// yang dag byang chub sems rig
335b6(rnying rgyud): na/ ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste// thams cad ma lus bde gnas so// lam lnga ston byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom byas te// 
335b7(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgo bkag nas// lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin// rtog dang mi rtog gnyi ga med// gnyis med de ni yang dag lam// thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du// shin tu mnyam
335b8(rnying rgyud): bzhag rtogs bya zhing // bla na med pa ston par bya// yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang // de bzhin nyid kyis ma brjod kyang // sems can blo'i rim pa
336a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin// so sor 'tsham par kun la gsal// 'di ni rdo rje theg mchog ste// rgya mtsho klung du chu 'bab ba zhi// thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid// theg pa thams cad rdo rje'i sa rab tu
336a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs byed bya ba'i dam tshig ni// shes rab blo tshon rab ldan pas// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su// thugs rje snyoms par bsam mi khyab// don dang 'thun
336a3(rnying rgyud): ba 'ba' zhig ston// mi mthun zhags pa 'khor ba gcod// bder gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad dbyingasu dag par 'dus// sbyar byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang
336a4(rnying rgyud): rig ye shes dbang thob nas// dkar po tshan gyis mdog sgyur ba bzhin// dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin byang chub dug gsum ste// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor// nyon mongs
336a5(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal thar byed lam// thar dang mthar gnyis med na// thams cad ma lus byang chub rgyu// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye shes sgyu mar snang bad
336a6(rnying rgyud): log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnya// sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam// mnyam pa nyid na mi gnas pa'i// bsod nams ye shes tshegs rdzogs te// ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la// thig mchog rdo rje
336a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus rdzogs// dpe byad bzang po dpag tu med// thams cad dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// spyod yul thams cad smon na mkhyen// de bzhin nyid
336a8(rnying rgyud): dang kun rtog la// gnyi su med pas dbang sgyur te// ma lus thams cad bde ldan zhing // thams cad byang chub mchog tu 'gyur// ye nas dngos po med pa la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du grub
336b1(rnying rgyud): rigs 'dzin gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// shes rab rnams gsum goms byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rtogs te// rtag tu yangs pa chen po bsgom// rgyu 'bras dus gci
336b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa yi// rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yin// brgya brgya dag tu bskur zhing gnas// lus ma bor bar sangs rgyas pa'o// zad med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dmachi
336b3(rnying rgyud): ni/ shes rab chen po rnam dag pas// spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur// shes dang spyod yul gnyi su med// de bzhin nyi du ro gcig ste// thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas// zad med rin
336b4(rnying rgyud): chen gter du 'gyur// mi zad par ldan dam tshig mchog/ 'og min mtha' dbus bsam mi khyab// bsgrub med/ mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma
336b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yi// dbyi ngas dang rig pa gnyis med pa'i// de bzhin nyid de rdo rje'i rigs// thams cad gnyisu med pa la// bsgrub dang sgrub pa/ 
336b6(rnying rgyud): yod ma yin// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la// de la lam gyis bcosu med// thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ye dag gyur pa yang // phyin ci log gi
336b7(rnying rgyud): blo log nas// log rtog gnas na longs spyod pa// ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab// 'khrul rtog ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// nyon mongs 'dren
336b8(rnying rgyud): cing mtho ris gnas// byang chub lam chen rtogs par ston// gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig tu brtags
337a1(rnying rgyud): nas ston// ji snyed mang po'i don brjod kyang // rdo rje gsung la spros pa med// spros med de ni sna tshogs pa'i// kun tu brda' 'jal ye shes gsung // sgra dang ming
337a2(rnying rgyud): tshig kun las 'das// thams cad pad+ma chags med pa'o// bsgyur ba zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid/ 
337a3(rnying rgyud): kyis dbang bsgyur te// thams cad ye shes dbyingasu bstim// zad med ye shes gter ldan pas// thugs rje byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor don rtog/ 
337a4(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag/ thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag dang // 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus la// gsung cig tshig tu ma brjod kyang // 
337a5(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi thugs rje byin rlabs kyis// thar dang mthar gnyi/ ga la// so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// chos kyi gsu/ nga mchog dam pa yis// thar pa bskul zhing ngan song sbyong / 
337a6(rnying rgyud): rang rig dbang bsgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de na ji snyed yod pa yis// mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa yang // rang rig rnam par rtogs pa nyid// sangs
337a7(rnying rgyud): rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang // ye shes sprul par dag pa'i yul// yi ge med 'jal zhes bya ba'i
337a8(rnying rgyud): / dam tshig ni// yi ge tshig dang sgra spangs pa'i// brjod med ngang du gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa'o// chos rnams thams cad yi nas dag/ thams cad thug su gyur pas na// sgra dang tshig la
337b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pa min// thugs la thugs ni mi gnas pa'o// bdud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dang tshig ni// nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// bdag nyid lha'i dkyil
337b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor te// skye shi med pa'i g.yu drung gnas// bdud bzhi bcom pa'i skyes mchog gis// dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom// ma rig log 'dren 'dul bcad de// chos kyi dbyingasu thams cad
337b3(rnying rgyud): thim// stong gsum kun grags zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed// 'gro ba'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// sku gsung thugs da
337b4(rnying rgyud): yon+dan dang // lhun gyi grub pa'i ye shes kyi// thams cad ga dul bya chud ma zos// ngan song sbyong zhing byang chub zhing // ye shes rdzogs chen kun tu ston// ye shes gsung mchog
337b5(rnying rgyud): ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad ku// yang dag shes pas rab rtags na// rang bzhin med/ cir yang snang // snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid// de ltar rtogs pa
337b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes ni// kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang can// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang // 'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin// bsam yas ye shes rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams bas
337b7(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab ste// mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung // sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags pa dang // dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra// ji ltar bi bang lag thogs na// 
337b8(rnying rgyud): sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang // dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid// phyogs dus dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad dang // dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun// phyogs
338a1(rnying rgyud): dang snga phyi med pa yi// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor snang ba thams cad kun// rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'du// rang
338a2(rnying rgyud): rig de nyid thams cad yin// 'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas yin// 'dus byas snang dang mi snang gnyi ga min// yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med// rang bani// 
338a3(rnying rgyud): ye nas dag pa yi// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// 'jig dang bzhig par bya ba min// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag ces gsungaso// de bzhin sku nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 
338a4(rnying rgyud): de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang // 'gro ba ma lus tham sa cad la// thar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku// rtog pa can la 'khor ba lus// so sor 'tsham par don ston cing // sto
338a5(rnying rgyud): pa nyid la dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du kun la snang // kun la de ltar rtogs par byos// lhun grub bde gnas zhe sa bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
338a6(rnying rgyud): la// byang chub snying po yod pa ltar// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i// byang chub snying por thams cad 'dus// phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun// bdag gi ngang du gnas pas na// bdag la ba/ 
338a7(rnying rgyud): gis dbang bsgyur nas// spyod yul thams cad smon mi dgos// che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rig pa'i rgyal po rang gyur pas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// gong na med/ 
338a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa mnan pas// thams cad kun gyi gtso bo yin// thams cad ma lus gnyis med pas// sgo dang bsgo bar bya ba min// de bzhin nyid la dbang bskur bas// thams cad dbyingasu ro gcig/ 
338b1(rnying rgyud): chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyi nang snod bcud bdag rnams la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas// chen po'i gzugs snang thams cad ni// de bzhin
338b2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sgyu ma'i rtsal rnams 'dzin 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro// rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te// thams cad kun las 'khyil par gan/ 
338b3(rnying rgyud): zad med gter chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// zag bcas gnod sbyin nor dang 'dra// sems can 'phel 'grib zad 'gyur gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon+ta na ni// zad med 'phel 'grib med pa yi// 
338b4(rnying rgyud): mang po spros pas 'bro mo 'gyur// nyung ngu bsdus pas sbom po min// zad med rin chen gter yin pas// thams cadang kun la khyab pa'o// rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam chi/ 
338b5(rnying rgyud): ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas rnam par/ dag pa la// rnam rtog rkyen gyis blo bur du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson rang gnas// rang rig sgrib med
338b6(rnying rgyud): dag pa yin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba gnyis// rang bzhin med par don rtogs na// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag/ gzung 'dzin dril byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyin ci log tu rnam
338b7(rnying rgyud): brtags na// bdag dang bdag gir so sor snang // de la 'dzin pa gnyis zhugs nas// rang bzhin med bzhin so sor snang // yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// dngos po thams cad stong pa yin// 
338b8(rnying rgyud): dngos dang dngos nyid mi gnas pa// de rtogs sdug bsngal bral byed yin// yum 'gyur dbyings phyug ma'i dam tshig ni// 'byung ba lnga la brten 'gyur na// thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus gan// 
339a1(rnying rgyud): skye 'khrungs ma lus gzhi yang yin// thams cad kun gyi rgyu yang yin// de bzhin shes rab rnam gsum gyis// le lo med pa'i brtson pa 'bod// de bzhin dbyings nyid rdzo/ 
339a2(rnying rgyud): gyur na// bla med byang chub 'byung ba'i gnas// chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyi ga
339a3(rnying rgyud): dag/ rang bzhin ye shes de bzhin no// 'bras bu rnam par dag pa yi// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// sems can don byed ces
339a4(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig ni// byang chub semasu don gcig pas// rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung // thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// nyon mongs lam nas 'gro bar byed// nyon mongs khams/ 
339a5(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas pa yang // phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin// der rtog/ sa mtho ris thar pa'o// rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya/ ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang // sgyu ma
339a6(rnying rgyud): mig yor tshul shes pa// gnyi ga rang rig nyid 'dus// de nyid yang dag yin par bshad// sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin// ming tshig sgra la mi rten par// blo'i gti
339a7(rnying rgyud): tu go bar bya// sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems nyid las ni gzhan na med// sems dang chosu dbyer med pas// byang chub lam de ri/ 
339a8(rnying rgyud): ba min// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// rtog med rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas// brjod med spros med bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten
339b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i// sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa yang // so so'i mtshan nyid ma rtogs pa// ba spu tsam yang brjod pa med// bsod nams chen pos bstangs pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing nyid dag pa'o// las
339b2(rnying rgyud): ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas// de nyid dbyings las spros pa med// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rnam dag sku gsung sprul pa dang // che mchog sna tshogs bstan pa yang
339b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems la snang 'gyur te// snang ba nyid na dbyingasu 'ub// phyin ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis// khams gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor// de nyid log rtogs sna tshogs snang // de
339b4(rnying rgyud): las ma gtogs gang yang med// ye nas ma bcos zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// blo med byang chub smon ma dgo/ nas// 'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snyi
339b5(rnying rgyud): por gnas// de bzhin dbyings kyis kun tu khyab// ji lta ba yi/ dang gnas la// de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas/ gnyi su med par rtogs 'gyur na// su zhig bcos shing su yis
339b6(rnying rgyud): rtogs// rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang rig yi nas dag pa yis// sus kyang ma bcos nga gis gsal// ma chags pad+ma 'dra
339b7(rnying rgyud): ba yi// ye shes can gyi spyod yul de// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs// thams cad dbyings phyag ma zhes bya ba'i
339b8(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ni// mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// bdag dang bdag gi med pa yi// shin tu zab pa'i blo las byung // chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na/ 
340a1(rnying rgyud): sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// rang rig ye shes don rtogs na// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drang thob// byang chub sdom byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gzung 'dzin bras
340a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyis// tshogs med dbyings la mnyam bzhag na// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing // nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur// bdag gis ya
340a3(rnying rgyud): dag rdzogs byas te// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyingasu dgod// phyogs dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad
340a4(rnying rgyud): kyang // rtogs pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang // snang ba nyid na dbyer med de/ mtha' dang dbus med zlum pa'i// de bzhin rang gis rig pa yang // mtha' dang dbus me du ma min// gang du/ 
340a5(rnying rgyud): mi 'gro kun tu khyab// kun la bde sprin mi gnas pa'o// tha ma/ sa cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing // thams cad gnyis med
340a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings shes na// mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste// kun tu zad med rin chen gter// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rtag tu bde gnas byang
340a7(rnying rgyud): chub nyid// mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// thabs nyid shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te// thabs la thabs
340a8(rnying rgyud): ni rnam par sbyor// sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyi ga med// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang // snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de nyid shes rab yin par bshad// rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o// 
340b1(rnying rgyud): shes rab nyid la thabasu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang 'byung // 'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med// med pa nyid na sna tshogs sna
340b2(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab dbyings las byung // mnyam bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis// shes rab thabs su don rtogs byos// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// gnyis med byang chub
340b3(rnying rgyud): sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur na// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phros na// kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po// de yis ma byas gang yang min// kha dog
340b4(rnying rgyud): dbyibs rigs gang yang min// shin tu brtags dka' sus dmi rig/ bdag gis bdag kyang mi mthong na// gzhanadagyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// thams cad sbyor ces bya ba'i
340b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ni// ye nas lha dang lha mo yin// dkyil 'khor yang nga dag sbyor ba dang // dbang po yul du sbyor ba'o// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum du
340b6(rnying rgyud): sbyor// dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid sbyor// rtag chad mu bzhi'i khro mo'o// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun// mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig par sbyor// yang na shes rab dbyings ma la// bde
340b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la// bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms te// gnyisu med par ldan par bya// rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas// byang chub pad+ma shin tu spro// phyogs du kyi
340b8(rnying rgyud): 'khor mnyes pa dang // 'gro ba mang po bde thob nas// slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar// bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs
341a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs// bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs// thams cad dbyingasu 'byor pas na// ngan 'gro mi ltung yang dag 'grub// 'di ni bsgral
341a2(rnying rgyud): ba chen po yin// sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin// sbyor ba nyid ni ma lus bsgral// thams cad ma lus par bsgral byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa// gnas pa'i sas
341a3(rnying rgyud): can ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen por rtogs pa yis// dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya// shin tu khro bo chen po yis// thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar// chos nyid rtogs pa'i
341a4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// gnyisu med par thabs kyis bsgral// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas// thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya// ri rab chen
341a5(rnying rgyud): po'i gling bzhi la// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// thugs rje chen pos byin rlabs te// ye shes me che/ na bsgom byas na// thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya// 
341a6(rnying rgyud): dbyingasu yang ni bstim byas te// de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis rlabs// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur// de ltar bsgral bar kun byas kyang // bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang red
341a7(rnying rgyud): phung po lnga po ba shig pa la// bshig nas 'byung ba bag la zhe// ma bshig na yang 'byung ba yin// rnam shes med pas bsad byas na// gnas pa nyid na dngos po med// sems kyi rang bzhin
341a8(rnying rgyud): de la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang // sus kyang mi zin sodang pa med// 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral pa// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun// phyin ci log las bzlog
341b1(rnying rgyud): byas te// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang // shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de tsam la ni bsgral zhes gdags// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// 
341b2(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// byang chub gnas su bsgral bas ni// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin// thabs nyid shes rab shes rab nyid thabs te// gnyisu med pa nyid
341b3(rnying rgyud): byang chub kyi sems so// sbyor ba ni lha dang lha mor sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang po yul du sbyor ba dang // chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang // so so rtsal sgyu ma tsa
341b4(rnying rgyud): ba suM du spyir ba dang dang ngosu su lha dang lha mo sbyor ba dang // rtag chad mu ba ni khro bo khro mor sbyor ba dang // mngon sum du sbyor ba'o// sgrol da ba ni thabs kyis bsgrol ba dang // 'pho bas bsgral ba dang / 
341b5(rnying rgyud): dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid bsgral ba dang // thams cad ma lus par dbyingasu dus gcig bsgral ba dang // thams ca da thugs rje chen pos gnyi su med par sgrol ba'o// 'di gnyis
341b6(rnying rgyud): dus gcig tu mdzad// ya char ma gyur par bya'o// dngos grub mchog kyang der thob ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad// ma byin par len pa zhes/ 
341b7(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med// rang bzhin rang gis bdag med pa// kun 'thogs
341b8(rnying rgyud): med spyad 'gyur yang // spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med// thams cad ye nas stong pa la// gang gis len cing gang la spyod// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// thogs pa med pa'i spyod 'gyur yang / 
342a1(rnying rgyud): bcing bar mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs// chags med ye shes chen por yin// ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings// de ltar rang rig yin par bshad// gnyi su med par
342a2(rnying rgyud): rtogs gyur na// blangs pa nyid na kun tu bzang // brdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas dngos po yod ma yin// rang rig ngang gis 'od
342a3(rnying rgyud): gsal la// ming tsam tshig gis mtshan mod kyis// ming dang tshig la dngos po med// ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis// nga dang bdag tu med pa la// so so mtshan ma dngos por bzung // 'dzin
342a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dngos po yod med de// chos rnams thams cad ming tshi gra tsam// ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang // brjod par bya/ du dang brjod pa med// chos rnams thams cad brdzun du snang // 
342a5(rnying rgyud): brdzun nyid pa ni brdzun spyod de// brdzun zhes bya ba brtags pa tsam// thams cad brdzun gyi tshig yino// rdo rje'o// joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thog ma med nas
342a6(rnying rgyud): phyin ci log/ bdag dang bdag gi med pa la// rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod pa yin// mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi// 
342a7(rnying rgyud): bdag rtog bag chags kun bcom nas// rdo rje dbyings thim par bya// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor brna/ 
342a8(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba min// 'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor// blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis// chos kyi don po mchog nyon la// 'khor ba spangs med sangs rgyas zhing kha
342b1(rnying rgyud): cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs// rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nor gyi mchog ni bkor bdun yin// 'dod pas btsal bar mi rnyed de// sku gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs
342b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// gnyisu med par 'byor byas na// nor bdun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan// pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam chis
342b3(rnying rgyud): ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// pad+ma 'das nas skyes pa 'dra// ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun// bdag las gung
342b4(rnying rgyud): na gcig kyang med// bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing // don rnams bsgrub/ dpa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rdo rje rigs kyis thams cad ba/ 
342b5(rnying rgyud): rin chen rigs kyis yon+dan 'byin// pad+ma rigs kyis chags med 'gyur// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas// gzung dang 'dzin
342b6(rnying rgyud): pa rnams spangs te// mnyam pa'i dbyings la sems kyis blta// skye 'chi med par lhun gyis grub// sku gsung thugs dang yon+tan dang // phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa// gzhan na
342b7(rnying rgyud): yod 'ong ma yin te// rang byung ye shes gnas med yin// mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang // bla med byang chub bskur snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// sna tshogs kha dog
342b8(rnying rgyud): dbyibasu snang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// brjod med rang bzhin kun tu go/ nyon mongs med cing bla med sgra// ma brjod stong gsum gras/ 
343a1(rnying rgyud): pa yi// gsung brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// brjod pa nyid na stong gsum med// de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa// yang dag rtog/ 
343a2(rnying rgyud): pas rab rtags pa// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med// de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa// bdag gis bdag kyang dmig
343a3(rnying rgyud): mi 'gyur// dngos med kun la dbang sgyur ba// sku gsung yang dag ldan gyur na// yon+tan na mkha' mtha' dang mnyam// mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du 'ub// spyod yul ma lus thams cad la/ 
343a4(rnying rgyud): ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung // mi zad pa'i gter chen ra 'grub// gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yid// bo de'i bkor ni rin po che// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// 
343a5(rnying rgyud): bya byed med par rnams bzhi mdzad// mdzad dang mdzad par bya ba med// ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos// sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod// spyod med ngang gi dkyil 'khor
343a6(rnying rgyud): la||chags med tshul du rnam par rol// bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mos kyi// brjod pa nyid
343a7(rnying rgyud): na yong med de// mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang // de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab
343a8(rnying rgyud): namakha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyis kun tu khyab// snod bcud ma lus thams cad la// snang ba chen pos khyab pab su/ 
343b1(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar// snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhi no// rten byed sa chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ji/ 
343b2(rnying rgyud): ltar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrungs ma lus thams cad 'byung // thams cad kun gyi gnas rten te// de bzhin theg chen bla med la// byang chub sangs
343b3(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun kyang gnas// theg pa mthon dman thams cad 'byung // thams cad theg chen dbyingasu 'dus// sreg byed ye shes me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bdag med ye shes rang rig gis// 
343b4(rnying rgyud): dngos dang dngos med bag chags bsregs// rang dang spyi'i chos rnams dang // sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun// dngo sra po med par rtogs byas na// 'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag mya
343b5(rnying rgyud): ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtog pa thams cad ye nas tshogs// thams cad 'khru/ byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams
343b6(rnying rgyud): ni// sgrib gnyis dag gis 'khor bar 'gyur// mnyan bsams bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis// bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas na// pha rol phyin rdzogs sa bcu bsgrubs// sa gsum yang dag rdzogs
343b7(rnying rgyud): byas te// mnyam pa'i zhing la thams cad 'god// khros kyis mchog ni 'di yin// g.yed byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dag tshig ni// sems can ye nas dag pa la// bdag 'dzin rdul snyed g.yogs
343b8(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// sems dang rdul rnams med rtogs pas// ye shes rlung gis bag chags gtor// chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la gzung du med pa ltar// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// 
344a1(rnying rgyud): ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang rig byin ci ma log pa'i// gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis// 
344a2(rnying rgyud): cad mnyam pa'i ngang 'gyur na// thams cad ma lus bdag yin pas// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur te// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// ji ltar sprad kyang bsod nams tshogs// mnyan
344a3(rnying rgyud): rig ye shes chen po yin// chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// snang ba nyid ni 'ja' tshe na bzhin// rang bzhin
344a4(rnying rgyud): med par kun tu snang // de nyid chos sku yin par bshad// / cis kyang ma gos ma spangs pa'o// so so snang zhing / 'thun pa'i gzugs// bdag dang bdag tu ma rtags pa// de
344a5(rnying rgyud): ltar bu yi ngang du snang // chos rnams sgra ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang / dngos po med las dngos po sgra// brjod dang sgra'i dngos po
344a6(rnying rgyud): min// chos rnams sgra ltar shes par byas// thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon las gud na med// sgra nyid don gyi dngos po min// don nyid sgra las gud na med// 
344a7(rnying rgyud): chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro// de bzhin dri yi dngos po yang // yod
344a8(rnying rgyud): pa ma yin kun tu mnam// the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis// chos kun de ltar shes par gyis// dri yis rab tu tshim 'gyur yang // dri dang dngos po gnyisu med// dngos grub thams
344b1(rnying rgyud): cad de ltaro// chos thams cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad byung // de bzhin dbang po dngos med
344b2(rnying rgyud): dang // rdzas kyi dngos po med pa yi// rnam shes dbang po yul tshogs na// ro yi dbang po thams cad 'grub// ro dang ro ru rtogs pa yang // rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma// chos rnam
344b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad reg byar ltar// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gzugs rnams dbu ba rdos pa 'dra// tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin// mtshan 'dzin smig rgyu bzhin du gnas// rnam shes
344b4(rnying rgyud): sgyu mas dbang bsgyur na// mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung ba/ ra nges// bde ba'i ro mchog kun kyang myong // de nyid bso dra nams tshegs chen po// bde ba chags med ye shes yin// 
344b5(rnying rgyud): rig gi dngos grub de ltar// 'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yang dag nyid la gan/ sa byas na// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rags par snang
344b6(rnying rgyud): ba de bzhin gshegs// sgyu mar 'dzin pa yum gyi dbyings// gzugs ni mtshan ma dngos po med// gcig la lnga lngar bshig pa dang // thams cad na mkha'i ngang du gnas// nam
344b7(rnying rgyud): de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'dus byas nyid kyi dngos grubo// 'dus byas kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang // log rtogs sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// 
344b8(rnying rgyud): gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong // rigs dang rgyud rtag tu med// rigs dang kha dag dbyibs med pas// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par snang // snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku// cir yang 'gyur ni/ 
345a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad 'grub// kun 'byung dngos sgrub de ltararo// glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// rnam rtog 'du byed
345a2(rnying rgyud): mang pos g.yengs// ji ltar bus pa shed ma byed// bya byed mang pos g.yengs par gnas// bya byed mang po bdag med pas// ting 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i
345a3(rnying rgyud): dbyisu gnas// 'du byed sna tshogs mi g.yo brtan// dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams thams cad skye med pas// shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// rang rig ye/ 
345a4(rnying rgyud): shos 'od gsal bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob// / chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// kun la spyod pa dadabang thob ste// spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun tu
345a5(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ye nas zlum// thams cad rgyas 'debs shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi stong la ga bcu// rang bzhin chen pos kun tu khyab// rang byung de
345a6(rnying rgyud): nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya sgyu yin te// chos dbyings de nyid zab pa yi// bdag la gnas shing brtag dka' ba'o// mnyam pa'i dbyingasu thams cad 'dus// ye nas bdegan
345a7(rnying rgyud): zhong du'o// chos rnams dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye nas dbyingasu ro gcig pas// de la nga dang bdag ma rtogs// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo
345a8(rnying rgyud): tsam med// thams cad bde gshegs snying po bas// rkyen gyi rdul gyis ga la 'gro/ shes rab mchog gis de ltar rtogs// ma lus kun 'dus dbyings shes byos// thams cad 'jigs
345b1(rnying rgyud): byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig na// shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis// brtag rtog mtshan ma kun bshig pas// mtshan ma med pa'i phyag d+ha ru// thams cad rus par yang dag rtogs/ 
345b2(rnying rgyud): rtog pa nyid kyang dngos med la// de nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// snang ba nyid na byang ba med// de nyid 'jig pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnas
345b3(rnying rgyud): thams cad bdag yin pas// gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos med de la su zhig gsod// gang zhig gnyis 'dzin pa la// skye dang 'chi ba de la
345b4(rnying rgyud): yod// ye shes can gyis brtags pas na// skye 'jig da na dngos po med// thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas// 
345b5(rnying rgyud): ngan song gnas rnams yan chad du// yang dag par ni dbyer ma de// gang yang spang bar bya ba min// theg pa mthon da/ man bsam yas pa// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs
345b6(rnying rgyud): ngan song gnas rnams thams cad kun// bla med byang chub rgyu yod pa'o// thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad kun tu bzang po yi// 'dod pa'i yon+tan lnga rnas
345b7(rnying rgyud): la// thogs pa med par spyad byas te// bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang brtags// gzhan yang stong khams thad ni// shes rab dbyings
345b8(rnying rgyud): dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod// thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phyogs dus mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rigs mchog ma rtogs pa/ 
346a1(rnying rgyud): theg pa dman dang lta ba dman// des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mnyam pa yi don nyid kun khyab kyang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs// de yis
346a2(rnying rgyud): yang dag nyid mi mthong // ma mthong ba la mi chud bya// thams cad bsrung du med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med// dge
346a3(rnying rgyud): dang mi dge gnyi ga med// nyon mongs spangs zhing byang bsgrub med// de bzhin nyid kyi glong gyur na// bde dang mi bde dbyer med de// ye nas dag mnyam nyi gnas// de la bsrung bya rdul rtsam
346a4(rnying rgyud): med// thams cad bsrung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni // sems can khams gsum 'khor ba'i// thog ma med nas 'khor ba yi// phyin ci log la 'jol nyag spyod
346a5(rnying rgyud): gzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags// des na 'khor bar rtag tu 'phyan// de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo med par yongs spangs te// nga med bdag med mnya
346a6(rnying rgyud): par bsrung // thams cad 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rdo rje sems dpas bkas bcad pa// sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun// don bzhin du ni ma bsrungs na/ 
346a7(rnying rgyud): yak+Sha khro bo med dpal gyis// snying nas drangs te khrag 'thungs nas// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de yi sdug bsngal bzod brlag chad// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// dam rdza/ 
346a8(rnying rgyud): so sor spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rigs lnga so sor dbye ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/ rin po che ni rta'i sha/ pad+ma rigs ni a ri ka'i sha/ don yod na mkha' lding
346b1(rnying rgyud): gi sha/ bder gshegs rigs ni sha che no// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar// nges par dang du blang ba'o// yang na thams cad gcig tu bsdu// yang na mtshan nyid med par
346b2(rnying rgyud): rtag/ ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// ye nas rang bzhin gsal ba las// thams cad kun la yod par bshad// ye shes
346b3(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bla na med pa'i mchog yin te// rdo rje rigs mchog thams cad kyis// bar ma chad par rtag tu bsgrub// byang chub shing drung skye bar 'gyur/ 
346b4(rnying rgyud): bla med byang chub mchog kyang 'grub// skye 'chi med pa'i ba de 'grub ste// sems la dbang yang thob par 'gyur// spyod yul thams cad smon na shes// rgyud kyi rgyal
346b5(rnying rgyud): bo sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o// // gang ni ga dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na// nyon mongs ngan song / 
346b6(rnying rgyud): gnasu skye// byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// bla med 'gro ba'i rgyu yang chad// rigs chad nyid du skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu mnyam pa'i don rtogs
346b7(rnying rgyud): la// sku ni 'ja' tshen tshul 'dra bar// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// 'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par// gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom// lha yi sku rnams
346b8(rnying rgyud): gsal bsgom na// bsod nams tshegs chen thob par 'gyur// de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na// ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu
347a1(rnying rgyud): bsgom// yi dam lnga de spangs byas na// ngan song mi bde rtag tu myong // sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa'i don ni// sngags daphyag rgya bar mi gcad// rnal 'byor/ 
347a2(rnying rgyud): 'grub pa'i lam yang yin// mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa'ang yin// don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te// rtag tu mnyam bzhag phyag rgya yin// dug gsum gting 'byin sngags
347a3(rnying rgyud): yin te// yang dag don chen klung 'dod pas// dus mtshams med par phyag rgya sngags// yid brtan drag tu bzlas brjod bya// yon+tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// phyag rgya bskyod dang yi
