347a4(rnying rgyud): ge o// rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid bstan pa// bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po// yon+tan zad med sbyin pa ni/ na// byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa// chags med ni
347a5(rnying rgyud): du 'god pa yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod / nga // 'khor ba'i lam rnams stong par byed// ma rI ga mun sel sgron me yin// long ba rnams kyi dmigs bu
347a6(rnying rgyud): mkhan// de la rtag tu mchod byas na// sangs rgyas byang chub thag mi ring // rdo rje mched dang lcam dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa// rdo rje rigs kyi spun yin te// thog ma med nas las 'thun
347a7(rnying rgyud): pas// lta spyod 'thun pas 'dir skyes te// gcig la cig ni mig dang 'dra// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// dam tshig ngan sems dpya byas nas// dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyu
347a8(rnying rgyud): de bas dam tshig 'da' mi byed// gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// srid gsum ma lus kun la khyab// phyin ci log gis rab
347b1(rnying rgyud): bsgribs nas// dbul po gter dang gyad kyi nor bu 'dra// de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis// chos la skyon yod ma yin te// sems can don phyir na/ 
347b2(rnying rgyud): tu gsang // theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ de la gsang don bstan gyur na// rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par// 'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la// shin tu nges pa'i don bzung nas// gsang
347b3(rnying rgyud): don de nyid log par khrid// ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor// de bas shin tu gsang bar bya// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// thar lam kun la mkhas par bya// shes rab mchog
347b4(rnying rgyud): dang ldan pas na// sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin// the dgra pa mthon dman don nyid ni// so sor 'tsham par bstan dgos so// dang du blang dang mi spang ba// rnal 'byor pas
347b5(rnying rgyud): ni rtag tu spyad// chags pa med par gyur pa dang // dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni// dam tshig mdo bshad na/ nga nas 'byung // ma rtogs pa zhes sprad gyur na// yi dgas
347b6(rnying rgyud): srin po'i nang du skye// yang na dam tshig 'di lta bur// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom pa mi 'da' ste// byed gcod tshogs chen gnyisu 'gyur// 'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa na// mnyam pa de'i dbyings
347b7(rnying rgyud): na gnas// shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bya lam na mkha' gcod bzhin gyis// 'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun// mkha' la rlung
347b8(rnying rgyud): chen 'phro ba bzhin// yid kyi rtog chags ma lus pa// chu la nya chen 'phyo ba ltar// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar ltos// de ltar rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting
348a1(rnying rgyud): spos// rdo rje theg mchog kha 'ches la// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par// gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing // thugs thub dag gis spyad byas pa dang s+ya/ 
348a2(rnying rgyud): khams dag tu rgyud par 'gyur// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam dang rtags pa gang yang med// ji lta mi gnas yul la spyod// spyod par byed dang spyod pa med// de ltar rtogs pa'i/ 
348a3(rnying rgyud): rigs mchog ni// rdo rje rig 'dzin skye ba na// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// yon+tan mi zad gnas pa yin// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing // kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la/ 
348a4(rnying rgyud): chos dang gang zag gnyis med na// 'di ni byang chub sa pa yin// las dang nyon mongs thams cad la// mnyam pa'i don du mi shes shing // rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod 'dzin na// 'di ni
348a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing // spang dang mi spong bye/  'gyur ba// 'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin// dge bcu dag la
348a6(rnying rgyud): gtsor len cing // dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas// lha dang mi'i skye gnas te// 'dod khams dag tu 'khor ba'i sa// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing // tshad med pa ni dang bsam gtan
348a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi// rim par so sor bdag 'dzin cing // gzugs tshogs dag la bdag tu rtog/ 'di ni tshangs gnas rim par skye// mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs par// ming bzhi med par ma shes
348a8(rnying rgyud): te// skye mched bzhi la gnas 'gyur bas// sred pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru skye// thams cad mnyam par ma shes na// ma lus kun la zhe sdang zhing // snying rje yang dag med 'gyur na// 'di ni mi zad chen
348b1(rnying rgyud): po yi// dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa yin// chags med dngos po mi shes nas// thams cad kun la 'dod chags shing // lus kyis bsgribs dang zas kyis bsgribs// yi dgas
348b2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i gnas skye// nga dang bdag med mi shes shing // chos rnams kun la rmongs byas pas// shes rab mi gsal don med pas// dge sdig gnyis kyi don ma rtogs// 'di ni byol song gnas
348b3(rnying rgyud): skye// shin tu nga rgyal cher skye cing // thams cad bdag gir gzung bas na// kun dang rtsod pa'i las byed pa// lha ma yin gyis gnasu skye// theg mchog mthon dman thams cad dang / 'dzi/ 
348b4(rnying rgyud): rten lta ba thams cad kun// ye shes chen pos rab rtag/ das na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// rang bzhi/ na dbyings las nyams pa med// shes rab chen po mag
348b5(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// mthon dman gnas dang lam drug dang // 8bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// so sor de bzhin 'a rab gzigs// sngags mchog bla na med pas ni// mtshan
348b6(rnying rgyud): ma kun dang mi rtag par// mtshan ma kun dang thams cad med// kun dang mnyam pa nyid yon pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor lta ba brjod mi bya// sbyin log rta/ 
348b7(rnying rgyud): bsams yas pa// ye nas yod pa ma yin te// so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyis// gzung 'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te// ci yang med la cir yang snang // snang ba nyid na rang bani/ 
348b8(rnying rgyud): med// de ltar rtags na 'gro'i gnas// rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtags rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni// cir yang spyod kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la bya chen lding ba bzhin// chu la skur/ 
349a1(rnying rgyud): chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkha' la rlung chen 'gro ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod// bde
349a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ro mchog myong bar 'gyur// de la su zhig chags par byed// spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin// bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu'i ngang du spyod// 'di ni spyod
349a3(rnying rgyud): brlabs chen yin// lta spyod ya char ma gyur par// sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad// kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang // spyod pa dag dang yong mi mthun// kha cig spyod pa rdzogs
349a4(rnying rgyud): byed kyang // mnyam pa'i lta ba yong mi shes// kha cig lta spyod gnyi ga med// yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yin// don dadam kun rdzob dbyer med pas// yang dag nyid rab tu rtogs
349a5(rnying rgyud): bla med theg chen dang gnas ni// don dam kun rdzob dbyer/ med de// kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la// ngag dang ma dag gnyis kar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// 
349a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu'ang dbyer med de// lta ba mthon dman de tsamo// thabs kyi lta sprod chen po ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni nor bdun// 
349a7(rnying rgyud): kun rdzob du ni mnyam rdzogaso// mnyam pa nyid la ma g.yos bzhin// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag/ thams cad dag ces bya ba yang // dngos po
349a8(rnying rgyud): gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod gnyis na rnam par dag/ dag tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las// rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rigs chen dag
349b1(rnying rgyud): tu zad par 'dus// ma lus chos kun dbyer mi dmigs// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rigs ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin// mi dmigs dbyings nas kun 'byung ba// yon+tan chen po
349b2(rnying rgyud): gnas yin te// zhing khams mi gzang gnas kyang yin// 'di ni rin chen rigs gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// chags dang chags par bya ba med// de bzhin nyid
349b3(rnying rgyud): gcig pa ste// nyes pas mi gos pad+ma bzhin// thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus pas// 'di la bya ba rdul tsam med// ma byas bzhin du don grub pa// sgron yon byang chub nyid sbyor// 'di
349b4(rnying rgyud): ni las rnams grub pa yin// chos rnams ma lus tham sa cad kun// mtha' dang dbus med du mar bral// gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid// dbyer med pa yi tshul rtog
349b5(rnying rgyud): te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing // mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa// 'di ni me'i
349b6(rnying rgyud): rigasu bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// dngos por snang la gzung du med// skyod na thams cad kun smra te// 'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad// dam tshig chen po'i mdo/ 
349b7(rnying rgyud): rnams las// 'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad kun gyi mdzod skyed yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// sra zhing rtan pa'i
349b8(rnying rgyud): gnas yod pas// dngos po med pa'i tshul rtogs te// 'di ni sa chen yin par bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin na mkha' chen po yis// pri dang nang gi
350a1(rnying rgyud): 'byed pa'o// thams cad gsal ba'i ngang nyid de// 'byung ba bzhi po thams cad kyang // thams cad na mkha'i ngang du thim// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
350a2(rnying rgyud): kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyingasu thub// nyon mongs snga pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin gshegs/ 
350a3(rnying rgyud): med rtogs na byang chub lam// ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro/ de bas thos bsams bsgoms pa yis// yang dag don nyid rtogs byas te// thams cad sangs rgyas nyid sbyor
350a4(rnying rgyud): 'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na// yang dag don la chags byed// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// ma cha// gas pa la chags pa dang // shin tu chags mchog chen po
350a5(rnying rgyud): yin// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung 'gyur te// snang ba mtha' yas zhing dag yin// thams cad pad+ma rdzus skyes yin// rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa ru skye// zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid
350a6(rnying rgyud): ni// phyin ci log la zhe sdang zhing // zhe sdang dngos po med shes na// sdang dang mi sdang mnyam shes te// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// thams cad kun la phye/ 
350a7(rnying rgyud): med de// de ltar ma rtogs kun la snang // de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes// des ni zhe sdang nyi mthong // yang dag rtogs pas rab rtags na// zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin// gti
350a8(rnying rgyud): mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pas// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// don dam du ni dbyer med la// kun rdzob sgyu ma mig yor tshul// snang ba nyid na dngos med pas// de la su zhig nga/ 
350b1(rnying rgyud): tu 'dzin khams cad dbyer med mo dmigs pa// shes rab can gyi gti mug yin// de rtags de bzhin gshegs pa'o// nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mnyam pa nyid la gnas byas
350b2(rnying rgyud): nas// phyin ci log dang thog dman la// shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang // nga rgyal ni ba so sa man// rang bzhin med pas dbyingasu 'dus// 'di ni yon+dan 'byung gnas yin// de bzhin dag
350b3(rnying rgyud): shes par byos// phrag dog mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa ste// 'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin// mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing // thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus// 
350b4(rnying rgyud): mnyam pa la shin du sdom// de bas phrag dog chen po yin// byin ci log tu bdag tu bcings// gzung dang 'dzin pas da shin tu dog/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// dog yang
350b5(rnying rgyud): med de thams cad mnyam// de nyid shes pas las rab 'gru ba// phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// phung po lnga por snang ba yang // kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed// bde ba'i
350b6(rnying rgyud): yul dang mi bde'i yul// so so'i ro rnams myong byed cing // lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas// so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med// gang gis de la dngos bzung na// ngan song gsum
350b7(rnying rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur// de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// snang ba nyid ni rang bzhin med// snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston// snang dang mi snang gnyi su med// de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas/ 
350b8(rnying rgyud): gzugs nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// kun la rnams gsum 'byung mod kyi// bde dang mi bde dngos po med// gnyis ga ma yin lung ma bstan// 
351a1(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang // tshor dang 'byung ba gnyis ga stong // stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin// de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin// 'du shes mtshan
351a2(rnying rgyud): bshad pa ni// gsum tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin// so so mtshan nyid bshig pa na// dngos po med de bzhin nyid// dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa// bya byed med par kun tu 'jug
351a3(rnying rgyud): khams gsum ma lus thams cad la// mtshan ma che chung bsam mi khyab// khyab med dngos po yod ma yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan// 'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar
351a4(rnying rgyud): gnas// rtsa ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te// lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la 'pho// deng rtogs rtsa ba yod ma yin// med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'byung // de la dngos po
351a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pa ni// rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas// mas gsum brtson ra kun tu 'khor// yang dag na phyir rig pas ni// 'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin de// de la
351a6(rnying rgyud): rnam rig 'byung ba ni// dngos po med de skad cig ma// ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad// sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin par bshad// kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te// de yi
351a7(rnying rgyud): dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// kha dog dbyibs dang rig rgyun min// gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs// 'di ni kun la dbang sgyur te// mtho ris 'gro 'am ngan song 'gro/ rtogs dang ma rtogs
351a8(rnying rgyud): khyad par ro// bzhi po mnyam pa'i ngong shes na// 'di ni ye shes chen po yin// kha dog lnga yi mtshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang / 28
351b1(rnying rgyud): gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te// ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong // ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang khu la
351b2(rnying rgyud): sogs nag por bstan// chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas// byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu mdog ni dkar bstan pa// de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/ chos rnams
351b3(rnying rgyud): ma lus thams cad kun// pad+ma rA ga zhes brjod do// chags dang chags par bya ba med// chags med phyir yang dmar po'o// yon+tan gter chen zad mi shes// thams cad 'byung ba'i
351b4(rnying rgyud): gnas yin te// de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la// zad me dang rin chen gter 'gyur ba// mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan// chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la// thugs
351b5(rnying rgyud): chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dbyingasu yang dag bsdu dgos pas// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// kun tu las ni ljang gu'i mdog/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// 
351b6(rnying rgyud): cis kyang mi tshugs bcosu med// kha dog nag pa dngos po la// mtshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med// de bzhin kun la shes par byos// phyogs lnga zhes bya bya ba'i dam tshig ni// mtha'
351b7(rnying rgyud): dang dbus med de bzhin du// dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la// ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya phyir// phyogs dang dbusu gnas par bya// sems can ma rig mdongs pa la// nyon mongs ma rig gas// 
351b8(rnying rgyud): bya'i phyir// ye shes sgrol ma 'od 'bar bas// ma rig mun pa sel bar byed// de phyir de la shar zhes bya// sems can ma lus thams cad la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing // ma rig
352a1(rnying rgyud): mun pa nub 'gyur bas// de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun// ye shes chen po bdag med pas// sdug bsngal rab tu byang byas nas/ 
352a2(rnying rgyud): de la byang gi phyogs shes brjod// de ltar ma lus thams cad la// thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub// rnam rtog mtshan nyid byang gyur na// de'i yon+tan chen po rdzogs// de ltar chos rnams
352a3(rnying rgyud): ma lus kun// rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus// phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid du zlum pa'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta// ma rig phyin ci log rnams
352a4(rnying rgyud): kyi/ phyogs rnams so sor gzung 'gyur na// rtag tu nyon mo/ dngas 'khor bar 'gyur// dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing // phyin ci log ni dngos
352a5(rnying rgyud): por 'dzin// dngos por gzung bas khams gsum 'khor / gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la// snang zhing dngos po med pa dang // lha dang lha mor dngos por rtag/ 
352a6(rnying rgyud): bdag dang lha nyid gnyis pa'o// sgra rnams sna tshogs grags pa yang // sgra nyid dngos po med par shes// sgra brjod ma lus thams cad ni// chos kyi sgra chen sna tshogs yin// dri'i dngos por sna
352a7(rnying rgyud): ba yang // dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med// dri snom chos kyi dri yin te// shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs// ro yi dngos po snang ba yang // ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin// ro bro de bzhin nyid
352a8(rnying rgyud): kyi ro// bde ba de yis tshim par byed// reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang // reg bya'i dngos po yong med de// reg byar snang ba long spyod yin// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// mi shes phyin ci log rma/ 
352b1(rnying rgyud): kyis// dbang po yul la chags 'gyur na// rtag tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing // ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad// rtsa ba sogs ma'i me bzhin du// khams gsum dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur
352b2(rnying rgyud): de bas ye shes chags med rtogs// byas la mi stsogs bsod nams byos// kun la spyod cing mi gos pas// ye shes chen po rtag tu sgoms// mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni don
352b3(rnying rgyud): dam skye ba med par mnyam pa dang // kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang // don dam pa dang kun rdzob du dbyer med par mnyam pa dang // chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang // rnam
352b4(rnying rgyud): par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o// de la don/ dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'// 
352b5(rnying rgyud): yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings// mtshan nyid med cing dmig/ su med// gzung du med cing smon pa med// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin// thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// / 
352b6(rnying rgyud): namakha' la yang mtshan nyid med// kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang // 'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang // 'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed// rtog pa kun gyi
352b7(rnying rgyud): ma snang // 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te// bya byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnas// thams cad snang la rang bzhin med// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med na// 
352b8(rnying rgyud): chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // yod dang med pa gnyi ga min// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang // snang ba nyid
353a1(rnying rgyud): dngos po med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te// de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// 'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni// sa chu me rlung na mkha' las// 
353a2(rnying rgyud): ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te// rang bzhin ngang gyis de ltar 'byung // so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni// thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam// mtshan nyid
353a3(rnying rgyud): so sor gnas pa ni// shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam// rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni// rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa// rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi// 'di ni chos
353a4(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi ye sheso// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing // kun kyang dbyer med pa yin pas// thams cad me long lta bu
353a5(rnying rgyud): tshul// thams cad kun la yud rtog cing // rtog dang brtag pa ra bya ba med// dus gsum kun tu mi dmigs pa// 2de ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin// log rtogs dbang po'i
353a6(rnying rgyud): spyod yul spangs// dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med par// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin// mnyam pa rnam lnga de ltar brtags// chos rnams ma
353a7(rnying rgyud): lus thams cad la// ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang // thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtags// 'di ni yang dag rtogs pa yin// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bsod
353a8(rnying rgyud): nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rigs bzhi'i lha dang lha mo dang // 'khor gyi khros
353b1(rnying rgyud): khro mo dang // yang na 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid de// 'jig rten tshogs 'khor yin// tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // byang chub sems
353b2(rnying rgyud): dang ma chags pa'i// gnyisu med par thom gyur na// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan// 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang // sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun// de bzhin gshegs
353b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtags// thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni// chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang // ngan song sbyong zhing thar lam ston// stong gsum grags
353b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sgra chen dang // thams cad 'jal ba'i sgra yang yin// ba dra ba tshim byed bsod nams te// brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin// 'di ni chags med pad+ma'i gsung chos nyid dngos/ 
353b5(rnying rgyud): po med pa la// dri yis mchog tu tshim byed pa// bsod nam/ sa tshogs chen yin par bshad// chags med ye shes tshul yin te// de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na// 
353b6(rnying rgyud): rigs 'dzin sa rnams bskul bar 'gyur// ngan song gsum du chos kyi dri// kun tu bde gnas thob par byed// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus la// bde ba'i ro yis mchod pa
353b7(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// tshim byed bsod nams tshegs chen 'gyur// dngos por mi 'dzin bsod nams tshegs// de lta bu yi ro mchog gis// thams cad kun la tshim par 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su
353b8(rnying rgyud): longs spyod ldan// dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin// bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'o// rnal 'byor la su rung rnams kyis rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa dang // sbyor mchod dag gis long spyod// 
354a1(rnying rgyud): na// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub 'gyur// bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar gyur nas// sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed// dpung gi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i/ 
354a2(rnying rgyud): mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par byed// tshogs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// kun la thogs pa med par spyod// thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed// 
354a3(rnying rgyud): mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du byed// yon+dan chen po 'phel bar byed// khro bo gtum pa'ang zhi bar byed// thams cad kun la spyad bde ba// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dbyings
354a4(rnying rgyud): bsdus pas dkyil yin te// 'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// de lta ba yi/ ngotshul du gnas// 'khor gyi 'phro men tshim byed ces bya ba
354a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ni// bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu// rtag tu mnyam bzhag khro bo'i tshul// 'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te// mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang // sngags ma/ 
354a6(rnying rgyud): dam pa ma lus 'don// de nas 'phra men 'khor bsdus nas// so so'i las dang 'thun byas te// so so'i gnas su bzhag par bya// dbang du bsdu dang bsgom pa'i thabs// ji ltar 'chas
354a7(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du bya// ma lus thams cad byos shig par// lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// 'dod yon lnga yi sbyin pa gtang // de nas las rnams
354a8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs byas nas// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brtan nas// rigaso lnga ye shes lnga la sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bdag la thams cad bsdu bar bya// de ltar bcu
354b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngang 'chang ba// ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas// rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas// theg dman spyod pa'i yong mi 'gyur// mi khom gnas skye mi 'gyur// skye shi med pa'i
354b2(rnying rgyud): g.yung drang thob// sangs rgyas shing yang sbyong bar byed// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// yul rnams yod/ 
354b3(rnying rgyud): pa ma yin te// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste// snang ba'i dngos po rnams bshig na// so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas// gzhigs na na mkha'i
354b4(rnying rgyud): du ni// na mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na// mtshan nyid me/ dad pa'i dbyingasu thim// thams cad kun gyi 'byung gan das so// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad gcig ma// snang ba mi 'go
354b5(rnying rgyud): thabs yin te// rang bzhin med pa shes rab nyid// nyon mo sa rnam par shes pa ni// kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la// nga dang bdag tu rnam par rtogs// bde sdug mtshan ma
354b6(rnying rgyud): so sor 'dzin// kun gzhi dngos po med pa la// bag chags stsogs pa'i gnas med de// snang ba'i dngos po med pa la// nyon mongs blo yis blang du med// sgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// de ltar
354b7(rnying rgyud): sgo byed dngos po med// med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa// khams gsum brtson rang rtag tu 'khor// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni// snang dang mi snang gnyi ga la// skad cig lung
354b8(rnying rgyud): tsam rtog par yin// rtog pa nyid kyang ma 'grub na// yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub// yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni// snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa// phyi ma ma byung brtags tu med
355a1(rnying rgyud): de ltar rang bzhin dmig su med// rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra// rgyud ni yongasu ma chad pa// 'di ni kun tu 'byung ba yin// de ltar don rnams dngos po med// chu da
355a2(rnying rgyud): rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba// de gsum gcig dang so so min// de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid// gcig pa ma yin so so min// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// thams cad ye
355a3(rnying rgyud): dbyar med cing // gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med// de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin// rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med// byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni// shin tu mi dmigs brtag da// 'a
355a4(rnying rgyud): yangs la rgya che gting zab pa// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'a gyur te// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ 'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min// shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa// mtha'
355a5(rnying rgyud): dang dbus kyang brtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang // nyid ni// dmigs med tshul du de ltar snang // dbying / sa dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang // rang rig kho na tsam du
355a6(rnying rgyud): zad// sems can ma lus thams cad kyi// de ltar khong du chud par byos// nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sems can ma lus thams cad
355a7(rnying rgyud): la// snying rje'i thag pa ma chags par// nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing // byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis// de bzhin 'khor ba'i brtson ra la// snying rje'i zhags pa cher ba
355a8(rnying rgyud): nas// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen po skye ma byed// de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la// las kyi sgrib pas mi gos shing // thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par
355b1(rnying rgyud): dga' ba dag la 'gyod pa med// sems can nga dang bdag med la// thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de// bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad dri ma med par bya// chos rnams thams
355b2(rnying rgyud): cad stong pa bas// de la dngos dang rtog pa med// na mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// snang ba thams cad dngos med pas/ 
355b3(rnying rgyud): yod dang med pa thams cad kun// mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigaso// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas// kun la
355b4(rnying rgyud): smon cing chagasu med// byang chub sems rnams thams// cad ni// shin tu rtag dka' gting zab pas// rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigasum
355b5(rnying rgyud): sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu// byang chub de nyid sems yin// sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas// sems can ma lu sa thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin/ 
355b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus chos sa cog/ sems dang byang chub nyid du'ub// bo d+ha chen pos de skad bshad// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad// spyang pa nyid na chags pa
355b7(rnying rgyud): med// dus mtha' med par mnyams gnas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la// mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang // snang ba nyid na dngos po meng // de bzhin yang dag nyid rtogs// gang
355b8(rnying rgyud): zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de// ri bong rwa dang mo sham bu// tshig tsam gdag su rung mod kyi// thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med// thams cad ma lus stong zhes
356a1(rnying rgyud): ste// dran med brdos pa ma yin pas// rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do// shes pa 'ba' shig kho na
356a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na// de nyid don dam dbyings yin te// gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med// yod las gtsal na sgro btags 'gyur// med las btsal na bskur btab ste/ 
356a3(rnying rgyud): yod med gnyis las btsal byas na// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste// de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu// tshig gis lnga phyi yod mod kyang // 
356a4(rnying rgyud): don gyis cig char rdzogs par bsgoms// de lta bu'i don rtog ngas kyang // 'gro nyal 'dug sdod long spyad kyang // theg che na sgom las nyams pa med// gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i// 
356a5(rnying rgyud): blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// ma rtogs le lo snyam/ las byas// don ma grub par ngan song 'gro// sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na// tshig gis mnyam pas sang
356a6(rnying rgyud): mi rgya// de bas don tshig ldan par byos// 'on tang the tshom med par 'grub// rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis// dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom// yon+tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyan
356a7(rnying rgyud): spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid cig/ rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// des ni byang chub snying po len// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po
356a8(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa la
356b1(rnying rgyud): sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang / dam tshig ni gaH
356b2(rnying rgyud): yino// phyag rgya bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te// che du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba de nyid kho na las// byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o// mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// 
356b3(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'i// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid// mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba min// de bzhin nyid kyi ngang du 'ug// 'jig rten 'das
356b4(rnying rgyud): dang 'jig rten pa'i// brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun// chos nyid ngang las ma rtogs pa// log rtogs nyon da mongs rdul tsam med// phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od 'bar yang
356b5(rnying rgyud): de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te// bdag nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa 'i// rnam gsum tshul gyis bsgom byas shing // phyag rgya skyed
356b6(rnying rgyud): cing log 'dul ba// bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/ bdag nyid phyag rgya kun gyi bdag/ ye nas rang bzhin 'od
356b7(rnying rgyud): gsal bas// byang chub skye 'khrung rgyu yang yin// 'bras bu yang dag nyid du'o// rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa// bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa// mthar phyin gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o// / 
356b8(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// thams cad shes rab dang du gnas// rigs lnga bder gshegs yab yum du// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thab
357a1(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab nyid la rol// bde min ma chags tshogs chen po// yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs// lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// nang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste// mdo
357a2(rnying rgyud): bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang // gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa// lag gi 'du 'phro bsam yas dang // yan lag stabs chen bsgral bsigs kun// nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang
357a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas// 'joms shing ces kyang mi tshugs pa// rang byung chen po lha yi lha// thams cad kun la 'bogs par byed// dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags par bya'o// / 
357a4(rnying rgyud): las dang las kyis mi gos pa// gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing // ma chags pa la chags pa dang /  shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'a/ 
357a5(rnying rgyud): la// sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes// yon+tan mi zad gter du 'gyur// gzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o// sku ga sung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o// rnam par rtog med tshul
357a6(rnying rgyud): gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// 'dul ba'i don lan bsam mi khyab// 'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang // thams cad dbang sngas don 'grub pa// ma lus kun 'das
357a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag/ kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro// rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam rdzogs dbyingasu thams cad 'dus// rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste// lhun grub
357a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang nyid// phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni// thugs kyi rtag su bstan pa yin// dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab na// sems can kun gyis yong mi 'da'// de bzhin mnyam nyid
357b1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yin// kun la khyab cing thams cad snang // sku gsung thugs kyi rgyus btab na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun// mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang byar med// rdo rje sems da/ 
357b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs nges na// 'od lta bu la rtag tu gnas// de lta bu'i blo med na// rdo rje'i rig su yong mi bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste bdun cu
357b3(rnying rgyud): brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di che du brjod do//  kyai byug
357b4(rnying rgyud): bcu dus pa ni rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo ba nyid// gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi// rnam rtogs zhags pas so sor zin// sa rnams khyad par bkod
357b5(rnying rgyud): ba yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye she sa ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyis// don du mi 'gyur yod ma gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag
357b6(rnying rgyud): rgya gsang chen snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra bar byed pa gang // de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgro dang
357b7(rnying rgyud): skur ba ni pa yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// de nyid nges pa'i dbyings las phyung // de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin las gnas
357b8(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i brgyan nyid zhug so// gas
358a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o// // 'phags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgya pa las
358a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'ag
358a3(rnying rgyud): lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu mchog/ gsang ba chen po 'di yod par// me mar mur gyi dngos 'bogs shing // spu gri so ni gtams las kyang // 'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar
358a4(rnying rgyud): byos// khong na gnas pa'i yang khong na// lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsda mo// thams cad la yang me long bzhin// ba ltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang // ye shes 'phrul gyi
358a5(rnying rgyud): lde mig gis// rdo rje tha rams sgrom phye nas// yid ba/ zhin rin chen gter phyung ba// bskal ldan mchog gi/ sa spyad du gsol// yi ge kun la mi snang zhing // bla ma'i/ 
358a6(rnying rgyud): thugs la gnas pa ni// skal ldan mchog gi spyod yul to// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// dper na seng+ge'i 'o ma ni// gser gyi phyis bus 'dzin 'gyur gyi// snod gzhan dag tu byug/ 
358a7(rnying rgyud): ba ni// snod kyang 'chag la 'o ma yang 'bo// yong gis gser gyi rang bzhin la// dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang // gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med// de bzhin chos kyi mtshan
358a8(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang // mtshan ma sna tshogs cir snang yang // nyid las gyur pa rdul tsam med// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos nyid kun tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya
358b1(rnying rgyud): bcug// rdzogs s+ho// 'phags pa thabs kyi nags pa pad+mo phreng zhes bya/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng gi don bsdus
358b2(rnying rgyud): pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas rig pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i mchod pa rgya yongasu ma chad pa'i
358b3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang dang / bla bres dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa bzhi dang / bdug spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa bzhis mtsha
358b4(rnying rgyud): de// lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas so so ma yin pa'i darig pa'i 'dud pas phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas da'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsum
358b5(rnying rgyud): du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma khyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sgra da yul nyan thos dang thun mong ma legs pa thabs gang
358b6(rnying rgyud): gis rtogs pa de tshe 'di nyid la thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i don du bsha du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / cang mi gsung bar 'dzum pa mdzad// 'di skad ces
358b7(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ don 'di dang phyi nang gi chos thams cad 'dra ste bden pa gnyisu 'duso// bden pa gnyis la yang tshul 'di ltar shes par bya'o// 
358b8(rnying rgyud): bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul// de bzhin nyid la gnas byas nas// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ byed spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa ste/ 
359a1(rnying rgyud): sa bcu rim gyis bskyod pa la// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// sa rnams mnyam pa nyid sbyor// rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis// chos kun sgyu mar rig pa'i phyir/ 
359a2(rnying rgyud): dngos dang dngos med bag chags bsregs// yang na ye shes me zhes bya// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam smin ni// med min rgyu 'bras 'thun par 'grub// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis// 
359a3(rnying rgyud): rig pas tshegasu 'gyur bso// lam gyi nang na nye lam bde rdzogs pa// thabs kyi nang na ma nor dam pa ste// bsgrubs na tshe 'dis sangs rgyas che ba yang // blang dor med pa'i sku gsum
359a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rjes thob// 'phags pa thabs kyis zhags pa pad+mo/ phreng las bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // / sems dpa' chen pos dam tshig 'di dag ni
359a5(rnying rgyud): bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ngas bshad// gti mu ga zhe sdang nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni// bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa can// de ni dam tshig rdo// 
359a6(rnying rgyud): rje yin// 'phags pa thabs kyis zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po dbang 'di dag ni rang rig pa'i rtsal gyi
359a7(rnying rgyud): 'thob// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te// rdo rje dril bu rig pas 'dzin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi// chos la 'dod bzhin dbang byed// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma
359a8(rnying rgyud): phreng las dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po mchod pa'i mchog ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'drangs// kun la
359b1(rnying rgyud): phan pa'i sman yin te// rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis// thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
359b2(rnying rgyud): kun tu 'od kyi sa las 'das// pad+ma'i spyan du gyur pa na// rig pa'i byin rlabs chen po las// rang 'byung dkyil 'du 'phro yi tshul// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen te// mtshan dang dpe byad kun
359b3(rnying rgyud): las grol// rngam zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can dang // mgyogs ma mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan// de ni thig le rdo rje yin// 'di zhes gang zag bdag med par// rtog pa nga phyir ngas bsha
359b4(rnying rgyud): de// mkhas pas de la 'byor par gyis// 'phags pa tha bas kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng ting 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po spyod yul
359b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o// chen po lnga yang de/ bzhin gshegs// gcig la'ang lnga lngar rig par gyis// khams gsum bdag nyid yin pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyang / 
359b6(rnying rgyud): de la bya// ye shes lnga dang 'gro ba lnga// mnyam pas so so dbyer mod de// sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bsgyur nas// spyod yul kun tu maN+Da la// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las gzug
359b7(rnying rgyud): brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po zhes rdo rje sems dpa' thos nas bshad// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku// sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyi
359b8(rnying rgyud): kun tu rin chen lta bu ste// don dang las yin bsgoms pas 'grub// dbu mig rna ba sna lce la// oM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgoms par
360a1(rnying rgyud): bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la// hUM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du sgom par bya// lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la/ 
360a2(rnying rgyud): traM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la// hrIHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma
360a3(rnying rgyud): lda/ sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgoms par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa'i ser mo la// a zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste// sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga// sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya// 'phags pa
360a4(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las lha'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa/ de'o// // sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje
360a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' bos nas bshad// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ma ra ldan pas// lnga zhing lnga dang 'byor pa yi// tshem buSh+Ta yi lha bsgoms na// thams cad bdag nyid chen por
360a6(rnying rgyud): rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis// dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas// byang chub sems sprin dbab par gsol// rdo rje gsor ba'i
360a7(rnying rgyud): dga' mchog 'di// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas gsor// mi dmigs bde dang 'phro ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin mar ldan las byung // rnal 'byor reg 'dzin mar ldan pas// na bza' dang ni
360a8(rnying rgyud): zhal zas rnams// grub pa'i rdzasu dbang bskur nas// gsol na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// klu dang tshig gi sgra rnams yon// gsung gi
360b1(rnying rgyud): bor byin rlabs te// bsgrags na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas// bro dang gar gyis bskyod byas te// 'od kyi 'du 'phro byin gyis rlabs// dngos grub
360b2(rnying rgyud): mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma phreng las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang gas
360b3(rnying rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung // oM badz+ra bai ro tsa na o// oM satwa badz+ra hU~M/ oM rang na badz+ri traM/ oM d+harma badz+ra hrIH/ oM karma badz+ra a/ oM badz+ra ak+Sho b+h+yaHhUM/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ oM badz+ra rA dzA hUM/ 
360b4(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra rA ga hUM/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu hUM/ oM badz+ra rad na saM b+ha ba tAM/ oM badz+ra rad na traM/ oM badz+ra sur+ya traM/ oM badz+ra d+h+wa dza traM/ oM badz+ra hA sa traM/ oM badz+ra a mri tA b+ha hI/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na dz+dzaH/ 
360b5(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra tsakra hrIH/ oM badz+ra pA shaM hrIH/ oM badz+ra a mo g+hasa? d+hi ha/ oM badz+ra karma ha/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha ha/ oM badz+ra yak+ShahUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+pe ha/ ho badz+ra shwa ra d+he tu oM/ oM badz+ra but+pal
360b6(rnying rgyud): tsa na hUM/ oM badz+ra mA ma ki tra~M/ oM badz+re ban+d+ha ra ba si ni ha/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya tA rA ha/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha hUM/ oM badz+ra de shwa re b+h+yaHde hUM/ oM badz+ra ma le traM/ oM badz+ra
360b7(rnying rgyud): pra Sh+pe tr-i/ oM badz+ra pA sha traM/ oM badz+ra rad na ra tri traM/ oM badz+ra ga t+ye hrIH/ oM badz+ra A lo ke hrIH/ oM badz+ra s+pho ta hrIH/ oM badz+ra nr-i t+yai ha/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he ha/ oM badz+ra g+han+da ha/ oM badz+ra ra ti ha/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti
360b8(rnying rgyud): hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti hU~M/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti traM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las sngags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / sems dpa' chen po
361a1(rnying rgyud): nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad// lha dang lha mo'i ngang nyid/ yan lag lnga la 'byor bas na// bskyod pa thams cad phyug rgya yin// de skad
361a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' bos bka' stsal to// de la phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du// lag gi 'du byed bsgoms nas ni// thal mo dam sbyar rtse bsnol gshibs// rdo rje thal ma/ 
361a3(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal to// sor mo nang du bsnol nas bkan// gung 'dzub mthe bo mthe chung rnams// so sor rtse sprad phyir bkye de// srin lag gshibs bsgreng dam tshig rgya// rkang sor g.yas/ 
361a4(rnying rgyud): kyis g.yon pa mnan// lag 'thil g.yas kyis g.yo don pa mnan// mthe bo rtsa sprad pang du blang // rnam pa dar snang mdzad rgya chen yin// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las
361a5(rnying rgyud): g.yas kyi 'dzum mo g.yon gyis bzung // tshogs pas gci ga la cig bzung ba// 'di ni sbyor ba'i rgya mchog go/ mthe bo gnyis dang mthe bo chung gnyis// so sor rtse sprad zlum
361a6(rnying rgyud): po ste// lhag ma 'od 'phro rting phye ba// mi bskyed pa yi phyag rgya yin// rting sprang gung mo rtse sbyar te// 'dzum mo tshigs bcag gung la sbyar// srin mtheb rtse sprad mthe chung sba// rin chen 'byung
361a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya yin// gung 'dzub srin lag rtse sprad de// mthe chung ngos la sbyar bar bya// mthe bo rtse sprad zlum po ste// snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin// thal mo sbyar nas so sor spyad// 
361a8(rnying rgyud): bskyod nas 'khor lo ltar byas te// glog gi phreng bas 'khor bar bya// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin// phyag rgya'i rgyal po 'di dag ni// thugs kar cing zhing nyi mos// 'du 'bru
361b1(rnying rgyud): zhing mkha' la dgrol// las dang thun mong nyid bshad// rdo rje dril bu bzung nas ni// thugs kar rang ni dkur bstan nas// bcu thabs zur gyis lta ba ni// rdo rje sems pa'i rgya chen
361b2(rnying rgyud): yin// lags pa bsnol nas khu tshur bcang // gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// 'dzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa// rdo rje rgyal po rgya chen yin// lags pa khu tshur bcangs pa las/ 
361b3(rnying rgyud): g.yon gyi 'theb 'dzub rtse sprad de// g.yas kyi gung mo brkyang nas gdeng // rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgya chen yin// lag pa gnyid kyi sor mo rnams// so so'i gung mo tshigs dang por// ngos
361b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi nas ni rtse mo gzugs// rdo rje legs pa'i rgya chen yin// rting sbyar gung mo'i rtse sprad te// theb 'dzub srin lag tshigs bcag ste// drug char rtse sprad mthe chung sbas
361b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rgya chen yin// 'the bo mthe chung rtse spyad nas/ lu gu rgyud du sbrel bar bya// lhag ma 'od ltar byas pa ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya chen yin// lag ngar g.yon pa bsgreng nas ni
361b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// g.yas pa gru mor gzung bar bya// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgya chen yin// g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhags nas// sor mo'i tshogs bcag sprad byas te// kha
361b7(rnying rgyud): yi zad kar bzung bar bya// rdo rje band pa'i rgya chen yin// g.yon gyi sor mo'i rtse rnams yin// ma phrad tsam du bsdus pa las// g.yas kyis 'byed pa ltar byas pa// rdo rje chos kyi rgya
361b8(rnying rgyud): chen yin// g.yas kyi lag ngar bsgreng ba la// mthe bo mthe chung rtse sbeng// lhag ma gsum yang bsgreng bar bya// g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa// rdo rje rnon pa'i rgya chen yin/ 
362a1(rnying rgyud): lag pa rgya gram rtse bsnol nas// mthe bos gnyis kyi rtse sprad de// bskor ba lta bur byas pa ni// rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya chen yin// sor mo nang du bsnol ba las/ 
362a2(rnying rgyud): gung mo rtse sprad 'dzub sbyar te// mthe bos gung mo mnan pa ni// rdo rje smra ba'i rgyal chen yin// lag pa'i 'khrig ma bsnol ba las// gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por// ngo bzhir
362a3(rnying rgyud): sa yi so mo brtan// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams// phan tshun thagasu btags pa las// mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya// rdo rje gsung ba'i phyag
362a4(rnying rgyud): rgya yin// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// 'dzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang // kha 'gram gnyis bzung b.rabya// rdo rje gnod sbyin rgya chen yin// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa
362a5(rnying rgyud): las bsnol te kha ni sbyar nas kyang // thugs kar dam du gzung bar bya// rdo rje khung chur rgya chen yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni// lag gi 'du shes 'di
362a6(rnying rgyud): dag gis// 'du 'phro mos pa bskyed nas ni// bcing zhing mkha' la 'grol bar bya// mthe bo mthe chung nang du sprad// gung mo rtse sbar bzhi yang sgreng // rdo rje 'dzin ltar stong sprad pa/ 
362a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin// rting sbyar 'theb 'dzub rtse sbyar te// 'dzub mo'i mig tu mthe chung drang // lhag ma rtsi gsum ltar byas pa// rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yin// lag ngar g.yon
362a8(rnying rgyud): pa bsgreng nas kyang // sor mo ut+pal ltar byas pa// g.yas kyi sor mo gzung bar bya// rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin// rkang pa gnyis kyi pus mo dang // lag pa gnyis kyi grub mo
362b1(rnying rgyud): rnams// spang nas lag pa gdengs pa ni// kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu chur dkur brten nas// ldan pa gas su bya ba las// chags pa'i mig gis lta ba ni/ 
362b2(rnying rgyud): sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa skong skong po byas te// g.yos pas gru mo bzung nas kyang // dkor ning sor mi 'gro ba ni// rdo rje gdug pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa gnyis ni rgya'i/ 
362b3(rnying rgyud): sbyar nas// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// mtho chung sbrel nas 'jub mi skyed// rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi rgya// mthe chung lu gu rmu du sbrel// ser mo rnams ni so sor bsgreng // thal mo ban
362b4(rnying rgyud): to lta ba ni// rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin// srin lag dang / ni mthe bo gnyis// so sor rtse mo sprad pa las/ 'phral pa'i thad kar drangs pa yi// rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya
362b5(rnying rgyud): yin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas la 'khor gyis lha dang lha mo rnams la phyag na rdo rje las/ 
362b6(rnying rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang 'khor phal po ches dbyangs 'thun par bstod pa/ oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams na// rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang ba
362b7(rnying rgyud): bla med lha dang lha mo yi// grub pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi gtso// sems ma bcu drug rigs kyi yum// mthu chen khro bo khro mo dang
362b8(rnying rgyud): nyar 'jig rten skyong bar ldan// oM sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ 
363a1(rnying rgyud): oM dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan rnams// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// bdag gi lhag pa'i bas pa'i rnams// grub par byin gyis rlabs du gsol/ 
363a2(rnying rgyud): oM khams gsum zhing du sbyor la phyag 'tshalo// dmigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshalo// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshalo// cir yang sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal// 
363a3(rnying rgyud): zhes bstod nas nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs te// rol par khro bo'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo'i rtog pa bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la
363a4(rnying rgyud): lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dad ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gcir bu pa dang kun tu rgyu la sogs pas so so'i rig sngags kyi las kyis ma
363a5(rnying rgyud): hA de ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi lha dang // gnod sbyin ma thu bo che dang // 'phra men ma thams cad bskul nas sems can rnams kyi srog gi bar chad bgyid 'tshe bar
363a6(rnying rgyud): bgyid// shin tu sdug bsngal bar bgyid// de la thabs gang gi bzlog par bgyi// sbyor ba gcad par bgyi// bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thad
363a7(rnying rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos sngon chad bshad de lag na rdo rje khyod nyid kyis byas pa'i gsang sngags dang / srid pa zad par byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad
363a8(rnying rgyud): kyang bzlog par byed// gnon par byed// sbyor ba gcod pa byed na kun tu rgyu la sogs pa gzhan lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
363b1(rnying rgyud): bar zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags zlog cing gnon pa dang / sbyor ba gcod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra dz+wa la badz+re hUM/ man tra sum+b+ha ni/ a
363b2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra dz+wa la hUM/ oM brI hUM bruM traM bru~M hUM bruM hrI/ bruM A b+ha~M/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu nas mtshon cha'i char chen po phab ste lag na rdo rje nyid kyang kha sbub tu 'gyel nas khrag skyug par
363b3(rnying rgyud): gyur to// lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang rgyal te lus dum bur chad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sbyor ba chad par rig nas slar bslang ste/ oM badz+ra sa twa rA
363b4(rnying rgyud): dzadz+dza de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang 'di las 'da' bar ma dbyed cig/ khyod kyi 'khor thams cad kyang 'di las 'da'
363b5(rnying rgyud): bar byed na thams cad brlag par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad la bsgo shig/ de nas lag na rdo rjes gsol pa btso
363b6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das 'di ni srid pa gsum thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa/ mthu' bo che thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa mthu bo che thams cad nga rgyal gcog pa bdag lags te/ ji ltar
363b7(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i slad du bdag gi ming yang lag na rdo rje zhes btags na 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di
363b8(rnying rgyud): smras pas/ bdag kyang khrag tu skyug cing 'gyel bar gyur na gzhan lta ci smos// 'di ni 'da' bar dka'o// de bzhin du lha dang gnod sbyin rnams la yang sgo'o// de nas bcom ldan
364a1(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad/ maM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drang // sku ni dung
364a2(rnying rgyud): ka chen po la// dbu skra kham nag ral pa can// dbu gsum pa la phyag drug ste// dmar dang dud ka gnag pa yin// g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni// ti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang
364a3(rnying rgyud): dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba la// rdo rjes dkrug cing 'thun par brtag/ g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni// ti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // khyung gi khra chen thogs pa dang // ti ral
364a4(rnying rgyud): phra mo'i gsus pa nas// glo snying nang grol 'dren cing za// gtsug tu rnam par snang mdzad nyid// oM phrag g.yas ra la oM k+Sho b+ha hUM/ g.yon rang na sam+b+ha ba traM/ rkang g.yas
364a5(rnying rgyud): a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a/ g.yon na a mi tA b+ha ste hrIHbruM las rdo rje 'khor lo la// rdo rje rnams ni rigs sngags brtag/ ke'u ri dang ni tse'u ri dang // pra mo ha dang pe ta
364a6(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang byA gri mu ku dang // sing ha la sogs mgyogs ma rnams// sti ra la ni 'bri tshugs su// lta zhing rtod pa'i tshul bzhin gnas// ha ha de nas skad cig la// rig sngag/ 
364a7(rnying rgyud): nyid dang spos stong bcas// dgug pa'i pho nyar brtag par bya// ras sam gro ga'am rtsa rnams la// kho bo'i gzugasu bris pa 'am// yang na skud pa nag pos bcing / ha ha/ 
364a8(rnying rgyud): gad mo chen po dang // rdo rje bskul pa'i glu blangs te// pho nya rnams la mngag par bya// de nas rig sngags bzung nas kyang // rtsa yi gzugs la gnas pa dang // 'khor lo la sogs/ 
364b1(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha yis// de dag phye mar brlag par bya// badz+ra tsakra hUM/ phye mar de dag gtubs nas ni// thod pa gzhung dang bcas pa yis// hom khung gru gsum sgo can du// ram zhes bya
364b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i me sbar te// drang srong 'khor bcas g.yab mos bode// de nas rig sngags bsreg par bya// de ltar lha dang bdag sbyar na// rnam lnga'i chas dang ldan par bya// ma mo chen
364b3(rnying rgyud): mo sha la spyon// 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// ma mo chen mo khrag la byon// glu dang gar dang gang rgyangs kyis// so sor mtshad de bsgrub
364b4(rnying rgyud): par bya// zin pa'i sems can gang yang rung // de dag sku da pa nag pos bcing // de yang dum bur bcad por bya// de nas mi de snga ma bzhin// tshe gnas bya phyir 'bru
364b5(rnying rgyud): lnga yis// gnas lnga dag tu rnam bkod// zin pa'i sem sa can bsrung bar bya// cha zhing rtsub pa'i shing dang ni/ sha dang chang dang yo byad rnams// gnag tsang tsha bar
364b6(rnying rgyud): rnam sbyar te// lha chen rnams la mchod par bya// de nas las rnams grub pa dang // ha ha la sogs gad mo dang // klu dang rdo rje dbyug pa yis// lha rnams bdag la thim par bya/ 
364b7(rnying rgyud): 'di ni bdag nyid srung ba dang // las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar phyogs na 'phra men ma ke ri kha dog sngon mo phyag gnyis pa ste// g.yon pan d+ha tsan dan dmar gyis
364b8(rnying rgyud): bkang ba thogs gi g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ oM badz+ra ke raM dzo dza hUM zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na// sangs rgyas kyang dgug nus na gzhan lta ci smos
365a1(rnying rgyud): che ge mo zhig khug cig ces bcol nas gtor ma dang tsan+dan dmar chen ar rgal oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/ zhes brjod cing arga lan gsum du bsgre ngo // lho phyogs na
365a2(rnying rgyud): bo ri kha dog ser mo phyag mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ oM badz+ra tsau ri hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bcol na phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang rdul tsam yang med par rku nus na gzhan lta ci smos/ nub
365a3(rnying rgyud): phyogs na phra mo ha dmar mo phyag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa/ oM badz+ra pra mo ha hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te btsil na phyag na rdo rje yang ring gi mthu bzhag nas dbang du
365a4(rnying rgyud): 'ong na gzhan lta ci smos/ byang phyogs na be ta li kha do gra nag mo phyag g.yon zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing za ba/ g.ya sa na rdo rje 'phyar ba/ oM badz+ra be ta li hUM dza zhes stong rtsa
365a5(rnying rgyud): brgyad bzlas te/ bcol na 'jig rten dang 'jig rte/ na las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub na 'jig rten gyi bsgrub pa phran tshegase lta ci smos/ shar/ 
365a6(rnying rgyud): lho'i mtshams na puk+ka si kha dog dmar ser phyag gnyis zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta 'dren cing zab oM badz+ra puk+ka sa hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang
365a7(rnying rgyud): 'ching zhing 'dren par nus na gzhan bcing zhing za ba lta ci smos// lho nub kyi mtshams na g+hasma ri kha dog ljang khu phyag g.yon na ban+d+ha tsan+dan dmar pos bkang ba rdo rjes dkrug cing / 
365a8(rnying rgyud): gsol pa/ oM badz+ra gasma ra hU~M dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ btsal na phyag na rdo rje yang myos par nus na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// nub byang gi mtshams na badz+ra kar
365b1(rnying rgyud): ma kha dog ljang khu zhing chung ngu lag pa gnyis kyis gzung ste snying ka nas za ba// oM badz+ra karma hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na las gang bya ba thams cad 'gru go// byang / 
365b2(rnying rgyud): shar gyi mtshams na tsan+da l-i kha dog ser skya/ phyag g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i pan+d+ha 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyis zhing dbyug 'dzin pa/ oM badz+ra tsan+da li hUM dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bco/ 
365b3(rnying rgyud): na za ma dang ma ning yang rgyu de 'phel bar byed na dbang po tshang zhing nyams pa med pa la rgyud 'phel zhing tshe dang dbang thang 'phel bar bya ba lta ci smos te/ 'phra men ma 'di rnams phrin las
365b4(rnying rgyud): skul ba'i tshe arga dang ge tor ma 'bul ba ni gong du smos rab bzhin du bgyi'o// khres na thams cad phyag na tri shul 'bar ba// g.yon rnge'u chung bsnams pa// gdan me smag/ 
365b5(rnying rgyud): nag sku'i kha dog nag mo la khrag dang zhag dang thal ba/ 'i thig les tshom bur byas shing ba su tas rked pa ba cings pa/ gser gyi lpags pa go zur bsgos pa srod tu/ 
365b6(rnying rgyud): a dza nas lus brgyan te gcer bu'i tshogs skrag gnag 'bar ba/ g.yon rnge'u chung bsnams pa// g.yas me smug kun ka kha dog nag mo la 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs shing
365b7(rnying rgyud): zas par byas nas slar dpal chen po'i sku la thim par bya'o// da ni phyi rim bshad par bya'o// shar phyogasu sing rtse kha kha dog ser mo zhing chung kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas
365b8(rnying rgyud): g.yon bsnol pa/ sing+ga'i mgo can lho phyogs na bya khra mu kha kha dog dmar mo lag pa gnyis bsnol te mdun zhing gnas pa la lta ba/ stag gi mgo can nub phyogasu sni ka mu kha
366a1(rnying rgyud): dog nag mo lag pa gnyis zhing chu ngu 'dzin cing lces ldag pa wa mgo can/ byang phyogs na shon mu kha kha dog 'thing ka zhing lag pa gnyis kyis khong dral te lta ba l+yaM
366a2(rnying rgyud): mgo can/ shar lho'i mtsham su kri ta mu kha kha dog dmar gnag zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas ban+d+ha g.yon gri thogs pa bya rgod kyi mgo can/ lho nub mtshams
366a3(rnying rgyud): na kang ka mu kha kha dog dkar dmar phrag pa g.yon pa la zhing khel zhing rkang pa nas bzung ba/ g.yas pa mgo 'dzin pa/ bya kang ka'i mgo can mchu ring thor to gug ze ba dmar mo// 
366a4(rnying rgyud): nub byang mtshams na ka ka mu kha kha dog nag mo// bya rog gi mgo can mchus zhing thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa ngas pad+ma ban+d+ha 'dzin pa/ byang shar mtsham su hu lU ka mu kha
366a5(rnying rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs lag pa g.yon pa dung chen khrag gis/ bkang ba la 'thung ba lag g.yas pa rdo rje lcags/ skya 'dzin pa/ 'ug pa'i mgo can/ nang rom 'ug pa'i la
366a6(rnying rgyud): gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya rog gi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'o phyi rim bya kang ka mchu rings kyi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rom bya rgod kyi 'khor gyis bskor/ de dag thams cad
366a7(rnying rgyud): kyang zhing mang po gsar rnying spungs pa'i steng na zhing la rtod pa'i phyir 'thab pa'i tshul ston pa she dag go// de dag gi snying po 'di rnamaso// hUM ha he phaT hUM/ 'di kun 'bru re re yan lan
366a8(rnying rgyud): bzhi bzhi brjod// hUM gis ga tso bo bskyed/ has nang gi lha mo bskyed/ des phyi'i lha mo bskyed/ phaT kyis thams cad khros par bskul hUM gis thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer
366b1(rnying rgyud): bas phyogs bcur khyab par bgyi'o// lha mo blo ldan tshogs kyis bdag/ he ru dpal la phyag 'tshalo// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang // rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa dang // dam tshig gnyen
366b2(rnying rgyud): bo dral ba dang // rdo rje spun la 'khu byed rnams/ khyed kyis rdul du rlags nas ni// gnod sems ma lus gtan nas phyung // dpal chen po ta na 'ga' na'i gnasu tshogs chen po lag
366b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshe sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo'i gzi byin gyis gdug pa thams cad gtan nas 'byin cing longs spyod chen po 'gying zhing 'gying ba'i glu blangs te/ thams cad dgyes par mdzad
366b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings 'dis dgyes par mdzad// rdo rje pad+mar daphyag rgya dpral bar bcings te phyar nas mchod shing 'khor thams cad gcer bur byung nas skra gshig
366b5(rnying rgyud): cing rgyugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM e a l-i ho hU~M hU~M hAM hUM/ de nas tshogasu gshegs nas 'a khor thams cad la spyan dgrad pas gzigs shing 'dzun
366b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i brda' ha ha saM saM sgra phyung ste/ 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu dbyangs 'dis gtso bo la bstod do// e ma'o// chos kyi don byung ba/ chos don dag pa bdag med pa/ nam
366b7(rnying rgyud): dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshalo zhes bstod pas gtso bo mnyes nas 'khor thams cad la gzigs shing dam stsal pa'i dbyangs 'di gsung so// kha gA l+ya/ 
366b8(rnying rgyud): sha ta ba ka/ a la la la ho// ma ha bany+tsa a mri ta/ kha raM lo gi ni/ kha ra DA ki ni/ a la la la ho// b+ha ga bAn kha ga ga/ lha mo rnams rnga rdung / dbyangs len/ rgyud gsum gyi tshig
367a1(rnying rgyud): te g+he te ts+tshe/ tig+ha/ tem+be/ ta g+ne ste/ g+ho g+h+ra g+he/ 'phags pa thabs kyi nags pa pad+mo phreng rigs sngags gcod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// 
367a2(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/ bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'du 'phro'i klong dkyil na// khro bo chen po rnams bzhugs pa// brkyang bskum tshul gyis gnas pa ste/ 8
367a3(rnying rgyud): kyis khrag 'thung chen po ni// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// gshog pa rdo rje gdoms pa gdeng // zhabs kyang brgyad du rnam par bstan// de yi dkyil 'khor khro bo ni// dbu gsum byag/ 
367a4(rnying rgyud): drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje'i brag steng na/ 'jig rten skyong bas 'dud chu lo// de yi pho nya bka'an ni// rdo rje 'bru men gtum bag can// 'jig pa'i gzugs
367a5(rnying rgyud): can mang po ste// de dag cir yang 'grub par byed/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las khro 'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
367a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje srin mo chen mo ni// 'jigs byed chen mor snang ba ste// phyag kyang srin po chen po ltar// 'thun te zhabs kyang de dang 'dra// de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor du// rin chen me tog po
367a7(rnying rgyud): nas ni// lcags la bab pa'i lha de ni// gnyer na 'grub par the tshom med// dge dang dge'i chos rnams la// lhag par bsten par mi bya ste// mnyam nyid rig pa'i klung zhum
367a8(rnying rgyud): nas// ci la thogs pa med par spyod// rdo rje dbyug pa blangs na su// g.yab mo lnga yang g.yab par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor bzhugs par brtag/ mchod pa chen po dbul bar bya// 
367b1(rnying rgyud): se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang // mgyogs mas phyogs bcu gar yang phyin// de la zhon na 'gro byed pa// bya rog mgo can la sogs kun// sbed byed ma yis sbas pa ni// mthu chen
367b2(rnying rgyud): lha srin gang gis kyang // de la mthong bar mi nus na// gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la nus// bskul byed las ni gzhan 'debs yin// mgyogs ma'i las ni phyin par 'gro/ gsod
367b3(rnying rgyud): ma'i las ni grub pa yin// so sor ma bsgrubs nyid 'gro ma// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rdo rje srin mo'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / oM badz+ra kr-i/ 
367b4(rnying rgyud): d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn dza hUM ba ma ho// da ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha shri he ru ka hUM/ a a ats+tsha/ 
367b5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+re kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ gardza gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi badz+ra ya hUM/ ha na ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM dzA kro d+ha nI la ka Na De hUM/ da ha da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha \u0f7f
367b6(rnying rgyud): man ta ka d+na/ pa tsa ba tsi be tsi hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+hA ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+b+ha hi ya gr-i ba hUM/ hu luN+Da lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM bidz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra tsi tAts+tsha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM \u0f7f
367b7(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kuN Da lo hUM/ ts+tshin d+hats+tshan+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-id+hA trai la~M gyi bi dza ya hUM/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA la la hUM/ s+pho Ta s+phoT s+pho Ta hU~M phaT/ 'phags pa/ 
367b8(rnying rgyud): thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las khro bo bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang las kyi sngags ril 'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM/ ha la ha la ha la ha
368a1(rnying rgyud): sgyu sa ba/ \u0f7f/ ma sams sus surbA hA/ mamams ma s+sa b+hUb+hU b+hUd+hA d+hArmA/  sgyu 'dugs pa labs kyi gags pa pad+ma dulas
368a2(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // mnyam pa nyid rtogs byas nas// bskul zhing gisogs pa thams cad kyi // phyag rgya yin zhes rgyal pos bshad// mdo tsam du ni 'ang
368a3(rnying rgyud): brtag/ lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng // rkang pa 'thil sbyor thur du gzugs// tshogs chen bzhi yang gcag par bya// mgo dang mtshan yang snying por brtag/ rdo rje co cig rtse
368a4(rnying rgyud): dang // bcu gcig tu yang rnam brtags te// 'di ni khrag 'thung chen po yi// phyag rgya yin par dpa' bos pa sha da// lag na thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng // rkang pa phral nas
368a5(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum zhing // gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed/ pa// 'di ni hUM gi rgya chen yin// rkang pa 'phral/ mthil zur du gzugs// lag pa phral nas gar byed ci/ 
368a6(rnying rgyud): stabs su mchod par byed pa ni// 'di ni stobs chen phyag rgya yin// rkang pa g.yon gyis g.yas la 'khyud// lag pa gar thabs bskor nas kyang // thal mo drag tu brdabs pa ni// 
368a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas g.yon mthe bo yis// mthe'u chung sen mo'i mthil du gnan// gdangs pa'i thabasu bsgreng ba ni// dbyug sngon can gyis phyag rgya
368a8(rnying rgyud): yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis// rdeg pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang // g.yon pa skul brten pa ni// gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i thal ma
368b1(rnying rgyud): gdab pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang // g.yon gyis 'dzin pa ltar byas pa// mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa thal mo sbyar nas ni// gung mo rgyab tu bsnol bar bya// mthe bo
368b2(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyang bral te bsgreng // spyi bor bzhag pa gre ba'i rgya// rkang pa g.yas pa'i thur du gzugs// lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng // g.yon pa'i brkang pa lag phyar ba'i// gzhan
368b3(rnying rgyud): gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin// log pa g.yas g.yon bskur brten te// rkang pa gshibs te mchongs pa ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya zhes// dpa' bo chen pos yang du bshad// 
368b4(rnying rgyud): lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang // rkang pa brkyang ba skum byas pa ni// khams gsum rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes// mgon po dpa' bos yang du bshad// lag pa
368b5(rnying rgyud): g.yas g.yon sprugs pa dang // lus kyang drag du gsigs pa ni// rdo rje phra men ma rnams kyi// phyag rgya yin pa ra 'dren par bshad// phyag rgya 'di dag bcings nas ni stan
368b6(rnying rgyud): chen drag du mchongs byas na// khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur// gzhan yang go 'phangs thams cad kun// grub par gyur te the tshom med// rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos
368b7(rnying rgyud): bshad// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / 'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa'i// dkyil du khrag
368b8(rnying rgyud): 'thung spyan drangs te// mdun du hUM yang spyan drang // rgyab du stobs chen spyan drangs nas// 'khor lo rtsibs kyi steng dag tu// bcu po rnams kyang go rims bzhin// so so'i gnas su
369a1(rnying rgyud): spyan drangs te// dmar gyi arga gsol nas ni// mchod yon gzhan yang dbul bar bya// rdo rje dbyangs kyis bstod byas te// de nas las rnams bsgrub par ga
369a2(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// khros pas yud tsam rlag mdzad// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa badz+ra
369a3(rnying rgyud): phreng las las kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / rdo rje 'dra men sbyor ba yis// yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas// rtod pa'i tshul du rab bstabs na// lha yang rung ste/ 
369a4(rnying rgyud): brlag par 'gyur// 'ug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa'i 'phra men ma rnams spang byas te// mig dang rna ba sna drang lce// de yi sems 'phrogs bsgom nyams 'gyur// 'dra
369a5(rnying rgyud): men rnams ni spad byas te// de yi sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing // gsang ste 'khrug par bsgom byas na// sgrub pa nyams shing 'bye bar 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs
369a6(rnying rgyud): kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i las kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / hom khung zur gsum gdengs po la// rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan byas te// thod pa dag gis
369a7(rnying rgyud): rnam par brgyan// spyan drangs bsregs na lha yang 'chi// 'phra men mngags te bkug nas ni// thabs kun bsregs na mod la 'chi// gsur dang bsres pa'i sha rnams kyis// 
369a8(rnying rgyud): lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje glu ni blangs nas su// 'byung po'i sha ni shin tu zhom// 'byung ba'i khrag ni shin tu zhing // 'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste// gsol ste
369b1(rnying rgyud): dgyes par mdzod// 'phags pa thabs kyi nags pa pad+mo 'phreng las drag po hom gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// ljags so nag za' shing rnams la// mgo brgya mdung / 
369b2(rnying rgyud): rtse zur gsum// khro bo khro mo rnams bsgoms te// btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po phur pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// 
369b3(rnying rgyud): lcags phye dug dang rdo phye dang // khrag las smras te bsres pa dang // mud ga'i chan dang sbyor ba dag/ sbyor bas gtor na de brlag 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo dri
369b4(rnying rgyud): las drag po'i gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu ga cig pa'o// / khro mo'i dkyil 'khor gtun khung du/ khro ba'i tho bas brdungs pa yi// rdo rje gtun phrugs bsgom
369b5(rnying rgyud): byas na/ lha yang rung ste brdangs par 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // drag
369b6(rnying rgyud): las kyis bsgrubs pa'i rnams// 'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo bcad nas// rnam shes hUM gis bsdus btums te// 'og min bla med gnas mchog na// gtso bo lnga dang gtse ma
369b7(rnying rgyud): lnga/ sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo rnams// sbyor ba'i lhum su phaT kyis 'phang // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las gnas bstabs
369b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // bla gam dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa// khro bo khro mo spyan drangs te// mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod// de nas las
370a1(rnying rgyud): rnams brtsam par bya// chags pa'i rdo rje 'khor bcas pa// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// chags pas yud la dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur/ 
370a2(rnying rgyud): gang yang med// rdo rje 'phra men mngags nas su// bkug nas khro bo chen po yis// chags pa'i tshul gyis de lus las// dpa' dang gzi brjid bsdus nas 'grub// 'phra men rnams
370a3(rnying rgyud): kyi mngags nasu// de yi mig rna sna dang lce// lus dang sems bsgyur rnams bsgoms na// kun la mdzes shing dga' bar 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang
370a4(rnying rgyud): gi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / hom khung zla gam gdengs pa la// rdo rje zhags pa/ das brgyan par bya// de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te// mi
370a5(rnying rgyud): rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste/ nyi shu lnga pa'o// // zangs sam kha dog
370a6(rnying rgyud): dmar po'i shing // mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam// mgo la khro bo'i 'khor bsgoms te// btab na nges par de dbang bsgyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi phur/ 
370a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i las bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // zangs phye dang ni bu ram dang // dmar po'i 'bras can la sogs pa// sbyar bas gtor ma btang bar bya// mthong bas nges pa
370a8(rnying rgyud): de dbang 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng ba las dbang gi gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
370b1(rnying rgyud): bsgoms byas na// lha yang rung ste dbang du 'gyur// de ni bde ba chen po yin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// 
370b2(rnying rgyud): gru bani dkyil 'khor brtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// mchod pa klu la sogs pas mchod// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor ba
370b3(rnying rgyud): bas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun// dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod// khro bo khro mo 'khor bcas dang // rdo rje 'phra men 'khom
370b4(rnying rgyud): bcas pas// dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel bsgoms na/ dbadag nyid chen por de 'gyuro// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu dang / 
370b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// // hom khung gu bzhi gdengs pa la// rdo rje'i khor los brgyan par bya// de nas lha rnams spyan dang / sa te// bsregs pas mchod cing dpal 'phel bsgom/ 
370b6(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur bzhi lha rnam
370b7(rnying rgyud): bsgoms te gdab par bya// 'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// // gser
370b8(rnying rgyud): 'bras chan ser po rnams// 'o ma sbrang rtsi gtor ma ni// rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste// mkhas pas rgyas par bsgom zhing sbyin// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las
371a1(rnying rgyud): / rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// // lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems
371a2(rnying rgyud): ni 'phro bsgoms na// 'di ni rgyas pa'i las 'grub bo// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// // zlum po'i dkyil 'a
371a3(rnying rgyud): brtsibs brgyad par// lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te// dkar po'i yon gyis mchod pa bya// de nas las rnams tsam par bya// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten
371a4(rnying rgyud): khams ni rab 'byams kun// yud rtsam nyid la zho mdzade// zhi bar grub la phyag 'tshalo// lha rnams 'khor ba ces thams cad kyis// 'khrug pa thams cad ni mdzad
371a5(rnying rgyud): par/ bsgoms na thams cad yud tsam gyis// zhi bar/ 'gyur te the tshom med// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las ni ba'i las kyi le'u ste sum bcu bzhi pa/ 
371a6(rnying rgyud): hom khung zlum po gdengs pa la// rdo rje pad+mos brgyan par bya// phur pa dkar po drug btab te// spyan drangs rdul phye sogs pas mchod// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las
371a7(rnying rgyud): ni ba'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o// // phur pa kha dog dkar po la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtsi zlum par// lha rnams bsgoms la gdab par bya// 'di ni zhi ba'i las la shis/ 
371a8(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las zhi ba'i phur ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// // dngul dang 'bras chen dkar po rnams// 'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni// zhi ba
371b1(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba'i gtor ma te// mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms shing gtor// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// // lha monam
371b2(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi grub pa bsgom par bya// byin gyis thams cad zhi bsgoms na// lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las ni
371b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i spyod pa las kyi le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// // mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de las dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas
371b4(rnying rgyud): pas ci dga' bsgyur na 'grub// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las las bsdus pa'i le'u ste su bcu dgu pa'o// // drag pos thams cad 'dul bas
371b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// dbang gis 'byor pa mchog kyang 'grub// rgya sa pas gzi brjid rnam par 'phel// zhi bas bde ba 'i mchog kyang 'grub// 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa
371b6(rnying rgyud): pad+mo phreng las las sgrub pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan ni dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi
371b7(rnying rgyud): zlum por bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i don// 'khor lo rtsibs zur can du bya ba gzhi zlum po'i nang na gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyis rlabs kyi
371b8(rnying rgyud): lha dang / lha mo dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya la sogs pa dang nyid kyis 'gro ba'i don// rnam pa gcig tu chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye she
372a1(rnying rgyud): ci yang mkhyen pa lhun gyis grub pa'i don no// mtha' gru ba ni bya ba ni// phyogs bcu'i snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad la dbang bsgyur bas bde ba
372a2(rnying rgyud): po rgyas pa'i don/ dkyil nas lha mo lnga phyir lta ba// lha mo ni dbyings nyid nye ba'i byin rlabs te// sems dpas dbyings nyid dang nye ba mthong ba'i don no// sems dpa' lnga nang du lta
372a3(rnying rgyud): ba ni dbyings nyid nye ba la lta ba'i don no// sems dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni// dbyings nyid thams cad dus rdo ba lta bu bems po ma yin gyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing se/ 
372a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' nyid dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshigo/ sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes da/ dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa ma
372a5(rnying rgyud): yin gyi dbyings nyid dang ldan zhing dbyings nyid kyang ma khyen pa'i ye shes las mi zhan pa'i tha tshig/ rnam gcig tu sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi
372a6(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad dbang bsgyur ba'i don/ sems ma nang du lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don// sems dpa' dang sems ma byi
372a7(rnying rgyud): nang du gcig la gcig gzigs pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i tha tshig/ khro bo dang / khro mo ril phyir lta ba ni phyi'i dngos po dang rgol ba la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba'i
372a8(rnying rgyud): don// de la dbyings ni dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba lta bu'o// mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni nyi ma'i 'od snang zhing gsal ba lta bu'o// de'i byin rlabs ni dro nang 'jam pa lta bu'o// 
372b1(rnying rgyud): phyi'i dngos po la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba ni rtsi shing bskams pa dang tshig pa lta bu ste/ lha mo dang sems ma ni chos kyi dbyings rig pa'i don sems la snang ba'o// lha
